Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Sita Krishna Radha Vittala Rakhumayi Jaya Jaya Vittala Rakhumayi
Sooradasa Prabhu Karuna Sagara Vittala Rakhumayi
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Nagara Vittala Rakhumayi
Panduranga Prabhu Pandari Natha Vittala Rakhumayi Jaya Jaya Vittala Rakhumayi
Vittala Vittala Vittala Jai Jai
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to victorious Lord Rama, Lord of Sita; Glory to victorious Lord Krishna, Lord of Radha; Glory to victorious Lord Vittala, Lord of Rukmani Victory to Lord Vitthala, the lord of Meera, Soordas, Pandari

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Natavara Krishna Natavara Krishna Radhey Nandalala
Harey Harey Madhava Harey Gopika Lola
Karishna Ghana Ghana Nila Krishna Gokula Bala
Harey Harey Madhava Harey Gopika Lola
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the many names of the Lord: Krishna, Madhava, the Lord of Radha and the darling son of Nanda. O Dark blue-complexioned Lord Krishna of Gokula! Thou art the master actor of the Divine Play.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deena Bandhu Vitthala Jai Karuna Sindhu Vitthala Jai
Vitthala (3) Jai Paanduranga Vitthala Jai
Apath Bhaandhava Vitthala Jai Anaatha Rakshaka Vitthala Jai
Vitthala (3) Jai Paanduranaga Vitthala Jai
Parthi Pureesha Vitthala Jai Sri Satha Sai Vitthala Jai
Vitthala (3) Jai Paanduranaga Vitthala Jai
Devotional Song Meaning: Dear lord you are the friend of the forlorn. You protect us in times of distress, we pray to the one who is splenderous white. You are also the lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Gaye Geet Sada Subha Aur Shyam 
Har Ek Phal Pein Har Ek Kshan Mein 
Bhaja Ham Sada Tero Naam (Gaye ...) 
Koyi Kahe Thujhe Janaki Ram 
Koyi Pukare Radhey Shyam 
Hamarey Liye Thum Sai Bhagavaan (Gaye ...)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant 'Sai Ram'. Let us sing glory of Lord Sai Ram day and night, every minute and every second. Some pray Thee as Lord of Janaki- Lord Rama; some as Lord of Radha - Lord Shyama; but for us, Thou art Lord Sai Baba.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Ranga Sri Ranga Ranga Ranga Sri Ranga (2)
Kaveri Tatavasa Kasturi Ranga
Karunya Lavanya Karunanta Ranga
Jai Panduranga Jai Sai Ranga (2)
Devotional Song Meaning:
We adore Lord Ranganatha who exudes a heavenly aroma! 
You are the One whose shrine is located on the banks of the holy River Kaveri.
O Lord, Your Beauty and Grace is Unmatched! You are the Infinite Reservoir of Compassion.
Victory to You, O Lord Sai, the Purest One in White Complexion! O Sai Ranganatha, Victory to You, the Eternal Preserver of this Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Ram Bhaja Mana Ram 
Panduranga Shree Ranga Bhaja Mana Ram 
Bhaja Mana Keshava Bhaja Mana Madhava 
Bhaja Mana Yaadava Bhaja Mana Ram 
Bhaja Mana Mukunda Bhaja Mana Govinda 
Bhaja Mana Aananda Bhaja Mana Ram
Devotional Song Meaning:
O Mind! Worship Lord Rama, Panduranga, Keshava, Madhava, Yadava, Mukunda and Govinda. Be in 
bliss worshipping all these names of the Lord.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara Shambho 
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shambho Mahadeva 
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara Shambho 
Dhama Dhama Dhamaru Bhajey Shankara 
Ghana Ghana Ghanta Bhajey 
Hara Bholanatha Shambho 
Sathya Sai Naathha Shambho
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the Names of the Lord: Shankara, Shiva, Shambho and Mahadeva Accompanied by 'Damaru' (drum) beats of 'Dama, Dama' and the sound of ringing bells (Ghanta) 'Ghana Ghana'. Chant the easy-to-please name of Lord Sai Naathha who destroys all miseries of life

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhava Keshava O Mere Atma Ram
Tum Ho Mere Bhagavan  
Baba Tum Ho Mere Bhagavan
Sharanam Prabhu Sharanam Prabhu 
Sharanam Hare Sai Ram 
Daya Karo Daya Karo 
Daya Karo Bhagavan
Daya Karo Kripa Karo 
Raksha Karo Bhagavan
Devotional Song Meaning: You are known as Madhava and Keshava, you are also my inner resident. You are my lord, Baba. I seek thy refuge, be merciful dear lord, please do protect me.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
A temple in my heart, a prayer in my soul
A song on my lips and I sing to You (2X)

Baba Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Baba Sai
Baba,
I sing to You
Sathya Sai Baba, Baba Sai Baba, Sathya Sai
Baba,
I call to You
A light in my heart, a yearning in my soul
A name on my lips and I call to You (2X)

Joy in my heart, peace in my soul
A smile on my lips and I sing to You (2X)

Sai you are More Precious than Silver
 Sai you are More Value than Gold
 Sai you are More Beautiful than Diamonds
 Nothing I desire compares with You

Sai Charana Sukha Dayi Bhajore (x2)
Sai Naama Ke Do Akshara Mein
Sab Sukh Shaanti Samaayi Re
Sai Naath Ke Sharano Mein Aakar
Jeevana Saphala Banaao Re
Devotional Song Meaning: The feet of Sai grant grace and comfort. In the 2 lettered name of Sai is contained the entirety of peace and wellbeing. Find fulfillment in your like having taken refuge in his feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Lead Kindly Light, Lead me on
Through the dark night to a bright dawn
Lead Kindly Light Lead me on
Lead me from unreal onto the Real
Lead me from darkness to Divine Light
Lead me from death to Life Eternal (X2)
Lead me, Guide me, O Love Divine
Asathoma Sathgamaya
Thamosoma Jyotirgamaya
Mrithyorma Amrithamgamaya
Hari Om Hari Om, Om Sai Ram
-- 2nd Speed --
Hari Om Hari Om, Om Sai Ram
Asathoma Sathgamaya

Ganesha Shiva's son I reverently Implore Thee
Ganesha You are the One to Clear the Path before me
Ganesha Shiva's son I reverently Implore Thee
Ganesha You are the One to Clear the Path before me

Lord Sai within my heart humbly I adore Thee
Lord Sai I pray Thou art kept in mind before me
Lord Sai within my heart humbly I adore Thee
Lord Sai I pray Thou art kept in mind before me

Lead Kindly Light Sathya Sai Baba(X2)
You have come to fill our hearts, fill our hearts with love
You have come to light the lamp, light the lamp of love

Guide me Oh Lord Sathya Sai Baba
Guard me Oh Lord Sathya Sai Baba
You have come to Show the way, lead me by the hand
You will always watch for me, however far I am

Picture His Form Sathya Sai Baba
The Universal Light Sathya Sai Baba
Satyam Shivam Sundaram Sathya Sai Baba
Make the temple in your heart the place where He resides

Chant The Name Of God Sing The Glory Of The Lord
Hare Ram Hare Ram Hare Krishna ,Sai Ram 
Call Him Allah Or Buddha Jesus Zorrastra 
Say Ram Rahim Mahavir Sai Natha 
He is All Names And All Forms Choose Anyone
 He is All Names And All Forms Almigthy One (x2)

Sai Ram, Hear My Call To You, Sai Ram Hear My Call
Sai Ram, I Know You Must Hear My Call
Sai Ram, Hear My Call To You, Sai Ram Hear My Call
In My Heart Is A Burning, Yearning For You
I Am Waiting, I Am Praying, I Am Calling To You

Va Va Murugaiya Vadivel Azhaga
Va Va Va Kumara Tiru Karthikeya (Va Va Murugaiya ...) 
Singaravela Shiva Shakthi Bala 
Sangeetha Lola Sathya Saieesha 
Va Va Murugaiya Vadivel Azhaga (6X - low and high)
Devotional Song Meaning: Come, Come, O Lord Muruga (Subramanium), beautiful form with the spear in your hand, Come O son of Shiva and Parvathi, Come O Sai Baba, lover of music.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Jai Sadguru Maharaj Jai Sadguru Maharaj
Hey Sai Natha Bhagawan Jai Sadguru Maharaj
Prema Swaroopa Shanthi Swaroopa Jai Sadguru Maharaj
Papa Vinashaka Mukthi Pradayaka Jai Sadguru Maharaj
Hey Sai Natha Bhagawan Jai Sadguru Maharaj
Devotional Song Meaning: Praise the one true teacher, the one true king. Sai you are the true teacher. Your form is love and peace. You destroy our sins and grant us liberation. Dear Sai you are our teacher.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sathya Swaroopini Sai Janani
Nitya Niranjani Mata Sai
Parama Dayavani Mangala Roopini
Jagadodharini Kaivalya Dayini
Karuna Sagari Pahi Maheshwari
Devotional Song Meaning: Dear Sai, Mother your form is of truth. Ever fresh and new are you. You are one filled with superme compassion and one whose form is auspicious. You redeem the world and grant us liberation. Oh, Ocean of mercy, protect us dear mother.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru Devo Maheshwara
Jaya Deva Guru Deva Jaya Sathya Sai Eshwara
Jai Jai Jai Karunakara Jai Jai Jai Akhileshwara
Jai Jai Jai Shirdishwara Jai Jai Jai Parthishwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the Sai Guru, who is Brahma (creator), Vishnu (sustainer) and Maheshwara (destroyer). Adore His lotus feet, which redeems all from miseries.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru Devo Maheshwara
Jaya Deva Guru Deva Jaya Sathya Sai Eshwara
Jai Jai Jai Karunakara Jai Jai Jai Akhileshwara
Jai Jai Jai Shirdishwara Jai Jai Jai Parthishwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the Sai Guru, who is Brahma (creator), Vishnu (sustainer) and Maheshwara (destroyer). Adore His lotus feet, which redeems all from miseries.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gajanana Gajanana
Prathama Pujana Gana Raya
Prathama Prathana Sri Gana Raya
Lambodara Gana Raya
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord Gajanana! Thou art the One Whom all worship and pray. O'Mighty One! Thou art King of the Divine Forces.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prema Bhakthi Jagao Man Mein 
Aao Mere Bhajana Mein Baba (1)
Aao Mere Hrudaya Mein Baba (1)
Tuma Ho Deena Janon Ke Sai
Tuma Ho Bhakta Janon Ke Baba
Aao Mere Bhajana Mein Baba (1)
Aao Mere Hrudaya Mein Baba (1)
Devotional Song Meaning: Awaken love and devotion in our hearts dear lord. Please accept my offering and come into my heart. You belong to the down trodden, you belong to your devotees. Please come.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Son of Shiva, son of shakti
Lord ganesha is your name
Remove all our tears, remove all our fears
Uplift us, empower us with love
Sainatha ganesha, the son of Mahesha
Sing through us lord of all lords (2x)

Let my heart reflect thy light lord
As the moon reflects the light of
the sun in love, always in love (x2)
Hu Allah Allah Hu Allah, Hu Allah Allah Hu. (x2)

Giridhara Nagara Kunja Vihari
Madhuvana Sanchari Parthi Vihari 
Shyamala Sundara Mayura Mukutadhara
Pankaja Lochana Madhava Mohana
Madhuvana Sanchari Parthi Vihari
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Giridhara who held up the mountain to save His devotees, moves around in Kunj. Hail Lord Krishna who resides in Parthi and loves to roam in the fields of ‘Madhuvana’. The dark-complexioned beautiful Lord, with the effulgence of a thousand suns rising together wears a crown of peacock feathers on His head. With eyes ruddy as the interior of a lotus, the Lord of Lakshmi has an exquisitely beautiful form, very much pleasing to behold

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jagadeesha Jaya Paramesha
Nilakantha Sada Shiva
Om Hari Om
Hari Om Hari Om
Devadhi Deva Dina Dayala
Chandrashekhara Shambho (2)
Nilakantha Sada Shiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to supreme Lord Mahesha, who has blue neck (He swallowed the poison which came out during churning of ocean to retrieve the earth and kept in His throat - Nilakantha). He is merciful Lord, Lord of all Lords, perpetually auspicious and has Crescent on His forehead. Chant the mantra, "HARI OM , HARI OM

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Shivaya Om Shivaya
Shambho Shankara Om Shivaya 
Shambho Shankara Om Shivaya 
Shambho Shankara Om Shivaya 
Om Shivaya Om Shivaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the mantra, " Om Shivaya, Shambho Shankara Om Shivaya ".

Devotional Song Lyrics:
I bow down at the Feet of Ganesha
Ganesha Ganesha 
(I bow down …)
Ganesha, I Pray, You will clear my way (3x) 
Ganesha Ganesha
(I bow down …)
Jai Ganesha, Sai Ganesha, clear my way to Baba (3x)
Ganesha Ganesha

Ayyappa Sharaname Ayyappa Sharaname Ayyappa Sharaname Swami Ayyappa Sharaname
Shabari Nayaka Shanthi Dayaka Ayyappa Sharaname Swami Ayyappa Sharaname
Parthi Nayaka Prashanthi Dayaka Ayyappa Sharaname Swami Ayyappa Sharaname
Devotional Song Meaning: We seek refuge in Ayyappa and sing his glory. Glory to the lord of the devotee Sabari, the granter of peace. Glory to the lord of Parthi, the granter of eternal peace.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aao Aao Aao Aao
Aao Sundara Nanda Gopal
Navaneetha Chora Manasa Vihara
Darshana Do Nandalala (2)
Mujhey Darshana Do Nandalala
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome to the charming Gopala, the son of Nanda who lovingly stole butter and who revels in the hearts of devotees. Oh Nandalala, grace us with your Darshan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aao Aao Antaryami
Adi Narayana Sai Narayana |Aao Aao...|
Hrudaya Vihari Hey Giridhari
Hey Giridhari Hey Giridhari
Hari Hari Sri Hari Sai Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome Lord Sai Narayana, the indweller of our hearts! Chant the names of Sai Giridhari, Hari and Sai Murari

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aao Aao Hey Bhagawan
Sab Jeevan Ke Karo Kalyan |Aao Aao...|
Tum Ho Parama Krupa Ke Sagar
Tum Ho Guna Mandir Nata Naagara
Tum Ho Sathya Sanathana Swami
Ghata Ghata Vasi Antaryami
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome O Lord! Bless and grant auspiciousness and peace. You are the Ocean of Compassion, the Temple of Virtues. You are the Truth and Eternal Bliss, omnipresent in every being

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aao Aao Nandalala
Sundara Shyama Gopala |Aao Aao...|
Tum Hi Ho Bansidhari Shyama
Ayodhya Pathi Sita Rama
Parthi Baba Karuna Sindhu (Nidhan)
Maakhan Chora Yashoda Bala
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome Oh Nandalala (Krishna). You are beautiful and the holder of the divine flute. You are Lord Rama of Ayodhya, the Lord of Sita. You are Lord Sai of Parthi the compassionate one. You are also the darling son of Mother Yashoda, the one who stole butter.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aao Aao Sai Natha
Aao Aao Hey Jagannatha |Aao Aao...|
Darshan Ke Liye Taras Rahey Hai
Nayan Hamarey O Sai
Darsha Dikhao Daya Ke Sagar
Aao Shankara Hey Parameshwara
Aao Aao Sai Natha
Aao Aao Hey Jagannatha (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome! Oh Sai, Lord of the Universe, Our eyes are eager to see Your Divine form. Kindly grant us your Divine Darshan O Ocean of Compassion! Welcome Oh Lord Krishna

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aao Aao Sai Pyaarey
Keertan Karoon Main Sai Tumharey |Aao Aao...|
Tum Ho Merey Nayanon Ke Taarey
Darshan Do Jeevan Ke Saharey
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome, Oh Beloved Lord Sai! I sing Your glory! Oh Supreme Lord you are the twinkling star of my eyes. Oh companion of my life, kindly grant us your Divine Darshan

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aao Aao Shyama Gopal
Madhura Manohara Sai Gopal Aao |Aao Aao...|
Dharma Uddharana Bhaktha Parayana
Aao Narayana Krishna Gopal (Aao)
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome Oh Shyam Gopala, the one who has a charming and a captivating form. You are the upholder of righteousness and very dear to the devotees who treads the right path. We welcome you as Narayana, Krishna and Gopala

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aao Aao Swami
Hrudaya Mandir Mey Aao Swami |Aao Aao|
Darshana Dey Prabhu Paapa Vinashaka
Sharanagatha Ke Bhava Bhaya Mochana
Sathya Swaroopa Aao
Prema Swaroopa Aao Swami
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome Lord. Please come and install yourself in our hearts. Your Divine Darshan dispels all sins. Give me refuge and save me from the cycle of birth and death. Please come, Oh embodiment of Divine Love and Truth

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aao Gopala Giridhari
Aao Aao Antaryami
Aao Aao Ananda Sai |Aao Gopala...|
Aao Aao Hrudaya Nivasi
Aao Aao (Pra) Shanthi Nivasi
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome Lord Sai Giridhari Gopala! The indweller of our hearts. Welcome, Oh Blissful Lord of Prashanthi

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aao Gopala Shyama Gopala
Darsha Dikhao Mujhey Parthi Gopala |Aao Gopala|
Brindavan Ke Krishna Gopala
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Gopala
Aao Gopala Shyama (Sai) Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Come and grant us your divine Darshan Oh Gopala! The one with Blue complexion who dwells in Brindavan and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aao Prabhu Aao Sai Bhagawan
Sathya Sai Bhagawan |Aao Prabhu...|
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Pradatha
Nithya Nirmala Jeevana Daata
Jagadodharana Bhaktha Parayana
Aao (Sai) Narayana Bhakthon Ke Pran
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome! Oh Lord Sathya Sai Bhagawan! You endow everyone with purity of life, truth, righteousness, bliss and love. Oh Lord Sai Narayana! You are the saviour of entire creation and the Lord dear to your Devotees

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aao Pyaarey Nayana Hamarey Sai Hamarey Aao
Tum Bin Koi Nahin Rakhwaley
Tum Bin Kaun Saharey (Baba)
Tum Bin Kaun Saharey Aao Sai Pyaarey
Sai Hamarey Aao (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome! Oh Beloved Lord Sai! You are our protector. Without You, there is no one to protect and support us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aao Sai Gopal
Aao Gopal Aao Gopal Aao Sai Gopal |Aao Sai...|
Aao Hey Prabhu Parama Dayal
Aao Natawara Lal
Aao Sundara Aao Abhayankara Aao Shiva Shankara Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome! Oh Sai Gopal, the Lord who is most merciful. Welcome! Oh Sai, who is the form of Shiva Shankara, the beautiful one and the protector of the Universe

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aao Sai Narayana Darshan Deejo
Tum Ho Jagat Vidhata (2)
Tum Hi Ho Brahma Tum Hi Ho Vishnu
Tum Hi Ho Shankara Roopa (2)
Tum Hi Ho Rama Tum Hi Ho Krishna
Tum Ho Vishwa Vidhata (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome Sai Narayana grant us your Darshan. You are Brahma, Vishnu, Shankara, Rama, Krishna and you are the one who creates and organizes the universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Abhaya Pradayini Ananda Roopini
Rajeeva Lochani Raja Rajeshwari
Parthi Pureeshwari Paapa Vimochani
Hrudaya Viharini Sai Janani (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother, you are the one who bestows protection from fear, you are bliss personified having eyes resembling the lotus petal. Oh goddess, of Parthi you are the remover of sins and the one who revels in our hearts.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Abhaya Pradayini Ananda Roopini
Rajeeva Lochani Raja Rajeshwari
Parthi Pureeshwari Paapa Vimochani
Hrudaya Viharini Sai Janani (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother, you are the one who bestows protection from fear, you are bliss personified having eyes resembling the lotus petal. Oh goddess, of Parthi you are the remover of sins and the one who revels in our hearts.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Abhaya Pradayini MataMahalakshmi
Alankara Roopini MataMahalakshmi |Abhaya Pradayini...|
MataMahalakshmi Sai Mahalakshmi
Ananda Dayini MataMahalakshmi
Amrutha Varshini MataMahalakshmi |Mata Mahalakshmi...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Mother Mahalakshmi (the Goddess of wealth) is the One who has decorated Herself grandly. She confers freedom from fear, Bliss and Grace in a torrent who is presently moving on Earth as Sai Mahalakshmi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Adi Narayana Sai Narayana
Jaya Hari Narayana Jaya Jaya
Pandari Vasa Hari Narayana
Parthi Nivasa Sai Narayana
Varada Narayana Veda Narayana |Jaya Hari|
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Sai Narayana, the primordial one. You are the resident of Pandari and the Lord of Parthi. Victory to Lord Narayana who confers boons, who is the source for the origin of the Vedas.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Adi Parashakthi Ma Ananda Roopini Ma
Parthi Nivasini Ma Jagadodharini Ma
Teri Mahima Jo Koi Gave
Janam Janam Ka Dukh Bisrave
Premamayi Sai Ma Sathya Swaroopini Ma |Parthi Nivasini Ma|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother! the resident of Parthi, you are the supreme power and bliss personified who sustains the universe. Those who sing your glory would be free from miseries accumulated from multiple lives. You are the embodiment of Love and supreme Truth.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Adi Poojita Gajanana
Mangala Kari Maha Ganadhipa |Adi Poojita...|
Ambika Tanaya Gajanana
Amba Bhavani Shiva Shambho Kumara
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Gajanana (elephant headed god), you are the first adored (worshipped), bestower of auspiciousness and the head of Ganas (group of demigods). You are the one who makes us cross this turbulent world, victory to you, oh son of Lord Parvathi and Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Adi Shesha Anantha Shayana
Srinivasa Sri Venkatesha
Raghukula Tilaka Raghu Ramachandra
Sita Pathey Sri Ramachandra |Adi Shesha|
Yadu Kula Tilaka Yashoda Bala
Radha Pathey Gopala Krishna
Pannaga Bhooshana Gowri Manohara
Uma Pathey Shiva Shambho Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Adore the Lord Srinivasa also known as Venkatesha, who reclines on the seven headed serpent. Sing the glory of Ramachandra, the supreme of Raghu dynasty who is worshipped by his consort Sita. Chant the name of Krishna, the son of mother Yashoda and the supreme of Yadu dynasty who fostered the cowherds and who is worshipped by His consort Radha. Worship Lord Shiva bestower of auspiciousness, one who wears a serpent as His ornament and who is adored by his consort Parvathi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aganita Guna Abharana Vibhushani
Adi Parashakthi Devi Namo
Sakala Charachara Srishti Samrakshini
Jagadeeshwari Jaganmata Namo
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh supreme goddess Shakthi (Parvathi), salutation to thee, who has immeasurable good qualities as your ornaments and who protects and sustains both animate and inanimate things of this creation. Oh goddess of the universe salutation to thee.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Agarva Sarva Mangala Om Namah Shivaya
Kishora Chandrashekara Om Namah Shivaya
Bhujanga Raja Shobhita Om Namah Shivaya
Mrudanga Tunga Mangala Om Namah Shivaya
Dharadharendra Vanditha Om Namah Shivaya
Prachanda Tandava Shiva Om Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Shiva, salutation to thee. You are the embodiment of primordial sound Om who exhibits humility and bestows auspiciousness. You adorn the crescent moon and the mighty serpent, dancing to the rhythm of drums during creation. All Gods and eminent people worship you, Oh Lord Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aho Madhura Aho Madhura Atmaka Lingam
Sathya Sai Nabhi Kamala Udbhava Lingam
Shivarathri Mahotsava Atmaka Lingam
Shuddha Sphatika Jyothirmaya Mangala Lingam
Sathyam Shivam Sundaram Atmaka Lingam
Tat Pranamami Sada Sayeeshwara Lingam
Devotional Song Meaning: We bow to that immortal Linga (symbol of Lord Shiva) created from the Naval of Sayeeshwara during the festival of Shivarathri, which is the symbol of light and purity and the embodiment of truth, auspiciousness and beauty.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ajanu Bahum Aravinda Netram
Atmabhi Ramam Manasa Smarami (2)
Bhooloka Vaikunta Parthi Nivasam
Prabhu Sai Ramam Manasa Smarami (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Meditate on the form of Lord Rama, whose abode is the heart of devotees, whose arms extend upto his knees and whose eyes are like the blooming lotus. Meditate on Lord Sai Rama, the Dweller of Parthi, which is verily the Heaven on Earth.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Akhanda Jyothi Jalao Sai Man Mandir Mey
Akhanda Jyothi Jalao
Koti Surya Sama Teja Swaroopa
Sai Tum Ho Divya Swaroopa
Akhanda Jyothi Jalao (2)
Divya Jyothi Gnana Jyothi Prema Jyothi Jalao |Akhanda Jyothi|
Akhanda Jyothi Jalao (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord Sai! Illumine the temple of my mind so that the flame of knowledge may glow continiously. You, my Lord have the effulgence of ten million suns, kindle the infinite flame of divinity, wisdom and Divine Love in my mind.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Akhila Jagat Ke Daata Sai
Shirdi Nivasi Bhagawan
Darshan Do Bhagawan (Sai)
Kalimala Bhanjana Parama Daya Ghana
Karuna Nidhey Shirdi Vasa (Parthi Vasa)
Deena Janavana Parthi Mahesha
Shirdi Nivasi Bhagawan |Darshan Do|
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Sai, the dweller of Shirdi, grace us with your divine presence. Oh Sai, you are the supreme reserve of compassion and kindness. Annihilate our acquired impurities. Lord of Parthi, you are the refuge of the forlorn.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Akhila Loka Nayaki Devi Tripura Sundari
Ananda Dayini Devi Jagadeeshwari
Adi Mahakaali Lakshmi Mahadevi Roopini |Ananda Dayini...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh goddess, you are beauty personified, head of all the worlds and the universe. You are the bestower of bliss and adored as Kaali, Lakshmi and Parvathi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Akhilanda Koti Nayaka Avatara Sai
Avatara Sai Antaranga Sai |Akhilanda Koti...|
Aganita Guna Sheela Ananda Sai
Adi Shesha Sai Veda Saara Sai
Avatara Sai Paramatma Sai
Atma Linga Sai Antaranga Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: O Sai, the supreme leader of all gods and worlds descended on earth who has become the indweller of hearts, reserve of immeasurable good qualities and bliss personified. You are the one who reclines on the Adishesha (7 headed serpent), you are the essence of Vedas and the divine incarnate.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Alakh Niranjan Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Narayan Narayan
Narayan Narayan Narayan Bhaja (Sai) Narayan (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: O Narayana, the one who is free of all blemishes and remover of fear and ignorance in this world, we Chant your holy name.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Alakh Niranjan Sai Sundara
Madhava Giridhari Mohana |Alakh Niranjan...|
Sripathi Sri Hari Dayamaya Hari
Sri Ranganath Hari Keshava
(2nd speed starts from Madhava Giridhari Mohana)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sai, you are beauty personified having captivating look, unstained from the world and attributeless. Mother Lakshmi is your consort who resides in your heart and you lifted the Giridhari mountain on your finger tips. You are having a compassionate heart to remove the miseries of your devotees. You are the resident of Srirangam and the destroyer of demon Keshi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Allah Karo Pukar
Sathya Sai Ki Jai Jai Kaar |Allah Allah |
Yesu Pitha Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Mahaveer Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Zohrashtra Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Sarva Dharma Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Allah, Yesu, Mahaveer, Zohrashtra and Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of all religions.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Allah Sai Baba
Yesu Masiha Sai Baba |Allah Allah...|
Nanak Sri Buddha Sai Baba
Zohrashtra Mahaveera Sai Baba
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine name of Sai Baba who is also Allah, Yesu, Nanak, Zohrashtra and Mahaveer.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Bhajo Maulah Bhajo Hey Allah Sai Bhagawan
Ram Bhajo Hey Krishna Bhajo Hey Rama Krishna Bhagawan
Nanak Bhajo Gautam Bhajo Hey Buddha Sai Bhagawan
Yesu Bhajo Zohrashtra Bhajo Hey Mahaveer Bhagawan
Sai Bhajo Shirdi Sai Bhajo Hey Shirdi Sai Bhagawan
Sathya Bhajo Sathya Sai Bhajo Hey Sathya Sai Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine names of the Lord - Allah, Rama, Krishna, Nanak, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahaveer, Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Eshwar Terey Naam Karuna Sindhu Sai Ram
Mahaveer Tum Buddha Zohrashtra
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Nanak Shyam
Sab Hai Sai Bhagawan (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai, you are full of kindness and we adore you as Allah, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Yesu, Nanak and Shyam (Krishna).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Eshwar Tu
Yesu Buddha Prabhu Tu
Zohrashtra Mahaveera Tu
Sai Rama Tu Sai Krishna Tu
Sarva Dharma Prabhu Tu
Sathya Sai Prabhu Tu
Treta Yug Mey Rama Prabhu Tu
Dwapara Yug Mey Krishna Prabhu Tu
Kali Yug Mey Sai Prabhu Tu |Sarva Dhama| |Sathya Sai|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai! You are Allah, Eshwar, Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahaveer, Rama, Krishna. In the Treta Age, you incarnated as Lord Rama; in the Dwapara Age as Lord Krishna and in the Kali Age as Lord Sathya Sai who fosters the unity of all religions.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Eshwara Ek Hi Naam
Bhajorey Manuva Baba Naam |Allah Eshwar...|
Allah Bolo Eshwar Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Nanak Bolo Yesu Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Gautam Buddha Mahaveera Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Bolo Sai Ram Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: All divine names are HIS, so adore oh! Mind the names of Allah, Eshwar. Chant with the devotion all names such as Allah, Eshwara, Sai Ram, Nanak, Yesu, Buddha and Mahaveera.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Ho Akbar Allah Ho Akbar Allah Ho Akbar
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Allah Ho Akbar Shirdi Sai Parthi Sai Tum Ho
Guru Nanak bhi Tum Ho
Zohrashtra Mahaveera Tum Ho
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Tum Ho
Allah Ho Akbar Tum Ho (Sai)
Allah Ho Akbar Allah Ho Akbar Allah Ho Akbar
Devotional Song Meaning: Allah is supreme, Allah is supreme and as he is also Yesu, Shirdi Sai, Parthi Sai, Guru Nanak, Zohrashtra and Mahaveer chant their glorious names.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Ho Akbar Sai Ram Maulah Ho Akbar Sai Ram
Rama Rama Jai Sai Ram Bolo Sundara Naam
Ram Ram Sai Ram Bolo Sundara Naam |Allah Ho|
Bolo Mahaveer Naam Yesu Prabhu Ka Naam
Gurbani Ki Jai Jai Bolo Jai Jai Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine names Allah, Maulah, Rama, Mahaveer and Yesu. Victory unto them and Gurubani (divine verses of Gurugranth scripture of sikhs).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Ho Tum Eshwar Bhi Tum Mahaveer Nanak Ram
Partheesha Sai Shankara Tum Hi Ho Merey Pran |Allah Ho...|
Zohrashtra Yesu Buddha Tum Ho Sab Ke Palanhaar
Satchidananda Sai Tera Brindavana Shubh Dhaam
Devotional Song Meaning: Dweller of Brindavan the sacred abode O Sai you are Allah also Eshwar, Mahaveera, Nanak, Ram. Oh Sai Shankara of Parthi, you are our life and protector and the embodiment of existence, knowledge and bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Kaho Chahey Eshwar Kaho
Buddha Nanak Mahaveer Kaho
Yesu Pitha Zohrashtra Kaho
Shirdi Sai Parthi Sai Kaho
Jis Naam Se Shanthi Miley To
Wohi Naam Baar Baar Kaho
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant repeatedly any of the names of Lord - Allah, Buddha, Nanak, Mahaveer, Yesu, Zohrashtra, Shirdi Sai, Parthi Sai - which confers peace.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Naam Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo Maulah Naam Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo
Nanak Yesu Mahaveera Naam Bhajo
Sri Buddha Deva Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo Shirdi Sai Baba Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo
Sri Raghu Rama Bhajo Govinda Krishna Bhajo
Sri Sathya Sai Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo
Devotional Song Meaning: Adore and chant repeatedly the divine names Allah, Maulah, Nanak, Mahaveer, Buddha and Shirdi Sai Baba. Also chant divine names Raghuram, Govinda, Krishna and Sri Sathya Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Sai Allah Maulah Sai Maulah (3)
Tum Hi Ram Rahim O Sai Tum Hi Yesu Mahaan
Tum Hi Yesu Mahaan
Tum Hi Krishna Karim O Sai Tum Hi Mera Pran
Tum Hi Mera Pran
Devotional Song Meaning: Sai you are Allah and Maulah. You are the Ram the merciful and the great Yesu. You are Krishna the benevolent and O Sai you are our life force.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Sai Maulah Sai
Sadguru Sai Antaryami
Nanak Sai Prema Sai
Yesu Sai Karuna Sagara
Sarva Dharma Priya Sathya Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, You are Allah, the all pervading Divine Teacher, You are Nanak, Jesus, the Loving and Compassionate one, fostering all faiths

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Tero Naam Sai Maulah Tero Naam
Ram Rahim Sai Krishna Karim Sai
Parthi Vihara Sai Bhaktha Janon Ke Sai
Parama Dayalu Sai Parama Krupalu Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh compassionate and kind Sai residing in Parthi, you are for your devotees, you are none other than Allah, Maulah, Ram, Rahim, Krishna and Karim

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Tum Ho Eshwar Tum Ho
Tum Hi Ho Ram Rahim (2)
Merey Ram Merey Ram Ram Rahim
Yesu Tum Ho Nanak Tum Ho
Zohrashtra Bhi Ho Mahaveer Tum Ho
Gautama Buddha Karim
Tum Hi Ho Ram Rahim
Merey Ram Merey Ram Ram Rahim (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord! You are Allah, Eshwar, Rama, Rahim, Jesus, Guru Nanak, Zohrashtra, Mahaveer, Gautama Buddha. O Lord Ram, Rahim.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Allah Yesu Buddha Deva Andaru Neevey
Maulah Sai Mahaveera Nanak Neevey
Rama Krishna Shiva Roopa Dhariyu Neevey
Veda Geeta Granthamula Saramu Neevey
Mathamulanni Poojinchu Devuduvu Neevey
Sarva Dharma Priya Sathya Saivu Neevey
Sai Ram Sai Ram |Sai Ram Sathya|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sairam Sri Sathya Sairam You are Allah, Yesu, Buddha, Maulah, Mahaveer and Nanak. Other forms we adore you are Rama, Krishna and Shiva. You are the essence of Veda, Geeta and other Scriptures. One God worshipped by all religion O Sai you love and foster all faiths.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Alokya Sri Bala Krishnam
Ananda Sundara Tandava Krishnam
Neela Megha Shyama Sundara Krishnam
Nanda Sunandadi Vanditha Krishnam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Bala Krishna! you are unworldly and while dancing on the Kalinga serpent, you look beautiful and blissful, presenting the cloud like complexion adored by nanda and sunanda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Amba Bhavani Jagadamba Bhavani (4)
Sri Chakra Vasini Ananda Dayini
Gnana Pradayini Jyothi Swaroopini
Omkaara Roopini Sri Sai Roopini
Amba Bhavani Jagadamba Bhavani
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh universal mother Bhavani, resident of srichakra, bestower of bliss and knowledge and having glowing look. You are the embodiment of Omkaara (primordial sound) descended in the form of Sri Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Amba Bhavani Shiva Shambhu Kumara
Sri Gananatha Shanthakara
Purana Purusha Sathya Sai Natha
Pranava Swaroopa Partheesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Ganesh! Beloved son of Shiva and Mother Parvathi, you are the embodiment of peace. O Lord Sathya Sai! You are the one adored in ancient holy scriptures and you are the very form of the primordial sound.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Amba Manda Haasa Vadani Manohari Sai Jagat Janani
Mata Mata Mata Jagat Janani |Amba Manda|
Jagat Janani Shubha Karini
Sai Jaganmata
Sathya Sai Jaganmata
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the auspicious Mother of the Universe, Mother Sai who has an enchanting face with a charming smile

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Amba Parameshwari Akhilandeshwari
Adi Parashakthi Paalaya Maam
Sri Bhuvaneshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Ananda Roopini Paalaya Maam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Divine Mother of the Universe (Bhuvaneshwari, Raja Rajeshwari) and the Consort of Lord Shiva, the all-powerful one, you are bliss personified, we pray to you to protect us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Amba Sahita Samba Sadashiva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva Shambho
Parvathi Ramana Sadashiva |Hara Hara|
Devotional Song Meaning: We Pray to Shiva, who is accompanied by Mother Parvathi. We chant the names of Mahadeva, the divine consort of Parvathi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Amba Shankari Parameshwari Shashi Shekari Amba
Sarveshwari Jagadeeshwari Maheshwari Amba
Sundari Guna Manjari Shiva Shankari Amba
Kadambari Shwetambari Hari Sodari Amba
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Mother Shankari Parameshwari who is the consort of Shiva (adorns with the beautiful Crescent Moon on the head) you are the Goddess who is the Protector of the Universe. And you are the Goddess who is the most beautiful with abundant good qualities. You are the sibling of Lord Hari. We offer our salutations to you Oh Mother.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Amba Vandanam Eshwaramba Vandanam
Janani Vandanam Jagat Janani Vandanam (2)
Sai Vandanam Sai Mata Vandanam
Mata Vandanam Eshwaramba Nandanam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh universal mother Sai we bow to you and also we bow to Eshwaramba whom you made your physical mother during your advent on earth.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ambey Bhavani Ma Jai Jai Bhavani Ma
Raksha Karo Raksha Karo Ambey Bhavani |Ambey Bhavani|
Ambey Bhavani Teri Jyothi Jalavun
Jyothi Jalavun Teri Arati Utarun
Ambey Bhavani Jai Jai (Jagadambey) Bhavani |Raksha karo|
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to mother Bhavani and we chant your divine name. Protect us from all miseries. We illumine you with Arati and in return you illumine our hearts.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ambey Jagadambey Jagadambey Gowri Ma
Ambey Jai Jai Ma Jagadambey Jai Jai Ma
Mahalakshmi Mata Meri Ambey Jai Jai Ma
Daya Nidhey Dukha Harnewaali Ambey Sai Ma
Bholi Baali Mata Meri Ambey Jai Jai Ma |Ambey Jagadambey|
(2nd speed starts with Ambey Jai Jai Ma)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Mother of the Universe. You are Mother Lakshmi, the compassionate one and remover of worldly miseries and who is innocence personified.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ambey Janani Abhirami
Abhaya Pradayini Shivakami |Ambey Janani|
Sambhavi Shankari Sarveshwari
Shantha Swaroopini Shivaranjani
Sathya Swaroopini Sai Mata
Shashwata Ananda Dayini Mata
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh pleasing divine mother, the consort of Shiva known also as Abhirami Sambhavi, Shankari the one who grants fearlessness and is omnipresent. We chant your glorious names. You are Sai Mata the embodiment of truth and peace who grants us with eternal peace.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ambika Tanaya Gajanana
Gajavadana Gananatha Gajanana
Paahi Ganesha Vinayaka
Tribhuvana Palaka Mangala Dayaka
Vidya Buddhi Siddhi Pradayaka
Paahi Ganesha Vinayaka (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Loving son of Mother Parvathi, the Elephant-headed Lord Ganesha, Kindly protect us. You are the sustainer of the three worlds, the one who confers auspiciousness, knowledge, wisdom and success.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Amruthamaya Vichara
Sri Rama Charitha Katha Saara |Amruthamaya...|
Sri Rama Charitha Katha Saara (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Dwell on the nectarine experience of Story of Sri Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Anand Se Bolo Jai Baba Jai
Prem Se Bolo Jai Baba Jai
Jai Jai Jai Jai Amba Ki Jai
Jai Jai Jai Mahalakshmi Ki Jai |Ananda Se|
Jai Jai Jai Shirdi Ki Jai
Jai Jai Jai Sathya Sai Ki Jai
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant jai Baba jai blissfully suffused in Love. Victory be to Mother Mahalakshmi who is also Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ananda Mangala Arati Gao
Veena Venu Mrudanga Bajao |Ananda Mangala|
Madhava Madhava Hari Narayana
Sathya Sai Ki Jai Jai Bolo
Madhura Madhura Sangeeta Sunao
Devotional Song Meaning: Perform the blissful auspicious Arati of Sathya Sai who is also Madhava to the accompaniment of musical instruments such as Veena, Flute and Mrudunga set in tune to sweet melodious music.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ananda Nandana Hey Bhaktha Chandana
Hey Yadu Nandana Krishna Krishna
Devaki Nandana Gokula Balana
Natawara Mohana Krishna Krishna
Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: Hey Krishna, Sai Krishna you are bliss personified and beloved of devotees, star of Yadukula, Son of Devaki brought up in Gokula and you are an elegant dancer who is captivating.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ananda Ram Ananda Shyam
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Prema Swaroopa Brahmananda
Satchidananda Hari Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana |Narayana Sai|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Blissful Lord Ram and Shyam, we chant your name Narayana, Hari and Sai, you are the embodiment of Divine Love, truth, awareness and bliss

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ananda Rama Ayodhya Rama
Karunya Rama Kamaneeya Rama |Ananda Rama|
Sitabhi Rama Sundara Rama
Saketa Rama Sayeesha Rama
Ananda Rama Ayodhya Rama Karunya Rama Kamaneeya Rama
Sitabhi Rama Sundara Rama Saketa Rama Sayeesha Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Rama, you are bliss personified who resides in Ayodhya. You are compassionate and beloved of devotees. You are the adorable consort of Sita. You the star of Ayodhya, who has taken the form of Sayeesha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ananda Sagara Muralidhara
Meera Prabhu Radhey Shyam Venu Gopala |Ananda Sagara...|
Nanda Yashoda Ananda Kishora
Jai Jai Gokula Bala Jai Venu Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Krishna, you are the ocean of bliss and the one who plays captivating music on flute, the Lord of Meera and Radha, the son of Nanda and Yashoda. Victory to Gopala

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ananda Sri Sai Parthi Pureesha
Sadananda Madhava Prashanthi Vasa
Mandara Dhara Govinda Mukunda
Sundara Roopa Sri Satchidananda
| Sadananda Madhava |
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai Madhava, dweller at Prashanthi of Parthi, you are eternally blissful, beauty personified. You are embodiment of existence, awareness and bliss. You are Govinda, the one who carried the Mandara mountain, who bestows Mukti (liberation) to devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ananda Tandava Rudra Maheshwari
Artha Samrakshaki Abhinava Sundari
Gnana Vishweshwari Ananda Bhairavi
Anandeshwari Sai Maheshwari
Devotional Song Meaning: Sai Maheshwari, you are so blissful during the cosmic dance (creation), you are the protector of troubled devotees, looking beautiful. You are the blissful universal Goddess Bhairavi who bestows knowledge.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Anandamaya Bhagawan Hey Premamaya Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sai Bhagawan |Anandamaya Bhagawan...| Hey Karuna Nidhey Prabhu Sai Ram Krupa Nidhey Deenon Ke Pran Lelo Prabhu Mujhey Sharan Lagalo Mujhey Daya (Krupa) Karo Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai Bhagawan, you are love and bliss personified, repository of compassion and kindness and hope of the downtrodden. Kindly accept us at your lotus feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Anandamaya Sai
Dayamaya Krupamaya Premamaya |Anandamaya Sai...|
Dinakara Koti Tejonmaya
Deena Vatsala Sai Karunamaya
Shantha Saguna Parabrahmamaya
Sarvamaya Niramaya
Sai Satchidanandamaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Sai you are verily the embodiment of Bliss, Compassion and Love. Your divine effulgence is equivalent to the splendour of crores of sun. You are pleasantly disposed towards the underprivileged, storehouse of eternal Peace, all pervasive divinity. You are Omnipotent, blemishless and the embodiment of Existence, Awareness and Bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Anandamey Sai Naamamey
Adbhutamey Sai Geetamey
Akhandamey Jyothirmayamey
Sundaramey Sai Roopamey (Ati)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai! Chanting your divine name is true bliss and singing your glory confers ecstacy. Your infinite effulgence is all pervading and Your form is beauty personified.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Anatha Bandho Sai Prabho
Aparadha Kshama karo Sai Prabho
Jeeva Yatra Mey Saath Raho
Nija Prem Bhakthi Hum Ko Deejo
Hrudaya Mandir Se Math Jao
Charanamrutha Seva Deejo Prabhu
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai! You are the Lord of the deprived people. Kindly forgive our misdeeds and be with us in our journey of life. Bless us with Divine Love and devotion and be constantly in our thoughts and our hearts, grant us the opportunity to serve your Lotus feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Anjana Nandana Veeram Ashoka Vana Sancharam
Vande Lanka Bhayankaram
Sita Shoka Vinashakaram
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutation to thee, O son of mother Anjana, the valorous and powerful. You wandered the Ashoka vana (forest) and instilled fear among the demons to redeem Mother Sita from distress.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Anjana Sutha Anjaneya
Vayu Putra Vathathmaja
Vanarotthama Bala Bheema
Rama Dootha Ranadheera
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Anjaneya the son of Mother Anjana and Vayu, you are the supreme among the Vanaras (monkeys) and the strongest. You are a supreme warrior and humble emissiary of Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Anjaneya Hanumantha Veera
Anjana Sutha Vayu Kumara
Sita Mata Shoka Vinasha
Sri Rama Dootha Namo Namasthey
Sri Rama Dootha Namo Namosthey (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh valorous Hanumantha, you are the son of Anjana and Vayu. Salutation to thee, who is the ambassador of Sri Rama and the redeemer of mother Sitas distress.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Anjaneya Paahi Maam Hanumantha Paahi Maam
Vayu Nandana Paahi Maam Lanka Dahana Paahi Maam
Aprameya Paahi Maam Suprakasha Paahi Maam
Rama Dootha Paahi Maam Sathya Sai Paahi Maam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Anjaneya son of Vayu (wind god) protect us. Hanumantha who set Lanka on fire protect us. Protect us O effulgent one having immeasurable qualities O Ramas ambassador who is in the form of Sathya Sai protect us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Anjaneya Veera Hanumantha Shoora
Vayu Kumara Vanara Veera |Anjaneya...|
Vayu Kumara Vanara Veera
Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jai Jai Ram Sita Ram Jai Radhey Shyam (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Anjaneya, Hanuman, the offspring of Vayu (Wind God) you are brave and powerful. Chant the names Sri Ram, Sita Ram, Radhey Shyam

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Annapoorneshwari Paalaya Maam
Adi Parashakthi Paalaya
Sri Bhuvaneshwari Paalaya Maam
Sri Jagadeeshwari Paalaya
Parthi Pureeshwari Paalaya Maam
Paahi Maheshwari Paalaya
Sundara Roopey Paalaya Maam
Chira Sukha Dayini Paalaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother! You are the nourisher, sustainer and protector of the universe. O Mother Sai! You are beauty personified and the one who gives wealth and comforts

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Antar Jyothi Jalao Sai
Brahma Sanathani Daya Karo
Daya Karo Hey Poorna Jyothirmayi
Shiva Shakthimayi Krupa Karo
Deena Dayamayi Patitha Pavani
Sai Jagat Janani Raksha (Krupa) Karo
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother Sai! You have neither beginning nor end. Kindly illumine our soul and shower your mercy. Oh Effulgent Mother of the Universe! You are the form of Shiva and Shakthi and merciful to the deprived. Kindly protect us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Antaranga Sai Anatha Natha Sai
Deena Bandhu Sai Karuna Sindhu Sai |Antaranga Sai|
Rama Krishna Shiva Shakthi Prema Roopa Sai
Yuga Avatara Baba Sri Sathya Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai Bhagawan, you are love and bliss personified, repository of compassion and kindness and hope of the downtrodden. You are verily Rama, Krishna and the incarnation of Supreme Love of the modern era otherwise known as Sri Sathya Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Antaryami Sai
Poorna Brahma Avatari
Hey Giridhari Hrudaya Vihari Krishna Kunja Vihari |Antaryami...|
Gopala Leela Dhari
Hey Gopi Mana Sanchari
Madhusudhana Murari |Hey Giridhari|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh indweller Sai, you have descended from supreme unmanifested state (Brahman). You are Krishna, the resider in the hearts of devoteees, who wandered in the Brindavan lifting Giridhari mountain. Exhibited divine Leela (sports) with Gopi Gopala imprinting yourself in their minds. You are the Madhusudhana and Murari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Antaryami Sai Murari
Deena Dukhiyon Ke Tum Hitakari |Antaryami Sai...|
Sai Naam Ke Mahima Bhaari
Bhava Sagar Se Paar Utharo
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Gao
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Murari! You are the Indweller of the heart and benefactor to those distressed and Mysterious is the power of the name "Sai" which helps to cross the ocean of life and death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Antaryami Sri Raghurama
Akhilanda Koti Nayaka Rama |Antaryami|
Atmabhi Rama Pavana Naama
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Palaka Rama
Kali Yug Ke Avatar Sai Rama
Sarva Dharma Priya Sri Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sri Raghurama you the indweller and supreme leader of the universe. You are Atma (soul) in all and your name purifies everybody. You foster the truth, righteousness and peace in the world. After descending in the Kali Yuga as Sai Rama loved all faiths.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Anupama Sundara Nanda Kishora
Brindavana Ghana Shyam
Murali Madhava Radhey Govinda
Madhusudhana Ghana Shyam Sathya Sai Sundara Shyam
Kunja Vihari Mandara Giridhari
Kamala Nayana Bhagawan
Bhakthon Ke Prabhu Partheeshwara Sai
Natawara Sundara Shyam Sathya Sai Sundara Shyam
Devotional Song Meaning: O Krishna son of Nanda! You are unsurpassingly beautiful! You are dark as the clouds and adored in Brindavan as Radhey Govinda, Madhusudhana and Giridhari. O Lotus eyed Lord Sathya Sai! You are beloved to your devotees and adored as the same dancing Shyam

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Araj Suno Giridhari Gopal
Sundara Shyama Murari Gopal |Araj Suno...|
Mohana Murali Dhaari Gopal
Brindavana Sanchari Gopal
Radha Hrudaya Vihari Gopal
Saath Raho Sathya Sai Gopal
Devotional Song Meaning: O Krishna the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain, kindly listen to my prayer. You are charming and captivating and sanctified Brindavan by your presence. You are the indweller of Radha's heart. Always be our companion

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Araj Suno Merey Parama Krupalu
Partheeshwara Sai Deva |Araj Suno...|
Sathya Sanathana Antaryami
Sakala Charachara Tum Ho Swami
Janam Maran Se Paar Karo
Bhava Bandhan Se Uddhar Karo (Baba)
Devotional Song Meaning: O Supremely merciful Lord of Parthi! Kindly listen to my prayer and to help me to come out of the bondage of the cycle of birth and death. O Lord Sai! You are omnipresent, infinite and indweller of our heart

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Araj Suno Prabhu Sai Natha
Darshana Do Ab Swami
Dwar Khada Hoon Aao Sai
Charana Sharana Do Swami
Hrudaya Nivasi Sai Baba Sai
Pran Sakha Tum Swami
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Natha, please listen to my appeal and appear before me now. I am standing at your door step, bestow me the protection of your feet, Oh the indweller Sai, you are my best friend.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aravinda Lochana Aartha Janavana
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana |Aravinda Lochana...|
Eshwaramba Nandana Dosha Nivarana
Parama Niranjana Hey Shubhanana
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lotus -Eyed Lord Narayana! You are the protector of the deprived and distressed. O Auspicious son of Mother Eshwaramba, the blemishless one! You are the redeemer of our defects

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Aruna Ramana Sri Guru Deva
Shesha Ramana Sadguru Deva |Aruna Ramana...|
Bhava Bhaya Harana Sri Sai Deva
Sri Sai Deva Sri Sai Deva |Bhava Bhaya|
Guru Hai Sath Chith Ananda Deva
Ananda Deva Sri Sai Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, we worship you as our guru, who gives delightness to the eyes at the dawn. You are the blissful eternal guru reclining on Shesha (seven headed serpent) who protects us from fear and worldly miseries. You are the our Lord Sai who is the embodiment of existence, awareness and bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Arunachala Shiva Arunachala Shiva Arunachala Shiva Aruna Shiva
Akshaya Linga Atma Linga
Tejonmaya Vigraha Linga
Iha Para Sukha Dayaka Esha (Sai) Iha Para Sukha Dayaka
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: O Shiva, you are the resident of Arunachala (place) and in the form of imperishable Atma Linga. An effulgent symbol of Shiva which bestows peace and happiness in this and the higher world. O Shiva salutation to thee, the embodiment of Primordial sound.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Atma Linga Sai Sai Sathya Sai
Amrutha Linga Sai Sai Sathya Sai
Jyothir Linga Sai Sai Sathya Sai
Netra Linga Sai Sai Sathya Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: O Sathya Sai you in the form of Atma linga (created by you from within) also in the form of Amrutha Linga (immortal symbol), Jyothir linga (effulgent one) and Netra linga (symbol with eyes).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Atma Lingam Bhajorey Ati Adbhuta Lingam Bhajorey
Naga Lingam Navamani Lingam
Nabhi Kamala Udbhava Lingam
Eshwara Lingam Bhajorey Sayeeshwara (Partheeshwara) Lingam Bhajorey
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing in praise of the Atma Lingam, the auspicious and astonishing divine form of Lord Shiva, the Naga Lingam studded with nine precious stones that has emerged out of the navel of Shiva. Sing in praise of the Eshwara Lingam and Sayeeshwara Lingam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Atma Ram Ananda Ram
Adbhuta Ram Ayodhya Ram
Sita Ram Sathya Sai Ram
Sundara Ram Sugunabhi Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Ram (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the wonderful form of Lord Rama, the resident of Ayodhya and who is indweller of our heart and who confers bliss. Chant the name of Ram and Sairam, the Lord of Sita and the virtuous one

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Atma Rama Ananda Naama
Ananda Mohana Sri Parandhama |Atma Rama...|
Mayabhi Rama Manasa Prema
Sundara Naama Sugunabhi Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord Rama! The indweller of hearts. Your form gives happiness, bliss and love. You are the embodiment of virtues who assumed an illusive form of the human being

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Atma Rama Ananda Ramana
Achyutha Keshava Hari Narayana
Bhava Bhaya Harana Vanditha Charana
Raghukula Bhooshana Rajeeva Nayana
Adi Narayana Anantha Shayana
Satchidananda Sathya (Sai) Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord Rama! You are indweller of hearts and you are the embodiment of bliss. Chant the names of Keshava, Narayana, Sai Narayana the remover of worldly fears. O Lotus eyed jewel of the Raghu dynasty, the embodiment of truth, awareness and bliss, we bow down to your lotus feet

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Atmabhi Rama Ananda Rama
Sita Rama Sai Rama
Sundara Naama Hey Ghana Shyama
Radhey Shyama Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the sweet names of Lord Rama, Ghana Shyama, Radhey Shyama, Sai Rama, the indweller of our hearts and embodiment of bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Avatarini Amba Bhaya Harini
Bhairavi Shankari Durga Bhavani |Avatarini Amba|
Bhaktha Jana Priya Tribhuvana Dharini
Bhagawathi Bharati Brahma Sanathani |Bhairavi Shankari|
Devotional Song Meaning: O universal mother you have descended in the form of Bhairavi, Shankari, Durga, Bhavani. You are the beloved of devotees and who supports the three worlds. We chant you as Bhagawathi, Bharati and the Brahma Sanathani (primordial goddess).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ayodhya Ke Sita Ram Brindavan Ke Radhey Shyam
Radhey Shyam Jaya Radhey Shyam
Radha Madhava Radhey Shyam
Sai Ram Jaya Sai Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Sita Ram, the Lord of Ayodhya and Radhey Shyam who resides in Brindavan. Victory to Lord Sairam of Parthi

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ayodhya Shiromani Dasharatha Ram
Saketa Ranjana Kaivalya Dhama |Ayodhya Shiromani...|
Neeraja Lochana Sai Narayana
Bandha Vimochana Bhaktha Parayana
Prana Sakha Merey Prabhu Sai Rama |Saketa Ranjana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of the Lotus eyed Saketa Rama, the son of Dasharatha and the jewel in the crown of Ayodhya dynasty. Free us from the bondage of life and death as you are our dearest companion and our ultimate abode.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ayodhya Vasi Ram Ayodhya Vasi Ram
Dasharatha Nandana Ram Jaya Jaya Janaki Jeevana Ram
Aranya Vasi Ram Aranya Vasi Ram |Dasharatha Nandana|
Ahalya Uddhara Ram Ahalya Uddhara Ram |Dasharatha Nandana|
Bhaktha Vatsala Ram Bhaktha Vatsala Ram |Dasharatha Nandana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Ram, son of Dasharatha resident of Ayodhya the consort of Janaki. During your exile in the forest you redeemed Ahalya from her curse and you are the beloved of all devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ayodhya Vasi Ram Hai Dwaraka Mey Aayey
Dwaraka Vasi Shyam Hai Shirdi Mey Aayey
Shirdi Vasi Shyam Hai Parthi Sathya Sai
Bolo Ram Sai Ram Bolo Sathya Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Sathya Sai Ram, who is the same Lord who incarnated in Ayodhya as Ram, in Dwaraka as Shyam, in Shirdi as Lord Shirdi Sai and in Parthi as Sathya Sai

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ayodhya Vasi Ram Ram Ram Dasharatha Nandana Ram
Patitha Pavana Janaki Jeevana Sita Mohana Ram
Ayodhya Vasi Ram Ram Ram Dasharatha Nandana Ram
Patitha Pavana Janaki Jeevana Sita Mohana Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Rama, the Lord of Ayodhya, the Son of Dasharatha and the consort of Sita and whose name purifies the deprived.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ayodhya Vihari Sri Rama Rama Rama
Dwaraka Vihari Sri Krishna Krishna Krishna |Ayodhya Vihari...|
Saptagiri Vihari Govinda Govinda
Nija Bhaktha Hrudaya Vihari Sri Sai Natha Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Rama who is the resident of Ayodhya, Krishna the resident of Dwaraka and Govinda the God of seven hills. O Lord Sai you revel in the hearts of devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Baar Baar Prabhu Janam Liya
Sri Madhusudhana Janam Liya |Baar Baar...|
Kausalya Nandana Sri Raghu Ram
Devaki Nandana Hey Ghana Shyama
Eshwari Nandana Sai Bhagawan
Janam Liya Prabhu Sai Bhagawan
Narahari Narayana Sai Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord Madhusudhana! You incarnated as the Lord Hari, Ghana Shyama, Narahari, Narayana, as the beloved son of Kausalya, Devaki and Mother Eshwaramba. Chant the names of the Lord Rama, Krishna, Ghana Shyama and Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Baar Baar Tum Aao Sai
Darshana Do Bhagawan (2)
Nithya Nirmala Nithyananda
Satchidananda Prabho
Darshana Do Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome Oh Lord Sai! Grant us the Darshan of your ever pure and blissful form again and again

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Baba Aao Merey Keertan Mey
Antaryami Darsha Dikhao
Naiya Hamarey Paar Lagao |Baba Aao...|
Antar Jyoth Jalao Sai
Jeevan Jyothi Tum Ho Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Beloved Baba! grantyour Divine Darshan while we sing Your glory andhelp uscross the boat of life. Kindle the lamp of wisdom in our hearts just asyou illuminated our lives.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Baba Dil Mey Basey Raho
Janam Janam Mey Saath Raho
Haath Na Chodo Anatha Natha
Saath Na Chodo Sai Prabho (Merey)
Terey Charan Mey Lelo Sai Prabho
Devotional Song Meaning: Baba, please install thee in our hearts, be with us for all births. Oh supreme Lord Sai! Do not leave our hands and deprive us from your grace and always place us at your lotus feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bada Chitha Chora Brindavana Sanchara
Gopala Gopala Hey Murali Gopala
Govardhanodhara Gopala Bala
Gopi Manohara Radhey Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Gopala, who played in Brindavan, who lifted the Govardhana mountain and who captivated the hearts of Radha and Gopis.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bada Chitha Chora Mana Mohan
Mera Chitha Chora Jaganmohan
Ayodhya Ke Sita Ram
Brindavan Ke Radhey Shyam
Shirdi Ke Sai Baba
Parthi Ke Sathya Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of the Sita Ram - the Lord of Ayodhya, Radhey Shyam - the Lord of Brindavan, Sai Baba of Shirdi and Puttaparthi, the darling of every heart

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bala Gopal Jai Jai Sai Shyam
Prema Bharo Dil Mey Hamarey Sai Ram
Hamarey Sai Ram Badey Pyaarey Sai Ram |Prema Bharo|
Hum Bhakthon Ke Tum Ek Sai Ram
Tumharey Jagat Mey Bada Pyaara Pyaara Naam
Sangh Raho Har Dum Hamarey Sai Ram
Sangh Raho Hamarey Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Sai Shyama the Infant Gopala, our Beloved Lord. Saturate our hearts with Divine Love and be with us in every moment of our life. Your dear name and glory engulfs the entire world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bala Gopala (Sai)
Devaki Nandana Gopala |Bala Gopala...|
Vasudeva Nandana Gopala
Yashoda Nandana Gopala
Nanda Gopala Ananda Gopala
Sai Gopala Sathya Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Infant Gopala and Sai Gopala. Gopala is the dear son of Mother Devaki and Vasudeva, Mother Yashoda and Nanda and who confers bliss

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bansidhara Kanhaiya Ghana Shyama Sundara
Giridhari Gopa Bala Brindavana Vihara |Bansidhara...|
Govinda Madhava Harey Madhusudhana Mukunda
Radhey (Sai) Govinda Radhey(Sai) Gopala Radhey (Sai) Govinda Radhey (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the various names of Lord Krishna - Govinda, Madhava, Madhusudhana, Mukunda, Sai Gopala, the one who plays the enchanting flute and who resides in Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bansidhari Krishna Murari
Govardhana Giridhari Shourie
Patithodhari Paapa Viduri
Leela Nataka Sutradhari
Parthi vihari Sai Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Krishna Murari, you are so enchanting with your flute. You saved your devotees by lifting the entire Govardhana Mountain. You are the redeemer of the down trodden and remover of their sins. You are the director of your divine play and who resides in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Beda Paar Karo Merey Sai
Uddhar Karo Merey Baba |Beda Paar...|
Allah Eshwar Sai Baba
Shirdi Baba Parthi Baba
Reham Nazar karo Sai Baba
Daya Karo Sai Krupa Karo
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord Sai! Uplift and help me to cross the ocean of life and death. You are Allah, Eshwar and Shirdi Baba. Shower your mercy, Compassion and Grace on us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhagawan Bhagawan Bhagawan Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Bhagawan Bhagawan |Bhagawan Bhagawan... |
Aparadha Kshama Karo Sai Bhagawan
Araj Suno Merey Sai Bhagawan
Bhagawan Bhagawan Bhagawan Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: We chant your name Bhagawan. Kindly listen to our earnest prayer and pardon us for our misdeeds.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhagawan Bhagawan Patitha Pavana Ram
Daya Karo Daya Karo Daya Karo Bhagawan
Patitha Pavana Ram (Sai)
Deena Dayalu Parama Krupalu
Raksha Karo Bhagawan
Sai Krupa Karo Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord! Chanting Your name purifies the downtrodden. Oh Ever Merciful and Compassionate Lord! Kindly shower Your grace and protect us

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhagawan Bhagawan Sai Baba Tero Naam
Koi Kahath Hai Allah Ho Akbar
Koi Kahath Hai Yesu Sai Shankara
Nanak Buddha Mahaveer Digambara
Premavatara Sai Ram Sai Ram
Sai Baba Tero Naam
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord, O Lord, You are Sai Baba, some call you Allah, Yesu, Shankara, Nanak, Buddha, Mahaveer, Digambara. The avatar of God filled with love has the name of Sai Baba.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhagawan Krishna Namo Bhagawan Krishna Namo
Patitha Pavana Patithodharana
Ramachandra Namo Bhagawan |Bhagawan Krishna|
Vishwadhara Jagat Pala Shiva Paramatma Namo
Kaalatheethaya Siddhi Roopaya Sathya Sai Namo
Antaryami Namo Bhagawan
Antaryami Namo (Sarva)
Devotional Song Meaning: Bow to Lord Krishna. Bow to Lord Rama, who is the saviour and uplifter of the afflicted and miserable. Bow to Sathya Sai who is above and beyond time and is the very embodiment of all Virtues and success. Bow to Lord Shiva who sustains the entire creation. Bow to Omniscient Lord.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Govindam Bhaja Gopalam
Paramanandam Shyama Bhajo
Nithyanandam Brahmanandam
Satchidanandam Shyama Bhajo
Prema Swaroopam Deena Dayalam
Poorna Avataram Sai Bhajo
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Eternally blissful Lord Shyam, we sing and dwell on your divine names of Govinda and Gopala. You are the embodiment of truth, awareness and bliss. You are the embodiment of love and compassion. We adore you as the Poorna Avatar.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Govindam Bhaja Govindam
Govindam Bhajarey Manasa
Patitha Pavana Naama Partheesha Rama
Satatam Bhaja Bhajarey Manasa
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mind! Chant the divine name of Govinda, Partheesha Rama incessantly which redeems the down trodden.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Dasharatha Baalam
Bhaja Mana Sita Manasa Lolam |Bhaja Mana|
Bhaja Mana Megha Shyamala Ramam
Bhaja Mana Pavana Taraka Naamam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mind, chant the name of Rama, the son of Dasharatha which delights the mind of Sita. Also chant Ramas name whose complexion is like dark cloud and whose name when chanted protects us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Govinda Gopala
Govinda Gopala Gopala |Bhaja Mana Govinda|
Govinda Bolo Hari Gopala Bolo (2)
Govinda Gopala Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship & chant the name of Govinda and Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Krishna Gopal
Bhaja Krishna Gopal Bhajo Bhajorey |Bhaja Mana Krishna|
Yadu Nanda Gopal Bhajorey
Mukunda Gopal Bhajorey
Bhaja Govindam Bhaja Govindam Bhaja Govindam Bhajarey (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship the name Krishna & Gopal. The son of Yadu dynasty bestows liberation to devotees. Chant the name Govinda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Narayana Narayana Narayan
Lakshmi Narayana Narayana Narayan
Sathya Narayana Narayana Narayan
Sai Narayana Narayana Narayan
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship Lord addressed as Narayana, Lakshmi Narayana, Sathya Narayana, Sai Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Radhey Shyama Gopala
Murali Manohara Radhey Gopala |Bhaja Mana Radhey...|
Nanda Kishora Natawara Lala (2)
Parthi Vihara Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship Lord Radhey Shyam, beautiful with his flute, son of Nanda who resides in Parthi as Sai Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Sai Gopalam
Bhaja Bhaja Goparipalam Varam |Bhajo Mana Sai...|
Bhaja Mana Gopi Manasa Chandram
Bhaja Bhaja Brindavana Sancharam |Bhaja Mana Sai|
Bhaja Mana Gaana Kala Priya Devam
Bhaja Bhaja Partheeshwara Sayeesham
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mind! chant Sai Gopalam who foster the cow herds and who grants boons and who delights Gopis mind. Chant the name Partheeshwara Sai shyam who moves about in Brindavan and he is a Lord who loves art and music.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Shyama Sundara Giridhari
Mora Mukuta Peetambara Dhaari |Bhaja Mana Shyam...|
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Giridhara Naagara Giridhara Naagara |Meera Ke|
Murali Manohara Shyama Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the name of Shyama Sundar, the Lord who lifted the Govardhana mountain in his little finger, who wore the crown of peacock feather and ochre cloth. The Lord of Meera who played the enchanting Divine Flute Shyama Murari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Shyama Sundara Giridhari
Mora Mukuta Peetambara Dhaari |Bhaja Mana Shyam...|
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Giridhara Naagara Giridhara Naagara |Meera Ke|
Murali Manohara Shyama Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the name of Shyama Sundar, the Lord who lifted the Govardhana mountain in his little finger, who wore the crown of peacock feather and ochre cloth. The Lord of Meera who played the enchanting Divine Flute Shyama Murari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Sita Rama Harey
Bhaja Mana Radhey Shyam Harey |Bhaja Mana Sita Rama...|
Bhaja Mana Sai Rama Harey
Bhaja Mana Sai Krishna Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the name of Sita Ram, Radhey Shyam, Sai Ram and Sai Krishna which gives immense happiness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Manuva Bhaja Manuva Govinda Narayana
Govinda Narayana Gopala Narayana
Sai Govinda (Gopala) Narayana
Ramaya Narayana
Krishnaya Narayana
Sri Sai Narayana
Sai Govinda (Gopala) Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mind! Chant the divine name of Gopala, Sai Govinda, Rama & Krishna - forms of Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Ramam Bhaja Ramam
Bhajorey Manasa Bhaja Ramam |Bhaja Ramam|
Kalyana Ramam Bhaja Ramam
Kodanda Ramam Bhaja Ramam
Pattabhi Ramam Bhaja Ramam
Pavana (Taraka) Naamam Bhaja Ramam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mind! Chant the name Rama, also the names Kalyana Ramam (auspiciousness), Kodanda Rama (Rama with bow), Pattabhi Rama (caronated). All the names makes us to cross the ocean of Samsara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Sai Natham Bhaja Sai Natham Sai Natham Bhajarey Manasa
Parthi Pureesham Prashanthi Nilayam Parama Pavitram Paramatma Roopam
Shirdi Nivasam Shiva Sayeesham
Shantha Swabhavam Shankara Roopam |Bhaja Sai Natham|
Chinmayanandam Chithravathi Teeram Chitha Pariharam Sri Sai Natham
Sathya Swaroopam Sadguru Charanam Samba Shivoham
Jyothi Swaroopam Preeti Swabhavam Parthi Nivasam Paapa Vinasham
Devotional Song Meaning: O mind! Chant the name of Sai Natham who is the sacred form of supreme Lord residing at Prashanthi Nilayam. Also he resides in Shirdi as Shivasai. He is the embodiment of peace, auspiciousness and bliss, dwelling at the shores of Chitravathi river sanctifying us. His form is Truth and the Sadguru under whose lotus feet let us reside. Being Resident of Parthi his form is effulgent, lovable and which destroys sins.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Sai Natham Devadi Devam
Devadi Devam Shritha Jana Paalam |Bhaja Sai|
Parama Pavitram Pavana Roopam
Mangala Dayaka Murthy Swaroopam
Janana Marana Vimochaka Roopam
Sri Sai Sai Natham Ananda Roopam
Sathya Sai Natham Sadananda Roopam
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Sai Natham who is God of gods protecting his devotees. His form is highly sacred and divine granting auspiciousness. His form redeems one from the cycle of birth and death. Chant again the blissful form of Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Sri Krishnam Bhaja Sri Krishnam
Sri Krishnam Bhaja Paramodharam
Vasudeva Sutham Devaki Vinutam
Nagalankruta Yamuna Salilam
Gaana Vilolam Yadu Kula Baalam
Govardhanadhara Tulasi Maalam
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Sai Krishna, the supreme redeemer, the son of Devaki and Vasudeva dancing on the head of Kalinga serpent at Yamuna river playing the enchanting flute. He is the star of Yadu dynasty who lifted the Govardhana mountain who is adorned with the garland of Tulasi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Panduranga Vittala Jai Vittala
Purandara Vittala Vittala Jai Vittala |Bhaja Mana Panduranga...|
Bhaja Mana Panduranga Vittala Jai Vittala
Purandara Vittala Vittala Jai Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship Lord Panduranga Vittala, Lord Purandara Vittala. Victory to Vittala

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajan Karo Manuva Govinda Harey
Govinda Murari Gopala Murari |Bhajan Karo...|
Mathura Natha Hey Giridhari
Radha Madhava Hey Giridhari (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship Lord Govinda, Murari, Gopala, the Lord of Mathura, Giridhari, the Lord of Radha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajarey Guru Natham Manasa Bhajorey Sai Natham
Bhajo Sayeesham Parthi Nivasam
Bhajo Brindavana Gokula Baalam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind worship Guru Natham who is also Sai Natham the supreme Lord of Parthi. Chant the name of Gokulabala of Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajo Badri Narayanam
Bhajo Parthi Narayanam
Bhajo Shirdi Narayanam
Bhajo Sai Narayanam
Sathya Sai Narayanam
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine names of Badri Narayana, Parthi Narayana, Shirdi Narayana, Sai Narayana and Sathya Sai Narayana.
Worship Lord Sai Bhagawan, Who has incarnated in the Kali Age to uplift humanity and lead the fallen to deliverance.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajo Bhajo Sita Ram
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sita Ram |Bhajo Bhajo...|
Dasharatha Nandana Ram
Kausalya Tanaya Ram
Janaki Jeevana Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram |Sita Ram Sita Ram|
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Sita Ram, Lord Rama the son of Dasharatha, Lord Rama who killed the ten headed Ravana, uplifted humanity and lead the fallen to deliverance.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajo Bhajo Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Pandari Natha Panduranga Bhajo Mana Vittala |Bhajo Bhajo...|
Partheeshwara Sai Natha Vittala
Parameshwara Sathya Sai Vittala
Rakumayi Vittala Ranga Sai Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Vittala of Pandharpur, Sai Vittala of Parthi who is the supreme Lord of the Universe and Lord of Rakumayi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajo Gananayaka Gajavadana
Mangala Dayaka Shubha Charana |Bhajo Gananayaka...|
Siddhi Vinayaka Shiva Nandana
Ananda Dayaka Chitha Chandana
Buddhi Pradayaka Jaga Vandana
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the Elephant-faced Lord Ganesh, Son of Lord Shiva. He confers auspiciousness, liberation, bliss and Intelligence.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajo Ghana Shyam Bhajo Sita Ram Bhajo Sathya Sai Ram
Bhajo Ghana Shyam Bhajo Radhey Radhey Shyama Bhajo
Murali Manohara Sai Ghana Shyam
Mata Pitha Guru Deva Brahma Vishnu Mahadeva
Mata Pitha Guru Deva Sathya Sai Mahadeva
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Krishna, Lord Sai Ram, Lord Ram the Lord of Sita. O Lord Sai, Oh Enchanting Divine Flute Player! You are Father, Mother, Guru, Brahma Vishnu and Lord of Lords

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajo Ghana Shyama Bhajo Murali Gopala Bhajo
Nanda Ke Lal Bhajo Radhey
Giridhara Gopala Mathura Natha
Kamala Nayana Hey Kaivalya Dhama |Nanda Ke|
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Ghana Shyam, Gopala the enchanting Divine Flute Player, the son of Nanda, the Gopala who lifted the mountain and who is the Lord of Mathura the lotus eyed Gopala

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajo Ghana Shyama Radhey Shyam
Nayanabhi Ram Natawara Shyam |Bhajo Ghana|
Mukunda Madhava Murahara Shyam
Govinda Gopala Giridhara Shyam
Kunja Vihari Sundara Shyam
Sai Murari Sundara Shyam
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Ghana Shyam, Radhey Shyam, Mukunda, Madhava, Govinda, Gopala, Giridhara, Sai Murari

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajo Madhura Hari Naam Nirantara Bhajo Madhura Hari Naam
Sarala Bhaav Se Sai Bhajo
Madhura Bhaav Se Baba Bhajo
Hari Hi Sukh Hai Hari Hi Shanthi
Hari Prashanthi Nivasi Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship and recite forever the enchanting and sweet name of Lord Hari. There is no Happiness and peace without chanting the sweet name of the Lord Sai, the resident of Prashanthi Nilayam, the abode of everlasting peace.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajo Mana Bhajo Rama Ram
Sri Ram Sri Rama Ram |Bhajo Mana Bhajo...|
Bhajo Bhajo Mana Baba Naam
Bhajo Bhajo Sathya Sai Naam
Rama Rama Rama Ram (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord! Chant the name of the Lord Rama and worship Lord Sai

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajo Mana Ram Bhajo Mana Ram
Bhajorey Sai Ram Ram Ram
Mangala Naama Bhajorey Manuva
Mayi Sita Ram Ram Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: O Mind! Chant the auspiciousness name of Lord Ram and Lord Sai Ram. Worship Lord Ram, the Lord of Mother Sita.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajo Mana Ram Bhajo Mana Ram
Bhajorey Sai Ram Ram Ram
Mangala Naama Bhajorey Manuva
Mayi Sita Ram Ram Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: O Mind! Chant the auspiciousness name of Lord Ram and Lord Sai Ram. Worship Lord Ram, the Lord of Mother Sita.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Ramam Sri Ramam
Sundara Shyamala Komala Ramam |Bhaja Mana Ramam|
Bharata Lakshmana Pramudita Ramam
Maruti Sevitha Manobhi Ramam
Pankaja Lochana Pattabhi (Prabhu Sai) Ramam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind Chant Sri Rama, the Lord Rama whose servants were Bharata and Lakshmana, whose abode was Bhadrachala and who was the life of mother Janaki

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajo Mana Sita Ram
Bhajo Mana Sri Raghu Rama Sai Ram |Bhajo Mana Sita...|
Bhajorey Manasa Bhajo Sai Ram
Bhajo Bhajo Parthi (Shirdi) Baba Naam (Bhajo)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Meditate & sing the Glory of Sita & Rama, Sing the name of Rama who is from the Raghu dynasty & verily Sairam, O mind repeat the name Of Sai ram, O mind sing the Name who is the Lord of Parthi

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajo Radhey Govinda Bhajo Shyama Gopal
Shyama Gopal Bhajo Murali Gopal |Bhajo Radhey|
Keshava Narahari Shyama Gopal
Madhava Murahara Murali Gopal
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship by chanting the many names of the Lord Radhey Govinda, Gopala, Murahara, Shyama, Keshava and Madhava

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajo Sita Ram Bhajo Radhey Shyam
Govinda Gopala Sai Harey Ram |Bhajo Sita Ram...|
Keshava Madhava Radha Vallabha
Varada Narayana Nayanabhi Ram |Govinda Gopala|
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the Lord of Sita, Lord Rama. Worship the Lord of Radha, Lord Shyama. Chant the names of the Lord Govinda, Gopala, Sai, Keshava Madhava and Narayana who confers boons.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Bhai Sai Ram
Parthi Pureesha Sai Ram |Bhajorey Bhai...|
Dwarakamayi Sai Ram
Sada Sukha Dayi Sai Ram
Shirdi (Parthi) Pureesha Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Sai Ram, the Lord of Puttaparthi, Dwaraka and Shirdi. He is always granting happiness to all

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Bhai Sai Ram
Parthi Pureesha Sai Ram |Bhajorey Bhai...|
Dwarakamayi Sai Ram
Sada Sukha Dayi Sai Ram
Shirdi (Parthi) Pureesha Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Sai Ram, the Lord of Puttaparthi, Dwaraka and Shirdi. He is always granting happiness to all

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Bhajo Sada Durga Bhavani
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjani Sai Bhavani |Bhajorey Bhajo...|
Mahishasura Mardhini Bhavani
Daya Sagari Hey Jagat Janani
Devotional Song Meaning: Always worship Mother Durga, Bhavani. She is the destroyer of the fear of the cycle of birth and death. She is the slayer of the demon Mahishasura. O Mother of the Universe! You are full of mercy.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Bhajo Sai Harey Ram
Govinda Gopala Sai Harey Ram
Madhava Mohana Sai Harey Ram (Hey) |Bhajorey Bhajo...|
Sri Madhusudhana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Har Ek Prem Anand Se Bolo Ram Harey Ram
Govinda Gopala Sai Harey Ram |Madhava Mohana|
Devotional Song Meaning: O Mind, Chant Sai Ram protect and save us, Lord Govinda, Gopala, Madhava, Mohana, Madhusudhana, destroyer of fear and bestower of Love and Joy, protect and save us

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Bhajorey Gananatham Bhajorey
Bhajorey Gananatham Bhajorey
Buddhi Pradayaka Paapa Vinashaka
Vighnesham Bhajorey
Abhaya Pradayaka Ananda Dayaka
Shiva Nandanam Bhajorey Gananatham Bhajorey
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name Gananatham (elephant headed god) the son of Shiva who bestows intellect, destroys sins and removes obstacles, protects from fear and grants joy and happiness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Guru Charanam
Sri Guru Charanam Pranamamyaham
Sadguru Charanam Pranamamyaham |Bhajorey|
Sri Guru Charanam Sada Smarami
Sadguru Charanam Sada Bhajami
Sai Guru Charanam Sada Namami |Sri Guru|
Devotional Song Meaning: I worship and bow at the lotus feet of Sai Sadguru and always repeat his name mentally.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Manasa Gananatham
Vighna Vinashaka Vinayakam |Bhajorey Manasa...|
Buddhi Pradayaka Gajananam
Bhava Bhaya Nashaka Vinayakam
Devotional Song Meaning: O mind! adore Ganapathi (elephant headed god) who is leaderless, who bestows intellect, destroys the fear of worldly miseries.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Manasa Sai Ram
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Bhagawan
Eshwar Allah Terey Naam
Yesu Buddha Bhi Terey Naam
Shirdi (Parthi) Pureeshwara Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: O mind! worship and chant Sai Ram the Lord of Parthi Puri and Shirdi and chant his other divine names Eshwar, Allah, Yesu, Buddha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Manuva Baba Naam
Bhaktha Janon Ke Bhagawan |Bhajorey Manuva...|
Prema Pradayaka Bhagawan
Bhagawan Bhagawan |Prema Pradayaka|
Parthi Pureeshwara Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: O Mind! Worship and chant the name of Lord Sai baba, the Beloved Lord of devotees and the Lord of Parthi. He always showers love on all

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Manuva Sadguru Deva
Parama Krupalu Sai Mahadeva
Nis Din Dhyaan Karoon Main Tera
Janam Janam Ka Mitey Andhera
Parabrahma Parameshwara Roopa (Deva) |Parama Krupalu|
Devotional Song Meaning: O mind chant and worship Sai Mahadeva who is supreme God and preceptor. From the day I started meditating on you the ignorance accumulated since several birth is vanished. Also you are the supreme God with form and formless.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Manuva Sai Gopala
Sai Gopala Radhey Nandalala |Bhajorey...|
Akhileshwara Ko Abhinandana Hai
Sai Natha Morey Tana Mana Dhana Hai
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mind adore Sai Gopala who is dearest to Radhey. You are the Sai Natha the supreme God of universe. Salutation unto you and my body, mind and money is entirely yours.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Manuva Sai Naamam
Parthi Nivasam Pankaja Netram |Bhajorey...|
Prema Swaroopam Sayeeshwaram
Hrudaya Nivasam Sayeeshwaram
Shirdi Pureesham Sayeeshwaram
Poornavataram Sayeeshwaram (Pari)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mind! chant the divine name Sai having eyes like lotus residing in Parthi. He is Sayeeshwara the embodiment of love revelling in our hearts and resident of Shirdi. He has descended in Parthi with full power of Godhead.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Manuva Sai Ram
Bhaktha Janon Ke Bhagawan Bhagawan |Bhajorey Manuva...|
Paapa Vinashaka Sai Naam
Pavana Naam Sai Naam
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram |Pavana Naam|
Shirdi Parthi Shiva Naam Hari Naam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mind! Chant the name Sai Ram the supreme God dear to his devotees. The sacred name Sai Ram destroys sins of devotees and elevates them to divinity. Also you are Shiva, Hari of Shirdi and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Rama Charan Satatam Bhajorey Rama Charan
Bhajorey Janaki Jeevana Ramam
Bhajorey Ramam Bhadrachala Ramam
Bhajorey Pavana Taraka Naamam
Bhajorey Sri Rama Ramethi Ramam
Devotional Song Meaning: Constantly chant and pray to the Lotus feet of Lord Rama. Pray to the Lord of Janaki, the resident of Bhadrachala, the sacred and pious name of Lord Rama

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Sada Bhajo Rama Krishna Govinda
Bhajo Hari Deena Bandhu Krishna Rama Govinda
Bhajorey Anatha Natha Sai Rama Govinda |Bhajo Hari|
Devotional Song Meaning: Always chant the name of Lord Ram, Krishna Govinda and Sai Ram. The Lord's name support and shelter the meek and he is the friend of the weak

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Sada Sai Naamam
Pavana Naamam Partheeshwara Naamam
Ishta Pradayaka Naamam
Mruthyu Sanjeevana Naamam
Sathya Sayeeshwara Naamam (Bhajorey)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant all the time the name of Sai the Lord of Parthi who sanctifies us and whose name works as medicine to cross the cycle of Birth the death. Chant the name Sathya Sayeeshwara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhajorey Sadguru Sai Charanam
Pavana Charanam Padmadala Charanam |Bhajorey Sadguru...|
Mukti Dayaka Mohana Charanam
Paapa Vinashaka Partheesha Charanam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship the Lotus Feet of Sadguru Sai, the sacred and beautiful Feet of Lord Sai which takes you to liberation and destroys all sin

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaktha Jana Lola Sharanam Ayyappa
Mohini Bala Sharanam Ayyappa |Bhaktha Jana|
Pampa Teera Vasa Sharanam Ayyappa
Parthi Puri Vasa Sharanam Ayyappa
Swamiyey Sharanam Sharanam Ayyappa
Devotional Song Meaning: I surrender to you Ayyappa the beloved of devotees and son of Mohini dwelling at shores of Pampa river. You are also Sai Baba of Parthi. O lord, I bow to you.
