Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhaktha Vatsala Tero Naam O Sai
Dukha Bhanjana Tero Naam O Sai
Tum Sangh Baandhi Prem Ki Dori
Sumiran Karoon Tero Naam O Sai
Patithodharana Bhaktha Parayana
Partheeshwara Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai the Lord of Parthi we chant your name which is loved by your devotees, destroys their miseries. You bind everything in universe by chord of love. We chant your name mentally all the time and you are up lifter of downtrodden and praised (through bhajans) by your devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhakthon Ne Hai Aaj Pukara
Hum Ne Pukara Baba Sab ne Pukara
Deejo Deejo Hum Ko Sahara
Aana Hi Padega Baba Aana Hi Padega
Shirdi Se Aao Ya Parthi Se Aao
Mathura se Aao ya Ayodhya Se Aao
Mecca se Aao Ya Madina se Aao
O Merey Maulah O Merey Sai Tu Kahin Se Bhi Aao |Aana Hi|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Baba I personally appeal and all devotees also appeal you earnestly to grant us your company and all the good things you have. You have to come necessarily from wherever you are from Shirdi, Parthi, Mathura, Ayodhya, Mecca and Madina.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhasma Bhooshitanga Sai Chandrashekara
Phaala Netra Shooladhari Sai Shankara |Bhasma Bhooshitanga...|
Saama Gaana Priyakara Sai Shankara
Hara Hara Hara Shiva Shambho Natana Shekara
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Sai Shankara
Sai Shankara Sathya Sai Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: The charming Lord Sai who wears sacred ashes all over his body and decorates the moon on his head. Sai Shankara who has a third spiritual eye on his forehead and who holds the Trident. O Lover of the Saama Gaana! O charming One! O King among the dancers, Virtuous persons adore and worship thee O Parthi Sai Shankara

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhasma Vibhushitha Bhavani Shankara
Bhava Bhaya Nasha Bhola Shankara
Hara Hara Shankara Samba Shiva
Hara Hara Shankara Sai Shiva
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Shankara, the Lord of Bhavani, who has sacred ashes smeared all over the body. The easy to please Lord Shankara destroys the fear of the cycle of birth and death. Chant the mantra, Hara Hara Shankara Sai Shiva, Om Namah Shivaya

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhasmabhisheka Maheshwara
Bhasma Vibhushitha Sundara
Hara Om Hara Om Haalaahala Dhara
Hara Hara Hara Hara Hey Shiva Shankara
Natawara Shashi Dhara Gowri Manohara
Chandrashekara Jatadhara
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the Lord Maheshwara who is bathed and smeared with sacred ashes all over the body looking beautiful. Oh Shiva Shankara you drank Haalaahala (poison) to save troubled world. You are the consort of Gowri who danced decorating with moon on head with huge flock of hair.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Paapa Nikhandana
Sai Tero Naam
Sai Pavana Naam
Puttaparthi Pavana Triveni
Sai Darsha Snan
Sai Pavana Naam
Bhajana Keertana Naama Smarana
Sai Pavana Naam
Pranava Swaroopa Sai Narayana
Sai Ko Pehchaan
Sai Pavana Naam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai your sacred name when chanted redeems one from fear of worldly miseries and destroys the sins. Your abode Puttaparthi is sacred. Also your darshan, worship, bhajan everything is sacred. Sai Narayana you are the embodiment of Primordial sound (Pranava). So know the Sai as supreme god.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Shesha Shayana Hari
Pranava Swaroopa Narayana
Rajeeva Lochana Adi Sanathana
Bandha Vimochana Narayana
Padmanabha Prabhu Kamala Manohara
Vaikunta Pathey Narayana (2) |Pranava Swaroopa|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Hari you reclining on seven headed serpent removed the fear of worldly sorrows. You are Narayana the embodiment of Primordial sound (Om) having eyes resembling lotus, eternal from beginning, one who frees from cycle of birth and death. You are captivating Lord Narayana having navel resembling lotus and your abode is Vaikunta.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhava Bhaya Harana Vanditha Charana
Jaya Radha Jaya Madhava (Shourie)
Mangala Charana Kalimala Dahana
Narayana Keshava (Sai) |Jaya Radha|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord, your adorable (worship able) holy feet frees us from the continuous cycle of birth and death Glory to Radha, Victory to Lord Krishna, the slayer of the demon Madhu and sustainer of the Universe. Your holy feet dispels the sins of the kali age Oh Lord Narayana, the eternal guardian, Oh Keshava, the slayer of demon Kesi. Glory to Radha, Victory to Lord Krishna, the slayer of the demon Madhu and sustainer of the Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhava Bhayankara Girija Shankara
Nacho Nacho Prabho Hey Nataraj
Tandaveshwara Hey Nataraj
Nacho Hey Nataraj Nacho Nacho Hey Nataraj (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Dance, dance Nataraja also Shankara the consort of Girija (Parvathi) who removes fear and frees one from cycle of birth and death. Also hey, Nataraja you are cosmic dancer during creation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhava Nasha Puttaparthi Pureesha
Jaya Shiva Shankara Hey Jagadeesha |Bhava Nasha...|
Mruthyunjaya Hima Shaila Girisha
Mohana Kara Mana Moha Vinasha
Jyothi Prakasha Sathya Sayeesha |Jaya Shiva|
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord of Puttaparthi, You destroy the cycle of birth and death. Glory to Shiva Shankara and Glory to the Lord of the Universe You are the conqueror of Death/time and you reside on the snow clad mountain. O enchanting one, you are the remover of the mind's attachment O Sathya Sai, You are effulgence and lustre

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhava Sagar Se Paar Utharo
Sai Nath Bhagawan |Bhava Sagar...|
Allah Yesu Buddha Mahaveera
Sab Naamon ki Ek Hai Mahima
Sarva Dharma Ke Palanhaarey |Sai Nath Bhagawan|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sainath Bhagawan! Help me to cross the ocean of continuous passage of life and death. (Allah, Yesu, Buddha, Mahaveera- All these names have the same magnitude of power) You are the sustainer of all the various faiths/religions, Oh Sainath Bhagawan and you are the sustainer of all these names, Allah, Yesu, Buddha, Mahaveera, all of which are equal in their magnitude/potency.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhavani Nandana Bala Gajanana
Pranava Swaroopa Paahi
Hey Parthi Pureeshwara Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh young Gajanana (elephant headed god) Son of Bhavani (Parvathi), embodiment of primordial sound (Pranava) protect us. Also you are Lord Sai of Parthi Puri.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhavatharini Partheeshwari
Sukha Dayini Sayeeshwari |Bhavatharini...|
Bandha Mochani Prashanthi Eshwari
Janani Devi Leela Vinodini
Shiva Vama Bhage Sayeeshwari
Charanam Sharanam Samrajya Dayini
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother, residing in Parthi, You help us cross the worldly existence O Sai Mother, you grant us all the pleasures and comfort O Mother, Goddess of Parthi, you free us from bondage O Mother, you bestow joy upon us O Sai Eshwari, the consort of Lord Shiva We surrender at Your feet, O the one capable of bestowing kingdom

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhola Bhandari Baba Shiva Shiva Shiva Sai Baba
Anatha Rakshaka Deena Dayala Patitha Pavana Sai Baba |Bhola Bhandari...|
Yogeshwara Sai Murari Yogeshwara Hey Tripurari
Nithyananda Brahmananda Premananda Sai Baba
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Baba, you are the Lord who can be pleased easily (The easy-to-please-Lord) and You are the treasure of mercy and prosperity. Oh Sai Baba, You are the supporter of the orphans, protector and the refuge to the destitute and you uplift them and make them sacred. Oh Lord of the Yogis, Oh Sai Murari, Tripurari, the destroyer of three worlds Oh Sai Baba, you are eternally blissful, Brahmananda and Premananda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhola Jai Bhola Jai Sathya Sai ki Jai Bolo Sathya Sai ki Jai
Rama Krishna Ki Jai Pavana Purusha Jai Narayana Ki Jai (Bolo) |Bhola Jai|
Sanathana Dharma Uddharaka Sai
Apad Bandhava Govinda Sai
Eshwaramba Priya Sutha Sai
Sathya Sai ki Jai Sathya Sai ki Jai (Bolo) Sathya Sai ki Jai Sathya Sai ki Jai
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Sathya Sai who can be pleased easily. Also victory to Rama, Krishna, Supreme Lord and Narayana. Oh Sai you the upholder of ancient dharma (faith). Govinda Sai you are the caretaker of the afflicted. You are lovable son of Eshwaramba. Chant victory to Sri Sathya Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhola Nath Harey Jagadeesha
Shaileshwara Hara Uma Mahesha |Bhola Nath Harey...|
Bhava Bhaya Haari Hey Tripurari
Shiva Gangadhara Sai Murari
Bhola Nath Bhola Nath
Sai Nath Sai Nath
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the easy to please Lord of the Universe, who grants all that is asked for without any question. The Lord who resides on the Mountain, The Lord of Mother Uma. The one who destroys the cycle of birth and death and the Lord of the three worlds Lord Sai Murari, The auspicious one, who has the Holy Ganga (in his matted hair). The easy to be pleased Lord, Sai nath.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhola Nath Shambho Shankara
Sai Nath Bhola Maheshwara
Dama Dama Damaru Bholey Shankara
Dhimi Dhimi Dhimi Dhimi Natana Manohara
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Shankara |Sai Nath|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the Easy-to-please Lord Sai Shankara, the conferrer of all prosperity. Lord Sainath, is the incarnate of Lord Maheshwara, the destroyer of all that is transient. He is the enchanting dancer to the rhythmic beats of damaru (kettle-drum). He has won over death, the eternal one, is Sai Shankara, bestower of all auspiciousness and prosperity.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhola Shankara Bhola (Hara)
Shaileshwara Hara Vishwambharadhara |Hara Bhola Shankara...|
Surya Chandra Pralayagni Netra Dhara
Shakthi Sahita Shiva Natana Manohara
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Shankara, The giver of prosperity, You are easily pleased. The one who resides on the snow clad mountain, you pervade the entire universe. Your three eyes denote, The Sun, The Moon and the pralaya Agni (the fire of deluge) Oh Lord, the Enchanter, who dances with his concert Shakthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhuvana Bandhava Sai Bhagawan
Mata Pitha Bandhu Sakha Tum Ho Bhagawan
Eshwar Bhi Tum Ho Allah Nanak Tum Ho
Prabhu Yesu Tum Ho Mahaveer Tum Ho
Buddha Deva Tum Ho Merey Pran (Sai) Nath Tum Ho
Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: You are also Eshwar, Nanak, Yesu, Mahaveer and Buddha. O Sai ram you are my life force. Worship and chant Sai Bhagawan the supporter of this universe. You are my mother, father, relative and friend.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bhuvana Mohini Sri Varalakshmi
Mangala Dayini Mukti Pradayini
Vishnu Mohini Shakthi Swaroopini
Ksheerabdhi Tanaye Sai Narayani
Ananda Roopini Sowbhagya Dayini (Parama)
Devotional Song Meaning: Captivating goddess of universe Sri Varalakshmi (Goddess Lakshmi who grants boons) bestows auspiciousness and liberation. You are embodiment of creative power and consort of Vishnu. You are Sai Narayani dwelling on ocean of the milk, blissful one.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bolo Bolo Jai Sai Ram
Jai Bolo Bolo Sai Ram |Bolo Bolo|
Deena Bandhu Deena Dayala
Karuna Sindhu Sai Krupala
Meera Ke Prabhu Shyama Gopala
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name Jai Sai Ram who is support and compassionate to meek, embodiment of kindness and merci. You are Shyam Gopala the Lord of Meera. Also you are Sai Ram of Parthi Puri.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bolo Bolo Sab Mil Bolo Om Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya |Bolo Bolo...|
Joota Jata Mey Gangadhari
Trishoola Dhari Damaru Bhajavey
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Bhaja
Goonj Utao Om Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us all chant together, " Om Namah Shivaya" and bow down to Lord Shiva, the bestower of all prosperity He holds the Holy Ganges in his matted locks of hair He holds the Trishoola (the trident) and plays on the Damaru (kettle-drum). Let us all play the Damaru in a rhythmic fashion Let the chanting "Om Namah Shivaya" resonate and let us bow down to the Lord Shiva, the bestower of all prosperity.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bolo Jai Jai Kaar Bolo Jai Jai Kaar
Bolo Jai Jai Kaar Sai Baba Ki
Patitha Pavana Hey Ghana Shyama
Sai Gopala Hey Ghana Shyama
Prema Bhagawan Sai Bhagawan
Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant victory to Sai Baba who is also Ghana Shyama the saviour of afflicted. Chant Sai Gopala, Prem Bhagawan (Lord whose form is love) and Sai Bhagawan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bolo Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Sai Ram
Bolo Jai Sathya Sai Ram (2)
Mandir Mey Sai Ram
Masjid Mey Sai Ram
Gurudware Mey Sai Ram
Girja Ghar Mey Sai Ram |Bolo Jai|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant victory to Sai Rama whose form is truth and who is dweller of Temples (for Hindu), Masjid (for Muslims), Gurudwara (for Sikhs), Girja Ghar (a church or synagogue of jews)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bolo Krishna Jai Bolo Krishna Jai
Bolo Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Jai
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Krishna Jai Jai
Mayi Meera Mana Vihari Krishna Jai Jai
Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Jai (Bolo)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Krishna, Sai Krishna who is the foster of truth, righteousness, peace and love. The charmer of Meeras mind.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bolo Narayana Jai Jai Vittala
Sai Narayana Ranga Ranga Vittala |Bolo Narayana...|
Govinda Krishna Naam Rakumayi Vittala
Gopala Krishna Naam Panduranga Vittala
Sri Ranga Vittala Sai Ranga Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us all chant the many names of the Lord. Glory to Lord Narayana, Vittala, Govinda, Gopala, Panduranga, Shri Ranga and Sai Ranga.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bolo Ram Sai Ram
Bolo Shyam Sai Shyam |Bolo Ram...|
Bolo Ram Sai Ram
Bolo Shyam Sai Shyam
Bolo Ram Ram Ram Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Sairam, Chant the name of Sai Shyam Sai, The one who is mother and father. Shyam, The one with a dark blue complexion, Lord Krishna

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bolo Ram Sai Ram Sathya Sai Ram
Sathya Naam Sai Naam Hari Ka Naam
Sri Hari Hari Bol Hari Narayana
Bhajo Manuva Tu Sathya Narayana
Merey Ram Hey Ghana Shyam Sathya Sai Ram |Sathya Naam|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the Lord Sathya Sai Ram, The Lord's name is Sathya, The eternal changeless truth. Chant the name of Lord Hari and Lord Narayana. Oh Mind, You chant the name of Sathya Narayana Oh my Lord Rama, my Ghana Shyama, my Sathya Sai Rama The Lord's name is Sathya, The eternal changeless truth.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bolo Rey Hari Naam
Bolo Rey Shiva Naam |Bolo Rey...|
Bhaktha Janon Ke Baba Naam
Sai Naam Sai Baba Naam |Bhaktha Janon|
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Hari, Lord Vishnu and Chant the name of Lord Shiva, the bestower of prosperity. Chant the name of Sai Baba, who belongs to the devotees, the Lord Sairam, who resides in the abode of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Bolo Sai Ram Sathya Sai Ram
Prashanthi Vasa Sathya Sai Ram |Bolo Sai Ram...|
Tan Man Lekey Man Mey Basaakey
Sai Ram Bolo Sathya Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us chant the name Sai Ram whose form is truth dwelling in Prashanthi Nilaya. Install his form in the heart after surrendering physically and mentally.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Brahma Murari Sada Poojita Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Bilvarchana Priya Bhavani Shankara Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Mruthyunjaya Mahadeva Maheshwara Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Bhasmoddhoolita Tejo Vigraha Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Lingodhbhavakara Sai Maheshwara Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya (Om)
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Shiva is fond of being worshippped by Bilva leaves. He is the Lord of Lords and the conqueror of death. We bow to the Lord who manifests the Lingam, brings forth from within himself. We bow to the Lord, who is the conqueror of death and who is the supreme Lord We bow to Lord Sai, Who has sacred ashes emanating from Him and His Light illumines the Universe. We bow to the Lord Sai Maheshwara, the Supreme Lord, who is fond of the 8 versed hymn, Lingashtakam Chant the mantra, "Om Namah Shivaya". We bow to Thee, Oh Lord Shiva

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Brahma Parathpara Poorna Maheshwara
Adi (Sai) Natha Sri Kedareshwara
Bilva Dala Priya Chandrakaladhara
Dhimi Dhimi Damaru Ninaada Kara (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the supreme Brahman who has taken the form of Maheshwara with full divine qualities. He is the eternal Lord from beginning resident of Kedareshwara, who loves worship with bilva leaves, adorn with moon on the head and who dances to the rhythm of Damaru.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Brahma Swaroopa Naada Swaroopa
Sathya Swaroopa Dharma Swaroopa |Brahma Swaroopa|
Jyothi Swaroopa Divya Swaroopa
Shanthi Swaroopa Prema Swaroopa
Shirdi Swaroopa Parthi Swaroopa
Deva Deva Deva Sathya Sai Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: O God Sathya Sai you are supreme Brahman (Universal God) embodiment of primordial sound, truth, righteousness, effulgence, peace and divine love who is resident of Shirdi and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Sayeeshwara (Hey)
Daya karo Krupa karo Parameshwara
Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
Parama Dayala Paapa Vinasha
Raksha Karo Raksha Karo Sayeeshwara |Daya Karo|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sayeeshwara, You are the incarnate of Trinity, Brahma, Vishnu and Maheshwara (Creator, Sustainer and Annihilator) ; Bestow on us your compassion and grace, Oh Parameshwara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Brahmananda Roopa Sri Sai Deva
Brinda Vihara Ananda Chanda |Brahmananda Roopa...|
Nithyananda Atmananda Keshava Govinda
Govinda Gopala Jaya Ananda Mukunda
Govinda Gopala Jaya Ananda Mukunda (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Sri Sais form gives supreme bliss. He is the charmer of Brindavan. Chant his name (Keshava Govinda) which gives everlasting happiness and bliss. Victory to Govinda, Gopala, Mukunda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Brahmanandam Swami Naamam
Netranandam Swami Roopam |Brahmanandam|
Nityanandam Swami Geetam
Hrudayanandam Swami Roopam
Atmanandam Swami Dhyanam
Anandam Paramanandam
Swami (Sai) Sevanam Anandam
Devotional Song Meaning: We derive supreme bliss by chanting Swamiss (Sai) name. His form is delightful to the eyes. Singing his glory gives us everlasting peace. His form his charming to our hearts. One gets atmic bliss by meditating on his form.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Brahmanda Nayaka Baba Parthi Pureeshwara Baba
Chand Aur Suraj Tum Ne Banayey
Nadiya Sagar Tum Ne Banayey (2) |Brahmanda...|
Ayodhya Nagari Tum Ne Banayey Dwaraka Nagari Tum Ne Banayey
Shirdi Parthi Tum Ne Basayi
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Baba, Creator of the entire Universe! You reside in Parthi (Prashanthi Nilayam). You created the sun and the moon You made the rivers and oceans You made the city of Ayodhya and situated the city of Dwaraka. You created the holy cities of Shirdi and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Brindavan Ke Sundara Sai
Parthi Puri Ke Pavana Sai
Bhaktha Janon Ke Leela Sai
Madhava Sai Mathura Sai
Mangala Dayi Baba Sai
Baba Sai Leela Sai (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: O Beautiful Sai of Brindavan O Sai, who is all sacredness and has Parthi as his abode You are the saviour of the devotees O Lord Madhava, The dweller of Mathura (You are verily the embodiment of sweetness) O Sai bestower of auspiciousness O Sai Baba, O Sai Baba.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Brindavan Mey Radhey Shyam
Avadh Puri Mey Jai Siya Ram
Vindhya Himachala Mey Shiva Shankar
Parthi Puri Mey Sai Ram
Rama Krishna Shiva Govinda Narahari
Narayana Sai Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Narayana, you are Lord Krishna of Brindavan, Lord Rama of Ayodhya, Lord Shiva residing in Himalaya mountains and you are Lord Sai Rama of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Buddha Mahaveer Yesu Sai
Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Bol Manuva
Allah Yesu Sath Guru Sai
Geeta Veda Quran Ho Sai
Tan Mey Sai Man Mey Sai
Rom Rom Mey Sai Sai |Vahey Guru|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mind chant Vahey Guru, Vahey Guru. Chant the name Buddha, Mahaveer, Yesu and, Sadguru Sai who are the essence of scriptures Geeta, Quran and Bible. O Sai you are the indweller of body and mind and every atom of body is filled by you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Chanda Kirana kula Mandana Ram
Srimad Dasharatha Nandana Ram'
Kausalya Sukha Vardhana Ram
Vishwamitra Priya Dhana Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Sita Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Beloved Prince of King Dasharatha, Lord Rama! You are the adoration of the noble lineage of the Raghu Dynasty, radiating bliss and Happiness, like the cooling rays of the moon. You are the cause of Mother Kausalya's happiness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Chanda Kirana kula Mandana Ram
Srimad Dasharatha Nandana Ram'
Kausalya Sukha Vardhana Ram
Vishwamitra Priya Dhana Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Sita Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Beloved Prince of King Dasharatha, Lord Rama! You are the adoration of the noble lineage of the Raghu Dynasty, radiating bliss and Happiness, like the cooling rays of the moon. You are the cause of Mother Kausalya's happiness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Chandra Kaladhara Samba Sadashiva
Shambho Mahadeva (Shiva) (3)
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Shiva, who is eternal and unchanging, wears the moon on His head as a decoration. The Lord of the Lords is the bestower of good. Let us chant the mantra that means, I bow to Lord Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Chandra Kaladhara Shambho Deva
Partheesha Sai Jagadeesha |Chandra Kaladhara...|
Akhilandeshwara Paramesha
Karunakara Sayeesha
Trinetra Dhari Shiva Shankara |Partheesha Sai...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva, who is the Lord of the Universe adorning the crescent moon on His head, with the third eye in the forehead and who is the most compassionate one.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Chandra Vadana Kamala Nayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Anantha Shayana Deena Sharanya |Narayana Sai|
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Narayana has a face pleasing like the moon and his eyes are like lotus. He is reclining eternally on the serpent and is the refuge to the weak and meek.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Chandramouleeshwari Shankari Shankari
Mangala Pradayini Madana Koti Sundari
Madhava Hari Sodari Sai Jaganmohini
Devotional Song Meaning: The consort of Shiva - Parvati is adorned with crescent moon on her matted hair. The goddess Shankari bestows auspiciousness having beauty equivalent to crores of Madanas. The sister of Madhava is captivating goddess to the whole world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Chandrashekara Indushekara
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sai Shankara
Hara Hara Mahadeva Hara Hara Mahadeva (2)
Janana Marana Shoka Bhava Klesha Vidhura
Chandra Chooda Chandra Vadana Chandrashekara |Hara Hara|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name Hara Mahadeva (Shiva) one who frees us from cycle of birth and death and one adorn with moon on head and his face is serene like moon rays. He is Sai Shankara who fosters truth, righteousness, peace and love.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Chandrashekara Sai Sundara
Devadi Deva Maheshwara
Vyagrambaradhara Hey Shiva Shankara
Vibhuti Sundara Amaradeeshwara
Chidambaresha Sayeeshwara |Devadi Deva|
Devotional Song Meaning: O Sai beauty personified you are Shiva adorn with moon on the head, God of Gods Maheshwara, who wears tigers skin as cloth, smeared with sacred ash dwelling at Amarnath, Chidambaram. Also you are Sayeeshwara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Chandrashekara Sayeeshwara
Chandrakaladhara Hrudayeshwara |Chandrashekara...|
Prema Pradayaka Parameshwara
Parameshwara Sayeeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara |Prema Pradayaka|
Prashanthi Nilaya Hara Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Our Lord Sai, is none other than Lord Shiva, who wears the crescent moon on his head The Lord who adorns his head with the moon is also the Lord who resides in the Heart Lord Parameshwara, the greatest Lord grants Love to all. The greatest Lord is our Lord Sathya Sai, whose abode is Prashanthi Nilayam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Chandrashekaraya Namah Om
Gangadharaya Namah Om |Chandrasehekaraya...|
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om
Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om
Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Om
Sayeeshwaraya Namah Om (Sathya)
Devotional Song Meaning: Obeisance to Lord Shiva, who is decorated with the crescent-moon on his head, who makes the Holy Ganges flow through his matted hair. I bow to Lord Shiva, who destroys the illusion and all that is transient. Chant the mantra " Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om, Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Om, Sayeeshwarya Namah Om. "

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Charana Kamala Deejo (Mujhey)
Aao Aao |Charana Kamala...|
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome to Hari Narayana who is also Sai Narayana and Sathya Narayana. Show us your adorable lotus feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Charana Kamala Vando Sai Nath Ke Charana Kamala Vando (2)
Jo Trishavanto Piyo Charanamrutha Jeevan Mey Paavey Anando
Jeevan Mey Paavey Anando
Devotional Song Meaning: We should consider Lord Sai's Lotus feet as our closest companion. (His lotus feet is the only true companion) Whoever pines for his nectar-like lotus feet will be filled with bliss throughout his entire lifetime.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Chaturmukha Bhaaryey Maam Paahi
Vaagdevi Vani Saraswathi
Amaley Kamalasana Sahitey
Adbhuta Charithey Saraswathi
Jaya Jaya Sai Dayalakari
Vidya Vijaya Saraswathi
Shruthi Laya Gananaya Veena Pusthaka
Paani Geervani Saraswathi
Devotional Song Meaning: O Saraswathi the consort of Chaturmukha (Brahma) protect us. You are the goddess of speech and sound seated in the posture of lotus, one with extraordinary character. You are the embodiment of highest knowledge holding book as its symbol, veena on other hand. Your music is synchronized with shruthi and your arrow is speech (Geervani).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Chitha Chora Eshwaramba Bala
Sathya Sai Shyama Gopala |Chitha Chora...|
Jagadodhara Sai Gopala
Brahmananda Swaroopa Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Beloved Son of Mother Eshwaramba, Lord Sathya Sai, you are the stealer of our Chitha, the spiritual Heart.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Chitha Chora Muraliwala
Nandalala Nanda Gopala
Nandalala Nandalala
Brindavana Shyama Gopala
Mathura Vraja Gokula Bala
Mana Mohana Madana Gopala
Nandalala Nandalala
Nandalala Nanda Gopala
Nandalala Nandalala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the many names of the Lord Chitha Chora, the stealer of the Chitha, the spiritual Heart, the seat of consciousness. Murali Vala, the enchanting Flute Player; Brindavan Shyama Gopala, the dark-blue complexioned Lord Gopala moving about in the Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Chitha Chora Yashoda Ke Bal Navaneetha Chora Gopal
Gopal Gopal Gopal Govardhanadhara Gopal
Gopal Gopal Gopal Gopal Govardhanadhara Gopal
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord Gopala! Beloved Prince of Mother Yashoda! You are the captivator/stealer of the Hearts of devotees, their Chitha, the spiritual Heart, the seat of consciousness. You are the stealer of butter, i. e. Hearts of the Gopis (devotees). Chant the name of Gopala, the one who protects the cows or tends the cows as a cowherd Chant the name of the Govardhanadhara Gopal, who held aloft the mountain Govardhana to protect the villagers against the torrential rain.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Chitha Raja Chitha Raja
Brindavana Ghana Mangala Charana
Savari Surath Prema Bharana |Chitha Raja...|
Roopa Manohara Murali Madhuvana
Parthi Pureeshwara Chitha Raja Chitha Raja
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord of Parthi, You are the king of my mind/ Chitha, the spiritual Heart Your auspicious feet rambled the thick forests of Brindavan and made them auspicious. Your beautiful complexion captivates us and fills us with Love. O Lord of Parthi and King of my mind! You have a charming beautiful loving Lotus face. Oh Holder of the Flute! You are the bestower of auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daasharathey Ram Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya (2)
Pavana Naama Megha Shyama
Manmata Shata Guna Dhama Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory unto you Oh Rama the son of Dasharatha. You liberate the sufferings of your devotees and your complexion is blue like the clouds. You are verily beautiful with reserve of abundant virtues.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daasharathey Rama Jaya Jaya Rama
Raghukula Bhooshana Raja Rama |Dasharathey...|
Sita Vallabha Sundara Rama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Sathya Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Ram, the Prince of King Dasharatha Lord Rama is the Jewel of the Raghu Dynasty. Chant the name of Lord Ram, Glory to Lord Rama. The beautiful Rama is Goddess Sita's beloved. Chant the name of Lord Rama, Our Sathya Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daasharathey Rama Kalyana Guna Dhama
Rama Sri Rama Rameshwara Rama |Dasharathey Rama|
Bhadrachala Rama Patitha Pavana Rama
Ahalyodharaka Rama Puttaparthi Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Rama, Sai Rama son of Dasharatha you are abode of all virtues and auspiciousness, saviour and up-lifter of afflicted, freed Ahalya from her curse. You reside in Rameshwara, Bhadrachala and Puttaparthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dakshina Murthim Sai Mahesham
Sathyam Shivam Sundaram
Sundaram Sundaram
Chinmaya Mudram Chidananda Roopam
Sanakaadi Yogi Jana Vanditha Sri Gurum
Sathyam Shivam Sundaram |Sundaram Sundaram|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai Mahesha you are Dakshinamurthy (God of silence) the embodiment of truth, awareness, beauty. The Lord with blissful form sitting in the posture Chinmudra facing south. You are worshipped by yogis like Sanaka etc.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Bhaajey
Nachey Shankara Nachey Rey |Dama Dama|
Tunga Himachala Shringa Nivasita
Nachey Pralayankara Nachey Rey
Srishti Shankara Laya Pralayankara
Nachey Rey Shiva (Sai) Nachey Rey
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Shankara dance in rhythm with Damaru (drum) the one who dwells at the peak of highest ice laden mountain Himachala, plays the cosmic dance of creation, sustenance and destruction.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Bhajey
Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghanta Bhajey
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shambho Bhajey
Shiva Sai Shankara Sada Bhajey
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship and chant the divine name Shiva, Sai Shankara the embodiment of auspiciousness who dance to the rhythm of Damaru (drum sounding dama dama) and Ghanta (bell sounding ghana ghana).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dama Dama Damaru Bhajavey Shankara
Mahadeva Hey Bhola Shankara |Dama Dama|
Gowri Natha Sadashiva Shankara
Neelakanta Gangadhara Shankara
Vama Deva Pashupathi Shiva (Sai) Shankara
Sharanagatha Abhayankara Shankara
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Shankara beat the Damaru (drum) dama, dama.. Oh Mahadeva who is easy- to- please, you are the consort of Gowri (Parvathi) granting always auspiciousness whose throat is blue (due to Haalaahala poison), one who holds Ganga in his matted locked hair, the Lord of Pashupathi. Blessed devotees will free from fear who takes refuge in him. Chant the mantra Om Namah Shivaya.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dama Dama Damaru Damaru Natha Shiva
Dhimitha Dhimitha Dhimi Gowri Natha Shiva |Dama Dama...|
Natana Manohara Nataraja Shiva
Bham Bham Hara Hara Bholey Nath Shiva
Shambho Shankara Vishwanath Shiva
Shivaya Namah Shiva Sai Nath Shiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Shiva, loves the sound of the Damaru (Drum) "Dum Dum Dum", "Dhim Dhim Dhim"" and ""Bhum Bhum Bhum". Chant the name of Bholey Nath, the easy-to-please Lord Shiva, Lord Gowri Natha, the Lord of Goddess Parvathi, Lord Nataraja, The Lord of dance, Lord Shankara, the one who gives happiness, Lord Shambho, the bestower of good and Lord Sai Natha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Danava Bhanjana Rama Sai Shyamala Komala Ram
Hey Rama Rama Jaya Rama Sai Rama Rama Ram |Danava Bhanjana...|
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Sai Daya Sagara Ram
Deenon Ke Prabhu Rama Sai Rama Rama Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Charming and sweet Rama, you annihilated the demons (Danavas) Victory to Lord Rama, Our Sai Rama O Son of Dasharatha, you are an ocean of compassion You are the refuge to the destitutes, O Rama, You are our Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Darsha Dikhao Merey Sai Nandalala
Daya Karo Mujhey Krishna (Sai) Gopala |Darsha Dikhao...|
Devaki Nandana Deena Dayala
Mathura Natha Madana Gopala
Sai Narayana Sada Krupala |Daya Karo|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Gopala, the beloved prince of Nanda! Grant me Darshan Shower Your compassion on me. Oh Lord Krishna Gopala! Loving son of Mother Devaki and the compassionate Lord of meek and weak. Oh Lord of Mathura and the most beautiful one. Oh Ever-compassionate Lord Sai Narayana! Shower Your mercy and grace on me.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Darshan Do Deva Deva
Dasharathey Dayabhi Rama |Darshan Do...|
Dharma Uddhara Daya Nidhey
Dasa Paripala Krupa Nidhey
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Rama, bless us with your Darshan. You are the Son of Dasharatha, the compassionate one, upholder of righteousness, the reserve of kindness. You are protector and sustainer of your devotees who take refuge in you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Darshan Do Ghana Shyama Shyama
Radhey Govinda Radhey Gopala |Darshan Do...|
Mathura Natha Deena Dayala
Parthi Puri Ghana Shyama Shyama
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Ghana Shyama bless us with your vision, the Lord of Radhey Gopala. You are the Lord of Mathura compassionate towards weak and meek and also you are Shyama of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Darshan Do Prabhu Sai Natha
Darsha Dikhao Sai Natha |Darshan Do|
Araj Suno Merey Shyama Gopala
Shyama Gopala Sai Gopala (2) |Araj Suno|
Brindavan Ke Nandalala
Devotional Song Meaning: Sai Nath bless us with the vision of your divine form, listen to our earnest prayer. Oh Shyam Gopal beloved of Gopi and Gopas of Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Darshana Deejo Bhagawan
Parama Dayalu Bhagawan |Darshana Deejo|
Adi Anantha Adbhuta Roopa
Ananda Daata Aashritha Vatsala
Prema Swaroopa Shanthi Pradatha
Satchidananda Sri Sathya Sayeesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Grant me the vision of Your Divine Form Oh Lord, the Supremely Merciful Bhagawan! You are Infinite and Your Form is unsurpassingly beautiful and indescribable. Thou art the Grantor of Joy and happiness to those who have come to Thee for refuge. Your Form is Love and You are the bestower of Peace. Oh Most Supreme Lord Sri Sathya Sai! You are the embodiment of Truth, Awareness and Bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Darshana Do Darshana Do
Darshana Do Sai Bhagawan |Darshana Do...|
Tum Ho Baba Natawara Lala
Tum Ho Baba Deena Dayala
Tum Ho Baba Parama Krupala
Tum Ho Karuna Nidhan (Baba) |Darshana Do Sai|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai Bhagawan, Grant me Darshan, Vision of your holy form. You are the sustainer of the entire world Lord, you have Shirdi as your holy abode Oh Lord, with your Love and supreme compassion, you destroy the ill-effects of kali Oh Lord of Shirdi and Parthi, you are the treasure house of Compassion Oh Supreme Lord of Parthi, you are the refuge to the destitute Oh Lord, who resides in Shirdi, please grant me your vision.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Darshana Do Sai Mata
Aao Aao Sai Mata |Darshana Do...|
Tribhuvana Dharini Parthi Nivasini
Prema Swaroopini Sai Mata |Aao Aao|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sai Nath bless us with the vision of your divine form, listen to our earnest prayer. O Shyam Gopal beloved of Gopi and Gopas of Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Dayabhi Rama
Dharani Pala Shiromani Rama |Dasharatha Nandana|
Deena Dayala Ravikula Rama
Daasharathey Sri Raghu Rama (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: O the Son of Dasharatha the compassionate Rama, the supreme ruler and sustainer of the earth who is compassionate to weak and meek, the star of Surya clan, the prince of Dasharatha Oh Raghu Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Raja Rama
Janaki Jeevana Sri Raghu Rama |Dasharatha Nandana...|
Rama Rama Ravikula Soma
Ravikula Soma Ravikula Soma |Rama Rama|
Danava Samhara Kodanda Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh King Rama you are the Son of Dasharatha, the consort and life of Janaki, star of Sun clan, annihilator of demons, wielder of bow Kodanda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Daya Sagara Rama
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Rama Daithya Kulaantaka Rama |Dasharatha Nandana...|
Lakshmana Sevitha Rama Lakshmi Manohara Rama
Sookshma Swaroopa Rama Sundara Vadana Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: O Merciful Lord Ram! O Prince of King Dasharatha! You are an ocean of mercy. You slayed the ten headed evil Ravana and who put an end to the clan of demons. You are worshipped and attended by Brother Lakshmana and you are the enchanter of Goddess Lakshmi. O Beautiful Faced Rama, your form is imperceptible. (You are also the formless one)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Daya Sagara Rama
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Rama Daithya Kulaantaka Rama |Dasharatha Nandana...|
Lakshmana Sevitha Rama Lakshmi Manohara Rama
Sookshma Swaroopa Rama Sundara Vadana Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: O Merciful Lord Ram! O Prince of King Dasharatha! You are an ocean of mercy. You slayed the ten headed evil Ravana and who put an end to the clan of demons. You are worshipped and attended by Brother Lakshmana and you are the enchanter of Goddess Lakshmi. O Beautiful Faced Rama, your form is imperceptible. (You are also the formless one)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Ramachandra Prabhu Janaki Jeevana Jaya Jaya Ram
Raghukula Bhooshana Deena Janavana
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Rama, you are the darling son of King Dasharatha and you are life to Janaki, Janaka's daughter (Goddess Sita) You are the crown jewel of the Raghu Clan and are the saviour of the destitute. Oh Lord of Sita, you are the uplifter of the fallen (destitute) Oh Raja Rama, King Rama, you are the Lord of the Raghus of the Raghu lineage or clan

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Sri Ramachandra Dharma Samrakshaka Ram
Devaki Nandana Murali Dhara Ananda Dayaka Shyam
Eshwaramba Sutha Sri Sathya Sai Premamrutha Bhagawan
Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva Shakthi Swaroopa Mangala Dayaka Naam
Dasharatha Nandana Ram
Ananda Dayaka Shyam
Premamrutha Bhagawan
Jai Jai Jai Sai Ram (Bolo)
Devotional Song Meaning: Darling Son of Dasharatha Oh Rama having blissful and serene face and who upholds righteousness. You are Shyama (Krishna) the darling Son of Devaki holding the enchanting flute, bestowing happiness. You are Lord Sathya Sai, Son of Eshwaramba who is the embodiment of love. Victory to Shiva the all powerful whose name bestows auspiciousness. Chant victory to Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dasharatha Ram Janaki Ram
Maruti Sevitha Manobhi Ram
Sita Ram Sri Raghu Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Ram
Jaya Jaya Ram Janaki Ram
Ahalyodharaka Ananda Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Prince of King Dasharatha! Oh Lord of Sita! You are constantly worshipped by Maruti (Hanuman, a monkey devotee of Lord Rama), Chant the name of the Lord of Parthi Puri, Lord Sai Ram. Victory to Lord Rama, Lord of Janaki (Sita) The blissful Rama, The saviour of Ahalya

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dasharatha Rama Dayabhi Rama
Danava Bhanjana Karunabhi Rama |Dasharatha Rama|
Deenodharana Manobhi Rama
Taraka Naama Sugunabhi Rama (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Rama Son of Dasharatha you are merciful and compassionate, annihilator of demons, up lifter of destitute, embodiment of noble virtues and your name when chanted releases one from the miseries of the world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Datta Guru Datta Guru Dattatreya Guru
Sai Natha Deena Natha Brahma Roopa Guru
Alakh Niranjan Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Dattatreya Guru
Dattatreya Guru
Sai Nath Guru |Deena Natha|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the Holy names of the Noble Teacher Dattatreya and Lord Sai Natha, Reciting ever pure and spotless names of the Noble Teacher Lord Dattatreya and Lord Sai Nath, destroys the fear of the bondage of birth and death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dattatreya Sadguru Deva
Dehi Dehi Tava Sri Paada Seva
Tum Hi Brahma Sanathana Deva
Vishnu Narayana Sri Vasudeva
Pannaga Bhooshana Shiva Mahadeva
Dehi Dehi Tava Sri Paada Seva (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh God and Noble teacher Dattatreya grant us to serve your feet. You are Brahma the eternal God, Vishnu, Narayana who is indweller in all. You are Shiva, Mahadeva adorn with serpent as ornament.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daya Karo Bhagawan Krupa Karo Bhagawan (2)
Bhagawan Bhagawan
Hey Sai Nath Bhagawan
Hey Krupa Nidhey Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord, bestow on us your compassion and mercy, Oh Lord Sai, who is the treasure house of compassion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daya Karo Bhagawan Shankara Daya Karo Bhagawan
Trinetra Dhari Trishoola Dhari Ganga Dhari Daya karo |Daya Karo...|
Parvathi Ramana Pannaga Bhooshana Neelakanta Daya Karo |Daya Karo|
Chandrashekara Chandrakaladhara Vibhuti Sundara Daya karo
Devotional Song Meaning: Be kind towards us Lord Shankara the one who has third eye and possesses trident. Holds Ganga in the matted hair. You are the consort of Parvathi wearing snake as ornament and whose throat is blue (due to Haalaahala poison). You are beautiful with vibhuti smeared all over the body and adorn with moon on the head having serene complexion like moon rays. Oh Shiva show us your merci.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daya Karo Daya Karo Daya Karo Ma
Raksha Karo Raksha Karo Sathya Sai Ma
Hey Ma Hey Ma
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Sathya Sai Ma
Sathya Sai Ma Sathya Sai Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Universal mother Sathya Sai Ma show us your mercy and kindness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daya Karo Hari Narayana
Karuna Sagara Narayana
Pankaja Nayana Pannaga Shayana
Sri Vasudeva Narayana
Paapa Vinashaka Prashanthi Vasa
Parthi Pureeshwara Narayana
Paramananda Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Hari Narayana bestow us your mercy who is the ocean of compassion reclining on the five headed serpent (Adishesha) whose eyes resembling lotus. Oh God Narayana you are the indweller of all the beings, presently in the Kali Yuga you are Sai the resident of Prashanthi at Parthi who destroys the sins and you are supreme bliss personified.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daya Karo Hari Narayana
Karuna Sagara Narayana
Pankaja Nayana Pannaga Shayana
Sri Vasudeva Narayana
Paapa Vinashaka Prashanthi Vasa
Parthi Pureeshwara Narayana
Paramananda Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Hari Narayana bestow us your mercy who is the ocean of compassion reclining on the five headed serpent (Adishesha) whose eyes resembling lotus. Oh God Narayana you are the indweller of all the beings, presently in the Kali Yuga you are Sai the resident of Prashanthi at Parthi who destroys the sins and you are supreme bliss personified.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daya Karo Hey Daya Nidhey Hey Bhagawan
Tan Man Dhan Sab Sharana Tumharey |Daya Karo...|
Adi Anantha Hari Avinashi
Sada Nirantara Ghat Ghat Vasi
Deena Dayala Sada Krupala (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Bhagawan, The treasure house of Mercy, have mercy on us This body, mind and money (all the material possessions) are all yours Oh Infinite and the primal one, You are all pervading; Oh the saviour of destitute, you are ever compassionate.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daya Karo Hey Jaya Jagat Janani
Krupa Karo Hey Durga Bhavani |Daya Karo...|
Pranava Swaroopini Hey Kalyani
Mata Maheshwari Durga Bhavani
Sharanam Sharanam Sharanam Bhavani
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mother of the Universe Bhavani, show compassion and mercy on us. You are the personification of the primordial sound "OM", Oh mother Durga we surrender at your feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daya Karo Hey Karuna Murthy Krupa Karo Bhagawan
Tum Bin Koi Aur Na Dooja
Tum Ho Hamarey Pran
Tum Ho Anatha Natha Deena Bandhu
Tum Bin Kaun Sahara
Tum Bin Kaun Sahara Prabhuji
Devotional Song Meaning: Show mercy on us Oh compassionate Lord, no one but you care for us, you are our life, you are the saviour of the downtrodden, Oh Lord who else other than you can help us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daya Karo Hey Karuna Nidhan Sai
Tum Ho Daata Daya Karo
Tum Ho Sai Krupa Karo
Prabhu Tum Sai Antaryami
Parthi Puri Bhagawan (2)
Tum Ho Daata Daya Karo |Tum Ho|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, Treasure house of Grace and compassion, kindly bless us with your mercy. You are always the giver, please bestow on us your mercy Oh Lord Sai, You are the indweller of the Heart Oh resident of Parthi, bestow on us your grace and mercy

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Partheeshwara Sai Deva
Janam Janam Tum Saath Raho
Sai Nath Mahadeva
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Partheeshwara Sai Deva
Shirdeeshwara Sai Deva Partheeshwara Sai Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai deva the Lord of Parthi be compassionate and merciful towards us and accompany us from birth to birth. Oh Sai Mahadeva the resident of Shirdi and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daya Karo Sadguru Sai Daya Karo
Shirdi Nivasa Sai Daya Karo
Parthi Nivasa Sai Daya Karo |Daya Karo...|
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Tum Ho Brahma Eshwara
Radha Kantha Parvathi Ramana
Deena Bandhava Sai Daya Karo |Parthi Nivasa|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh True Guru, (the dispeller of the darkness of ignorance), Oh Lord Sai, the resident of Shirdi and Parthi, please shower your mercy. O Lord Giridhari, The one who held aloft the mountain to save the devotees, you are the Lord of Meera You are Brahma (creator) and Eshwara (destroyer) Oh Radha's beloved and the enchanter of Goddess Parvathi Saviour of helpless and the destitute, Oh Lord Sai, the dweller of Parthi, shower your compassion on us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daya Karo Sai Narayana
Daya Karo Hey Krupa Karo
Krupa Karo Baba Daya Karo
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Narayana (Sai)
Deena Ke Bandho Deena Sharana Sai Narayana
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Narayana (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Narayana, please shower your mercy on us. Show your mercy on us show your compassion on us. Oh Baba, please confer your compassion on us. Oh Lord, the companion of the Forlorn and the refuge to the destitute, Oh Sai Narayana, grant us mercy and compassion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daya Karo Shiva Gangadhari
Krupa Karo Shiva Hey Tripurari |Daya Karo...|
Naama Madhura Shubha Mangala Kaari
Alakh Niranjan Trishoola Dhari
Daya Karo Daya Karo Daya Karo Bhola Bhandari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Shiva, The one who holds the Holy Ganges in your locks of hair, shower your compassion on us. Oh Lord Shiva, who destroyed the city of Tripura, shower your mercy on us. Your sweet name bestows all auspiciousness. Oh imperceptible and Faultless one, Oh the Holder of Trishul, the trident, Oh Easy-to-please Lord, shower your mercy on us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daya Sagara Karunakara
Jagadeeshwara Sayeeshwara |Daya Sagara|
Bhuvaneshwara Akhileshwara
Guna Gambhira Sayeeshwara (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, you are the ocean of compassion and mercy. Oh Lord of the entire creation, Oh Sai eshwara You are the Lord of the entire world, You are the master of the entire world and the entire Universe Oh Lord Sai, You are the embodiment of all virtues qualities.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Daya Sudha Barsao Mata Jaya Jaya Jaya Ambey
Prema Sudha Barsao Mata Jaya Jaya Jaya Ambey
Devi Niranjani Sai Bhavani
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ambey (2)
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ambey (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Mother Ambey! Oh Ocean of mercy and love! Shower Your grace. Oh Purest One! (Mother Sai). You are the destroyer of the cycle of birth and death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dayabhi Rama Janaki Rama
Madhura Manohara Prabhu Sai Rama
Atma Rama Nayanabhi Rama
Kodanda Rama Pattabhi Rama
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Rama |Madhura Manohara|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Resident of the Heart of devotees and holder of the Kodanda bow! You are merciful and beautiful to behold. Chant the name of the King Rama of the Raghukula dynasty and the beautiful and enchanting Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dayamaya Hey Maheshwara
Krupamaya Hey Sadashiva
Dama Dama Damaru Maheshwara
Damaruka Natha Sadashiva
Hari Om Hari Om Sadashiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Hey Maheshwara (Shiva) you are full of compassion. You are also Shiva the embodiment of auspiciousness show us your kindness who loves the sound of damaru (drum) dama, dama.. chant Hari Om.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dayamaya Sri Sai Harey
Krupamaya Sai Baba Harey
Dharma Swaroopa Rama Harey
Prema Swaroopa Sai Harey
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sathya Sai Baba Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name Sai Harey the compassionate one and the embodiment of love and who is highly merciful also he is Rama the embodiment of righteousness. You are Sai who fosters truth, righteousness, peace and love.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deena Bandhava Baba Daya Sagara
Patitha Pavana Sai Karunakara |Deena Bandhava|
Sathya Sai Prema Sai Shanthi Dharma Sindhu Sai
Jeevan Ka Aadhaar Sai Janam Janam Bandhu Sai |Patitha Pavana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Baba the ocean of compassion you are the kinsman to destitute, up-lifter of afflicted. You are Sathya Sai whose form is truth and righteousness, refuge of all lives, father, mother and perpetual companion from birth to birth.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deena Bandhava Sri Sai Deva
Daya Sagara Devadi Deva |Deena Bandhava...|
Paahi Prabho Sayeeshwara
Dehi Vibho Jagadeeshwara
Sharanam Prabho Sathya Sai Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, You are the kinsman of the destitute and the afflicted. Oh Lord of Lords, you are a ocean of compassion. Oh Lord Sayeeshwara, kindly protect me. O Lord of the universe, grant yourself to me Oh Sai deva, I surrender to thee.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deena Dayala Hari Parama Dayala
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Gopala
Madhura Manohara Krishna Gopala
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Gopala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Brindavana Ghana Madana Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the many names of the supremely merciful, sweet and beautiful Lord Krishna, Hari, Govinda, Gopala, The Lord of Meera and Giridhara

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deena Dayala Sri Sai Rama
Jagadodhara Prashanthi Rama
Anatha Rakshaka Ananda Rama
Ananda Rama Sri Sai Rama |Anatha Rakshaka|
Atmabhi Rama Prabhu Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Shri Rama, Sai Rama, You are merciful and kind towards the weak and the meek Oh Lord of Prashanthi, you have come for the upliftment of mankind. Oh Rama, the blissful one, You are the protector of those who are orphaned. Oh Lord Sai Rama, you are the indweller of our Hearts.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deena Dayala Tribhuvana Pala Giridhara Bala Nandalala
Murali Manohara Maya Vilola
Natawara Sundara Shyama Gopala
Radha Madhava Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Giridhara (Krishna) darling of Nanda, you are the protector of three worlds, compassionate towards weak and meek, captivating figure with enchanting flute in your hands. You play with the illusion created by you. You are Shyam Gopala and the Lord of Radha who danced on the Kalinga serpent. You are also Sai Gopal.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deena Dukha Bhanjana Alakh Niranjan
Karunamaya Sai Deva
Rajeeva Lochana Ayodhya Rama
Dasharatha Nandana Ananda Dhama
Raghupathi Raghava Kalyana Rama
Ayodhya Jana Priya Rama |Karunamaya|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai you are destroyer of miseries of weak and meek. You are pure and spotless with full of kindness. You are Rama the consort of Janaki (Sita) resident of Ayodhya and darling of Dasharatha. You are the abode of the supreme bliss, star of Raghu clan who bestows joy and happiness to devotees and you are lovable to the people of Ayodhya.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deena Dukhiyon Ke Taarana Kaarana
Tu Hey Eesa Masiha O Sai Baba |Deena Dukhiyon...|
Dharma Uddharana Bhaktha Parayana
Adi Narayana Sai
Alakh Niranjan Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Parthi Narayana Sai (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Baba, You are the destroyer of the miseries and pain of the destitute Oh Lord Sai Baba, You are the Supreme Lord You have descended for the revival or upliftment of righteousness and for guiding the devotees. Oh Lord Sai, you are the Imperceptible and faultless and are the destroyer of the fear of the cycle of birth and death. Oh Sai, resident of Parthi, You are the Lord Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deena Dukhiyon Se Prem Karo Mera Sai Prasanna Hoga
Sai Mera Main Tera Yeh Prem ki Beheti Dhaara
Yeh Prem ki Beheti Dhaara
Mera Sai Prasanna Hoga
Devotional Song Meaning: My Lord Sai will be very happy, if you love and serve those afflicted with misery and pain. The flow of love binds us to Sai and binds Sai to us. This is the Stream of Love that flows amongst us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deena Janavana Deena Samrakshaka
Sanathana Sarathey Devadi Deva
Adi Sanathana Nitya Niranjana
Jagadodharana Sai Narayana
Jyothi Swaroopa Prema Swaroopa
Prashanthi Swaroopa Devadi Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh God of Gods Sai Narayana you are the protector and refuge to destitute, eternal charioteer. Your supreme state is eternal and spotless unaffected by world. Upholder and sustainer of universe, embodiment of effulgence and love. You are the Lord of Prashanthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deena Janavani Vara Dayini
Gnana Swaroopini Narayani
Sayeeshwari Amba Jagadeeshwari
Veda (Swa)Roopini Vageshwari
Prema Pradayini Partheeshwari
Mata Maheshwari Mana Mohini |Sayeeshwari Amba|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mother Sayeeshwari, the goddess of the universe. You are the refuge to the destitute. You bestow boons and who loves the divine music. You are the essence of the Vedas and goddess of speech who bestows love. You are Partheeshwari and Maheshwari, the one who delights the mind.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deena Natha Sai Guru Natha
Prema Swaroopa Shanthi Pradatha |Deena Natha|
Jaya Jaya Guru Deva Satchidananda
Shashi Vadana Alankruta Kesha
Sundara Sai Ananda Dayi
Daya Sagara Karunakara Sai Guru Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai Gurunatha, the Lord of the destitute, love is your form. You grant peace to the devotees. Victory unto you Oh lord, who is the embodiment of truth, awareness and bliss, who has a face like the moon, decorated with a crown of hair. Oh Sai, you are the ocean of compassion and kindness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deena Natha Shankara
Karuna Sagara Shankara
Parthi Pureeshwara Shankara
Bhola Natha Kailasa Vasa
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Paramesha
Sayeeshwara Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Shankara, the bestower of happiness, you are the Lord of the destitute Oh Lord Shankara, who resides in Parthi, You are an ocean of compassion. Oh Easy-to-please Lord, you have the mount Kailasa as your abode. Oh Lord of Parthi, You are the greatest Lord, Oh Sayeeshwara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deena SharanyaDeena Natha
Karuna Sagara Sai Baba
Karuna Sagara Sai
Sita Rama Radhey Shyama
Sai Sundara Rama
Maya Manusha Vesha Dharey Tum
Jaya Leeladhara Sai Baba
Jaya Leeladhara Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh radiant Lord Sai Krishna, you are the protector of needy and downtrodden, the ocean of compassion, you are Lord Rama, the consort of mother Sita and also Lord Krishna, the beloved of Radha. You have attired the beautiful human form to be among your devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deenodharana Rama Harey
Deena Dayala Krishna Harey
Raghukula Tilaka Rama Harey
Yadu Kula Nandana Krishna Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Rama, you are the saviour of the meek and week. You are also Krishna who is compassionate to the meek and week. You are the star of the Raghu clan and as Krishna, the darling of Nanda and the star of the Yadu clan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deenodharana Yadu Veera
Gopi Sanchitha Krutha Chora
Danava Samhara Ranadheera
Janaki Jeevana Aadhara
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Krishna, you are the star and courageous one of the Yadu clan, who is the upholder of the meek and week. You are the mischievous thief who stole butter from the Gopikas. You are the great warrior who annihilates demons. You are also the refuge and life of Janaki (Sita).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dehi Sharanam Simha Vahini
Dehi Sharanam Asura Vinashini
Dehi Sharanam Bhava Bhaya Haarini
Dehi Sharanam Hari Narayani
Dehi Sharanam Brahma Sanathani
Dehi Sharanam Sai Narayani
Devotional Song Meaning: Grant me protection of Goddess Durga, whose vehicle is a Lion. Oh Destroyer of demons, Oh Destroyer of the fear of the cycle of birth and death, Oh Consort of Lord Narayana, Oh the eternal infinite one, Oh Sai Narayani, Grant me protection.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deva Deva Giri Deva Dalarchita
Deva Sura Paripalaya Mamkita
Chandrachuda Shiva Tejovilarchita
Rundamala dhara Trishoola Shobhita
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Shiva, the great God, the resident of Ice Mountain, who is worshipped with the petals of flowers and leaves. You are the protector of the Gods. We adore you Oh Shiva, the effulgent one, adorned with the crescent moon on the head, garland of skulls of evil doers and who holds the Trident.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deva Deva Mahadeva Sai Shankara
Sai Shankara Shirdeeshwara
Bhasmodbhavakara Partheeshwara
Swara Varna Tejonmaya Jagadeeshwara
Sarva Mantra Swaroopa Sayeeshwara
Vamadeva Virupaksha Vishweshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: God of gods Oh Mahadeva, who is also Sai Shankara, the resident of Shirdi. You are Partheeshwara, who creates sacred and divine ash. You are the effulgent God of the universe from whom emanates musical notes and alphabets. You are Sayeeshwara, Vama Deva, Virupaksha and Vishveshwara who are the embodiment of all mantras.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deva Devothama Deena Samrakshaka
Devadi Deva Dayamaya
Sri Sai Deva Krupamaya |Deva Devothama...|
Patithodhara Paapa Vidhura
Parthi Vihara Parameshwara
Bhasmodbhavakara Bhava Bhaya Nashana |Sri Sai Deva|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sri Sai! You are Supreme among Gods, the Protector of the afflicted. Oh Lord of all Lords, you are the embodiment of compassion. Oh Lord Sai, you are the embodiment of mercy. Oh Lord, the up-lifter of the fallen and the destitute, Oh Supreme Lord, the one who moves about in Parthi Oh Creator of Bhasma, the sacred ash and the remover of the fear of the bondage of cycle of birth and death. Oh Lord Sai deva, the embodiment of mercy.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Deva Senapathey Skanda Subrahmanya Paahi Maam
Paahi Parameshwara Skanda Subrahmanya Paahi Maam
Subrahmanya Shanmukha Natha
Sai Natha Karuna Sindho |Paahi Parameshwara|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Subrahmanya (son of Shiva) the chief of the battalion of Gods, who destroys demons, protect us. Oh Skanda, the supreme God, protect us. Protect us, Oh Shanmukha Natha (six faces God) and Sai Natha who is the embodiment of kindness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Devadi Deva Vinayaka
Pranava Swaroopa Suramuni Vanditha |Devadi Deva|
Mangala Charana Paahi Gajanana
Hey Shubha Dayaka Vighna Vinashaka
Sri Charanam Bhava Dukha Haranam (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: God of Gods Vinayaka (elephant headed God) you are the embodiment of Pranava, the primordial sound. Worshipped by Gods and saints, having an auspicious feet, protect us. Hey, Gajanana, who bestows goodness and frees us from the miseries of the world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Devaki Nandana Gopala (Vasu)
Shyama Mukunda Gopala |Devaki Nandana...|
Radha Madhava Raasa Vilola
Leela Manusha Natawara Lala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Gopala, the beloved son of Mother Devaki Chant the name of Lord Gopala, who is also known as Shyama, the one who is beautiful because of the colour black and the conferrer of Liberation. Chant the name of the one who is as sweet as honey and who delights in participating in folk dances with Radha. Chant the name of the Lord, who is a supreme dancer

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Devaki Tanaya Daya Nidhey
Daya Nidhey Krupa Nidhey |Devaki Tanaya...|
Darshan Deejo Deva (Sai) Deva
Deena Natha Sai Natha
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the merciful and compassionate Son of Mother Devaki, Lord Krishna. Oh the treasure house of compassion and mercy. Oh Lord of Lords, Sai Deva, please grant us your Darshan, view of your Divine Form. Oh Sai Natha, the up-lifter of the forlorn.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Devi Bhavani Jagat Janani
Manda Haasini Ananda Dayini |Devi Bhavani...|
Mangala Kaarini Karunya Roopini
Narayani Devi Narayani
Mahishasura Mardhini Ambey Bhavani
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Goddess Bhavani, the mother of Universe and the destroyer of cycle of birth and death. She has a bewitching smile and she confers bliss. She confers auspiciousness and is the embodiment of mercy. Worship Goddess Narayani. She is the annihilator of the demon Mahisha, Goddess Amba.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Devi Bhavani Ma Jaya Sai Bhavani Ma
Daya Karo Sai Ma Krupa Karo Sai Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Devi Bhavani Ma
Jaya Parthi Nivasini Ma Jaya Sai Bhavani Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Mother Sai Bhavani, the destroyer of the cycle of birth and death. Oh Sai Ma, bestow on us your mercy and compassion. Oh Mother, resident of Parthi, Victory and Glory to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Devi Durga Dashabhuja Dhaarini
Danava Daithya Dushta Samhaarini |Devi Durga...|
Bhagawathi Bharati Bhava Bhaya Haarini
Mata Maheshwari Mangala Kaarini
Raja Rajeshwari Girija Bhavani
Bhaktha Janashraya Sai Bhavani
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Goddess Durga, who has ten arms. She is the destroyer of evil people and demons. Goddess Durga Devi, wields ten arms Mother Maheshwari, confers auspiciousness. Mother Bhavani, The daughter of Himavan, mountain king, is also Raja Rajeshwari - The queen of queens. Sai Bhavani, who protects the devotees and acts as a refuge to the devotees

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Devi Durga Kalyani
Maha Shakthi Bhavani Shivani |Devi Durga|
Suguna Manohari Sai Bhavani
Devi Jagadambey Janani Dayamayi
Vande Bhagawathi Mata Bhavani
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh goddess Durga, who confers auspiciousness. You are Bhavani with tremendous power, who is the consort of Shiva. You are the captivating Sai Bhavani with virtuous qualities. Oh divine mother of the universe, who is highly compassionate. Oh mother who is adored as Bhagawathi and Bhavani, we bow to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Devi Jagat Janani Sai Mata
Pranava Swaroopini Praneshwari |Devi Jagat...|
Gnana Pradayini Gnaneshwari
Tripura Sundari Daakshayini
Bhagawathi Bharati Narayani
Jagadeeshwari Jaganmohini
Karunamayi Sathya Sayeeshwari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai Mother, You are the mother to the entire world You are the form of Pranava (Primordial Sound, Om) and you are the very life Oh Embodiment of wisdom, you grant us the knowledge and wisdom Oh Daughter of Dhaksha (Goddess Parvathi), you are the most beautiful one in all the three worlds You are Bhagawathi, Bharati and Narayani. Oh Goddess of the entire world, you enchant the whole world Oh Sai Mother, you are the embodiment of compassion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Devi Janani Sai Janani Darshana Do Mata
Danava Mardhini Dharma Swaroopini Darshan Do Mata
Sathya Sanathani Shanthi Pradayini Darshan Do Mata
Parthi Pureeshwari Prema Pradayini Darshan Do Mata
Darshan Do Mata (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh universal mother, Sai Janani, bestow on us the vision of your divine form. You are the destroyer of demons, embodiment of righteousness. You are the eternal truth and the goddess of Parthi who bestows peace and love.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Devi Lakshmi Maam Paahi
Deena Daya Kari Maam Paahi |Devi Lakshmi|
Ksheerabdhi Tanaye Maam Paahi
Sarva Mangaley Maam Paahi
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh goddess Lakhmi, protect us. You are compassionate towards the meek and week. You are the consort of Narayana, reclining on the ocean of milk. Protect us, Oh goddess of auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Devi Sai Ma Devi Saraswathi Ma
Durga Bhavani Ma Kaali Kapalini Ma
Jagadodharini Ma
Sai Daya Karo Ma (Sathya)
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Mother Sai, Mother Saraswathi (Goddess of knowledge and wisdom), Mother Durga Bhavani (Destroyer of cycle of birth and death) and Mother Kaali (Destroyer of demonic qualities and the One holding a skull as symbol). O Up-lifter of the entire Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dhanya Ho Eshwaramba
Jag ko Deejo Lal Baba
Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho
Kali Yug Mey Avatar Liye
Sakala Charachara Hey Bhagawan
Jagadodhara Sai Narayana
Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho
Dhanya Ho Eshwaramba (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Thee, Oh! Auspicious Mother Eshwaramba! You have gifted Lord Sai Gopal to the world in the present Kali age. Lord Sai Narayana is Omnipresent and has come for the deliverance of mankind.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dharani Nayaka Govinda
Dinakara Teja Govinda
Venu Gaana Priya Govinda
Venkata Ramana Govinda
Geeta Dayaka Govinda
Sukha Paripalaka Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord Krishna (Govinda), who loves to play beautiful music on His flute and who gave us the Bhagawad Geeta and who protects and sustains His devotees. He is the Lord of the Universe who lights up our lives everyday.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dhim Dhim Dhimi Dhimi Natana Shiva
Tandava Keli Vilasa Shiva
Leela Manusha Vesha Shiva
Lingodhbhavakara Sai Shiva (Atma)
Sai Shiva Hara Bala Shiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Shiva's rhythmical dance is referred to here as Dhim Dhim Dhimi. Lord Shiva delights in the rhythmical dance and he performs the cosmic dance, Tandavam. (also referred to as Shiva Tandavam) Lord Shiva, has taken the human form which is like a sport (leela) for him. Sai Shiva, is our Young Shiva, who brings out the Lingam from within, by His Divine Will.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dhimitha Dhimitha Dhim Dhimitha Dhimitha Dhim Nachey Bhola Nath
Nachey Bhola Nath (4)
Mrudanga Boley Shiva Shiva Shiva Om
Damaru Boley Hara Hara Hara Om
Veena Boley Sai Ram Sai Ram
Nachey Bhola Nath (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Shiva dances in ecstacy with the tune, "Dhimita Dhimita Dhim". Along with it the drum vibrates with the sound, "Hara Hara Hara Om". The mrudanga (musical instrumental) chants the auspicious name of, "Shiva Shiva Shiva" and the Veena (musical instruments)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dum Dum Dum Dum Damaru Bhajey
Bhola Nath Shiva Shambho Bhajey (Hara)
Hara Sai Nath Shiva Shambho Bhajey
Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghanta Bhajey
Gowri Nath Shiva Shambho Bhajey |Hara Sai Nath|
Devotional Song Meaning: In ecstacy, the drum (Damaru) beats "Dum Dum Dum" It plays in the worship of Sai and Shiva, The easy-to-be-pleased Lord and the destroyer of ignorance. The gong rings out the sounds "Ghan Ghan Ghan". Worship the Lord of Goddess Parvathi (the consort of Lord Shiva).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Durga Bhavani Ma Jaya Jaya Sai Ma
Kaali Kapalini Ma Jaya Jaya Sai Ma |Durga Bhavani...|
Parama Shivani Ma Jaya Jaya Sai Ma
Jagadodharini Ma Jaya Jaya Sai Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Mother Durga, Bhavani, Kaali and Sai. Victory to Mother Sai, Who is the Supreme Shivani (Power). Victory to Mother Sai, Who has come to save and deliver mankind.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Durga Durga Devi Durgati Nashini
Kaali Kaali Maha Kaali Kapalini |Durga Durga...|
Bhagawathi Bharati Devi Saraswathi
Ambey Bhavani Lakshmi Narayani
Parthi Nivasini Sai Janani
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Durga, the goddess who removes poverty. Chant the name of Kaali, the goddess who adorns the garland of skulls (of evil doers). Oh mother Sai you are also adored as Bhagawathi, Bharati, Saraswathi, Bhavani and Lakshmi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Hey Sai Jaganmata
Sai Jaganmata Mata Sai Jaganmata |Durga Lakshmi...|
Veena Vadini Saraswathi Hey Sai Jaganmata
Durga Lakshmi Amba Bhavani Sai Jaganmata |Sai Jaganmata |
Devotional Song Meaning: Hey Sai, the universal mother. You are goddess Durga, Lakshmi and Saraswathi who plays the divine Veena.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Ma
Dukha Nivarini Jagat Janani
Janani Janani Janani |Durga Lakshmi...|
Janma Vimochani Jagadambey
Paapa Vinashini Parama Shivey
Para Sukha Dayini Sai Shivey
Parthi Nivasini Sada Shivey |Janani Janani|
Devotional Song Meaning: Adore the universal mother, who is worshipped as Durga, Lakshmi and Saraswathi. You are the remover of sorrows and one who frees us from the cycle of birth and death by washing away our sins. You are the supreme Goddess of Parthi who is compassionate and bestows bliss to all.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Sai Jaganmata (Jai)
Sai Jaganmata Maam Paahi Jaganmata (Sathya) (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Durga, Lakshmi, Saraswathi and mother Sai. Divine Mother of the Universe Oh Sai, protect me.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Durgati Nashini Durge Jaya Jaya
Kala Vinashini Kaali Jaya Jaya |Durgati Nashini...|
Uma Rama Brahmani Jaya Jaya (2)
Sita Radha Rukmini Jaya Jaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Goddess Durga, who destroys misfortunes and distress. Victory to Goddess Kali, Who is the destroyer of demonic qualities. Victory to Goddess Uma, Sita, Radha and Rukmini. Victory to Lord Sai Natha, Who is affectionate, tender and loving towards us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Durga Amba Bhavani Jai Jai Durge Amba Bhavani
Sankata Harini Mangala Karini (2)
Pranava Swaroopini Mata Jai Jai
Durga Amba Bhavani
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to goddess Durga Amba Bhavani, the annihilator of miseries, bestower of auspiciousness and the embodiment of primordial sound.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Durge Durge Durge Jai Jai Ma (2)
Karuna Sagari Ma
Kaali Kapalini Ma
Jagadodharini Ma
Durge Jai Jai Ma (Amba)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Mother Durga, Victory to Mother Durga Oh Mother, you are the ocean of compassion. Oh Mother Kaali, who is adorned with a garland made of human skulls (represents the destruction of our ego) Oh Mother, you uplift the whole world. Victory to you Divine Mother Durga.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Durgeshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari (Amba)
Paramesha Jagadeesha Partheeshwari |Durgeshwari...|
Karunya Lavanya Kamaleshwari
Sathya Sai Jaganmata Parameshwari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh universal mother Durga, you are Sayeeshwari, the embodiment of truth and infinity. You are also adored as Kamaleshwari, with elegant beauty and compassion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Dwaraka Natha Madhusudhana Ghana Shyam
Gokula Nandana Devaki Nandana
Sai Sundara Shyama |Dwaraka Natha...|
Mandara Giridhara Venu Vilolana
Kamala Vadana Ghana Shyam
Parthi Vihari Krishna Murari
Madhusudhana Ghana Shyama Shyama
Devotional Song Meaning: We adore you as Madhusudhana and Ghana Shyama, the Lord of Dwaraka, the darling of Gokula and Nanda. You are none other than our beautiful Sai Shyama, who enchants us with his divine flute playing in the woods of Mandara Mountain. Your face is like the lotus flower and has a dark complexion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ek Baar Kshama Karo Sai Merey Baba Sri Sathya Sai
Kshama Murthy Sai Baba Prema Murthy Sathya Sai |Ek Baar...|
Shirdi Ke Sai Terey Dwarakamayi
Parthi Ke Sai Teri Yaad Mujhey Aayi |Kshama Murthy|
Devotional Song Meaning: Merciful One! Sri Sathya Sai Baba, please forgive me I am standing in front of You, thinking about You. Oh! Shirdi Sai residing in Dwarakamayi, I remember Sai the dweller of Parthi, who is full of Love.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Eka Dantham Sai Gajananam
Ganapathi Vara Siddhi Vinayakam |Eka Dantham|
Gananatham Shiva Gowri Sutham
Gajamukham Sai Gajananam (2)
Gajamukham Sai Gajananam (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: We adore you Sai Gajanana (elephant headed god), who has a single tusk. Head of Ganas (demigods) and bestower of boons O Vinayaka (leaderless), you are the son of mother Gowri and Lord Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Eshwar Allah Ek Tum Hi Ho
Karuna Sindho Ram
Deena (Bhaktha) Janon Ke Jeevan Saharey
Daya (Mujhey Krupa) Karo Bhagawan
Karuna Sagara Dayabhi Rama
Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Sai Ram (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Eshwara (refers to God in Hinduism) and Allah (God in Islam) are both one and the same. The name refers to the same Almighty. Oh Rama, You shower on us the compassion You are the refuge to the destitutes You are the refuge and saviour to the devotees Oh Bhagawan, Shower Your compassion on me Oh Merciful Rama, You are the ocean of Compassion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Eshwar Allah Terey Naam Sai Terey Naam
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Ram Sathya Sai Ram
Allah Sai Maulah Sai
Yesu Buddha Sai Hey Mahaveer Sai
Govinda Sai Gopala Sai Nanak Sai |Sarva Dharma|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, Eshwara is your name, so is the name Allah, yours. (The names Eshwar and Allah, both reach you Oh Lord Sai) Oh Sathya Sai Rama, you are fond of all the faiths You are Allah and You are Maulah. Oh Sai, You are Jesus Christ, Buddha, Mahaveer. Oh Sai, You are Govinda, Gopala, Guru Nanak. Oh Sathya Sai, you are fond of all the faiths. (All the Faiths lead to you)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Eshwara Allah Tero Naam Eshwari Nandana Sai Ram
Krishna Christhu Tero Naam Karuna Sagara Sai Ram
Rama Raghava Terey Naam Shirdi Pureeshwara Sai ram
Krishna Keshava Tero Naam Karuna sagara Sai Shyam
Devotional Song Meaning: You are adored as Eshwar and Allah. You are Sai Ram the son of mother Eshwaramba, the ocean of compassion. You are also worshipped as Krishna, Christ, Sai Baba (resident of Shirdi), Shyama and Keshava.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Nandana Jagat Vidhata
Parthi Nivasa Sai Deva Daya Karo Guru Deva (Hey)
Kamala Nayana Hey Hrudaya Vihari
Ananda Dayaka Hey Giridhari
Charan Sharan Mey Lelo Hum Ko
Yuga Avatara Sai Murari |Parthi Nivasa|
Devotional Song Meaning: Son of Eshwaramba, Sai Baba, creator of the universe, dweller of Puttaparthi, noble Lord and Teacher, Oh lotus-eyed One, indweller of devotees' hearts, Oh Sai Krishna, incarnation of this age, bestow Thy Grace on us, make us merge in You.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Nandana Niranjana Namo Namo
Sarva Devatha Athita Swaroopa Namo Namo |Eshwaramba|
Bhaktha Hrudaya Vasa Bhaktha Chintana Namo Namo
Sarva Loka Nayaka Sanathana Namo Namo
Sayeeshwara Namo Namo Sarveshwara Namo Namo (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutation to thee Oh Sayeeshwara, the son of mother Eshwaramba, who is pure and spotless. You are the embodiment of all forms of Gods, the indweller of the heart, brooding always the welfare of devotees. O supreme Lord of all worlds, we bow unto you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Nandana Sai
Shirdi Parthi Prema Sai
Vishwa Kalyana Karana Sai
Shashwata Ananda Dayi Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai, you are the darling of Eshwaramba. You are the beloved of the people of Shirdi and Parthi. You are the cause of universal welfare and goodness. You are the bestower of perpetual bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Janardhana
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Guru Deva
Sai Guru Deva Sai Guru Deva
Mangala Dayaka Sai Guru Deva
Munijana Mohana Madhava Sai
Prashanthi Nilaya Deva |Parthi Pureeshwara...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Sai, residing in Prashanthi Nilayam, Oh son of Eshwaramba, you bestow auspiciousness and you are worshipped by sages.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Priya Nandana
Sai Jaya Jaga Vandana (2) |Eshwaramba|
Ratnakara Kula Bhooshana
Rajeeva Nayana Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana (3) (Narayana Sai Narayana)
Devotional Song Meaning: You are the beloved Son of Eshwaramba. You are worshipped by the whole world. You are the jewel of the Ratnakara clan. You have beautiful eyes. Oh Sai you are Hari, Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Priya Tanaya
Esha Mahesha Sri Sayeesha
Yuga Avatara Sayeesha
Leelavatara Sayeesha
Poornavatara Sayeesha (Pari)
Devotional Song Meaning: Loving son of Eshwaramba, Lord Mahesha, Sri Sai! The Avatar of the Kali Age, the Avatar who is full of play (Leela), the Avatar in His complete glory!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Priya Tanaya Sai Narayana
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana |Eshwaramba...|
Kali Yug Mey Avatar Liye
Kan Kan Mey Tera Naam (O Sai) (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana, You are the beloved son of Mother Eshwaramba, to whom you are Sai Narayana. You have incarnated in this present Kali Age as our Lord Sathya Narayana You are all pervading and your name is present in every atom.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Eshwari Nandana Parthi Gajanana
Pranava Swaroopa Paahi Prabho
Omkaareshwara Uma Maheshwara
Parthi Pureeshwara Palaya Maam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Gajanana of Parthi, the son of mother Eshwaramba and embodiment of primordial sound, protect us. You are adored as Maheshwara, the consort of Uma and the resident of Omkaareshwara and Parthi. Please protect and sustain us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Eshwari Nandana Sai Gopala
Hey (Sai) Madhusudhana Krishna Krishna
Jagadodhara Parthi Vihara
Prema Swaroopa PremAvatara
Dwarakamayi Sri Sathya Sai
Hey (Sai) Madhusudhana Krishna Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai, Son of Eshwaramba, Our Sai Gopala Oh Lord Krishna, the destroyer of the demon Madhu Oh Lord who resides in Parthi, you have come to uplift the whole world You are the very embodiment of Love and the incarnation of Love. Oh Lord Sai, who was the Lord Krishna of Dwaraka You enchant the entire world and you are loved by the entire world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Eshwari Tanaya Esha Mahesha
Shambho Shankara Sadashiva
Parthi Pureesha Hey Paramesha
Sharanam Sharanam Partheeshwara
Sharanam Sharanam Sayeeshwara (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Mahesha (Shiva), who has incarnated as the son of mother Eshwaramba, the embodiment of bliss and auspiciousness. You are the supreme Lord of Parthi. We surrender unto your lotus feet, Oh Sayeeshwara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gaana Lola Gopala
Sai Manohara Gopala |Gaana|
Jagadodhara Parthi Vihara
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name Gopala, who is engrossed in divine music. You are Sai having captivating form, who sustains the universe and who rambles in Parthi. You are Meera's little Krishna, who lifted the mighty mountain on your finger tips.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gaana Priyey Sai Karunamayi
Kadambari Amba Katyayani |Gaana Priyey...|
Hari Vallabhey Sukha Dayini
Omkaara Roopini Narayani
Bhuvaneshwari (Amba) Jaganmohini
Sri Chakra Vasini Sayeeshwari
Devotional Song Meaning: The Merciful Mother Sai is delighted by Music Chant the names of the Deities Kadambari, Amba and Katyayani (different names of Goddess Parvathi) Oh Goddess Lakshmi, the beloved of Lord Hari (Vishnu), you are the bestower of happiness and all comforts Oh Goddess Narayani, You are the primal form of Om You are the Goddess of the entire world and the one who beautifies the world. Oh Sayeeshwari, the one living in Sri Chakra.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gajamukha Gajamukha Gajanana
Gowri Nandana Gajanana |Gajamukha...|
Girija Nandana Gajanana
Girisha Nandana Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Gajamukha (elephant headed) god, the son of Gowri, the beloved of Girija and Shiva who is the Lord of the mountains.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gajamukha Gajamukha Gananatha
Suramuni Vanditha Guna Sheela |Gajamukha...|
Suramuni Vanditha Guna Sheela
Gajamukha Gajamukha Gananatha |Suramuni|
Devotional Song Meaning: We chant the glory of Gajamukha, who is the leader of Ganas (demigods) and who is worshipped by Lords and Saints. You are the embodiment of virtues.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gajanana Gajanana
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gajanana |Gajanana...|
Parvathi Nandana Varada Gajanana
Parama Dayakara Sai Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Ganesha, The Lord with Elephant-face Oh Sai Gajanana, you are the Lord of Parthi. Oh Son of Mother Parvathi, You are the conferrer of boons Oh Sai Gajanana, you are supreme compassionate.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gajanana Gajanana
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gajanana |Gajanana...|
Parvathi Nandana Varada Gajanana
Parama Dayakara Sai Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Ganesha, The Lord with Elephant-face Oh Sai Gajanana, you are the Lord of Parthi. Oh Son of Mother Parvathi, You are the conferrer of boons Oh Sai Gajanana, you are supreme compassionate.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gajanana Hey Gajanana
Gowri Tanaya Gajanana |Gajanana|
Hey Shiva Nandana Jaya Jaga vandana
Vidya Buddhi Pradayaka
Parama Niranjana Mooshika Vahana
Parthi Pureeshwara Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Gajanana (Ganesha), son of Gowri (Parvathi) ; Oh Son of Shiva, Victory to the One who is revered by the whole world; You are the one who bestows knowledge and intelligence; Hey Gajanana, You are the supreme one who has mouse as his vehicle and you are the Lord of Puttaparthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
