Gajanana Hey Shubhanana
Gowri Manohara Priya Nandana
Pashupathi Tanaya Gajanana
Parama Niranjana Shubhanana (Hey)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Auspicious Elephant -Faced Lord! You are loving son of Mother Gowri Thou art the beloved son of Lord Shiva, who is the Lord of all creatures. You are supreme, pure and free of all blemishes Oh Lord Ganesha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gajanana Hey Shubhanana
Gowri Manohara Priya Nandana
Pashupathi Tanaya Gajanana
Parama Niranjana Shubhanana (Hey)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Auspicious Elephant -Faced Lord! You are loving son of Mother Gowri Thou art the beloved son of Lord Shiva, who is the Lord of all creatures. You are supreme, pure and free of all blemishes Oh Lord Ganesha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gajananam Girija Tanayam
Gangadhara Shiva Kumaram Devam |Gajananam...|
Suramuni Sevitha Charanam Sharanam
Sada Smarami Sai Sharanam
Devotional Song Meaning: We adore the Lord Gajanana (elephant headed god), the loving son of Girija and Shiva (who adorns the Ganges). We bow to your feet, which is worshipped by Gods and saints. We dwell on your divine form always.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gajavadana Gajanana
Gowri Tanaya Gajanana |Gajavadana...|
Jai Jai Jai Jai Gajanana (3)
Devadi Deva Gajanana |Gowri Tanaya|
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Lords of Lords, Lord Gajanana, The Elephant faced Lord, The beloved son of Mother Gowri. Chant the name of the Elephant -Faced Lord, Gajanana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gajavadana Gananatha
Gowri Tanaya Dayamaya |Gajavadana...|
Bhuvana Dhara Pranava Swaroopa
Paalaya Paalaya Parthi Pureesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Ganesha, the Elephant-faced Lord O Son of Mother Parvathi, You are extremely compassionate Oh The one whose form is the Pranava and who is the sustainer of the entire creation, Protect us Oh Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gajavadana Gananatha Gajavadana Deena Natha
Siddhi Daata Shiva Tanaya
Buddhi Pradayaka Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Yuga Yuga Vanditha Jaya Sri Ganesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the Elephant -Faced Gajanana, the Lord of the Demigods. The Prince of Lord Shiva who can bestow all the Siddhis and the intellectual prowess. O Son of Mother Parvathi, you remove the fear of the cycle of birth and death and help cross it. Victory to Lord Ganesha, who is worshipped to and prayed to in all ages (yugas)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gajavadana Gananatha Natha
Gowri Vara Tanaya Gunaalaya |Gajavadana...|
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Siddhi Vinayaka Hey Shubha Dayaka
Devotional Song Meaning: O Elephant -Faced Lord! You are the Lord of the Divine Forces O Beloved son of Mother Gowri. You are full of Virtues O Lord who grants us knowledge, intelligence and wisdom O Lord of all Siddhis, you are the conferrer of all auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gajavadana Gananatha Natha
Gowri Vara Tanaya Gunaalaya |Gajavadana...|
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Siddhi Vinayaka Hey Shubha Dayaka
Devotional Song Meaning: O Elephant -Faced Lord! You are the Lord of the Divine Forces O Beloved son of Mother Gowri. You are full of Virtues O Lord who grants us knowledge, intelligence and wisdom O Lord of all Siddhis, you are the conferrer of all auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gananatha Gananatha
Mooshika Vahana Jaya Gananatha
Sharanam Sharanam Gajanana |Gananatha|
Siddhi Vinayaka Gananatha
Buddhi Pradayaka Gananatha
Jagadodhara Jaya Gananatha |Sharanam|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord of Lords, Oh Ganesha Victory to the Lord whose vehicle is a mouse (Symbolises Cleverness) We surrender to the Lotus feet of Gajanana You are the bestower of all siddhis and success and intellectual prowess Oh Lord Gananatha, who is the sustainer of the entire creation, we surrender at your Lotus Feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gananatha Sai Gajanana
Partheeshwara Dukha Bhanjana |Gananatha...|
Kailasa Pathey Shiva Nandana Deena Natha Harey Hey Niranjana
Siddhi Pradatha Shubhanana Jagadeeshwara Shanthi Niketana
Jagadeeshwara Shanthi Niketana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Ganesha, The Lord of all Ganas (Demigods) Oh Lord of Parthi, you relieve us of all anxieties and sadness. Oh The Son of Shiva (the Lord of Kailasa), who are the embodiment of purity and the Lord of destitutes. Oh Granter of all the siddhis and prowess, The one whose face radiates goodness Oh Sustainer of the whole world and the abode of all peace.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gananatha Vighna Vinashaka Gananatha
Gananatha Gananatha
Bhaktha Pala Vara Dayaka
Karunakara Shubha Dayaka
Siddhi Vinayaka Chandana Tilaka
Sharanam Sharanam Bhaktha Rakshaka
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Gananatha, you are the destroyer of all obstacles, protector and sustainer of your devotees, bestower of boons. Oh compassionate one, you are the bestower of auspiciousness. You are the almighty with supreme powers adorned with a symbol made of Sandal paste. We bow to you. Oh protector of devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gananayakam Ganeshwaram (Sai)
Gowri Tanaya Gajananam |Gananayakam...|
Mooshika Vahana Sri Gananatham
Paashankushadhara Bala Gajananam
Ananda Tandava Narthana Ganapathim
Vinayakam Vimalacharam Vighneshwaram
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Ganesh, you are the leader of demigods, beloved son of Gowri who rides the mouse. You hold the noose and hook in your hands and is the delightful cosmic dancer having a spotless form. You are all supreme Lord who removes all our obstacles.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Gananayakam Sai Gananayakam Sadananda Sundara Gananayakam Vara Dayakam Sai Shubha Dayakam Parthi Pureeshwara Gananayakam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Ganesha, The Lord of the Ganas, the Demigods You are eternally blissful and most beautiful. You bestow various boons and confer all auspiciousness. O Lord of Lords, you have Parthi as your residence.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ganapathey Paahi Maha Mathey
Gnana Swaroopa Namostuthey
Pankaja Charana Daya Nidhey
Mangala Kara Hey Krupa Nidhey
Sapta Swarapathi Vidya Pathey
Sayeeshwara Twam Suguna Nidhey
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Ganapathi, the highly intellectual one, protect us. Salutations to thee, the embodiment of knowledge. You are the treasure house of compassion with a lotus feet. You are the master of all forms of knowledge and music. Oh Sayeeshwara you are the reserve of divine qualities.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ganapathi Om Jaya Ganapathi Om
Gajamukha Varada Ganapathi Om
Mooshika Vahana Gajanana
Modaka Hasta Gajanana
Parama Niranjana Gajanana
Paada Namasthey Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to thee, OH Ganesha, the elephant faced one, the bestower of boons, the one who has mouse as his vehicle, the one who has Modaka (a sweet preparation) in His hand, The one who is supremely pure, Oh Gajanana, I offer obeisance at your Lotus feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ganesha Charanam Parama Pavanam Sathya Sainam Gajananam
Nithya Smaranam Parama Pavanam Sathya Sainam Gajananam
Sadguru Charanam Parama Pavanam Sathya Sainam Gajananam
Bhava Bhaya Haranam Parama Pavanam Sathya Sainam Gajananam
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us bow in reverence to Lord Ganesha, Lets bow in absolute purity to the name of Sai, to the elephant faced Ganesha Constantly remember the purifying name of Sai, Remember Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced one. The sacred feet of Sadguru are purifying, so is the name of Sai and Ganesha All the fears of the cycle of birth and death are removed by the remembrance of the name of Sai and Ganesha, the elephant faced Lord.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ganesha Sharanam Sharanam Ganesha (4)
Sayeesha Sharanam Sharanam Sayeesha (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Surrender to the Lotus Feet of Lord Ganesh. Surrender to the Lotus Feet of Lord Sayeesha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ganeshwara Ganadhipa
Vighneshwara Vinayaka |Ganeshwara...|
Nirvikalpa Niramaya
Gunaatheetha Niranjana
Bhava Bhanjana Manoranjana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Ganesh (elephant headed god) you are the Lord and chief of Ganas (demigods), remover of obstacles, all supreme. You exist in the thoughtless and pure mind. You are attribute less and spotless who delights the mind and destroys the worldly miseries.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Shankara Girija Mano Ramana
Jaya Mruthyunjaya Mahadeva Maheshwara Mangala Shubha Charana
Nandi Vahana Naga Bhooshana
Nirupama Guna Sadana
Natana Manohara Neelakanta Sai
Neeraja Dala Nayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Shankara, Bearer of the Holy Ganges in his hair and whose consort is Goddess Girija, born of the mountains. Glory to the Lord, who is the Lord of Lords and who has conquered death and whose feet confer auspiciousness. You have Snake as ornament and bull Nandi as vehicle You are the source of all pure sacred virtues Hail the Lord who enchants the mind with his dance, Oh blue-throated Sai, whose eyes are like the petals of a lotus flower.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gangadhara Girija Ramana
Shambho Shankara Samba Sadashiva |Gangadhara...|
Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Sai Shankara
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shirdi Pureeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the holy name of Shiva who adorns the Ganges in his matted flock of hair, who is the beloved of Girija. Chant the holy names Shambho, Shankara, Samba Sadashiva (one who bestows auspiciousness and happiness) who is also the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gangadhara Gowri Mahesha
Tripurantaka Jyothi Prakasha
Haalaahala Dhara Paramesha
Chandrashekara Sai Mahesha
Devotional Song Meaning: This is a Bhajan in praise of Lord Shiva--The one who bears the Ganges and the Moon on his head. He destroys the demon "Tripura" (who symbolises the darkness within us) and illumines us. He is the ultimate Lord who drank the deadly poison of "Haalaahala" for the welfare of the world during "Samudra Manthan" (churning of the ocean). He is also our Lord Sai Mahesha

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gangadhara Hara Gangadhara Hara Kailasa Natha Prabhu Shankara
Bhava Nasha Bhava Bandha Vimochana
Sathya Sai Shiva Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: We praise the Lord Sathya Sai Shiva Shankara-The One who is Auspicious, Captivating-The One who bears the Ganges on his head, One who is the Lord of the mountain 'Kailasa' and the One who liberates us from the bondage of the world and prevents us from taking birth again and again.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva
Shambho Shankara Samba Shiva
Brahma Vishnu Parameshwara Roopa
Bhaktha Jana Priya Sai Krupala
Samba Shiva Sai Shiva (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the Lord Sathya Sai Shiva, who is the very form and embodiment of the Trinity--Brahma, Vishnu and Parameshwara He bears the ganges on his head, is very attractive and compassionate, confers happiness and prosperity and is very dear to all his devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva
Shambho Shankara Samba Shiva
Brahma Vishnu Parameshwara Roopa
Bhaktha Jana Priya Sai Krupala
Samba Shiva Sai Shiva (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the Lord Sathya Sai Shiva, who is the very form and embodiment of the Trinity--Brahma, Vishnu and Parameshwara He bears the ganges on his head, is very attractive and compassionate, confers happiness and prosperity and is very dear to all his devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gangadhara Hara Samba Sadashiva
Sai Naam Sukha Dayi Naam
Aao Aao Hey Bhagawan
Prakat Huvey The Tum Shirdi Mey
Prakat Huvey Ho Ab Parthi Mey
Vibhuti Sundara Sai Ram |Aao Aao|
Devotional Song Meaning: Here we are calling on the Divine, Effulgent Lord to give his Darshan The Lord who is the Eternal Lord of the Divine Cosmos, One who has the Ganges on his head One whose name itself gives so much happiness Oh Lord You appeared in Shirdi Now You have appeared in Parthi O Divinely beautiful Lord Sairam Come come Oh Effulgent Lord.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gangadhara Hara Shiva Shambho
Vibhuti Sundara Sai Shambho
Om Hara Hara Hara Hara Shambho
Haalaahala Dhara Shiva Sai Shambho
Devotional Song Meaning: This is a prayer to Lord Shiva who Has the river Ganges on His head; Who has Vibhuti all over His body; Who swallowed the deadly poison (Haalaahala) ; Who is also our Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gangotri Natha Ganga Shiva
Shambho Mahadeva Samba Shiva
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Shiva
Sugandha Kuntalamba Sametha Shiva
Matrubhuteshwara Mahadeva
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Jeeveshwara
Shiva Shakthi Roopa Sayeeshwara
Gangotri Natha Ganga Shiva (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Shiva who adorns the Ganges, who is also the Lord of Gangotri and whose other names are Shambho, Mahadeva and Samba Shiva. You are the consort of Gowri or Kuntalamba (one who has naturally fragrant hair). You are the Lord of mighty earth, protecting indweller of devotees. You are Sayeeshwara who is the embodiment of Shiva and Parvathi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Garuda Vahana Narayana
Hey Shesha Shayana Narayana |Garuda Vahana...|
Sri Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
Hari Om Hari Om Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: We sing in praise of the Lord Narayana, who is the beloved of his consort Goddess Lakshmi, whose vehicle is Garuda, who sleeps on the serpent (also known as "Adishesha"-who incarnated as Lakshmana - Rama's brother) and who is also know as Hari

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ghana Ghana Neela Bansi Adhariya
Madhura Madhura Smitha Vadana Savariya
Ghana Ghana Neela
Mora Mukuta Peetambara Gatiya
Jhumaka Jhumaka Jhuma Bhaja Ghungharia
Devotional Song Meaning: We are here worshipping Lord Krishna and describing His beautiful form He has the body of thick blue colour, with the flute on His lips, gentle smile on His bluish face, peacock feather as his crown, the yellow cloth on his hip and his anklets making pleasant sound.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ghana Ghana Neela Om Shivaya
Om Shivaya Om Shivaya |Ghana Ghana...|
Shivaya Namah Om Sai Shiva
Sai Shiva Sai Shiva |Shivaya Namah|
Sai Shiva Hara Sai Shiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine name Om Shivaya, whose throat is dark blue in colour (due to consumption of deadly poison). And obeisance to Lord Sai Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ghana Ghana Neela Vadana Ati Sundara
Megha Shyamala Madhava Murahara |Ghana Ghana...|
Mandasmitha Mukha Nayana Manohara
Govinda Gopala Natawara Giridhara |Megha Shyamala|
Devotional Song Meaning: Krishna is described as having a face of thick blue colour He is also described as one who has the colour of black clouds, who is very sweet in nature and one who killed the demon Mura He has a gentle smile on his face and beautiful eyes He is the Supreme Cowherd looking after his cows (mankind), He is the Supreme Dancer and Actor, the one who lifted the mountain of Govardhana for protecting the people of Gokula from the wrath of Indra

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ghana Ghana Neela Yadu Nandana
Ghana Shyama Sundara Mana Mohana
Natawara Giridhara Gopalana
Murali Manohara Madhusudhana
Devotional Song Meaning: Description of Krishna as Nanda's foster son of the Yadu dynasty having thick blue colour Very attractive to the mind having beautiful colour of blue/black The Supreme Dancer and Actor, The One who lifted the mountain (Govardhana), The cowherd The One with the beautiful form with the flute and the slayer of the demon 'Madhu'

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ghana Shyama Gopala Ghana Shyama Gopala
Mana Mohana Jaganmohana
Yadu Nandana Gopal |Ghana Shyama|
Gopala Gopala Shyama Gopala
Gopala Gopala Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lord with dark blue complexion One, Gopala, the One who captivates the mind, The One who captivates the whole Universe, You are the little child in the Yadava clan; Oh Gopala, the enchanting blue coloured Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ghana Shyama Sundara
Bansidhara Prabhu Krishna Kanhaiya
Tum Hi Merey Ma Baap Bhaiyya |Ghana Shyama|
Devaki Tanaya Hey Nandalala
Deena Bandhava Dwarakanatha
Radha Hrudaya Nivasa Harey Krishna
Madhusudhana Muralidhara
Partheeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: O beautiful Lord Krishna Kanhaiya with the flute and of blue colour, You only are my mother, father and brother O son of Devaki and the foster son of Nanda O relative of the downtrodden and orphans and the Lord of Dwaraka O Lord Krishna/Hari who wanders in the heart of Radha O slayer of the demon Madhu, with the flute on your lips O Sathya sayeeshwara the Lord of Parthi

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giri Raja Tanaya Jaya Ma
Hey Durgati Nashini Ma |Giri Raja...|
Maha Jyothirmayi Shiva Shakthimayi
Asura Vinashini Ma
Jaya Devi Durge Jaya Ma |Hey Durgati|
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the daughter of the King of Mountains O Mother, the destroyer of our bad condition in the world The most effulgent and the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi, The mother who is the destroyer of demons (all evils) Victory to the mother Durga.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhara Bala Gopala (Harey)
Govinda Govinda Gopala (Hey) |Giridhara Bala...|
Gopi Lola Gopala
Govardhanodhari Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh cowherd boy who danced with the Gopis and One who lifted the Govardhana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhara Bala Hey Nandalala
Devaki Nandana Shyama Gopala |Giridhara...|
Keshava Madhava Shyama Gopala
Shyama Gopala Shyama Gopala |Keshava|
Bansidhara Hey Shyama (Sai) Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Krishna is extolled with different names as the One who lifted the mountain, The son of Devaki, The Lord of Radha, The One who danced with the Gopikas, The One with the flute and He is also our Sai Gopala

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhara Bala Shyama Gopala
Eshwari Tanaya Sai Gopala
Gaana Vilola Murali Gopala
Govinda Madhava Goparipala (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: We chant the name of Shyama Gopala who is little Krishna lifted the mountain in his fingertips. He is also Sai Gopala son of Eshwaramba the enchanting flute player who loves music. He is Govinda protector of cow herds (people) and in whose chest revels Mother Lakshmi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhara Gopala Gopala
Sai Gopala Sai Gopala |Giridhara...|
Shirdi Pureeshwara (Parthi Pureeshwara) Sai Shankara
Sai Shankara Sai Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine names Gridhara Gopala, Sai Gopala the resident of Shirdi and Parthi. He is also Sai Shankara who also bestows auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Surdas Ke Shyama Manohara
Bhakthon Ke Sathya Sai Manohara
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Gopala, One who lifted the mountain The Lord of Meera and Surdas and the beautiful Lord Sathya Sai the beloved of his devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhara Gopala Muralidhara Harey
Govinda Gopala Damodara
Giridhara Gopala Muralidhara Harey |Govinda Gopala|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the Lord Gopala, Giridhara, The One with the flute who is also called Damodara

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhara Gopala Sai Giridhara Gopala
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gopala |Giridhara Gopala...|
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Paahi Maam Ghana Shyam O Shyama (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord Sai Gopala, the lifter of mountain, the Lord of Meera The Lord of Parthi kindly protect me.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhara Govinda Gopala Ghana Shyama Nandalala
Mana Mohana Madhusudhana Hey Madhava |Giridhara Govinda...|
Damodara Janardhana Muralidhara Mana Mohana
Namo Sai Narayanaya Namo Sathya Narayanaya
Namo Sai Narayanaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the various names of Gopala, Govinda, Giridhara The beautiful son of Nanda with thick bluish colour, the slayer of the demon Madhu Damodara, Janardhana, Muralidhara, Salutations to the Lord Sai Narayana, Sathya Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhara Merey Gopala
Radhey Gopala Radhey (Sai) Gopala |Giridhara Merey...|
Nanda Kishora Maakhan Chora
Yashoda Bala Gopala |Radhey Gopala|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name my Lord Sai Gopala the Giridhara The Lord of Radha The son of Nanda and Yashoda The One who steals the butter

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhara Merey Shyama Gopal
Shyama Gopal Sai Gopal |Giridhara Merey...|
Govinda Govinda Gopi Gopal
Govardhanodhari Gokula Gopal
Shyama Gopal Sai Gopal |Giridhara Merey...|
Mukunda Murahara Mohana Gopal
Murali Manohara Madhava Gopal |Shyama Gopal|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the various names of My Lord Gopal, the Giridhara, The one who lifted Govardhana mountain, the cowherd of Gokula The enchanting Lord Mukunda, Madhava, with the flute, the slayer of Mura, the Lord Sai Gopal.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhara Muralidhara Sai Gopala
Radha Madhava Gopi Lola |Giridhara Muralidhara...|
Maakhan Chora Nanda Kishora
Madhusudhana Sai Mohana Krishna
Karunapaara Sai Avatara
Devotional Song Meaning: O Sai Gopala you are little Krishna who lifted the mountain, enchanting flute player, beloved of Gopis and Lord of Radha. You are the stealer of butter the beloved of Nanda, destroyer of Madhu Demon. You have descended in the form of Sai with reserve of compassion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhara Naagara Kunja Vihari
Madhuvana Sanchari Parthi Vihari |Giridhara Naagara...|
Shyamala Sundara Mayura Mukutadhara
Pankaja Lochana Madhava Mohana
Madhuvana Sanchari Parthi Vihari (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the Lord Giridhara who roams in the garden and in the forest of Madhu He also wanders around in Parthi He is very beautiful with the peacock feather as his crown and lotus eyes.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhari Giridhari Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala |Giridhari...|
Goparipala Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala |Goparipala.|
Govinda Govinda Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Gopala, one who lifted the govardhana mountain the protector of the cows. Chant the name of the Lord Govinda and our Sai Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhari Giridhari Murali Shyam Murari
Radha Ramana Veda Bharana
Pavana Charana Karuna Bharana
Devotional Song Meaning: We chant your name Giridhari the enchanting flute player having dark blue complexion, beloved of Radha, embodiment of Vedas and kindness having divine lotus feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhari Giridhari Radhey Gopala Jaya Giridhari
(Aa)shritha Jana Vihari Giridhari
Meera Ke Nath Prabho Giridhari (Mayi)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Giridhari (who lifted the mountain) the Lord of Radha. You are the refuge and delightful to your devotees and you are the Lord of Mother Meera.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhari Hey Nandalala
Yashoda Ke Bala Tribhuvana Pala
Jagata Uddhara Gokula Bala
Murali Lola Munijana Pala
Parthi Vihara Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Giridhari, the son of Nanda and Yashoda The protector and sustainer of all the three worlds The liberator of the world and the boy of Gokula The player of flute and the protector of the Saints and Rishis Oh Lord Sai Gopala who wanders in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhari Jaya Giridhari
Sugandha Tulasi Dala Vanamali |Giridhari...|
Munijana Sevitha Madhava Murahara
Murali (Gopa Gopi) Manohara Giridhari
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Giridhari The One who wears the garland of fragrant basil leaves and the garland made of jungle flowers Chant the name of Lord Madhava who is worshipped by Saints and who destroyed the demon 'Mura' The beautiful flute player and the beloved of the Gopalakas and Gopikas

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhari Lal Shyama Gopal
Natawara Lal Madana Gopal
Mathura Natha Krishna Gopal
Sri Madhusudhana Murali Gopal
Yashoda Ke Bal Nanda Gopal
Eshwaramba Priya Sai Gopal
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the handsome boy Gopala who is the supreme dancer and actor who is the Lord of Mathura the slayer of Madhu and the player of flute the son of Yashoda and Nanda the Sai Gopal whom Eshwaramba is very fond of.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhari Murari Govinda
Ghana Shyama Murari Gopala |Giridhari...|
Radhey Krishna Murari Govinda
Sathya Sai Murari Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Giridhari Govinda who is the destroyer of the demon 'Mura' chant the name of Radha Krishna and Sathya Sai Gopala

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Giridhari Shyama Mukunda Murari
Madhura Madhura Hey Muralidhari |Giridhari Shyama...|
Mathuradhipathey Madhava Shourie
Sri Madhusudhana Mayura Mukutadhara
Madana Mohana Krishna Kunja Vihari
Giridhari Shyam Giridhari Shyam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Giridhari (Krishna who lifted the mountain) with dark blue complexion who redeems us from miseries and gives liberation, you are the sweet enchanting flute player Lord of Mathura and valorous Madhava, destroyer of Demon Madhu and the one who adorn with crown of peacock feather, strolls the grooves and garden of Brindavan captivating the dear ones.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Girija Bhavani Shivaranjani
Mata Bhavani Jagat Karini |Girija Bhavani|
Shakthi Swaroopini Bhaya Harini
Sowbhagya Dayini Sukha Dayini
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Girija and Bhavani who pleases and makes Shiva happy. Chant the name of Mother Bhavani who liberates the world. She is the embodiment of power and destroys all our fears. She gives happiness and good luck.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Girija Nandana (Hey)
Hey Shiva Nandana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana |Girija...|
Gaana Vilolana Danava Mardhana
Palita Deenavana Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Gajanana (elephant headed god) you are the beloved of Girija and Shiva who protects us from fear and redeems one from cycle of birth and death. Lover of music and destroyer of demons and protector of weak and meek.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gnana Bhaskara Kumara Dayapara
Omkaara Roopa Shiva Shakthi bala
Shanmukha Natha Parama Daya Ghana
Devotional Song Meaning: O Shanmukha (six headed god) the son of Shiva and Parvathi. You are compassionate to the needy and the embodiment of primordial sound (Om) and the treasure house of supreme kindness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gokula Nandana Shyama Murari
Maakhan Chora Gopala Sai
Mathura Natha Madana Murari
Shyama Sundara Sai Gokula Bala
Surdas Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Natawara Shyama Gopala Sai |Maakhan Chora|
Devotional Song Meaning: O Shyama Murari (Krishna) you are the beloved of Gokula who is the stealer of butter, Lord of Mathura, the blue complexioned one and beautiful, the Lord of Surdas Hey! Giridhari who is the delightful dancer. You are also Sai Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopal Gopal Brindavana Gopal
Hey Nanda Ananda Mukunda Gopal |Gopal Gopal...|
Govardhanodhara Gopalana
Gopi Janodhara Niranjana |Hey Nanda|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant Gopala, Gopala the unstained God of Brindavan, one who delighted Nanda and liberated the devotees. Uplifted the Govardhana mountain to save the people, you are protector of cows and Gopis.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopala Brindavana Pala
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Murali Lola Munijana Pala
Suramuni Vanditha Gopala Bala
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Gopala of Brindavan beloved of Gopis (cow herd women) you are little Krishna of Gokula the enchanting flute player. Worshipped by saints and gods and you are the protector of them.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopala Darshan Dey Nandalala
Madhusudhana Neela Bala Govinda
Muralidhara Hari Nanda Mukunda |Gopala...|
Radha Madhava Shyama Gopala
Darshan Dey Dey Madana Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Gopala, the son of Nanda give us your Darshan The bluish colour boy who destroyed Madhu. The Lord addressed as Muralidhara, Hari, Mukunda, the son of Nanda, Radha Madhava, Shyama Gopala. Please give us your Darshan O extraordinarily handsome Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopala Giridhara Bala
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala |Gopala...|
Goparipala Narayana (2)
Narayana Narayana |Goparipala|
Govinda Govinda Narayana (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, who lifted the mountain, who is the boy of Gokula and who gave happiness to the Gopis. Chant the name of Lord Narayana, Govinda - the protector of cows

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopala Gokula Bala
Nandalala Goparipala |Gopala Gokula|
Shyama Govinda Krishna Gopala
Raasa Vilola Venu Gopala
Nanda Nanda Ke Mukunda Bala
Kamala Vadana Sai Krishna Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the various names of Krishna - Gopala, Gokula Bala, Nandalala, Shyama Gopala, Krishna Gopala, Raasavilola, Venu Gopala. The boy Mukunda of Nanda & the lotus faced Sai Krishna Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopala Gopala
Giridhara Bala Gopala |Gopala...|
Murali Lola Gopala
Murahara Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala - one who lifted the mountain, the player of the flute, the slayer of the demon Mura and who is our Sai Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopala Gopala Gokula Nandana Gopala (3)
Nanda Kishora Gopala
Navaneetha chora Gopala
Yashoda Bala Gopala
Yadu Kula Tilaka Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name ofGopala, whoisthe darling of Gokul and Nanda. The One who stole butter, son of Yashoda and star of Yadu clan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopala Gopala Nacho Gopala
Nacho Nacho Sai Nandalala
Rhuma Jhuma Rhuma Jhuma Nacho Gopala
Nacho Nacho Sai Nandalala
Devotional Song Meaning: Please dance and give us the enjoyment of seeing you dance - Gopala and son of Nanda. While you dance, let us hear the sound of your anklets "Rhuma Jhuma".

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopala Gopala Radhey Gopala
Radhey Shyam Sri Ranga Sai Gopala
Madhava Hey Yadava Pandari Natha Vittala
Hey Deena Natha Vittala
Hey Sai Natha Vittala
Radhey Shyam Sri Ranga Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: OhGopala, the beloved of Radha, alsoyou areShyama and Sai Gopala the resident of Srirangam. You are the star of Yadudynasty and you are the Lord Vittala of Pandari, who gives refugeto meek and weak devotees. Also you are Sai Natha Vittala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopala Gopala Radhey Nandalala
Govinda Gopala Radhey Nandalala |Gopala...|
Brindavana Sanchara Radhey Nandalala
Murali Manohara Radhey Nandalala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, the one who is also thebeloved ofRadha and darling of Nanda, One who wanders in Brindavan and whoholdstheflute and the one who isattractive to look at too.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopala Gopala Sai Gopala
Radha Hrudaya Vihara Bala |Gopala Gopala|
Nanda Kishora Gopala
Navaneetha Chora Gopala
Kaliya Mardhana Gopala
Govardhana Dhara Gopala
Gopala Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala also Sai Gopala whoresides in theheart of Radha, the son of Nanda, stealer of butter and the onewho subdued the Kaliya serpent dancing over its head andthe onewhoalso lifted the Govardhana mountain.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopala Govinda Govinda Harey Murarey
Mayura Mukuta Peetambara Dhari
Brindavana Sanchari |Gopala Govinda...|
Shankha Chakra Gadha Padmadhari
Krishna Mukunda Murari (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Gopala, Govinda, Hari and Murari, you are theone who wears the peacock crown and the yellow cloth, you are theone who wanders in Brindavan, you are theone who bears the Conch, Disc, Mace and Lotus in his hands. You are Lord Krishna, Mukunda and Murari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopala Govinda Narayana Hari
Nandalala Mukunda Narayana Hari |Gopala Govinda...|
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari
Narayana Hari Veda Parayana Hari
Narayana Hari Jai Jai Narayana Hari (5)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine names ofGopala. Govinda and Narayana who is beloved of Nanda and the one who bestows liberation to the devotees. Your glory has been extolled in the Vedas. Victory to you ohNarayana Hari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopala Krishna Madhava Krishna
Govinda Madhava Gopala Krishna |Gopala Madhava...|
Madhava Murali Gopala Krishna
Mukunda Madhava Gopala Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us chant the divine names of Krishna, Gopala, Madhava, Murali and Govinda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopala Radha Lola
Murali Lola Nandalala |Gopala...|
Keshava Madhava Janardhana
Vanamala Brindavana Pala |Murali Lola|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, whogives joy to Radha, The son of Nanda who played his flute. The Lord Keshava, Madhava and Janardhana The one who takes care of Brindavan and theone who wears the garland made of jungle flowers.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopala Radhey Krishna Govinda Govinda Gopal
Gopal Gopal Gopal |Gopala Radhey...|
Govinda Govinda Gopala Radhey Krishna
Govinda Govinda Gopala Sai Krishna
Govinda Govinda Gopal
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Gopala, Radha Krishna, Govinda and Sai Krishna

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopi Ramana Gokula Nandana
Shritha Jana Palana Narayana
Lakshmi Ramana Aganita Guna Gana
Sai Narayana Namo Namo
Sathya (Parthi) Narayana Namo Namo
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh the beloved of Gopis and Gokula you are the protector of sacred people, You are theconsort of Lakshmi, the immeasurable treasure house of virtuous qualities. Salutations to theeOh Sai Narayana residing inParthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gopi Ramana Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
Goparipala Gopala
Govinda Govinda Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala the beloved of the Gopikas Chant the name of Sai Gopala who is the protector of cows. Chant the name of Govinda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govardhana Giridhara Gopika Manohara
Mohana Muralidhara Sathya Sai Natawara |Govardhana Giridhara...|
Vasudeva Giridhara Brindavana Sanchara
Keshava Damodara Sathya Sai Natawara
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Govardhana Giridhari (Krishna who lifted the mountain to save peopleof Gokula) you are the beloved of Gopikas, the enchanting flute player and a delightful dancer. You are the one wandering in Brindavan. You are also known as Keshava (destroyer of demon Keshi) and Damodara (one who is having rope around the waist). You are also the Lord Sathya Sai of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govardhana Giridhari Murari
Hey Vraja Bala Hey Vanamali
Gokula Brindavana Sanchari
Meera Ke Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Parthi vihari Sai Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: OhGovardhana Giridhari Murari (the little mischievous Krishna who lifted the mountain to save the people of Gokula). You arethe one who is from Mathuraand you are the one who is wearing a garland made of jungle flowers. You are theone from Gokula and wanderer of Brindavan forest. You are the Lord of Meera also presently you are Sai rambling in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Bhajo Sri Hari Gopala Bhajo
Gopi Gopala Bhajo Shyama Bhajo
Govinda Giridhari Gopala Bhajo
Rakumayi Panduranga Vittala Bhajo
Sri Sai Parabrahma Ananda Bhajo (Hey)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant and worship the various names of Krishna, Govinda, Hari, Gopala, Shyama Giridhari. Also chant the names of Rakumayi Panduranga Vittala (the beloved of Rakumayi and the Lord of Pandharpur) who is also presently Sai of Parthi who is eversupreme and blissful.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Bolo Gopala Bolo
Ram Ram Bolo Hari Naam Bolo
Allah Sai Yesu Nanak
Zohrashtra Mahaveera Buddha Naam Bolo |Govinda|
Yeh Naam Saarey Hai Jeevan Saharey
Paramananda Ke Yeh Kholtey Hai Dwarey
Jo Naam Chaho Woh Naam Bolo
Prem Se Bolo Bhaav Se Bolo
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glorious names of Govinda, Gopala, Rama, Hari, Allah, Sai, Yesu, Nanak, Zohrashtra, Mahaveera and Buddha. Asyou Chant the names you choose with Love and devotion, they sustainyou through the journey of life.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Bolo Guru Sai Bolo
Gopala Bolo Guru Sai Bolo |Govinda Bolo...|
Shirdi Sai Bolo Shiva Guru Naam Bolo
Sathya Sai Bolo Sadguru Naam Bolo
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Prema Sai Bolo Parabrahma Bolo
Parthi Baba Bolo Paramatma Bolo
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Guru, Govinda, Gopala, Shiva Sai of Shirdi and Parthi who are all the embodiments of Love

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Gopal Jai Jai Narayan Gopal
Madhava Gopal Madhusudhana Gopal
Keshava Gopal Mukunda Gopal
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to you Oh Narayana, Gopal and Govinda. You are the slayer of demon Madhu and Keshi the one who gives liberation to the deserved.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Gopala
Jaya Madhava Gopala
Mukunda Murali Gopala
Madhusudhana Gopala |Govinda Gopala|
Yashoda Nanda Gopala
Yadu Nandana Gopala
Jaya Muralidhara Gopala |Madhusudhana Gopala|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant Govinda Gopala (God who fosters cowherds and people) and victory to Madhava Gopala the enchanting flute player who bestows liberation to devotees. You are the destroyer of demon Madhu and beloved of Yashoda, Nanda and Yadu clan. Victory to the God who holds the flute.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Bolo Radhey Shyam
Bolo Radhey Shyam Bolo Sai Ghana Shyam |Govinda Gopala...|
Govinda Gopala Bolo Radhey Shyam (2) |Bolo Radhey|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the glorious names ofGovinda, Radhey Shyam and Sai Ghana Shyam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:

Radhey Gopala Gopi Gopala
Meera Ke Natha Prabhu Murali Gopala
Govardhanodhara Gopala Bala |Radhey Gopala|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Govinda, Gopala, Nandalala (Krishna) the Lord of Radha, Meera and the Gopis The one who plays the flute and the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain - Glory to Him.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Narayana (Bhaja Mana)
Govinda Madhava Narayana |Bhaja Mana Govinda...|
Govinda Madhava Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana (7)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Govinda, Gopala, Madhava and Narayana

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Narayana Hari
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari (2) |Govinda Gopala|
Jagadodhara Narayana Hari
Bhaktha Uddhara Narayana Hari
Parthi Pureesha Narayana Hari
Narayana Hari Jai Jai Narayana Hari (2)
Narayana Hari (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Govinda Gopala and Narayana. The one who is the sustainer of the universe, the one who is the redeemer of his devotees sufferings, Glory to you Oh Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Prabhu Giridhari
Govinda Gopala Hrudaya Vihari |Govinda Gopala...|
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora
Parthi (Hrudaya) Vihara Bada Chitha Chora
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Govinda Gopala Giridhari to the one who is the Indweller of our Hearts, to the one who is the son of Nanda and to the one who stole butter in Gokula, the very same Lord of Parthi who now steals our Hearts.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Radha Ramana
Govinda Govinda Gopala Radha Ramana
Govinda Govinda Gopala Radha Ramana
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name Govinda Gopala the beloved of Radha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda
Mukunda Madhava Govinda
Gopala Sai Gopala |Mukunda Madhava|
Jai Jai Govinda Jai Jai Gopala (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name Govinda (foster of cow herd) who gives liberation to devotees. Victory to Govinda who is also Sai Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Bhaja Mana Radhey Govinda
Radha Lola Govinda Raasa Vilola Gopala
Krishna Keshava Harey Madhava Govinda Jaya Govinda
Harey Murarey Sai Murarey Govinda Jaya Govinda
Govinda Jaya Govinda Govinda Jaya Govinda (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Lets chant the divine name of Govinda reverberating in the mind ofRadha the beloved of Krishna who is engrossedin the divine sports with Gopala. Also you are the destroyer of demon Keshi. Victory to youOhSai Murari and Govinda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Gayiyere Bhajo Radhey Gopala Krishna Gayiye
Murali Manohara Gayiyere Bhajo Nanda Ke Lal Prabhu Gayiye
Giridhari Giridhari Gayiyere Maayi Meera Ke Nath Prabhu Gayiye (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the name of Govinda and worship the Lord of Radha -- Krishna and Gopala Sing the name of the handsome flute player and worship the Lord, the son of Nanda, Sing the name of the Lord of Mother Meera.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Gokula Brinda
Govinda Govinda Satchidananda |Govinda Govinda|
Sri Ranga Ranga Hrudayanta Ranga
Bhaktha Vatsala Sai Ranga
Govinda Govinda (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: We chant the name of Govinda of Brindavan at Gokula, who is the existence, awareness andbliss. He is also God residing in Srirangam who revels in our hearts and he is the beloved of devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Govinda Bolo
Shyama Sundara Venu Gopala Bolo |Govinda Govinda...|
Parthasarathi Keshava Bolo
Sanathana Sarathi Partheesha Bolo
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the name of Govinda The handsome bluish boy Gopala with the flute Sing the name of Keshava, the charioteer of Partha i.e., Arjuna Sing the name of the eternal charioteer the King of Parthi - Sai - who guides us all in the right path towards liberation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Gopala Govinda Narayana |Govinda|
Govinda Narayana Hari Hari Gopala Narayana |Gopala Govinda|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda, Narayana andGopalawhich remove our miseries.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Gopala Govinda Narayana |Govinda|
Govinda Narayana Hari Hari Gopala Narayana |Gopala Govinda|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda, Narayana andGopalawhich remove our miseries.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Gopala Govinda Narayana |Govinda|
Govinda Narayana Hari Hari Gopala Narayana |Gopala Govinda|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda, Narayana andGopalawhich remove our miseries.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey
Govinda Govinda Gopala |Govinda...|
Govardhanodhari Gopala
Gopala Gopala |Govardhana|
Gopi Manohara Gopala
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda, Gopala, who lifted Govardhana mountain on his finger tips to save Gopis and Gopas of Gokula. He is the captivating Lord of them.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey
Govinda Govinda Gopala |Govinda...|
Govardhanodhari Gopala
Gopala Gopala |Govardhana|
Gopi Manohara Gopala
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda, Gopala, who lifted Govardhana mountain on his finger tips to save Gopis and Gopas of Gokula. He is the captivating Lord of them.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey
Govinda Govinda Gopala |Govinda...|
Govardhanodhari Gopala
Gopala Gopala |Govardhana|
Gopi Manohara Gopala
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda, Gopala, who lifted Govardhana mountain on his finger tips to save Gopis and Gopas of Gokula. He is the captivating Lord of them.

Devotional Song Lyrics:

Govinda Harey Gopala Harey Hey Murali Gaana Lola
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey Hey Radha Ramana Lola
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey Hey Nanda Gopa Bala
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Govinda and Gopala The one who enchants with his flute The one who is the consort of Radha and the one who is the son of Nanda

Devotional Song Lyrics:

Shyam Brindavana Bal Bhajo |Govinda Hey...|
Shyama Gopala Radhey (Sai) Gopal
Radhey Jai Radhey Jai Radhey Gopal (Jai Jai Sai Gopal)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant and glorify the beloved of Nanda, who is the little Shyam of Brindavan and the beloved of Radha. Victory to the Lord of Radha who is none other than our beloved Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai
Radha Madhava Hari Govinda Jai Jai
Mukunda Jai Jai Murari Jai Jai
Madhusudhana Murali Krishna Jai Jai
Keshava Jai Jai Madhava Jai Jai
Narayana Hari Sri Krishna Jai Jai (Sriman)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Govinda, the beloved of Radha, one who gives liberation and is the annihilator of the demon Mura. Chant His divine names Krishna, Keshava and Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai
Radha Madhava Hari Govinda Jai Jai
Mukunda Jai Jai Murari Jai Jai
Madhusudhana Murali Krishna Jai Jai
Keshava Jai Jai Madhava Jai Jai
Narayana Hari Sri Krishna Jai Jai (Sriman)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Govinda, the beloved of Radha, one who gives liberation and is the annihilator of the demon Mura. Chant His divine names Krishna, Keshava and Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Jaya Govinda
Gokula Nandana Govinda
Ghana Ghana Neela Govinda
Bala Mukunda Govinda
Hey Ghana Shyama Govinda |Gokula Nandana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Govinda, the beloved child of Gokula whose complexion is dark like the cloud Glory to child Mukunda and Govinda

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Krishna Jai Gopala Krishna Jai Gopala Pala Bala Radha Krishna Jai
Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jai |Govinda...|
Gopikamala Haari Pyaari Maayi Meera Man Vihari Madana Mohana Muralidhari Krishna Jai
Krishna Jai Rama Krishna Jai Radha Krishna Jai Bala Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jai
Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jai
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Krishna; Glory to the child Krishna, who is the Lord of Radha; Glory to the beloved Lord who wears the garland of the Gopis; Glory to one who dwells in the heart of Meera; Glory to the Lord of Love who enchants our hearts; Glory to the Lord who plays flute; Glory to Thee.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Krishna Jai Gopala Krishna Jai Govinda Govinda Govinda Gopala Jai
Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Govinda Krishna Gopala Krishna |Govinda...|
Keshava Madhava Sai Narayana Govinda Govinda Narayana
Nandalala Vraja Bala Hey Sai Narayana Krishna Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Govinda, Gopala, Krishna, Madhava, Keshava, Narayana The son of Nanda and the darling child of Vraja

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Krishna Vittala Venu Gopala Krishna Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Jaya Pandari Natha Vittala
Govinda Vittala Gopala Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala
Vittala Vittala Panduranga (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Govinda, Lord Krishna with the flute, Lord Vittala and Panduranga who is the Lord of Pandharpur.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Krishna Vittaley Venu Gopala Krishna Vittaley
Ranga Ranga Vittaley Sri Panduranga Vittaley
Govinda Krishna Vittaley Venu Gopala Krishna Vittaley |Ranga Ranga|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Govinda, Krishna, Vittala. Sing the Glory of Venugopala the one plays the flute. You are Panduranga who is the Lord of Pandari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Madhava Gopala Keshava
Jaya Nanda Mukunda Nanda Govinda Radhey Gopala |Govinda Madhava...|
Giridhari Giridhari Jaya Radhey Gopala
Ghana Shyama Shyama Shyama Jaya Jaya Radhey (Sai) Gopala |Jaya Nanda|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda and Madhava who protects cowherds and slays demon Keshi. Victory to the beloved of Nanda, who confers liberation to the devotees. We also adore you as the beloved of Radha, Giridhari, (the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain) Ghana Shyama and Sai Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Madhava Gopala Keshava (3)
Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna
Krishna Krishna Gopala
Gokula Bala Gopi Ramana
Mana Mohana Madhusudhana Jaya Madhava Jaya Keshava
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to you Oh Lord Govinda Madhava Gopala Keshava Krishna The adorable child of Gokula, the Lord of Gopi The one who enchants and attracts, slayer of demon Madhu, Victory to Lord Madhava Keshava

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Murahari Madhava
Govinda Gopala Keshava |Govinda Murahari...|
Janardhana Sai Parthi Vihari
Govardhanodhari Madhava
Madhava Keshava Hari Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Govinda, Gopala, Madhava, Keshava, Janardhana, Hari, Narayana Glory to Lord Sai who is the indweller of Parthi

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Muralidhara Murahara
Govinda Ghana Shyama Harey |Govinda Muralidhara|
Govinda Govardhana Giridhara
Govinda Parandhama Harey |Govinda Ghana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine names of the Lord Govinda, Muralidhara, Murahara, Ghana Shyama, Giridhari and Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Murari Gopala Murari
Vittala Sri Hari Panduranga
Hrudaya Vihari Jaya Giridhari
Murahara Shourie Panduranga
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Govinda, Murari Gopala, VittalaHari and Panduranga. Chant the divine name of Giridhari who resides in all our Hearts

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Narayana Gopala Narayana
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Govinda, Narayana, Gopala

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Radhey Krishna Govinda Govinda
Gopala Radhey Krishna Govinda Govinda
Mohana Bala Krishna Govinda Govinda
Parthi Nivasa Krishna Govinda Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Govinda, the Lord of Radha (Lord Krishna) ; Gopala, the handsome boy Krishna and the Lord who resides in Parthi, Lord Sai

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Rama Gopala Rama
Keshava Madhava Sai Rama
Janaki Jeevana Sita Rama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Jaya Jaya Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Rama the consort of Sita, Gopala, Keshava, Madhava and Sathya Sai

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Rama Jai Jai Gopala Rama
Madhava Rama Jai Jai Keshava Rama |Govinda Rama...|
Durlabha Rama Jai Jai Sulabha Rama
Ek Tu Rama Jai Jai Anek Tu Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Rama Who is difficult to attain when sought externally, easily attained when sought within. Victory to Lord Rama, You are the One Lord who has manifested in many forms

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Vittala Gopala Vittala (3)
Sri Sai Vittala Shirdi Sai Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Parthi Ranga Vittala
Sri Ranga Shirdi Ranga Parthi Ranga Vittala (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the glorious names, of Govinda, Vittala, Gopala (names of Lord Vishnu) whoprotects cowherds and all beings. He is the Lord of Shirdi, Parthi and Pandharpur.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govinda Yadu Kula Madhava Ananda Paahi Keshava
Navarasa Yugadhara Muralidhara Nava Mohanaanga Hey Sridhara
Madhava Keshava
Sridhara Damodara
Gaana Lola Nija Bhaktha Paripala
Brindavana Sayeeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Govinda, Madhava and Keshava, who is from Yadu dynasty. You exhibit 9 modes of melodies and postures while you play your enchanting flute. Your other names are Sridhara and Damodara. You are Lord Sayeeshwara of Brindavan, who is the lover of music and the divine protector of His true devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Govindethi Sada Snanam
Govindethi Sada Japam
Govindethi Sada Dhyanam
Sada Govinda Keertanam
Devotional Song Meaning: Always immerse (wash sins away) yourself in the name of Lord Govinda. Always chant and meditate and sing on the name of Govinda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gowri Ganesh Uma Ganesh
Parvathi Nandana Sri Ganesh
Sharanam Ganesh Sharanam Ganesh
Shiva Nandana Ganapathi Ganesh
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Ganesh, beloved son of Mother Gowri, I surrender to Thee, Lord of all Demigods, beloved child of Lord Shiva andGoddess Parvathi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gowri Ganesha Vinayaka (3)
Shuklambara Dhara Natha Gajanana
Sri Ganaraya Gajanana
Gajavadana Jaya Ganapathi Vandana
Mangala Murthy Gajanana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha, Vinayaka, the son of Gowri who is adorned with white garment and who bestows auspiciousness We offers our obeisance to you

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gowri Manohara Hey Nataraja
Shiva Shiva Shankara Hey Shiva Raja
Pavana Charitha Paahi Mahesha
Paahi Mahesha Hey Jagadeesha
Karunamaya Prabho Hey Jagadeesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Hey Nataraja (dancing Shiva), the beloved of Gowri, you are the supreme God who grants us auspiciousness. One who extols you merges in divinity. Protect us oh Mahesha, the compassionate Lord of the universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gowri Nandana Bala Gajanana
Gajavadana Gananatha Gajanana |Gowri Nandana|
Maha Ganapathey Paahi Gajanana
Gajanana Paahi Gajanana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Gowri's son little Gajanana who has the face of an elephant. I bow down to you..

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gowri Nandana Gajanana
Gangadhara Hara Shambho Nandana
Parama Niranjana Mooshika Vahana
Gaana Vilolana Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Gajanana, you are the beloved of Gowri and Shiva, who adorns the Ganges on His head blissfully. You are supremely unstained from the world, who rides the mouse ashis vehicle and who is the lover of music.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gowri Nandana Gajanana (Hey)
Girija Nandana Niranjana |Hey Gowri Nandana|
Parvathi Nandana Shubhanana
Paahi Prabho Maam Paahi Prasanna
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Ganesh, son of Mother Gowri who is blemishless and whose countenance is most auspicious. O Lord protect us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gowri Nandana Sri Ganesha
Parvathi Nandana Parthi Ganesha |Gowri Nandana...|
Adi Poojita Vijaya Ganesha
Pashankushadhara Varada Ganesha
Yuga Yuga Vanditha Paahi Ganesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sri Ganesha (lord of demigods), you are the beloved of Gowri and the resident of Parthi. Victory unto you, oh Ganesha, who is always invoked first. One who holds the noose and hook, bestowing boons; you are worshipped from age to age. Protect us, Oh lord.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gowri Nathaya Vishwanathaya
Sai Nathaya Namah Shivaya
Gunatheethaya Gunadharaya |Sai Nathaya |
Kala Kalaya Kaalatheethaya
Kala Roopaya Namah Shivaya
Prema Roopaya Parthi Vasaya |Sai Nathaya|
Om Namah Shivaya Sai Shivaya (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Obeisance to Shiva, who is the consort of Gowri and the Lord of the universe. You are Sai Natha who is with all attributes and also attribute less. You are the embodiment of time, beyond time and the Lord of time. You are the resident of Parthi whose form is Love.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gowri Shankara Uma Vara
Girija Shankara Prabho Hara |Gowri Shankara...|
Parvathi Shankara Uma Vara
Neelakanta Manohara
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Shankara, you are the consort of Shakthi called by many names like Gowri, Uma, Girija and Parvathi. You are Loving and having a captivating form with a blue throat (due to consumption of poison to save the world).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gowri Suthaya Om Namah Om
Lambodharaya Om Namah Om |Gowri Suthaya...|
Vighneshwaraya Om Namah Om
Bhava Dukha Bhanjana Om Namah Om
Devotional Song Meaning: We bow to Lord Ganesha, son of Mother Gowri, remover of obstacles and destroyer of sorrows

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Gowri Vara Gangadhara
Shambho Shiva Bimbadhara |Gowri Vara...|
Vyagrambaradhara Jyothi Prakasha
Pavana Naama Harey Paramesha
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutation to Shiva, the embodiment of Aum, who is the consort of Gowri. You are adorned with the Ganges on the head and the crescent moon, wearing the tiger skin as your attire. You are the supreme God of effulgence and the saviour of all.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Baba Guru Baba
Charana Namostuthey Guru Baba
Vidya Dayaka Guru Baba
(Pra)Shantha Swaroopa Guru Baba
Guruvara Guruvara Guru Baba
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship and pay obeisance at the lotus feet of the most supreme, noble teacher, Lord Sai Baba. He is the embodiment of truth, love and peace. He grants spiritual knowledge

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Bhagawan Sai Ram Sadguru Natha Sri Bhagawan
Dayamaya Deena Dayalu
Chinmaya Roopa Sai Bhagawan
Sathya Swaroopa Sai Bhagawan
Nithya Lola Sri Sai Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship and pay obeisance at the lotus feet of the most supreme, noble teacher, Lord Sai Baba. He is the embodiment of truth, love and peace. He grants spiritual knowledge

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru Devo Maheshwara
Guru Sai Guru Baba
Guru Sai Maheshwara |Guru Brahma|
Guru Padukaa Sai Charanam
Sai Charanam Maheshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the Sai Guru, who is Brahma (creator), Vishnu (sustainer) and Maheshwara (destroyer). Adore His lotus feet, which redeems all from miseries.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru Devo Maheshwara
Guru Sai Guru Baba
Guru Sai Maheshwara |Guru Brahma|
Guru Padukaa Sai Charanam
Sai Charanam Maheshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the Sai Guru, who is Brahma (creator), Vishnu (sustainer) and Maheshwara (destroyer). Adore His lotus feet, which redeems all from miseries.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Dev Guru Dev
Sathya Sai Natha Sadguru Dev
Sharanam Sharanam Guru Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Brahma Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Vishnu Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Shiva Charanam
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: We chant and worship the divine preceptor who is presently Sathya Sai Natha, who is Brahma, Vishnu and Maheshwara. We bow to thy lotus feet and our obeisance to Lord Shiva who is the embodiment of primordial sound.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Deva Guru Deva
Guruvayur Pura Hari Deva
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana
Sharanam Sharanam Sai Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord Sai Narayana! Lord of Guruvayur (a place in Kerala)! You are the destroyer of demon Mura. Please protect me, I have come to Your refuge

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Deva Guru Govinda
Mandara Giridhara Shirdi Pureeshwara
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Shiva |Guru Deva...|
Sundara Roopa Sri Sai Deva
Vaidehi Mohana Narayana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi Glory to Lord Vishnu, the benevolent teacher whose beautiful form enchanted Vaidehi (Lakshmi)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Deva Jaya Deva
Sharanam Sharanam Sai Deva Deva |Guru Deva...|
Pranava Swaroopa Devadi Deva
Gnana Pradayaka Sadguru Deva |Sharanam Sharanam|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to our guru, our God of Gods, Surrender to Lord Sai, embodiment of Om, Lord of the Universe, supreme granter of wisdom.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Deva Priya Deva Sai Deva Dayamaya
Vibhuti Sundara Shashankha Shekara
Sai Shankara Daya Karo (2) |Guru Deva|
Gokula Ranjana Sai Gopala
Raghukula Bhooshana Sai Rama
Hey Madanaantaka Daya Karo (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sai is the merciful and enchanting Guru who is also Shiva, adorned with Vibhuti and crescent moon on the head. Also you are the Sai Shankara who is merciful. You are the Sai Gopala who delights people of Gokula, you are Rama the jewel of Raghu dynasty.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Deva Sharanam Deva
Paahi Prabho Sharanam Deva |Guru Deva...|
Sundara Roopa Sri Sai Deva
Sharanam Sharanam Sadguru Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: We surrender to our Guru and God, Protect us Lord, Lord Sai, your form is beauty itself, We surrender to our true guru, God.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Devaya Namo Namo
Hey Parameshwara Namo Namo |Guru Devaya...|
Omkaaraya Namo Namo
Parthi Pureeshwara Namo Namo
Jagadeeshwaraya Namo Namo
Prashanthi Eshwara Namo Namo
Devotional Song Meaning: Bow again and again to Supreme Noble Teacher, Supreme Lord, Lord whose form is Om, Lord of Parthi, Lord of the Universe and Lord of Prashanthi Nilayam, Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Hamarey Man Mandir Mey Guru Hamarey Pran
Sathya Prem Ke Tum Ho Daata Sai Nath Bhagawan
Jai Jai Sai Nath Bhagawan
Gnana Bhakthi Ke Tum Ho Daata Sai Nath Bhagawan
Jai Jai Sai Nath Bhagawan
Jaya Guru Deva Sri Guru Deva Sai Nath Bhagawan |Jai Jai Sai Nath |
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to my Guru who is the remover of ignorance who stays in my heart, who is the giver of truth and love. Victory to Lord Sai who gives peace and devotion. Victory to you Oh Guru Deva who is none other than our Sainath.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Hara Guru Hari Guru Brahma
Guravey Sakshath Parabrahma
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya Jagat Guru
Jagadidam Akhilam Tava Roopam
Jaya (4) Hara (4) Shiva (4) Jagat Guru
Jagat Guru Sai Guru
Devotional Song Meaning: Guru who removes ignorance is compared to Hara that is Shiva, Hari, Vishnu and Brahma. He is verily the Parabrahma who is formless. Victory to the Guru of whole world whose beauty is supreme and who is auspicious, who is the divine Guru.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Guru Maharaj Guru Sathya Sai Natha Sadguru (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Sathya Sainath, who is our great guru (preceptor), who blesses all.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Mahima Gao (3)
Sadguru Sai Anantha Guru
Brahmananda Ananda Guru
Sarva Dharma Sathya Sai Guru
Sai Guru Sathya Sai Guru |Sarva Dharma|
Guru Ke Vani Gao
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing about the greatness of the eternal, universal and ever-blissful teacher, Sathya Sai who loves all the religions; He is the truth, knowledge and bliss

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Nanak Ji Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Jo Boley So Hovey Nihaal
Allah (Maulah) Sai Lelo Salaam
Salaam Salaam Lakhon (Mera) Salaam
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Sai Ram
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahaveera Naam |Salaam Salaam...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Guru Nanak; Whoever sings thus, that person becomes liberated; Accept my salutations, Sai Baba, who is Allah; Ten million salutations; Accept these salutations of mine; Sai Baba, you are father Jesus, our Lord; You are Buddha, Zohrashtra and Mahaveera. Accept my Salutations

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Pada Ranjana Rama Jaya Jaya
Bandha Vimochana Rajeeva Lochana
Abhaya Karambhuja Rama Jaya Jaya
Jai Jai Ram Sita Ram (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to pleasing Noble Teacher - Lotus-Eyed Lord Rama, who unties the knots and tangles of life - thereby leading to liberation. Victory to charming Supreme Guide - Lord Rama, worship of whose Lotus Feet removes fear. Victory to Lord of Sita - Lord Rama and Lord Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Pada Vandana Guru Vandana
Guru Natha Sai Natha Jaga vandana |Guru Pada|
Shiva Rama Krishna Roopa Jagannatha Sai Deva
Shirdi Prashanthi Vasi Sukha Shanthi Daata
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship and bow to the lotus feet of Guru Sainath whom the people from all over the world worship. He is Shiva, Rama, Krishna and the Lord of the world. He is the resident of Shirdi and Parthi who bestows happiness and peace.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guru Sai Maheshwara
Karunakara Karunamaya
Prashanthi Sai Sundara
Parabrahma Roopa Parathpara
Trivikrama Narayana
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Sai Maheshwara, the guru who is the embodiment of kindness and mercy and who is the resident of Prashanthi having a delightful form. He is the embodiment of supreme Lord and He is Narayana, treading three worlds (in the Vamana avatar). He is the creator, sustainer and the destroyer of the universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guruvara Guruvara Sai Namo
Sadguru Satchidananda Namo
Veda Gamanutha Sai Namo
Naada Priya Shiva Sai Namo
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Sai, our guru who grants us boons. He is the embodiment of existence, awareness and bliss, the essence of Vedas, lover of divine music and the primordial sound Om.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guruvara Naam Pavana Naam
Sadguru Naam Guru Nanak Naam
Guruvara Naam Pavana Naam
Sadguru Sai Baba Naam
Jai Guru Sadguru Nanak Naam Jai Bolo Sai Baba Naam
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing/repeat the names of the Guru - Guru Nanak and Sai Baba; these names purify one's heart.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Guruvayurpura Sri Hari Krishna Narayana Gopal
Mukunda Madhava Muralidhari Narayana Gopal
Narayana Gopal Sri Hari Narayana Gopal
Narayana Gopal Sai Narayana Gopal
Govardhana Giridhari Murari Narayana Gopal |Mukunda Madhava|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord of Guruvayur Lord Hari, Krishna, Narayana, Gopal, Madhava, Muralidhara, Mukunda and Sai Narayana. Chant the name of Krishna the lifter of Govardhana Mountain

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hamsa Vahini Devi Narayani
Jaya Jaganmohini Tribhuvana Palini |Hamsa Vahini|
Jaya Mrudu Bhaashini Mata Bhavani
Bhava Bhaya Harini (Tribhuvana Palini) Sai Janani
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh goddess Lakshmi (Narayani) who has the swan as her vehicle. You are the sustainer of all the three worlds, who has a captivating form. Victory unto you Oh Mata Bhavani, who speaks softly. You are none other than our mother Sai who redeems us from fear and worldly troubles.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hara Bhola Natha Uma Pathey Shambho Shankara Pashupathey
Nandi Vahana Naga Bhooshana Chandrashekara Jatadhara
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Manohara Girija Kantha Sadashiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us chant the divine names of Shiva or Shambho who is the consort of Uma. Lord who is easy to please, who rides the Ox (Nandi), decorated with snake and the sustainer of all species adorned with the crescent moon and Ganga on his matted lock of hair. You are the beloved of Gowri and Girija.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hara Hara Gangey Hara Hara Gangey
Hey Nataraja Hey Shiva Raja Hara Hara Hara Hara Gangey |Hara Hara...|
Parthi Pureeshwara Jaya Gangadhara
Hara (4) Gangey |Hara Hara...|
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara Shankara Sai (2)
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara Shankara Sai (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us chant the glorious name of Shiva who adorns the Ganges in his matted hair. Oh Shankara, you are the master of the divine dance and the resident of Parthi, who bestows auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva
Om Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Om Namo Namo Namah Shivaya
Brahma Vishnu Surarchitaya Om Namo Namo Namah Shivaya
Uma Ganesha Sharavana Sevitha Om Namo Namo Namah Shivaya |Om Namo|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the great God Shiva! Chant the auspicious name of"Shiva"who is worshipped by the other two Gods. Brahma and Vishnu. You are served by Your consort, the Divine Mother Uma and by Your sons, Ganesha and Sharavana (Subrahmanya).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hara Hara Hara Hara Namami Shankara Bhaja Mana Sai Ram
Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Sadashiva Bhaja Mana Sai Ram
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva Bhaja Mana Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing (chant) the name of Shiva, the name of Sai. Sing (chant) the name of Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hara Hara Hara Hara Samba Shiva
Vibhuti Sundara Sai Shiva
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva
Trishoola Dhari Trinetra Shiva
Parthi Puri Paramesha Shiva |Vibhuti Sundara|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Shiva the three-eyed destroyer of evil. He bears the Ganges and the trident; chant the name of Sai Shiva of Parthi Who is adorned with holy ash

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hara Hara Shankara Namami Shankara
Uma Pathey Kailasa Shankara
Gangadhara Hara Chandrakaladhara
Parthi Pureeshwara Shiva Sai Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Shankara, consort of Uma, whose abode is Mount Kailasa. Lord Shiva has Mother Ganges and the Crescent moon over His Head, is the same Sai who dwellsin Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hara Hara Shankara Samba Sadashiva Esha Mahesha
Tandava Priyakara Chandra Kaladhara Esha Mahesha
Amba Guha Lambodhara Vanditha Esha Mahesha
Vindhya Himachala Shringa Nivasita Esha Mahesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the many names of the Lord Shankara, Samba Sadashiva and Mahesha. Oh Lord Mahesha! You are fond of Tandava Dance (cosmic dance). You are adorned with Moon as decoration on Your forehead. You are worshipped by the darling son of Mother Amba - Lord Ganesh, the one with a pot belly. You are the resident of the Himalayas. By Chanting the above divinenames, the Lord destroys evil and grants protection.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hara Hara Shankara Shiva Shiva Shankara Bham Bham Bholey Nath
Bham Bham Bholey Nath Sai Bham Bham Bholey Nath
Dama Dama Damaru Damaru Ka Natha Bham Bham Bholey Nath
Bham Bham Bholey Nath Sai Bham Bham Bholey Nath (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine name of Shiva, who redeems from all troubles (Hara), the Lord who is easy to please, whose damaru creates sounds like Bham Bham and Dama Dama during the cosmic dance.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hara Shiva Shankara Bholey Nath Shirdi Pureeshwara Sai Nath
Shiva Shiva Shankara Bholey Nath Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Nath
Ahi Bhooshana Shiva Gowri Nath
Parama Sumangala Sai Nath
Girija Ramana Paramananda Samadhipriya Ganga Nath
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva and Lord of Parthi. Lord of Gowri, adorned with a cobra, always blissful is the delight of Girija. He bears the river Ganges, bestows auspiciousness and He rejoices in the bliss of meditation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hara Shiva Shankara Shashankha Shekara Hara Bham Hara Bham Bham Bham Bolo
Bhava Bhayankara Girija Shankara Dhimi Dhimi Dhimi Thaka Narthana Kelo
Hara Shiva Shankara Shashankha Shekara Hara Bham Hara Bham Bham Bham Bolo |Bhava Bhayankara...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva, dancing to the rhythm of drums. Shankara, Lord of Girija, destroys the fear of the cycle of birth and death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Harey Krishna Harey Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Gopal Govinda (Madhava Mukunda) Bolo Jai Sai Ram
Hey Parameshwara Parthi Pureeshwara Daya Karo Hey Sai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram Jai Jai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram Jai Jai Ram Bolo |Jai Jai Ram|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Krishna, Rama, Gopala, Govinda, Madhava and Mukunda. Bless us Oh Sai the Lord of Parthi who is also Parameshwara. Victory to youOhSai rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Harey Krishna Mukunda Murari
Harey Krishna Sai Krishna |Harey Krishna Mukunda|
Bhajo Krishna Sunaada Murali
Bhajo Murali Madhura Murali
Mana Mohana Krishna Madhusudhana Krishna
Yadu Nandana Krishna Gopi Chandana Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: Praises be to you Oh Lord Krishna! whose other names are Mukunda and Murari. Glory be to the enchanting one, slayer of demon Madhu, of Yadava lineage and the darling of Gopis who plays sweet divine music on the flute

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Harey Krishna Yaduvara Krishna
Sundara Krishna Mana Mohana Krishna
Dheera Krishna Damodara Krishna
Krishna Krishna Krupa Karo Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship and chant the name of the Lord Hari, Sai Ram, Mukunda, Madhava, Govinda and Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Harey Murali Manohara Shyama
Harey Gopi Manohara Shyama |Harey Murali|
Harey Devaki Nandana Shyama
Harey Vasuki Shayana Shyama
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to the Lord who has an enchanting form with the flute in His hands, dear to the Gopis, son of Devaki and the one who reclines on the serpent Vasuki.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Harey Murarey Madhukaitabhaarey
Govinda Gopala Mukunda Shourie
Anantha Sridhara Govinda Keshava
Mukunda Madhava Narayana
Devaki Tanaya Gopika Ramana
Bhaktha Uddharana Trivikrama
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of the Lord by chanting His names Govinda, Gopala, Sridhara, Keshava, Mukunda, Madhava, who is the son of Devaki, dear to the Gopikas and the one who annihilated the demons Madhu and Kaitabha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Harey Murarey Sai Ram Harey Murarey Ram
Parama Sumangala Sai Ram Parama Sumangala Ram
Allah Eshwara Sai Ram Sab Tum Ho Bhagawan |Parama Sumangala|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to Sai Ram the One who is Supremely auspicious who is also addressed as Ram, Allah and Eshwara

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Harey Murarey Shyam Bhaja Mana Radhey Govinda
Shyam Mukunda Harey Bhaja Mana Radhey Govinda |Harey Murarey...|
Sai Govinda Harey Bhaja Mana Radhey Govinda
Radhey Jai Radhey Jai Radhey Bhaja Mana Radhey Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind Sing in praise of Radhey Govinda of blue complexion whose other names are Murarey, Mukunda and also Sai

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Harey Murari Ranga Narayana Om
Peetambara Dhara Narayana Om
Mayura Mukuta Dhara Narayana Om |Harey Murarey|
Lakshmi Kantha Narayana Om
Narayana Narayana Narayana Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Narayana is the one who is dressed in yellow attire, with the peacockfeather on His head, the one who isdear to Mother Lakshmi, who is also known as Ranga of Pandharpur.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Rama Krishna Harey Ram
Mukunda Madhava Sri Sai Ram |Harey Ram...|
Govinda Gopala Radha Ke Shyam
Giridhara Gopala Meera Ke Shyam
Bolo Ram Bolo Shyam Bolo Sai Ghana Shyam
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the different names of the Lord, Rama, Krishna, Mukunda, Madhava, Govinda, the blue complexioned Gopala who is dear to Radha and Meera.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
HareyRam Harey Ram Krishna Krishna Ram
RadhaKrishna Rama Krishna Sai Ghana Shyam
GiridharaGopala Sai Ghana Shyam
Krishna Rama Govinda Sai Ghana Shyam
SundaraRoopa Sai Ghana Shyam |RadhaKrishna|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Narayana, the charming Prince of Vasudeva, the Lord of Radha. Madhava, who is infinite bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Rama and Krishna ceaselessly. Glory be to them.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Rama and Krishna ceaselessly. Glory be to them.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Rama and Krishna ceaselessly. Glory be to them.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Harey Sai Gopala Radhey Krishna
Harey Sai Govinda Panduranga |Harey Sai Gopala.|
Hey Prabhu Vandana Hey Yadu Nandana
Hey Nanda Nandana Dayamaya
Kunja Vihari Krishna Murari
Parthi Vihari Namo Namo
Devotional Song Meaning: Accept my salutations Oh Lord Sai Gopala, Sai Govinda, Panduranga the compassionate one, who dwells at Parthi, had earlier incarnated as Krishna in the Yadu lineage and moved about in Brindavan as the son of Nanda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Harey Sai Harey Sai Sai Sai Harey Harey
Harey Baba Harey Baba Bala Baba Harey Harey |Harey Sai...|
Achyutham Keshavam Rama Narayanam
Krishna Damodaram Vasudevam Bhajey
Sridharam Madhavam Gopika Vallabham
Sadgurum Nayakam Sai Ramam Bhajey
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant various names of the Lord Achyutha, Keshava, Rama, Narayana, Krishna, Damodara, Vasudeva, Sridhara, Madhava and the Lord of the Gopis who is none else than our sacred preceptor Sri Sathya Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Anandamaya Jaya Narayana (Sai)
Vasudeva Nandana Radha Jeevana
Paramananda Madhava
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Praises be to Lord Narayana who is Supreme Bliss personified, who incarnated as the son of Vasudeva and the very life of Radha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Bhajana Bina Sukh Shanthi Nahin
Hari Naama Bina Ananda Nahin
Prema Bhakthi Bina Uddhar Nahin
Guru Seva Bina Nirvana Nahin |Hari Bhajan...|
Jap Dhyaana Bina Sam Yoga Nahin
Prabhu Darsha Bina Pragnana Nahin
Daya Dharma Bina Sath Karma Nahin
Bhagawan Bina Koi Apna Nahin
Sai Ram Bina Paramatma Nahin
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind Understand there is no peace without chanting the Glory of the Lord Hari which itself is Bliss. There is no progress without loving devotion to the Lord and no liberation without service to the feet of the Guru. There is no equanimity of mind without remembering Lord's name and meditation. There is no integrated awareness without Lord's vision. Performing good deeds constitute righteousness and compassion. Understand that everything belongs to God and that Supreme Consciousness is Sai Rama Himself.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Bol Hari Bol Hari Hari Bol
Mukunda Madhava Govinda Bol
Hari Bol Hari Bol Hari Hari Bol
Keshava Madhava Govinda Bol
Devotional Song Meaning: Contemplate on the name of the Lord Hari Meditate on the Lotus Feet of Lord Hari Worship the Divine Flute Player, Lord Madhava. Sing the glory of Lord Keshava.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Bolo Harey Rama Naam
Hari Bolo Harey Krishna Naam
Hari Bolo Sathya Sai Ram
Hari Bolo Harey Rama Naam
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the many names of the Lord Hari, Rama, Krishna and Sathya Sai

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Govinda Govinda Narayana
Hari Gopala Gopala Narayana |Hari Govinda...|
Satchidananda Ananda Narayana
Paramananda Ananda Narayana
Hari Narayana Sai Narayana (5)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the different names of the Lord Narayana, Govinda, Gopala, Hari, personification of Truth, Awareness and Supreme Bliss

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Govinda Nanda Mukunda
Keshava Narayana
Madhava Narayana
Sridhara Narayana
Sri Hari Narayana
Parthi Narayana Hari Narayana
Govinda Narayana Paramananda Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the different names of Lord Narayana, Hari, Govinda, Madhava, Sridhara, the one of supreme Bliss who dwells in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Guna Gaana Karo Mana Mero
Sai Guna Gaana Karo Mana Mero
Harey Rama Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna
Sai Guna Gaana Karo Mana Mero (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Sing blissfully the divine attributes of Hari, Rama, Krishna and Sairam

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Guru Natha Prabhu Guru Natha Partheesha Natha Sri Sathya Sai Guru Natha
Talli Tandriyu Neevey Kadaa
Daari Chupe Guru Devudu Kadaa
Narayana Govinda Mukunda
Maaku Prapanchamu Neevey Kadaa
Nanda Sunanda Nanda Mukunda Brindavana Chanda Sri Sathya Sai Guru Natha
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us worship Sri Sathya Sai as our preceptor, the one who is both Mother and Father, the Divine Master who guides on our path of Spiritual progress. There is no other world for us except You Bhagawan the dear child of Nanda. You are verily Narayana, Govinda, Mukunda, the crown head of Brindavana who is none else than Sri Sathya Sai

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Hari Bhajo Mana Sai Ram Bhajorey
Sai Ram Bhajo Mana Sai Krishna Bhajorey |Hari Hari...|
Mukunda Madhava Vittala Bhajorey
Govinda Govinda Madhava Bhajorey
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Sing the Glory of the Lord Sai Rama and Sai Krishna who is none else than the re-incarnation of Madhava, Mukunda, Govinda and Vittala

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Hari Bol Hey Manuva
Hari Bol Hari Bol
Hari Charan Ke Dhyaan Karo
Kamal Nayana Ke Smarana Karo |Hari Bol...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the Name of Lord Hari and Meditate on the feet of Lord Hari while visualising His Lotus eyes.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Hari Govinda Hari Hari Giridhara Bala Hari Hari Shyama Gopala
Madhava Hari Keshava Hari
Yadava Hari Nandalala (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Hari in the form of Govinda, the dark complexioned Krishna who lifted the Govardhana hill with His little finger, Madhava, Keshava, who incarnated in the Yadava lineage as the son of Nanda

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Hari Govinda Hari Hari Om
Parthi Pureesha Panduranga
Pandari Natha Hari Hari
Parama Dayala Pannaga Sai
Paramananda Hari Hari
Hari Hari Govinda Hari Hari Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the Lord Hari, Govinda, the One of Supreme Bliss and Compassion who dwells at Parthi and Pandharpur.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Hari Govinda Narayana
Jaya Hari Bol Sri Hari Bol |Hari Hari...|
Harey Rama Harey Krishna Prashanthi Raja Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Bolo
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of the Lord Hari who is also known by different names Govinda, Narayana, Rama, Krishna. Sing the praises of Sai Ram who is the Crown head of Prashanthi Nilayam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Hari Hari Hari Hari Hari Bolo
Hari Hari Ke Gun Gao
Govinda Govinda Govinda Bolo
Govinda Ke Gun Gao
Sai Ram Bolo Sai Shyam Bolo
Sai Ram Gun Gao
Govinda Govinda Govinda Bolo |Govinda Ke|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Name and Divine attributes of Lord Hari, Govinda who has incarnated again as Sai Rama

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Hari Hari Hari Smaran Karo
Hari Charana Kamal Dhyan Karo |Hari Hari...|
Murali Madhava Seva Karo
Murahara Giridhari Bhajana Karo
Devotional Song Meaning: Let the Mind dwell incessantly on the Lotus Feet of Hari, let the hands indulge in the service of Madhava who holds Flute in His Hands, Let the mouth sing the Glory of the One who vanquished the demon Mura and lifted the Mountain with a finger.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Hari Narayana
Hari Govinda Narayana
Hari Gopala Narayana
Hari Hari Narayana
Hrishikesha Narayana
Partheesha Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Narayana who is none else than Hari, Govinda, Gopala, the master of senses and who has incarnatedin Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Hari Om Shiva Shankara Om
Narayana Hari Om (2)
Keshava Hey Shiva Madhava Hey
Narayana Hari Om (2)
Paramatma Antaryami
Narayana Hari Om (3)
