Devotional Song Meaning: Meditate on the primordial sound Om and chant the divine names Hari, Shiva, Shankara, Keshava, Madhava, who is the indweller which is the Supreme Consciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Hari Om Sri Hari Om
Govinda Giridhara Hari Hari Om
Mukunda Madhava Hari Hari Om
Natawara Naagara Sri Hari Om
Karuna Sagara Sri (Sai) Hari Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing in praises of the Lord Hari, Govinda, Mukunda, Madhava, Giridhara, the Supreme actor, the Ocean of Compassion and the Originator of the Primordial sound Om.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Hari Sri Narayana Jai Sai Ram
Allah ho Akbar Rahim Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Halleluya Yesu Prabhu Jai Sai Ram
Sharanam Sharanam Buddha Jai Sai Ram
Zohrashtra Mahaveer Jai Sai Ram
Satsri Akal Vahey Guru Jai Sai Ram
Sarva Devatha Atitha Jai Sai Ram
Jai Sai Ram Jai Jai Sai Ram
Jai Sai Ram Jai Jai Sai Ram (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory be to Sairam and praises be to Him who is the embodiment of all faiths Narayana, Allah, Yesu, Buddha, Mahaveer, Zohrashtra and Guru Nanak

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Hari Sumiran Hari Hari Bhajomana
Hari Hi Tero Tan Man Aur Dhan |Hari Hari...|
Tulsidas Bhajey Ramam Ramam
Meera Daasi Bhajey Govindam
Hari Bin Jeevana Kaisa Jeevan
Hari Charanan Mey Arpan Kar Man
Devotional Song Meaning: Meditate upon the name of Hari, who is your body, mind and wealth. His devotees Tulasidas sang Rama's name and Meera sang Govinda's name (Krishna). This life without Hari is not worth Oh Mind, surrender at the feet of Hari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Naam Gaate Chalo Sai Naam Gaate Chalo
Madhava Govinda Govinda Madhava Naam Gaate Chalo |Hari Naam...|
Govinda Vittala Gopala Vittala
Jaya Parthi Vittala Jaya Sai Vittala (2) |Madhava Govinda|
Devotional Song Meaning: Let every moment be spent in ruminating over the Lord's name Hari, Madhava, Govinda, Gopala, Vittala and Sai who dwells inParthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Govinda (2)
Hari Narayana Duritha Nivarana
Sai Narayana Govinda
Keshava Madhava Govinda
Govinda Govinda
Govinda Hari Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Contemplate on the sweet names of the Lord, Govinda, Keshava, Madhava, Narayana the One who dispels the negative consequences of our deeds.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Govinda Jaya Narayana Govinda
Hari Narayana Jaya Narayana
Jaya Govinda Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant continuously the names of Narayana, Govinda and Hari. Let victory be to them.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Govinda Sai Narayana Govinda
Murali Madhava Govinda
Govardhanadhara Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Blissfully contemplate on the names of the Lord Narayana the indweller in Man, Govinda the cowherd boy, the master of senses, Murali the one who holds flute and the one who held aloft the Govardhanamountain.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Hari Hari
Sai Narayana Hari Hari
Hari Narayana Bhajo Narayana |Sai Narayana|
Hey Keshava Hey Madhava
Govinda Rama Hari Hari
Hey Keshava Hey Madhava |Govinda Rama...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Offer Salutations to the Lord Narayana who is otherwise known as Keshava, Govinda, Hari, Rama and Madhava.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Bhajorey (2)
Shyama Sundara Madana Gopala
Satchidananda Sai Gopala
Gopalana Gopi Gopalana Gopi Gopalana Bhajorey
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Bhajorey
Hari Narayana Bhajorey (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Sing the Glory of Lord Narayana also known as Hari. Who has descended on Earth as the dark complexioned and enchanting Gopala. He is the very embodiment of Truth, Awareness and Bliss and the One who protects the cows and the Gopis.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Narayana (Om) (2)
Achyutha Keshava Madhava Govinda Hari Narayana Narayana (Om)
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Narayana (Om)
Devotional Song Meaning: Praises be to the Lord Narayana whose other names are Achyutha, Keshava, Madhava and Govinda. The originator of the primordial sound Om.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Sai Narayana
Naam Bina Sukha Shanthi Nahin
Naman Karo Hari Naam Hari Naam
Smarana Karo Sai Naam Sai Naam
Narayana Hari Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Understand Oh Mind! There is no peace and security bereft of the Lord's name Hari and Narayana. Bow down in reverence to the Name Hari. Keep chanting the name of Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Srinivasa
Jaya Govinda Sri Venkatesha
Padma Lakshmi Hrudaya Nivasa |Hari Narayana...|
Dharani Nayaka Paapa Vinasha
Mangala Dayaka Manusha Vesha
Maha Teertha Sri Tirumalai Vasa
Balaji Sai Parthi Nivasa
Devotional Song Meaning: The bestower of Auspiciousness, the Lord of the Earth, destroyer of Sins has come down in human form as Lord Srinivasa at the Holy place Tirumala and who has Mother Lakshmi in His Heart. Lord Srinivasa is also known as Govinda, Venkatesha and Balaji has now incarnatedin Parthi as Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Om Ananda Narayana
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana |Hari Om|
Triloka Palana Narayana
Parthi Nivasa Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to Lord Narayana, sustainer of the three worlds, embodiment of Bliss and the originator of the Primordial sound Om who dwellsin Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Namah Shivaya
Sai Om Sai Om Sai Om Namah Shivaya
Dama Dama Damaru Mahadev ka
Vandana Iski Kartey Hai Sab Devatha
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Namah Shivaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant thedivine mantra of Shiva " Namah Shivaya". All the Gods Pay their Obeisance toLord Mahadev who holds the Damaru in his Hands.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Narayana (2)
Shanthakara Bhujanga Shayana Padmanabha Narayana
Lakshmi Ramana Kamala Nayana Sai Natha Narayana
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory tothe Lord Narayana. The one who isresting on the Serpent and the one who is the personification of serenity. He is also the one who is the beloved of Goddess of wealth (Lakshmi) and he is the Lotus eyed Sai Natha of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Om Namah Shivaya
Shiva Shiva Shankara Hara Parameshwara Sayeeshwaraya Namah Om (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the mantra "Hari Om Namah Shivaya". Let us offer our obeisance to Lord Shiva who bestows auspiciousness, is the Lord of the Lords, presently incarnated as Sayeeshwara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the Powerful mantra "Hari Om Namah Shivaya". Lord Shiva is the embodiment of auspiciousness and the origin of the primordial sound Om.
Let us offer our salutations to our sacred preceptor Sathya Sai who is noneother than the incarnation of Shiva and Energy Principle Shakthi, Sita Rama as well as Radhey Shyam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Om Narayana Sathya Narayana
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us Sing the Glory of Narayana the embodiment of Truth and chant the Mantra 'Om Namah Shivaya' the origin of the Primordial sound Om.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Om Tat Sat Hari Om Tat Sat Hari Om Tat Sat Hari Om
Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jaya Radha Krishna
Govinda Govinda Bhajo Radhey Govinda Gopala Gopala Bhajo Krishna Mukunda
Om Hari Om Hari Om Sai Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Understand Oh Mind! The Primordial Sound Om is that Effulgent pure Consciousness. Chant the names of Krishna, Govinda who are also embodiments of that Supreme Consciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hari Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Sai Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya |Hari Om|
Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Sai Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Hari Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Sai Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Hari Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Sai Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Understand Oh Mind! The Mantra 'Namah Shivaya' is the Embodiment of that Supreme Effulgent Consciousness. Shiva Himself is the Embodiment of that Supreme Effulgent Consciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Anatha Nath Sai Tum Ho Antaryami
Tum Ho Merey (Sai) Bhagawan
Deena Dukha Bhanjana Sahara Do Mujhey
O Merey Sai Bhagawan
Hrudaya Mandir Mey Aao Sai Merey
Deejo Krupa Vardaan |Tum Ho|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai! You are verily my Lord, for you are the Indweller and Champion of distraught and helpless. Oh Lord! Take up my cause for You are the One who destroys sorrows of the Forlorn. Enter the Temple of my Heart and Shower Your Blessings.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Bhagawan Hey Bhagawan
Daya Karo Bhagawan
Deena Natha Anatha ke Natha |Hey Bhagawan|
Janana Marana Bhava Shoka Vidhura
Niraadhaar ke Aadhaar
Deena Dayala Parama Krupala |Daya Karo|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Bhagawan, the Lord of Puttaparthi. Have compassion on this devotee. You, who can deliver us from the fear of life and death. The all compassionate Lord who has come as a saviour of the less privileged and deprived. I bow down to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Brahma Hey Vishnu
Dayamaya Hey Maheshwara
Sathya Sai Parameshwara |Hey Brahma...|
Maha Shakthi Shiva Sai Shankara
Poorna Teja Sai Avatara
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Sathya Sai who is Creator, Sustainer and Destroyer and the Supreme Sovereign Lord and Compassion Personified. Sathya Sai is the Total Incarnation of that Supreme Energy.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Chinmayi Sai Janani
Mata Jaganmayi Sai Janani
Shabdha Brahmamayi Sai Janani
Parathparamayi Sai Janani
Shiva Shakthimayi Sai Janani
Nithyanandamayi Sai Janani
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother Sai! You are that Pure Consciousness, Mother of the Entire Universe and the originator of the Primordial sound by which this Universe has come into being. Oh Mother! You are superior even to the best, the embodiment of Matter and Energy principle and the Ever Blissful.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Chitha Chora Parthi Nivasa
Indu Vadana Sri Sayeesha
Gopi Vallabha Gokula Nandana
Govardhanadhara Gopala (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Our Salutations to Sayeesha, the stealer of our Hearts, who has the countenance of the cool Moon. He is the same Lord Gopala who had earlier incarnated at Gokula as the Lord of the Gopis and the one who held aloft the Govardhana mountain.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Deena Bandhu Anatha Natha
Hey Guru Natha Sai Natha
Parthi Pureesha Hey Paramatma
Patitha Janavana Sai Natha
Devotional Song Meaning: Our Lord Sai is that Supreme Consciousness, the uplifter of the downtrodden and refuge of the forlorn. Lord Sai is also our mentor and the source of succour to the orphaned.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Deena Bandhu Deena Natha Sai Avatara
Prem Ke Sindho Karuna Sindhu Sai Avatara
Sarva Dharma Ke Ek Swaroopa Sai Avatara
Bhajorey Sai Avatara
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us sing the Glory of Sai the Incarnation of the Modern Era who is the friend and Emancipator of the forlorn. Sai is the Single Godhead of all the different Faiths and the Ocean of Supreme Love and compassion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Deena Dayalu Ghana Sai Ghana Shyam
Karuna Sindhu Karo Kalyan
Tum Ho Baba Antaryami
Tum Ho Sab Ke Jeevan Swami
Prem Baras Deejo Sai Ghana Shyam |Karuna Sindho|
Devotional Song Meaning: Shower your Love on us, Oh the dark complexioned Lord of the forlorn. Oh Sai, You are the indweller, the Ocean of Compassion and the lifeline of everyone

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Deena Dayalu Harey Harey Sai Ram Harey Harey
Sai Ram Ghana Shyam Sai Ram
Hey Bandha Vimochana Rama Harey
Hey Paapa Samharaka Sai Harey
Sai Ram Harey Harey |Sai Ram Ghana Shyam|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to the Lord Sai Rama who has a soft corner to the deprived ones, the One who relieves us of Bondages of the World, the annihilator of Sins.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Deena Dayalu Sai Rama Ram
Parama Krupalu Sai Rama Ram
Sai Rama Rama Rama Ram (2)
Hey Patitha Pavana Sai Rama Ram
Bhaktha Vatsala Sai Rama Ram |Sai Rama (2)|
Devotional Song Meaning: Repeat the name of Sai Rama the redeemer of the forlorn, the ever compassionate, the uplifter of the oppressed and the one who is ever endearing to His devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Eshwari
Sai Mata Eshwari
Bhaktha Jana Priya Sayeeshwari |Hey Eshwari|
Shankari Sambhavi Sada Shivey
Katyayani Kamalambikey
Pankaja Lochani Bhava Bhaya Nashini
Mohana Roopini Moksha Pradayini
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother You are the consort of Eshwara, the lotus eyed and is loved by all. She is also known as Shankari Sambhavi, Sadashivey, Katyayani and Kamalambikey and has a very Pleasing form, destroys the cycle of births and the bestows Liberation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Gananatha Gajanana
Heyramba Gajanana |Hey Gananatha...|
Gowri Nandana Gajanana Gajanana Hey Gajanana
Siddhi Vinayaka Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lord of the Ganas (Shiva's army), dear son of Gowri, also known as Heyramba is the one who bestows spiritual powers and without a leader above Him.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Giridhari Gopala
Keshava Madhava Gopala |Hey Giridhari|
Nanda Mukunda Gopala
Navaneetha Chora Gopala
Antaryami Gopala
Hrudaya Vihari Gopala
Aao Pyarey Muraliwale Darshan Do Prabhu Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Gopala (Krishna) also known by names like, Giridhari, Keshava, Madhava, Mukunda, you are the in dweller of our hearts, Oh Loving Lord holding the Flute give me your vision Oh Lord Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Giridhari Hey Nandalal
Yashoda Tanaya Hey Nandalal |Hey Giridhari...|
Radha Pyaarey Hey Nandalal
Nandalal Nandalal
Devotional Song Meaning: Praises be to the son of Nanda and Yashoda, who is dear to Radha and the One who lifted the Mountain to save his tribesmen.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Govinda Hey Ananda Nanda Gopala
Mohana Muralidhara Shyama Gopala |Hey Govinda...|
Mandara Giridhari Harey Natawara Lala
Madhava Keshava Madana Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to the Lord Gopala, son of Nanda, to the one of Bliss, having an Enchanting form. Glory be to the one who holds the Flute in His hands, absolute pretender, who lifted the Mandara mountain in order to save the yadavas from the wrath of Rain God.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Govinda Hey Gopala
Shyama Sundara Madana Mohana
Govardhana Giridhari
Shankha Chakra Gadadhari
Meera Prabhu Giridhari
Radhey Shyam Muralidhari
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the attributes of Gopala, Govinda, the one with dark complexion, having an Enchanting form, who adorns the Conch, the Disc and the Mace. Praises be to the one who is dear to Meera and Radha and who holds the Flute in His hands.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Govinda Hey Gopala Hey Madhava Madhusudhana
Aao Aao Prabhu Aao Aao
Mujhey Aakar Darsha Dikhao |Hey Govinda...|
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Swaroopa
Aao Prabhu Aao Aao (Aao) |Mujhey Aakar|
Devotional Song Meaning: Come Oh dear Lord Gopala, Govinda and grace us with the vision of your beautiful form. You are the very embodiment of Human values and the destroyer of the demon Madhu.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Indushekara Raja Shiva Raja Shankara
Hey Indushekara Shambho Shiva Raja Shankara
Om Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Pinaka Vaibhava Raja Shankara
Shiva Raja Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Sovereign Lord Shankara who adorns the crescent moon on His head, the one of benevolence and who holds the Bow (Pinaka) in His hands.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Kamala Vadana Sai Ranga
Kaivalya Panduranga (2)
Sai Gopala Ghana Ghana Neela
Kutila Kuntala Tribhuvana Pala
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Roopa (2)
Maheshwara Roopa |Brahma Vishnu...|
Maya Lola Brahma Swaroopa
Devotional Song Meaning: Hail the Lotus faced Lord Ranga who is the Absolute reality. Sing in praise of Lord Gopala of the complexion of thick dark clouds, of curly hair and the sustainer of the three worlds. He is verily the Embodiment of the Trinity and who uses Illusion as His instrument to destroy the sinner.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Krishna Hey Krishna
Vittala Jaya Panduranga Panduranga (4)
Nanda Kishora Shyama Gopala
Shyama Gopala Madana Gopala (3)
Vittala Jaya Panduranga Panduranga
Panduranga Panduranga Panduranga Panduranga (4) |Vittala Jaya Panduranga...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Repeat in unison continuously the names of Panduranga, Vittala, of the dark complexioned and Enchanting Gopala who is the son of Nanda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Krishna Madhava Govinda Gopala
Mathura Natha Madana Gopala
Nanda Mukunda Shyama (Sai) Gopala
Krishna Harey Jaya Krishna Harey Jaya Hari Govinda Krishna Harey (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the various names of Gopala, Govinda, Krishna, Madhava, the One who gives delight and the one who is the Lord of Mathura. Glory be to Him.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Ma Durga Bhavani Ma
Hey Ma Durgati Nashini Ma
Jagadodharini Jaya Sai Ma
Jaya Parameshwari Sai Ma
Jaya Sai Ma Jaya Jaya Ma
Jaya Jaya Ma Jaya Sai Ma
Parthi Pureeshwari Sai Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory be to Mother Durga who removes the distress of Her devotees, redeemer of the world, consort of Lord Parameshwara who dwellsin Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Madhava Hey Madhusudhana
Damodara Hey Muralidhara |Hey Madhava...|
Mana Mohana Hey Yadu Nandana
Deenavana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to the Lord Madhava, who vanquished demon Madhu and who holds the Flute in His hands. Lord Damodara removes the fear of repetetive births, has an Enchanting Form and the source of succour to the underprivileged.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Madhava Yadu Nandana
Mana Mohana Hey Madhusudhana
Janardhana Radha Jeevana
Gopalana Gopi Ranjana
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Krishna is the one who vanquished demon Madhu, who prompts the Mind of his devotees, is dear to Radha. He tends to the cows and is a source of delight to the Gopis.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Nanda Kumara Gopala
Brindavana Sanchara Gopala
Mana Mohana Murali Gopala
Mana Mohana Radhey Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Gopala is a Mind charmer, who plays the Flute, consort of Radha, son of Nanda and the One who moved about Brindavana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Nanda Nanda Gopal Ananda Nanda Gopal (2)
Hey Nanda Nanda Ananda Nanda Yadu Nanda Nanda Gopal
Devotional Song Meaning: The child Gopala is the One who gives delight to Nanda, belongs to the Yadava lineage and is ever blissful.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Nandalala Gopala
Shyama Gopala Sai Gopal |Hey Nandalal...|
Giridhara Gopala Radhey Gopala |Shyam Gopala|
Devotional Song Meaning: Gopala is of dark complexion, dear son of Nanda and the consort of Radha, surprised everyone by holding the mountain with His little finger.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Nandalala Hey Nandalala
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala |Hey Nandalala...|
Vishwa Vanditha Vijaya Gopala
Veda Vedantha Venu Gopala
Radha Vallabha Raasa Vilola
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the son of Nanda, consort of Radha, who played the celestial dance with the Gopis. Lord Gopala who holds the flute in His hand is worshipped by the entire Universe and the origin of Vedas and upanishads.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Nandalala Hey Vraja Bala
Maakhan Chora Yashoda Ke Bala
Brindavan Ke Gokula Bala
Daya Karo Hey Sai Nandalala |Maakhan Chora.|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh! Son of Nanda and of Yashoda! Protect us! You are the One who stole butter from the houses of Gopis and moved about gardens of Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala
Radha Ramana Hari Radhey Gopala |Hey Nandalala...|
Natawara Giridhara Sai Gopala
Murali Manohara Hey Nandalala
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory be to You Oh son of Nanda and the consort of Radha, the One with the flute in His hands, the Supreme actor, who lifted the entire mountain with a finger.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Nandalala Shyama Gopala
Murali Manohara Krishna Gopala
Krishna Gopala Karunakara
Hey Devaki Nandana Damodara
Sai Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the One who is the dear child of Devaki, of Nanda, Compassionate, the One of dark complexion and attractive with the flute in His hands and a rope around His waist.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Nataraja Hey Nataraja
Nata Shiva Shankara Nataraja
Ambuja Lochana Nataraja
Ananda Tandava Shiva Raja
Shakthi Mahesha Nataraja
Sai Manohara Shiva Raja
Devotional Song Meaning: Hail the Lord of Dance, Lotus eyed, Lord of Mother Shakthi, who performs the celestial dance who has now come down as Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Nirakari Allah Hey Avatari Prabhu Ram
Janam Janam Merey Saath Raho Tum Sathya Sai Bhagawan |Hey Nirakari|
Tum Hi Hamarey Mata Pitha Sai
Tum Hi Hamarey Pran (Ram) |Janam Janam|
Nanak Yesu Buddha Mahaveer
Sab Hai Sai Bhagawan |Janam Janam|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai! Be my master through many lives. You are verily our Mother, Father and our very Life itself. Lord Sai is the Formless Allah, Nanak, Yesu, Buddha, Mahaveer and every other form of Divine Personages.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Hey Parameshwara Deena Dayalu Daya Sindhu Sayeesha Krupalu (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Parameshwara is the refuge of the downtrodden and the Ocean of Mercy who has come down as Lord Sayeesha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Parameshwara Parthi Pureeshwara
Karuna Sagara Shankara
Daya Karo Sai Shankara (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Parameshwara is the Lord of Lords, the ocean of Compassion and the Lord of Parthi. Show mercy on us, Oh the bestower of Auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Parthi Pureesha Prashanthi Vasa Sadguru Sai Ram
Sadguru Sai Ram (Hey)
Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Ram
Harey Ram Sai Ram
Hey Anatha Natha Deena Bandhu Sadguru Sai Ram
Sadguru Sai Ram (Hey)
Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Ram
Harey Ram Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Sai Ram is our Sacred Preceptor who dwellsin Prashanthi Nilayam inParthi and the refuge of Forlorn. Repeat the Name of Ram who is none other than Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Parthi Pureesha Prashanthi Vasa Sai Murari
Sai Murari Sai Murari Sai Murari Sai Murari |Hey Parthi Pureesha|
Hey Hrishikesha Hrudaya Nivasa Hrudaya Nivasa |Sai Murari|
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lord of Parthi and the resident of Prashanthi Nilayam is the indweller of every heart. He is Lord Sai who also dwells at Hrishikesh and the One who had annihilated demon Mura.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Ram Bhagawan
Hey Karuna Sindhu Ram
Hey Deena Bandhu Sai Ram
Bhaktha Premi O Karuna Karo
Daya (Mujhey Krupa) Karo Bhagawan
Hey Janaki Jeevana Ram
Hey Parthi Pureeshwara Ram |Hey Deena Bandhu|
Devotional Song Meaning: Let Your benedictions be on us devotees Oh Lord Ram. You are the Ocean of Compassion and refuge of the Forlorn. You are the very Life of Mother Janaki and the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Ram Hey Guna Dhaam
Raghava Sundara Ram
Janaki Jeevana Ram |Hey Ram...|
Kausalya Tanaya Raghukula Ram
Ayodhya Shiromani Dasharatha Ram
Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to Lord Ram, repository of Virtues and the descendant of Emperor Raghu. Lord Ram is the crest jewel of Ayodhya and the son of Mother Kausalya and King Dasharatha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Ram Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
Hey Ram Vaidehi Priya Ram
Hey Patitha Pavana Sai Ram |Hey Ram...|
Manimaya Bhooshana Ram
Kausalyatmaja Ram
Ravana Mardhana Ram
Rama Dootha Priya Ram (Hey)
Patitha Pavana Sai Ram (Hey)
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Rama, you are the loving prince of Mother Kausalya and beloved Sita. You look handsome adorned with precious gems and jewels. Slayer of demon King Ravana, you are the redeemer of the downtrodden and worshipped by Hanuman.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Rama Dootha Hey Rama Bhaktha Hey Rama Daasa Namo Namo
Sita Mata Shoka Vinasha
Anatha Natha Namo Namo
Maruti Raya Mahanubhava
Ati Balavanta (Anjaneya) Namo Namo
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the messenger, devotee and the servant of Rama. Salutations to the One who destroyed Mother Sita's agony, son of Maruti, guide to the orphaned, Supreme being and one of magnificent strength.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Rama Narayana
Harey Krishna Janardhana |Hey Rama...|
Nityananda Brahmananda
Krishna Madhusudhana |Harey Krishna|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Rama and Krishna who are the incarnations of Narayana. Lord Krishna is the motivator, personification of Supreme Bliss and the One who vanquished demon Madhu.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Ranga Panduranga
Rakumayi Ranga Vittobha Ranga |Hey Ranga|
Kaveri Ranga Kasturi Ranga
Karunya Ranga Karunanta Ranga
Kalyana Ranga Kamaneeya Ranga
Sri Ranga Ranga Sri Sai Ranga
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Ranga of Pandharpur, consort of Mother Rakumayi, who stands on a brick, the Onewith utmost compassion and Benevolence to all. Lord Ranga is very charming, dwells by the river Kaveri.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Sai Jagannatha Hey Sai Jagannatha Hey Sai Jagannatha
Deena Bandhu Sai Natha Karuna Sindhu Jagannatha
Hey Sai Jagannatha Hey Sai Jagannatha
Hey Sai Jagannatha Hey Shirdi Jagannatha Hey Parthi Jagannatha
Devotional Song Meaning: Repeat the sacred name of Sai the Lord of the Universe, the refuge of the Forlorn, the Ocean of compassion and the One who dwells at Shirdi and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Sai Ranga Hey Panduranga
Karunanta Ranga Hrudayanta Ranga |Hey Sai...|
Sri Ranga Ranga Jaya Ranga Ranga
Ananda Ranga Sadananda Ranga |Karunanta Ranga|
Devotional Song Meaning: Contemplate on the name of Lord Ranga, the One who dwells in everyones Heart, the One of compassion and is ever blissful.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Shesha Shayana Narayana
Veda Bharana Narayana
Bhava Bhaya Harana Narayana
Pavana Charana Narayana
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Narayana reclines on the serpentAdishesha and the One who fosters Vedas. Repeat the name of Narayana whose sacred feet dispels fear of repetetive births.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Shiva Nandana Hey Shiva Nandana Hey Shiva Nandana Paalaya Maam
Hey Girija Sutha Hey Girija Sutha
Hey Girija Sutha Raksha Maam
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect me Oh the son of Shiva and Mother Girija.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Shiva Nandana Jaya Jaga Vandana
Jaya Gowri Sutha Paahi Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Parama Daya Ghana
Paahi Prabho Maam Paahi Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh the son of Lord Shiva and Mother Gowri, the entire Universe bows down to you in reverence. Save me Oh Elephant faced son of Parvathi for you are the One of Supreme compassion

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Shiva Nandana Nandana
Hey Shiva Nandana Sai Gajanana |Hey Shiva...|
Mooshika Vahana Modaka Hasta
ChamaraKarna Vilambita Sutra
Vamana Roopa Maheshwara Putra
Parthi Gajanana Paada Namostuthey
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow down to the Feet of the son of Shiva, who has the head of an Elephant. He has a short stature, having big ears, the sacred thread hanging on His body and has a mouse as His vehicle.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Shiva Shankara Namami Shankara Shiva Shankara Shambho
Hey Girijapathi Bhavani Shankara
Shiva Shankara Shambho (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Prostrations to Lord Shiva, the One who bestows Auspiciousness, Lord of Mother Girija also known as Bhavani.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Shiva Shankara Nataraja
Bhavani Shankara Shiva Raja |Hey Shiva...|
Natana Manohara Hey Nataraja
Sai Manohara Shiva Raja
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Shiva confers Auspiciousness and is the Lord of enticing Dance and the beloved of Mother Bhavani.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Shiva Shankara Shambho Hey Tripurari
Dayamaya Maheshwara Sai Shankara
Hara (4) Shambho Mahadeva Gangadhara Shankara
Shiva (4) Shambho Mahadeva Sayeeshwara Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Shiva bestower of auspiciousness and who burnt down three cities built by the demons. Shiva is the Lord of the Lords, of Supreme compassion, the One holding Mother Ganges in His matted locks.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Shyama Sundara Hey Sai Sundara
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Sai Sundara |Hey Shyam...|
Neela Megha Sundara Neeraja Lochana
Brahmanda Nayaka Hey Sai Sundara
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the Lord Sai who has charming looks and is the Lord of Parthi. He has the complexion of dark blue clouds, lotus eyed and the Lord of the Entire Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Vishwa Pala Gopala
Hey Deena Bandhu Gopala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Giridhara Bala Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Gopala sustains the whole Universe, friend of the helpless. He held aloft the Mountain high and the Lord of Meera's devotion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Vishwanath Hey Gowri Nath Hey Sai Nath Bhagawan
Daya Karo Daya Karo Daya Karo Bhagawan |Hey Vishwanath...|
Deena Dayala Sai Ghana Shyama
Patitha Pavana Hey Sai Rama |Daya Karo|
Devotional Song Meaning: Show mercy on us Oh Lord of the Universe and of Mother Gowri. Lord Sai is the redeemer of the downtrodden and provides succour to the weak.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hey Vraj Bal Yadu Nanda Gopal
Shyama Sundara Mohana Gopal |Hey Vraj Bal...|
Yashoda Ke Bal Yadu Nanda Gopal
Gopal Gopal Gokula Bal
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Gopala You are the son of Nanda and Yashoda and of the Yadava lineage. You are the one who moved about in the thick bushes of Brindavan, is of dark complexion and attractive to behold.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Heyramba Janani Sri Sai Janani
Bhavani Jagadambey Ma (2)
Tribhuvana Palini Hey Karunamayi
Uma Sharadamba (2)
Raksha Karo Sai Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect us Oh Sai Ma! You are the creator of this Earth, the sustainer of the three worlds and personification of compassion. Oh Mother, you are known by the names Bhavani, Uma and Sharada.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hrudayanta Ranga Sai Nandana Vana Vihari
Jaya Yadu Nandana Jaya Ghana Shyam (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the One who is the indweller of the heart, the deep blue complexioned son of Yadu lineage, the one who dwells in the Nandana Forest.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Hum Sab Milkar Mangal Gaayen
Sai Bhagawan Sathya Sai Bhagawan (2)
Sab Sukh Jeevana Sai Bhagawan
Sab Dukha Harana Sai Bhagawan
Sathya Swaroopa Sai Bhagawan
Parthi Nivasa Sai Bhagawan |Sai Bhagawan|
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us sing the glories of Lord Sathya Sai, the One who confers happiness to all and removes misery from everyone's life. Sathya Sai is the Embodiment of Truth and the resident of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Indu Vadana Yadu Nandana
Eshwaramba Priya Nandana |Indu Vadana Yadu...|
Mandara Giridhara Hey Madhava
Mangala Charitha Sayeeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine name of the one who has the face that of the moon and the one who belongs to the Yadu Dynasty. Sayeeshwara is the lovely son of Mother Eshwaramba and the one who has an impeccable history.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Induvadanadhara Indradri Priyakara
Chandrakaladhara Hey Shiva Shankara
Lalita Manohara Laya Pada Mrudukara
Hey Sai Shankara Pranamamyaham
Shiva Sai Shankara Pranamamyaham
Devotional Song Meaning: Shankara has the face that of the Moon, dear to Lord Indra, bears the crescent Moon on His Head. My prostrations are to that Sai Shankara whose feet are soft and has a charming disposition.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagadambey Amba Bhavani
Jaganmata Mangala Dayini
Jagadeeshwari Sai Janani |Jagadambey Amba...|
Parameshwari Parthi Shivani
Narayani Mangala Karini
Sayeeshwari Sankata Harini
Sarveshwari Sai Janani
Devotional Song Meaning: Amba Bhavani, Parameshwari, Jagadeeshwari, Narayani, Jagadambey, Sarveshwari are the various names of the same Mother who confers Auspiciousness, the One who removes misery is Sai Janani of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagadambey Devi Bhavani
Jaganmatey Shakthi Durge (2) |Jagadambey|
Kumara Gananathamba Kalyani Shyamalamba
Janani Durge Satya Sai Mata
Uma Maheshwari Kalavathi (Amba)
Devotional Song Meaning: Bhavani or Durga is the Goddess and Mother of the Entire Universe. Chant the various names of Mother Goddess, Janani, Uma maheshwari, Sharada, Kalyani, Shyamala, Durga and Kalavathi who confer boons to the Devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagadashraya Sri Raghu Rama
Jagadodhara Sita Rama |Jagadashraya Sri...|
Parama Pavana Taraka Naama
Sri Rama Shata Koti Pranama
Sai Rama Koti Pranama
Sharanam Sharanam Atma Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty, sustainer of the entire Universe. Lord Rama whose consort is Mother Sita has come to uplift the entire world. Reciting Lord's name helps to cross the vicious cycle of birth and death. We surrender ourselves at your Lotus feet with countless prostrations Oh Sai Rama who is the indweller of our Heart.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Ho
Jagadodhara Jaya Jaya Ho |Jagadeesha Harey...|
Allah Yesu Nanak Sai
Antaryami Buddha Mahaveera
Zohrashtra Sarva Dharma Priya Deva
Shanthi Nivasa Sathya Sai Deva (Pra)
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Sai the Lord and Redeemer of the Universe. Lord Sathya Sai is the embodiment of Allah, Yesu, Nanak, Buddha, Mahaveera, Zohrashtra. Sai is the indweller and embodies Supreme Peace.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagadeesha Harey Shiva Shambho
Samba Shiva Hara Sai Shiva
Hey Tripurari Bhava Bhaya haari
Parthi Pureeshwara Shiva Shambho |Samba Shiva|
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Shiva is the Lord of the Universe, whose consort is Amba, removes the fear of the cycle of Birth and Death. Lord Shiva is the One who destroyed the three cities created by the demons has come down as the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagadeesha Harey Shiva Shambho
Samba Shiva Hara Sai Shiva
Hey Tripurari Bhava Bhaya haari
Parthi Pureeshwara Shiva Shambho |Samba Shiva|
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Shiva is the Lord of the Universe, whose consort is Amba, removes the fear of the cycle of Birth and Death. Lord Shiva is the One who destroyed the three cities created by the demons has come down as the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagadeeshwara Paahi Parameshwara Shiva Gangadhari
Neelakanta Shiva Shambho Murari
Chandramouli Charmambaradhari
Paahi Maam Dehi Maam
Shambho Shankara Parthi vihari
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect us Oh Sovereign Lord of the Universe. You have Mother Ganges in your matted locks and a deep blue throat. You are the One with the Crescent moon on your head and the skin of the Tiger round your body (which indicates the sublimation of animal qualities), who dwellsin Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagadeeshwari Daya Karo Ma
Shiva Shankari Krupa Karo Ma
Sayeeshwari Raksha Karo Ma
Partheeshwari Bhala Karo Ma |Shiva Shankari|
Devotional Song Meaning: Mercy on us, Oh Mother Goddess of the Universe. May your benedictions be upon us Oh Shankari, whose consort is Shiva. Shower your blessings and protect us Oh Sayeeshwari theGoddess Of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagadeeshwari Jaya Mata Bhavani
Karunya Lavanya Akhilandeshwari |Jagadeeshwari Jaya...|
Hey Shiva Shankari Triloka Palini
Sharanagata Paripalini Mata
Devotional Song Meaning: Mother Bhavani is the Goddess of the Entire Universe. She sustains the three worlds, compassionate and beautiful. She is the consort of Lord Shiva and takes complete care of the One who has surrendered to Her.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagadodhara Sayeeshwara
Baraso Hum Par Prem Ki Dhara
Sakala Jagat Mey Naam Tumhara
Bhakthon Ke Sab Sai Sahara
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh uplifter of the entire world, Shower us with your Love. Oh Lord Sai You are known all over the world, the support and strength of alldevotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagadodhara Shyama Gopala
Muralilola Hrudaya Vihara |Jagadodhara...|
Jaya Brindavana Madana Gopala
Madana Gopala (2) |Jaya Brindavana|
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Gopala is the Lord of the whole Universe and is the indweller of every Heart. Gopala who is dark in complexion, entices everyone with the flute in His hand and moves about in Brindavan, is presently Sai Gopala residing inParthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagadodharaka Janaki Rama
Paramodhara Pattabhi Rama
Lakshmana Sevitha Lavanya Rama
Rajeeva Nayana Ranjana Rama
Raja Rama Ravikula Soma
Ravana Mardhana Rakshaka Rama
Moksha Pradayaka Mohana Rama
Maruti Poojita Manobhi Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Rama is the Supreme uplifter of the world, consort of Mother Janaki and the crowned King of Ayodhya. Lord Rama is served by His younger brother Lakshmana, Handsome and lotus eyed. He is the cream of the Solar dynasty who vanquished the evil Ravana. Rama who has a pleasing personality, is worshipped by Maruti, the Guardian of His devotees and grants Liberation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagadodharini Ma
Vishwa Vilasini Ma
Sthira Sukha Dayini Ma
Durgati Nashini Ma (Hey)
Parthi Pureeshwari Parvathi Ma
Bhava Bhaya Harini Bhairavi Ma
Sambhavi Ma Gowri Ma
Jaya Parameshwari Jaya Bhuvaneshwari
Jaya Partheeshwari Parvathi Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother you are the nourisher and charmer of the Universe. You are the provider of lasting happiness and destroyer of misfortune. You are known by several names, Parvathi, Bhairavi, Sambhavi, Gowri, Parameshwari and Bhuvaneshwari and presently You are known as Partheeshwari too.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagadodharini Mata Durga Jagadodharini Ma
Jago Jago Ma Jago Jago Ma Jago Jago Ma Janani
Hey Gowri Devi Rana Chandi Devi
Hey Shiva Ramana Jago Ma (2)
Jago Jagadodharini Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Universal Mother Durga! Awaken us from the slumber of ignorance. You are Mother Gowri and the valiant Chandi devi. Awaken us to the inherent Atmic reality, the charmer of Lord Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagamey Sarvam Vishnumayam
Sadguru Sri Sathya Saimayam (2) |Jagamey...|
Omkaara Naadamayam
Om Shiva Shakthimayam
Premamayam Sai Naamamayam
Pranava Kaara Brahmamayam
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Vishnu, our sacred preceptor Sathya Sai, is the Supreme Principle from whom the Primordial sound Om originatesand pervades the Entire Universe. The Universe is the manifestation of Matter and Energy, of Supreme Love and the name of Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaganmata Jaganmata
Devi Bhavani Hey Sai Mata |Jaganmata Jaganmata|
Mata Maheshwari Girija Mata
Parthi Pureeshwari Parama Dayakari
Devi Bhavani Jai Sai Mata
Devotional Song Meaning: The Universal Mother is known by several names as Devi Bhavani, Maheshwari and Girija. She is extremely compassionate Mother Sai who dwells at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaganmatey Jagat Janani
Jaya Jagadambey Devi Bhavani
Devi Saraswathi Durga Lakshmi
Mahishasura Samhaarini Mata
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Goddess Mother who nourishes the entire Universe. You are verily Mother Saraswathi, Durga and Lakshmi and the One who removed demon Mahishasura from the face of the Earth.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagat Guru Sadguru Sai Guru Deva
Sarva Janashraya Mama Guru Deva |Jagat Guru...|
Sanathana Sarathey Sayeesha Deva
Pranamamyaham Koti Pranamamyaham (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Our Sacred and Universal Preceptor Sai is adored by everyone. Countless prostrations to Lord Sayeesha the Eternal charioteer.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagat Janani Jagadamba Jagadamba Jagadamba Bhavani
Mahishasura Mardhini Kalyani
Shumbha Nishumbha Prana Haarini |Jagat Janani...|
Sharada Sangeeta Vadini
Nava Durge Nava Roopa Dharini
Amba Bhavani Jagadamba Bhavani (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Amba Bhavani is the Universal Mother who vanquished the demon Mahishasura as well as demons Shumbha and Nishumbha to promote the welfare of the world. Mother Sharada plays sublime notes on Her Veena and Mother Durga assumes nine different forms. Glory to the Divine mother.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagat Janani Shiva Sai Shankari
Mata Maheshwari Parvathi Ma
Abhaya Pradayini Gaana Vinodini
Mata Bhavani Ma (Jaya Ma)
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Kaali Kapalini Ma (Jaya Ma)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to the Mother of the Universe Shankari, Parvathi, Bhavani, the one who confers freedom from fear, delighted by music and the One wearing a garland of skulls.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagat Palana Jaganmohana
Sundara Sai Gopalana
Munijana Sevitha Madhusudhana |Jagat Palana...|
Keshava Govinda Janardhana
Sridhara Madhava Damodara
Achyutha Anantha Narayana
Sri Sai Krishna (Deva) Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the various names of the Lord Gopala, Keshava, Govinda, Janardhana, Sridhara, Madhava, Damodara, Achyutha, Anantha, Narayana, Madhusudhana who is the nourisher and captivator of the Universe, the one who is handsome and served by saints, is known as Sai Krishna now.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagata Uddharana Parthi Viharana
Tum Ho Mangala Dhaam (Prabhu)
Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Paapa Vimochana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Sundara Nayanabhi Ram | (Baba) Tum Ho|
Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, You are the benefactor of the entire Universe, repository of all virtues. Victory beto You Oh the One with beautiful eyes, destroyer of sins, cycle of birth and death and the one who inhabits Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jagatpathey Hari Sai Gopala
Jagadodhara Sai Nandalala
Mathuradhipathey Krishna Gopala
Madhura Madhura Hey Gaana Vilola
Jagadodhara Sai Nandalala
Sai Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Gopala is the Lord and sustainer of the whole Universe. Victory to Gopala who is the King of Mathura and patron of sweet music.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jago Jago Giridhari Gopala
Jago Jago Hey Gokula Bala
Darshan Deejo Deena Dayala
Prabhu Paramatma Tribhuvana Pala
Sai Narayana Natawara Lala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Gopala! Grant us with the vision of your Form. Awaken us from the slumber of Ignorance, the one who held the mountain high, the one who is the Lord of the three worlds, the one who is an absolute pretender who moved about in Gokula and the one who is therefuge of the hapless.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jago Jago Jago Shankara
Jago Jago Jago Sayeeshwara |Jago Jago...|
Haalaahala Dhara Hey Paramesha
Hey Tripurari Jaya Partheesha
Gangadhara Shankara
Gowri Vara Shankara
Hara Gangadhara Shankara
Sayeeshwara Shankara (Sathya)
Devotional Song Meaning: Awake us to the inner reality Oh bestower of Auspiciousness, the supreme Lord who has held the vicious poison in His throat. Shankara is theone who holds the sacred Ganges in His matted locks, consort of Mother Gowri, is the same Sayeeshwara who dwellsin Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jago Jago Ma Shankari Ma
Shankari Ma Abhayankari Ma |Jago Jago...|
Mata Maheshwari Parvathi Ma
Devi Daya Karo Shiva Ramana
Janani Triloka Palini
Jai Jai Bhavani Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother Shankari, wake us up to the reality of the soul, the one who assures total protection. Victory be to you Maheshwari, Bhavani, Janani, the delight of Lord Shiva and sustainer of the three worlds.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Durge Durgati Pariharini
Jai Jai Durge Jaya Bhava Bhaya harini
Jaya Durge Janani Jaya Sai Janani
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Roopini
Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani
Devotional Song Meaning: Hail Mother Durga for she absolves the misfortunes of Her devotees, releases one from the birth and death cycle. Victory be to Mother Sai who is the very manifestation of the Cardinal Values of Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Ganaraya Sri Ganaraya
Jai Ganaraya Sri Ganaraya Mangala Murthy Moriya
Siddhi Vinayaka Mangala Daata
Ashta Vinayaka Mangala Dayaka Mangala Murthy Moriya
Sindhura Vadana Pankaja Charana
Sindhura Vadana Pankaja Charana Ganapathi Bappa Moriya
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory be to the leader of troops (Shiva's army), who confers and is also the personification of Auspiciousness. Salutations to the eight different forms of the One without a leader, with the vermillion on His face and Lotus feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Ganesha Jai Ganesha
Tu Hi Sab Ka Bhagya Vidhata
Tu Hi Riddhi Siddhi Daata
Tera Poojan Prathama Hamesha
Jai Ganesha Jai Ganesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha, who confers prosperity to all and who bestows intelligence. Victory to Lord Ganesha, who is always worshipped first.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Ganesha Paahi Maam Sri Ganesha Raksha Maam
Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesha Raksha Maam
Lambodhara Gowri Sutha Jai Ganesha Paahi Maam
Mangala Kara Sankata Hara Jai Ganesha Raksha Maam |Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh|
Devotional Song Meaning: Save me Lord Ganesh, the One with a big belly and the son of Mother Gowri. Protect me OhLord Ganesh for you destroy the plighted condition of your devotees and confer prosperity and Auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Ganesha Vighna Vinashaka
Dukha Bhanjana Shubha Dayaka
Hey Adi Poojya Gajanana
Gajanana Shubhanana
Lambodhara Paapa Nikhandana
Vighneshwara Bhava Dukha Nashana
Dukha Bhanjana Shubha Dayaka (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the One who removes obstacles, destroyer of sorrows and the One who grants prosperity. The Elephant faced Lord who is offered the first Prayers, has a big belly and roots out oursins.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Hari Bol Jai Sita Ram Gopi Gopala Bhajo Radhey Shyam
Harey Ram Ram Ram Ghana Shyam Shyam Shyam
Sri Raghu Nandana Sri Rama Dasharathey Jaya Raghu Rama
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora Brindavana Govinda Lala |Harey Ram Ram|
Devotional Song Meaning: Victoryto Hari, Gopala, Sitaram, Radheyshyam. Lord Rama belongs to the Raghu dynasty and isthe dear son of King Dasharatha. Lord Krishna is the dear son of Nanda, He is the One who stole butter from houses of Gopis and moved about amongst the thick bushes of Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Hari Krishna Jai Hari Krishna Govardhana Giridhari
Radha Mohana Radha Jeevana
Manjula Kunja Vihari
Devotional Song Meaning: Praises be to the Lord Krishna who raised the Govardhana Hill on His little finger, consort and the very life of Radha, who moved about in the beautiful thickly grown bushes of Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Hari Vittala Sai Sri Hari Vittala
Govinda Gopala Radhey Jai Hari Vittala
Baba Vittala Parthi Sai Vittala |Govinda Gopala|
Savari Vittala Sathya Sai Vittala |Govinda Gopala|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Vittala, Hari, Govinda, Radhey, Gopala who is none else than our dear Sathya Sai Vittala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jagadeesha Harey Prabhuvara
Hara Hara Shambho Jagadeka Vibho |Jai Jagadeesha...|
Chandrashekara Kailasadhipathey
Bhaava Gochara Bhavani Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of the Sovereign Lord of the Universe, Shiva, One of Benevolence. Shankara bears the crescent moon on His head, is the Lord of Mount Kailasa, imperceptible to the senses and the consort of Mother Bhavani.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Bhavani Durga Mangala Pradayini
Bhakthi Mukti Dayini Phanindra Mani Bhooshani |Jai Jai|
Kaali Mahakaali Jai Jai Shiva Shakthi Jai (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to Mother Bhavani, bestower of Auspiciousness, Devotion and Liberation, adorned with precious Gems. Victory to the One who is personification of Shiva and Shakthi and Mahakaali.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Bhavani Ma Ambey Bhavani Ma
Ambey Bhavani Ma Sai Bhavani Ma |Jai Jai Bhavani...|
Shirdi Bhavani Ma Parthi Nivasi Ma
Hrudaya Nivasi Ma Ambey (Sai) Bhavani Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Mother Ambey Bhavani, the indweller of the Heart, who dwellsin Shirdi and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Durge Jai Bhavani
Sambhavi Shankari Jai Bhavani
Jaya Jagadambey Jaya Mangalyey |Sambhavi|
Jaya Jagat Janani Maha Kaalikey |Sambhavi|
Devotional Song Meaning: Praises be to Mother and Goddess Durga, Bhavani, the origin of Auspiciousness, consort of Shankara and who is also adored as Maha Kaali.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Gopala
Sai Gopala Radhey Gopala |Jai Jai...|
Hey Nandalala Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Brindavana Sanchara |Sai Gopala...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Gopala whose consort is Radha, son of Nanda, endearing to the Gopis and who moved about in Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Guru Deva Sri Sai Mahadeva (3)
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Sai Mahadeva
Mata Pitha Guru Deva Sri Sai Mahadeva
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the revered preceptor Mahadeva, who is the embodiment of Mother, Father, Preceptor and the Trinity Brahma, Vishnu and Maheshwara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Hanuman Jaya Hanuman (2)
Maruti Raya Jaya Hanuman
Mahanubhava Jaya Hanuman
Vayu Kumara Jaya Hanuman
Vanara Veera Jaya Hanuman
Anjana Putra Jaya Hanuman
Ati Balavanta Jaya Hanuman
Sri Rama (Bhaktha) Dootha Jaya Hanuman
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Hanuman the son of Maruti and Anjana devi, the Onewhohas the authority and wisdom. Hanuman is one of extraordinary strength, monkey warrior, messenger and devotee of Sri Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Devi Jagadamba
Sankata Harini Mangala Karini |Jai Jai...|
Gnana Shakthi Vignanamayi
Premamayi Kalyanamayi
Shubha Dey Mata Devi Jagadamba
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to Universal Mother, destroyer of sorrows and promoter of the well being of her devotees. Confer your grace upon us Oh Mother the personification of Integrated awareness, Supreme wisdom, Supreme Love and Auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Devi Jagadamba
Sankata Harini Mangala Karini |Jai Jai...|
Gnana Shakthi Vignanamayi
Premamayi Kalyanamayi
Shubha Dey Mata Devi Jagadamba
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to Universal Mother, destroyer of sorrows and promoter of the well being of her devotees. Confer your grace upon us Oh Mother the personification of Integrated awareness, Supreme wisdom, Supreme Love and Auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Gananayaka Jai Jai Vighna Vinashaka
Jaya Shubha Mangala Dayaka Vidya Buddhi Pradayaka
Gajavadana Gowri Nandana (2)
Gangadhara Shiva Shambho Nandana
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us sing the Glory of the leader of Ganas (Shiva's army) and the destroyer of all obstacles in the path of spiritual practices. Sing the Glory of the bestower of all that is auspicious, Intelligence and Knowledge. The Elephant headed Lord is the son of Gowri and Shiva otherwise known as Gangadhara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Hey Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Shubhanana |Jai Jai...|
Neelakanta Sutha Gajanana
Nithya Shubhanga Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: The Elephant faced Lord is the son of Parvathi and the Blue throated Shiva and confers Grace on His devotees continuously.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Jai Ganapathi Deva (3)
Mata Parvathi Pitha Mahadeva (2) |Jai Jai...|
Gajanana Gajanana
Gajanana Hey Ganapathi Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the Elephant faced Lord of Ganas (Shiva's tribe) whose Mother is Parvathi and Father Mahadeva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Mana Mohana Jai Jai Jai Madhusudhana
Madhava Keshava
Gopala Gopalana
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the various names of the Lord Gopala, Mana Mohana, Madhusudhana, Madhava and Keshava.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana |Jai Jai...|
Mukunda Madhava Narayana
Sri Krishna Govinda Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Narayana has incarnated as Krishna and is known by various names such as Govinda, Gopala, Mukunda, Madhava and Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Vijayee Bhava
Jai Jai Jai Partheeshwara
Jaya Jaya Shiva Shaktheeshwara
Jai Jai Jai Vaidheeshwara
Jaya Jaya Haalaahala Dhara
Jai Jai Jai Vijayee Bhava (3)
Vijayee Bhava
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Lord of Parthi, the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi, to the One who holds poison in His throat (symbol of sacrifice), is also known as Vaidheeswara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Yadu Vamshadulari
Leela Lalita Manohara Pyaari |Jai Jai|
Bhuvana Mohana Prabhu Sant Sahayaka
Gaavata Veda Puran Pukari
Nanda Ke Lal Yashoda Ke Bal
Gopi Gopal Bala Jaya Vraja Lal
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing in Praise of dear one of Yadu lineage, whose acrobats are lovely and enticing. Saints and Sages have sung in adoration of the Lord, who is the dear child of Nanda and Yashodaand the one whose name ischanted by the pandits whochant the Vedas and scriptures.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani Ambey Bhavani Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Sai Bhavani Ma (Sathya)
Simha Vahini Trishoola Dharini Ambey Bhavani Ma
Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani Parthi Nivasini Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma |Sai Bhavani|
Devotional Song Meaning: Hail the Mother Amba Bhavani who has the Lion as Her vehicle, who holds the Trident in Her hands is the Sathya Sai Bhavani who dwellsin Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani Parthi Nivasini
Tribhuvana Sundari Alakh Niranjani
Jai Jai Janani Jai Shiva Ranjani
Sundari Guna Manjari Karunakari Gowri
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to the Mother who is most beautiful in all the three worlds, blemishless andwhois a cause of delight to Shiva. Mother Gowri is ever compassionate and the storehouse of sacred attributes.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Prabhu Giridhari Natawara Nandalala
Natawara Nandalala Hey Giridhara Gopala (Hey)
Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing in praise of Gopala, the One who had lifted the mountain to save His tribesmen, the absolutely playful son of Nanda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari
Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari (2)
Jai Jai Ram Sai Hari |Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai.|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divinenames of Rama, Krishna, Hari and Sai repeatedly. Victory be to them.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Jai Jai Rama Krishna Hari (7 times)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine names of Rama, Krishna and Hari incessantly.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Sai Ma Jaya Sai Saraswathi Ma
Veena Vadini Ma Vidya Daayini Ma |Jai Jai...|
Mukti Pradayini Ma Shakthi Pradayini Ma |Veena Vadini|
Devotional Song Meaning: Mother Sai is Mother Saraswathi Herself, one who bestows Knowledge and the One who plays on the Veena (stringed instrument). Mother Saraswathi gives strength and grants Liberation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Sri Ram Sai Harey Ram
Jai Jai Sri Ram Neela Gagana Shyam |Jai Jai|
Raghu Nandana Bhava Bhanjana Jai Jai Sri Ram
Rajeeva Dala Lochana Jai Jai Sri Ram
Raghuveera Ranadheera Jai Jai Sri Ram
Parthi Puri Raghava Jai Jai Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama who has Lotus eyes, the one who has the complexion of thick blue clouds, the one who belongs to the Raghu clan and destroys the miseries of devotees. Lord Rama is valiant warrior on the battlefield, is presently Sai Ram residing at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Jai Jai Vaishnavi Devi Ma Jai Jai Vaishnavi Devi Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma Sai Ma Jai Jai Ma Jai Jai Ma Jai Jai Ma Sai Ma |Jai Jai Vaishnavi...| Sherawali Ma Jyothawali Ma Pahadawali Ma Jai Jagat Janani Sai Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma Sai Ma |Jai Jai Ma...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to Mother Vaishnov Devi and Victory be to Her, the One of dazzling Light, who has Lion as Her Vehicle. Victory to Her who dwells among the mountain ranges and who is the Mother of the Entire Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Jai Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Pundarika Varada Panduranga Vittala
Jai Jai Vittala Panduranga Vittala |Pundarika|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing in Praise of Lord Vittala, standing on a brick. Glory be to Panduranga Vittala who blessed His devotee Pundarika.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Jai Sai Ram Jai Jai Ram (Bolo) (2)
Anatha Rakshaka Sai Ram
Apad Bandhava Sai Ram
Prema Swaroopa Sai Ram
Premavatara Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glories of Sai Ram who protects those who have nobody to turn to and who is a real friend in times of trouble. Sai Ram is the very personification and Incarnation of Supreme Love.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Jai Sai Ram Jai Jai Ram (Bolo) (2)
Anatha Rakshaka Sai Ram
Apad Bandhava Sai Ram
Prema Swaroopa Sai Ram
Premavatara Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glories of Sai Ram who protects those who have nobody to turn to and who is a real friend in times of trouble. Sai Ram is the very personification and Incarnation of Supreme Love.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jai Santoshi Ma Jai Jai Sai Ma (3)
Mangala Karini Ma Sai Sankata Harini Ma
Triloka Palini Ma Sai Trishoola Dharini Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to Mother Santoshi, who removes misfortune of Her devotees and promotes their welfare. She holds the mighty Trident in Her hand and sustains the three worlds.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Janaki Jeevana Raghava
Radhika Jeevana Keshava
Treta Yugadhi Sita Apaharanadhi
Ravana Mardhana Raghava
Dwaparadhi Hari Dharmapaksha Prati
Kaurava Nashana Keshava O Leela Madhava Keshava
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Raghava is the life force of Mother Janaki, vanquished Ravana who abducted Mother Sita during the Treta Era. Lord Keshava is the life force of Radhika, rooted out the Kaurava race and installed Righteousness during the Dwapara Era.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Janaki Jeevana Rama Raghuvara
Jaya Bhuvaneshwara Raghava Sundara |Janaki Jeevana|
Ravikula Mandana Asurani Khandana
Alakh Niranjan Rama |Jaya Bhuvaneshwara..|
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Rama belongs to the Raghu clan, who is the heart throb of Mother Janaki, who is the Lord of the Earth and ever Handsome. Rama whois the descendant of the Solar dynasty, rooted out the demonic forces to protect the devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Janani Jagat Janani
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jagat Janani
Jagadodharini Sai Ma
Bhava Bhaya Harini Bharati Ma
Janani Jagat Janani
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jagat Janani
Jagat Janani
Devotional Song Meaning: Praises be to Mother of the Universe. Mother Sai sustains and nourishes the Universe, removes the fear of successive births.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Janani Jagat Janani
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jagat Janani
Jagadodharini Sai Ma
Bhava Bhaya Harini Bharati Ma
Janani Jagat Janani
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jagat Janani
Jagat Janani
Devotional Song Meaning: Praises be to Mother of the Universe. Mother Sai sustains and nourishes the Universe, removes the fear of successive births.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Janani Janani Ma Shankari Durgati Nashini Ma
Mata Uma Sai Ma
Janani Janani Ma
Dashabhujadharini Bhairavi Ma
Paapa Vinashini Parvathi Ma
Jaya Bhuvaneshwari Jaya Partheeshwari
Jagadodharini Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Extol the Glories of Mother Uma, the origin of Auspiciousness and destroyer of misfortune. She is known as Bhairavi, when she bears ten Hands, negates the effects of sin and the Mother of Humanity, who dwellsin Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Janani Janani Sathya Sai Shubha Janani
Jagat Karini Paripoorani Sayeeshwari Janani
Sathya Swaroopini Janani
Dharma Samvardhini Janani
Shantha Swaroopini Janani
Prema Pradayini Janani (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us Sing the glory of Mother Sathya Sai, who is Perfect by Herself and the originator of the Universe, also known as Sayeeshwari. She is the Originator of all the Cardinal Values of human beings.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Janani Krupa Karo Ambey
Sai Janani Jaya Jagadambey
Janani Janani Janani Janani |Janani Krupa...|
Mata Maheshwari Mangala Karini Ambey
Mangala Karini Tripureshwari Jagadambey
Abhaya Dayini Amrutha Bhaashini Ambey
Sai Janani Jaya Jagadambey |Janani Janani|
Devotional Song Meaning: Shower your choicest blessings on us Oh Mother Amba. You are the Sovereign Mother of the three worlds, who blesses all with good fortune. Oh Mother Sai you are the One of nectarine words and grants freedom from fear.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Janani Ma Sai Janani Ma (3)
Prema Vahini Ma Gnana Vahini Ma
Dharma Vahini Ma Dhyana Vahini Ma
Prashanthi Vahini Chira Sukha Dayini
Jaya Jaya Sai Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother Sai, You are verily the free flowing rivers of Love, Wisdom, Righteousness, Meditation and Supreme Peace reaching out to the far corners of the world and conferring long lasting Happiness on Everyone. Glory to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Janani Sai Devi Dayamayi
Janani Ma Krupalini Ma
Tum Ho Prema Swaroopini Ma
Daya Karo Sathya Sai Ma
Janani Prema Dayini Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother Sathya Sai You are theOne of compassion and personification of Love. Shower your Grace on us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Janardhana Jagannatha
Jaya Jaya Deva Jagadeesha
Sadguru Brahma Sanathana
Sadashiva Sai Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Lord of the Universe and loved by people. You are our sacred Preceptor who is Eternal. You are Shiva as well as Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Janardhana Nanda Bala Govinda Gopala
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna
Krishna (Sai) Krishna Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the Names of the Lord Govinda, Gopala, Krishna and Sai. You are the son of Nanda and the One who induces people to do good actions.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Bajrang Jaya Balabheem Jaya Hanuman Jaya Bolo (2)
Jaya Bajrang Jai Jai Jaya Balabheem Jai Jai Jaya Hanuman Jaya Bolo (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Praises of Bajrang, Balabheem and Hanuman. Victory be to them.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Bolo Jaya Nandalala
Jaya Bolo Jaya Murali Gopala |Jaya Bolo...|
Nanda Kishora Shyama Gopala
Murali lola Munijana Pala
Dwarakanatha Deena Dayala
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the son of Nanda, the one who plays the Flute, the one who is dark complexioned, the one who is the Lord of Dwaraka, the one who encourages saints and sages and source of succour to the helpless.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Deva Jaya Deva Jaya Guru Deva
Jaya Sai Deva
Satchidananda Sai Guru Deva
Parabrahma Paramananda
Guru Nanak Guru Govinda
Atma Swaroopa Sai Guru Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing praises of the Sacred preceptor, who is the Embodiment of Truth, Awareness and Bliss, who was born as Guru Nanak and personification of the Higher Self.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Devi Deena Dayamayi
Jagat Janani Durga Bhavani |Jaya Devi...|
Jai Jai Sai Sangeeta Vinodini
Janani (San)Geeta Vinodini |Jai Jai Sai Sangeeta|
Jaya Partheeshwari Jaya Bhuvaneshwari
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Durga Bhavani who is the Mother of the Universe, compassionate towards the needy. Glory be to Mother Partheeshwari who is the Sovereign Mother who revels in soulful and classical Music.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Devi Durge Gowri Shankari Parvathi
Bhuvana Mohini Lalita Lakshmi Kalavathi |Jaya Devi...|
Kamala Kamini Hari Narayani Bhagawathi
Veda Mata Vidya Dayini Bharati
Hamsa Vahini Veena Paani Saraswathi
Devotional Song Meaning: Mother Gowri is also known as Shankari and Parvathi and Bhagawathi. She is Lakshmi the Goddess of wealth, also known as Kamala and Narayani. She is also Mother Saraswathi the Goddess of Knowledgeand Mother of Vedas too. She holds the Veena and has the Swan as her Vehicle, is also known as Bharati.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Gananayaka Bala Gajanana
Hey Shiva Nandana Paahi Gajanana |Jaya Gananayaka...|
Prathama Poojya Sri Natha Gajanana
Mooshika Vahana Hey Shubhanana
Yuga Yuga Vanditha Paahi Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect us Oh Lord Gajanana, the son of Lord Shiva. Riding on the Mouse, you are the auspicious one whom the Universe worships and you have been worshipped for eons.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Ganesha Gajanana Daya Nidhey
Mangala Dayaka Siddhi Vinayaka
Lambodhara Gajavadana Manohara
Parvathi Nandana Siddhi Vinayaka
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Elephant faced Lord, compassion personified, who grants auspiciouness and Occult powers. Lord Ganesha has an enormous belly, son of Parvathi and is also known as Vinayaka (the remover of obstacles).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Ganesha Jaya Mangala Daata
Vande Saraswathi Sai Mata |Jaya Ganesha|
Mooshika Vahana Sri Gananatha
Vighna Vinashaka Bhagya Vidhata
Vande Saraswathi Sai Mata
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha who confers prosperity and welfare, the one who has a Mouse as His Vehicle, the one who is the leader of Shiva's army of Ganas and destroys impediments. Salutations to Mother Saraswathi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Gopala Jaya Gopala
Jaya Radhey Govinda Gopala |Jaya Gopala...|
Chinmayananda Hey Sai Gopala
Nithyananda Roopa Sai Gopala |Jaya Radhey|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, the consort of Radha and Sai Gopala who is ever in the Bliss of Pure Consciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Govardhana Dhari Gopala
Radha Hrudaya Vihari Gopala |Jaya Govardhana|
Janam Maran Bhaya Haari Gopala
Meera Prabhu Giridhari Gopala
Parthi Vihari Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Gopala (Krishna) also known by names like, Giridhari, Keshava, Madhava, Mukunda, you are the in dweller of our hearts, Oh Loving Lord holding the Flute give me your vision Oh Lord Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Govinda Jaya Gopala
Hey Parameshwara Harey Mukunda |Jaya Govinda...|
Shirdipureeshwara Sayeeshwara
Parthi Nivasa Parameshwara
Parama Pavitra Sayeeshwara
Prema Swaroopa Sayeeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Sayeeshwara is the Ever sublime, embodiment of Love. He is also the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi. He is the Supreme Lord Govinda, Gopala and Mukunda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Govinda Jaya Gopala
Hey Parameshwara Harey Mukunda |Jaya Govinda...|
Shirdipureeshwara Sayeeshwara
Parthi Nivasa Parameshwara
Parama Pavitra Sayeeshwara
Prema Swaroopa Sayeeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Sayeeshwara is the Ever sublime, embodiment of Love. He is also the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi. He is the Supreme Lord Govinda, Gopala and Mukunda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Gowri Vara Sugunalaya
Jaya Jagadeeshwara Niramaya |Jaya Gowri...|
Jaya Partheeshwara Premalaya (2)
Karunalaya Sathya Dharmalaya
Prashanthi Nilaya Dayamaya
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lord of the Universe, the beloved of Mother Gowri is a paragon of virtues, blemishless, one of compassion, embodiment of Truth and Righteousness has Prashanthi Nilayam as His Abode.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Deva Prabhu Sai Deva
Devadi Deva Pranamamyaham
Shiva Shiva Shambho Kailasa Pathey
Parthi Pureeshwara Paalaya Maam |Devadi Deva|
Devotional Song Meaning: Our Salutations to the Preceptor and Lord of Lords Sai Deva. Protect me Oh Shiva, the originator of Auspiciousness, Lord of Mount Kailasa and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Govinda Sadguru Govinda
Madhava Govinda Paahi Maam
Deena Dayala Baba Deena Natha
Parama Dayala Hari Prashanthi Vasa
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect us Oh Sacred Preceptor, You are Madhava and Govinda as well. Our Salutations to Baba, the Sacred preceptor Sai who is the refuge of the forlorn and extremely merciful.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Jaya Guru Sai Ram
Jagat Guru Sathya Sai Ram |Jaya Guru...|
Brahma Vishnu Shiva Sai Ram
Parabrahma Roopa Sai Ram
Mata Pitha Guru Sai Ram |Jagat Guru|
Devotional Song Meaning: Prostrations to Sathya Sai Rama, the Universal Guru. He isthe Mother, Father, Preceptor as well as Creator, Sustainer, Destroyer and personification of Absolute Godhead.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Natha Shiva Guru Natha
Parthi Pureesha Harey Paramesha |Jaya Guru Natha...|
Parama Dayala Paahi Mahesha
Jaya Jaya Sathya Sayeesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the venerable Preceptor Sathya Sai, who is the Sovereign Lord, the one who is extremely compassionate and the onewho dwells in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Omkaara Jaya Guru Omkaara
Sadguru Deva Sai Mahadeva |Jaya Guru|
Sathya Swaroopa Sai Mahadeva
Dharma Bodhaka Sai Guru Deva
Shantha Swaroopa Prema Swaroopa (Pra) |Sadguru Deva|
Devotional Song Meaning: Prostrations to the venerable preceptor Sai Mahadeva, the very form of the Primordial sound Om. Sai Guru deva is the direct manifestation of Truth, Peace and Supreme Love and preacher of Righteousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Omkaara Jaya Jaya Sadguru Omkaara Om
Brahma Vishnu Sadashiva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Devotional Song Meaning: Venerable salutations to our Preceptor who is the form of Primordial sound Om and Creator, protector and destroyer. He is also Mahadeva and Sadashiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Shankara Girija Ramana
Jaya Jaya Mangala Divya Charana |Jaya Guru...|
Jaya Muni Vanditha Nagabharana
Jaya Sarveshwara (Sayeeshwara) Saroja Nayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the beloved of Mother Girija whose Divine feet confers all that is auspicious, who adorns snakes on His body and meditated upon by the Sages and who is noneother than the lotus eyed Sayeeshwara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Hari Govinda Jaya Hari Gopala
Madhava Mohana Mayura Mukutadhara
Giridhara Gopala |Jaya Hari...|
Surdasa Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Sri Hari Jaya Hari Sai Giridhari
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the Glory of Govinda, Gopala, Madhava, Hari, the One who has the peacock feather on His Head, who lifted Govardhana Mountain on His finger and theone who is the dear Lord of Surdas.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Hari Govinda Radhey Gopala
Madhura Madhura Muralidhara |Jaya Hari...|
Brinda Vihari Krishna Murari
Meera Ke Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Radha Madhava Damodara
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Govinda, Gopala, Madhava, Damodara, playing lilting tunes on His Flute. Sing the Glory ofthe Dearest Lord of Radha and Meera whomoved about in Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Hey Shankara Jaya Hey
Pavana Para Shiva Jaya Hey |Jaya Hey Shankara...|
Atmodharaka Ananda Dayaka
Adi Mahadeva Jaya Hey |Pavana Para|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Shankara, Victory be to you. You are Purity personified. You are the one whocauses emancipation of souls and confers Bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Gopalana
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Narayana
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Janardhana
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Niranjana
Devotional Song Meaning: Praise the Lord whofosters cowherds, the one who is present in man, victory to the one who uplifts humanity and the one who is faultless and pure.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Lingeshwara
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Sayeeshwara
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Mruthyunjaya
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Sayeeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory be to Sayeeshwara, who is in the Form of a Linga (denotes without beginning or end) and the One who has conquered Death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Mooshika Vahana
Hey Shiva Nandana Prathama Vandana
Parvathi Tanaya Siddhi Vinayaka
Sharanam Sharanam Vighna Haranam |Hey Shiva Nandana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the son of Shiva and Parvathi who moves on a mouse and the one who is offered the first prayers. Let us surrender to the one who removes obstacles and grantsus spiritual powers.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Ho Nataraj (2)
Gangadhara Shambho Hey Nataraj |Jaya Ho...|
Phaala Lochana Paahi Murari
Haalaahala Dhara Hey Tripurari
Jaya Ho Nataraj
Jaya Ho Nataraj (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Lord of dance, who holds Mother Ganges in his matted locks, the one whohas the third eye of wisdom. Protect meOh Lord who destroyed the three cities created by the demons and holds the poison in His throat.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Ho Sai Ram Jaya Ho Sai Ram
Karuna Sindhu Ram Sai Parthi Pureeshwara Ram |Jaya Ho Sai Ram...|
Treta Yug Mey Ram Sai Dwapara Yug Mey Shyam
Ram Tum Hi Rehman Sai Sab Ka Hey Bhagawan
Kali Yug Ke Avatar Sai Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Sai Ram who is an ocean of compassion and Lord of Parthi. He had incarnated as Lord Ram in the Treta age and Shyam in the Dwapara age, has come down as Sai in this Kali age. Oh Lord! You are worshipped by people of all faiths

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jagadambey Gowri Mata
Gowri Mata Sai Mata |Jaya Jagadambey ...|
Kala Vinashini Jagadodharini
Parthi Nivasini Sai Mata
Devotional Song Meaning: Hail Gowri the Universal Mother, who swallows time and resurrects the world is presently Sai Mata who dwellsin Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Govinda Harey
Nithyananda Brahmananda Jaya Gopala Harey
Arunachala Shiva Om Trishoola Dhari Shiva Om
Hari Narayana Om Sai Narayana Om
Jaya Devi Bharati Vidya Dayini Annapoorna Mata Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the Lord of the Universe, Govinda, Gopala who is the personification of Eternal Bliss. He is Lord Shiva who holds the Trident and has made the Mountains of Arunachala as His Abode. Lord Sai is the embodiment of Narayana, Mother Bharati who gives Knowledge and Mother Annapoorna who provides food for everyone.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Murare
Jaya Jagannatha Janardhana |Jaya Jagadeesha...|
Jaya Vanamaali Jaya Giridhari
Jaya Jaya Sri Hari Sai Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Lord of the Universe who is the inner motivator of all, wears a garland ofjungle flowers and annihilated demon Mura.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jagadeesha Jaya Paramesha
Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Jaya Sai Harey
Keshava Roopa Sai Shareera Jaya Jagadeesha Harey
Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Jaya Sai Harey (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Sovereign Lord and Lord of the Universe Esha (Shiva) who Himself is Keshava and Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jagadeesha Jaya Paramesha
Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Jaya Sai Harey
Keshava Roopa Sai Shareera Jaya Jagadeesha Harey
Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Jaya Sai Harey (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Sovereign Lord and Lord of the Universe Esha (Shiva) who Himself is Keshava and Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jagadeeshwara Paahi Maam Dehi Maam
Anga Vibhuti Harey Shiva Shankara
Amaradheeshwara Hara Hara Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect me Oh Lord of the Universe, Shankara, who has smeared Vibhuti (Sacred ash) on His Body and who is the Lord of the immortals.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Jagadambey
Mata Bhavani Mata Ambey
Jai Jai Jai Jai Jai (Mata) Jagadambey |Jaya Jagat...|
Vaishnavi Mata Mata Ambey
Mata Ambey (3) |Vaishnavi Mata |
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Mother of the Universe Ambey who is also known as Vaishnavi Devi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Jagadeeshwari
Parthi Puri Parameshwari
Anantha Koti Brahmanda Nayaki
Dasha Maha Vidya Veda Vilasini
Mukti Pradayini Bhava Bhaya Haarini
Sathya Sai Bhuvaneshwari
Devotional Song Meaning: Hail the Universal Sovereign Mother Sathya Sai Bhuvaneshwari, who dwells in Parthi, Goddess of innumerable Galaxies that exist, an Exponent of all Ten Texts (4 Vedas and the 6 Scriptures), confers Liberation and negates the vicious cycle of Birth and Death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Jagat palini
Sai Bhavani Ma (Sathya)
Paapa Vinashini Parthi Nivasini
Suramuni Vandini Ma (3) |Sai Bhavani Ma|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the Mother Sai Bhavani, who is ever compassionate, the one who destroys Sins, One who dwellsin Parthi and worshipped by divine sages.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Sai Shiva Shankari Sai Parameshwari
Ambey Bhavani Ma (Jagad)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Mother Sai, the One who confers all that is Auspicious, Supreme, the one who is also known as Amba Bhavani.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Ma Devi Sai Ma Sathya Sai Ma
Shiva Shakthi Roopini Ma Sai Ma
Tribhuvana Palini Ma Sai Ma |Shiva Shakthi|
Moksha Pradayini Ma Janani Sai Ma Sathya Sai Ma
Janani Ma (Sai) Janani Ma (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the Mother of Universe Sathya Sai, who is the Personification of Lord Shiva and Shakthi, who sustains the Three worlds and confers Liberation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Ma Jaya Ma
Ma Jaya Ma |Jaya Jagat|
Jagadodharini Ma Jaya Ma
Hey Shiva Shankari Hey Parameshwari
Sai Bhavani Ma Jaya Ma |Jagadodharini Ma|
Devotional Song Meaning: Hail the Mother Sathya Sai, the Motherwho sustains the Entire Universe, who is Supreme, also known as Sai Bhavani, Shiva Shankari and Parameshwari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Mata
Parthi Nivasini Trishoola Dharini |Jaya Jagat...|
Shwetambarini Ambey Bhavani
Shakthi Roopa Durga Mata (2) |Parthi Nivasini|
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Mother of the Universe, who holds the Trident, dwellsin Parthi. She is dressed in white as Saraswathi also known as Ambey, Bhavani, Durga and the personification of Energy.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Jaya Jagat Janani Sayeeshwari  Jaya Jagat Janani Sarveshwari  Veena Pusthaka Dharini Janani  Jaya Jaya Hey Madhusudhani  Omkaara Roopini Hreemkara Roopini  Sreemkara Roopini Janani  Omkaara Roopini Janani  Janani Janani Janani
Devotional Song Meaning: Sayeeshwari is Goddess of Learning who holds the Veena (stringed instrument) and the books. She is worshipped as he Goddess of wealth and beloved of Lord Madhusudhana and the Goddess of Energy principle. She is also the embodiment of Omkaara, Hreemkara and Sreemkara aspects of the Primordial sound Om.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Ananda Amrutha Varshini
Parthi Nivasini Paalaya Maam
Jaya Jaya Hey Himadri Suthey
Paalaya Maam Amba Rakshaya Maam
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect me Oh the dweller at Parthi who confers Grace and Bliss in a downpour. Confer your Grace Oh Amba the daughter of Himalaya mountain.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Ananda Amruthavarshini
Raja Rajeshwari Rakshaya Maam
Durga Saraswathi Lakshmi Narayani
Brahma Sanathani Paalaya Maam
Parthi Nivasini Rakshaya Maam
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of the One who sheds Love in the form of a downpour. Protect me the Queen of Goddesses. You are the incarnation of the three energy principles, the Eternal and the one who dwells in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Deva Jagadeesha Deva
Daya Sagara Sai Deva |Jaya Jaya Deva|
Neeraja Nayana Ksheerabdhi Shayana
Neela Megha Shyama
Saama Gaana Priya Sarva Dharma Priya Sathya Sai Mahadeva
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai Deva you are the ocean of compassion. Oh Sai, You are the One having Lotus eyes, whose abode is that of the Ocean, the onewhose complexion is deep blue. Sai Mahadeva Loves the music of Veda and loves all religions equally.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Devi Ambey Bhavani
Durga Saraswathi Lakshmi Narayani |Jaya Jaya Devi...|
Abhaya Pradayini Tribhuvana Dharini
Parthi Nivasini Sai Janani
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Mother Amba Bhavani the personification of Durga, Lakshmi and Saraswathi and Narayani. She is verily Mother Sai, who dwellsin Parthi, confers freedom from fear and the One who bears the three worlds.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Devi Girija Mata
Jaya Jagadambey Pranava Swaroopini
Ashtabhujankita Akhila Dharini
Jaya Yogeshwara Hrudaya Nivasini
Devotional Song Meaning: Praises be to the Universal Mother Girija, the embodiment of the Primordial Sound Om. She is the one who has eight arms and the one who bears the universe. She is the one who resides in the heart of Lord Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Gajanana Gananatha
Gowri Nandana Hey Gananatha |Jaya Jaya|
Buddhi Pradayaka Hey Gananatha
Siddhi Vinayaka Hey Gananatha
Jaya Gananatha Sai Gananatha (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Praises of the Elephant faced Lord, Leader of the demigod troops, son of Gowri, who confers Intelligence and spiritual powers.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Gananatha Deva Shambho Kumara
Jaya Jaya Partheesha Prabho Sai Ganesha
Jaya Jaya Hey Adi Deva Deena Sharanya
Jaya Jaya Hey Abhaya Daata Parthi Ganesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the son of Shambho, leader of Shiva's troops and the Lord of Parthi. Glory to the refuge of the Forlorn, the First Lord, who grants protection from fear.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Gangadhara Shankara
Jaya Jaya Gowri Vara Shankara |Jaya Jaya Gangadhara...|
Ardha Shareera Alankruta Girija
Parthi Pureeshwara Pavana Charitha
Palita Bhuvana Aashritha Phalada
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of the One who holds Mother Ganges on His Head, beloved of Mother Gowri. Lord Shiva whose half body is adorned by Mother Girija, the Lord of Parthi, nourishes the world, grants welfare and has a sacred history.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Girija Bala Gajanana
Jaya Shiva Shankara Parvathi Nandana |Jaya Jaya Girija...|
Vighna Vinashaka Vijaya Gajanana
Sharavana Sevitha Sumukha Gajanana
Tava Pada Sharanam Sharanam Gajanana
