Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to theson of Girija otherwise known as Parvathi and Lord Shankara. We surrender at your feet Ohthe Elephant faced Lord you are the onewho removes obstacles in the spiritual Path and served by His brother Sharavana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Govinda Jaya Nandalala
Radha Lola Raasa Vilola
Tribhuvana Paripala Deena Dayala |Jaya Jaya Govinda...|
Surdas Prabhu Karuna Sagara
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Bhaktha Sakha Bhagawan Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Prostrations to Govinda, the son of Nanda, dear to Radha, who did the celestial dance with the Gopis, nurtures the three worlds and compassionate towards the helpless. Gopala is a friend to His devotees and Lord of devotees Surdas and Meera.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Govinda Narayana
Jaya Hari Govinda Narayana |Jaya Jaya|
Mathuradhipathey Mandara Giridhara
Murali Manohara Narayana
Narayana Namo (Sai) Narayana (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Prostrations to Lord Narayana, who incarnated as Govinda who is the Lord of Mathura and the One who lifted the Mandara mountain and played soulful music with His Flute.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Hey Jagadeesha Mahesha
Jaya Jaya Hey Kailasa Vasa |Jaya Jaya Hey Jagadeesha...|
Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva Sai Mahesha
Jaya Hey Shambho Sai Natha
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Anatha Natha
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Universal Lord Mahesha, who dwells at Mountain Kailasa, beloved Lord of Gowri and the navigator of the Orphaned is the same Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Devi Narayani
Janana Marana Bhaya Harini |Jaya Jaya...|
Dukha Vinashini Jagat Paripalini
Jaya Jaya Jaya Devi Jagat Janani
Jagat Janani Shubha Karini
Jaya Jaya Jaya Devi Jagat Janani
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Mother Narayani, who removes the fear of birth and death, destroys sorrow and fosters the world. She is the Goddess of the Universe and confers welfare to all.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha
Jaya Gananatha Sri Gananatha
Heyramba Gananatha Natha
Hey Shiva Nandana Parvathi Nandana
Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha Natha
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us Sing the Glories of the leader of shankara's army, who is the son of Lord Shiva and Parvathi whose other name is Heyramba.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Gajanana
Gajanana Hey Gajavadana |Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey...|
Parvathi Nandana Gajanana
Pashupathi Tanaya Gajanana
Adi Poojya Deva Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the Elephant faced son of Parvathi and Pashupathi, who is offered the First Prayers.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Madhusudhana
Jaya Brindavana Mana Mohana |Jaya Jaya...|
Sundara Sai Shirdi (Parthi) Vihari
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram |Radhey Shyam...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to the One who vanquished the demon Madhu, the charmer who moves about in Brindavan. Praise the One who dwellsin Shirdi and Parthi. Repeat the names of Radhey Shyam and Sairam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Sri Guru Natha
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Sadguru Natha
Sadguru Natha Sadguru Natha
Sathya Swaroopa Shiva Guru Natha
Antaryami Vishwa Vidhata
Mukti Pradatha Sai Guru Natha
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us Sing in praise of our Sacred preceptor Shiva, the embodiment of Truth. Our Preceptor Sai, is the indweller, the Creator of the Universe, who grants Liberation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Sai Natha
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Jagannatha |Jaya Jaya...|
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Shirdi Pureeshwara
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Parthi Pureeshwara
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Sathya Sayeeshwara
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Jagadeeshwara
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Sayeeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to our Universal Lord Sayeeshwara who dwellsin Shirdi and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaga Vandini Ma
Jaya Paramesha Hrudvasini Ma |Jaya Jaya...|
Adi Shakthi Parabrahma Swaroopini
Jagat Janani Chathur Veda Vilasini
Samba Vinodini Mata Bhavani
Sambhavi Shankari Moksha Pradayini
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the One who is adored by the Entire Universe, the indweller and Embodiment of Supreme Energy. Whom the Four Vedas describe, is a delight to Lord Shiva, One who confers Liberation is also known by the names Bhavani, Shankari and Sambhavi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya Ma
Jagat Janani Shubha Karini |(Ma) Jaya Jaya...|
Jagadodharini Sai Ma
Jagat Paripalini Parvathi Ma
Jagat Janani Shubha Karini
Devotional Song Meaning: We offer our obeisances to our Universal Mother who confers all that is Sublime and Auspicious. The Uplifter, the Administrator and the Mother of the Universe that is Parvathi, is also Sai Ma.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ma Jaya Sai Ma
Janana Marana Bhaya Harini Ma |Jaya Jaya...|
Sundara Vadani Suhaasini Ma
Mangala Karini Maheshwari Ma
Mahadeva Mana Mohini Ma
Maya Nashini Sri Sai Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us sing in Glory of Mother Sai, who negates the fear of the cycle of birth and death. The consort of Maheshwara, has a Beautiful smiling countenance, the One who charms Mahadeva and offsets the effects of Illusion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Krishna Yadu Nandana
Jaya Jaya Brindavana Chandana |Jaya Jaya...|
Jaya Jaya Krishna Mana Mohana
Jaya Jaya Sai Gopalana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Krishna who belongs to Yadu lineage, the shining star of Brindavan, the charmer of Mind, who is none other than our Sai Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Mangala Sai Namo
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Namo
Shiva Shaktheeshwara Sai Namo
Sri Shaileshwara Sai Namo
Devotional Song Meaning: Prostrations to Sai, the Lord of Parthi, the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi (Matter and Energy) who also dwells at Shaila Mountains.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Mohana Murali Gopala
Jaya Giridhara Brindavana Pala |Jaya Jaya Mohana...|
Jaya Hey Madhava Ghana Ghana Neela (2)
Jaya Meera Prabhu Radhey Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of the charming Gopala who plays on the Flute, the lad of Brindavan who surprised everyone by lifting the Mountain on His little finger. Sing in Praise of Madhava of the complexion of deep blue clouds and dear Lord ofMeera.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya Janaki Jeevana
Sharanagatha Palana Jaya Jagadodharana |Jaya Jaya...|
Rajeeva Dala Lochana Jaya Jagadanandana
Rajadhi Raja Ramachandra Sai Jaga Vandana
Devotional Song Meaning: Extol the son of Raghu, the very life of Mother Janaki, the sustainer of Universe and protector of those who surrender to Him. The One who is worshipped and source of delight to the Universe, is Emperor Ramachandra.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Raghuvara Sri Rama
Hara Brahmarchitha Prarthitha Rama
Kalathmaka Parameshwara Rama
Janani Janaki Manobhi Rama (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sri Rama belongs to the Raghu dynasty is adored by both Shiva and Brahma (the God of Creation) and Parameshwara Rama who swallows Time and who is thebeloved of Mother Janaki.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Ram Jagadabhi Ram
Deena Bandhu Sai Ram (Hey)
Jai Jai Ram Jaya Ram Sai Ram
Danava Bhanjana Dayamaya
Dayamaya Krupamaya
Alakh Niranjana Asurani Khandana
Deena Bandhu Sai Ram (Hey) |Jai Jai Ram|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing in Praise of Rama, the friend of the afflicted and theLord of the World. Victory to Lord Rama who rooted out demonic forces from the face of the Earth whois blemishless and extremely compassionate.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Megha Shyam
Dasharatha Nandana Danava Bheema
Jagadabhi Ram Janaki Ram
Suramuni Vanditha Sundara Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Rama, the One who is deep Blue in complexion, son of Dasharatha and the uprooter of the Demonic clan. The Beloved of Mother Janaki, the Lord of the world, is worshipped by the divine sages.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Raghu Ram Ravikulabdhi Soma
Sita Ram Sri Raghuram Sathya Sai Bhagawan |Jaya Jaya Ram|
Sita Kantha Ram Jaya Janaki Jeevana Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Rama Scion of the Solar race, is beloved and life of Mother Sita, has come presently in the form of Sathya Sai Bhagawan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Rama Janaki Rama
Raghukula Bhooshana Raja Rama |Jaya Jaya...|
Tapasa Ranjana Taraka Naama
Danava Bhanjana Kodanda Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Praise be to Rama whois the consort of Mother Janaki and the Gem of Raghu dynasty. Chant Rama whose name liberates one from the mundane cycle and is a source of Delight for the Sages and saints, the wielder of the Bow and vanquisher of the demonic race.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Rama Janaki Rama
Raghukula Bhooshana Raja Rama |Jaya Jaya...|
Tapasa Ranjana Taraka Naama
Danava Bhanjana Kodanda Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Praise be to Rama whois the consort of Mother Janaki and the Gem of Raghu dynasty. Chant Rama whose name liberates one from the mundane cycle and is a source of Delight for the Sages and saints, the wielder of the Bow and vanquisher of the demonic race.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Rama Jaya Raghu Rama (3)
Deena Bandho Sathya Sai Ram
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Dayabhi Ram
Pankaja Lochana Nayanabhi Ram
Daya Sagara Karuna Sagara
Deena bandho Sathya Sai Ram
Daya Sagara Sai ram
Karuna Sagara Sai Ram
Prema Sagara Sai Ram
Deena bandho Sathya Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Rama is the friend of the Forlorn, takes care of his devotees, Lotus eyed, Ocean of compassion is also true of Sathya Sai who is Ocean of Supreme Love.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Rama Jaya Raghu Rama Dasharatha Nandana Raja Rama
Abhaya Pradayaka Ananda Dayaka
Tribhuvana Mohana Sita Rama
Danava Bhanjana Deenodharana
Prema Sagara Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Rama was the descendant of the Raghu clan, the son of Dasharatha, who confers Bliss and fearlessness. Rama was the most Handsome of all the three worlds, beloved of Mother Sita, Annihilator of the Demon clan and emancipator of the downtrodden.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Rama Krishna Hari
Sai Rama Krishna Hari |Jaya Jaya...|
Ayodhya Rama Krishna Hari
Dwaraka Krishna Rama Hari
Shirdi Rama Krishna Hari
Parthi Krishna Rama Hari
Sathya Sai Narayana Krishna (Vittala) Hari
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Rama of Ayodhya, Krishna of Dwaraka, Hari, Vittala and Sai of Shirdi and Sathya Sai of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Rama Sita Rama
Bandha Vimochana Jaya Raghurama |Jaya Jaya...|
Ravikula Mandana Atma Rama
Asurani Khandana Kodanda Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Rama beloved of Sita, of Raghu clan who releases One from bondage, the Indweller Rama, the jewel of Solar race, the Bow wielding Rama who wiped out the demonic clan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Sadguru Sai Sadashiva
Hara Hara Shankara Shambho Mahadeva |Jaya Jaya...|
Neelakanta Sai Bhasma Vibhushitha |Hara Hara|
Parthi Pureeshwara Shakthi (Sai) Maheshwara |Hara Hara|
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow down in reverence to to the Sacred Preceptor Sai Sadashiva, One who confers Auspiciousness Mahadeva, the Blue throated, who has smeared Sacred Ash all over His Body and Maheshwara consort of Shakthi, the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Sai Mahesha
Jaya Jaya Gowri Gangadhara
Jaya Jaya Samba Sadashiva
Jaya Jaya Parthi Lingeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Sai Mahesha, Gangadhara consort of Mother Gowri, Sadashiva the consort of Mother Amba and the Lord of Linga whose abode is Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Sai Namo Jaya Shubha Dayi Namo
Jaya Govinda Jaya Gopala Jaya Mahadeva Namo |Jaya Jaya Sai|
Abhaya Pradatha Vishwa Vidhata
Jagadodhara Namo
Jaya Shirdeesha Jaya Partheesha Jaya Paramesha Namo
Devotional Song Meaning: Prostrations to Sai who confers all that is auspicious, to Govinda, Gopala and Mahadeva. Salutations to the One who grants freedom from fear and the Lord of the Universe, Supreme consciousness who is the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Shankara Hara Hara Shankara
Jaya Jaya Shankara Mahadeva
Hara Om Hara Om Hara Om Hara Om
Hara Om Hara Om Sadashiva
Adi Karana Ananda Lola
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Shankara, Mahadeva and Sadashiva. Chant the mantra 'Hara Om', Primary Source of everything and relishes to be in Bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Shankara Jaya Abhayankara
Parvathi Shankara Sri Sai Shankara
Sristi Sthithi Laya Karana Karana
Mruthyunjaya Gananayaka Nayaka
Uma Pathey Shiva Shankara Shankara
Gangadhara Jagadeeshwara Eshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Shankara, who protects One from fear, beloved of Parvathi. Shankara is responsible for creation, sustenance and destruction of the Universe, has won over Death, Lord of Durga and Uma, holds Mother Ganges on His head and who isthe Lord of the Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Shankara Samba Shiva
Tribhuvana Dharaka Maheshwara |Jaya Jaya|
Ganga Dhari Kailasa Vasi
Vibhuti Sundara Parthi Nivasi
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Shankara, Consort of Amba, one who bears Ganges on His head, dwellsin Kailasa, has smeared Holy Ash all over His body and who is the resident of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Shankari Jaya Parameshwari
Jaya Shiva Shankari Ma
Jaya Vishweshwari Jaya Sarveshwari
Vibhuti Sundari Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Puttaparthi Pureeshwari Ma |Vibhuti|
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Mother Shiva Shankari, Goddess of the Universe, who has Vibhuti allover Herself, has presently incarnatedin Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Vani Pranamamyaham
Manjula Bhaashini Veda Vilasini |Jaya Jaya...|
Bhava Bhaya Nashini Abhaya Pradayini
Parthi Nivasini Mukti Pradayini
Devotional Song Meaning: Prostrations to Goddess of Knowledge Vani, Mother of Vedas and of soft speech. She destroys fear of cycle of Births, bestows protection and Liberation, dwells in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Kailasa Pathey Shiva Shankara
Samba Sadashiva Shambho
Partheeshwara Sai Shiva Shambho
Shaileshwara Karunamaya Shankara
Lingodhbhavakara Shiva Shambho
Trishoola Jatadhara Gangadhari
Haalaahala Dhara Shambho
Samba Sadashiva Shambho |Partheeshwara Sai|
Partheeshwara Sai Shiva Shambho (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to the Lord of Kailasa Mountains, Shiva Shankara, who is Shiva and Shakthi. Salutations to the Lord of Shaila mountains, who is full of compassion, the One who creates Lingam (symbol of infinite proportions). Shankara has the Trident and holds Mother Ganges in His matted locks.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Kausalya Nandana Ram Paramananda Ananda Ram
Jaya Shirdeesha Partheesha Ram Prashanthi Sayeesha Ram |Jaya Kausalya...|
Jaya Mangala Pavana Naam Jaya Sundara Vaidehi Ram
Sundara Sayeesha Ram (Jaya)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the son of Kausalya, One of Supreme Bliss, who dwellsin Shirdi and Prashanthi Nilayam in Parthi. The Name 'Ram' is potentially Auspicious and He is the beloved of Mother Vaidehi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Krishna Kunja Vihari
Jaya Radha Hrudaya Vihari
Jaya Yamuna Teera Vihari
Jaya Gopi Ke Hrudaya Vihari
Jaya Madhava Raasa Vihari
Jaya Sai Parthi Vihari
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the One who moves about through thick shrubs, on the banks of Yamuna river, the One who dwells in Radha's and Gopis Hearts and performed the celestial dance with them and Sai who dwellsin Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Krishna Madhusudhana Jaya Radha Mana Mohana
Brindavana Sanchari Govardhana Giridhari
Jaya Parthi Vihari Sai Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the One who vanquished demon Madhu and who charms Radha. Lord Narayana who has come down as Krishna moved about in Brindavan and held aloft the Govardhana mountains, now dwellsin Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Krishna Mukunda Murarey
Jaya Govinda Brinda Vihari |Jaya Krishna...|
Mana Mohana Madhava Shourie
Hara Meera Prabho Giridhari
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Krishna, Mukunda, Govinda, Madhava, Murarey, the One who moves about in Brindavan and entices the Mind, the Valarous, is the Lord of Meera's Devotion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Lambodhara Paahi Maam
Jagadamba Sutha Raksha Maam |Jaya Lambodhara...|
Sharanagatha Raksha Maam
Hey Karuna Nidhey Paahi Maam
Sri Gananatha Samraksha Maam
Nija Bhakthi Mudam Dehimey
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect me Oh son of Universal Mother Amba, with a big belly. Protect me for I have surrendered to You, Oh the ocean of Mercy. Give me true devotion to thee, Oh Lord of Shiva's forces who looks after my welfare.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Ma Anandamayi Janani
Sab Ko Krupa Karo Janani
Bhaktha Janon Ke Mangala Karini
Mangala Karo Janani (Ma)
Tum Ho Prema Dayini (Ma) |Sab Ko Krupa|
Devotional Song Meaning: Bless everyone of us, Oh Mother who is Bliss personified. You confer great boons and Supreme Love for your devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jagan Ma Satya Sai Ma
Jagadodharini Prem Sai Ma |Jaya Ma...|
Sankata Harini Santoshi Ma
Shashwata Ananda Dayini Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Jaya Jagat Janani Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma |Jaya Jagat|
Devotional Song Meaning: Bless everyone Oh Universal Mother and Redeemer of the Universe. You are Mother Santoshi who destroys sorrow and grant permanent Bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Jaya Shirdi Shankari Ma
Jaya Parthi Eshwari Ma
Shiva Shakthi Sai Ma
Jagat Janani Jaya Jaya Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Hail Praises on Mother who is Shankari at Shirdi and Eshwari at Parthi. Victory to the Universal Mother who is Shiva and Shakthi in One.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Daya Karo Sai Ma
Krupa Karo Sai Ma (Sab Ko)
Mukti Pradayini Prema Pradayini Shanthi Pradayini Ma
Janani Ma Janani Jagat Janani Sai Ma
Daya Karo Sai Ma Jaya Ma |(Sab Ko) Krupa|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Mother who confers Love and Peace and grants Liberation. Shower your mercy on us OhMother of the Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jagadeeshwari Sai Ma Jagadeeshwari Maheshwari Sayeeshwari Sai Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jagadeeshwari Sai Ma Jagadeeshwari Maheshwari Sayeeshwari Sai Ma (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Mother Sai who is the Goddess of the Universe, Supreme and known as Mother Sayeeshwari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Jaya Jaya Ma
Prema Sai Ma Ananda Sai Ma
Krupa Sai Ma Tum Hi Daya Sai Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Praises be to Mother Sai who is the very personification of Supreme Love and Bliss, the One of Compassion and Mercy.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Sunaada Vinodini Ma |Jaya Ma...|
Sathya Sai Saraswathi Ma
Sunaada Vinodini Ma |Jaya Ma...|
Sadashiva Ranjani Ma
Sada Bhava Bhanjani Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma |Sunaada Vinodini|
Devotional Song Meaning: O Mother Sathya Sai, You are Saraswathi who rejoice in soulful music set to proper tune. You are ever a source of Delight to Lord Shiva and the destroyer of the cycle of Births.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Mana Mohana Krishna Murari
Jaya Nandalala Kalimala Hari |Jaya Mana Mohana...|
Jaya Jaya Giridhara Parthi Vihari
Deena Bandhu Karunakara Sharana Tumhari
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Giridhari
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Krishna the vanquisher of demon Mura, the son of Nanda who removes blemishes of the present Kali age. You are the One who held aloft the mountain, to protect devotees from Torrential rain. I surrender to you Oh Lord of Parthi, a source of succour to the helpless.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Maruti Jaya Maruti Jaya Rama Dootha
Jaya Maruti Jaya Maruti Jaya Vayu Putra
Jaya Maruti Jaya Maruti Jaya Mangala Daata
Jaya Maruti Jaya Maruti Jaya Mahanubhava
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Maruti to the messenger of Rama, son of Wind God, Supreme Being and the One who confers Auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Meera Prabho Giridhari
Jaya Govinda Gopala Krishna Murari
Madhura Madhura Muralidhari
Ananda Ananda Sai Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Govinda, Gopala, Krishna, Lord of Meera's Devotion, who held the Mountain High, the one who holds the Flute in His Hand. He is the Sweetness and Bliss personified.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Murali Madhava Shourie
Parama Pavana Pandari Natha
Paramatma Hey Purandara Vittala
Sri Ranganatha Hrudayanta Ranga
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Madhava the Valarous One, Murali with the Flute in hisHand, Pandari Natha the Lord of Pandharpur. He is Vittala the Supreme Consciousness and the Highly Sacred One and Lord of Purandara and Ranganatha the indweller of the Heart.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala
Mohana Moorat Sai Gopala |Jaya Nandalala...|
Jaya Brindavana Madana Gopala
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Nandalala |Mohana Moorat|
Devotional Song Meaning: Praises be to Gopala the Son of Nanda, themost Charming and the one who moves about in Brindavan. Sai Gopala has a captivating Form and is the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala
Mohana Moorat Sai Gopala |Jaya Nandalala...|
Jaya Brindavana Madana Gopala
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Nandalala |Mohana Moorat|
Devotional Song Meaning: Praises be to Gopala the Son of Nanda, themost Charming and the one who moves about in Brindavan. Sai Gopala has a captivating Form and is the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Narayana Jaya Hari Om
Sai Narayana Jaya Hari Om |Jaya Narayana...|
Brahma Shivaarchita Jaya Hari Om
Paapa Vinashaka Jaya Hari Om
Jaya Hari Om (Om) Jaya Hari Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to the Mantra 'Hari Om', which is chanted with the Name of Narayana by even the Lord of creation Brahma and the Lord of dissolution Shiva. Chanting of 'Hari Om' destroys Sins.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Narayana Jaya Hari Om (Sai)
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Sai Om
Paramatma Sai Hari Om
Parabrahma Sai Hari Om
Hari Om Hari Om Jaya (Sai) Hari Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the powerful mantra Hari Om along with the divine names Narayana, Shiva, Parabrahma, Shiva and Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Narayana Sadguru Deva
Gayana Narthana Priya Mahadeva (Sai Deva) |Jaya Narayana...|
Nirakara Saakara Tum Hi Ho
Poorna Brahma Avatara Tum Hi Ho
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Mahadeva
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the Sacred Preceptor Narayana and Mahadeva who delights in soulful Music and Dance. Oh Sai Mahadeva! You are both the Form and Formless divinity and Incarnation of God in its Totality, who presently dwells in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Narayana Sathya Narayana
Keshava Madhava Sai Narayana |Jaya Narayana...|
Sri Krishna Govinda Sai Narayana
Mukunda Madhava Sathya Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine Names of the Lord Keshava, Madhava, Krishna, Govinda, Mukunda, Narayana, Sathya and Sai..

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Panduranga Jaya Vittala
Jagadodhara Hari Vittala
Pandari Natha Jaya Hari Vittala
Purandara Vittala Parama Dayala
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Vittala, the One standing on a brick, Hari, Panduranga the redeemer of the Universe, Lord of Pandharpur and Purandara (Saint Composer) and the One who is Supremely compassionate.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Panduranga Prabho Vittala
Jagadodhara Hari Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala
Sri Ramani Hrudayanta Ranga
Mangala Kara Karunanta Ranga
Aashritha Deena Janavana Ranga
Jagadodhara Hari Vittala |Panduranga Vittala|
Panduranga Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant and Glorify the name of the Lord Panduranga Vittala, the Lord of Pandharpur. Lord Ranga causes delight to Mother Lakshmi His consort and bestows Benevolence and Compassion to the destitutes.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Partheesha Jaya Paramesha
Jaya Gowreesha Jaya Gangadhara
Jatadhara Jaya Sai Shankara
Vijayee Bhava Tava Sharanam Dehi
Sharanam Dehi
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lord of Gowri, who bears Mother Ganges in His matted locks, personification of Supreme Consciousness, is Sai Shankara, the Lord of Parthi. Oh Lord I sing your Praises and seek your Protection.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Partheeshwari Jaya Parameshwari Jaya Sarveshwari Mata
Mangala Dayini Moksha Pradayini Parthi Pureeshwari Mata |Jaya Partheeshwari|
Abhaya Pradayini Sai Ma
Ananda Dayini Sai Ma
Akhilandeshwari Sai Ma
Ananda Roopini Mata
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to the Supreme Mother of all, who confers Benevolence and Liberation and dwellsin Parthi. Mother Sai bestows Freedom from fear and Bliss. She is the Mother of the Universe and Personification of Bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Radha Manohara Nandalala
Jaya Geeta Vinodana Shubha Lola
Jaya Shyama Murari Goparipala (3)
Jaya Sai Murari Parthi Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the son of Nanda, charmer of Radha, who delights in sacred Music. Gopala the dark coloured, slayer of demon Mura, takes care of Gopis and is Sai Murari of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya Jaya Ram
Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Sai Ram |Jaya Raghu Nandana...|
Janaki Vallabha Sita Ram
Bhaktha Uddharana Sai Ram |Jaya Raghu Nandana...|
Mayi Meera Prabhu Radhey Shyam
Mandara Giridhari Hey Ghana Shyam
Mandasmitha Mukha Radhey Shyam
Mahima Avatara Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama whobelongs to the Raghu clan and who is the consort of Mother Janaki and who redeems devotees. Radhey Shyam always has a smiling countenance and is also the Lord of Meera and the One who held high Mountain Mandara to protect tribesmen from the wrath of Torrential rain. He is ourown Sai Rama of untainted reputation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya Jaya Rama
Jaya Jagat Janani Janaki Rama |Jaya Raghu Nandana...|
Nava Nava Komala Megha Shyama
Bhava Harana Bhadrachala Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Rama whose consort is Janaki, Mother of Universe, the One who is Ever new and fresh. Rama is of deep blue complexion, Lord of Bhadrachala (pilgrim centre in Andhra Pradesh) destroys the cycle of Birth.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Krishna Harey Parthi Puri Sai Ram
Jaya Sai Harey Jaya Baba Harey Jaya Brindavana Ghana Shyam
Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Krishna Harey Parthi Puri Sai Ram |Jaya Sai Harey|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing in Praise of Rama, Krishna the dark coloured One who moves about in Brindavan, Sai Baba otherwise known as Sai Rama who dwells in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Sita Rama Harey
Jaya Krishna Harey Jaya Krishna Harey Jaya Radha Krishna Harey
Jaya Sai Harey Jaya Sai Harey Jaya Sai Baba Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Rama whose consort is Mother Sita, Krishna whose consort is Radha and Sai who is also known as Sai Baba.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Rama Janaki Rama
Jaya Rama Sai Rama
Jaya Rama Sri Raghu Rama
Jaya Rama Sai Rama
Jaya Rama Sita Rama
Jaya Rama Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Rama of Raghu Clan, whose beloved is Janaki otherwise known as Sita has now incarnated as Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Rama Raghu Rama
Ranadheera Sukumara |Jaya Rama|
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Rama
Rajeeva Lochana Rama Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Rama the Lotus eyed, is a mighty warrior on the battlefield, the One who added reputation to His Clan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Rama Rama Rama Harey
Ghana Shyama Shyama Shyama Harey
Raghupathi Raghava Rama Harey
Ghana Shyama Sundara Sai Krishna Harey
Rama Harey Krishna Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Repeat the name of Rama, Lord of the Raghu dynasty and Shyama the Dark complexioned Lord who has compelling looks.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Sadguru Sai Ram Jaya Sai Mahadeva
Jaya Parthi Puri Ke Ram Jaya Shirdi Puri Ke Shyam
Lohitambara Dhara Parthi Pureeshwara
Jaya Sadguru Sai Ram
Jaya Sai Mahadeva
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Sacred preceptor Sai Ram and Sai Mahadeva. Victory to Ram who has incarnated as the Lord of Parthi and Shyam who had incarnated as the Lord of Shirdi. Glory to the Sacred Preceptor Sai Ram and Sai Mahadeva who wears a red robe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Sai GopalaJaya Nandalala
Madhusudhana Krishna Jaya Mana Mohana
Shyamala Komala Jaya Parthi Krishna |JayaSai...|
Hrudaya Vihara Hey Chitha Chora
Hey Chitha Chora Hey Chitha Chora
Bhakthon Ke Pyaarey Krishna Pyaarey BalSai Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: This bhajan extols the virtues of Lord Sai Krishna as, the one who enchants and steals the hearts of devotees who love Him.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Sai Guru Deva Sai Guru Deva
Guru Seva Bina Nirvana Nahin Jaya Sai Guru Deva |Jaya Sai...|
Tum Hi Ho Mata Pitha Tum Hi Ho Sai Guru Deva
Sathya Swaroopa Raaha Dikhao Sai Guru Deva |Guru Seva|
Devotional Song Meaning: There is no salvation without Your Service Oh Preceptor Sai! Grace me with your advice for you are the Embodiment of Truth, My Mother, Father and Preceptor.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Sai Rama Jaya Raghu Rama (3)
Hey Jaya Sai Rama Jaya Raghu Rama |Jaya Sai|
Dukhiyon Ke Daata Sai Rama
Prema Pradatha Sai Rama
Shantha Swaroopa Sai Rama |Hey Jaya|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Sai Rama and Scion of Raghu Clan, Raghu Rama. Sai Rama is a champion of the downtrodden, spreads Supreme Love and is the Embodiment of Peace.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Sai Shankara Jaya Abhayankara
Samba Sadashiva Shiva Hara Hey Shiva Hara Hey Shiva Hara Hey |Jaya Sai...|
Jaya Gangadhara Jaya Bimbadhara
Vyagrambaradhara Shiva Hara Hey Shiva Hara Hey Shiva Hara Hey
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Sai who is Shankara and bestows freedom from fear, the one whose other half is 'Amba' who is known as 'Shiva and Hara, one who has Mother Ganga and crescent moon on his head and sits on the Tiger's skin.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Sayeesha Jaya Sayeesha
Radha Madhava Jaya Partheesha |Jaya Sayeesha...|
Hrudaya Sarathi Sai Kanhaiya
Radhey Govinda Prashanthi Nilaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Radha Madhava otherwise known as Radhey Govinda has incarnated again on Earth as Sayeesha, the charioteer of the Spiritual Heart and dwells at Prashanthi Nilayam in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Shankara Bhaava Gochara Shiva Chidambara Omkaara
Parthi Vihara Paapa Vidhura
Jagadodhara Brahmapara (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Shankara who is beyond senses, Lord of Chidambaram (Holy place in India) personified as Omkaara, the Supreme Brahman, the Lord of Parthi who removes sin and uplifts the world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Shiva Shankara Kailasa Vasi
Jaya Jaya Ramachandra Ayodhya Vasi |Jaya Shiva...|
Jaya Jaya Sri Krishna Dwaraka Vasi
Jaya Jaya Ram Krishna Dakshina Vasi
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya Shirdi Nivasi
Jaya Jaya Jaya Puttaparthi Nivasi
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Shiva Shankara who has His Abode at Kailasa, Ramachandra at Ayodhya, Sri Krishna at Dwaraka, Ramakrishna at Dakshineshwar and to the One who dwells at Shirdi and Puttaparthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Sri Ganesha Vighna Nasha Gajanana
Vidya Buddhi Sarva Siddhi Sunandana |Jaya Sri...|
Jaya Heyramba Sri Jagadamba Nandana
Eka Dantha Dayavanta Shubhanana
Mangala Dayaka Sri Vinayaka Vandana
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the Lord of Ganas destroyer of obstacles who has the head of an Elephant who confers scholarship, intelligence, power. Glory to the son of Jagadamba, single tusked, compassionate bestower of auspiciousness. I bow to thee who has no leader.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Vallabha Gananayaka
Jaya Guha Sodara Shubha Daata
Jaya Hey Eshwari Nandana
Jaya Vara Dayaka Namostuthey
Jaya Partheeshwara Namostuthey
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the Lord of Ganas, the brother of Guha (Lord Subrahmanya), who bestows auspiciousness, son of Eshwari, Pranaams to one who confers boons and the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Vijayee Bhava Jaya Vijayee Bhava
Bhava Bhaya Nasha Hanumantha
Pavana Kumara Vanara Veera
Ati Balavanta Hanumantha
Anjani Putra Veeranjaneya
Niranjana Vijayee Bhava (Bolo) (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the One who removes fear of repetetive Births. The son of Pavana and Anjana is blemishless and one of extraordinary strength.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Vijayee Bhava Parthi Pureeshwara
Jaya Bhakthashraya Krupa Maya
Jaya Jaya Jaya Sarva Jagat Rakshaka
Jaya Jaya Jaya Janardhana
Jaya Jaya Jaya Sayeeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us a song of Victory to Sayeeshwara, who dwells at Parthi, has utmost compassion for His devotees, Protector of the whole Universe and to the Motivator of His followers.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jaya Vittala Vittala Vittala Jaya Vittala Panduranga
Jaya Vittala Panduranga (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Vittala, the One standing on a brick and of Panduranga incessantly.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jayatu Jayatu Rama
Janani Janaki Rama
Janana Marana Bhaya Klesha Vinasha
Raghupathi Sita Rama Rama Ramethi Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, consort of Mother Janaki, the one who destroys fear of birth and death, the Emperer of Raghu dynasty.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jayatu Shiva Natana Shiva
Jaya Jagadeesha Mahesha Shiva |Jayatu Shiva...|
Bhasma Vibhushita Phaala Shashidhara
Pingala Lochana Ganga Mohana
Pinaka Vaibhava Sai Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glories of the Lord of Dance Shiva, the Universal and Sovereign Lord. Shiva has the Sacred Ash smeared all over His body, the Crescent Moon on His forehead, has brown-coloured eyes, charms Mother Ganges and holds the Bow (Pinaka) in His hand who is also Sai Shankara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jayatu Shiva Shiva Janaki Rama
Jaya Raghu Nandana Radhey Shyama
Tyaga Karo Abhimaan
Dhyan Karo Hari Naam |Jayatu Shiva...|
Taraka Naama Smaranam
Tapatraya Samharanam
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the Glory of Lord Shiva, Janaki Rama, Raghunandana, Radheyshyama. Shed your Ego and Chant Hari's Name, which destroys our Sin and helps us to cross the cycle of Births.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jayatu Vittala Jaya Vittala
Rakumayi Vittala Ranga Vittala |Jayatu Vittala...|
Jayatu Vittala Jaya Vittala |Rakumayi Vittala|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Vittala, Ranga vittala and His consort Rakumayi continuously.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jeevan Ki Naiya Mori Paar Karo Sai Nath
Sai Nath Sai Nath Parthi Puri Sai Nath
Prem Sudha Sagar Tu(m) Sai Bhagawan
Deena Bandhu Deena Sakha Sai Bhagawan
Madad Karo Raksha Karo Sai Natha Hey |Sai Nath|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai Nath, Help me to reach the other end through the boat of Life, the Lord of Parthi. Oh Sai Bhagawan, protect me for you are verily the Ocean of Supreme Love, the refuge of the Forlorn and the deserted.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jeevana Jyothi Jalao Kanhaiya
Jo Kuch Mera Sab Hai Tera |Jeevana Jyothi...|
Daya Karo Mujhey Hey Sai Shyama
Sharan Lagalo Mujhey Krishna Kanhaiya
Hey Anatha Natha Sri Sai Natha
Devotional Song Meaning: Light the Lamp of my Life Oh Young Krishna, I owe everything to You Oh Lord. Accept me into your fold Oh Child Krishna Bless me with your Grace, Oh Sai Natha the refuge of the Forlorn.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jeevana Jyothi Tum Ho Sai
Prem Ki Jyothi Jalao Sai Prem Ki Jyothi Jalao
Jeevan Ke In Andhiyaron Mey Sai Deep Jalao
Sai Deep Jalao Sai Deep Jalao |Prem Ki Jyothi|
Devotional Song Meaning: Light the Lamp of Love of Life Oh Sai, to cross the dark crevices of this Turbulent world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jhulana Jhuley Sai Gopala
Krishna Natawara Nandalala |Jhulana Jhuley...|
Govinda Giridhara Gokula Bala
Shyama Manohara Muraliwala
Shobhita Sundara Prem Hindola
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Gopala rock in the Swing of my Heart, the mischievous son of Nanda. Govinda the dark complexioned boy of Gokul who held the mountain high, has the Flute in Hand and a bewitching smile on His face.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jhulana Jhuley Sai Jhulana Jhuley (2)
Nandana Nandana Ananda Chandana
Madhava Mana Mohana Sai Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Rock the Swing of My Heart Oh son of Nanda who is Bliss Supreme, Oh Madhava who draws everyones Mind, Oh Sai Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jhulana Mey Jhuley Merey Sai Nandalala
Sai Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala |Jhulana Mey|
Murali Lola Gokula Bala
Radha Manohara Raasa Vilola
Jhulana Mey Jhuley Merey Sai Nandalala
Dheere Dheere Hauley Hauley
Devotional Song Meaning: Rock the swing of my heart slowly, Oh son of Nanda, Gopala, Young Krishna who plays the Flute and moves around Gokul.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jhulana Mey Jhuley Merey Sai Ram
Sathya Sai Ram Hey Bhagawan |Jhulana Jhuley|
Eshwaramba Nandana Jai Sai Ram
Jai Sai Ram Jai sai Ram |Eshwaramba Nandana|
Man Mandir Mey Jai Sai Ram
Jai Jai Sai Ram Jai sai Ram
Jai Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Jai Sai Ram (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Rock the Swing of our Heart to the tune of this bhajan Oh Sathya Sairam, son of Eshwaramba. Sai ram in our minds and Sai ram in our hearts. Victory to Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Jo Bhi Hari Ka Bhajan Karey
Woh Hi Brahma Hari Pad Paavey
Sai Nath Jo Bhajana Karey
Bhava Sagar Se Paar Karey
Devotional Song Meaning: Those who chant the name of Hari alone reach the position of Brahman (Lord of Universe). Those who chant the name of Sai is sure to cross the cycle of birth and death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Joota Jatadhara Gangadhari
Shivaya Namah Shiva Om
Shiva Shiva Om Hara Hara Om |Shivaya Namah|
Gangadhara Gowri Shiva
Shivaya Namah Shiva Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Prostrations to Shiva who has Ganges on His matted Locks of Hair on His Head and consort of Gowri.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kaalatheethaya Siddhi Roopaya Yogeshwaraya Namo
Jagat Hithaya Vishwa Roopaya
Sayeeshwaraya Namo
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (5)
Devotional Song Meaning: We bow to the Lord of Yogis, to the one who is beyond time and considerate. We bow to Lord Sai who has the Universe as his form, to Lord Sathya Sai who is Shiva the embodiment of Om.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kaali Kaali Maha Kaali Kapalini
Durga Durga Devi Durga Bhavani
Mangala Gowri Mata Maheshwari
Raja Rajeshwari Lakshmi (Sai) Narayani
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Mother Kaali, the dark complexioned, ferocious, wearing a garland of skulls. She is Durgabhavani the destroyer of evil. She is the Lord of Emperors also known as Maheshwari, Gowri, Lakshmi and Narayani the bestower of Auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kaali Kapalini Jagat Janani
Lakshmi Narayani Jagat Janani
Parthi Nivasini Jagat Janani
Triloka Palini Jagat Janani
Trinetra Dharini Jagat Janani
Brahma Sanathani Jagat Janani
Jayatu Sai Janani Janani
Devotional Song Meaning: Mother of the Universe Kaali wears a garland of Skulls, Lakshmi Consort of Lord Narayana, Guardian of the Three worlds, the One who bears three eyes and the Ancient Godhead who has Her Abode in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kab Logey Khabar Morey Ram Mujhey Apna Banalo Ghana Shyam
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Ghana Shyam Ghana Shyam
Sai Ram Ram Ram Sai Ram |Ghana Shyam|
Devotional Song Meaning: When will you take notice of me Oh Lord Ram? Let me merge in you Oh dark complexioned Shyam. Chant repeatedly the name of Lord Sai Ram, Ghana Shyam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kahan Main Dhoondoon Hey Bhagawan
Darshan Do Darshan Do
Darsha Dikhao Merey Sai Bhagawan
Kabhi Mandir Mey Kabhi Masjid Mey
Apna Hrudaya Mey Hai Bhagawan
Teerath Mey Kabhi Murath Mey (Kabhi)
Parthi Puri Ke Prabhu Sai Bhagawan
Darshan Do Darshan Do |Darsha Dikhao|
Devotional Song Meaning: Where shall I search for you Oh Sai Bhagawan? Grant us your Divine Darshan. The Lord is not to be found in the deities of temples, mosques or holy places but is present within our hearts. Grant such a Darshan Oh Sai Bhagawan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kailasa Pathey Bhagawan Shankara
Ayodhya Pathi Sri Rama Raghuvara
Mathura Pathey Sri Krishna Natawara
Parthi Pathey Sai Ram Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Shankara is the Lord of Kailasa. Sri Rama belongs to Raghu lineage and is the Lord of Ayodhya. Krishna the supreme actor is the Lord of Mathura and Sai Shankara is the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kailasa Pathey Karuna Nidhey
Karuna Nidhey Sharanam Prabho |Kailasa Pathey...|
Ganga Jatadhara Girija Pathey
Shambho Shankara Sai Prabho
Devotional Song Meaning: I surrender to the Lord of Kailasa who is an Ocean of compassion. The One with matted locks and Ganges on His Head is the origin of all that is well.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kailasa Pathey Mahadeva Shambho
Hari Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Hey Shiva Shankara Sai Shankara Om Namah Shivaya
Hey Tripurari Bhava Bhaya Haari Om Namah Shivaya
Hey Pralayankara Hara Hara Shankara Om Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya Sai Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Shivaya Namah Om Namah Shivaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord of Lords, dweller of Mount Kailasa, is the bestower of auspiciousness. Chant the mantra 'Om Nama Shivaya' repeatedly. Shankara who is also Sai Shankara bestows welfare of the world, the destroyer of Tripura and who negates the fear of rebirth, the one who causes the final delusion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kailasa Pathey Sai Karuna Nidhey
Parvathi Pathey Pashupathey |Kailasa Pathey...|
Shambho Shankara Shirdi (Parthi) Pathey
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Pathey
Sathya Sai Shiva Vishwa Pathey (Sri)
Devotional Song Meaning: Parvathi's Consort is Lord of Animals and Lord of Kailasa and Ocean of compassion. Shambho Shankara is the Lord of Shirdi, the One who has Ganges on His head is the consort of Gowri and Sathya Sai is the Lord of the Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kailasa Vasa Gangadhara
Ananda Tandava Sadashiva
Himagiri Vasa Samba Shiva |Kailasa Vasa...|
Ganapathi Sevitha Hey Jagadeesha
Sharavana Sevitha Hey Paramesha
Shaila Girishwara Uma Maheshwara
Neela Lochana Natana Natesha
Ananda Tandava Sadashiva |Himagiri Vasa|
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lord of the Mother Ganges dwells in Kailasa in the Himalayan ranges, whose consort is Amba, performs the celestial dance of Bliss. The Lord of Universe is served by His sons Ganapathi and Sharavana. Shiva is the consort of Uma resides in the Shaila Mountains and Lord of Dance has Blue eyes.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kala Roopini Kadambari
Naada Roopini Narayani
Sathya Dharma Roopini Sayeeshwari
Mangala Roopini Maheshwari (Sarva)
Kadambari Narayani (Amba)
Sayeeshwari Maheshwari (Sathya)
Devotional Song Meaning: Kadambari is the personification of Fine arts, Narayani is the personification of Sound, Sayeeshwari is the embodiment of Truth and righteousness, Maheshwari is the embodiment of Auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kalavathi Amba Saraswathi
Naada Brahmamayi Vedavathi
Ananda Roopini Vidyavathi
Veda Brahmamayi Sai Bhagawathi
Parthi Pureeshwari Amba Saraswathi |Naada Brahma|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Mother Saraswathi the mother of all arts. She is also the Mother of Vedas, Brahman in the form of sound. Saraswathi is the mother of all knowledge and has bliss as her form, residing at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kali Yug Ke Avatar Ho Sai Baba
Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho Eswaramma
Sai Brahma Sai Vishnu
Sai Hey Parameshwara
Dukhiyon Ke Dukh Door Karo Tum
Sai Hey Parameshwara
Bolo Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho Eswaramma
Devotional Song Meaning: Blessed was Mother Eswaramma Oh Lord Sai of this Kali age, you are none other than Brahma, Vishnu and Parameshwara, the one who drives away the miseries of the downtrodden, Oh Lord Parameshwara, Oh Lord Sai Ram, Blessed was Mother Eswaramma.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kali Yug Ke Avatara Sai Baba
Araj Suno Parthi Baba
Daya Ke Sagara Sai Baba
Karunamaya Sai Prema Pradatha
Deena Janon Ke Sai Baba
Bhaktha Janon Ke Sai Baba
Sathya Sanathana Sai Baba
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai you are the incarnation of this Kali age, please listen to my appeal, Oh Lord of Compassion, the bestower of Love, the kin of your devotees, the needy and the downtrodden. You are Eternal.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kali Yuga Avatara Sai Bhagawan
Krupa Nidhey Deenon Ke Pran |Kali Yuga Avatara...|
Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Bhagawan
Antaryami Sai Bhagawan
Karuna Sindhu Sai Bhagawan
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: Sai Bhagawan is the Incarnation of the Kali Age, son of Mother Eshwaramba, the indweller of every being, the ocean of compassion and the Life of the underprivileged is the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kalimala Bhanjana Kodanda Rama
Karunanta Ranga Kaivalya Dhama |Kalimala Bhanjana...|
Maya Manusha Munijana Prema
Madhura Manohara Mangala Naama
Parthi Pureesha Prabhu Paramatma
Patitha Pavana Pattabhi Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: The bow wielding Rama destroys the evil effects of the Kali age, is compassionate and grants liberation. Rama who loves sages has an elusive form of a human being whose name is sweet, enchanting and confers Auspiciousness. The emancipator of the downtrodden, the cosmic consciousness is presently dwelling at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kalyana Krishna Kamaneeya Krishna
Kalinga Narthana Sri Krishna
Govardhana Giridhari Murari Gopi Mana Sanchari
Murari Gopi Mana Sanchari
Brindavan Ke Tulasi Mala
Peetambara Dhari Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: We bow to the enchanting form of Krishna born to redeem the world of its negative afflictions, who subdued the poisonous serpent Kaliya by dancing on it. Krishna lifted the Govardhan mountains to protect the devotees from the wrath of Indra, has captured the hearts of Gopis, the slayer of demon Mura. Our Salutations to the one who adorns the Tulasi garland and the Yellow cloth.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kalyana Rama Ananda Rama
Rama Sri Rama Jaya Rama |Kalyana Rama...|
Avatara Sai Avatara Rama
Poorna Avatara Sathya Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Rama, who confers bliss and causes the welfare of the world. Salutations to Lord Rama the incarnation and Sathya Sai Rama who has come down with all the facets of an incarnation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kalyana Ranga Kamaneeya Ranga
Ananda Ranga Sadananda Ranga
Hrudayanta Ranga Karunanta Ranga
Rakumayi Ranga Sayeesha Ranga
Shirdeesha Ranga Partheesha Ranga |Ananda Ranga|
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Ranga is One who bestows welfare. One of Everlasting Bliss, of compassion, Lord of Rakumayi, is Sayeesha the One who dwells at Shirdi and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kamakshi Kalyani Kadambari
Katyayani Gowri Kanakambari
Vagesri Nityeshwari Panchakshari
Vamesri Poorneshri Parameshwari |Kamakshi Kalyani|
Maadhasthi Matangi Maheshwari
Magadamba Bhagawathi Rageshwari (Sayeeshwari)
Devotional Song Meaning: This Bhajan extols the Goddess Parvathi with several of her other names.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kamala Manohari Shiva Sai Shankari
Kaali Kapalini Kadambari |Kamala Manohari...|
Jaya Katyayani Bhagawathi Bharati
Kanchi Nivasini Kamakshi Sundari
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the enchanting form of the Mother Lakshmi seated on the Lotus, Shankari consort of Lord Shankara, Kamakshi the presiding deity at Kanchi, Mother Kaali adorning the garland made of skulls and Mother Saraswathi also known as Kadambari and Bharati.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kamala Nayana Bhagawan
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan
Hey Deena Janon Ke Pran
Hey Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Ram
Sri Sai Ram Jaya Jaya Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Ram |Hey Deena|
Devotional Song Meaning: Pranaams to the lotus eyed Lord Sathya Sai who dwells at Parthi the refuge of the forlorn, emancipator of the downtrodden, the Lord of Mother Sita.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kamala Nayana Prabhu Kamala Pathey
Kamalasana Prabhu Kamala Kantha |Kamala Nayana...|
Kamalanabha Prabhu Kamala Ramana
Kamaleshwara Prabhu Kamala Kantha
Devotional Song Meaning: Our salutations to the lotus eyed Lord who is the consort of Kamala (Goddess Lakshmi). The Lord who is the enchanter of Kamala, seated on the lotus from whose navel arises the lotus, is the Lord of Kamala (Goddess Kamala).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kamala Nayana Ram Vimala Charana Ram
Kamala Nayana Vimala Charana Patitha Pavana Ram
Patitha Pavana Ram Janaki Jeevan Ram
Patitha Pavana Janaki Jeevana Paapa Vimochana Ram
Ayodhya Vasi Ram Ananda Chanda Ram
Ayodhya Vasi Ananda Chanda Patitha Pavana Ram
Dasharatha Nandana Ram Dasha Mukha Mardhana Ram
Dasharatha Nandana Dasha Mukha Mardhana Patitha Pavana Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: We offer our salutations to the Lotus eyed Rama whose feet are pure and blemishless, the uplifter of the underprivileged, the remover of sins and the very life of Mother Janaki. Lord Rama is the King of Ayodhya and confers Bliss, is the son of King Dasharatha and the One who vanquished the ten headed Ravana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kamala Nayana Sri Rama
Karuna Sindho Sita Rama |Kamala Nayana...|
Kalimala Bhanjana Rama Rama
Rama Rama (2) |Kalimala|
Karunya Lavanya Kodanda Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Our salutations to Lord Rama the lotus eyed one, destroyer of the evil effects of Kali age, the compassionate who has a compelling form, who wields the bow.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kamala Nayana Sri Sai Jaya Jaya
Karunakara Narayana Jaya Jaya
Sri Raghu Nandana Rama Jaya Jaya
Yadu Kula Bhooshana Shyama Jaya Jaya
Esha Manusha Vesha Jaya Jaya
Meera Ke Prabhu Natha Jaya Jaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Sri Sai whose eyes resembles the lotus. Victory to compassionate Narayana, Rama the beloved of Raghu clan, Shyama (Krishna) the jewel of Yadu clan, the Supreme Lord who is in the human form and Lord of Meera.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kamala Netra Sayeeshwara
Kaivalya Teja Sureshwara |Kamala Netra...|
Megha Shyama Ghana Gagana Shareera
Shantha Brahmamaya Abhayakara
Megha Shyama Ghana Gagana Shareera |Shantha Brahmamaya|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Sayeeshwara the Lotus eyed One who confers Liberation, whose complexion is that of thick clouds in the sky, guards against fear and embodiment of Peace.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kanaka Sabesha Kailasa Shiva
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Manohara |Kanaka Sabesha...|
Gnana Pradayaka Samba Shiva
Narthana Sundara Natana Manohara
Paahi Prabho Maam Parthi Pureeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lord of Kailasa mountains, One who holds the Ganges on His Head, delight of Mother Gowri. Protect me O Lord the One who confers Wisdom, whose dance is thrilling, is the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kanda Kumara Vadivela
Gowri Putra Vadivela |Kanda Kumara...|
Karthikeya Karuna Sagara
Deena Sharanya Vadivela
Sri Sai Natha Vadivela
Devotional Song Meaning: Kanda, Kumara and Karthikeya are the names of Lord Subrahmanya, the son of Shiva and Gowri. He is an Ocean of Compassion and friend of the Forlorn, is verily Sai Natha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kanha Kanhaiya Bansi Adhariya Brindavan Ghana Raasa Rachaiya
Gokula Nandana Hey Chitha Mohana
Radha Manohara Shyama
Manasa Chora Nanda Kishora
Parthi Vihara Sai Gopala Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Krishna also known as Kanha and Kanhaiya performed the Raasa Leela Dance in Brindavan with the flute on his lips. He is the boy of Gokula who enchants everybody's mind, the son of Nanda and the delight of Radha who stole the butter, is none other than Sai Gopala of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kanhaiya Teri Bansi Bhajey Merey Lal
Nis Din Mey Bhajo Tero Naam |Kanhaiya Teri...|
Hey Nandalala Gopala
Gopala Gopala
Govinda Govinda Govinda Gopala
Sai Krishna Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: The day I chant your name Krishna my beloved, play with your enchanting flute. Hey Gopala! The beloved of Nanda, you are Govinda (foster of cows), Sai Krishna and Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kari Mukha Varada Maam Paahi
Gajamukha Natha Maam Paahi
Gajanana Maam Paahi
Gananatha Maam Paahi
Lambodhara Maam Paahi (Jaya)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh elephant headed God the bestower of boons (Gajanana) protect me. I chant your other names Gajamukha, Gananatha (God of Demigods) and Lambodhara. Protect me.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karthikeya Karunakara
Sharanam Sharanam Sayeeshwara |Karthikeya...|
Gowri Nandana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Pashupathi Ranjana Parathpara
Devotional Song Meaning: I surrender to You Oh Karthikeya, the compassionate One, the son of Mother Gowri, who destroys the cycle of Birth and death, is a source of delight for Pashupathi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karuna Jalathey Dasharathey
Kamaneeyanana Krupa Nidhey
Sri Raghu Nandana Sita Pathey
Shritha Jana Palana Suguna Nidhey
Dasharathey Daya Nidhey
Devotional Song Meaning: The son of Dasharatha, the scion of Raghu dynasty has a pleasing form, is an ocean of compassion. The Lord of Mother Sita, one who fulfills the desires of His devotees, is a paragon of virtues.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karuna Karo Sai Deva
Kalyana Karo Sai Deva
Sri Guru Jaya Guru Sathya Sai Deva |Karuna Karo...|
Tum Matrumayi Sai Deva
Tum Shakthimayi Sai Deva
Tum Premamayi Sai Deva
Tum Krupamayi Sai Deva
Sri Guru Jaya Guru Sathya Sai Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory be to you Oh Sathya Sai deva! Show mercy and let your benedictions be upon us. You are verily our Mother and embodiment of Energy, Love and Compassion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karuna Nidhey Kamala Manohara
Karivarada Sai Karunya Natha |Kamala...|
Tejonmaya Divya Naama Roopa
Naama Roopa Naama Roopa |Tejonmaya|
Tribhuvana Vanditha Hari Hara Roopa
Devotional Song Meaning: We adore you Hari the consort of Lakshmi. You are also Sai the compassionate bestower of boons. Your name and form are divine and effulgent. You are the Hari worshipped by all the three worlds.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karuna Nidhey Bhagawan
Gopala Brindavana Sai Bhagawan
Mana Mohana Madhava Sai Bhagawan |Karuna Nidhey...|
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara bala
Parama Dayala Sai Krupala
Parthi Puri Bhagawan
Mana Mohana Madhava Sai Bhagawan
Karuna Nidhey Bhagawan (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Gopala is enchanting, Lord of Meera, who moves about in Brindavan, is extremely compassionate. Sai Bhagawan is an Ocean of absolute Mercy whose Abode is at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karuna Niketana Bhaktha Sakha Prabho
Sharan Mey Lo Bhagawan
Dukha Bhanjana Sri Ram
Tribhuvana Sanchari Jyothi Swaroopa
Nithya Niranjana Ram
Adi Ananth Hey Prema Swaroopa |Dukha Bhanjana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Rama the ever Compassionate one, the real friend of the devotee and destroyer of sorrow, I seek refuge in you. You move around the three worlds, ever pure, you are both the beginning and the end. You are also the embodiment of love.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karuna Sadani Ma Sai Karuna Sagari Ma
Kanchana Abharani Ma Sai Karunya Roopini Ma
Kamala Manohari Ma Sai Kalyana Dayini Ma
Kalusha Vidhurini Ma Sai Kali Avatarini Ma
Kali Avatarini Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Mother Sai is another name for absolute Compassion, is an enchanting Goddess of Wealth bedecked with Gold jewels. She confers benevolence, removes impurity and is an Incarnation of the present Kali age.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karuna Sagara Prema Swaroopa
Paapa Vimochana Ram
Dukha Bhanjana Sri Ram
Allah Eshwar Terey Naam
Nanak Yesu Terey Naam
Parthi Pureeshwara Deena Daya Ghana |Dukha Bhanjana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Sai is an embodiment of Divinity, Ocean of compassion, removes Sin and destroys sorrow. Allah, Eshwar, Nanak and Yesu are your names Oh Lord. He is highly compassionate towards the distressed and the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karuna Sagara Hey Bhagawan Jagadeeshwara Jagannatha
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Parameshwara Hrudaya Vihari Gopala |Karuna Sagara|
Dwaraka Natha Sri Madhusudhana Meera Natha Gopala
Bhaktha Janashraya Deenodharana Sai Yuga Avatara
Devotional Song Meaning: We adore you Sai the descent of Kali age, who is refuge of devotees and uplifter of weak and meek. You are the Lord of universe with an Ocean of compassion. You are Gopala who revels in our hearts, slayer of demon Madhu, the Lord of Meera, resident of Dwaraka and at present you are the resident of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karuna Sagara Hey Nandalala
Murali Manohara Shyama Gopala |Karuna Sagara...|
Giridhara Naagara Sai Gopala
Sai Gopala Sai Gopala |Giridhara Naagara|
Meera Ke Prabhu Shyama Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: The Son of Nanda, Gopala is an Ocean of Mercy, plays lilting tunes with Flute, dark complexioned, the One who lifted the Mountain and Meera's inspiration.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karuna Sagara Krishna Murari Radhey Govinda
Madhava Mohana Mangala Roopa Radhey Govinda Jaya Radhey Gopala |Karuna|
Shankha Chakra Dhara Chinmaya Roopa Radhey Govinda Jaya Radhey Gopala
Bhaktha Jana Priya Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Govinda
Jaya Sai Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Radhey Govinda who is also Krishna, Murari the ocean of compassion. Victory to Radhey Govinda who has an Auspicious and captivating form. He has a blissful form, who holds the conch and wheel in His Hands. You are the Beloved of devotees and you are Sai the resident of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karuna Samudra Sri Rama
Kausalya Tanaya Sri Rama
Sharanagatha Priya Sai Rama
Sharanam Sharanam Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Rama the son of Kausalya, you are verily the ocean of compassion. Oh Sai Rama, you love those who have surrendered to you and hence I thus surrender myself.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karuna Sindho Shiva Shambho
Kamala Nayana Sai Shiva Shambho
Kali Yuga Deva Deena Bandho
Kalimala Bhanjana Sai Shambho
Shambho Shiva Shambho (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: The eternally Auspicious Shiva with Mother Amba, is the same Sai Shambho the lotus eyed, embodiment of compassion, is verily the Lord of the Kali age who destroys its evil effects. Chant 'Shiva Shambho' repeatedly.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karuna Sindhu Dasharatha Nandana Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
Prema Swaroopa Prashanthi Niketana Maruti Sevitha Ram
Ahalyodharaka Rajeeva Lochana Raghukula Bhooshana Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: The compassionate lotus eyed Lord Rama, the son of Dasharatha, was served by Maruti. Lord Rama is the redeemer of Ahalya of her curse, is verily the Lord of Parthi the embodiment of Love who resides at Prashanthi Nilayam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karuna Sindhu Rama Kaivalya Shanthi Dhama
Neeraja Netra Parama Pavitra Paramananda Rama |Karuna Sindhu...|
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Daya Sagara Rama
Danava Mardhana Rama Daasa Samrakshaka Rama |Karuna Sindhu|
Karuna Sindhu Rama Kaivalya Shanthi Dhama (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Rama bestows liberation and the abode of peace and compassion. Your lotus eyes are highly sacred and blissful. You are the slayer of demons, protector of devotees who surrender to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karuna SwaroopiniRaja Rajeshwari
Tribhuvana Palini Parthi Pureeshwari
Hrudaya Nivasini Akhilandeshwari
Tripura Sundari Veena Vadini
Dasha Bhuja Dhaarini Asura Vinashini |Tribhuvana Palini...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to mother Sai residing in Parthi, who is the embodiment of compassion, the one who is ruler of the three worlds, the one residing in every one's hearts, the one who is the most beautiful in all the three worlds and the one who annihilated demons.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karunakara Narayana
Kamala Charana Sharanam Sharanam |Karunakara...|
Kamala Netra Kamalasana
Kamala Vallabha Kamala Nabha
Narayana Narayana (5)
Devotional Song Meaning: I surrender myself to Lord Narayana, the compassionate One, with the Lotus Feet. He is Lotus eyed, stationed on a Lotus, consort of Kamala (Lakshmi) and from whose Navel arises a Lotus.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karunamaya Deva Krupamaya Deva
Hari Om Hari Om
Hari Mera Jeevan Ka Sahara
Hari Mera Aadhaar
Krupamaya Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: We chant your Glory Oh compassionate Lord Hari. You are merciful and the embodiment of Primordial sound, the very life and refuge of Meera.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karunamaya Karthikeya
Kaivalya Daata Sri Sai Natha |Karunamaya...|
Himagiri Nandini Priya Kumara
Iha Para Sukha Dayi Bhava Bhaya Hara
Sharanagatha Priya Shanmukha Natha
Sharanam Sharanam Shambhu Kumara
Sharanam Sharanam Shambhu Kumara (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Karthikeya is epitome of compassion and the One who grants Liberation. The dear son of Himavan's daughter, confers welfare here and hereafter, destroys the vicious cycle of Births. Oh son of Shambho, I surrender myself to thee.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karunamayi Janani Ma
Hey Prema Swaroopini Ma |Karunamayi Janani|
Hrudaya Nivasini Sai Ma
Abhaya Pradayini Sai Ma
Gaana Vinodini Ma Sai Ma Sai Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mother Sai, you are the most compassionate one, personification of Love, the one residing in our hearts. Oh mother, you enjoy music and are the protector of this world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karunanta Ranga Kariraja Varada Kamalesha Sri Sai Rama
Omkaara Rama Prashanthi Rama
Parabrahma Sathya Sai Rama
Kamalesha Sri Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: The lotus eyed and compassionate Sai Rama, the one who saved the elephant king is verily the cosmic soul Sathya Sai Rama, the embodiment of Om residing at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Karunya Roopa Sri Sai Deva
Jaya Deva Prabhu Deva
Nayana Manohara Sai Sundara
Devadi Deva Sri Sathya Sai Deva
Guru Deva Sai Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord! You are Our Divine preceptor Shri Sathya Sai, the embodiment of love and compassion, the One with a captivating form. You are a treat to the eyes Oh Lord of Lords

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kashaya Vesha Dharana
Kali Yuga Avatara Radha Ramana |Kashaya Vesha...|
Shirdi Sai Sri Sathya Sai
Dwarakamayi Narayana
Chithravathi Teera Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: The Incarnation of Kali Age Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai has donned Ochre robes. Dwarakamayi was Shirdi Sai's Abode while Sathya Sai has chosen the banks of Chitravathi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kashi Pathey Varanasi Pathey
Ganga Jata Joota Gowri Pathey
Shirdi Pathey Puttaparthi Pathey
Chinni Sai Krishna Shreya Pathey (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the Lord of Kashi or Varanasi (Shiva) holding Ganges in the matted locked hair, the resident of Shirdi and presently Parthi as little Sai Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kasturi Ranga Kaveri Ranga Sri Ranga Ranga Ranga
Kalyana Ranga Karunanta Ranga
Sri Ranga Ranga Ranga
Garuda Gamana Ranga Shesha Shayana Ranga
Sri Ranga Ranga Ranga
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the name of Ranga with the scented vermillion on his forehead, having an enchanting form. The Lord has Garuda as his chariot and who reclines in serpent Adishesha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kasturi Tilakam Narayanam
Kamala Nayanam Narayanam |Kasturi...|
Guruvayur Pura Narayanam
Kali Yuga Avatara Narayanam
Govinda Govinda Narayanam (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lotus eyed Narayana adorning the scented vermillion is the presiding deity at Guruvayur is also the cowherd boy who has incarnated in this Kali age.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kausalya Nandana Vaidehi Mohana
Rajeeva Lochana Rama
Yuga Avatara Parameshwara Rama
Asurani Khandana Kodanda Rama
Bharatarchita Sri Rama Parthi Pureeshwara Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lotus eyed Rama, the son of Kausalya, enchanter of Vaidehi is the incarnation of the age. Salutations to the bow wielding Rama who was worshipped by his brother Bharata, uprooter of the demon clan, now dwells at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kausalya Rama Karunya Dhama
Ravana Mardhana Rama Sri Rama |Kausalya...|
Ahalyodharaka Rama Sri Rama
Maruti Sevitha Rama Sri Rama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Jaya Jaya Rama (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Rama! the abode of compassion, you are the beloved of Kausalya, slayer of Ravana, redeemer of Ahalya from her curse. Victory to you Rama who is served by Maruti (monkey God).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kausalya Sutha Ram Rama Ram
Dasharatha Nandana Danava Bhanjana Dasha Mukha Mardhana Ram |Kausalya...|
Karuna Samudra Ram Rama Ram
Krupa Sagara Ram Rama Ram |Dasharatha Nandana|
Devotional Song Meaning: We adore you Rama the son of Kausalya and Dasharatha. You are the annihilator of demons and ten headed demon Ravana. You are the ocean of compassion and kindness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kausalyatmaja Rama Charan
Vaidehi Priya Rama Charan
Maruti Sevitha Rama Charan
Bharatarchita Sri Rama Charan
Ahalyodharaka Rama Charan
Shanthi Niketana Rama Charan (Pra)
Rama Charan Sada Bhajo
Devotional Song Meaning: Adhere to the feet of Rama Oh mind, the son of Kausalya, enchanter of Vaidehi, one who was served by Maruti, worshipped by Bharata and to the one who confers supreme peace.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Keshava Madhava
Govinda Gopala
Hari Bol Hari Bol Hari Hari Bol
Keshava Madhava Govinda Bol
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mind chant the name of Hari, Keshava, Madhava, Govinda and Gopala incessantly.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Keshava Madhava Jaya Deva Madhusudhana
Netra Kamala Dala Athiva Manohara
Antaryami Prabhu Parameshwara
Maya Manusha Vesha Leeladhara (2)
Maya Manusha Vesha Leeladhara (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of the lotus eyed, the indweller and supremely enchanting Lord Keshava, Madhava, Madhusudhana who has taken the deluding human form as a sport.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Keshava Madhava Madhusudhana
Sridhara Sundara Narayana |Keshava Madhava...|
Murali Manohara Janardhana
Achyutha Anantha Narayana (3)
Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the various names of the same Lord Narayana. Keshava, Madhava, Madhusudhana, Sridhara, Murali Mohana, Janardhana, Achyutha, Govinda and Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Keshava Narayana Govinda Murari
Madhava Madhusudhana Damodara Shourie
Keshava Narayana Govinda Murari
Madhava Madhusudhana Damodara Shourie
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Keshava, Narayana, Govinda, Murari, Madhava, Madhusudhana, Damodara and Shourie.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Khagapati Vahana Jagat Paripalana
Garuda Gamana Hari Narayana (2)
Nigamagamanutha Nirupama Sannuta
Nirupama Guna Sathya Narayana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Our Salutations to you Oh Lord Narayana, you are the ruler of this Universe riding on Garuda (The king of Birds), the one who is praised by Vedas, the one who is supreme in virtues, Oh Lord Sathya Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kodanda Ram Kalyana Ram
Janaki Ram Jaya Jaya Ram
Ananda Ram Ayodhya Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Ram (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Rama wielder of Kodanda (bow), bestower of auspiciousness. You are the life of Janaki (Sita). You are the blissful Rama of Ayodhya and at present Parthi as Shri Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Kodanda Rama Kalyana Rama
Janaki Rama Jaya Rama
Karunya Rama Lavanya Rama
Palita Sundara Sri Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the bow wielding Rama, one who fosters, compassionate and charming and consort of Janaki is full of sacred attributes.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Koi Boley Hari Hari Koi Boley Ram Ram
Koi Boley Durga Kaali Koi Boley Sai Ma
Koi Boley Narayana Allah Bismillah
Koi Boley Nanak Yesu Buddha Mahaveera
Sadhu Sant Fakira Jaane Sab Hai Tero Naam
Bol Man Allah Malik Bol Man Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Some may call God as Hari while some others may call Ram. Some may say Durga Kaali but some others Sai Ma. If Hindus call him Narayana, Muslims call Allah Bismillah and yet some others Nanak, Yesu, Buddha and Mahaveer. Saints, Sages and Fakirs (Muslim Saints) know that One Same God is known by different names.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Koti Pranam Shata Koti Pranam
Hey Deena Natha Sai Ram (3)
Tum Ho Bhakthon Ke Yuga Avatar
Tum Ho Ananda Nanda Ke Lal
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Gopal |Hey Deena Natha|
Devotional Song Meaning: Many repeated Pranaams to you the refuge of the forlorn, Sai Rama. You were born as the son of Nanda and presently the incarnation of our age, Sai Gopala residing at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Bhajo Krishna Bhajo Murali Gopal
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopal
Nandatmaja Nanda Navaneetha Chora
Ghana Shyama Radha Karuna Kataksha |Radhey Govinda...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name Krishna who is having enchanting flute fostering cows and people, is Govinda with dark blue complexion compassionate beloved of Radhey, son of Nanda stealer of butter.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Bhajo Krishna Bhajo Murali Govinda Bhajo
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopala Bhajo |Krishna Bhajo...|
Giridhari Shyama Bhajo Gopi Gopala Bhajo
Murali Madhava Nanda Mukunda Bhajo
Madhuvana Sanchari Shyama Gopala Bhajo (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Krishna, the one holding the flute the one with consort Radha, dark complexioned who held aloft the Govardhan mountain, dear Gopala of the Gopis who moved about the forest inhabited by demon Madhu.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Gopal Krishna Gopal
Darshan Do Merey Sai Nandalal
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bal
Radha Madhava Shyama Gopal
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Gopal |Darshana Do|
Devotional Song Meaning: Grant me darshan Oh son of Nanda and the Lord of Meera, the dark complexioned consort of Radha you are Sai Gopal the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Gopala Yadu Nandana
Venu Vilolana Mana Mohana |Krishna Gopala|
Mora Mukuta Gokula Ramana
Ghana Shyama Ananda Govinda
Krishna Murari Madhusudhana
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of God by chanting His various names. Krishna, Gopala, Yadu nandana, Ghana Shyama, Govinda, Ananda, Murari. Krishna delights in Playing Flute, is enchanting in form with a peacock plumage on His head and cheiftain of Gokul.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Hari Keshava Narayana
Krishna Hari Madhava Narayana
Krishna Madhusudhana Narayana
Krishna Mana Mohana Narayana
Krishna Krishna Jai Jai Govinda Krishna Jai Jai (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the glorious names of Krishna that is Hari, Keshava, Narayana, Madhava, Madhusudhana (slayer of demon Madhu) having a charming form. Victory unto Govinda Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Kanhaiya Bansi Bhajaiyya
Paar Karo Merey Jeevana Naiya
Nanda Ji Ke Bala Murali Gopala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala |Paar Karo|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Play boy Krishna! Carry the boat of my Life across to the other side. You are the son of Nanda, who played the Flute, lifted the Mountain and the Lord of Meera.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Kanhaiya Krishna Kanhaiya
Jaya Jaya Gopala Bhaiyya |Krishna Kanhaiya...|
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora
Narayana Avatara Sai |Krishna Kanhaiya...|
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Govardhanodhara Krishna Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Krishna and Gopala son of Nanda, who stole butter. He is the Incarnation of Narayana, beloved of Gopis and who lifted Govardhana mountain on the finger tips.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Kanhaiya Krishna Kanhaiya
Jaya Jaya Gopala Bhaiyya |Krishna Kanhaiya...|
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora
Narayana Avatara Sai |Krishna Kanhaiya...|
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Govardhanodhara Krishna Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Krishna and Gopala son of Nanda, who stole butter. He is the Incarnation of Narayana, beloved of Gopis and who lifted Govardhana mountain on the finger tips.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Gopala Krishna
Mukunda Madhava Gopala Krishna |Krishna Krishna...|
Nanda Ananda Gopala Krishna
Satchidananda Sri Sayeesha Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the glorious name Krishna whose other names are Govinda, Mukunda (one who liberates), Madhava (one who is having Lakshmi on the chest), beloved of Nanda of Gokula and embodiment of existence- awareness-bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Govinda Krishna Gopala Bala Krishna
Nanda Nandana Bhaktha Chandana Gaana Lola Krishna
Sundara Vadana Saroja Nayana Radha Priya Krishna
Yadava Krishna Yashoda Krishna Sathya Sai Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: Krishna is the son of Nanda, who is dear to His devotees and delights in Music. He is Lotus eyed, with a charming countenance and dear to Radha. He belongs to the Yadava clan, son of Yashoda who has presently incarnated as Sathya Sai Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Govinda Narayana
Krishna Rama Govinda Narayana
Sai Rama Govinda Sai Shyama Gopala
Sai Krishna Govinda Narayana (Harey)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the Name of Krishna, Govinda, Narayana, Sai Rama, Sai Shyama and Sai Krishna to the delight of everyone.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Jaya Gopi Ramana
Bhaktha Vatsala Jeevana
Radha Madhava Mohana (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Krishna the Lord of the Gopis, the life of His devotees. Radha and Madhava lure everyone around.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Krishna Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Krishna
Govinda Gopala Krishna Narayana (Sai) (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the various names of Lord Krishna namely Radhey, Govinda, Gopala, Narayana and Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Madhava Madhusudhana
Yadava Yadu Kula Yadu Nandana
Govardhanodhara Gopi Ramana
Bhaktha Janodhara Bhava Bhaya Harana
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glories of Krishna, Madhava, the slayer of demon Madhu, one of Yadava lineage. Krishna held aloft the Govardhana Hill with His little finger in order to save Gopis and Gopas. He is the redeemer of His devotees and destroys the fear of rebirth.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Mana Mohana
Chitha Chora Radha Jeevana
Megha Shyama Madhusudhana
Radha Kantha Yadu Nandana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Krishna! You have an enchanting form, dear to Radha, dark in complexion and slayer of demon Madhu. You belong to the Yadu clan and have stolen our hearts.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Mukunda Janardhana
Krishna Govinda Narayana Hari
Achyuthananda Govinda Madhava
Satchidananda Narayana Hari
Achyuthananda Govinda Madhava |Satchidananda|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the different names of the imperishable Lord Krishna, Mukunda, Janardhana, Govinda, Narayana and Hari who is verily Truth, Awareness and Bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Mukunda Murari
Gopi Gopi Jana Giridhari |Krishna Krishna...|
Meera Ke Prabhu Muralidhari
Radha Mohana Shyama Murari |Gopi Gopi Jana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Krishna, Mukunda and Murari, the One who lifted the Mountain for sake of Gopis. The Lord of Meera's devotion, one with the Flute, the dark coloured charmer of Radha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Radha Krishna
Govinda Gopala Venu Krishna
Mohana Krishna Madhusudhana Krishna
Murari Krishna Mukunda Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of various forms of Krishna, the one with flute, with his consort Radha, the Charmer, who slayed demon Madhu, Mura, Krishna as Vishnu Himself.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Yaduvara Krishna
Murahara Keshava Yadava Madhava |Krishna Krishna...|
Murali Manohara Krishna Murari
Krishna Murari Shyama Murari |Murahara Keshava|
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Krishna was born of Yadhava clan, dark complexioned, slayer of demon Madhu and Mura having an enchanting form with the flute.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Madhava Madhava Krishna
Krishna Madhava Sai Harey
Brindavana Sanchari Shyama Gopala
Jaya Madhusudhana Jaya Nandalala
Jhulana Jhuley Merey Sai Nandalala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Krishna of the Madhu lineage, the dark complexioned son of Nanda, one who moved about in Brindavan, please swing in our hearts O Sai Nanda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Mukunda Govinda Giridhara
Murali Mohana Narayana
Parthi Purandara Narayana (2)
Madhava Sri Hari Mandara Giridhari
Govinda Murahara Narayana (Harey) |Parthi Purandara Narayana (2)|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord, Krishna, Mukunda, Govinda, Giridhara, Murali Mohana, Narayana, Madhava, Srihari, Murahara and the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Murari Bhava Bhaya Haari Hey Giridhari Gopal
Parthi Vihari Hrudaya Vihari Bhaktha Sakha Bhagawan
Bhaktha Sakha Bhagawan (Sai) (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: The slayer of demon Murari also destroys the fear of the cycle of birth and death, the resident of Parthi is the true friend of his devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Murari Muralidhari
Gopi Vallabha Giridhari
Hrudaya Vihari Leeladhari
Parthi Vihari Sai Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Krishna who holds the flute in hand, held the mountain high, is dear to the Gopikas. Krishna who is ever playful, resides in the hearts of beings, is Sai Murari residing at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Murari Muralidhari
Gopi Vallabha Giridhari
Hrudaya Vihari Leeladhari
Parthi Vihari Sai Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Krishna who holds the flute in hand, held the mountain high, is dear to the Gopikas. Krishna who is ever playful, resides in the hearts of beings, is Sai Murari residing at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Radha Jaya Krishna Radha
Nanda Gopa Bala Navaneetha Chora |Krishna Radha...|
Krishna Radha Jaya Krishna Radha (3) |Nanda Gopa|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the Name of Krishna who is dear to Radha, the son of Nanda and the One who stole Butter (worldly desires of devotees).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Rama Govinda Gokula Nandana Gopala
Rama Krishna Govinda Trayee Brindavana Gopala
Sai Krishna Govinda Parthi Pureeshwara Gopala
Sai Ram Sai Shyam
Gopi Manohara Gokula Bala Sai Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Gopala who is the the delight of everyone at Gokula especially the Gopikas is also Sri Rama of the Treta age and Sai Shyam residing at Trayee Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Krishna Rama Govinda Narayana Madhava Keshava Hari Narayana |Krishna Rama...| Sri Venu Gopala Krishna Madhava Madhusudhana Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Narayana is the one who resides in the heart of Nara (man) is also Rama, Govinda the one bearing the flute in His Hands, slayer of demon Madhu.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishna Sri Hari Krishna
Govinda Gopala Krishna Krishna
Nanda Mukunda Govinda Navaneetha Chora Gopala
Govinda Gopala Gokula Nandana Gopala
Krishna Sri Hari Krishna
Krishna Sri Sai Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the Various names of the Lord, Krishna, Hari, Govinda, Gopala, Mukunda, of the son of Nanda and the One who steals butter and Sai Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishnam Vande Nanda Kumaram
Radha Vallabha Navaneetha Choram
Ramam Vande Dasharatha Tanayam
Sita Vallabha Raghukula Tilakam
Muralidhara Sukumara Sharanam
Gopi Vallabha Nanda Kishoram
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow to the little Krishna, the son of Nanda, consort of Radha, the one who stole butter and had a tender body, was the beloved guardian of Gopikas. I bow to Rama, the son of Dasharatha, consort of Sita and the crown of the Raghu dynasty.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishnam Vande Nanda Kumaram
Radha Vallabha Navaneetha Choram
Ramam Vande Dasharatha Tanayam
Sita Vallabha Raghukula Tilakam
Muralidhara Sukumara Sharanam
Gopi Vallabha Nanda Kishoram
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow to the little Krishna, the son of Nanda, consort of Radha, the one who stole butter and had a tender body, was the beloved guardian of Gopikas. I bow to Rama, the son of Dasharatha, consort of Sita and the crown of the Raghu dynasty.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krishnaya Charanam Krishnaya Charanam Krishnaya Charanam Namo Namo
Krishnaya Charanam Namo Namo (2)
Sayeesha Charanam Sayeesha Charanam Sayeesha Charanam Namo Namo
Sayeesha Charanam Namo Namo (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Many prostrations at the Feet of Lord Krishna and Sayeesha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krupa Karo Hey Krupa Nidhey
Daya Karo Hey Daya Nidhey
Paapa Mitao Parthi Pathey
Raksha Karo Dharma Kshetra Pathey
Devotional Song Meaning: Show mercy on us, Oh the ocean of compassion and the Lord of Parthi. Protect us by removing the sins committed by us, Oh the Lord of Dharmakshetra.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Krupa Karo Mujhey Sai Murari
Dukhiyan Hoon Main Darsha Bhikhari |Krupa|
Tum Ho Merey Nayanon Ke Taarey
Darshan Do Mujhey Prabhu Giridhari
Krupa Karo Mujhey Sai Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Show mercy on me Oh Sai Murari, I feel depressed without your vision. Grant me your Vision Oh Lord, the One who lifted the Govardhana Mountain. You are the Star of my Eyes.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ksheerabdhi Shayana Narayana
Sri Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Vaikunta Vasa Narayana
Vaidehi Mohana Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Natajana Paripala Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the Name Lord Narayana who reclines on the Ocean of Milk, consort of Sri Lakshmi and who Incarnated as Narasimha (half Man half Lion). Narayana who has Vaikunta as His Abode, is the charmer of Vaidehi, the One who takes complete care of those who have surrendered to Him.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Lagaley Man SaiBhajan Se Preet
Mata Pitha Sutha Bandhava Naari
