Sab Do Din Ke Meet Samajh Man
Sai Bhajan Se Preet
Sai Prabho Nija Bandhu Tumharo
Sada Rahey Tero Meet Samajh Man
Bolo Ram Ghana Shyam
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai Ram, who is the real friend and kin, who will always be with you. Hook your mind to the loving Sai Bhajans. All your kith and kin, like, mother, father, children and spouse are just friends for few moments only.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Lakshmi Saranga Dhara Sita Pathi Raghuveera Radhey Govinda
Rakumayi Panduranga
Sathya Sai Panduranga
Devotional Song Meaning: The Valiant one of Raghu dynasty who holds the arrows is the Lord of Sita, Incarnation of Lakshmi. Chant the names of Govinda the Lord of Radha and Panduranga the Lord of Rakumayi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Lambodhara Gananatha Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Shubhanana
Pashupathi Tanaya Siddhi Vinayaka
Pranavakara Shambho Nandana
Parthi Pureesha Paahi Gajanana
Hey Shiva Nandana Shubhanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect me Oh the Lord of Ganas, having an elephant head and the big bellied son of Parvathi and Shiva who embodies the sacred Pranava and is the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Lambodhara Hey Gowri Nandana
Vighna Vinashaka Shubhanana
Siddhi Vinayaka Hey Dukha Bhanjana
Asura Vinashaka Shubhanana
Gowri Nandana Mooshika Vahana |Vighna Vinashaka|
Devotional Song Meaning: Vinayaka is the son of Gowri who removes obstacles, destroys worry and grants spiritual powers, bestows Auspiciousness and uproots the demon clan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Lambodhara Hey Vighneshwara
Shambhu Kumara Siddeshwara
Ambika Tanaya Omkaareshwara
Heyramba Sai Shirdeeshwara (Partheeshwara)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of the Lord who removes obstacles, the son of Shambhu and Ambika, who has a big stomach. He is he Lord of Yogis, the embodiment of Omkaara, also known as Heyramba, is also the Eshwar of Shirdi and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Lambodhara Jaya Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Parama Daya Ghana |Lambodhara...|
Bandha Vimochana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Pranava Swaroopa Hey Shiva Nandana
Paahi Prabho Maam Paahi Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect me the elephant headed and the big bellied Lord, son of Mother Parvathi and Shiva, the remover of bondage and fear of birth and death, the very form of the sacred Om.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Lambodhara Jaya Gowri Sutha
Ganadhipa Jaya Gajanana |Lambodhara...|
Phaalachandra Dhara Gaja Karneshwara
Partheeshwara Maam (Sayeeshwara Maam) Paahi Prabho
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lord of Ganas and the son of Mother Gowri, who has an elephant head, is the one who holds the crescent moon, has big ears as that of an elephant. Protect me the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Lavanya Roopa Lambodhara
Shambho Kumara Shankari Bala |Lavanya Roopa|
Pranava Kaara Prasanna Roopa
Paalaya Maam Prabhu Partheeshwara
Eka Dantha Jai Jai Ganesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord of Ganas, who has a charming form, a Pleasant face, a Big belly, son of Shambho and Shankari. Protect me Oh Lord with a single tusk, the source of the Primordial sound, the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Lingodhbhavakara Lingeshwara
Partheeshwara Maam Paahi Prabho
Paahi Prabho Maam Dehi Vibho
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect us the Lord of Parthi, You are Lingeshwara and the one who creates Lingam out of his own self.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ma Hey Ma
Hey Ma Hey Ma
Sai Mata Jagat Janani |Ma Hey Ma...|
Veena Vadini Saraswathi Mata
Jagat Palini Gowri Mata
Ambey Bhavani Lakshmi Mata |Sai Mata|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Universal Mother Sai, Saraswathi who plays on the Veena (a stringed instrument), Gowri who sustains the Universe, Lakshmi and Ambey Bhavani.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ma Saraswathi Gyaan Do
Vidya Buddhi Daan Do |Ma Saraswathi|
Prema Daayini Shanthi Daayini
Bhakthi Mukti Pradayini
Sai Mata Taar Do
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mother Sai, bestow us the spiritual knowledge, the education and the intelligence. Oh mother, you are personification of Love and Peace, Devotion and Liberation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhava Gopala
Madhusudhana Hari Giridhara
Mukunda Madhava Parthi Vihara
Muralidhara Hari Sundara
Muralidhara Hari Sundara (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to Madhava, Gopala, Madhusudhana, Hari, Giridhara, Mukunda, Muralidhara, Sundara who has Incarnated again in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhava Gopala
Madhusudhana Hari Giridhara
Mukunda Madhava Parthi Vihara
Muralidhara Hari Sundara
Muralidhara Hari Sundara (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to Madhava, Gopala, Madhusudhana, Hari, Giridhara, Mukunda, Muralidhara, Sundara who has Incarnated again in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhava Harey Krishna Madhura Mohana
Gokula Balana Devaki Nandana
Venu Vilolana Paapa Vinashana |Madhava Harey...|
Radhika Jeevana Rajeeva Nayana
Nanda Sunandana Gopi Ramana |Venu Vilolana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh son of Devaki, dear child of Gokula, who bears the flute and destroys sin. He is lotus eyed, the very life of Radha, the ever joyful Lord of Gopis.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhava Harey Madhusudhana Harey
Yadava Harey Yadu Nandana Harey
Keshava Harey Radha Krishna Harey
Janardhana Mana Mohana Harey
Sai Satchidananda Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the different names of Krishna, of Yadava lineage, Madhava, Madhusudhana the charmer of the minds and hearts of men and the very embodiment of Truth, Awareness and Bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhava Keshava Narayana
Sri Ramana Veda Parayana
Bhava Bhaya Harana Narayana
Tribhuvana Bharana Narayana (Hey)
Devotional Song Meaning: Narayana is the one who reclines on Adishesha also known as Madhava and Keshava is the remover of the fear of birth and death, wholly devoted to the promotion of Vedas and the Lord of the three worlds.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhava Madhava
Madhusudhana Hari Madhava
Mathuradhipathey Keshava Madhava |Madhava...|
Mohana Murali Mukunda Madhava
Pavana Parthi Pura Hari Madhava
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Jaya Hari Madhava
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the descendant of King Madhu, slayer of demon Madhu, Lord of Mathura who is attractive to behold and the resident of sacred land of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhava Madhusudhana (Hey)
Yadava Kula Bhooshana Harey Krishna |(Hey) Madhava...|
Jagat Palana Jaganmohana Hey Nandana
Devotional Song Meaning: Praise the Lord the annihilator of demon Madhu, the Ornament of Yadava Clan, son of Nanda and the One who enchants and nourishes the Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhava Mohana Muralidhara
Muralidhara Muralidhara |Madhava Mohana|
Yadava Sai Narayana
Nanda Mukunda Narayana
Navaneetha Chora Narayana |Nanda Mukunda|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana you have taken birth in the Yadava clan as the son of Nanda, one who steals the butter (of worldly desires) from the hearts of your devotees, holds the flute and charms everyone around.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhava Mohana Murari
Madhusudhana Hey Muralidhara |Madhava Mohana...|
Govinda Ananda Dayaka
Gopala Giridhari Sri Hari
Sri Hari Sai Sri Hari
Devotional Song Meaning: Sri Hari is one of the various names of Lord Krishna the slayer of demons Mura and Madhu, holds the flute and held the mountain aloft and gives Supreme bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhava Mohana Shyama Gopala
Muralidhara Mukunda Gopala
Dwapara Yug Mey Krishna Gopala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Shyama Manohara Hey Nandalala
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Gopala who had taken birth in the Dwapara age, Lord of Meera, son of Nanda has come again as Sai Gopala at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhava Mohana Shyama Murari
Radha Vallabha Hrudaya Vihari |Madhava Mohana|
Murali Vinodana Madhuvana Sanchari
Sai Murari Sai Murari
Sharan Mey Lelo Prabhu Charana Tumhari
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Krishna who is the consort of Radha and has the human Heart as His abode, He delights in Playing the Flute and moves about in the forests of Madhu. Oh Sai Murari I bow to your feet, Hence accept me into your fold.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhava Murahara Murali Gopala
Jaya Govinda Jaya Gopala
Parthi Purandara Parama Daya Ghana
Deena Janavana Sai Gopala |Jaya Govinda|
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Govinda and Gopala of unbounded compassion, dear to the forlorn, is the life principle at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhava Murahara Murali Manohara Giridhara Gopala
Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala
Nanda Kumara Sundarakara Brindavana Sanchara
Murali Lola Munijana Pala Giridhara Gopala |Hey Giridhara Gopala|
Kaustubha Haara Mouktika Haara Radha Hrudaya Vihara
Bhakthodhara Bala Gopala Giridhara Gopala |Hey Giridhara Gopala|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing continuously the Glories of the One who lifted the Govardhan Hill to protect His tribesmen from the wrath of Lord Indra in the form of Downpour of Rain. He is the son of Nanda, with a bewitching form, who moves about in Brindavan. He loves playing the Flute and meditated upon by the Sages. He is the One who wears the Emeralds and pearls on His Bosom and the Resurrector of His devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhava Roopa Manusha Vesha
Sai Maharaj Sathya Sai Maharaj |Madhava Roopa...|
Dattatreya Daiva Swaroopa
Devadi Deva Sai Maharaj
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Madhava has taken a Human Form as the Emperor Sathya Sai, who is also Lord Dattatreya, the Divine Personality and the Lord of Lords.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhura Madhura Hey Muralidhari
Murahara Shourie Hey Giridhari
Hrudaya Vihari Parthi Vihari
Hari Hari Sri Hari Sai Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Hari is the one born as Krishna, the one who gives bliss, resident of every heart and resident of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhura Madhura Murali Ghana Shyama
Mathuradhipathey Radhey Shyama
Surdas Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Meera Ke Prabhu Hrudaya Vihari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh dark complexioned Shyama, Lord of Mathura one who resides in everyone's heart, is also the Lord of Surdas and Meera.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhura Madhura Muralidhara Madhava Madhusudhana Sri Krishna
Neela Bala Sri Krishna Vanamali Abharana Krishna
Vijaya Sarathi Krishna Venu Vilola Krishna
Geeta Bodhaka Krishna Parthasarathey Krishna
Sharanam Sharanam Sri Krishna Raksha Raksha Sai Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: I have surrendered to You Sri Krishna, who slayed demon Madhu, the one who is sweetness personified and a delightful Flutist. Krishna, who has adorned a flower garland, is of blue complexion. He is the Successful charioteer of Partha (Arjuna) and the One who has taught Geeta (Bhagawad Geeta). Protect me Sai Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhura Madhura Sai Naama
Madhura Madhura Sai Dhyana |Madhura Madhura...|
Madhura Madhura Sai Geeta
Madhura Madhura Sai Bodha
Sundara Sundara Sai Roopa
Jayatu Jayatu Sai Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glories of the Lord whose Name, Contemplation, Song, Teachings are all Sweetness Personified and His Form is Beauty Personified.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhura Manohara Madana Gopal
Madhura Sudha Rasa Murali Gopal
Murali Gopal Murali Gopal
Radha Manohara Radhey Gopal
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Gopal whose vision delights everyone, who is the essence of Sweetness, one who delights Radha and the Lord with the Flute.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhuram Madhuram Madhuram (Ati)
Mangala Naamam Madhuram Madhuram
Madhava Naamam Madhuram (Sai) |Ati Madhuram...|
Shravanam Madhuram Smaranam Madhuram
Sathyam Madhuram Sai Madhuram
Sarvam Madhuram Seva Madhuram |(Sai) Madhava|
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lord is sweetness personified and hence everything about Him is sweet. His name, his speech, his thought, the service done to HIM is sweet too.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhuram Sai Madhuram Madhuram
Madhuram Sai Sarvam Madhuram |Madhuram...|
Geetam Madhuram Shravanam Madhuram
Naamam Madhuram Smaranam Madhuram
Paadam Madhuram Dhyanam Madhuram
Sai Madhuram Darshana Madhuram (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sai is Sweetness personified. His Songs, Discourses, Name, Meditation, Chanting, Gift of Vision, Touching His Feet are all sweet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhusudhana Harey Madhava
Sri Vasudeva (Sai Deva) Janardhana
Hari Keshava Narayana
Sri Hari Govinda Mana Mohana
Janardhana Jagat Palana
Deenavana Dukha Bhanjana
Aravinda Lochana Ananda Naam |Sri Vasudeva|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Madhusudhana, Madhava, Vasudeva, Janardhana, Hari, Keshava, Narayana and Govinda. Chant the names of One who charms the Mind, Motivator of people, sustainer of the Universe, destroyer of sorrows, Lotus eyed, whose name itself is Bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhusudhana Hey Muralidhara
Madhava Keshava Devadi Deva |Madhusudhana Hey...|
Mana Mohana Hey Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana |Mana Mohana Hey|
Bhuvana Abharana Vanditha Charana
Devotional Song Meaning: Madhusudhana, Muralidhara, Madhava, Keshava, Mana Mohana are different names of the same Lord Narayana. Sai Narayana the bestower of Auspiciousness, jewel of the Earth and feet worthy of obeisance.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhuvan Ke Mohana Murali Bhajaiyya
Giridhari Nanda Kumara Kanhaiya
Ananda Ram Balaram Ji Ke Bhaiyya (2)
Giridhari Nanda Kumara Kanhaiya
Gopi Manohara Raasa Rachaiya
Giridhari Nanda Kumara Kanhaiya (2)
Giridhari Nanda Kumara Kanhaiya
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh adorable Krishna, you are the son of Nanda, the brother of Balaram, the one who gives bliss and the enchanting one who dances with the Gopikas.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhuvana Ke Muraliwala
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala |Nacho Nacho|
Gopi Manohara Gopala Bala
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Sai Natha |Nacho Nacho|
Devotional Song Meaning: Dance Oh son of Nanda dance, the one who holds the flute, moving around the forest of demon Madhu, the Gopala of Gopis, the dear Sai of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhuvana Murali Guna Gao
Madhusudhana Hari Naam Japo |Madhuvana Murali...|
Vraja Gopi Priya Radhey Shyam Naam
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram Naam
Hrudaya Vihari Sri Sathya Sai Ram
Gowri Manohara Shankara Naam Bhajo
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Krishna, chant the name of Madhusudhana, the beloved Radheyshyam of the Gopis of Vraj Brindavan, Sita Ram of the Raghu dynasty, Shankara who charms Gowri and of Sathya Sai Rama who resides in everyone's heart.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhuvana Murali Shyama Bhajo
Madhura Manohara Krishna Bhajo
Radha Madhava Shyama Bhajo
Brindavana Gopala Bhajo
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the sweet name of Krishna of enchanting beauty, consort of Radha, of Gopala who moves about in Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhuvana Murali Shyama Murari
Savariya Morey Raasa Vihari
Gokula Nandana Hey Giridhari
Deenan Ke Tum Bhava Bhaya Haari (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh dear Lord Krishna who plays Raasaleela (celestial dance), dear child of Gokula, who lifted the Govardhan mountain and the one who removes the fear of birth and death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madhuvana Sanchari Shyama Murari
Sri Madhusudhana Muralidhari |Madhuvana Sanchari...|
Madhava Mohana Mayura Mukutadhara
Mathura Natha Prabhu (Sai) Giridhari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Krishna! You are the slayer of demon Mura and who moved about in the forest of demon Madhu to slay him. You have worn the feather of the Peacock on your head and is the Lord of Mathura who lifted the Govardhan mountain.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Madura Puri Nilayey Meenakshi
Kamakoti Nilayey Kamakshi
Kashi Puradheeshwari Vishweshwari
Parthi Puradheeshwari Sayeeshwari
Devotional Song Meaning: Goddess Meenakshi has Her Abode in Madura, Kamakshi has Abode in Kanchi Kamakoti, Vishweshwari has Her Abode in Kashi and Sayeeshwari has Her Abode in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Maha Ganapathey Gajanana
Uma Maheshwara Priya Nandana |Maha Ganapathey...|
Gananayaka Vanditha charana
Tava Charanam Bhava Bhaya Harana |Uma Maheshwara|
Devotional Song Meaning: The dear son of Uma Maheshwari is the Elephant faced Lord of Ganas whose feet are worshipped by everyone. Prostrations to you Oh Lord, the destroyer of cycle of Birth and death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Maha Ganapathey Namostuthey
Matanga Mukha Namostuthey |Maha Ganapathey...|
Himadrija Sutha Namostuthey
Omkaareshwara Namostuthey (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Pranaams to the great Lord of Ganas, the elephant headed son of Parvathi, born of Himalaya mountains and the very embodiment of sacred syllable Om.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Maha Ganapathey Namostuthey
Matanga Mukha Namostuthey |Maha Ganapathey...|
Himadrija Sutha Namostuthey
Omkaareshwara Namostuthey (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Pranaams to the great Lord of Ganas, the elephant headed son of Parvathi, born of Himalaya mountains and the very embodiment of sacred syllable Om.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mahadeva Maheshwara Sai Narayana
Nata Naagara Dukha Bhanjana Sai Narayana
Karunakara Akhileshwara Sai Narayana
Allah Ho Tum Mahaveer Yesu Sai Narayana
Hrudayeshwara Partheeshwara Sai Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Sai Narayana is the Lord of all worlds, Epitome of compassion, Destroyer of Sin, Playful and the Lord of Lords. Sai Narayana is Allah, Mahaveer and Yesu. He is the indweller and the Lord of Parthi as well.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mahadeva Shiva Shambho Shankara
Maheshwara Shiva Shambho Shankara |Mahadeva...|
Mouleeshwara Shiva Shambho Shankara
Madanantaka Shiva Shambho Shankara
Mruthyunjaya Shiva Shambho Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Shiva the Lord of Lords, Sovereign Lord, with the braided Hair on His Head, Destroyer of Ego and the Conqueror of Death, is the One who confers all that is Auspicious.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mahishasura Mardhini Mama Taapa Vimochani
Madhava Sodari Mangala Kaarini |Mahishasura Mardhini|
Puttapartheeshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari
Sangeeta Roopini Saraswathi Manohari
Devotional Song Meaning: Praises to the slayer of Mahisha, the remover of my sins, the sister of Lord Madhava, the bestower of auspiciousness and Saraswathi, the very form of music, is also Sathya Sayeeshwari, the dweller at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Man Ek Baar Hari Bol
Hari Hari Bol Hari Bol |Man Ek Baar...|
Hari Pitha Hari Mata
Hari Guru Gnana Daata
Chidananda Roopa Hari Patitha Pavana Man Ek Baar Hari Bol
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! chant the name of Lord Hari even once, who is the Mother, Father, Preceptor and the one who bestows wisdom, the very form of Awareness and Bliss, redeemer of the downtrodden.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Man Mandir Mey Aao Giridhari
Nis Din Barsat Nayan Hamarey |Man Mandir...|
Surdas Ke Shyama Murari
Akhiyan Terey Darsha Ke Pyaasi (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord please be seated in our minds, our eyes are shedding tears of separation from you. Oh Lord of Surdas! Our eyes are pining to have your Darshan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Man Mandir Mey Aao Sai
Sai Bhagawan Darsha Dikhao |Man Mandir|
Sada Nirantara Bhajo Sai Ram
Giridhara Naagara Natawara Shyam |Sai Bhagawan|
Devotional Song Meaning: Come and Grant me Your Vision in the Altar of my Mind Oh Sai Bhagawan. Chant the Name of Sai continuously, Supreme actor, who was the Lord of Meera.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Man Mandir Mey Rajadhi Raja
Tum Ho Sai Maharaj
Narthana Sundara Nataraja
Shivakami Priya Shiva Raja |Tum Ho Sai|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai you are the king of kings enshrined in my heart, you are the Shiva Raja the beloved of Mother Shivakami and the master of dance.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Man Mandir Mey Sai Ram
Megha Shyam Radhey Shyam Sathya Sai Ram
Sri Ram Jaya Ram
Janam Janam Ka Tum Se Naata
Parthi Puri Parameshwara Roopa
Deena Dayala Hey Jagannatha |Parthi Puri Parameshwara|
Charan Mey Lelo Prabhu Sai Ram |Megha Shyam|
Devotional Song Meaning: The dark complexioned Krishna, Radha's consort is the same as Sathya Sai Ram dwelling in everyone's heart. Accept me in your fold the refuge of the forlorn. You have been my Lord since many lives.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Man Mey Merey Gopala Shyama Radhey Nandalala
Shyama Gopala Sai Gopala
Brindavan Ke Nandalala (2)
Yashoda Tanaya Gopala
Yadu Kula Tilaka Gopala
Radha Lola Gopala
Raasa Vilola Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh son of Nandalala and Yashoda you are enshrined in my heart, the star of Yadu clan, beloved of Radha, one who dances with the Gopikas at Brindavan known as Raasa Leela.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mana Bangaru Parthi Baba
Mana Shringara Vadana Sai |Mana Bangaru|
Antaryami Baba
Sarva Antaryami Sai (Mana)
Devotional Song Meaning: Our dearest Baba of Parthi the indweller of all beings has a charming face and a golden heart.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Ghana Shyama Gopala
Mathura Natha Venu Gopala |Mana Mohana Ghana...|
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora
Parthi Vihara Sai Gopala (2) |Mathura Natha|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh the Lord of Mathura, Gopala you lure the minds of human beings, the son of Nanda, you steal the butter of devotion from everybody's heart, Oh Sai Gopala the one dwelling at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Giridhara Shyama Harey
Shyama Harey Ghana Shyama Harey
Krishna Mukunda Ananda Chanda
Brindavana Ghana Shyama Mukunda
Sai Mukunda Hari Govinda |Brindavana Ghana|
Baba Harey Sai Baba Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Giridhara, Shyama, Krishna, Mukunda, Hari, Govinda and Sai Baba. Krishna lures the mind, has the complexion that of dark blue clouds.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Hey Giridhari Shyama
Mathura Natha Sundara Shyama
Natawara Naagara Megha Shyama
Nayana Manohara Sri Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Krishna otherwise Shyama is the charmer of Minds, the one who held aloft the mountain, is the Lord of Mathura and ever Handsome. Krishna is an absolute pretender and has dubious ways, a treat to the eyes who is none else than Sri Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Hey Madhusudhana
Mano Ramana Hey Nanda Nandana
Radha Ramana Hey Jaganmohana
Govinda Govinda Sai Jaga Vandana
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Krishna the cowherd boy attracts and enchants the mind the world and Radha, slayer of demon Madhu, is the son of Nanda and worshipped by the world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Krishna Kunja Vihari
Yadava Madhava Ranga Vittala Murari
Ghana Shyama Sundara Hey Giridhari |Yadava Madhava|
Vittala Murari Ranga Vittala Murari (2)
Vittala Murari (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Krishna attracts the mind of Human beings and moves about through the dense bushes. He belongs to Yadava clan. The one who lifted the Mountain high, is also known as Vittala and Ranga.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Madhusudhana
Mangala Charana Narayana
Govardhanodhara Gopalana
Govinda Gopala Narayana (3) |Mangala Charana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Narayana is the origin of Auspiciousness, slayer of demon Madhu you capture the minds of men, the cowherd Gopala who lifted the mountain Govardhan to save the devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Murali Gopala Jaya Govinda Radhey Gopala
Pandari Natha Jaya Hari Vittala
Govardhana Giridhari Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Gopala with the flute in his hands has a bewitching form which lures the mind, one who lifted Govardhan hill to save his devotees is also Lord Vittala of Pandharpur.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Muralidhara
Madhura Madhura Hey Giridhara Bala
Madhava Madhusudhana
Hrudayanta Ranga Sri Sai Ranga
Sri Ranga Ranga Puttaparthi Ranga |Madhava|
Devotional Song Meaning: The one of Madhu lineage, slayer of demon Madhu, personification of sweetness, lures the minds of everyone, who bears the flute, is also the Ranga residing in our hearts, Sai Ranga residing at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Muralidhari
Krishna Krishna
Radhey Radhey
Madhusudhana Madhava Shyama Harey
Ghana Shyam Ghana Shyam Jaya Sai Harey (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Krishna and Radhey, the one who attracts the Mind and holds the Flute. Krishna 's complexion is that of dark thick clouds and the One who slayed demon Madhu.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Muralidhari Jaya Radhey Govinda
Jaya Yamuna Teera Vihari Jaya Radhey Govinda
Jaya Brindavana Sanchari Jaya Radhey Govinda
Jaya Meera Prabhu Giridhari Jaya Radhey Govinda
Jaya Brindavana Sanchari Jaya Radhey Govinda |Jaya Yamuna|
Devotional Song Meaning: Radhey Govinda is a delight to the Mind, the player of Flute, who moves about on the banks of Yamuna river and Brindavan, is the Lord of Meera.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Nandalal
Mana Mohana Madhusudhana Brindavana Nandalal |Mana Mohana...|
Mana Mohana Nandalal
Brindavana Nandalal |Mana Mohana Madhusudhana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh charming son of Nanda of Brindavan, you are the slayer of demon Madhu.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Shyama Murari
Hey Giridhari Hrudaya Vihari
Brindavana Sanchari |Mana Mohana|
Gaana Vilola Murali Gopala
Sundara Shyama Gopala
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Hasita Vadana Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: The One who charms the Mind, who held aloft the mountain high, of dark complexion, indweller of the Heart moves as about the thick bushes of Brindavan. Gopala loves music, plays Flute, delights in playing with the Gopis and has a smiling face.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Manasa Bhajorey Guru Charanam
Dusthara Bhava Sagara Taranam
Guru Maharaj Guru Jai Jai
Sai Natha Sadguru Jai Jai
Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om
Arunachala Shiva Arunachala Shiva Arunachala Shiva Aruna Shivom
Omkaaram Bhava Omkaaram Bhava Omkaaram Bhava Om Namo Baba
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind adhere to the feet of Guru by singing his glory and take refuge under His feet which enables us to cross inconquerable ocean of life. Glory be to venerable Guru Sainath. Chant repeatedly ' Om Nama Shivaya' 'Arunachala Shiva'. Prostrations to Baba who is the embodiment of Om.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Manasa Bhajorey Guru Charanam
Dusthara Bhava Sagara Taranam
Guru Maharaj Guru Jai Jai
Sai Natha Sadguru Jai Jai
Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om
Arunachala Shiva Arunachala Shiva Arunachala Shiva Aruna Shivom
Omkaaram Bhava Omkaaram Bhava Omkaaram Bhava Om Namo Baba
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind adhere to the feet of Guru by singing his glory and take refuge under His feet which enables us to cross inconquerable ocean of life. Glory be to venerable Guru Sainath. Chant repeatedly ' Om Nama Shivaya' 'Arunachala Shiva'. Prostrations to Baba who is the embodiment of Om.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mandara Giridhara Madana Manohara
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Giridhari Giridhari Govardhanodhara Giridhari (2)
Madhava Madhusudhana
Murali Gaana Vilola
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Krishna who lifted the Govardhana mountain which was earlier known as Mandara mountains to save the people from the wrath of Indra, the Lord of Meera, slayer of demon Madhu, loves playing the flute.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mandara Mala Dhara Jaya Gowri Shankara
Hara Hara Paahi Trinetra
Gangadhara Bimbadhara Chandramouli Shankara |Mandara Mala Dhara...|
Vamadeva Mahadeva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shankara
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sathya Sai Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Gowri Shankara, who adorns the garland of 'Mandaara' flowers. Victory to the Three eyed one. The benevolent one who wears the Ganga, the moon on his crown of hair. God of Gods, Lord Shiva. He is none but the embodiment of Righteousness, Truth, Peace and Love - Sai Shankara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mandir Mey Aao Madhava
Madhava Keshava |Mandir Mey...|
Adi Narayana Anantha Sai
Aao Aao Hrudaya Nivasi |Mandir Mey...|
Radha Lola Rakumayi Vittala
Ranga Panduranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: I invite You in the temple of my heart, Oh Madhava, Keshava. The primordial, the infinite Sai, dweller of my Heart, beloved of Radha and Rakumayi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mandir Mey Tum Ram Ho Sai
Masjid Mey Noor Mohammad (Allah Ho Akbar)
Gurudware Mey Tum Guru Nanak
Man Mandir Mey Sai Sai
Bolo Ram Ek Hi Naam
Sab Mil Bolo Sai Ram
Bolo Ram Ek Hi Naam |Sab Mil...|
Devotional Song Meaning: You are adored as Ram in the Temple, as the light of Mohammad in the mosque; You are Guru nanak in the Gurudwara; In the temple of my mind, you are Sai, Sai.. . Chant the name of Ram, let us chant together 'Sai Ram'.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mangala Charana Gajanana
Gajavadana Shubhanana |Mangala Charana...|
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Gowri Tanaya Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the Lotus Feet of the benevolent Elephant-faced Lord. He is the provider of knowledge and intelligence, the son of Gowri.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mangala Dayaka Hey Gananatha
Pranava Swaroopa Vighna Vinasha |Mangala Dayaka...|
Hey Shiva Nandana Paahi Dayala
Parthi Pureeshwara Jagat Paripala |Pranava Swaroopa|
Devotional Song Meaning: Bestower of Good, Lord of the Ganas, the very embodiment of Pranava (Omkaar) and destroyer of obstacles. The merciful, loving son of Lord Shiva. He is also the Lord of Parthi, ruler of the Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mangala Dayaka Matanga Mukha
Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha
Mahadeva Shiva Gowri Nandana |Jaya Jaya .. |
Mooshika Vahana Mukti Pradayaka Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha
Mahadeva Shiva Gowri Nandana Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha who bestows auspiciousness, who is the beloved son of Lord Shiva and His consort Gowri. Victory to the Lord of Ganas, provider of liberation, who rides on the mouse (representing controller of the temperamental mind).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mangala Kaari Ganapathi Deva
Sankata Haari Ganapathi Deva
Peetambara Dhari Ganapathi Deva
Santana Sukha Kaari Ganapathi Deva
Prathama Poojana Tum Ganapathi Deva
Naman Karey Hum Ganapathi Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Ganapathi, wearing yellow coloured clothes, you are the one who is worshipped first, you bestow auspiciousness, you remove the obstacles in life and bestow eternal happiness, Oh Lord we offer our salutations.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mangala Kaarini Jai Sai Ma
Jai Sai Ma Jai Sai Ma |Mangala Kaarini...|
Bhagya Pradayini Sai Ma
Bhava Bhaya Haarini Sai Ma
Tribhuvana Palini Jai Sai Ma
Mata Maheshwari Sai Ma
Jai Jai Jai Sai Ma (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Mother Sai who bestows auspiciousness and wealth, who is the destroyer of fear (worldly attachments) and who is the ruler of the three worlds.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mangala Kara Hey Santoshi Ma
Sai Mata Darshana Deejo |Mangala Kara...|
Sundara Roopini Suguna Manohari
Shanthi Pradayini Santoshi Ma (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh auspicious Mother Santoshi, Oh Mother Sai please give your vision. Oh Beautiful one full of virtues, you bestow peace to the Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mangala Karini Mahalakshmi (Shubha)
Sankata Nashini Sri Shiva Shankari |Mangala Karini...|
Vidya Dayini Veena Paani
Sathya Swaroopini Parthi Nivasini
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Goddess Mahalakshmi who bestows auspiciousness to all. You are also Parvathi, who destroys the obstacles in life. You bestow knowledge to all. Holding Veena (a stringed instrument) in hand you are embodiment of truth who reside in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mangala Karini Sai Janani
Mata Maheshwari Veda Kalamayi
Raga Priyakari Bageshwari Ma
Jagat Janani Ma Jagat Janani Ma Jagat Janani Ma
Mata Pitha Guru Sai Janani
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother Sai, you bestow auspiciousness to one and all. You are the embodiment of Vedas, you are the lover of music and you are the Mother, Father and Preceptor to the entire humanity.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mangala Murthy Maruti Raya Raghava Priya Jaya Hanuman
Anjani Putra Anjaneya Vayu Kumara Jaya Hanuman
Sita Shoka Vinasha Karaka Rama Dootha Jaya Hanuman
Sakala Mangala Moola Kaarana Sarva Mangala Jaya Hanuman
Jai Jai Hanuman Jaya Hanuman (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Hanuman, the embodiment of auspiciousness who is also known as Maruti Raya, who adores Lord Rama and is the son of Anjani and Vaayu (Wind god).He is the one who removed the sorrow of Sita, the messenger of Rama and the one who bestows auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mangala Naama Bhajorey Manuva
Sankata Hara Sri Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Maruti Sevitha Manasa Ram
Mahima Avatara Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind, Chant the auspicious name of the Lord Sai Ram, the Lord who was served by the mighty Hanuman and the Lord who was the glorious incarnation of this Age. Chant the name which removes obstacles in life.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mangala Pradayini Sai Shankari
Shiva Shankari Sayeeshwari Shiva Shakthi Roopini |Mangala Pradayini...|
Sri Chakra Dhari Nilayey Amba Moksha Dayini
Shiva Shankari Sayeeshwari Shiva Shakthi Roopini
Devotional Song Meaning: This Bhajan praises Goddess Sai Shankari who bestows auspiciousness with various names such as, Shiva Shankari, Sayeeshwari, the embodiment of Shiva and Shakti, Sri Chakra Dharini and the one who bestows liberation (Moksha Dayini).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mangala Shubha Kari Mata Maheshwari
Ambey Bhavani Akhilandeshwari |Mangala Shubha...|
Rajeeva Lochani Raja Rajeshwari
Adi Parashakthi Sri Parameshwari
Ananda Roopini Hey (Sai) Shiva Shankari
Devotional Song Meaning: I propitiate Mother Maheshwari, who bestows auspiciousness, Mother Bhavani the mother of the universe, the Lotus eyed Raja Rajeshwari and Shiva Shankari who is the personification of the primordial energy and eternal of bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mangalamaya Varadey Bhavani
Mata Maheshwari Durga Bhavani
Ajara Amara Parabrahma Swaroopini
Nirakara Tum Hey Jagat Janani
Hey Jagat Janani (3) |Nirakara Tum|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Mother Bhavani who bestows auspiciousness to all, you are the one who knows no birth or death, the embodiment of the Absolute Supreme Cosmic Spirit, you are formless one, Oh mother of the entire Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Manuva Bolo Guru Charanam Manasa Bhajarey Sai Charanam
Sri Guru Charanam Sadguru Charanam
Sai Charana Namo |Manuva Bolo|
Sadguru Charanam Prabhu Paada Charanam
Sai Charana Namo
Sri Guru Charanam Prabhu Paada Charanam |Sai Charana Namo...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Meditate upon the divine feet of the preceptor Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Manuva Bolo Jai Sita Ram Bolo Jai Radhey Shyam
Jai Sita Ram Bolo Jai Radhey Shyam (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Meditate on Sita Ram and Radhey Shyam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Manuva Bolo Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Shyam Naam
Ram Ram Ram Bolo Ram Sita Ram Naam |Manuva Bolo...|
Ranga Ranga Ranga Bolo Panduranga Baba Naam
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Panduranga Baba Naam
Tukaram Namdeva Bhaktha Sakha Baba Naam
Panduranga Panduranga Panduranga Baba Naam
Devotional Song Meaning: Meditate on the various names of the Lord such as Radhey Shyam, Sita Ram, Panduranga, who is none other than our Lord of Parthi. The very same Lord was the friend of Saints like Tukaram and Namdev.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Maruti Raya Mangala Naama
Pavana Putra Paavana Charitha
Anjani Putra Anjaneya
Ati Balavanta Jaya Hanumantha
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the auspicious name of Lord Maruti (Hanuman), the Son of the Wind God, the one with blemishless character.Salutations to the Son of Anjani, the mighty Hanumantha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mata Annapoorneshwari
Sri Sathya Sayeeshwari |Mata...|
Mata Saraswathi Mata Mahalakshmi
Mata Annapoorneshwari (Hey) (2)
Sri Shiva Shaktheeshwari |Hey Mata|
Sri Sathya Sayeeshwari
Devotional Song Meaning: Pray to Mother Annapoorneshwari, who is none other than Sathya Sayeeshwari, who is also Mother Saraswathi (who bestows knowledge) and Mother Lakshmi (who bestows wealth). Mother Sai is also the embodiment of Shiva Shakti.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mata Bhavani Maheshwari
Sai Mata Bhavani Parameshwari
Sai Mata Bhavani Sarveshwari
Mata Bhavani Krupa Sagari
Krupa Sagari Krupa Sagari
Kaarini Poorani Dharini Amba Mata Bhavani (2)
Durga Devi Duritha Nivarini Mata Bhavani
Hey Mata Bhavani (3) |Durga Devi|
Devotional Song Meaning: Mother Bhavani, Maheshwari is none other than our Mother Sai Parameshwari, She is the goddess of all godessesShe is the Ocean of Grace (Krupa Sagari), She is the Cause (Kaarini), She is the Fulfillment (Poorani), She is the one who sustains the Universe (Dharini), Mother Bhavani is the destroyer of evil.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mata Maheshwari Tribhuvana Janani
Premamayi Sathya Sai Janani
Shiva Mana Mohini Paapa Vinashini
Veda Kalamayi Kalyana Dayini
Jagadodharini Parthi Narayani |Premamayi|
Devotional Song Meaning: The mother of three worlds, Maheshwari (who is Parvathi the Consort of Shiva) who is none other than Lord Sathya Sai is the personification of Love, is the enchanter of Lord Shiva.She is the destroyer of sins, the embodiment of Vedas and the one who bestows auspiciousness. The goddess Narayani of Parthi is the uplifter of the Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mata Mata Sai Mata 
Janani Mata Sai Vishwa Mata |Mata Mata ...|
Durga Bhavani Kaali Kapalini
Shanthi Dayini Sai Mata
Devotional Song Meaning: Mother Sai is the mother of the Universe. She is also known by names like Durga, Bhavani, Kali who bestows peace.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mata Pitha Guru Bandhu Sakha Hari
Narayana Sai Narayana (2)
Allah Tum Ho Yesu Tum Ho
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahaveer Tum Ho
Sab Ka Malik Ek Hai Bhagawan |Narayana Sai|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Narayana you are the Mother, Father, Guru, Kith and Kin. You are none other than Allah, Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahaveer and the Lord of the entire humanity.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mata Pitha Guru Bandhu Sakha Hari
Narayana Sai Narayana (2)
Allah Tum Ho Yesu Tum Ho
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahaveer Tum Ho
Sab Ka Malik Ek Hai Bhagawan |Narayana Sai|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Narayana you are the Mother, Father, Guru, Kith and Kin. You are none other than Allah, Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahaveer and the Lord of the entire humanity.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Matanga Vadana Ananda Sadana
Mahadeva Shiva Shambho Nandana |Matanga Vadana...|
Maya Vinashaka Mooshika Vahana
Mata Maheshwari Bhavani Nandana
Maha Ganapathey Mangala Charana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the one with the face of elephant (Matanga), who is the abode of bliss (Ananda), the loving son of Lord Mahadeva (Shiva) the remover of Maya (illusion, ignorance), who rides on the mouse (Mooshika), the beloved son of Goddess Maheshwari (Parvathi), we bow to the Lotus Feet of the Great Lord Ganapathy

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Matanga Vadana Gajavadana
Sharanam Sharanam Gajavadana |Matanga Vadana...|
Vighna Vinashaka Parvathi Nandana
Mangala Kaari Gajavadana
Gajanana Hey Shubhanana
Partheesha (Sayeesha) Sharanam Gajavadana
Devotional Song Meaning: We seek your shelter Oh elephant faced Lord Ganesha, we surrender to you. You are the remover of obstacles, Oh son of Parvathi, you bestow auspiciousness and well being. You are the Lord of Parthi, we surrender to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Matanga Vadana Maam Paalaya
Mouleeshwara Shiva Gowri Nandana (2)
Mangala Dayaka Siddhi Vinayaka
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh elephant faced Lord Ganesha, protect me, Oh beloved son of Lord Shiva and Gowri you are the one who bestows auspiciousness and success in our endeavours.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Matey Jaganmatey
Sankata Harini Mangala Karini
Manasa Bhavani Matey |Matey Jaganmatey|
Shiva Mana Mohini Sumadhura Bhaashini
Jaya Jaya Ananda Amrutha Varshini
Parthi Nivasini Paapa Vinashini
Patithodharini Matey
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to mother of the Universe, Mother Bhavani who is the remover of distress and bestower of auspiciousness, enchanter of Lord Shiva, with beauty in speech. Victory to the one who showers bliss and nectar, to the one who resides in Parthi, the destroyer of sins, the liberator of the downtrodden.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mathura Natha Gopala
Gokula Bala Gopala |Mathura Natha...|
Goparipala Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala
Murali Manohara Shyama Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: This Bhajan extols the attributes of Lord Krishna who is also called Gopala (Literal meaning Cowherd). He is described as the Lord of Mathura, the one who is dark complexioned, fond of flute and cares for the cows. He is none other than Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mathura Puri Vasa Radhey Gopala
Gopi Manohara Gopala Krishna
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora
Narayana Sai Narayana
Krishna Mukunda Murari Gopala
Parthi Puri Sai Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Sai Narayana who in the form of Krishna, the beloved of Radha resides in Mathura. He is the son of Nanda and the stealer of butter. He is also called with several names like Mukunda, Murari, Gopala etc.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mathuradhipathey Krishna Mukunda
Madhusudhana Ghana Shyama Mukunda
Venu Vilolana Parthi Ramana
Yadu Kula Bhooshana Rajeeva Lochana
Parthi Pureeshwara Jaya Mana Mohana |Madhusudhana|
Madhusudhana Ghana Shyama Mukunda
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lord of Mathura, Krishna was also known as Mukunda and Madhusudhana , with his dark complexioned body, enchanting music on flute, he is the up lifter of the Yadava clan. He is the Lotus Eyed, Lord of Parthi, who creates happiness in all our minds.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mathuradhipathey Nanda Mukunda
Brindavana Jaya Paramananda
Radha Madhava Jaya Govinda (2)
Radha Madhava Hey Nanda Nanda
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord of Mathura , the son of Nanda, the beloved of Radha Victory to you oh the blissful Lord of Brindavan

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Meera Nath Harey Giridhari
Radha Pyaarey Krishna Murari |Meera Nath...|
Brindavana Ke Raasa Vihari
Bhakthodhari Sai Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Krishna , you are the Lord of devotee Meera, the beloved of Radha, the ecstatic dancer in Brindavan with Gopikas and the liberator of your devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mera Jeevan Terey Hawaley Prabhu Isey Pag Pag Tu Hi Sambhaley
Pag Pag Tu Hi Sambhaley Isey Ho Pag Pag Tu Hi Sambhaley |Mera Jeevan...|
Bhava Sagar Mey Jeevan Naiya Dol Rahi Hai O Rakhvaiyya
Dol Rahi Hai O Rakhvaiyya
Isey Paar Tu Hi Utharey Prabhu Isey Pag Pag Tu Hi Sambhaley
Moh Maya Ke Bandhan Todo Hey Prabhu Apni Sharan Mey Lelo
Hey Prabhu Apni Sharan Mey Lelo
Is Paapi ko Apnalo Prabhu Isey Pag Pag Tu Hi Sambhaley
Devotional Song Meaning: I submit my life in your care, Oh Lord. Please take care of it every moment. The boat of my life is wobbling in this sea of worldliness, Oh dear Caretaker only you should take it across. Oh Lord, please take care of it every momentLiberate us from the bondage of illusion, take us in your care and shelter. Please accept this sinner, Oh lord. Please take care of me at every moment.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mitha Smitha Sundara Mukharavinda Nacho Nandalala
Nacho Nandalala Nandalala (3)
Meera Ke Prabhu Lala Nandalala (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Dance on in ecstacy, remembering the gentle, smiling, beautiful Lotus faced Lord, who is the darling son of Nanda. He is Lord of Meera, He is son of Nanda, He is Lord Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mitha Smitha Vadana Mridu Vachana
Mangala Charana Madhusudhana
Ravi Shata Koti Prakashana
Sai Ramana Sanathana
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Krishna, with smiling face and soft spoken tongue. We bow to His auspicious Feet who is also called Madhusudhana (slayer of demon, Madhu). His glory is of million suns. He is the eternal Lord, Sai Ramana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mohana Mukunda Hari Giridhara Govinda Hari
Narayan Sai Narayan (3)
Allah Narayan Eshwara Narayan
Nanak Narayan Yesu Narayan
Buddha Narayan Mahaveera Narayan
Sai Narayan Sai Narayan |Narayan Sai|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh enchanting Lord Mukunda (Krishna) you are the one who lifted the mountain (Giridhara), you are Govinda Hari (Vishnu) you are none other than Narayana, Allah, Eshwar, Nanak, Jesus, Buddha, Mahaveer, all are but emanations of the same Narayana, who is our beloved Sai Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mohana Murali Gaana Vilola
Jaya Brindavana Lola |Mohana Murali...|
Yashoda Tanaya Nandalala
Gopi Vallabha Gopala
Gopala Gopala
Gopala Nanda Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: He who enchants with his songs on the flute, victory to the regaler of Brindavan, child of Yashoda and darling of Nandabeloved of the Gopis, He is Gopala (Krishna).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mohana Murali Govinda Jaya Radhey Govinda
Hey Giridhari Govinda Jaya Radhey Govinda
Krishna Murari Govinda Jaya Radhey Govinda
Parthi Vihari (Hrudaya Vihari) Govinda Jaya Radhey Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the enchanter with the flute Lord Govinda who lifted the mountain to protect His devotees and who is the beloved of Radha. Victory to Krishna - slayer of demon Mura (Murari). He is the one who resides in Parthi (and in devotees hearts), He is Govinda (Vishnu).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mohana Murali Sunao Giridhari
Aao Hrudaya Mey Prabhu Giridhari |Mohana Murali...|
Hey Giridhari Parthi Vihari
Sri Madhusudhana Hrudaya Vihari
Meera Ke Prabhu Radha Pyaari
Devotional Song Meaning: Play for us the enchanting music of the flute, Oh KrishnaWelcome to my heart Oh Lord Giridhari. You are the one who resides in Parthi, become the resident of my heart, Oh Madhusudhana (slayer of demon, Madhu), Lord of Meera and beloved of Radha

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mohana Muralidhara Murari
Yadava Sai Shyama Murari |Mohana Muralidhara...|
Mangala Naamam Madhuram Madhuram
Mrudu Vachanam Smaranam Madhuram
Mathuradhipathey Akhilam Madhuram
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the enchanting flute player from Yadava dynasty , the slayer of demon Mura, Sai Krishna who has an auspicious and a sweet name. He who is soft spoken sweet, ever sweet and full of sweetness is the Lord of Mathura (Krishna)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mohana Raghurama Ati Sundara Sri Rama
Maruti Sevitha Rama
Rama Rama Jaya Rama (2)
Sri Rama Rama Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the enchanting Raghu Rama, ever beautiful Sri Rama, who is served by Maruti (Hanuman). Victory to thee Oh Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mohana Rama Hey Sai Rama
Pavana Naama Prashanthi Rama |Mohana Rama...|
Karuna Nidhey Prabhu Karunya Rama
Bhaktha Jana Priya Palita Rama
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Sai Rama (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: The enchanting Rama is our Sai Rama. The blessed name of Prashanthi Rama, the Compassionate Lord full of mercy is beloved of the devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mohana Roopa Sri Rama
Moksha Pradayaka Sri Rama |Mohana Roopa|
Moha Vinashaka Rama (Sri Rama)
Madhura Madhura Hey Taraka Naama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Jaya Jaya Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Rama with most enchanting looks, grants liberation, destroys delusion and attachment. Victory to Lord Rama whose sweet name itself liberates the humanity.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mohana Sai Muralidhara
Krishna Mukunda Madhusudhana |Mohana Sai...|
Aravindaksha Alankruta Kesha
Ati Sukumara Namo
Abhaya Pradatha Jagat Paripala
Kali Yuga Varada Namo |Krishna Mukunda|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you oh enchanting Sai, with flute in hand, you are none other than Lord Krishna also called Mukunda, Madhusudhana, the Lotus eyed one with the decorated hair. Oh extremely tender and gentle one, destroyer of fear, the ruler of the Universe and the blessing of the Kaliyuga (age of Kali), our salutations to You.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mooshika Vahana Modaka Hasta
Maha Ganapathey Namostuthey
Pashankushadhara Parama Pavitra
Paalaya Paalaya Parthi Pureesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Ganapathi who rides the mouse and holds 'modakas' (favourite sweets of Lord Ganesha) in hand, destroyer of sins, the one who is extremely pure, protect me, Oh Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mruthyunjayaya Namah Om
Tryambakaya Namah Om
Lingeshwaraya Namah Om
Sayeeshwaraya Namah Om
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Humble Salutations to Lord Sayeeshwara who is none other than Lord Shiva also known as , Mruthyunjaya (who has conquered death), Tryambakaya (with three eyes) and Lingeshwaraya (having a form which has no beginning and end).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mujhey Darsha Dikhao Bhagawan
Hey Sai Natha Bhagawan |Mujhey Darsha...|
Tum Jaanat Sab Antaryami
Deejo Merey Prabhu Amrutha Vani
Tum Ho Merey Atma Ram Baba
Puran Karo Merey Mann Ki Kaam Baba
Devotional Song Meaning: Show me your Divine Form Bhagawan, Oh Sainatha, You are omniscient, you are the in dweller. Give me your nectarine message Oh my Lord. You are my Atma Ram (In dweller) and fulfill my heart's desire Oh Baba.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mukunda Madhava Karivarada Sri Sathya Sai Ram
Govinda Keshava Sri Hari Roopa Sathya Sai Ram
Matsya Koorma Varaha Narahari Dashavathari Ram
Parthi Vasa Paalaya Maam Prabho Sathya Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sathya Sai, You were Kari Varada (the saviour of the Elephant from the clutches of Crocodile as Narayana), Mukunda, Madhava, Govinda, Keshava (All names of Krishna), you were none other than the Ten Incarnations of Lord Vishnu such as, Matsya (Fish), Koorma (Tortoise), Varaha (Boar), Narahari (Narasimha). I pray to you Oh Lord Sathya Sai to protect me.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mukunda Madhava Murali Manohara Govardhana Giridhari
Gopi Poojita Manasa Chora Peetambara Dhari |Mukunda Madhava...|
Geeta Bodhaka Sai Sundara
Vanditha Hrudaya Vihari (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Oh beautiful Lord Sai Krishna. you were worshipped by Gopikas, you stole their hearts wearing the yellow coloured dress, you were called by many other names such as Mukunda, Madhava, Murali Manohara, Govardhan Giridhari (All names of Krishna), you were the preceptor for the Sacred Bhagawath Geeta and you reside in the hearts of the devotees who worship you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mukunda Murari Murari Gopal
Hey Gopala Sai Hey Sai Nandalal
Prashanthi Nivasi Nivasi Nandalal
Hey Antaratma Jyothi Hey Jyothi Nandalal
Sathyam Shivam Shivam Sundaram
Hey Sundara Roopa Hey Roopa Nandalal
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh darling son of Nanda, the slayer of demon Mura, you reside in Prashanthi, you are the effulgent light of the Atma, You are Truth, Auspiciousness and Beauty. With your enchanting beauty you are none other than Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Murali Bajao Madhava
Giridhara Bala Gopala |Murali Bajao...|
Madhura Madhura Hari Naam Bajao
Mathura Natha Sai Natha
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Madhava (Krishna) play the melodious flute. Oh Lord Gopala (Krishna) you are the one who held the Govardhana mountain high to protect the cows. Sing the sweet name of Hari (Lord Vishnu) who is the Lord of Mathura and who is none other than our Sai Natha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Murali Gaana Lola Krishna Madhava
Venu Gaana Lola Krishna Keshava
Mathuradhipathey Radha Lola
Madhura Madhura Hey Yadu Nandalala
Hey Nandalala Yadu Nandalala (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh, Lord Krishna the player of ecstatic music on the flute, Oh Keshava (Krishna) Oh Lord of Mathura and the beloved of Radha, Oh sweet One, the son of Nanda of Yadava dynasty.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Murali Gaana Lola Nanda Gopa Bala Raavo Raavo Radha Lola Radha Lola
Treta Yugamuna Sita Ramudai
Dwapara Yugamuna Radha Loludai
Geetanu Drapina Taraka Naamudai
Yuga Yuga Manduna Kaguroopa Dariyai
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome Oh Lord Krishna, King Nandas Son, the beloved of Radha. In the Age of Treta you incarnated as Rama. In the Age of Dwapara you were enchanted by Radha and taught the Sacred Hymns of Geetha and you were the liberator of humanity and in every Age you were the most beautiful one to look at.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Murali Gaana Vilola Merey Prana Gopala
Murahara Madhava Maya Vesha
Meera ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Krishna who is fond of music on the flute, you are my life Oh Lord Gopala, you are the Lord of Meera.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Murali Krishna Mukunda Krishna Mohana Krishna Krishna Krishna
Gopi Krishna Gopala Krishna Govardhanadhara Krishna Krishna
Radha Krishna Bala Krishna Raasa Vilola Krishna Krishna
Shirdi Krishna Parthi Krishna Sri Sathya Sai Krishna Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: This bhajan extols Lord Krishna's beauty and glory by chanting His various synonyms and attributes.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Murali Madhava Sri Hari
Mukunda Govinda Harey Giridhari |Murali Madhava...|
Govardhanodhara Gopi Gopala
Radha Ke Pyaara Hey Yamuna Vihara |Mukunda Govinda|
Devotional Song Meaning: This bhajan extols Lord Krishna's beauty and glory by chanting His various synonyms and attributes.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Murali Manohara Gopala
Murahara Shourie Yadava
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Namo Namo Sai Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Narayana who took the form of Narahari (Half man Half Lion- Lord Narasimha), He is none other than the enchanting Lord Krishna also known by names such as, Gopala, Murahara, Shourie and Yadava.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Murali Manohara Shyama Bhajo
Munijana Sevitha Sai Bhajo |Murali Manohara|
Shyama Bhajo Radhey Shyama Bhajo
Shyama Krishna Sai Krishna Bhajo
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Krishna the one who conquers the mind with his divine music of the flute, the dark blue complexioned Lord. Sing about the one who was served by the pious sages. The dark blue Krishna is none other than my Sai Krishna

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Murali Manohara Shyama Murari
Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
Radha Lola Harey Giridhari
Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Gopala (Krishna) you are fond of the music on flute, you are the beloved of Radha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Murali Murali Murali Ghana Shyam
Mohana Murali Radhey Shyama |Murali Murali...|
Kanakambara Dhara Karuna Sagara
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Shyam
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Krishna (Shyam) who is fond of the enchanting music on Flute (Murali). The beloved of Radha, He adorns the yellow coloured cloth, He is compassion personified, He is the Lord of His greatest devotee Meera, He saved the cowherds by deftly lifting the Govardhana Mountain. He is none other than the Sai Shyam residing in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Murali Shyama Bhajo Madhava Govinda Bhajo
Radhey Shyama Bhajo Gopi Gopala Bhajo
Giridhara Bala Bhajo Sundara Gopala Bhajo
Shirdi Sai Bhajo Sathya Sai Baba Bhajo
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the various names of Lord Krishna such as Murali Shyama, Madhava, Govinda, Radhey Shyama, Gopi Gopala, Giridhara Bala, Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Murali Vinodana Munijana Mohana
Natana Manohara Gopala
Nithya Niranjana Hrudaya Sanjeevana
Deena Janavana Gopala |Natana Manohara|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Krishna, You play the flute, you are charmer of the minds of sages, enchanting dancer, ever new and able to resurrect the heart, Gopala who is compassionate towards the afflicted.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Muralidhara Gopala Madhura
Megha Roopa Hari Manasa Chora |Muralidhara...|
Radha Madhava Kunja Vihara
Ananda Ghana Roopa Naama Madhura (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh sweet Lord Gopala (Krishna) with the flute in your hand and with the complexion of dark clouds, you steal the hearts of devotees. You are the beloved of Radha, with the beautiful sweet name and form you stroll in Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Muralidhara Hey Ghana Shyama
Partheeshwara Sai Shyama
Giridhari Parthi Vihari
Meera Ke Giridhari
Surdas Ke Krishna Murari
Ghana Shyama Megha Shyama Sai Shyama |Giridhari|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Lord Sai Shyama (Krishna) resident of Parthi. You are the Lord of Meera and Surdas, you held the Govardhan Mountain to save cowherds (Giridhari).Your complexion is that of dark clouds (Megha Shyama),

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Muralidhara Manamohana Madhusudhana Krishna
Natanagara Jaya Madhava Hey Keshava Krishna Krishna Krishna |Muralidhara Mana Mohana|
Bansidhara Dukha Bhanjana Yadu Nandana Krishna
Radhey Govinda Sai Mukunda Tum Hi Jana Priya Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Krishna, holding the Flute in your hand, you are also known as Madhusudhana, Keshava and adored by your devotees, whose sorrows were driven away by you, Oh son of Yadu Dynasty.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Muralidhara Mukunda Murari
Govardhana Giridhari Murari
Maya Nataka Sutradhari (2)
Maya Manusha Veshadhari
Sai Murari Sathya Sai Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna with the flute in one hand, you have lifted the Govardhana Mountain with the other, you have annihilated the demon Mura, you have assumed the illusory form of human being for directing and guiding humanity. You are none other than Sathya Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Muralidhara Murahara Natawara
Gopi Jana Priya Giridhara
Brindavana Sanchara Jagadodhara
Yashoda Bala Nanda Kumara
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Lord Krishna, son of Nanda and Yashoda, holding flute in hand, you are the supreme dancer whom the Gopis adore, you stroll in Brindavan and up lift the humanity from miseries.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Mythili Pathey Raghu Nandana
Rama Raghava Rajeeva Lochana |Mythili Pathey...|
Deenavana Hey Karunamaya
Kamala Nayana Kausalya Tanaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord of Sita, the princess of Mithila, the descendant of the Raghu dynasty! Oh Rama! The Lotus-eyed Lord! The protector of the poor! Oh Lord filled with Compassion! The Lotus -eyed Lord who is the son of Queen Kausalya!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Naada Brahma Hari Sai Harey
Narayana Hari Sai Harey |Naada Brahma...|
Natana Kala Dhara Sai Harey
Naga Abharana Sai Harey
Sai Harey Sathya Sai Harey (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the one who exists in the form of Divine music, Oh Sai, Oh Lord Vishnu, the performer of the divine dance, one who adorns the snake as a jewel Oh Sai Shiva, Oh Sathya Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Naada Brahma Sayeeshwara
Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Shankara
Gowri Ramana Sadashiva
Hara Hara Gangey Mahadeva (2)
Hara Hara Gangey Mahadeva (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai! The Lord of divine Music! Oh Lord Shiva revelling in the cosmic dance! Oh Lord of Goddess Parvathi! Oh Shiva the Eternal! Oh Lord holding the Holy river Ganga in His hair locks! Oh the great Lord Shiva!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Naada Brahmamayi Dayamayi
Bhava Raga Laya Gaana Vinodini |Naada Brahma...|
Veena Venu Mrudanga Vinodini
Aashritha Phala Dayini Kalyani (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Divine Mother who is the form of divine music! The embodiment of Compassion! One who enjoys the tune, the expression, the rhythm of music! One who is delighted by the string instrument Veena, the flute and the percussion instrument Mrudanga, One who grants boons to those Who surrender to Her!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Naada Brahmamayi Sayeeshwari
Bhagawathi Mata Krupa Sagari |Naada...|
Varahi Vaishnavi Vageshwari
Matangi Mahamaye Mookambikey
Parameshwari Hari Sodari
Bhava Bhaya Haarini Sathya Sayeeshwari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother Sai! The abode of divine music! Oh Divine Mother! Oh Ocean of compassion! The Mother adored by various names, Varahi (a form of Shakthi), Vaishnavi (the sister of Vishnu), One who is the bestower of speech, The Mother who is worshipped as Meenakshi, Mahamaye and Mookambike in various forms in temples, One Who is the sister of Vishnu! One who is the Supreme Mother, One Who removes the fear of worldly existence, Oh Mother Sathya Sai!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Naada Lola Sathya Sai Harey
Nagabharana Sai Harey |Naada Lola|
Nandi Vahana Sai Harey
Namo Namo Shiva (Sathya) Sai Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow to the lover of music, Sathya SaiOne who adorns the snake as an ornamentThe one who rides on the bull - Nandi. I bow down to that Shiva, who is none other than Sathya Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Naada Swaroopa Namah Shivaya
Nagabharana Namah Shivaya |Naada Swaroopa|
Chandrakaladhara Shashi Shekaraya
Ganga Jatadhara Trilochanaya
Bhasma Vibhushita Sanathanaya
Natana Manohara Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Shiva! I bow to Thee! You are the form of divine music! The One who adorns the snake as an ornament! One who has the moon's crescent on His head! One whose hairlocks bear the flowing river Ganga! One Who is three-eyed! One Who has the holy ash smeared His body! One Who is Eternal! One Who enchants with His cosmic dance! I bow down to that Shiva!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Naam Bhajo Hari Naam Bhajo
Narayana Sai Narayana |Naam Bhajo...|
Nanda Ananda Mukunda Hari (2)
Brindavana Sai Baba Hari
Baba Hari Sai Baba Hari (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Hari the adorable son of Nanda, who is none other than Sai Narayana, He is the Sai Baba of Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Naam Bina Prana Nahin
Nanda Nanda Mukunda Sai |Naam Bina...|
Gao Rey Guna Gao Rey
Ganga Yamuna Teera Chalo Rey
Devotional Song Meaning: There is no life without chanting the name of adorable son of Nanda, of Lord Sai Mukunda. Sing His glory and His attributes, Go to the banks of the rivers Ganga and Yamuna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nachey Tribhanga Krishna Murari
Bhajey Mrudanga Manjula Bheri |Nachey...|
Karunanta Ranga Yuga Avatari
Sri Sai Ranga Bhava Bhaya Haari
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lord Krishna dances in the pose of tribhanga (three bends), Let the percussion instrument Mrudanga and the temple drums beat, Oh Lord, The Lord of Compassion, the avatar of this age, Oh Sai Salutations to you who removes the fear of this life.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nacho Hey Nataraj Shiva Shambho
Hara Bholey Nath Shiva Shambho
Shiva Shambho Shiva Shambho
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Bhajey
Hara Bholey Nath (Sai Nath) Shiva Shambho
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Shiva who performs the Celestial dance while the miniature drum "Damaru" beats.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nacho Nacho Hey Nataraj
Jagadeeshwara Partheeshwara Sayeeshwara |Nacho Nacho...|
Vibhuti Sundara Hey Nataraj
Bhavani Shankara Hey Shiva Raj
Sai Manohara Hey Nataraj |Jagadeeshwara|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Shiva, perform cosmic dance. Oh Lord of the Universe, Lord of Puttaparthi, beautifully smeared with the holy ash, consort of Bhavani (Parvathi), our Salutations to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala |Nacho Nacho...|
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana |Nandalala|
Rhuma Jhuma Payal Ghungaroo Bhajey
Ghungaroo Bhajey Sai Murali Bhajey|Nandalala|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Son of Nanda, Krishna, Perform the divine dance. the one who assumed the form of Lion God Narasimha, Oh Lord Sai Narayana, Let the anklets, the musical instrument Ghunguroo play, let the flute play the glory of Lord Sai Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nagabharana Hey Nataraja
Naga Linga Sai Shambho Shankara |Nagabharana...|
Nandi Vahana Namah Shivaya
Naada Swaroopa Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (2)
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Shiva adorning the snake as an ornament! Oh Sai Shiva in the form of a Linga beneath a snake. Oh Shiva! Who has the Nandi or the divine bull as your vehicle, Oh Shiva! Who is the form of Divine music. Oh Shiva! We worship you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Naga Bhooshani Sai Narayani
Sambhavi Shankari Parama Shivani |Naga Bhooshani...|
Himagiri Nandini Durga Bhavani
Bhagawathi Bharati Brahma Sanathani
Tripura Sundari Ananda Roopini
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother Sai! You are an aspect of Mother Parvathi who has the snake as an ornament! You are a form of Shakthi Who has names such as Sambhavi, the consort of Shiva, Shankari and Shivani You are the daughter of the king of Himalayas, You are Durga, You are Bhavani, You are the Divine Goddess called Bhagawathi, you are Saraswathi or the Goddess of learning, You are Eternal form of the Absolute, You are the embodiment of beauty and bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namah Om Sathya Sai Krishnaya Namah Om
Gopi Jana Vallabhaya Govindaya Namah Om
Madhavaya Keshavaya Yadavaya Namah Om
Radha Ramana Madhusudhana Mohanaya Namah Om
Bansidhara Muralidhara Giridharaya Namah Om
Devotional Song Meaning: I worship Sathya Sai Who is Krishna You are the beloved One of the cowherd girls, you are the cowherd boy. Salutations to you, who are the Lord of Goddess Lakshmi, the descendant of the cowherd clan, and the slayer of the demon Kesha! You are the Lord of Radha the cowherd girl, you are the slayer of Madhu, the demon, You are the One who lifted the Govardhana mountain, we worship You, who is the player of the flute.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namah Parvathi Pathayey Hara Hara
Hara Hara Shankara Mahadeva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva
Mahadeva Sadashiva
Sadashiva Mahadeva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva (3)
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva
Mahadeva Sadashiva |Sadashiva Mahadeva|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Hara or Shiva, who is the Lord of Parvathi. You are Shankara or doer of good, you are the greatest Lord (Mahadeva), You are the Eternal Lord (Sadashiva).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Samba Sadashiva Namah Shivaya
Girija Shankara Namah Shivaya
Bhavani Shankara Namah Shivaya
Lingodhbhavakara Sai Manohara
Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Prostrations to Shiva, One who is with Divine Mother Parvathi, Who is Eternal, Who is the Lord of Parvathi, Who as Sai creates the divine Linga, who conquers the mind.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Samba Sadashiva Namah Shivaya
Girija Shankara Namah Shivaya
Bhavani Shankara Namah Shivaya
Lingodhbhavakara Sai Manohara
Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Prostrations to Shiva, One who is with Divine Mother Parvathi, Who is Eternal, Who is the Lord of Parvathi, Who as Sai creates the divine Linga, who conquers the mind.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namami Brahma Namami Vishnu Namami Maheshwara
Smarami Brahma Smarami Vishnu
Smarami Sayeeshwara (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: I salute Brahma, the God of Creation, prostrate to Vishnu, the God of sustenance and worship Lord Shiva, the Lord of Destruction. I meditate on Brahma, contemplate on Vishnu and dwell upon Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namami Nithyam Gananatham
Smarami Nithyam Gajavadanam
Namami Nithyam Gananatham |Smarami|
Devotional Song Meaning: I worship Lord Ganesha every moment, Who is the Lord of Ganas or the attendants of Lord Shiva. I meditate daily upon Ganapathi, who has the face of an elephant.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namami Sai Pada Pankajam
Smarami Sai Naamamrutham
Bhajami Sai Charanambhujam
Karomi Sai Sankeertanam
Devotional Song Meaning: I worship the Lotus Feet of Lord Sai. I meditate upon the nectar of His Name. I sing the glory of Sai's Divine Lotus Feet. I perform the singing of Sai's glory.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namami Shankara Shambho Maheshwara
Namami Sadguru Mahadeva |Namami Shankara...|
Namami Brahma Namami Vishnu
Namami Sadguru Sai Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: I worship Shiva, the bestower of good, the great Lord, I prostrate to Shiva who is the true preceptor. I bow down to Brahma, the Lord of creation, I salute Vishnu, the Lord of sustenance. I prostrate to the great Guru (Guru of Gurus - Sadguru), Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namami Shiva Lingam Smarami Shiva Lingam
Namami Satatam Smarami Satatam Namami Shiva Lingam |Namami Shiva...|
Nabhi Kamala Udbhava Lingam
Loka Vipraha Karana Lingam
Shivarathri Mahotsava Atmaka Lingam
Shashwata Ananda Dayaka Lingam
Devotional Song Meaning: I worship the Linga, the oval symbol of Lord Shiva, I meditate upon the Linga. I worship constantly, I meditate constantly and salute Linga. The Linga that emanates from the lotus of the navel. The Linga that is the cause for the grace/wisdom in the world. The Linga that emerges on the holy night of Shivarathri. The Linga that bestows everlasting bliss

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Naman Karoon Main Guru Charanam
Sai Charanam Sadguru Charanam |Naman Karoon...|
Sharanam Sharanam Tava Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Vishnu Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Shiva Charanam
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow down to the feet of the preceptor. The feet of Sai, the eternal Guru. I surrender to thy feet, I surrender to the feet of Lord Vishnu and to the feet of Lord Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Naman Karoon Main Guru Charanam Guru Charanam Sadguru Charanam
Pranavananda Ananda Chanda
Sai Guru Mama Guru Satchidananda |Naman Karoon...|
Shanthi Vidayaka Guru Govinda
Mangala Dayaka Sadguru Natha
Eshwaramba Priya Tanaya
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow down to the feet of the eternal Guru, the embodiment of Om or the Pranava. The blissful Sai is my Guru and the form of Satchidananda -- symbolising Truth, Existence and Bliss. The One who bestows everlasting peace, He is Guru Govinda, the great Preceptor, He is the Real Teacher who blesses with auspiciousness. He is Sai, the beloved son of Mother Eshwaramba.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namasthey Namasthey Guru Maharaj
Sadguru Sri Sathya Sai Maharaj
Sharanam Sharanam Sayeesha
Sashtanga Sharanam Sarvesha (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh King of Preceptors! I bow down to you. You are the Eternal Preceptor Sathya Sai. I surrender to you Oh Sai! I offer reverential prostration with all the eight limbs to you, Oh Lord of Lords!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namo Bhagawathey Vasudevaya
Namo Bhagawathey Rama Roopaya
Namo Bhagawathey Shyama Roopaya |Namo Bhagawathey|
Rama Rahim Krishna Karim Yesu Buddha Mahaveer
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Devaya
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Roopaya
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow down to Lord who is the son of Vasudeva, I worship the Lord in the form of Rama, I prostrate the Lord in the form of Krishna or the blue-coloured Lord Rama He is Rama, Krishna; Rahim and Karim, Merciful and compassionate (names of Allah), Jesus Christ, Buddha and Mahaveer. I bow down to Lord Sai who is fond of all faiths.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namo Mahadeva Samba Sadashiva Om
Jaya Bhuvaneshwara Jaya Partheeshwara
Jaya Shiva Shankara Om |Namo Mahadeva...|
Bhavani Shankara Uma Maheshwara Girija Shankara Om
Hara Hara Shankara Gowri Manohara Sai Shiva Shankara Om |Jaya Shiva|
Devotional Song Meaning: I salute the great Lord Shiva, the bestower of happiness, the eternal Lord. Victory to the Supreme Lord of all worlds, who is the Lord of Puttaparthi. Victory to Shiva, the bestower of good. He is the Lord of Goddess Parvathi also referred as Bhavani, Uma, Girija and Gowri. He is Shankara, the Lord of Gowri's heart. He is Sai Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namo Namastheytu Namo Namaya
Namo Namastheytu Manonmanaya
Namo Namastheytu Niramayaya
Tubhyam Sada Bhakthi Krupa Karaya
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow down to you, my Lord, One who is the Lord of the Mind, One who is blemishless. I constantly offer my devotion towards you, who shows me compassion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namo Namo Hari Narayana (3)
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Naada Swaroopa Narayana
Parthi Pureeshwara Narayana
Paapa Vimochana Narayana
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow down to Sai who is the incarnation of Lord Vishnu - who is the ultimate abode of all creation. He is the form of the lion-faced Lord Narasimha. He is the form of divine music. He is the Lord of Puttaparthi. He is one who cleanses us of our sins.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namo Namo Nataraja Namo
Hara Jata Jootadhara Shambho
Namo Namo Nataraja
Pavana Gangadhari
Danava Mada Samhari
Parthi Puri Vihari
Parama Daya Ghana Shourie
Namo Namo Nataraja
Namo Namo Nataraja (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow down to Shiva who is the Lord of cosmic dance. He is the doer of good, Shambho - who has knotted hair locks on His Head. The pure one who bears the holy river Ganga on His hair. He is One who has killed the pride of the demonsHe is One who adorns Puttaparthi, full of infinite compassion.He is One with matted hair.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namo Namo Sai Narayana
Narayana Sathya Narayana |Namo Namo|
Kali Yuga Avatara Narayana
Karuna Sagara Narayana
Swagatham Sai Narayana
Swagatham Swagatham
Swagatham Sai Narayana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow to Lord Sai Narayana. He is our Sathya Narayana. The avatar of the Kali Age. The ocean of compassion, Narayana. I welcome (to my heart) Sai Narayana

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namo Namo Shankara Samba Sadashiva
Samba Sadashiva Shankara Sadashiva |Namo Namo|
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Manohara
Parvathi Priyakara Sri Vishweshwara
Kailasa Vasa Kanaka Sabesha
Namo Namo Shankara Samba Sadashiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva who supports sacred river Ganges in His matted hair, the Lord of the Universe and the Consort of Goddess Parvathi,residing in Kailsh. Salutations to Lord Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namo Namo Sri Devi Namo
Shritha Jana Palini Sai Namo
Chinmaya Roopini Devi Namo
Sri Partheeshwari Sai Namo
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow down to the divine Mother, who protects all those who seek refuge in Her. She is the divine Mother Sai. She has the cosmic form and She has taken form in Parthi now, as Mother Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namo Sharada Namo Sharada Namo Sharada Mata
Hey Vidya Gnana Pradayini
Ma Veena Pusthaka Dharini
Bhava Bhanjani Manoranjani
Sathya Sayeeshwari Mata
Sathya Sayeeshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari Mata
Sathya Sayeeshwari Mata
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow down to Mother Sharada, The One who bestows education, knowledge, The One who holds the string instrument 'Veena' and the book in her hands. She removes the fear of existence and enchants the mind. She is Mother Sathya Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Namostuthey Ganapathi Ganaraya
Namostuthey Namostuthey |Namostuthey...|
Hey Shiva Nandana Sai Gajanana
Sai Gajanana Namostuthey |Namostuthey Namostuthey...|
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow down to You, Lord Ganapathi, the Lord of Shiva's army. The son of Lord Shiva. The one who has the mouse as his vehicle. I repeatedly bow down to you. Please protect me, Oh elephant-faced One.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Ke Dularey Bhaiyya Nacho Nacho Nacho
Murali Ghana Shyama Mora Mukuta Dhama
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Swagatham Krishna Krishna Sharanagatham Krishna
Aao Merey Nayanon Mey Aao Merey Bhajano Mey
Sundara Sundara Gopala Shyama Sundara Sai Gopala
Antaryami Gopala Hrudaya Nivasi Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Perform the Divine dance, darling of NandaThe holder of the flute, the one as dark as the rain cloud, the one who adorns the peacock feathered crown. Perform the Divine dance.I welcome you, Lord Krishna. I surrender to you, Oh Lord Krishna. Be ever in my vision, be ever in my devotional songs. Oh beautiful Lord of the Gopas, the dark hued beautiful One. He is our Sai Gopala. He is the indweller, the dweller of our heart.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Ke Dularey Yashoda Ke Pyaarey
Govinda Murarey Deenon Ke Saharey |Nanda Ke...|
Karuna Sagara Giridhara Naagara
Murali Manohara Shyama (Sai) Murare
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh the loved child of Nanda, the beloved son of Yashoda. Oh Protector of cows, the support of the downtrodden. You are the ocean of compassion. The One who lifted the mountain Govardhana, The One who enchants with the sweet music of the flute, the one who is blue coloured and One who killed the demon Mura.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Ke Lal Bhajo Bhajorey Gopi Gopal Bhajo
Murali Mohana Shyama Bhajorey
Giridhari Lal Bhajo (Sai)
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora
Parthi Vihara Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing of the darling of Nanda, the Lord of cowherd devotees. Sing of the dark hued one with the enchanting flute. Sing of the child who lifted the mountain. The loved one of Nanda, the stealer of the hearts. The one who revels in Parthi, our Sai Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Ke Lal Bhajo Murali Gopal
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Giridhari Shyam Bhajo Gopi Gopal
Meera Ke Natha Prabhu Hey Nandalala |Radhey Shyam|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of the child of Nanda, the protector of cows, Krishna, who plays the flute. We pray to you, the blue coloured Lord of cowherd girl Radha; You lifted the mountain Govardhan. Sing the glory of the Lord of the cowherds, the Lord of the great devotee saint Meera and the beloved son of Nanda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Ke Lal Murali Gopal
Giridhari Govinda Radhey Gopal
Nanda Mukunda Radhey Gopal
Radhey Jai Radhey Jai Radhey Gopal
Radhey Radhey Radhey Gopal
Radhey Radhey Murali Gopal
Radhey Radhey Shyam Gopal
Radhey Radhey Sai Gopal
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh son of Nanda! Oh Lord Krishna, the player of the flute and the cowherd boy! The One who lifted the Govardhan mountain, the protector of the cows and the Lord of Radha, the cowherd girl. The son of Nanda, who grants liberation and glory to you. You are the blue coloured Lord of Radha , the flute playing Lord and the Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Kishora Mana Mohana
Navaneetha Chora Madhusudhana
Devaki Nandana Yadu Nandana
Devadi Deva Jagat Palana
Devotional Song Meaning: The son of Nanda, the One who enchants the mind, The One who steals butter, the slayer of demon, Madhu. The son of Devaki, and the child of the Yadava clan, The Lord of the Lords and the protector of the universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Kishora Narayana
Navaneetha Chora Narayana |Nanda Kishora...|
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Naada Swaroopa Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: You are the son of Nanda and are Lord Vishnu, who is the refuge for all beings, You are Krishna who stole butter, (symbolically, devotee's heart). You are the lion God Narasimha and you are the form of divine music.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora
Narayana Hari Madhava
Madhusudhana Muralidhara
Gopi Jana Chitha Chora
Brindavana Sai Kanhaiya |Narayana Hari|
Devotional Song Meaning: The son of Nanda Who stole butter, you are the Lord in whom all beings take refuge, Oh Vishnu! You are the Lord of Goddess Lakshmi. You killed the demon Madhu and you play the flute. You, who stole the hearts of the Gopis, You are the child of Brindavan, Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora Sai Gopala
Govardhana Giridhari Murari Hey Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala
Goparipala Gokula Bala Giridhara Gopala
Murali Lola Munijana Pala Hey Nandalala |Nandalala|
Devotional Song Meaning: The son of Nanda, the One who stole butter, Oh Lord of cowherds, You are the One who lifted the mountain Govardhana, the One who killed the demon Mura; You are the child of Nanda - You are the cowherd boy, the One who protects cows, one who revels in playing the flute. You are the One who protects the saintly persons, Oh Nandalal.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Kumara Govinda Navaneetha Chora Govinda
Srinivasa Hari Govinda Shritha Jana Pala Govinda |Nanda Kumara...|
Sai Rama Harey Govinda Sai Krishna Harey Govinda
Deena Dayalu Govinda Prema Swaroopa Govinda
Govinda Hari Govinda (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: I sing of the son of Nanda, the protector of cows; the One Who stole butter and who is the Lord of cows (all beings)! Oh Lord of Lakshmi! You are One that protects those that seek refuge in you. You are Sairam, you are Sai Krishna. You are the One that is compassionate towards the downtrodden and you are the form of Divine Love. You are the protector of cows (all beings), Lord Vishnu.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Kumaram Krishnam Bhajey
Navaneetha Chora Krishnam Bhajey|Nanda Kumaram|
Natawara Naagara Krishnam Bhajey
Narahara Sundara Krishnam Bhajey
Narayana Hari Krishnam Bhajey
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Krishna, the son of Nanda. The stealer of hearts, Lord Krishna. The divine dancer, Lord krishna. The beautiful man-God Lord Krishna. He is the Lord Vishnu, Sing the glory of Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Mukunda Hari Gopala
Gopi Jana Priya Goparipala |Nanda Mukunda...|
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Sai Gopala
Nanda Nanda Mukunda Gopala
