Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Krishna! You arethe cowherd boy, the one who grants liberation. You arethe favourite of the cowherds and the protector of cows (all noble souls). Oh Sai Krishna you are the onewho protects His devotees. You are the one who giveshappiness to Nanda too.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Nanda Mukunda Gopal
Nanda Mukunda Hari Shyama Gopal
Radha Manasa Krishna Gopal
Murali Manohara Mukunda Gopal
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gopal Sathya Sai Gopal
Devotional Song Meaning: You are the son and joy of Nanda and the bestower of liberation. You are the cowherd boy Krishna. Oh blue coloured Lord! You are the One Who resides in the heart of the cowherd girl Radha (symbolises ardent devotee). You arethe One Who plays the flute and conquers the mind. You are the One Who is the Lord of Puttaparthi and also known as Lord Sathya SaiGopal.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Nanda Mukunda Gopala
Murali Mohana Shyama Gopala
Shyama Gopal Ghana Shyama Gopala |Murali Mohana|
Jai Jai Jai Jai Jai Nandalala
Jai Nandalala Radhey Gopala |Murali Mohana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh son of Nanda! You are the cowherd boy Krishna who grants us liberation. You are the One who enchants us by playing the flute.Oh blue coloured Lord resembling the dark colour of the clouds, Victory be to you, the child of Nanda. Victory be to youoh Lord of Radha, the cowherd girl.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Nanda Mukunda Hey Sri Hari
Indiresha Yadu Nandana Hari
Manda Haasa Madhusudhana Hari
Sundarakara Sayeesha Sri Hari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh the son and joy of Nanda, you are the bestower of liberation, You, who art the child of the Yadavas. You arethe One with a slight smile and the One who killed the demon Madhu. You are alsothe One with a beautiful form of Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Nandana Hari Govinda Gopala
Ghana Shyama Mana Mohana (2)
Gopi Lola Gopala
Gokula Bala Gopala
Hey Nandalala Gopala |Ghana Shyama|
Devotional Song Meaning: The son of Nanda, Oh Vishnu! You are the protector of cows. You are the blue coloured Lord resembling the clouds and the One who enchants the mind. You are the favourite of the devout cowherd girls. The cowherd boy who is the beloved child of the cowherd abode Gokula and the loving child of Nanda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Nandana Navaneetha Chora
Gokula Bala Venu Gopala |Nanda Nandana...|
Mathura Natha Harey Krishna Gopala
Shyama Gopala Sai Gopala
Vanamali Giridhari Shyama Gopala |Gokula Bala|
Devotional Song Meaning: The son of Nanda Who stole butter. The child of the cowherd land Gokula, the One playing the flute. The Lord of Mathura, Oh Lord Krishna, the protector of cows. The blue coloured cowherd boy Krishna, wearing the garland (Vanamali) and the One who lifted the mountain Govardhana (Giridhari).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nanda Nandana Navaneetha Chora Brindavana Vihari
Shyam Sundara Madana Mohana Brindavana Vihari
Karuna Sagara Kamala Nayana Brindavana Vihari |Shyama Sundara...|
Padmanabha Parthi Vasa Brindavana Vihari |Shyama Sundara|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh the son of Nanda, You are the one Who stole butter and who played in Brindavan. You are the blue coloured beautiful Lord, with an enchanting form and the one who adorns Brindavan. You are the Ocean of compassion and the lotus-eyed Lord who revels in Brindavan. The One with a lotus in the navel (Vishnu) is the One who resides in Puttaparthi and alsothe One who adorns Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nandalal Nandalal Nandalal Yadu Nandalal
Nandalala Navaneetha Chora
Radha Pyaarey Nandalal
Mayi Meera Manasa Chora
Parthi Vihari Nandalal
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh child of Nanda! You are the child of Yadavas or the cowherd clan! You are the One who stole butter (devotees' hearts)! You are the loved One of Radha, the cowherd girl! You stole the heart & mind of the great saint Princess MeeraYou are the One who dwells in Puttaparthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nandalala Nandalala
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Navaneetha Chora Hey Bala Gopala
Gopi Manohara Gopala Bala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh child of Nanda! Rejoice in dance, dance and dance! You are the Lord of the cowherds who stole butter! You are the beautiful child Krishna! The one who enchanted the cowherd girls! The cowherd child!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nandalala Nandalala
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Navaneetha Chora Hey Bala Gopala
Gopi Manohara Gopala Bala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh child of Nanda! Rejoice in dance, dance and dance! You are the Lord of the cowherds who stole butter! You are the beautiful child Krishna! The one who enchanted the cowherd girls! The cowherd child!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nandalala Nandalala
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Navaneetha Chora Hey Bala Gopala
Gopi Manohara Gopala Bala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh child of Nanda! Rejoice in dance, dance and dance! You are the Lord of the cowherds who stole butter! You are the beautiful child Krishna! The one who enchanted the cowherd girls! The cowherd child!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nandalala Nandalala Daya Karo Bhagawan
Bhava Sagar Se Paar Utharo
Daya (Sai Krupa) Karo Bhagawan
Tumharey Sharan Bin Anath Hai Hum
Daya (Sai Krupa) Karo Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh child of Nanda! Oh Lord! Have compassion on me. Help me cross this Ocean of life. Have compassion on me. Have pity on me. Without (the shelter of) your feet, we are orphans Oh Lord! Have compassion towards me. Have pity on me Oh Lord Sai!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nandalala Navaneetha Chora Natawara Lala Gopala
Devaki Vasudeva Kumara
Deva Deva Gopala |Nandalala...|
Mohana Murali Gaana Vilola
Mohana Jaya Gopala (Mana)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh child of Nanda! the stealer of butter! One who dances beautifully! The cowherd Lord! The son of Devaki and Vasudeva! The Lord of Lords! Oh protector of cows! One Who plays melodiously on the flute! Oh the One with an enchanting form! The victorious cowherd Lord!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nandalala Shyama Sundara Nandalala
Kaustubha Dhari Vanamala Dhara Shyamala Madana Gopala
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Sai Shyam Sai Shyam
Radha Madhava Madana Gopala
Mathura Natha Gopala
Parthi Nandana Hrudaya Sanjeevana
Shyamala Madana Gopala |Radhey Shyam...|
Devotional Song Meaning: This bhajan praises Lord Sai Krishna as the one who is most charming, the one who wears the jewel Kaustubha, the beloved of Radha, the Lord of Mathura and the one who resides in the hearts of His devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nandalala Yadu Nandalala
Brindavana Govinda Lala
Radha Lola Nandalala
Radha Madhava Nandalala (Jai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh child of Nanda! You arethe darling of the Yadava (cowherd) chieftain. You arethe child of Brindavan and the protector of cows! You are the favourite of Radha, the cowherd girl. Victory to you!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nandana Yadu Nandana Anandana Chitha Chandana
Vandana Guru Vandana Sathya Sai Satchidanandana
Sundara Mukharavindana
Govindana Gopalana
Radha Madhava Mohana
Muralidhara Madhusudhana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh son of the cowherd chieftain Nanda! the source of joy! You arethe sandal fragrance of the heart. Salutations to the Guru, the preceptor Who is Sai, who is the embodiment of Truth, Existence and Bliss. The One Who is beautiful with a lotus-like face, He Who is the Protector of cows, the cowherd boy Krishna. You are the one who is the Lord of the cowherd girl Radha and are the enchanting One. You are the one who holds the flute andthe one who killed the demon Madhu.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nandeeshwara Hey Nataraja
Nandatmaja Hari Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana |Nandeeshwara...|
Nagabharana Namah Shivaya
Naada Swaroopa Namo Namo |Narayana Hari (Sai)|
Devotional Song Meaning: OhLord of Nandi, the divine bull, You are the Lord of cosmic dance, Shiva. You are alsoknown as the son of Nanda, Oh Vishnu, the ultimate refuge of all beings. OhSai Narayana, You are Shiva, who is adorned with the snake! You are the one who embodies divine music!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nandeeshwara Om Namah Shivaya
Nataraja Om Namah shivaya
Nagabharana Namah Shivaya
Nata Shiva Shankara Namah Shivaya |Nataraja Om...|
Sai Raja Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord of the divine bull Nandi! Lord Shiva! Prostrations to you Oh The Lord of cosmic dance! Lord Shiva! Salutations to you Oh Lord Shiva Who adorns a snake as an ornament! I worship you! Oh Shiva, Who dances and Who bestows good! Oh Sai Shiva! Obeisance to you!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nandi Vahana Nataraja Harey
Indushekara Shiva Raja Harey |Nandi Vahana...|
Bandha Vimochana Hey Baba Harey
Parthi Pureeshwara Shiva Sai Harey
Sai Harey Sathya Sai Harey
Baba Harey Sai Baba Harey
Sai Harey Sathya Sai Harey
Baba Harey Sai Baba Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Shiva Whose vehicle is the divine bull! You are the Lord of cosmic dance! Oh Lord Shiva! You are the one Who is adorned on His head with the crescentmoon! Oh Lord Sai Baba you are the one Who frees us of all bondage! Oh Lord of Puttaparthi You are Sri Sathya Sai Who is also the incarnation of Lord Shiva!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nandi Vahana Nataraja Namo
Phaala Lochana Shiva Raja Namo |Nandi Vahana|
Parama Esha Jagadeesha Namo
Shiva Shakthi Partheesha Namo
Bholey Baba Sayeesha Namo
Devotional Song Meaning: Recite the name of Lord Shiva (Lord Sai) who rides on the celestial Bull Nandi, has the third eye in the forehead, consort of Goddess Shakthi (Parvathi).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Naada Swaroopa Narayana
Parthi Pureesha Narayana
Paapa Vimochana Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! You arethe abode of all beings; the form of Lion-faced Lord Narasimha! Oh Lord! You arethe embodiment of divine music! Oh Lord of Puttaparthi! You are the Lord Who washes away our sins! Oh Lord Narayana, You are the ultimate refuge of all beings!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayan Hari Narayan Jaya Narayan Sai Narayan
Narayan Hari Narayan Narayan Sai Narayan (2)
Narayan Hari Narayan Jaya Narayan Sai Narayan
Narayan Hari Narayan Narayan Sai Narayan
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! You are the refuge of all beings! Victory be to you Oh Lord Hari! Oh Lord Sai the incarnation of Lord Narayana! Victory to you Oh Hari!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayan Narayan Bhajaman Narayan
Sri Hari Madhava Narayan Bhajaman Narayan
Murali Shyam Mohana Shyam Murali Mohana Shyam
Merey Ram Hey Ghana Shyam Sai Sadguru Naam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mind, Sing the glory of Lord Narayan! The abode of all beings! Sing the glory of the Lord of Lakshmi! Lord Vishnu! He is Krishna who is blue coloured, He is enchanting; His music on the flute is enchanting. He is my Lord Ram, He is the cloud-like blue coloured Lord. Sing the name of Sai, the Ultimate preceptor of all!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayan Narayan Jaya Govinda Harey
Narayan Narayan Jaya Gopala Harey
Narayan Narayan Jaya Govinda Harey
Narayan Narayan Jaya Gopala Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Narayana! Oh Govinda! Oh the cowherd Lord Krishna! Victory be to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayana Govinda Harey
Narayana Gopala Harey |Narayana Govinda...|
Shanthakara Bhujanga Shayana
Narayana Veda Parayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana, the refuge of all beings! You are the protector of cows (meek)! Oh Krishna, the cowherd Lord! You arethe One who is the embodiment of peace, You arethe One who reclines on the serpent Adishesha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Naama Bhajorey Narayana Veda Parayana
Karuna Bharana Bhava Bhaya Harana
Pavana Charana Patitha Janavana
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the name of Narayana, the ultimate shelter for all creatures! He is the Lord of the Vedas! He wears compassion as an ornament and removes the fear of the mundane world, He is One with Holy feet and One who redeems the downtrodden! He is Narayana, Hari and Sai!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana
Nanda Govinda Ananda Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Nanda Govinda Ananda Narayana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana, You are the abode of all beings. Lord Hari You arethe son of Nanda and The Lord of CowherdKrishna and the Lord of bliss!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana
Nanda Govinda Ananda Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Nanda Govinda Ananda Narayana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana, You are the abode of all beings. Lord Hari You arethe son of Nanda and The Lord of CowherdKrishna and the Lord of bliss!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana
Nanda Govinda Ananda Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Nanda Govinda Ananda Narayana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana, You are the abode of all beings. Lord Hari You arethe son of Nanda and The Lord of CowherdKrishna and the Lord of bliss!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana
Nanda Govinda Ananda Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Nanda Govinda Ananda Narayana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana, You are the abode of all beings. Lord Hari You arethe son of Nanda and The Lord of CowherdKrishna and the Lord of bliss!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana
Nanda Govinda Ananda Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Nanda Govinda Ananda Narayana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana, You are the abode of all beings. Lord Hari You arethe son of Nanda and The Lord of CowherdKrishna and the Lord of bliss!

Devotional Song Lyrics: Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Bhaja Narayana (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Veda Parayana
Shambho Mahadeva Shambho Mahadeva Shambho Mahadeva Sadashiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! You are the author of Vedas. You are also Lord Shiva, The doer of good.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Om
Sri Jagannatha Jyothi Swaroopa |Narayana Hari...|
Dharani Dhara Hey Damodara
Vande Sri Ananda Nanda Kumara
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! You arethe ultimate destination for all beings. Oh Vishnu! You are the Lord of the Universe! You are the divine light who holds the earth. Oh Vishnu! I Bow down to youoh Lord of Joy who is also the son of Nanda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Om Hari Om
Duritha Nivarana Hari Om Hari Om |Narayana Hari...|
Triloka Palana Hari Om Hari Om
Parama Dayalana Hari Om Hari Om
Garuda Vahana Hari Om Hari Om
Pundarikaaksha Hari Om Hari Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! You rescue usonce we call out your nameOh Lord Hari! You are the protector of the three worlds Oh Lord Hari. You are the most compassionate one Oh Lord Hari. You have Garudaor mighty Divine Eagle asyour vehicle Oh Lord Hari. Prostrations to you Oh lotus-eyedone.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om
Sai Narayana Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om |Narayana Hari...|
Shanthakara Bhujanga Shayana
Padmanabha Hari Om
Sai Narayana Hari Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! You are the Lord Sai Who is the incarnation of Hari. You are the embodiment of peace, you recline on the serpent Adishesha. You have a Lotus emerging from your navel (symbolises creation arising from the Lord). Oh Lord Sai! Oh Lord Narayana! Salutations to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayana Narayana Mangala Dhaam
Sai Brahma Sai Vishnu
Sai Parameshwara Omkaara
Sai Muralidhara Vara Govinda
Sayeesha Mangala Dhaam (Sathya)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! Oh the abode of auspiciousness! You are Brahma, the Lord of Creation, You are Vishnu, the Lord of sustenance! You are Shiva, the supreme Lord of Destruction, Oh Sai, the embodiment of OmkaarYou are Krishna holding the flute, bestower of boons, you are Govinda, the protector of cows.Oh Lord Sathya Sai! You are the abode of auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayana Sai Narayana
Narahari Roopa Namo Narayana
Shantha Swaroopa Namo Narayana
Hey Hrishikesha Hrudaya Nivasa
Deena Sharanya Narayana
Narayana Namo Narayana
Narayana Veda Parayana
Narayana Sai Narayana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Narayana! The abode of all beings! Oh Lord Sai! You are the lion-faced Lord Narahari! Prostrations to you.The form of peace oh Hari! my Obeisance! Oh Hrishikesha (Lord of the senses, Vishnu)! You are the inhabitant of the devotee's heart! Oh the refuge of the poor! Oh Lord Hari! Salutations to you.Oh Lord You are the author of Vedas.Oh Lord Sai! You are the incarnation of Lord Narayana!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayana Veda Parayana
Nava Nava Sundara Narayana |Narayana Veda...|
Neeraja Shayana Narayana
Neeraja Lochana Narayana
Ghana Shyama Sundara Narayana
Kali Yuga Avatara Narayana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! the author of Vedas! You are of ever renewing beauty Oh Narayana! You recline on the Lotus in the Ocean of milk You are lotus-eyed You have the beautiful form, with a blue colour like the clouds, You are the Avatar or incarnation of this Kali age (Sai).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayanam Bhaja Narayanam
Narayanam Sriman Narayanam |Narayanam Bhaja...|
Tava Paada Charanam Narayanam
Shesha Shayanam Narayanam (Adi)
Narayanam Sriman Narayanam
Narayanam Sathya Narayanam
Narayanam Sai Narayanam
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Narayana, the Lord of ultimate refuge He is Sathyanarayana or the Real form We surrender to your feet, Oh Narayana You recline on the cosmic serpent Adishesha!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayanam Bhaja Narayanam (3)
Bhaja Mana Narayanam (3)
Bhaja Mana Bhaja Mana Narayanam
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Narayana! Oh mind! Sing the name of Lord Narayana the abode of all beings

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Narayani Veda Parayani
Karunanta Ranjani Narayani |Narayani Veda...|
Kamakshi Sundari Katyayani
Vani Saraswathi Vijayambikey
Vageshwari Vaagdevi Janani (2)
Karunya Lavanya Guna Shalini
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother Parvathi! You are the sister of Narayana! You are the protector of all Vedas! You have other names like Kamakshi or the One with attractive eyes, You are Sundari or the beautiful One! You are Katyayani or the consort of Shiva! You are the Goddess of learning or Saraswathi, You are Vani the Goddess of art, You are the Mother responsible for oratory skills, You are endowed with qualities of compassion and beauty.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nata Nandana Ghana Sai Murari
Shyama Manohara Bansi Dhari |Nata Nandana...|
Mukunda Madhava Hey Giridhari
Raasa Vilola Kunja Vihari
Savari Surath Par Javun Balihaari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna! You are the divine dancing child! You destroyed the demon Mura You are the blue coloured Lord of enchanting beauty, holding the fluteYou are the Lord of Liberation, the consort of Lakshmi, you lifted the mountain Govardhan You danced with the cowherd girls and played in Brindavan I am enchanted by your captivating dark coloured form

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Natana Kaladhara Natana Manohara
Narthana Sundara Nataraja
Shivakami Sundara Shiva Raja
Shiva Sai Shankara Shiva Raja
Devotional Song Meaning: We pray to Shiva who is the source of all dance forms, heartthrob of Parvathi. His dance form enchants one and all. Beautiful Shiva is none other than Sai who also used to dance charmingly giving joy to his devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nataraja Hey Tripurari
Jaya Hey Jaya Hey Shambho |Nataraja Hey...|
Nandi Vahana Nagabharana
Phaala Lochana Parama Shiva
Pavana Charana Paahi Mahesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Hail Shiva, the destroyer of demon King Tripura. Victory to Lord Shiva who is revered as master of all dance forms, Nataraja. The celestial snakes adorn him as garlands and who rides Nandi, the great bull. We bow at his lotus feet seeking solace as he is the supreme form with the third eye who grants succour to the whole creation. We bow to Shankara who is also famously known as Mahesha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nataraja Namami Shankara
Shiva Raja Shiva Shiva Shankara |Nataraja Namami...|
Shirdi Pureeshwara Shiva Shankara
Parthi Pureeshwara Parameshwara
Hrudayeshwara Sayeeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: We offer our humble salutations to Shankara who is the source of all dance forms. We pray to Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai, incarnations of Shiva. We pray to Sai who resides in the hearts of the devoted.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nataraja Nataraja Narthana Sundara Nataraja
Shiva Raja Shiva Raja Shiva Tandava Priya Shiva Raja
Chidambaresha Nataraja
Parthi Pureesha Nataraja
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations of the Lord of dance form, Nataraja. Lord Shiva, in his beautiful form as Nataraja, who enacts the enchanting cosmic dance known as Tandava. He thrills the whole universe. Lord Shiva who appears in his cosmic dance form at Chidambaram in Southern India. Nataraja has incarnated as our Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nataraja Nataraja Natana Shekara Raja
Shiva Raja Shiva Raja Natana Shekara Raja
Shiva Shiva Namo Hara Hara Namo
Shankara Shiva Nataraja |Nataraja Nataraja...|
Namah Parvathi Pathayey Hara (Om)
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Shiva, the ultimate dancer, who mesmerizes one and all with his cosmic dance. Lord Shiva, who has no parallel to his dance and his dancing style. When his devotees sing his glory incessantly, he is enchanted. We bow to Shiva, the Lord of Parvathi, Hara Hara to bestow eternal bliss on his devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Natawara Giridhara Nandalala
Gopala Gopala |Natawara...|
Govinda Govinda Gopala Gopala
Govinda Govinda Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala
Nandalala Sai Nandalala
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lord of dance, the one who raised the mountain to protect his devotees, The darling son of Nanda, He is the protector of all beings, Gopala, also known as Govinda. Sing praises of the darling son of Nanda, who is none other than our beloved Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Natawara Krishna Natawara Krishna Radhey Nandalala
Harey Harey Madhava Harey Gopika Lola
Krishna Ghana Ghana Neela Krishna Gokula Bala
Harey Harey Madhava Hara Gopika Lola
Devotional Song Meaning: Pray to Krishna, the little prankster, who is the soul of Radha. Hey Madhava (Lord of Lakshmi)you are the enchanter of the gopis of Brindavan. The hue of dark blue makes you the endearing child of Gokul. Hail Krishna who showered eternal bliss on the gopis.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Natawara Lal Giridhara Gopal
Meera Prabhu Ghana Shyama Gopal |Natawara Lal...|
Veda Saara Jeevan Ka Aadhaar
Gopi Manohara Hrudaya Vihar
Devotional Song Meaning: Mischievous Krishna, the protector of gokul, who lifted the Govardhan mountain, stole the pure hearts of gopis. He is the Lord of Meera, whose heart was filled with pure love for the dark hued Gopala. He, whose name is the essence of all Vedas. He is also the life force (bulwark) for us. We bow to Gopal who always resides in the pure hearts of the cowherd, Gopis.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Natawara Naagara Hey Nandalala
Radha Lola Raasa Vilola |Natawara Naagara|
Murali Lola Munijana Pala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Giridhara Bala Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: The darling son of Nanda, You are the one who enchants with his mischief. The soul of Radha, you are the one who enticed all gopis with his dance. You are the one who enthralls with his flute, saviour of the righteous rishis.You are the Lord of Saint Meera, the child who lifted the mountain.Youare Sai Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Natawara Naagara Nanda Mukunda
Brindavana Ghana Shyama Govinda
Radha Madhava Ananda Chanda
Sai Murari Satchidananda
Devotional Song Meaning: Krishna the embodiment of dance, isthe darling son of Nanda, who grants liberation. The dark cloud hued protector of all beings, who lived in Brindavan.He shared the divine happiness with Radha. He is our Sai, bestowing truth, awareness and bliss and destroys any evil in us just as he annihilated Mura, the demon.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Natawara Natawara Nanda Kumara
Nanda Kumara Jaya Goparipala
Yaduvara Yaduvara Brinda Vihara
Brinda Vihara Jaya Parthi Vihara
Devotional Song Meaning: Hail the son of Nanda, who appears mischievous. Hail the son of Nanda who lovingly cares for all the cows. The jewel of the dynasty of Yadu, who strolls in Brindavan. Hail, Sai of Parthi, who also strolls as he did in Brindavan.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Navaneetha Chora Bala Gopal
Yashoda Nandana Krishna Gopal
Sai Gopal Sathya Sai Gopal
Sai Gopal Bhajo Murali Gopal
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to The Cowherd who stole butter and butter-like hearts of people of Gokul. Known as Krishna, a darling of mother Yashoda. Sing the glory of our Sai Krishna, who manifests everywhere through the music of HIS divine flute.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nayanon Mey Prem Dhar Vachanon Mey Amrutha Dhar
Sadguru Sai Mera Jeevan Ka Dhar
Nayanon Mey Prem Dhar Vachanon Mey Amrutha Dhar |Sadguru Sai|
Jeevan Ka Dhar Mera Jeevan ka Dhar |Sadguru Sai|
Devotional Song Meaning: The embodiment of eternal and divine love, who fills our hearts with the nectarine wisdom (Amrut), showers compassionate love through merciful eyes and sweet and soothing words of wisdom. Guru of gurus Sai, You are the true support and eternal guide of my life.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Neela Megha Shyama Govardhana Giridhari
Parthi Vihari Sai Murari
Brija Gopi Priya Nandana Raasa Vihari
Vana Mala Ghana Murali Bansidhari
Krishna Murari Natawara Naagara Shourie
Brindavan Sanchari Shyama (Sai) Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Prayers to Krishna who is majestic like a dark blue cloud and could lift the Mount Govardhan, Destroyer of demon Mura to protect the saintly people. He verily resides in Parthi to upflift the mankind. In the land of Brij, he was dear to all gopis and gopalas. He engaged the gopisin Raasaleela, having the garland of Tulasi, playing the divine flute, indulging in playful mischief, he made Brindavan a heaven on earth. He is none other than our beloved Sai Murari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Neela Megha Shyamala Ghana Shyama Sundara
Muralidhara Mana Mohana Sathya Sai Sundara
Jagat Karana Paripoorana Hey Sai Sundara
Shirdeeshwara Partheeshwara Sai Prem Mandira
Devotional Song Meaning: The beauty of the dark clouds reflects in immensely charming Krishna. The holder of the flute, the enchanter of the hearts, he is also our beautiful Sathya Sai. The cause and completeness of creation, is our beloved Sai. We offer our prayers to both Shirdi Sai and Parthi Sai to adorn our hearts.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Neela Megha Shyamala Roopa Gopala
Nithyananda Swaroopa Sai Gopala
Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Gopala |Nithyananda Swaroopa..|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh dark complexioned Lord Sai Gopala, you are the embodiment of eternal bliss, Oh son of Eshwaramba.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Neela Megha Shyamala Roopa Sai Gaana Lola Gokula Bala
Geeta Quran Bible Mey Tera Rang Hai
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Tera Roop Hai
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prem Sab Ko Diya
Hum Terey Charano Mey Sharan Liya (Baba)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sai, who loves bhajan songs, bestows the bliss as conferred upon Gopis by the dark-hued child of Gokula, Lord Krishna. All celestialbooks like Quran, Bible and Gita are filled with your hue. Even the trinity of Brahma, Vishnu and Maheshwara are your manifestations. You showered Truth, Right Conduct, Peace and Love on us to emulate by taking refuge at your lotus feet. Oh Baba, This surrender is our submission for redemption.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Neela Varna Ghana Shyama
Murali Lola Ghana Shyama
Radha Madhava Shyama
Meera Ke Prabhu Shyama
Sai Krishna Hey Giridhari
Sai Prabho Hey Nandalala
Surdas Ke Giridhari
Gopi Mohana Nandalala
Devotional Song Meaning: Krishna, who shines brilliantly in dark blue steals the hearts by the melodies from the divine flute, who is the dear Lord of Radha and Meera. The mighty one who lifted the Mount Govardhan has returned as Sai to redeem us as he did for the saints like Surdas and the devout gopis. Let us pray for our redemption.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Neelagriva Kumara
Bala Ganeshwara Gajanana
Mooladhara Nivasa
Paalaya Maam Prabho Partheeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh, Ganesha you are the son of Neelakanta, Mahadeva, You command all Ganas (army of Lord Shiva) You are the very base of the universe (also presiding deity of the Mooladhara Chakra). We offer our prayers to the Lord of Parthi to protect us at all times.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Neelakanta Gangadhara Hara Uma Pathey
Pralayankara Abhayankara Hara Bhootha Pathey |Neelakanta...|
Dama Dama Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Bhajey
Nataraja Manohara Tandava Nachey
Partheeshwara Parameshwara Kailasapathey
Devotional Song Meaning: Hail Shankara, bestower of auspiciousness, the Lord Shiva. The blue-throated Lord Shiva protector of one and all, who swallowed the poison raised by the churning. Praise the Lord who took all suffering on himself for the welfare of all beings. He helped Bhagirath to bring Ganges from heaven and in the process became Gangadhara. He grants bliss by playing the Damaru and performing the cosmic dance, Tandava. We bow to Shiva, Lord of Kailasa, who incarnated at Shirdi and at Parthi as our Sathya Sai. Prayers to him to bless us all at all times.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Neelakanta Mahadeva Gowri Vandana
Chandra Chooda Daya Natha Nandi Vahana
Samba Shiva Shooladhari Naga Bhooshana
Phaala Netra Uma Kantha Parama Pavana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh, God of Gods, Mahadeva, the blue-throated one, you are worshipped by the divine mother Gowri. You are adorned with the moon on your tresses, You bless the Nandi (The great bull) as your vehicle. You are full of compassion. You carry the Trident and wear the Holy snakes as ornaments. With mother Uma as consort, adorned with the third eye, you are the purest of the Pure. Bless us all at all times.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Neeraja Shayana Narayana
Neela Varna Hari Narayana
Shankha Chakra Hari Narayana
Padmadala Dhara Narayana
Hey Shesha Shayana Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Offering prayers to Narayana, who reclines on the Lotus, He is Hari and Narayana with enchanting blue hue. He holds the Conch and Sudarshan (wheel of liberation) Disc to protect his devotees. Lotus garlands enhance his glory, resting on the snake Shesha. We bow to Sai, who is Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nirakara Roopam Nirantam Ganesham
Sada Sath Swaroopam Smarami Ganesham
Parabrahma Roopam Paramatma Roopam
Bhajami Mahesham Namami Suresham
Devotional Song Meaning: We offer prayers to the infinite, formless Lord Ganesha. We contemplate on him as he represents ultimate truth. He is the Great Brahman and the supreme soul. We pray to the master of celestial entities and sing His glory at all times.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Niranjana Nara Roopa Dhara
Nirguna Gunamaya Sayeesha
Esha Jagadeesha Paramesha Sayeesha |Niranjana Nara...|
Nirguna Gunamaya Sayeesha
Natha Jagannatha Deena Natha Sai Natha
Devotional Song Meaning: Blemishless Lord in human form.Lord Sai who is beyond attributes, as well as source of all attributes. He is the master of entire universe and beyond the universe. He is the refuge of downtrodden and the entire creation. We bow to Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Niranjani Sai Bhavani
Jagat Janani Ananda Dayini |Niranjani Sai|
Durga Lakshmi Narayani
Sri Kamalasana Hamsa Vahini
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the blemishless Mother Sai, the creator and bestower of life. The universal mother is the source of bliss divine. She is the combination of Durga (power) and Lakshmi (wealth), Narayani (all round welfare) and Hamsa vahini (Saraswathi - education), Kamalasana (Seated on the Lotus bloom). We bow to the mother who is everything for us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nirupama Guna Sadana Charana Neeraja Dala Nayana
Kashayambara Vesha Dharana Kali Yuga Avatara
Nithya Ranjana Nirmala Charitha Nirupama Yogendra
Maha Teja Nataraja Viraja Aasha Paasha Nasha Esha
Devotional Song Meaning: Swami has no parallel as he is the source of pure and auspicious traits. We take refuge at the lotus feet of the lotus eyed one. He represents sacrifice signified by the orange robe which He adorns during this Kali age. Of ever-charming, blemishless character, He is the uncomparable Lord of Yogis. He is Eshwara, the majestic Lord of dance, who grants us freedom from every kind of worldly attachment and desire.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Nithyanandam Satchidanandam
Hari Hari Hari Om Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana |Hari Hari|
Prema Swaroopa Premananda (2) |Hari Hari|
Narayana Sai Narayana |Hari Hari|
Devotional Song Meaning: The ever blissful Narayana, who is the embodiment of Truth, Awareness and bliss is alsothe sole source for constant integrated awareness. He is the embodiment of pure love, who alone can grant such a blissful state to His devotees when they pray to him as Hari and Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
O Baba Sai Baba
Deenon Ke Dukha Harthey Baba |O Baba...|
Ram Hi Baba Krishna Hi Baba
Nara Dehi Narayan Baba (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Baba! Kindly remove the miseries of the meek. You are none other than Lord Rama, Krishna and Narayana incarnated as Lord Sai Baba.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Araj Suno Merey Sai Bhagawan
Parthi Puri Ke Tum Ho Daata
Brindavan Ke Tum Ho Daata
Sab Bhakthon Ke Man Ko Bhata
Paar Utharo Naiya Morey
Sai Ghana Shyama Sai Ghana Shyama
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord, hear my prayers my dear Sai, Oh Lord Sai Baba. You are the boon bestowing Lord of Parthi and Brindavan. You are the beloved of all devotees, enchanting their minds and hearts. Pleasehelp us cross this boat safely across the river of life, Oh Sai, the one having deep blue complexion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sai Baba Bhagawan
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sathya Sai Bhagawan
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sai Rama Bhagawan
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sai Krishna Bhagawan
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Shiva Sai Bhagawan
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sai Datta Bhagawan
Hara Bhagawan Hara Bhagawan Hara Bhagawan Hara Hara Bhagawan
Om Bhagawan Om Bhagawan Om Bhagawan Tat Sat Bhagawan
Prema Bhagawan Jyothi Bhagawan Atma Bhagawan Paramatma Bhagawan
Nanda Bhagawan Ananda Bhagawan Nityananda Bhagawan Brahmananda Bhagawan
Ayodhya Bhagawan Dwaraka Bhagawan Shirdi Bhagawan Sri Parthi Bhagawan
Rammu Bhagawan Rammu Bhagawan Rammu Bhagawan Itu Rammu Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: We bow to Bhagawan Baba who is the divine parent to all, who is the embodiment of truth, who grants love to one and all. Sairama, who pleases everyone and the saviour to the devotees and Sai Krishna who gives joy and protects all beings. We bow to Datta (the form of the Trinity). You are the Lord Shiva, You are the eternal Truth. You are the ever effulgent Atma, the Paramatma. You are the ever blissful son of Nanda, source of divine bliss. You are the Lord of Ayodhya and Dwaraka, having incarnated now at Parthi. Welcome to You, Bhagawan, hearty welcome to You, please come to me.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
O Merey Swami Antaryami
Antar Jyothi Jalao Sai
Tu Merey Pitha Tu Hai Meri Mata
Tu Merey Bandhu Tu Merey Daata
Tu Merey Malik Main Tera Balak
Daya Karo Merey Sai Natha
Devotional Song Meaning: Kindle the light of wisdom in my heart. Oh indweller of hearts, Lord Sai! You are my father, mother, kith and kin and master and my sustainer. I am Thine. Oh my Lord Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Om Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Babaya Namah (7)
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us bow and chant the glory of Sathya Sai Baba in all aspects. OM which is the primordial sound, Bhagawan - who possesses excellence in the SIXTEEN (only Krishna in Dwapara Age was supposed to have had) attributes in full splendour. Now, Sai. Shri which represents prosperity, Sathya the embodiment of truth.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Babaya Nama Om (4)
Tu Hai Sakala Jagat Ke Swami
Tu Hai Merey Ma Baap Bhaiyya
Tu Hai Merey Sai Baba
Om Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Babaya Nama Om
Devotional Song Meaning: We bow down to Lord Sathya Sai Baba. You are the Lord of the entire Universe.You are my mother, father and brother, You are my Lord, my Sai Baba.My salutations to You.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Ganesha Vighnesha Namo Namo
Sri Sathya Sayeesha Namo Namo (Om) |Om Ganesha...|
Vidya Buddhi Aur Siddhi Pradatha
Shiva Shivani Sutha Kumara Bhrata
Partheesha Paramesha Namo Namo (Om) |(Om) Sri Sathya|
Devotional Song Meaning: Hail the Lord Ganesha, who removes all obstacles. We pray to Sathya Sai who upholds human values to grant all round welfare to the humanity. He is bestower of education, intelligence and success. He is the son of Shiva and Parvathi, He is the brother of Subrahmanya. Our salutations to him, who is the Lord of Parthi, the greatest Lord.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Guru Natha Jai Guru Natha Sadguru Natha Om
Om Guru Natha Jai Guru Natha
Sadguru Natha Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the primordial sound, OM (Aum) which is our Guru, our Lord, who is the Guru of Gurus.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Guru Natha Jaya Guru Natha
Omkaareshwara Shiva Guru Natha |Om Guru|
Sadguru Natha Sathya Sai natha
Parthi Pureeshwara Harey Guru (Sai) Natha
Devotional Song Meaning: Meditate on the primordial sound 'OM' (AUM) representing the Parabrahman (the Supreme force). Fortunate are those who have Sai as their preceptor. Let us pray to HIM to guide us to salvation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Hara Hara Hara Hara Uma Maheshwara
Gowri Shankara Namah Om
Ksheerabhisheka Priya Shiva Shiva Shambho
Sayeeshwara Namah Om
Shiva Shaktheeshwaraya Namah Om
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: I pray to the Lord Shiva, Lord of Uma (Parvathi). He is the bestower of auspiciousness and good, the Lord of Gowri. The Lord Shiva who loves to be bathed in milk (abhisheka), Who has now taken the form of Lord Sai, the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Hari Om Hari Om Bhajorey Sada Om Hari Om Hari Om
Sai Narayana Hari Om (2)
Sathyanarayana Hari Om (2)
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Om (2)
Sai (Sathya) Narayana Hari Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant continuously the divine name, Om HariThat is our Sai Narayana, abode of all beings.He is the liberator, Sathya Narayana, the one True Lord.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Jaganmatey Matey Jaya Om (2)
Sai Mata Jaya Om
Devotional Song Meaning: We bow down to the Universal mother Sai, who is the mother of the whole universe. We offer our salutations in humility to the divine mother, Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Jagat Janani Sai Mata
Omkaara Roopini Sai Mata |Om Jaga...|
Abhaya Pradayini Sai Mata
Sai Mata Sathya Sai Mata |Abhaya Pradayini|
Anatha Rakshaki Sai Mata (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother of the Universe, Sai. Your form is the Pranava, Mother Sai. You are the destroyer of fear and the protector of the forlorn. Mother of the Universe Sai, we offer our prayers toyou who grants universal protection to the underprivileged, destitute and deprived.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Jai Jai Guru Sai Mukunda
Sai Mukunda Sai Mukunda |Om Jai...|
Satchidananda Ananda Chanda
Devaki Nanda Paramananda
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory and victory to Divine Guide, Lord Sai Mukunda, the bestower of liberation (mukti) who is embodiment of truth, awareness and bliss. Prince Mukunda is the darling son of (mother) Devaki and (father) Nanda. He is the eternally blissful Sai Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Muruga Jaya Muruga
Va Muruga Vadivel Azhaga
Shakthi Vadivela Sai Muruga
Sharavana Bhava Guha Sai Muruga
Devotional Song Meaning: We offer our prayers to Karthikeya, son of Shiva and Parvathi who is also knows as Subrahmanya and Muruga. He is powerful as he is the Commander in chief of the army of Deities. He who holds the powerful spear of liberation (vadivela), is offered prayers to grant peace and protect us from mortal worries. We surrender to the worshipful Sai Muruga, who dwells in the cave (guha) of our heart.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Muruga Jaya Om Muruga
Hara Hara Shanmukha Shiva Shakthi Bala |Om Muruga...|
Om Sharavana Bhava Vela Muruga
Vela Muruga Vela Muruga |Om Sharavana|
Bhaktha Mandara Sathya Sai Muruga
Devotional Song Meaning: Hail Muruga, the Six-faced Lord, son of Shiva and Shakthi. We surrender to him as he destroys ill effects of our earthly activities and grants us welfare by his powerful weapon, Vel (spear). He has come as the bestower of Happiness, Sathya Sai, for his devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om
Shaileshwaraya Namah Om
Gowri Varaya Namah Om
Neelakantaya Namah Om
Mruthyunjaya Namah Om
Lingeshwaraya Namah Om
Sayeeshwaraya Namah Om (Sathya)
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Meditate on Shankara, the supreme deity. He is the Lord of Srisailam and Kailasa, whose consort is Mother Gowri. He saved the universe by swallowing the 'haalaahala' poison (which restedin his throat turning it blue), Who grants us the power to overcome the fear of death. He manifests in the Linga form. Oh Sai Shankara! Protect us and bless us.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Om Namah Shivaya Namo Narayana (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the sacred mantra, Om Nama Shivaya; Chant the sacred name Narayana and bow in reverence and humility.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om Namah Om
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Vara
Kailasa Nathaya Namah Om
Gangotri Vasa Sri Sai Natha |Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the mantra 'Om Namah Shivaya', (I bow to Lord Shiva) who is the embodiment of Auspiciousness, Health and Prosperity. He, the beloved of Gowri, with the Ganga in his tresses. We bow down to Him, who is the Lord of Kailasa, who residesin Gangotri (origin of Ganga in Himalayas); He is verily our Lord Sainath

Devotional Song Lyrics: Om Namah Shivaya Om Namo Narayanaya (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the mantras 'Om Namah Shivaya' and 'Om Namo Narayanaya'

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Namah Shivaya Shiva Shambho
Gangadharaya Hara Shambho
Shambho Shiva Shiva (Hara Hara) Shambho
Shambho Hara Hara Shambho
Chidanandamaya Shambho (Satchidananda)
Nirakara Roopa Shiva Shambho
Hey Nirvana Daata Sai Shambho
Hey Shirdi Sai Shambho
Hey Parthi Baba Shambho |Chidanandamaya|
Devotional Song Meaning: We offer our prayerful salutations to Lord Shiva. He is the embodiment of Supreme bliss, though supporting the turbulent Ganges in his matted hair. He is the ever-blissful, formless form, who bestows Nirvana (enlightenment), who is our Lord Sai Shambho.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (2)
Shivaya Namah Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the mantra 'Om Namah Shivaya' - I bow down to Lord Shiva, the bestower of Liberation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah OmOm Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om
Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Om
Hara Hara Mahadeva Hara Hara Mahadeva |Om Namah...|
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Baajey
Dhimithaka Dhimithaka Mrudanga Baajey |Hara Hara|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the mantra OM Namah Shivaya.I bow down to Lord Shiva, who confers auspiciousness is also Hara, who destroys the evil. He is the Great God - Mahadeva, the destroyer of evil, who plays the hand-held drum, Damaru, while the percussion instrument, mrudanga, keeps the beat, as He dances the cosmic dance.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Namo Bhagawathey Vasudevaya
Hari Om Namo Bhagawathey Vasudevaya |Om Namo...|
Om Namah Shivaya Om Namo Narayanaya (2) |Hari Om Namo|
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow down to Thee, Oh Lord Krishna! Son of Vasudeva. I bow down to Lord Shiva, to Lord Narayana. Adoration to the Lord Vishnu and Lord Shiva, who abide and shine in all beings and is one with Om (Vishnu). Om- Sound symbol of the creator and creation. I bow down to Vasudeva who is the Lord of the Bhagawatha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Namo Namah Om Namah Om (2)
Achyuthaya Namah Om Sri Ananthaya Namah Om
Sundaraya Namah Om Sura Vandithaya Namah Om
Madhavaya Namah Om Madhusudhanaya Namah Om
Kaaranaya Namah Om Narayanaya Namah Om
Ramaya Namah Om Krishnaya Namah Om (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Bow to him in reverence and humility, revere him as he is the source of beauty, The undecaying, Infinite, beautiful one who is adored by the pious. The Lord of Lakshmi, who killed the demon 'Madhu'. The primal Cause, who indwells in all beings, Bow to him in reverence and humility. Prayerful salutations to OM, the Pranava. We offer salutations to Rama and Krishna, the avatars of Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Namo Narayana Namo Namo Narayana
Namo Namo Narayana Namo Lakshmi Narayana
Namo Lakshmi Narayana Namo Sathya Narayana
Namo Sathya Narayana Namo Sai Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: That supreme is offered prayers as Lakshmi Narayana (Lord of Lakshmi) as well as Sathya Narayana (The Absolute Reality).

Devotional Song Lyrics: Om Namo Narayanaya Om Namo Namo (8)
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow to the Lord who is the indweller of all beings.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om
Gayathri Savitri Saraswathi Om
Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om
Gayathri Savitri Saraswathi Om
Devotional Song Meaning: The Mother Goddess is personification of Shakti (power) which pervades the Creation. She is revered as power of the Sun (Savitri), the bestower of wisdom (Saraswathi) and Mother Gayathri, who is the personification of Durga, Lakshmi and Saraswathi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Shiva Shakthi Swaroopa
Om Shiva Shankara Roopa
Om Sathya Sai Swaroopa
Devotional Song Meaning: We offer our humble salutations to Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of Shiva and Shakti (Father and mother forms of universal parenthood). Offer prayers with Omkaara to Shankara and Shakti for self-realisation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Shiva Shambho Jaya Shiva Shambho
Bhava Bhaya Hari Hey Tripurari |Om Shiva...|
Hey Girija Pathi Gangadhari
Hara Hara Shambho Hey Shiva Shambho
Samba Sadashiva Sai Maheshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Shiva, Shambho, Tripurari (destroyer of three cities), Girija Pathey (The Lord of Girija), Ganga Dhari (bearer of the holy Ganges), Samba Sada Shiva and Sai Maheshwara (the Highest Godhood).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Shivaya Om Shivaya
Shambho Shankara Om Shivaya (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Bow down to Thee, who gives happiness and prosperity, bestower of good. We offer humble prayers to Shankara who grants auspiciousness and Shiva who grants sustenance to be submerged in universal consciousness

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Shivaya Om Shivaya Om Shivaya
Shambho Shankara Samba Sadashiva Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Hey
Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Hey |Om Shivaya...|
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Baajey
Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghanta Bajey
Jhanaka Jhanaka Jhan Payal Baajey Kailasa Vasa Uma Pathey
Trishoola Uma Pathey Trinetra Gowri Pathey (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the mantra " Om Shivaya". Chant the name of the Lord of Uma, Resident of Kailasa (pure hearts), Holder of the Trishoola (Trident), the Three-Eyed One, Lord Shiva. Lord Shiva, who enjoys the cosmic dance along with the rhythm of the Damaru (small drum) and the sound of bells.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Sri Bhagawan Namo Namo
Deena Dayala Parama Krupala |Om Sri...|
Namo Narayana Prashanthi Vasa
Mahaanubhava Devadi Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: We offer prayerful regards to Bhagawan, who is compassionate to the downtrodden and protects us with highest degree of grace. He is greatest of great celestial beings, verily the Lord Narayana, who has come as the Lord of Parthi, to whom we offer our prayers.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Om Sri Ram Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram (4)
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sita Ram
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the Lord of Sita and Shyam, the beloved of Radha. Chant the name of the Lord Sri Rama, Sita Ram and Radhey Shyam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Omkaara Naadamayi Sai Deva Sathya Sai Deva
Saakara Shiva Sai Devadi Deva |Omkaara Naadamayi...|
Tava Naama Smaranam Bhava Paapa Haranam
Tava Paada Sparshanam Sarva Paapa Nashanam
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Sathya Sai is the embodiment of the Omkaara. Pranava, the primal sound, represents the Almighty. That very sound realised in Truth has taken the form of our dear Lord Sathya Sai. Continuous chanting of His name destroys ill effects of all sins committed by us. The touch of his Lotus Feet redeems us to lead a spiritual and purposeful life and become an example.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Omkaara Priya Sai Ram Sai Rama
Raghukula Bhooshana Ramethi Rama |Omkaara...|
Sri Raghu Nandana Sita Rama
Ahalyodharaka Karunya Rama
Atmabhi Rama Ananda Rama
Jaya Jaya Rama Jai Sai Rama (5)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sai Ram, the embodiment of Omkaara is, the same Rama who was the jewel of the lineage of Raghu. He is the compassionate Lord of Sita, who liberated the devotee Ahalya, The indweller who is always in Divine Bliss. Victory to that Ram, who is our Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Omkaara Priya Sai Rama
Munijana Sevitha Sai Rama
Shanthakara Sai Rama
Sakshathkara Sai Rama
Bhava Raga Priya Sai Rama
Bhaagavatha Priya Sai Rama
Naada Swaroopa Sai Rama
Natya Kalapa Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: We pray to Sairama, who loves the Omkaar (Primordial sound). He, who is always worshipped by pious souls. He, who is the embodiment of peace, who could grant self realisation to us. He, who loves devotees who are immersed in the divine consciousness. He, who is the embodiment of divine music and dance.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Omkaara Roopa Sri Sai Natha
Sagduru Sri Sathya Sai Harey
Allah Yesu Eshwar Tum Ho
Gautama Buddha Mahaveer Ho
Zohrashtra Guru Grantha Nanak Tum Ho
Ram Rahim Sai Krishna Karim
Devotional Song Meaning: Pray to Sri Sathya Sai who is embodiment of Omkaara; Who is the True Guru, the One who removes darkness and gives enlightenment; He is verily Allah, Yesu, Eshwar, Buddha, Mahaveer, Zohrashtra, Guru Nanak, Ram, Rahim and Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Omkaara Roopini Janani Ma
Mangala Kaarini Janani Ma |Omkaara Roopini...|
Gaana Vinodini Janani Ma
Ananda Dayini Janani Ma
Janani Ma Partheeshwari Ma (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother Sai residing in Parthi, you are the personification of the Primordial Sound "OM". You bestow auspiciousness and happiness to one and all and you are enchanted by music Oh Mother.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Paahi Gajanana Deenavana (Vinayaka)
Sindhura Vadana Shritha Jana Palana |Paahi Gajanana...|
Ambika Tanaya Amaradeeshwara
Aganita Guna Gana Ananda Dayaka
Devotional Song Meaning: We pray to Ganesha to protect us - the unprotected. Your face shines while you are bestowing welfare on those who surrender and the downtrodden. You, the beloved child of Ambika, are praised by the celestial beings as there is no one parallel to you in granting bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Paahi Mahesha Hey Jagadeesha
Dehi Dehi Hey Paramesha
Poorana Brahma Sanathana Swami
Jaya Hey Jaya Hey Antaryami
Devotional Song Meaning: Hail the Great God, master of the universe. We pray to that Supreme Lord in human form to protect us. He is holistic and omnipresent, our Lord Sai. Victory to that force who resides always in us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Paahi Paahi Gajanana
Parvathi Putra Gajanana
Mooshika Vahana Gajanana
Modaka Hasta Gajanana
Chamara Karna Gajanana
Vilambita Sutra Gajanana
Vamana Roopa Gajanana
Maheshwara Putra Gajanana
Vighna Vinashaka Gajanana
Tava Paada Namasthey Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh! Son of Parvathi, we seek refuge in You. Please protect us. You ride on the mouse, holding sweet (modaka) in your hand. You, of the large fan-like ears, wearing a chain around your waist, You, of the short statured form. You, who mitigates our obstacles. Oh Ganesha, we prostrate at Your feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Paahi Paahi Kailasa Nivasi
Jata Jootadhara Parthi Nivasi |Paahi Paahi...|
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Manohara
Haalaahala Dhara Natana Manohara
Chinmaya (Vismaya) Roopa Sai Mahesha
Devotional Song Meaning: We pray to the Lord of Kailasa, the magnificent haired Lord who has taken birth in Parthi. He who holds the holy Ganga in His hair, who is the beloved of Gowri. He, who drank the poison, Haalaahala to protect the worlds, Who enchants our minds with His Cosmic Dance and Illusive Form.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Paahi Paahi Parameshwara
Jaya Gowri Vara Sundara |Paahi Paahi...|
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damarooka Natha
Dhimithaka Dhimithaka Natana Manohara
Tandava Priya Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Shiva, the Supreme one, we pray to You to protect us. You are the enchanting partner of the divine mother, Gowri. You love the celestial dance - Shiva Tandava - and confer bliss, with the enchanting subtle movements enhanced by the beats of your hand-held drum, Damaru.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Paalaya Pashupala Bala
Shishupaladi Kala Gunasheela |Paalaya Pashupala...|
Neeraja Samaneela Nirupama Guna Sheela
Varija Bhava Lola Bala Gopala Bala
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord Gopala--The Protector of all animals, The slayer of Shishupala and others, Having colour of the Blue Lotus, having good qualities beyond comparison--please protect us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Paaliya Hum Ne Sadguru Charanam
Sadguru Charanam Bhava Bhaya Haranam |Paaliya Hum...|
Sri Sai Charanam Sab Dukha Haranam |Sadguru Charanam|
Devotional Song Meaning: We have attained the Lotus Feet of our Sadguru Sainatha, The feet which remove the darkness of ignorance, the fear of this worldly existence. We take refuge at Your feet which wipe away our miseries and gives enlightenment.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Paar Karo Uddhar Karo Prabhu Parthi Puri Bhagawan
Harey Ram Ram Ram Ghana Shyam Shyam Shyam Hey Sai Natha Bhagawan
Deena Dayakara Karuna Murthy Kali Yuga Avatar Sai Bhagawan
Allah Sai Buddha Zohrashtra Yesu Christhu Bhagawan
Yesu Christhu Bhagawan (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord of Parthi! Save me and help me to get released from the cycle of birth and death. Oh Merciful Lord Sai Ram! You are the Incarnation of the Kali Age, Lord Sai. Chant the name of the Lord Ram, Ghana Shyam (Deep blue hued Lord Krishna), Allah, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Jesus Christ.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Padmanabha Hrishikesha Padma Netra Paahi
Janardhana Damodara Jala Janabha Paahi |Padmanabha Hrishikesha|
Vishwa Roopa Veda Vidya Vimala Charitha Paahi
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Parama Purusha Paahi
Devotional Song Meaning: We pray to the Lord with the Lotus (creation) springing from the navel (Padmanabha). Who is the Overlord of the sensory world, the Lotus eyed one, we salute you. You are the One who removes ignorance of devotees to escape the cycle of birth and death; Damodara, the one who was tied by the waist, by his mother, Yashoda; You are the all pervasive Universal form, preceptor of the Vedic knowledge of blemishless character; We pray to that primordial Lord born as Parthi Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Padmanabha Narayana
Parthi Vasa Narayana (2)
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the Lord of all beings, Narayana, from whose navel springs the Lotus of CreationThe Lord Narayana, who also resides in Badrinath (and Parthi).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Palani Muruga Vel Muruga
Sharanam Sharanam Vel Muruga |Palani Muruga...|
Ganapathi Sodara Vel Muruga
Karthikeya (Sai Deva) Vel Muruga
Hara Haro Hara Muruga Hara Haro Hara
Haro Hara Haro Hara Hara Haro Hara
Devotional Song Meaning: We surrender to you Lord Muruga, the Lord of Palani Hills, holding the 'Vel ' (spear), Brother of Lord Ganesha, born to Krithika mothers. We worship you Lord Muruga by chanting 'Hara Haro Hara'.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Pancha Bhoothamayi Parthi Nivasini
Panchaksharamayi Pavani Janani |Pancha Bhootha...|
Sanchitha Karma Vinashini Janani
Satchidanandamayi Sai Janani
Omkaara Roopini Tejonmaya Mayi
Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Shiva Shakthi Roopini
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Bow to Mother Sai, who pervades the five elements, Who is the source of the five syllabled mantra (Om Namah Shivaya). The one who destroys the stored karma of an individual, Who is Truth, Consciousness and Bliss Oh Mother Sai. She is the embodiment of the primordial sound Aum, the effulgence that pervades and sustains the illusory power. The incarnation of Shiva and Shakti, our dear Sai Ma.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Pandari Nivasa Hey Panduranga
Hey Parthi Vasa Sri Sai Deva |Pandari Nivasa...|
Deena Rakshaka Anatha Rakshaka (Sai)
Bhaktha Vatsala Hey Sayeeshwara (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of the Lord of Pandharpur, Panduranga. He is the resident of Parthi, Lord Sai, protector of the weak and orphan, under privileged. The Lord who assures care of the devotee, Sayeeshwara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Pandari Nivasa Ranga Vittala Harey
Panduranga Deena Natha Vittala Harey |Pandari Nivasa...|
Hrudayanta Ranga Sai Vittala Harey
Govinda Gopal Sai Vittala Harey
Puttaparthi Ranga Sai Vittala Harey
Vittala Harey Sai Vittala Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Hey Panduranga (Krishna), living at Pandharpur, You are the One who protects the weak. Hey Sai Vittala, Director of the play of life, You are the one who occupies the devotee's heart. Hey Sai of Parthi, You are the one who protects us. You areSai Vittala and Sai Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Panduranga Panduranga Panduranga Vittala
Pandari Natha Pandari Natha Pandari Natha Vittala |Panduranga...|
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Vittala
Bhaja Narayana Bhaja Narayana Bhaja Narayana Vittala
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Vittala |Hari Narayana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Panduranga Vittala of Pandharpur. The Lord of Pandharpur, who is none other than Lord Narayana. Sing His glory, for your liberation

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Panduranga Panduranga Vittala Paahey
Deena Natha Karuna Natha
Sai Natha Harey
Pandari Natha Panduranga
Vittala Paahey
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Panduranga! Oh Vittala! You are the Protector of the meek and helpless. You are the merciful lord. Oh! Sai Natha, you are the Lord of Pandharpur.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Panduranga Vittala Jai Pandari Natha Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Jai Pundarikaaksha Vittala |Panduranga|
Vittala Jai Vittala Purandara Vittala (2)
Vittala Jai Vittala Jai Rakumayi Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Lord of Pandari, who waited patiently for his devotee Pundalika. Victory to that Pundarikaksha. Recite the name of Lord Panduranga and Vittala. Victory to Vittala (Vishnu), the Lord of Rakumayi (Rukmini).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Panduranga Vittala Jaya Panduranga Vittala
Kasturi Ranga Vittala Kamaneeya Ranga Vittala |Panduranga...|
Govinda Ranga Vittala Gopala Ranga Vittala
Kalyana Ranga Vittala Karunanta Ranga Vittala
Partheesha Ranga Vittala Jaya Sai Ranga Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Lord Panduranga Vittala. The shining Vittala who attracts like the musk scent. He is the protector of all beings, full of mercy, He is the Lord of Parthi, Sai, the director of the play of life.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Panduranga Vittala Murari Murari (3)
Vittala Murari Ranga Vittala Murari (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Panduranga Vittala, who is Krishna, the slayer of demon Mura

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Panduranga Vittaley Hari Narayana
Panduranga Vittaley Sathya Narayana
Ranga Ranga Mohana Ranga
Jaya Hari Vittala Jaya Sai Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Panduranga, the dweller of Pandharpur, thou art Lord Hari. Oh Lord of Pandharpur! Oh Sathya Narayana. The enchanting director of the drama of life. Victory to you, Oh Sai Vittala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Panduranga Vittaley Hari Narayana
Panduranga Vittaley Sathya Narayana
Ranga Ranga Mohana Ranga
Jaya Hari Vittala Jaya Sai Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Panduranga, the dweller of Pandharpur, thou art Lord Hari. Oh Lord of Pandharpur! Oh Sathya Narayana. The enchanting director of the drama of life. Victory to you, Oh Sai Vittala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Panduranga Vittaley Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Govinda (3)
Bhajo (Sai) Narayana Govinda (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Panduranga Vittala, incarnation of Lord Narayana. The protector and indweller of all beings.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Panduranga Vittaley Panduranga Vittaley
Pandareesha Panduranga Sri Ranga Vittaley
Antaranga Vittaley Ananda Ranga Vittaley
Pundarika Varada Hey Purandara Vittaley
Panduranga Vittaley Panduranga Vittaley
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Panduranga Vittala of Pandharpur. He is also the Lord Sriranga.He is the indweller, the bestower of Bliss. He is the liberator of Pundarika, the devotee. He is the Lord Panduranga of devotee Saint Purandara Dasa.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Pannaga Shayana Kali Avatara
Narayana Hari Om
Parama Niranjana Neeraja Nayana
Sayeeshwaraya Hari Om
Buddhi Pradayaka Paapa Vinashaka
Sathya Sanathana Tum Ho
Deena Natha Hey Prabhu Parameshwara
Karuna Sagara Tum Ho
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Narayana, resting on cobra. O Lord of Lords! You are the Incarnation of the Kali Age. We worship the Lotus-Eyed Lord of Lords! The Embodiment of Purity, Lord Sai! You are the granter of liberating wisdom, the destroyer of sins, You are the eternal Reality. The saviour of the dejected and destitute, You are the Ocean of Mercy

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Pannaga Shayana Pankaja Nayana
Bhaktha Parayana Narayana
Pandari Natha Pundarikaaksha
Veda Parayana Narayana
Shankhu Chakra Dhara Peetambara Dhara
Vaikunta Vasa Narayana
Sankata Harana Sarva Dayalana
Parthi Nivasa Narayana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Narayana, resting on cobra, the Lotus-eyed One, worshipped and adored by the devotees. You are the Lord of Pandharpur. You are the preceptor of the Vedas, Narayana. Dressed in yellow garments, holding the conch and the Disc, You are the dweller of Vaikunta, abode of Narayana. Ocean of mercy, deliverer from pitfalls of materialistic life. You are none other than the Lord of Parthi, Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parama Dayalu Sai Ram (Hey)
Bhagawan Bhagawan |(Hey) Parama Dayalu...|
Treta Yug Mey Dasharatha Nandana
Dwapara Yug Mey Murali Mohana
Kali Yuga Mey Sai Narayana
Ek Prabhu Anek Naam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Ram! Thou art extremely merciful. Thou incarnated as Prince of King Dasharatha in the age of Treta (Rama); In the age of Dwapara, as charming and enchanting Flute Player (Krishna); And in present age of Kali, as Lord Sai Narayana. One Lord incarnated, assuming many names and forms.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Paramananda Govinda Gopal Jai
Sai Nanda Mukunda Gopal Jai
Sai Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey
Sai Keshava Madhava Mohana Harey |Paramananda Govinda...|
Mukharavinda Gopal Jai
Satchidananda Govinda Gopal Jai |Sai Nanda|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to supremely blissful, Lord Govinda - Gopala, Mukunda, Keshava, Madhava, Krishna and Rama. Glory to Lotus-Faced Gopala (protector of all beings), Who is the very embodiment of Truth, Awareness and Bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parameshwara Partheeshwara
Pavana Naama Sayeeshwara
Jagadeeshwara Hrudayeshwara
Jagadodhara Jatadhara |Pavana Naama|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glorious name of Lord Sai, the incarnation of Parameshwara (Shiva). Sing the beautiful name of He who is the Lord of the Universe and the One who resides in our hearts. Sustainer of Creation, the long-tressed Lord with the glorious name.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Partheeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara
Daya Karo Hari Narayana
Sri Sai Narayana (Sai)
Bhava Sagarodhara Bhuvanavana
Sharanagatha Thrana Narayana |Daya Karo|
Sri Sai Narayana (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: OhLord Sathya Sai, Lord of Puttaparthi, Oh Lord Sai Narayana, have compassion. You are the One who can help us cross the ocean of samsara. Hey Sai Narayana, we surrender to Thee. Please have compassion, Sai Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Partheeshwara Sri Sai Prabho
Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Prabho |Partheeshwara Sri|
Eshwar Allah Sri Sai Rama Naam
Buddha Zohrashtra Sai Krishna Naam
Madhava Mohana Sai Narayana
Prema Avatara Prabhu Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of the Lord of Parthi, Sri SaiThe darling son of Mother EshwarambaHe is the unifier of all religious denominations. He is the personification of Eshwar, Allah, Krishna, Zohrashtra, Buddha and Madhava.He is the incarnation of Divine Love

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Partheeshwari Jagat Janani
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Sai Janani |Partheeshwari Jagat...|
Veda Kalamayi Devi Bhavani
Naada Vidyamayi Narayani
Karuna Sadani Karunamayi Ma
Sharanam Sharanam Sai Ma |Jaya Jaya|
Devotional Song Meaning: Divine Mother of Parthi, Sai Ma, the One who sustains the Universe, victory to you! You are the knowledge of the Vedas, You are the Goddess of Music and the Arts, You are full of Grace, verily the embodiment of Grace. We surrender at Your feet, Mother Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parthi Mera Pandarpur Partheeshwara Sai Ranga
Shiva Hari Roopa Panduranga
Pundarika Varada Panduranga
Bhaktha Janashraya Sai Ranga
Panduranga Pandari Natha Sai Natha Vittala (Hey) (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Parthi is my Pandharpur and Lord Sai is the Panduranga from whom the devotees seek solace. He is the embodiment of Lord Shiva and the one who blessed His devotee Pundarika.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parthi Nandana Radhey Shyama
Aao Aao Sai Ghana Shyama |Parthi Nandana...|
Brindavan Ghana Shyama Govinda
Madhura Manohara Mukharavinda
Hey Giridhari Sai Murari |Aao Aao|
Devotional Song Meaning: Come Oh, Beautiful and Charming - dark hued Lord Sai of Parthi. You are the same Lord Krishna of Brindavan. The sweet, enchanting, Lotus faced Lord, who lifted the mountain and conquered the demonic force Mura. Chant the many names of the Lord Govinda, Ghana Shyama and Sai Murari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parthi Pureesha Panduranga
Pandari Natha Hari Hari
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lord of Parthi, who is none other than Panduranga, the Lord of Pandharpur.He is the Lord Vishnu, whose incarnation is the divine child of Nanda, the stealer of the hearts. He is Lord Narayana, Sai Narayana

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Natha
Parama Dayal Bhagawan
Sita Ram Jaya Ram
Deenodharana Bhava Bhaya Harana
Janaki Jeevana Ram
Alakh Niranjan Asurani Khandana
Sundara Nayanabhi Ram |Sita Ram|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord of Parthi! You are extremely merciful. Victory to Lord Rama, the Lord of Sita. You are the saviour of the meek, the destroyer of the fear, bondage of the birth and death. You are the very life of Janaki, i.e.; Mother Sita. Victory to the Lord who is unknowable and unstainable (Alakh Niranjan), who destroyed the demonic hordes. Lord Rama, the one with the beautiful eyes.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwaram Parama Dayalam
Sadguru Devam Pranamamyaham
Shanthi Nivasam Jaya Sai Natham
Namami Nityam Sathya Sai Natham
Shirdi (Parthi) Pureeshwaram Pranamamyaham
Devotional Song Meaning: We bow to the Guru of Gurus, Lord of Parthi, the supremely compassionate. Resident of Prashanthi Nilayam, victory to our Sai. We incessantly chant the name of Sathya Sai. He is the Lord of Parthi and Shirdi, we bow to Him.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwari Ma Jaya Sai Maheshwari Ma
Dukha Nivarani Bhava Bhaya Harini
Abhaya Pradayini Ma (Sai)
Jaya Ma Sai Ma (3)
Omkaara Roopini Ma (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the mother of Parthi, who is the incarnation of Mother Eshwari. She removes the afflictions of worldly sorrow and fear; And grants us fearlessness. Victory to that Mother Sai, who is the embodiment of Omkaara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parthi Puri Mata Sri Sathya Sai Mata
Daya Karo Mata Mujhey Krupa Karo Mata
Merey Janam Janam Saathi Merey Jeevan Ke Aadhaar
Terey Charano Ke Pyaasi Mujhey Darshan Do Mata
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh! Mother Sai, Lord of Puttaparthi, Oh Lord Sathya Narayana, have compassion on me. You are the anchor throughout this ocean of life, the companion who can help us to cross the ocean of samsara. I thirst for the vision of your lotus feet, please grant me your Darshan. I surrender to Thee. Please have compassion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parthi Puri Mey Janam Liya Jo Sai Baba Naam Hai
Mayura Mukutadhara Murali Manohara Sai Shyam Naam Hai
Hey Shiva Shankara Uma Maheshwara Sai Shambho Naam Hai
Hey Parameshwara Parthi Pureeshwara Tu Hi Mera Pran Hai
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna! You are the one who has been adorned with the crown of peacock feathers. You are the enchanter with the flute! You have incarnated in Parthi as Lord Sai Baba. Oh Lord Shambho! Oh Lord Shankara! Oh Lord of Uma. Lord Maheshwara! You have incarnated in Parthi as Sai Shambho. Oh Supreme Lord of Parthi! You are my very life.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parthi Puri Nayaki Paripalinchu Kamakshi
Nitya Buddhi Dayaki Neerajakshi Sundari
Bhaktha Loka Palaki Kamitaartha Dayaki
Devotional Song Meaning: The mother-ruler of Parthi, rule over our desires, the bestower of boons. Grant us the eternal wisdom, Oh beautiful Lotus-eyed one. The queen of the devotee's worldly lives, who bestows desired affluence on her devotees

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parthi Puri Sai Gopala Bala
Shirdi Puri Sai Gopala Bala |Parthi Puri Sai...|
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Gopala
Saama (Bhajana) Gaana Priya Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing of the protector of all beings, Sai of Parthi, He is also the Sai of Shirdi. The incarnation of Meera's Lord Giridhara Gopala (Krishna). The one who loves bhajans and songs (Saama Veda)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parthi Puri Vasa Sai Rama
Prashanthi Nilaya Sai Rama
Padmadala Netra Sai Rama
Pavana Naama Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Sai Rama who resides in Parthi. Sing of Sai Rama of Prashanthi Nilayam. The Sai Rama - with eyes like Lotus petals. Chant the blessed name - Sai Rama

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Gajanana
Pashupathi Ranjana Niranjana |Parvathi Nandana...|
Paahi Prabho Maam Paahi Prasanna
Girija Nandana Shubhanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Beloved Son of Mother Parvathi! Oh Lord Gajanana! Oh Lord of all beings! Kindly shower Your grace and protect us. Protect us Oh pleasant faced Lord. Oh Beloved Son of Mother Girija! You are forever conferring auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parvathi Shankari Girija Shankari
Sai Shankari Namostuthey (Sathya) (2)
Hey Jagadeeshwari Parthi Pureeshwari
Sai Shankari Namostuthey (Sathya) (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Pranaams to mother Parvathi, daughter of King of mountains (i.e. Himavan), the consort of Shankara (Lord Shiva). I bow down to thee Oh Sai Shankari, the Mother of the World, residing in Puttaparthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parvathi Tanaya Bala Gajanana
Surya Koti Sama Prabha
Jaya Shubha Dayaka Vishwa Vidhata
Parameshwara Sutha (Parthi Pureeshwara) Paalaya Maam
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of darling son of Parvathi - Lord Gajanana, whose face shines with the effulgence of koti (ten million) suns. Victory to the bestower of auspiciousness, who grants boons to all the world's denizens. The darling son of the Supreme Lord, protect me and grant me spiritual knowledge.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Parvathi Tanaya Gajanana
Siddhi Vinayaka Gajavadana |Parvathi Tanaya...|
Mooshika Vahana Gajavadana
Suramuni Sevitha Tava Charana
Devotional Song Meaning: We bow to the Elephant-faced son of Mother Parvathi. The fulfiller of devotees prayers, the remover of their obstacles. The Lord who rides on the mouse, who is served and adored by the pious and the righteous. We bow at your Lotus feet

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Pashupathi Natha Nageshwara
Hara Hara Bham Bham Shiva Shankara
Parvathi Pathey Maheshwara
Lingodhbhavakara Lingeshwara
Partheeshwara Sai Parameshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Lord of all beings, the one who drapes the cobra around his neck. Glory to him, Lord Shiva Shankara, bestower of auspiciousness, who is the Supreme Lord of Parvathi. He is the one who brings out the Linga, the Lord of the Shiva Linga. He is the Lord of Parthi, the Supreme Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Pashupathi Tanaya Bala Gajanana
Tum Ho Vighna Vinasha Ganesha
Hey Shiva Nandana Bala Gajanana
Vidya Buddhi Pradatha
Mangala Kara Hey Mangala Kara Hey
Sundara Sai Ganesha Ganesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the darling son of Lord Shiva (Pashupathi); Lord Gajanana, who is Ganesha, the destroyer of obstacles. Oh Son of Lord Shiva, Lord Gajanana! The bestower of wisdom (spiritual) and intellectual. Chant the name of the charming Lord Sai Ganesha, the bestower of auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Patitha Pavana Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
Pavana Naam Taraka Naam Paapa Vimochana Ram
Danava Bhanjana Ram Dasharatha Nandana Ram |Pavana Naam|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the pure and sacred name of Lord Sai Ram of Parthi, The sacred name that is the Saviour of the fallen, remover of all sins. Oh Lord Rama! Oh Prince of King Dasharatha! You are the destroyer of demonic qualities.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Pavana Sutha Hanuman Ki Jai
Sita Pathi (Siyavar) Ramachandra Ki Jai |Pavana Sutha...|
Parakrami Anjaneya Ki Jai (2)
Parthi Puri Sai Nath Ki Jai (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Hanuman, the son of the wind God, Victory to the chosen Lord of Sita, Lord Ram, Victory to the mighty son of Anjana Devi Victory to the Lord of Parthi, Sai Nath

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Pavana Sutha Hanumantha
Pavana Charitha Bhagawantha
Rama Rama Ram Sada Japantha
Rama Rama Rama Rama Sada Japantha
Ati Balavanta Hey Gunavanta
Devotional Song Meaning: We pray to Hanumantha, the son of Pavana (God of Wind). The Divine one who has a Sacred History. He is onewith Extraordinary strength, virtuous and given to chanting the name of Rama incessantly.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Poorna Brahma Avatara Sai
Sakala Jagat Aadhara Sai |Poorna Brahma|
Allah Yesu Rama Sai
Buddha Mahaveer Nanak Sai
Hum Bhakthon Ke Baba Sai
Sarva Dharma Avatara Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Sai, incarnation of the Supreme Lord. He is the sustainer of all the worlds. Sai is one with Allah, Jesus, Rama, Buddha, Mahaveer and Nanak. He is the beloved of us devotees. The One who preaches oneness of all religions.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Poornavatara Sai Guru Deva
Sathya Sayeesha Paramananda
Prema Sai Bhagawan
Sathya Sai Bhagawan
Parama Purusha Prabhu Sri Sai Natha
Purushottama Hey Parthi Pureesha
Prema Sai Bhagawan |Sathya Sai|
Devotional Song Meaning: Pray to the Divine Guru, the complete Avatar, Sai. He bestows divine bliss on His devotees. The embodiment of Divine Love. Sathya Sai is none other than the Supreme Lord, who took form as the perfect human. He will come again as Lord Prema Sai

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prabhu Ramachandra Ke Dootha Hanumantha Anjaneya
Hanumantha Hanumantha Hanumantha Anjaneya
Hey Pavan Putra Hanumantha Balabheema Anjaneya
Balabheema Balabheema Balabheema Anjenaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Hanumantha Oh! Anjaneya, Son of Anjana Devi and Pavana (Wind God); The messenger of Lord Ramachandra and one of Mighty Strength.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prabhu Tum Antaryami Sai
Daya Karo Daya Karo Hey Swami |Prabhu Tum...|
Deena Dayala Hey Sayeeshwara
Parama Krupala Jaya Partheeshwara |Daya Karo|
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Sai, the inner motivator of all, please show mercy on us. You are Protector of the meek. Victory to the very compassionate Lord of Parthi, shower Your Grace on us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Pranam Sweekar Karo Sai Mahadeva
Sai Mahadeva Sai Mahadeva |Pranam Sweekar...|
Allah Eshwar Yesu Sai
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahaveera Sai
Natana Sutra Dhari Jagannatha Sai |Sai Mahadeva|
Devotional Song Meaning: Accept our salutations Oh Sai, Lord of Gods, You are verily the Supreme One, be it Allah, Eshwar, Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahaveera, The supreme Director and Lord of the world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Pranamami Sri Durge Sai Narayani
Jaya Jagadambey Ambey Bhavani |Pranamami Sri...|
Mahishasura Samhaarini
Mahamaya Dukha Haarini
Devotional Song Meaning: I pay obeisance to Mother Durga, Sai Narayani (Sister of Vishnu), Jagad Ambey (the Mother of the Universe) and Devi Bhavani, the destroyer of the cycle of birth and death. The destroyer of the demon Mahishasura (ego) and the remover of miseries and the vast illusion or Maya (ignorance).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Pranava Swaroopa Hari Om Sai
Narayana Hari Om
Sayeeshwaraya Hari Om (Sathya)
Yadavaya Madhavaya Govindaya Namah Om
Paramatma Roopaya Hari Om
Hari Om Hari Om |Sayeeshwaraya|
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai , you are the very embodiment of the Primordial sound 'Om.' You are Narayana, the indweller of all beings. You are Krishna of the Yadava clan, one with Vishnu, the Lord of Lakshmi, you are the protector of all beings, Govinda. The embodiment of the Supreme soul, we pay our obeisance to You.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Pranava Swaroopa Paahi Gajanana Vighna Nasha Vinayaka
Eka Dantha Hey Gunavanta Vighna Nasha Vinayaka
Shritha Jana Palana Sindhura Vadana Vighna Nasha Vinayaka
Mahadeva Shiva Gowri Nandana Vighna Nasha Vinayaka
Devotional Song Meaning: Save us, Oh Elephant faced Lord, who is the embodiment of the Primordial sound, destroyer of impediments in the path of seekers, one without any leader. Single tusked, Storehouse of sacred qualities, Protector of those who seek his refuge. Having vermillion on His forehead, Son of Lord Mahadeva and Mother Gowri

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Pranavakara Parabrahma
Parishuddhatma Yesu Prabhu
Sarva Shakthimaya Bismillah
Sarvaadhara Ahur Mazda
Sarvamaya Sathya Sayeesha
Buddham Sharanam Gachchami
Devotional Song Meaning: I surrender myself to the Cosmic Lord, the source of primordial sound, Jesus, the pure and sacred soul, Bismillah, the all powerful one, Ahur Mazda, the basis for everything in this world, the omnipresent Lord Sathya Sai and Lord Buddha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prashanthi Nilaya Ram Hey Parthi Puri Bhagawan
Ahalyodharaka Ram Hey Dasharathey Raghu Ram
Sri Ram Jaya Ram
Sri Ram Ram Ram Jaya Ram 
Sai Ram Ram Ram Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Rama of Puttaparthi! Oh Lord of Prashanthi Nilayam! Oh Beloved Prince of King Dasharatha! Oh Saviour of Ahalya! Glory to Thee. Victory to Thee. Oh Lord Sai Rama of Prashanthi, salutations to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prashanthi Nilaya Rama Rama Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Rama Rama Ram
Krishna Narayana Rama Rama Ram
Sri Ranga Panduranga Rama Rama Ram
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Rama incessantly. The one who is Narayana come down as Sri Krishna, as Panduranga. He is none other than theone residing in Prashanthi Nilayam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prashanthi Nilayam Paramanin Alayam
Daiva Swaroopanin Devalayam
Kali Yuga Devanin Karunalayam
Manavar Mohikkum Mantralayam
Paapa Vimochanin Charanalayam (Janma)
Devotional Song Meaning: Prashanthi Nilayam is the abode of Parabrahman (Supreme Lord). It is the temple of the One with the Divine Form. Of the avatar of the Kali age, who showers compassion on all. It is the enchanting divine abode for all humans, of the temple of Love, where the sins of His devotees are washed away at the Lotus Feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prathah Smaranam Sri Guru Charanam
Sayeesha Charanam Sri Guru Charanam |Prathah Smaranam...|
Brahmananda Pradayaka Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Sayeesha Charanam
Devotional Song Meaning: Meditate on the Lotus Feet of the Guru (Lord Sai) in the early hours of dawn. Meditate on the holy feet of the Sadguru Sayeesha, the dispeller of ignorance. Surrender to the Lotus Feet of Lord Sai, who confers infinite happiness and heavenly bliss. We take refuge at your Lotus Feet, Oh Sainatha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prathah Smaranam Sri Ramam
Munijana Sevitha Sri Ramam |Prathah Smaranam...|
Ananda Daayaka Sri Ramam
Moksha Pradayaka Sri Ramam
Bhajamana Sai Ramam Ramam
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama in the dawn, the Lord who was worshipped by the sages and noble souls, who bestows happiness and liberation. Chant the name of Sri Rama who is none other than Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prathama Sharana Gananayaka
