Vighna Vinashaka Siddhi Vinayaka |Prathama Sharana...|
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Mooshika Vahana Sai Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: First pay obeisance to the Lord of the Demigods, Lord Vinayaka. Who destroys obstacles and assures success in our endeavours. Who grants knowledge (spiritual) and intelligence. Lord Sai Gajanana has a mouse (wayward mind is kept under His control) ashis vehicle.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prathama Sharana Gananayaka
Prathah Smaranam Vinayaka
Parthi Pureeshwara Shubha Dayaka |Prathama Sharana|
Vidya Dayaka Hey Gananayaka
Buddhi Pradayaka Vinayaka
Mangala Kara Hey Prashanthi Dayaka
Parvathi Tanaya Vinayak
Prathah Smaranam Vinayaka |Parthi Pureeshwara Shubha|
Devotional Song Meaning: We offer first obeisance and surrender to the Lord of Ganas (demigods). He is the bestower of auspiciousness, the Lord of Parthi. He confers knowledge and intelligence, the auspicious Lord Ganesha, son of Mother Parvati.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prathama Vandana Gananatha
Gajavadana Jaya Gananatha |Prathama Vandana|
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Vighna Vinashaka Vinayaka
Suramuni Vanditha Vinayaka
Devotional Song Meaning: Our first prayers to the Lord of the Ganas, The elephant-faced Lord Ganesh. He confers knowledge and intelligence. The remover of obstacles in the spiritual path. The One who is praised and adored by the wise and saintly.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prathama Vandana Gowri Nandana
Hey Shiva Nandana Paahi Gajanana |Prathama Vandana...|
Eka Dantha Gunavanta Vinayaka
Vighna Harana Shubha Mangala Charana
Pranava Swaroopa Paahi (Sai) Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: First pay obeisance to Lord Sai Gajanana, (Lord Ganesh)The beloved Prince of Lord Shiva and Mother Gowri. Oh Lord Sai Gajanana! The single-tusked One of noble character. You are the remover of obstacles, the bestower of auspiciousness. We bow to you, the embodiment of Pranava (Omkaar).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prathama Vandanam Ganapathi Devam
Nithyam Bhajarey Vinayakam (2)
Pranavakaram Parvathi Sutham
Sri Sai Natham Gananatham |Nithyam Bhajarey|
Devotional Song Meaning: Offer your first prayer (obeisance) to Lord Ganapathi, Chant incessantly the name of Vinayaka. He is the embodiment of Omkaara (Pranava, the primordial sound). The beloved son of Mother Parvathi. He is none other our Lord Sainatha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prem Bhakthi Jagao Man Mey
Aao Merey Bhajan Mey Baba
Tum Ho Deena Janon Ke Sai
Tum Ho Bhaktha Janon Ke Baba |Aao Merey|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Baba! Welcome to my heart and please awake within me the love and devotion for Thee. You are the support of those who are meek. You are the dear Sai of the devoted.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prem Eshwar Hai Eshwar Prem Hai
Har Dhadkan Mey Sai Sama Hai Eshwar Prem Hai |Prem Eshwar...|
Ram Rahim Krishna Karim
Zohrashtra Yesu Nanak
Koi Bhi Naam Japo Rey Manuva Eshwar Prem Hai (Manuva)
Devotional Song Meaning: God is Love; Love is God.Lord Sai is merged and is the sustainer of each heart beat which repeats God is Love. Oh Mind! Worship any name of the Lord Rama or Krishna, Rahim, Zohrashtra, Jesus or Nanak, as all names and form are love and only love. God is Love Love is God.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prem Se Aao Prabhuji
Hrudaya Mandir Mey Sada Raho |Prem Se...|
Nayana Mey Aao Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana |Nayana Mey...|
Nachath Nachath Nandalala |Prem Se...|
Shravan Mey Aao Shirdeeshwara
Shirdeeshwara Puttapartheeshwara |Shravana Mey...|
Sath Raho Sathya Sayeeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord, Please come and decorate our Heart with your presence with Love. Oh Lord Narayana! Let our eyes be filled with your enchanting form as the dancing Nandalala. Oh Lord of Shirdi, Lord of Parthi, let our ears listen to absorbing stories of your plays. So that we ever remain absorbed in your presence.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prem Se Bolo Ek Baar Sai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram
Bolo Ram Sai Ram |Prem Se...|
Hey Madhura Manohara Ram
Hey Mohan Moorat Ram
Hey Karuna Sindhu Ram
Hey Raghupathi Raghava Ram
Hey Patitha Pavana Ram |Jai Jai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Once more, recite the name of Lord Sai Ram. Victory to Lord Sai Ram. Chant the name of Lord Rama, of the Raghu Dynasty. Who is charming and pleasing, The ocean of mercy and the saviour of the miserable and fallen.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prem Se Gao Mangala Naam
Govinda Gopala Bolo Hari Naam
Prem Ke Sindho Deenon Ke Bandho
Karunamaya Sai Nayanabhi Ram |Govinda Gopal|
Harey Krishna Harey Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram (3)
Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: With love and devotion chant the auspicious name of the merciful and loving Lord Sai, who is an ocean of love and Companion of the meek. Chant the names Govinda and Gopala.Chant the name of the Compassionate Sai. Hail to Krishna, Ram and Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prem Se Gao Pavana Naam
Rama Rama Raghu Nandana Rama |Prem Se...|
Janaki Rama Jaya Raghu Rama
Jaya Sai Rama Jaya Sathya Naama
Devotional Song Meaning: With love and devotion, sing the purifying and uplifting name of Lord Rama of the Raghu Dynasty. Victory to the Lord of Janaki, Lord Rama. Victory to Lord Sathya Sai Baba.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prema Avatara Sai
Mahima Avatara Sai
Kali Yuga Avatara Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Pray to Sai, the incarnation of Love, Pray to Sai, the miraculous OnePray to Sai, the incarnation of the present Kali age.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prema Muditha Man Se Kaho (Rama Rama Ram) x 3 Sri Rama Rama Ram
Paapa Katey Dukha Mitey Lekey Rama Naam
Bhava Samudra Sukhada Naava Ek Rama Naam
Parama Shanthi Sukha Nidhana Divya Rama Naam
Niradhara Ko Aadhara Ek Rama Naam
Parama Gopya Parama Divya Mantra Rama Naam
Sant Hrudaya Sada Basath Ek Ram Naam
Mata Pitha Bandhu Sakha Sab Hi Ram Naam
Bhaktha Janara Jeevana Dhana Ek Ram Naam
(Rama Rama Ram) x 3 Sri Rama Rama Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: With the heart and mind full of love and devotion, recite the name of Lord Rama. Reciting the name of Lord Rama cuts down sins and miseries It is the safe boat that helps to cross the ocean of life and death. So potent is Lord Rama's name that it brings eternal peace and bliss It is the only support of those who have no support (destitute). So loving and so divine is Lord Rama's name that sages and saints always have only Lord Rama's name in their hearts. O Lord Rama! You are my Mother, Father, Relative, Friend, everything else. The only life-long treasure of the devotee is Your name. Chant the mantra 'Rama Rama Rama'.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prema Sai Parthi Sai
Pavana Sai Parama Guru Sai |Prema Sai...|
Mangala Kara Karuna Sai
Karuna Sai Karuna Sai (Mangala Kara)
Madhura Madhura Hrudaya Nivasi
Murali Gaana Vilola Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing (chant) the name of Sai who is the embodiment of Love, The inner purifier who is the Supreme GuruSai, who bestows auspiciousness and full of GraceThe sweetest indweller of our heartsHe is the enchanter with the flute born again as Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prema Sudha Rasa Deejo Sai
Paramananda Sada Sukha Dayi |Prema Sudha...|
Prashanthi Nilaya Dwarakamayi
Pavana Purusha Sadguru Sai
Deena Daya Ghana Sri Raghurayi
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai give us the nectar of divine Love and bliss of the highest order. You are the most blissful, who confers endless joy. The holy and divine preceptor of Dwarakamayiin Shirdi and Prashanthi Nilayam at Parthi. You, belonging to the Raghu lineage, who has unending compassion for the meek.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Prema Swaroopini Janani Ma
Charana Namostuthey Sai Ma |Prema Swaroopini...|
Jagadambey Krupa Kari Sai Ma
Karunamayi Janani Sai Ma
Tribhuvana Palini Sai Ma |Charana Namostuthey|
Devotional Song Meaning: You are embodiment of Divine Love, Oh mother of Universe. Humble pranaams at Your holy feetOh Mother Sai. Please have compassion for me Mother Sai. Oh divine mother of the three worlds, Mother Sai. HumbleSalutationsto you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Premamaya Bhagawan Sai Ram
Karunamaya Sai Rama Rama Rama Ram
Hey Dukha Bhanjana Palanahaarey
Hey Leelamaya Apad Saharey
Sharan Mey Lelo Sai Rama Rama Rama Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Sai Rama, you are the personification of Love and compassion, who destroys our miseries, who takes care of our troubles, Oh Lord take us in your fold. We surrender at your feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Premamayi Sai
Parabrahmamayi Sai
Anandamayi Sai
Paratatvamayi Sai
Niramayi Sai
Characharamayi Sai
Mayamayi Sai (Ati)
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Sai, Love personified, Sai, the Cosmic consciousness, Sai, who endows one with bliss, Sai, who preaches the ultimate and the highest Truth, Sai, who is blemishless, Sai, Present in moving and non - moving objects and creator of illusion (maya) of this world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Premamayi Sai Ma Gnanamayi Sai Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Shiva Shakthi Roopini Sai Ma Sadananda Roopini Sai Ma
Parabrahma Roopini Sai Ma Tum Hi Moksha Pradayini Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother Sai! You are the Embodiment of love, wisdom and bliss. Victory to Thee Mother Sai. Sai is the embodiment of Lord Shiva and Shakthi in one and ever remaining in a state of bliss. She is supreme consciousness incarnate and grants Liberation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Premamrutha Barsao Baba
Daya Karo Bhagawan
Krupa Karo Bhagawan
Tumhari Daya Bin Kaisa Jeevan
Rom Rom Mey Basneywaale Ram
Janana Marana Se Par Utharo
Daya Karo Bhagawan |Krupa Karo|
Devotional Song Meaning: Shower Your nectarine Love, Baba. Have compassion on me. Shower Your Grace. This life is meaningless without Your compassion. You are the indweller, life force of my every nerve. Oh Compassionate One, please liberate me from this cycle of life and death

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Punya Naam Pavitra Naam Rama Naam Sai Ram
Harey Krishna Harey Ram Madhura (Amrutha) Naam Sai Ram |Punya Naam...|
Karuna Sindhu Sita Ram Deena Bandhu Radhey Shyam |Harey Krishna...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Recite the pure and holy name of Lord Sai Rama, Glory to the names of the Lord Rama, Krishna and Sai Ram that is sweet and nectarine. Lord Krishna, the protector of the dejected and miserable and Lord Rama, the ocean of mercy, confers auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Purandara Ranga Harey Vittala
Pandari Ranga Harey Vittala |Purandara Ranga...|
Narahari Ranga Harey Vittala
Murahara Ranga Harey Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Purandara Ranga, the Lord worshipped by Saint Purandara Dasa. Glory to Vittala, the Lord of Pandharpur, Murahara Ranga, the glorious one who slayed the demon Mura.Chant the nameofHari, who has taken human form.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Pyaarey Nanda Lal Darshan Deejo
Yashoda Ke Bal Darshan Deejo |Pyaarey Nandalal...|
Natawara Lal Darshan Deejo
Giridhara Bal Darshan Deejo
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna! Kindly present Thyself. Oh Beloved Prince of Nanda and Mother Yashoda, give me your Darshan! You are the divinely mischievous child and the one who lifted the Govardhan mountain, please grant me your Darshan!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raasa Vilola Nandalala
Radha Madhava Nandalala |Raasa Vilola...|
Nanda Kishora Nanda Lala
Navaneetha Chora Nandalala
Nandalala Sai Nandalala (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the son of Nanda, Lord Krishna, Who is fond of the Raasaleela (divine folk dance with Gopis). The Lord of Radha, is the one who steals the hearts of devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raavo Raavo Ranga Sai
Radha Lola Ramaneeya Roopa |Raavo Raavo...|
Venu Vilola Vijaya Gopala
Vedodharana Vara Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Come and give us your Darshan Oh Ranga Sai (Krishna - Sai). One who has a lovely form, dear to Radha. One who revels in playing on the Flute, the victorious protector of all beings, You are none other than Sai Rama, who has taken the vow to redeem the Vedas (spiritual way of life).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raavo Raavo Sri Raghu Ram
Kaavo Ee Mammu Kodanda Rama
Bhava Nashaka Bhadrachala Rama
Pavana Naama Sri Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sri Rama! Won't you come to us and protect us? O Rama of the Bhadrachala temple, the destroyer of the cycle of birth and death, help us. Protect me, Oh Rama, who bears the Bow and Arrow (Kodanda). Oh Lord Sri Sai Rama - the one with the holy name.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radha Jeevana Raasa Vilola
Rakumayi Vittala Vittala Bala
Gopi Vallabha Gokula Bala (2)
Kali Yuga Sai Krishna Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Gopala is the very life of Radha, the beloved Krishna of the Gopis, performing the celestial dance with the Gopikas. The cowherd boy of Gokula, Vittala the consort of Rakumayi, has come down as Sai Krishna in the present Kali age.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radha Ke Natawar Lal Kanhaiya
Gokula Bala Goparipala |Radha Ke...|
Nanda Kumara Raasa Vilola
Meera Ke Prabhu Nanda Lal Kanhaiya
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Krishna (Kanhaiya), the Lord of Radha and Meera (devotee), The child of Gokula (city), is the sustainer of all beings. The darling son of Nanda, Lord Krishna, is fond of the Raasa (divine dance depicting the ecstacy of the union of the individual souls with the Supreme One).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radha Krishna Karuna Lola Radhey Govinda
Radhey Govinda Murali Govinda
Radhey Radhey Govinda Murali Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the merciful Lord, Radha Krishna. He is Radhey Govinda and Murali Govinda, who plays the enchanting flute.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radha Krishna Panduranga Radhey Govinda
Rama Krishna Panduranga Murali Govinda |Radha Krishna...|
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora Narayana Hari Govinda
Narayana Hari Govinda Narayana Govinda |Nanda Kumara...|
Pandari Natha Panduranga Parthi Pureesha Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Radha Krishna, also Radhey Govinda, Son of Nanda, the one who steals butter (hearts) from (of devotees) other houses. Chant the name of Lord Narayana, who installed Himself as Vittala Lord of Pandharpur. He has come down as Lord Sai at Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radha Lola Ramya Suchela
Rajitha Vana Mala Gopala
Venu Vilola Vijaya Gopala
Vedagama Moola Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh! Delightful, elegant, beautiful darling of Radha, Gopala; You are the one who is embellished with a garland of flowers from the vines of the forest, You are the beautiful player of the flute, Victorious Gopala, You are the origin of the Vedas too.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radha Madhava Gopala
Raasa Manohara Nandalala
Gopi Jana Mana Mohana Hey Krishna
Govardhana Dhara Nandalala
Parthi Vihara Nandalala (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Bow Down to the Lord of Lakshmi, who has takenbirth as Krishna, who captivates our hearts and minds by His celestial dancewith Radha (signifies the coming together of the individual and Cosmic soul). He isthe son of Nanda and the one who held aloft the Govardhan mountain. Now strolls around delighting the devotees in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radha Madhava Gopalana
Govinda Gopala Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana (2)
Narayana Veda Parayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the many names of the Lord Gopala and Govinda, the protector and sustainer of all beings, Narayana and the Lord of Radha, Lord Madhava, Who is none other than Lord Vishnu, the preacher of the Vedas.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radha Madhava Madana Gopala
Nanda Mukunda Natawara Lala |Radha Madhava...|
Mathura Natha Deena Dayala
Sai Govinda Giridhara Bala
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Krishna - Madhava, Gopala, Govinda, beloved of Radha. He is the beloved son of Nanda who liberates us with His divine dance. He is the Lord of Mathura, so full of compassion for the meek. Sai is none other than the boy who held up the mountain to save his devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radha Madhava Mana Mohana
Shyama Mukunda Madhusudhana |Radha Madhava...|
Krishna Murari Yadu Nandana
Mandara Giridhari Gopalana
Madhuvana Sanchari Janardhana
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the praises of Radha and Madhava who regales the mind of devotees, The dark complexioned Lord of the Yadu clan, Slayer of demons Mura and Madhu, He is the protector who held aloft the Mandara mountain.Janardana, Who moves about in the forests of Madhu (Madhuvan - Brindavan).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radha Pyaarey Jaya Gopal
Radha Madhava Jaya Gopal
Brindavan Ke Jaya Gopal
Murali Manohara Jaya Gopal
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the universal Protector, the Beloved Lord of Radha (devotee). Victory to that Lord Gopal of Brindavan. Victory to Gopal, the one who enchants with the Divine Flute.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radha Radha Radha Krishna Radha
Radha Krishna Radha (Jai) |Radha Radha|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing in praise of Radha and Krishna incessantly.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopal Bhajo
Murali Gopal Bhajo Sai Ghana Shyam
Sai Ghana Shyam (Shyam) Sai Ghana Shyam
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the praises of Radhey Govinda, Radhey Gopala, who is of deep blue complexion, holding the Flute in His hands. He is none other than our beloved Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Govinda
Radha Ramana Hari Radhey Govinda |Radhey Govinda|
Radha Ramana Hari Radhey Govinda
Radhey (4) Radhey (4) Radhey (4) Radhey Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing in praise of Radha and her beloved Govinda incessantly. Sing of Govinda who enthralls the heart of Radha. He is but the Lord Hari, the protector of all beings. Chant the holy name of Radhey, Radhey.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Bol Tu Mukh Se
Bol Tu Sai Ram (2)
Jai Bolo Sai Ram
Pal Pal Jeevan Beetho Jaaye
Bol Hari Ka Naam |Jai Bolo...|
Radhey Govinda Bol Tu Mukh Se
Bol Tu Sai Ram
Rom Rom Mey Sai Basaaye
Shwas Shwas Mey Ram |Jai Bolo...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Man repeat the names of the Lord Radhey Govinda and Sai Ram with your tongue. Our life span ebbs away with every passing second. Hence, chant the name of Hari and Sai before it is too late. Let every hair on our body vibrate with the name of Sai and our breath with the name of Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Bolo Radhey Govinda
Krishna Mukunda Bolo Krishna Mukunda
Brindavan Chanda Radhey Govinda
Prabhu Paramananda Krishna Mukunda
Sai Satchidananda Sri Mukharavinda |Krishna Mukunda|
Krishna Mukunda Bolo Krishna Mukunda
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Radhey Govinda and Krishna Mukunda. Radhey Govinda is the crowning jewel of Brindavan. While Krishna Mukunda endows one with supreme bliss.The Lotus faced Sai is the very personification of Truth, Awareness and Bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Gopala (Jaya)
Mana Mohana Hey Nanda Mukunda |Radhey Govinda...|
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Bhakthon Ke Sathya Sai Mukunda
Sai Mukunda Sai Mukunda
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the divine names of Radhey Govinda and Gopala. He is the one who attracts the mind and is the darling of Nanda. He is the one who is attractive to all the cowherd girls and is the darling of Gokula. Chant his name who has come down as Sai Mukunda to all his devotees, to help them cross the ocean of life and death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Gopala Jaya Govinda Radhey Gopala
Govinda Govinda Gopala (2) |Radhey Govinda...|
Krishna Madhusudhana Madhusudhana Krishna
Gopala Gopala Gopala (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Gopala, Krishna, the one who tends to cows, Lord of Radha (devotee). Repeat the names incessantly of Krishna, who slayed the demon Madhu.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Harey Murarey
Shyama Mukunda Harey Murarey
Krishna Govinda Harey Murarey
Sai Mukunda Harey Murarey
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the many names of Lord Krishna, who destroys the miseries of life Radhey Govinda, Shyama Mukunda, Of the dark complexioned liberator, the slayer of demon Mura and of Sai Mukunda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Jai Jai Radhey Gopala
Deena Natha Govinda Anatha Natha Gopala |Radhey Govinda...|
Radha Lola Govinda Raasa Vilola Gopala
Govinda Jaya Govinda Gopala Jaya Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Gopala, the Lord of Radha. You are the Lord of the meek and those who have no support. Oh Lord of Radha! You revel in the cosmic dance with the Gopis. Victory to Lord Govinda. Victory to Lord Gopala, the protector and sustainer of all beings.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Krishna Murarey
Jaya Sai Mukunda Murarey |Radhey Govinda...|
Nanda Ananda Radhey Govinda
Radhey Govinda Sai Govinda |Jaya Sai|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Blue- Complexioned Lord Govinda of Radha! You are the destroyer of the demon Mura. Victory to you Lord Sai, who bestows liberation. Victory to the blissful son of Nanda, the Lord of Radha, protector of all beings.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Radhey Gopala Sai Ram
Bansidhara Bansidhara Hey Chitha Chora
Hey Natawara Hey Natawara Nanda Kishora
Ghana Shyama Sundara Megha Shyama Sundara Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the names of the Lord Govinda - Lord of Radha, Gopala - protector of the innocent, Sai Ram.Oh Holder of the Flute! You are the stealer (Chitha Chora) of our awareness, mind and heart. Sing the names of Radhey Govinda, Radhey Gopala. The handsome and mischievous son of Nanda, youhavethe complexion of thick black clouds, thou art Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Krishna Govinda Bol Manuva
Mukunda Madhava Keshava Bol |Radhey Krishna...|
Hari Narayan Hari Hari Bol
Natawara Naagara Giridhari Bol
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the names of the Lord Radhey Krishna, Govinda, Mukunda, Madhava, Hari, Narayan. The mischievous child who lifted the mountain with His little finger!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Krishna Radhey Krishna Jai Sri Krishna Radhey Radhey (2)
Radhey Krishna Radhey Radhey
Jai Sri Krishna Radhey Radhey
Shirdi Krishna Parthi Krishna Sai Krishna Radhey Radhey
Radhey Krishna Radhey Krishna Jai Sri Krishna Radhey Radhey
Radhey Krishna Radhey Radhey |Jai Sri|
Devotional Song Meaning: Repeat the Names of Radhey Krishna, Of Shirdi Krishna and Parthi Krishna. Victory be to Sai Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Mukunda Murari Govinda
Govinda Govinda Ananda (3) |Radhey Mukunda...|
Giridhari Giridhari Ananda (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord of Radha, Mukunda - bestower of liberation, Murari, who slayed the demon MuraGovinda, the protector of the innocent and Giridhari, who held aloft the mountain. Sing repeatedly the names of Radhey Mukunda, Govinda, Giridhari, the real source of Bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Govinda
Radhey Radhey Gopala
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopala
Radhey Mukunda Harey
Radhey Mukunda Harey (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the Names of the Radha's Lord Govinda and Gopala, Radhey Gopala and Radhey Mukunda over and over again.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Govinda
Hey Radhey Gopala
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopala (2) |Radhey Radhey|
Murali Manohara Govinda Hey Madhava Murahari Govinda (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us sing in praise of Radha and Krishna. Praise be to Krishna who is the protector and sustainer, Whose flute music enchants us. He is Madhava, the Lord of Lakshmi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Govinda
Hey Radhey Gopala
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopala (2) |Radhey Radhey|
Murali Manohara Govinda Hey Madhava Murahari Govinda (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us sing in praise of Radha and Krishna. Praise be to Krishna who is the protector and sustainer, Whose flute music enchants us. He is Madhava, the Lord of Lakshmi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chanda
Anatha Natha Deena Bandhu Radhey Govinda
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chanda |Anatha Natha|
Bhaktha Vatsala Bhaagavatha Priya Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chanda |Anatha Natha|
Venu Vilola Vijaya Gopala Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chanda |Anatha Natha|
Pandari Natha Panduranga Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chanda |Anatha Natha|
Pundarikaaksha Purana Purusha Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chanda |Anatha Natha|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant continuously the name of Radhey Govinda - signifying Radha (the individual soul) and Govinda (signifying the Universal soul), the shining star of Brindavana, who is the refuge of the forlorn. He is the son of Nanda, the one who stole butter from the other's houses (steals devotees' hearts), Who takes care of his devotees, Who loves the Bhagawat (epic story of the avatars of Lord Vishnu). Radhey Govinda is the victorious One, who likes to play scintillating music on His Flute. He is Panduranga, the Lord of Pandharpur. He is the One who waited at the doorstep of devotee Pundarika to grant him liberation.He is Radhey Govinda, the ancient One.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Venu Gopala
Venu Gopala Sai Gopala |Radhey Radhey...|
Radhika Manohara Raja Gopala
Gopika Manohara Gopi Gopala
Neela Megha Shyama Sundara Sai Gopala
Madhava Keshava Sai Jai Jai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Govinda, Gopala, Lord of Radha - The ever blissful and enchanting Flute Player, who is our Sai Gopala.Pray to Lord Krishna, the beautiful cowherd boy with dark blue skin like a cloudThe one with beautiful hair who enchants the gopikasHe is the Lord of Lakshmi, victory to Sai Gopala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Radhey Shyam
Krishna (Sai) Murari Radhey Shyam
Kunja Vihari Radhey Shyam
Muralidhari Radhey Shyam |Krishna Murari...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us chant the Name of Radhey Shyam, He is Krishna, the one who killed demon Mura. He moves around the thick bushes of (Kunj) Brindavan, Who holds the flute in his hands.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Radhey Shyam Rakumayi Vittala
Jaya Hari Sri Hari Sai Hari Vittala |Radhey Radhey...|
Panduranga Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala
Purandara Vittala Pundarikaaksha Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the name of Vittala, beloved of Radha and Rukmini. Victory to Lord Hari, Lord Sai, Lord Panduranga Vittala of Pandharpur. He is the Lord of Saint Purandara Dasa and the liberator of devotee Pundarika.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Shyam Panduranga Vittale Rakumayi
Panduranga Purandara Vittale Rakumayi
Radhey Shyam Panduranga Vittale Rakumayi (2) |Panduranga|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Panduranga Vittala, who is none other than Radhey Shyam. Chant the name of Panduranga Vittala with His consort Rakumayi. He who was worshipped by Saint Purandara dasa.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Radha Madhava Megha Shyam
Yashoda Bala Radhey shyam
Murali Krishna Megha Shyam
Karna Kundala Kasturi Tilaka
Kaustubha Abharana Radhey Shyam |Radhey Shyam|
Sundara Vadana Radhey Shyam
Nanda Gokula Megha Shyam
Sridhara Madhava Yadava Nandana
Gokula Krishna Radhey Shyam
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Radhey Shyam, the dark blue hued Lord of Lakshmi. He is the son of Mother Yashoda and an enchanter with the flute. With ornaments on his ears and vermillion mark of the musk on his forehead, adorned with the jewel, Kaustubha. The handsome, dark hued son of Gokula chief, Nanda. Lord of wealth, the darling of Yadavas. He is Krishna of Gokula, Radhey Shyam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Radha Madhava Megha Shyam
Yashoda Bala Radhey shyam
Murali Krishna Megha Shyam
Karna Kundala Kasturi Tilaka
Kaustubha Abharana Radhey Shyam |Radhey Shyam|
Sundara Vadana Radhey Shyam
Nanda Gokula Megha Shyam
Sridhara Madhava Yadava Nandana
Gokula Krishna Radhey Shyam
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Radhey Shyam, the dark blue hued Lord of Lakshmi. He is the son of Mother Yashoda and an enchanter with the flute. With ornaments on his ears and vermillion mark of the musk on his forehead, adorned with the jewel, Kaustubha. The handsome, dark hued son of Gokula chief, Nanda. Lord of wealth, the darling of Yadavas. He is Krishna of Gokula, Radhey Shyam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam (2)
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Radhey Shyam, the dark hued Lord Krishna, beloved of Radha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Radha Ramana Sri Ranga Ranga Radha Ramana Sri Ranga
Jaya Yadu Nandana Parama Niranjana
Radha Ramana Govinda Mukunda
Radha Ramana Sri Ranga Ranga Radha Ramana Sri Ranga
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Shyam, the Lord of Radha. Victory to the Supreme Lord and Leader of the Yadu Dynasty, Lord Govinda. The supreme director of the play of existence. Victory to the Son of Yadava sect, pure and sublime. The enchanter of Radha (Lakshmi), you are Govinda and Mukunda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Shyama Gopal Ghana Shyam Gopal
Ghana Shyam Gopal Giridhari Gopal |Radhey Shyama...|
Brindavana Prabhu Krishna Gopal
Meera Ke Prabhu Nanda Gopal (Mayi)
Hum Bhakthon ke Sathya Sai Gopal
Devotional Song Meaning: Praises be to Lord Gopal, beloved of Radha, Of the colour of dark blue clouds, To the Lord of Brindavan, Krishna Gopal, To the Lord of Meera, son of Nanda and To our dear Sathya Sai Gopal.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Shyama Gopala Radhika Jeevana Sri Ranga
Megha Shyama Gopala Mana Mohana Sundara Sri Ranga |Radhey...|
Pandari Natha Gopala Panduranga Sri Ranga
Parthi Pureesha Gopala Sai Ranga Sri Ranga
Devotional Song Meaning: Pray to Lord Krishna (Ranga) who is the beloved of Radha, the beautiful cowherd boy with dark blue skin like a cloud, who enchants our minds. Pray to the Lord of Pandharpur, Panduranga (Vittala) who resides in Puttaparthi as Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Shyama Hey Ghana Shyama
Radha Madhava Mangala Dhama |Radhey Shyama...|
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Megha Shyama
Megha Shyama Megha Shyama |Jaya Jaya...|
Jaya Jaya Jaya Brindavana Dhama
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the dark hued Lord of Radha. He who is the Lord of Lakshmi, the abode of auspiciousness. Victory to the cloud complexioned Lord. Victory to the Lord of Brindavan, Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Shyama Hey Ghana Shyama
Radha Madhava Mangala Dhama |Radhey Shyama...|
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Megha Shyama
Megha Shyama Megha Shyama |Jaya Jaya...|
Jaya Jaya Jaya Brindavana Dhama
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the dark hued Lord of Radha. He who is the Lord of Lakshmi, the abode of auspiciousness. Victory to the cloud complexioned Lord. Victory to the Lord of Brindavan, Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhey Shyama Murari Jai Govinda Gopal Jai Govinda Gopal
Madhu Murali Kunjana Krishna Go Gopi Vandana Krishna
Jai Raasa Ranjana Krishna Jai Govinda Gopal
Tana Mana Ranjana Krishna Jai Govinda Gopal Jai Govinda Gopal (Jai)
Jai Jai Govinda Gopal Jai Govinda Gopal
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Radhey Shyam, to Govinda and Gopal, The one who slayed demon Mura, The One who moved about the forests playing on His enchanting Flute, Adored by the residents and all the beings of Gokul, Victory to the one who played the celestial dance, Who captivates the body and mind of his devoteesVictory to that Govinda Gopal.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhika Jeevana
Krishna Janardhana
Radhey Govinda Radhey Gopala
Devaki Nandana |Radhika...|
Nanda Nandana Hey Gopika Ranjana
Murali Mohana
Sri Madhusudhana (Krishna Krishna)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the praises of Krishna, the very soul of His devotee (Radha)Krishna the one adored by allThe darling son of Devaki and NandaThe enchanter of the Gopikas, with his divine fluteHe is the slayer of the demon, Madhu.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhika Jeevana Krishna Murari
Govardhana Dhari Hrudaya Vihari |Radhika Jeevana|
Meera Ke Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Parthi Vihari Sai Murari
Hey Mana Mohana Sharana Tihari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Krishna residing in Parthi, you are the life of Radha, your beloved, you are the resident in all hearts of devotees, you are the Lord of Meera, you are Giridhari (the one who lifted the hillock Govardhana aloft to save the cowherd community). We surrender to you Oh the most enchanting Lord.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Radhika Manohara Madana Gopala
Deena Vatsala Hey Raja Gopala
Bhaktha Jana Mandara Venu Gopala
Muralidhara Hey Gaana Vilola
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing of Madana Gopala, who attracts Radha's mind. We bow to the protector of the meek, the Royal Lord. He who enchants the devotees with his divine flute music and songs. Our salutations to that Divine One!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ragamayi Anuragamayi
Premamayi Ma Pranamayi |Ragamayi...|
Karunamayi Anandamayi
Bhagyamayi Ma Bhavamayi
Gnanamayi Ma Gaanamayi
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the Divine Mother, full of compassion and bliss , She is Love personified, the life force of all beings, The one who confers fortunes and relishes the good feeling in our actions. She is wisdom personified and embodiment of good music.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghava Raghu Nandana
Madhava Madhusudhana |Raghava Raghu...|
Rajeeva Dala Lochana Shyama Bansi Mohana
Donon Hi Naam Hai Anand Dhaam (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing of Raghava, the scion of Raghu dynasty, Lord Ram. He is the Lord of Lakshmi and the one who slayed demonic force Madhu. The Lotus eyed One, who is the dark hued flute playing enchanter. Both the names, Ram and Shyam, lead you to liberation and bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghava Raghuvara Rama Bhajo
Mandara Giridhara Shyama Bhajo |Raghava Raghuvara...|
Tulasi Dasa Prabho Rama Bhajo
Meera ke Prabhu Shyam Bhajo
Raghupathi Raghava Rama Bhajo Murali Mohana Shyama Bhajo
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Bhajo Nanda Nandana Shyama Bhajo
Sai Sundara Naama Bhajo
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the praises of Raghava of Raghu lineage, of Lord Rama - The Lord of Saint Tulasidas, the son of Dasharatha and of Shyama (Lord Krishna), who lifted the Mandara mountains, the Lord of Meera, the one who delights everyone with lilting music of His Flute, the son of Nanda. Praise our beautiful (Sundara) Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Raghava Sundara Rama Raghuvara Parama Pavana Hey Jaga Vandana |Raghava Sundara...| Patithodharana Bhaktha Parayana Ravana Mardhana Vighna Bhanjana Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: The beautiful Lord Rama is supreme among the Raghu dynasty. He is worshipped by the entire creation. Liberator of the chaste, venerated by the devotees; He destroys obstacles and annihilated the demon- king Ravana. Worship Lord Narayana, Who has incarnated in Parthi as Lord Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghothama Rama Ram
Ramakantha Rama Ram
Chidananda Rama Ram
Sarojaksha Rama Ram
Sai Rama Rama Ram (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the praises of Rama who belongs to the Highest order of the Raghu lineage. One who charms Sita (Mother Lakshmi), One who bestows supreme bliss, the Lotus eyed Ram. He is none other than Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghu Nandana Hey Raghu Nandana (2)
Pyaarey Merey Nandana Raghu Nandana |Raghu Nandana...|
Rajeeva Lochana Raghu Nandana
Dasharatha Tanaya Raghu Nandana
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Raghu Nandana
Janaki Jeevana Raghu Nandana |Raghu Nandana|
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow to the Lotus - Eyed Lord Rama of Raghu Dynasty who is beloved to me. He is Prince of King Dasharatha, Destroyer of the ten - headed Ravana. He, who is the Life - breath of Mother Janaki.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghu Nandana Raghava Ram Harey
Hey Janaki Jeevana Ram Harey
Hey Rajeeva Lochana Ram Harey
Sita (Sri) Rama Harey Sai Rama Harey (5)
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Rama of Raghu Dynasty. Worship the Lotus - Eyed Lord Rama, who is the very life- breath of Sita. Sri Rama and Sai Rama, we sing your praises.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghukula Bhooshana Rajeeva Nayana
Eshwaramba Nandana Sathya Sai Rama
Janaki Vallabha Lavanya Rama
Nirupama Sundara Sugunabhi Rama
Prashanthi Nilaya Pavana Naama
Jaya Jaya Rama Prabhu Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the jewel of the Raghu Dynasty, the Lotus- Eyed Lord Rama. He is the darling son of Mother Eshwaramba, Lord Sathya Sai Rama. The beloved of Janaki (Sita), exquisitely handsome Lord Rama, who is beautifully- complexioned and the most virtuous. Victory to that Rama, who is our Lord Sai Rama, of the sacred Prashanthi Nilayam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghupathey Raghava Raja Rama
O Raja (Sai) Rama
Patitha Pavana Sita Pathey Rama |Raghupathey|
Dasharatha Nandana Raja Rama Kausalyatmaja Sundara Rama
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Rama Raghava Mohana Megha Shyama
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Rama Rama Sita Rama |Patitha Pavana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Pray and Chant the name of Lord Rama, the handsome Prince of King Dasharatha and Mother Kausalya. Victory to Lord Rama, the Saviour of the downtrodden and the Lord of Sita. Victory be to You Oh Lord Rama. Oh Raghava Lord of Raghu dynasty, of captivating form and of dark complexion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghupathey Sita Rama
Janaki Jeevana Kodanda Rama |Raghu Pathey|
Rajeeva Lochana Ravikula Soma
Ravikula Soma Ravikula Soma |Rajeeva Lochana|
Ravana Mardhana Jaya Jaya Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the Lord of Sita, Lord of the Raghu dynasty, who is the life-breath of Mother Sita, Ram who wields the bow, Kodanda. The lotus-eyed star of the lineage of the Sun, who destroyed the demon Ravana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghupathey Sri Rama Chandra
Raghava Raghava |Raghupathey|
Ravikula Soma Sarvabhowma
Ramya Susheela Rama Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: We bow to Rama, Lord of the Raghu Dynasty, Who is still and shining as the moon. He is Raghava, Lord of Raghu dynasty. Raghava, who is the doyen of the Solar lineage, respected by everyone and has a charming personality.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghupathey Sri Rama Chandra Raghava Daya Nidhey (2)
Madhava Sri Radhikesha Govinda Harey Krishna (2)
Pashupathey Sri Parvatheesha Shankara Sadashiva (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Rama, Lord of the Raghus, who is still and shining as the moon, You are an Ocean of Mercy.Oh Krishna, Splendorous Lord of Radha, Protector of our souls and Remover of sorrows. Oh Lord of all creatures, Krishna. Beloved of the Mother Parvathi, You are the unchanging Shiva, the Source of Goodness. Oh Lord Sai, You are Lord Rama, Lord Krishna and Lord Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Raja (Sai) Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Sita Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai Rama. Oh Lord! You are the salvation of the fallen and repentful. Chant the name of the princely Rama of Ayodhya. Chant the name of Sai Ram whose name purifies us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Eshwar Allah Tero Naam Sab Ko Sanmati Do Bhagawan |Raghupathi...|
Nanak Yesu Gautam Ram Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Jaya Ram
Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Jaya Ram Sri Ram Jaya Ram Sathya Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord and King Sri Ram of Raghu lineage, the redeemer of the downtrodden, Lord of Mother Sita.Oh Lord! Bless us with wisdom. You are the very same God known by different names as Eshwar, Allah, Nanak, Yesu and Gautam. Victory to the personification of all forms, Sathya Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghupathi Raghava Ram Kaho
Rajeeva Lochana Ram Kaho
Ram Kaho Sai Ram Kaho
Ram Ram Sai Ram Kaho
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the Lotus - Eyed Lord Rama of the Raghu Dynasty. Chant the name of Lord Sai Rama. Chant, 'Ram Ram Sai Ram'.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghupathi Raghava Ram Ram
Ram Ram Rama Ram Ram
Ram Ram Rama Ram |Raghupathi Raghava|
Janaki Jeevana Ram Ram
Jagadodharana Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of the Lord of Raghu dynasty Raghava Ram, the very life of Janaki, the redeemer of the World.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghupathi Raghava Rama Harey
Shyama Sundara Sai Rama Harey
Paramatma Rama Parandhama Rama
Purushottama Sai Rama Harey
Asha Paasha Vinashaka Rama
Sai Rama Rama Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Pray to Lord Rama who is the doyen of Raghu lineage, having a dark-hued lovely form. He is the cosmic consciousness, the ultimate abode, the most exalted of humans. The destroyer of desires and attachment has come down as Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghupathi Ram Jaya Jaya Ram
Dasharatha Nandana Sri Raghuram |Raghupathi Ram...|
Sita Mohana Janaki Ram
Pavana Naam Mangala Dhaam
Jaya Jaga Vandana Prashanthi Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory and victory to Prince of King Dasharatha, Lord Rama of the Raghu Dynasty. He is dearest to Sita (Janaki). Reciting His name is purifying and helps to attain the auspicious abode. He is adored by the entire world, the Lord of Prashanthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raghuveera Ranadheera Rama Rama Ram
Rakumayi Vittala Shyama Shyama Shyam |Raghuveera...|
Sukumara Sundara Rama Rama Ram
Shirdeesha Partheesha (Sayeesha) Rama Rama Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sita Ram (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us sing the glories of Ram, champion of Raghu dynasty, one of might and courage at war. Chant the name of Lord Vittala of Rakumayi, the dark hued one, Victory to the good, young and handsome Ram, the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rahiman Rahiman Ram Rahim
Sai Ram Sai Ram Krishna Karim
Buddha Zohrashtra Nanak Sai
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Sai Tum Ho
Bhajorey Manuva Ram Rahim
Ram Rahim Sai Krishna Karim
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the various names of the same Lord Ram, Rahim the gracious One, Krishna, Karim (the compassionate), Sai Ram. Oh Lord Sai! You are Buddha, Zohrashtra, Nanak and You are the one who sent JesusYou are the embodiment of all that has come as One.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rahimana Ram Rahimana Ram
Allah Eshwar Ek Hi Naam
Panduranga Vittala Vittala Naam
Bhajorey Manuva Hari Ka Naam (Sai Ram)
Ek Omkaara Bolo Jai Sathya Naam
Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Nanak Naam
Prem Hi Eshwar Prem Hi Ram |Bhajorey Manuva|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the various names of the same Lord Ram, Rahim the gracious One, Allah and Eshwar are one and the same. Chant the names of Panduranga Vittala and Hari, Oh mind; Omkaara is the One True Reality. As preached by the great Guru Nanak. Love is God, Love is the name Oh mind. Chant the name of Hari and Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raja Gopala Radhika Manohara
Deena Lola Gokula Ke Bala
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora (2)
Pannaga Shayana Parama Dayala
Raja Gopala Radhika Manohara (2) |Deena Lola|
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Gopala is the King of Mathura, beloved of Radhika. Dear child of Gokula, ever ready to shower His Grace on the forlorn. The child of Nanda who stole the hearts of one and all, Reclining on the great serpent Adishesha and the supreme benefactor of the needy.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raja Rajeshwari Jaganmohini (Amba)
Jagadambey Mangala Kaarini |(Amba) Raja Rajeshwari...|
Jagadodharini Vighna Vinashini
Sthira Sukha Dayini Sai Janani
Devotional Song Meaning: Effulgent and beautiful Goddess Amba enchants the world and bestows auspiciousness. She destroys obstacles and saves the world. Mother Sai grants ever- lasting happiness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raja Rajeshwari Rajya Pradayini
Raakshasa Nashini Paalaya Maam
Sri Bhuvaneshwari Tripura Sundari
Shiva Shakthi Roopini Paalaya Maam
Devotional Song Meaning: Save us Oh Mother Goddess of Emperors, Donor of Kingdoms, destroyer of the demon race, Save us, Oh! Mother. The Goddess of the entire World, the most beautiful of all the three Worlds, protect us, the Embodiment of Shiva, the male aspect and the Shakthi, the female aspect of God.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rajadhi Raja Hey Sai Maharaja
Deenon Ke Nath Bhagawan
Devadi Deva Hey Sai Mahadeva
Parthi Nivasi Sai Ram
Harey Rama Rama Rama Rama
Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the King of Kings, the Supreme King, Lord Sai, protector of the miserable and dejected, The Lord of Lords, the resident of Parthi, Lord Sai, You are Lord Rama and Lord Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rajadhi Raja Raja Gambhira
Raja Marthaanda Raja Kumara
Raavo Raavo Gaana Manohara
Pankaja Lochana Parthi Vihara
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh King of Kings, with the prestige and diginity of a King, please come to me, Oh Lover of music, Lord Sai, who lives in Parthi. We beckon You to come Oh Lord Sai, the King of Kings, The lover of Music, the Lotus eyed, the One who dwellsin Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rajadhi Raja Rama Rajeeva Netra Rama
Ramaneeya Vesha Jaya Rama
Jaya Rama Sai Rama
Raghukula Bhooshana Rajeeva Lochana
Raja Ramachandra
Sita Pathey Hey Sundara Rama
Sajjana Sadhu Samrakshaka Rama |Jaya Rama...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Rama, the King of Kings, the Lotus eyed One, having the looks of a charmer. Sri Rama is the jewel of Raghu lineage, the consort of Sita, handsome Rama, Protector of the pious and the sages. Victory to you oh Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rajeeva Lochana Sai Narayana
Narahari Roopa Namo Narayana |Rajeeva Lochana...|
Parama Daya Ghana Patitha Pavana
Nithya Niranjana Sai Narayana |Narahari Roopa|
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the Lotus- Eyed Lord Sai Narayana, who has assumed a human Form, who is the saviour of devotees and towards whom he is extremely merciful and who is the embodiment of purity.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rajeeva Lochani Raja Rajeshwari
Mangala Karini Mata Maheshwari |Rajeeva Lochani...|
Sankata Harini Sai Narayani
Prashanthi Vasini Paapa Vinashini
Prema Swaroopini Sai Bhavani
Devotional Song Meaning: The Goddess of the Emperors, the Lotus eyed, Bestower of auspiciousness, Mother Sai Narayani, the sovereign ruler of this entire creation. She is the remover of sorrows , Destroyer of sins, who lives in Prashanthi Nilayam, The very embodiment of Love , Sai Bhavani.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rajeshwari Sri Bhuvaneshwari
Parameshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari
Partheeshwari Annapoorneshwari
Sarveshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari
Devotional Song Meaning: Divine Mother, Consort of the Ruler of the worldsYou are the supreme, Sathya Sayeeshwari, Mother Sai, Lord of Parthi, who confers sustenance to one and all. You are the Prinicpal Goddess, Sathya Sayeeshwari

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raksha Karo Bhagawan Sathya Sai Bhagawan
Paahi Dayalo Dehi Krupalo |Raksha Karo...|
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Pradatha
Nithya Niranjana Jeevana Daata
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Roopa
Sathyam Shivam Sundaram
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect us, Oh Lord Sathya Sai! You are the compassionate and merciful Lord of the helpless, the bestower of truth, righteousness, peace and love, the ever- cheerful Lord Who sustains all life, the embodiment of Brahma (Creator), Vishnu (Sustainer) and Maheshwara (Destroyer of evil). You are Truth, Auspiciousness and Beauty.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raksha Raksha Jagadeeshwara
Parthi Puri Parameshwara
Paahi Paahi Parameshwara
Dehi Dehi Tava Pada Seva
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect us, Oh Lord of the Universe! Protect us, Oh Lord of Parthi! Protect and bless us. We pray to Thee to grant us the opportunity to serve atYour Lotus Feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Raksha Raksha Prabhu Hey Jagadeesha
Pavana Naama Shiva Sayeesha
Mangala Daata Shiva Sayeesha
Bhaktha Janashraya Purana Purusha
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord of Universe! Oh Granter of Auspiciousness and Mercy! Oh Lord Sai, Protect us, Protect us. Your name Shiva and Sayeesha are holy and bestows auspiciousness on those who chant it. Grant us Your assurance of protection, Oh the Master of the Universe , Oh Lord! You are the most ancient and loved by all devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ram Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Sai Raghu Nandana Ram |Ram Jai...|
Ahalyodharaka Sri Raghu Nandana
Raghukula Bhooshana Ram |Ram Jai...|
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram |Sai Raghu (2)|
Devotional Song Meaning: Let Victory be on Your side Oh Lord Rama, the consort of Sita. Rama, the son of Raghu Dynasty, the redeemer of the curse on Ahalya, you are the crest jewel of the Raghu lineage. Chant the mantra Sita Ram, Sita Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ram Jinka Naam Hai Ayodhya Jinka Dhaam Hai
Hamarey Raghunath Ji Ko Hamarey Lakh Pranam Hai
Krishna Jinka Naam Hai Gokul Jinka Dhaam Hai
Hamarey Yadunath Ji Ko Hamarey Lakh Pranam Hai
Sai Jinka Naam Hai Parthi Jinka Dhaam Hai
Hamarey Pran Nath Ko Hamarey Lakh Pranam Hai
Devotional Song Meaning: We offer a lakh (hundred thousand) obeisances to our Lord of Raghu lineage, whose Name is Ram and Ayodhya His abode. We offer a Lakh obeisances to Lord of Yadu lineage, whose Name is Krishna and Gokul being His abode. We offer a Lakh obeisances to the Lord of our Life, whose Name is Sai and Parthi His abode.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ram Jis Ka Naam Hai Shanthi Sthapana Kaam Hai
Aise Raghukula Nandana Ko Hamara Pranam Hai
Keshava Jis Ka Naam Hai Dharma Sthapana Kaam Hai
Aise Yadu Kula Nandana Ko Hamara Pranam Hai
Sai Jis Ka Naam Hai Jagadodharana Kaam Hai
Aise Parthi Nandana Ko Hamara Pranam Hai
Devotional Song Meaning: We bow down to the scion of Raghu lineage, whose name is Ram and whose work is to establish Peace. We bow down to the scion of Yadu lineage, whose name is Keshava and whose work is to establish righteousness on Earth. We bow down to the scion of Parthi, whose name is Sai and whose work is to redeem the world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ram Kaho Krishna Kaho Eshwara Allah Sai Kaho
Buddha Kaho Guru Nanak Kaho Zohrashtra Mahaveer Yesu Kaho |Ram Kaho|
Yug Avatara Tum Ho Vishwa Shakthi Tum Ho
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Mahesha
Parabrahma Tum Ho (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Ram, Krishna, Eshwara or Allah. Chant the name of Buddha, Guru Nanak or Zohrashtra. Chant either Mahaveer or Jesus. You are the incarnation of this age. You are the power behind the Universe. You are Sai Mahesha, who loves all religion equally. You are the embodiment of the Supreme One.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ram Kaho Sai RamKaho
Shyam Kaho Ghana Shyam Kaho
Yesu Kaho Zohrashtra Kaho
Jag Ka Vidhata Sai Kaho
Mandir Mey Kabhi Masjid Mey
Apna Hrudaya Mey Sai Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: Call Him by any name be it Rama, Sai Ram, Shyam, Yesu, Zohrashtra, sometimes He is in a temple or Masjid, but the Creator of this Universe Lord Sai lives in our Heart.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Ram Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, Lakshmana, Sita, Victory to Hanuman (monkey devotee of Lord Rama) and Lord Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ram Rahim Ko Bhajanewaale Terey Poojari Baba
Tera Naam Ek Sahara (3)
Tum Hi Ho Geeta Tum Hi Ramayan
Tum Hi Ho Veda Puran |Tera Naam|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Baba! For the devotee's of Lord Rama (Hindus) and of Rahim (Islam), your name is the only refuge. You are the very Form of teachings of Holy scriptures, Bhagawad Gita, Ramayana, four Vedas and eighteen puranas.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ram Ram Bhajo Mana Harey Harey
Sai Ram Bhajo Mana Harey Harey |Ram Ram...|
Raghupathi Raja Rama Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram |Sai Ram|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mind! Worship Lord Rama of the Raghu Dynasty. The Lord of Sita, Lord Rama, destroys sins and evil, uplifts and liberates the penitent. Chant 'Sai Ram Sai Ram Harey Harey'.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ram Ram Ram Parama Sumangala Ram Ram Ram
Janani Janaki Jeevana Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram Jayatu Jayatu Rama
Parama Sumangala Ram Ram Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: The Name of Ram is highly auspicious. Lord Rama is the life of universal Mother Janaki. Victory to Ram and Sai Ram, whose Names are highly auspicious.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Bhaktha Hanumantha
Rama Daasa Hanumantha
Anjana Sutha Abhaya Pradayaka
Vayu Putra Vara Pradayaka
Sri Rama Daasa (Dootha) Namo Namo (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Hanumantha, the dear devotee and servant of Lord Rama. He whose Mother is Anjana and grants freedom from fear to His devotees. He is the son of the Wind god, bestower of boons. Let us offer our obeisances to the servant and messenger of Sri Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Charan Sukha Dayi Bhajorey (3)
Ram Naam Ke Do Akshara Mey
Sab Sukh Shanthi Samayi Rey
Sai Nath Ke Charan Mey Aakar
Jeevan Saphal Banao Rey
Devotional Song Meaning: Worshipping the Lotus Feet of Lord Ram endows one with happiness. Reciting only the two letters Ra and Ma, confers everlasting peace and happiness. Finish the mission of human birth by surrendering to the Lotus Feet of Lord Sai (by merging in Lord Sai).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Dhyaana Nirata Anjaneya
Rama Seva Vratha Hanumantha
Swami Mukhya Prana Pavamana
Daithya Kulaantaka Mahaveera
Anjanaadri Vasa Gunavanta
Dasanudasa (Sri Rama Dasa) Hanumantha
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Anjaneya, who is always immersed in meditation on Rama, who has taken a vow to be at service to Rama. The one who has won the confidence of Lord Rama. Hanuman is the champion uprooter of the demon race, the storehouse of good qualities, who lives in the Anjanaadri Hills, the one who serves those who serve the Lord, the true servant of Sri Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Govinda Harey
Bhajorey Rama Govinda harey |Rama Govinda...|
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Harey
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Rama Harey
Gokula Nandana Shyama Harey
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing in Praise of Rama and Govinda. Rama, the darling son of Dasharatha, The One who annihilated the ten headed Ravana. Shyama is the dear son of Gokula Sai, their embodiment, is the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Govinda Harey Krishna Gopal Harey
Sri Madhusudhana Harey Harey Harey
Sri Madhusudhana Harey
Devaki Nandana Goparipalana
Yadava Nanda Nandana Harey Harey
Yadava Nanda Nandana
Hey Jagat Palana Deena Janavana
Mathura Puri Madhava Harey Harey
Mathura Puri Madhava
Patithodharana Patitha Pavana
Parthi Vihari Krishnana Harey Harey
Parthi Vihari Krishnana
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Rama, Govinda (sustainer of all beings) the names of Lord KrishnaHe is the slayer of demon Madhu. The darling son of Devaki, ruler of all beings; The beloved Yadava child. The ruler of all worlds, benefactor of the meek, glory to that Lord of Mathura, the Lord of Lakshmi. Liberator of the chaste. Glory to the Lord of Parthi, who is verily, the same Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Harey Hari Naam Bolo
Hari Naam Bolo Sai Naam Bolo |Rama Harey...|
Sai Rama Parama Dayala
Parama Dayala (2)
Man Mandir Mey Diya Ujaala
Nanak Sai Bolo Govinda Sai Bolo
Yesu Sai Bolo Buddha Sai Bolo
Allah Sai Bolo Maulah Sai Bolo (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the many names of the Lord Rama, Hari, Govinda. Chant the name of Guru Nanak, Allah, Maulah and the all-pervasive Lord who is extremely compassionate and whose presence has kindled the light in the temple ofour hearts. Chant the Name of Rama and of Hari. Light the lamp of Love in our Hearts, Oh Sai the most merciful One. Chant the names of Allah and Maulah Sai, Nanak Sai and Govinda Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Harey Raghu Rama Harey
Shyama Harey Ghana Shyama Harey
Janaki Jeevana Rama Harey
Radha Madhava Shyama Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama, Ghana Shyama and Madhava. Chanting the Name destroys sins and evil. Sing the glory of Rama of Raghu clan, the very life of Mother Janaki and Shyama the dark complexioned one who is dear to Radha. Oh son of Nanda and playful stealer of butter (pure heart), Oh Madhava, (All names of Krishna).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Harey
Allah Eshwar Sai Harey
Guru Nanak Yesu Buddha Harey
Zohrashtra Mahaveera Sai Harey
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Harey (Baba)
Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Rama, glory to Krishna, glory to Lord Sai, who loves all religions equally.Oh Devotees! Glory to the name of the Lord of all faiths; Who is known by different names as Rama, Krishna, Allah, Eshwar, Guru Nanak, Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahaveera. Sai responds to any of these names.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Harey Sita Ram
Shyam Harey Radhey Shyam
Sita Vallabha Sundara Ram
Murali Manohara Radhey Shyam
Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama, the Lord of Sita, Radhey Shyam, the Lord of Radha. Chant the name of Rama, the handsome consort of Sita, Radhey Shyam, the enchanting Flute Player. They are none other than our Lord of Parthi, Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Jai Jai Rama Sai Rama Jai Jai Ram
Rajeeva Lochana Raghava Sundara Rama Jai Jai Ram
Sai Rama Jai Jai Ram
Sathya Swaroopa Shanthi Pradayaka Rama Jai Jai Ram
Amrutha Bhaashi Abhaya Pradayaka Rama Jai Jai Ram
Anatha Natha Deena Natha Rama Jai Jai Ram |Sai Rama|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to Rama, the lotus eyed One, the handsome King, Glory be to Sai Rama. Rama is the personification of Truth; grants Peace and freedom from fear. Glory to the One of nectarine words. Rama, the refuge of the forlorn, Lord Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Jayam Hari Rama Jayam
Raghava Dhyanamey Lokamayam |Rama Jayam...|
Rama Sita Pathi Raghava Mantram
Ramya Suguna Gana Sevya Niranthram
Rama Daya Para Sujana Pavitram |Ravikula|
Ravikula Dasharatha Suthamuna Hari Jaya.
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory be to Lord Rama of Raghu lineage, The entire world meditates on Rama. Glory be to the dear son of Dasharatha of the Solar Dynasty. Chant the Name of Raghava the Lord of Sita, and immerse ourselves ever in extolling His Divine qualities and in His service Rama who shows immense compassion towards the pure and the good ones.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Kodanda Rama Rama Pattabhi Rama Rama Kalyana Rama Raghava
Rama Sita Pathi Rama Neevey Gathi
Rama Neeku Mrokkiti Rama Nee Chey Jikkiti |Rama Kodanda...|
Rama Neekokka Mata Rama Nakokka Moota
Rama Nee Paatey Paata Rama Nee Baatey Baata |Rama Kodanda...|
Rama Neekevaru Todu Rama Kreeganta Choodu
Rama Nenu Neevadu Rama Natho Mathadu |Rama Kodanda...|
Rama Naamamey Melu Rama (Swami) Chintaney Chaalu
Nee Naamamey Melu Nee Chintaney Chaalu
Naamamey Melu Chintaney Chaalu
Rama Neevu Nannelu Rama Raayadey Chaalu |Rama Kodanda...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Rama who bears the Bow and arrow, the crowned King of Ayodhya, Rama, born for the welfare of entire Humanity. There is no refuge other than You, Oh Lord Rama consort of Sita. Rama, I pleaded with You, Oh Lord, I got the support of your benevolent hand, Oh Rama, Your One word is enough to contemplate and that is equivalent to a sack full (moota). Rama, there is no song other than the song about You, there is no path other than the way to You. Oh Rama, who is there for your company, why don't you look at me? I am yours Oh Lord, please converse with me. Chanting the name of Rama is better, Contemplating on Rama is enough. Please protect me, OhLord Rama, Your name alone is enough.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Govinda Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana |Rama Krishna...|
Sri Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
Om Anantha Narayana (Hari) (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Rama, Krishna, Govinda, Narayana He is none other than Lord Hari, the Supreme one.He is the Lord of the Goddess of Prosperity (Godess Lakshmi). He is the infinite, supreme Lord Hari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Govinda Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana |Rama Krishna...|
Sri Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
Om Anantha Narayana (Hari) (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Rama, Krishna, Govinda, Narayana He is none other than Lord Hari, the Supreme one.He is the Lord of the Goddess of Prosperity (Godess Lakshmi). He is the infinite, supreme Lord Hari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Govinda Narayana Keshava
Radhika Ramana Madhava Jaya Ranga Deva
Harey Rama Harey Krishna Sita Rama Raghava |Radhika|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Rama, Krishna, Narayana, Keshava and Madhava. The one adored by Radhika (Radha), Lord of Lakshmi, victory to you the Lord of the stage (world). Glory to Rama, Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Hari Mukunda Murari
Panduranga Hari Panduranga Hari
Deva Deva Deva Mahadeva Deva
Adi Deva Deva Brahma Vishnu Deva
Brahma Vishnu Deva Sathya Sai Deva |Panduranga Hari|
Panduranga Hari Jai Jai Panduranga Hari (3)
Panduranga Hari (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Rama, Krishna, Hari, Mukunda, the one who liberates, Murari, the one who slayed the demon, MuraHe is Pandu Ranga, Lord of Lords. He is the great God, Mahadeva (Shiva), He is the primordial Lord, the trinity of Brahma, Vishnu and ShivaHe is now taken form as Sathya Sai. Victory to Lord Pandu Ranga Hari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Hari Mukunda Murari
Panduranga Hari Panduranga Hari
Deva Deva Deva Mahadeva Deva
Adi Deva Deva Brahma Vishnu Deva
Brahma Vishnu Deva Sathya Sai Deva |Panduranga Hari|
Panduranga Hari Jai Jai Panduranga Hari (3)
Panduranga Hari (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Rama, Krishna, Hari, Mukunda, the one who liberates, Murari, the one who slayed the demon, MuraHe is Pandu Ranga, Lord of Lords. He is the great God, Mahadeva (Shiva), He is the primordial Lord, the trinity of Brahma, Vishnu and ShivaHe is now taken form as Sathya Sai. Victory to Lord Pandu Ranga Hari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Hari Narayana
Deena Janavana Hari Narayana
Deena Sharanya Narayana
Bhava Bhaya Harana Sai Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama, Krishna, Narayana and Hari. Lord Narayana, who is the protector and the One in whom the downtrodden has taken refuge. Lord Sai Narayana, who protects and liberates us from the bondage of life and death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Hari Sathya Sai Murari
Sai Murari Sathya Sai Murari |Rama Krishna...|
Allah Eshwar Yesu Bhi Tum Ho
Tum Ho Ram Aur Shyam Murari
Buddha Hi Tum Ho Brahma Bhi Tum Ho
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai Baba, You are none other than Rama, Krishna and Hari. Victory to You! You are Jesus Christ, You are Allah. You are Eshwar, Buddha and Lord Brahma.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Jaya Bolo (Bhaja Mana)
Rama Krishna Jaya Sai Krishna Jaya |Rama Krishna...|
Raghukula Bhooshana Rama Rama Ram
Radha Madhava Shyama Shyama Shyam
Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Krishna Harey Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the name of Lord Rama and Krishna. Victory to Lord Rama, the Jewel of the Raghu dynasty. Victory to the dark-hued Lord Krishna, Lord of Radha Chant the Mantra, 'Harey Ram Harey Krishna'.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Rama Krishna Rama Krishna Bhajorey
Sri Hari Madhava Govinda Keshava |Rama Krishna.|
Nanda Nanda Shyama Govinda
Pandari Natha Panduranga Bhajorey
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Rama, Krishna, Hari, Madhava, Govinda and Keshava. Sing the Glory of Shyama, the son of Nanda and Panduranga, the Lord of Pandharpur.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Tum Ho Jaya Ram Jaya Ram
Sai Krishna Tum Ho Sai Ram Sai Ram
Yesu Pitha Tum Ho Hey Ram Hey Ram
Allah Eshwar Ho Allah Ho Akbar
Shirdi Sai Tum Ho Sai Ram Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai you are everybody--Rama, Krishna, Yesu, Allah, Eshwar and Shirdi Sai

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Vasudeva Narahari Vittala
Harey Rama Vittala Harey Krishna Vittala
Panduranga Purandara Pandari Vittala
Shirdi Sai Vittala Parthi Sai Vittala |Panduranga|
Sathya Sai Vittala Parthi (Prema) Sai Vittala
Sathya Dharma Vittala Shanthi Prema Vittala
Sai Vittala Sarvam Vittala
Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Parthi Ranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Sai Ranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Parthi Ranga Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Rama, Krishna, Vasudeva, Hari in human formGlory to Vittala, who is Rama and Krishna. The Panduranga Vittala, Lord of Saint Purandaradasa, is born in Shirdi as Sai. He is also our Sai of Parthi. He who preaches Truth, Righteousness, Peace is Sai, who encompasses all. Sing of Vittala, Panduranga Vittala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Vasudeva Narayana Hari Hari
Vishwa Roopa Vasudeva Narayana Hari Hari
Narayana Hari Hari Om Narayana Hari Hari |Vishwa Roopa|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Rama, Krishna, Vasudeva, Hari Narayan, The all-pervading cosmic form of the Lord of Lords, Lord Hari, who is Sai Deva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Vasudeva Sai Nandalal
Harey Rama Rama Krishna Sai Nandalal
Sai Nandalal Sai Nandalal
Deena Bandhu Deena Natha Sai Nandalal
Sai Nandalal Sai Nandalal
Shirdi Vasa Srinivasa Sai Nandalal |Sai Nandalal|
Devotional Song Meaning: Pray to Sai, who is Rama, Krishna, Vasudeva, son of Nanda. Glory to Rama, Krishna and Sai. Sai is the son of Nanda, born again. Refuge of the meek and the forlorn. He is Sai of Shirdi, Lord Srinivasa of Tirupati (Vishnu).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki
Anjani Putra Balabheema Anjaneya Balabheema
Balabheem (6) Balabheema
Vayu Kumara Balabheema Vanara Veera Balabheema |Balabheem (6) |
Parthi Pureesha Sai Rama Pavana Purusha Sai Rama
Sai Ram (6) Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Hanuman, along with Rama, Lakshmana and Sita. Victory to the mighty son of Anjana, Hanuman. He is the son of Vayu (God of wind), He is the son of the monkey clan. Bow to the Lord of Parthi, Sai Rama, the pure and blemishless one.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Naam Smaranam Samastha Paapa Haranam
Kaama Krodha Haranam Raghuveera Naama Smaranam
Deena Janodharanam Bhavaabdhi Dukha Haranam
Devotional Song Meaning: Contemplating on the Name of Rama destroys all sins. Remembering the Name of the Hero of Raghu Dynasty (Rama) destroys desire and anger. Serving the hapless and the forlorn destroys the sorrows of the cycle of birth and death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Naama Bolo Sai Naama Bolo Radhey Shyam Ghana Shyam Jai Bolo
Rama Naama Bolo Sai Naama Bolo
Radhey Shyam Ghana Shyam
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Rama, Sai Rama, Radhey Shyama and Ghana Shyama (Dark blue hued). Chant the Name of Rama, Sai, Radheyshyam and Ghanashyam, Glory be to Him.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Naama Smaranam Sada Mokshanandakaram
Sri Krishna Naama Smaranam Sada Hrudaya Kutuhalam
Sri Govinda Naama Smaranam Sada Lakshmi Krupakaram
Sri Anjaneya Smaranam Sada Dhairyanandakaram
Sri Sai Naama Smaranam Sada Sarva Anandakaram
Devotional Song Meaning: Chanting Rama's name continuously confers liberation. Chanting Krishna's name repeatedly confers enthusiasm in the Heart. Chanting Govinda's name repeatedly confers prosperity. Chanting the Name of Anjaneya (Hanuman) continuously confers courage or fearlessness. Chanting the Name of Sai always confers bliss for all.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Naama Tarakam Sada Bhajorey
Rama Naama Tarakam Sada Japo Rey |Rama Naama...|
Sai Darshanam Paapa Nashanam
Sai Sparshanam Moksha Dayakam
Devotional Song Meaning: Always worship Lord Rama, who helps to liberate oneself. Incessantly chant the liberating name of Rama. The darshan (sight) of Sai liberates you from all sins.The touch of Sai bestows on you enlightenment.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Naama Tarakam Sada Bhajorey 
Sada Bhajorey Sadaa Japorey 
Ram Ram Ram Jai Kodanda Rama 
Ram Ram Ram Jai Kalyaana Rama 
Ram Ram Ram Jai Pattaabhi Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Always worship Lord Rama, who helps to liberate oneself. Incessantly chant the liberating name of Rama. The invincible one holding the bow, the one who was coronated rightfully, the one who confers grace on the world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Raghava
Ranjita Roopa Hey Rajeeva Lochana |Rama Raghava...|
Rama Rama Ravikula Soma
Ravikula Soma Ravikula Soma |Rama Rama Ravikula...|
Ravana Samhara Ranadheera
Devotional Song Meaning: Rama, otherwise known as Raghava, attracts all with His Form, the lotus eyed One. The doyen of Ravi lineage, the indomitable warrior who annihilated the demon Ravana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Raghava (Sai)
Raghu Nandana Ravikula Soma |Rama...|
Ravana Mardhana Ramabhi Rama
Ramethi Rama Raghu (Sai) Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama, Lord Sai Rama and Lord Raghava. Rama, also known as Raghava, is the Scion of Raghu dynasty, of Solar lineage. Rama who vanquished the demon Ravana, has now incarnated as Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Raghava Raghuveera
Sridhara Madhava Govinda |Rama...|
Keshava Madhava Madhusudhana
Achyutha Anantha Narayana
Gopi Lola Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant of Rama, known as Raghava, who is the champion of the Raghu lineage. Chant the various Names of Krishna, Sridhara (the one who bears Mother Lakshmi in His heart), Madhava, Govinda, Keshava (the One with long hair), Madhusudhana (the One who demolished the demon Madhu), Achyutha - undecaying, Anantha - endless, Narayana (indweller), Gopala (sustainer), who is dear to the Gopis.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Raghuvara Ram Sita Ram Rama Ram (2)
Rama Dasharatha Nandana Kamaneeya Komala Ram
Rama Danava Bhanjana Kodanda Raja Ram
Deena Bandhu Karuna Sindhu Rama Sai Ram
Rama Bhaja Mana Rama Bhaja Mana Rama Pavana Naam
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the Name of Rama whose consort is Mother Sita, He is the son of King Dasharatha. Rama the tender, handsome, one who is the annihilator of the demon clan; The One who wields the bow, an Ocean of compassion and dear to the forlorn.Sing the glory, Oh mind, of the purifying name of Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Raghuvara Rama Sita Rama Rama Ram
Sri Rama Rama Ram Sai Rama Rama Ram |Rama Raghuvara...|
Hey Patitha Pavana Ram Hey Shyamala Komala Ram
Hey Vaidehi Priya Ram Sai Ram Rama Jaya Ram |Sri Rama|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Rama whose consort is Mother Sita; He, who liberates the penitent, the handsome and tender Lord. He is the beloved of Vaidehi (Sita), victory to Lord Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Rama Jaya Jaya Rama
Raghuveeram Ranadheeram |Rama Rama...|
Atma Ramam Akhanda Ramam
Ananda Sada Adbhuta Ramam
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the hero of the Raghu dynasty, the illustrious warrior. He is the indwelling Atma, the unique one. He is the wonderful Rama who bestows eternal bliss.
Worship the Lotus - Eyed Lord Rama, who is the auspicious symbol of the Raghu dynasty. He is Sai Ram, the son of Mother Eshwaramba and is the glory of the Ratnakara dynasty.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram Rama Rama Jaya Sita Ram (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Rama the consort of Janaki.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Rama Raghu Ram Shyam Shyam Ghana Shyam
Koi Kahey Ram Koi Kahey Rahim Koi Kahey Ghana Shyam
Nanak Yesu Buddha Mahaveer
Sab Hai Sai Bhagawan (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing of Lord Rama, the dark-hued Krishna, Some call Him Ram, some Rahim, some say the dark blue hued one. Some bow to Nanak, Jesus, Buddha, Mahaveer. Lord Sai is one with all of them.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Rama Ram Raghu Nandana Atma Ram (Sri)
Sri Rama Rama Ram Dasharatha Nandana Ram |Rama Rama...|
Kausalyatmaja Vaidehi Priya Ayodhya Vasi Ram
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Maruti Sevitha Veera Kodanda Ram
Eshwaramba Priya Sutha Hey Avatari Sai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Janaki Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sita (Sai) Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Divine Name of Rama who was the son of Dasharatha, Who was the very life of his mother Kausalya and who was the chief of the Raghu clan. Chant the name of Sita's consort, the handsome Rama, resident of Ayodhya. Praise Rama who destroyed Ravana with the famous bow, Kodanda and the one who is served by Hanuman. Sing the name of the son of Eshwaramba, the Lord of Puttaparthi, Sai Rama!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Kodanda Ram
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Kalyana Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Vaidehi Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Pattabhi Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Atmabhi Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Sri Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the One with the famous bow, Kodanda. Victory to Him, the bestower of auspiciousness. Victory to Him, beloved of Vaidehi (Sita). Victory to Rama, the crown Prince. The one with the sweet form who resides in our hearts, Victory to Lord Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Rama Rama Ram Sai Ram
Karunya Rama Sri Sai Rama |Rama Rama...|
Vaidehi Ram Sai Ram (Rama)
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram (Sathya)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing of Rama, who has come as Sai Ram. The compassionate Rama, Lord RamaThe consort of Vaidehi (Sita), Lord Rama. Sing of Sai Rama, Sathya Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Rama Rama Sai Rama Namo
Krishna Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Namo
Yesu Yesu Yesu Sai Yesu Namo
Buddha Buddha Buddha Sai Buddha Namo
Rama Sai Rama Namo Krishna Sai Krishna Namo
Yesu Sai Yesu Namo
Buddha Namo
Zohrashtra Zohrashtra Sai Namo
Mahaveera Mahaveera Sai Namo
Guru Nanak Guru Nanak
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow to Rama, Sri RamaI bow to Krishna, Sri KrishnaI bow to Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahaveer & NanakAll are but emanations of our Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Rama Rama Rama Sita Rama Raghu Rama (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant incessantly the name of Rama, the consort of Sita, the Scion of Raghu dynasty.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Rama Sai Rama Sita Rama Radhey Shyam (3)
Dasharatha Nandana Sita Rama Vasudeva Nandana Radhey Shyam
Eshwaramba Nandana Parthi Pureeswara Sai Ram (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Sita Rama the son of Dasharatha and Radhey Shyam, the son of Vasudeva. Glory to Lord Sai Rama, the son of Eshwaramba, the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Rama Sai Rama
Parthi Pureesha Sai Ram |Rama Rama...|
Madhura Manohara Sundara Ram
Shyamala Komala Nayanabhi Ram
Ravikula Mandana Rajalalaam
Parama Pavana Mangala Naam
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama and Lord Sai Rama of Parthipuri. Oh Lord Rama! Having a graceful look, You are exceedingly beautiful and charming. You are the jewel of the Ravi Kula (descendant of the Solar dynasty) and you are the greatest among all Kings.Reciting Your name confers auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Sai Rama Sai Rama Sai Ram (2)
Kausalya Nandana Dasharatha Ram
Janaki Vallabha Jaya Jaya Ram
Lakshmana Sevitha Lavanya Ram
Ravana Mardhana Ranadheera Ram
Ayodhya Vasi Raja Ram
Anjana Priya Sutha Atmabhi Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Rama, who has come as Sai Ram. Rama, the darling son of Kausalya and Dasharatha, Victory to Ram, the beloved of Sita. The gentle Lord who was served by brother Lakshmana. The illustrious warrior, Rama who destroyed demon Ravana; The resident King of Ayodhya. The indwelling Lord of the dear son of Anjana (Hanuman).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Sharana Bhajo Rama Harey (3)
Ahalyodharaka Rama Harey
Alakh Niranjan Rama Harey
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Harey
Sai Jaga Vandana Rama Harey
Rama Harey Sai Rama Harey (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing of glorious surrender to the Lord Ram, the Rama who liberated chaste devotee - Ahalya, the one who is beyond attributes, the spotlessly pure Rama. Glory to the son of Dasharatha. He is Sai, adored by the whole world. Glory to Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Sri Ramachandra Jaya Jaya Rama
Karunabhi Rama Kamaneeya Rama |Rama Sri|
Kodanda Rama Kalyana Rama
Sharanagata Paripalana Sri Charana Rama
Rama Sri Rama Sai Rama
Samara Vijaya Rama Saketa Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Pray to Rama, who shines like the full moon, The compassionate and attractive RamaThe auspicious one who wields the bow, KodandaThe one who protects those who surrender at His Lotus FeetPray to Lord Rama, the victorious heavenly warrior.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rama Sumira Man Rama Sumira Man
Rama Sumira Man Ram
Janaki Vallabha Dasharatha Nandana
Ramachandra Sri Ram
Bhaja Mana Sita Ram Ram Bhaja Mana Sita Ram
Bhaja Mana Radhey Shyam Shyam Bhaja Mana Radhey Shyam
Bhaja Mana Sai Ram Ram Bhaja Mana Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mind, Chant the name of Lord Rama, the beloved of Sita and the Prince of King Dasharatha. Worship, Oh mind, the Lord Sitaram, Radhey Shyam and Lord Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ramachandra Prabhu Raghu Vamsha Naama
Sita Pathey Jaya Janaki Rama |Ramachandra...|
Ahalyodharaka Sugunabhi Rama
Ravana Samhara Kodanda Rama
Ayodhya Rama Pattabhi Rama
Nava Nava Komala Sri Sai Rama |Sita Pathey...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Rama! In the Raghu Dynasty You have incarnated as Lord Ramachandra, The husband of Sita, the Lord of Janaki (Sita). Oh Most virtuous Lord Rama! You liberated Ahalya (devotee), destroyed the demon Ravana, as you wielded the Kodanda bow. Oh Lord of Ayodhya (city in the North of India), the crowned King, Lord Ram! You have incarnated as Lord Sai Ram, the ever new and tender embodiment of Love!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ramachandra Raghuveera Ramachandra Ranadheera
Ramachandra Raghurama Ramachandra Parandhama
Ramachandra Raghunatha Ramachandra Jagannatha
Ramachandra Mama Bandho Ramachandra Daya Sindho
Raghuveera Ranadheera
Raghurama Parandhama
Raghunatha Jagannatha
Mama Bandho Daya Sindho (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Rama, the hero of the Raghu dynasty. Glory to Ramachandra, the illustrious warrior prince. He is verily the heavenly abode, the goal of our life. He is the Lord of Raghu dynasty, the Lord of all worlds. He is our very own relative, the sea of mercy and compassion. Sing the glory of Lord Rama!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ramachandra Sri Ram
Sai Rama Jaya Rama |Ramachandra...|
Dasharatha Nandana Dayabhi Rama
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Rama Rama
Tapasa Ranjana Taraka Naama
Ahalyodharaka Rama Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Ramachandra, the darling son of Dasharatha, the merciful Rama. The slayer of the ten-headed demon - Ravana, the liberating name that enthralls the saintly and the one who liberated Ahalya, the chaste devotee.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ramam Bhajo Raghu Ramam Bhajo
Raghukula Tilakam Ramam Bhajo |Ramam Bhajo...|
Dasharatha Nandana Ramam Bhajo
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Ramam Bhajo
Vaidehi Priya Ramam Bhajo
Vaikunta Vasa Ramam Bhajo
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the name of Rama, Who is the star of Raghu Clan. Rama, beloved son of Dasharatha who slayed the ten-headed demon, Ravana. The beloved of Sita (Vaidehi) and the one resides in Vaikunta (heavenly abode of Vishnu)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ranga Ranga Panduranga Ranga Vittala
Vittala Krishna Vittala
Vittala Sai Vittala |Ranga Ranga...|
Rukmini Sametha Pandari Natha
Parthi Ranga Vittala Deena Bandhu Vittala
Vittala Krishna Vittala |Vittala Sai|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Panduranga, Vittala and Sai. He is Lord Krishna, installed along with Rukmini as the Lord of Pandharpur. He is our Sai Vittala of Parthi, the saviour of the meek.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ranga Sri Ranga Jai Jai Panduranga
Vittala Jai Vittala Jai Vittala Sri Ranga |Ranga Sri|
Radhey Govinda Giridhara Gopal
Natawara Naagara Murali Manohara
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Ranga
Jai Jai Panduranga (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Panduranga Vittal, the Lord of Pandharpur. He is the Lord Krishna of Radha; Giridhar, the one who lifted the mountain. He, who revels in mischief and is the stealer of hearts is none other than the Lord of Parthi, Sai Ranga.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ratnakara Kula Bhooshana
Rajeeva Nayana Sai Narayana |Ratnakara...|
Eshwaramba Nandana (Hey)
Tribhuvana Palana (Vanditha) Mrudu Charana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lotus-Eyed Lord Sai Narayana! You are the jewel of the Ratnakara dynasty. Oh Darling son of Mother Eshwaramba and the sustainer of all creation. Your soft, Lotus Feet are worshipped and adored by the entire universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ravikula Mandana Rajeeva Lochana Raghava
Vasudeva Nandana Bandha Vimochana Keshava |Ravikula Mandana...|
Karuna Niketana Krishna Janardhana Yadava
Sri Madhusudhana Murali Mohana Madhava
Devotional Song Meaning: Sai took the form of Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty; In Dwapara yuga, He was the son of Vasudeva, as Krishna, who liberates us from bondage. The abode of compassion, the protector of all, the one who conquered the demon Madhu and the one who enchants all with the melody from his flute.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Rhum Jhum Nacho Nanda Dulaar
Madhava Murahara Murali Gopal |Rhum Jhum...|
Radha Manohara Natawara Lal
Govinda Giridhar Murali Gopal
