Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the many names of the Lord Madhava, Natavara, Gopala and Govinda. Pray to the Divine Dancer, the beloved child of Nanda. The Lord of Radha, the destroyer of demon, Mura. The enchanter with the flute and the mischievous Lord, who protected his devotees by lifting the mountain.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sada Bhajami Ganeshwaram
Nitya Smarami Sarveshwaram |Sada Bhajami|
Dheeram Daya Sagaram
Bhava Dooram Guha Sodaram
Karunya Jaladharam
Bhaktha Kanshepa Pradakaram
Devotional Song Meaning: I Chant the Name of Ganesha always, I constantly remember the Lord of all, The One of valour and the Ocean of compassion, Lord Ganesha, who removes the fear of birth and death. Brother of Lord Guha (Lord Subrahmanya), who is an ocean of compassion to his devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sada Bhajorey Hari Naama Bhajo
Madhura Sudha Rasa Hari Naama Bhajo |Sada Bhajo...|
Sri Raghu Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
Gowri Shankara Naama Bhajo Bhajo
Devotional Song Meaning: Constantly sing the name of Hari, the name that confers sweet nectar of immortality. Chant the names of Rama and Krishna. Chant the names of Parvati and Shankara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sada Bhajorey Shankara Naam (2)
Sada Japo Rey Sai Naam
Samba Sadashiva Sai Sarveshwara
Sundara Roopa Hara Gangadhara
Devotional Song Meaning: Always sing of the name Shankara, Always chant the name Shankara. May the beautiful form of the Lord Sai, who is embodiment of happiness and prosperity, be ever in our hearts.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sada Nirantara Hari Guna Gao
Prema Bhakthi Se Bhajan Sunao |Sada Nirantara...|
Sai Nath Ke Charano Mey Aao
Man Mandir Mey Deepa Jalao
Jeevana Naiya Paar Lagao
Devotional Song Meaning: Always sing the glory of our Lord; Let the bhajan resound with love and devotion; Come to the lotus feet of our Lord Sai; In your heart's temple, light the lamp of love; He will take you across the ocean of life.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sadashiva Ranjani Sai Janani
Sambhavi Shankari Durga Bhavani |Sadashiva Ranjani...|
Akhilandeshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Mata Maheshwari Narayani
Devotional Song Meaning: Eternal joy of Lord Shiva, wife of Shiva, She is the giver of life, Mother of all worlds, the queen of queens. She is Mother Parvathi, the sister of Lord Vishnu. She is none other than Mother Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sadguru Brahma Sanathana Hey
Parama Daya Ghana Pavana Hey
Janmaja Dukha Nivarana Hey
Jagadodharana Karana Hey
Sai Krishna Janardhana Hey
Janardhana Hey Janardhana Hey |Sai Krishna|
Bhava Bhaya Jaladhi Tarana Hey
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the merciful Noble Guru, Lord Sai Krishna, whose form is Brahma (Infinity). He is the saviour of the world. Oh Lord Sai Janardhana! Worship merciful, noble, Lord Sai Krishna, the saviour of world. You are the one who helps overcome sorrows and the fear of crossing the ocean of life and death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sadguru Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara
Sri Sathya Sai Sadashiva Shankara
Amrutha Amrutha Daana Karey Sai
Aap Haalaahala Paan Karey
Bhava Bhaya Jaladhi Paar Karey Sai
Jagadodhara Jaya Abhayankara |Sri Sathya|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh! Noble Universal Teacher, You represent the Trinity (Creator, Preserver & Destroyer). You are the one who gave the boon of immortality. You drank the poison arising from the churning of the world! Help me cross the ocean of fear and sorrow. Grant me fearlessness, Oh! ever blissful Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sadguru Charanam Sada Smarami
Sai Charanam Sada Smarami |Sadguru Charanam|
Shankara Charanam Sada Smarami
Pankaja Charanam Pranamamyaham
Devotional Song Meaning: Meditate upon the Lotus Feet of Divine Master. I offer obeisance by prostrating at the auspicious Lotus Feet of Lord Sai. Oh Shankara, I constantly meditate on Your Lotus Feet and offer my obeisances.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sadguru Charanam Sankata Haranam
Sathya Sanathana Sarathi Charanam |Sadguru Charanam...|
Sada Bhajorey Sada Japo Rey
Sai Naama Smaranam Madhuram
Sai Charanam Shanthi Sadanam
Devotional Song Meaning: Meditate on the Feet of the Universal Guru, they will protect you from harm. They are the feet of the True, eternal charioteer. Always chant and sing of them. Sweet is the remembrance of thy name - Sai. Thy Lotus Feet are the peaceful abode.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sadguru Nathudey Ma Baba
Satchidanandudey Ma Baba
Sarva Dayaludey Ma Baba
Sathya Sai Nathudey Ma Baba
Devotional Song Meaning: Baba is our sacred preceptor, the very personification of Truth, Awareness and Bliss. He is compassionate towards all and who is known as Lord Sathya Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sadguru Om Sadguru Om
Shiva Shiva Sai Sadguru Om
Shirdi Pureeshwara Sadguru Om
Sri Sai Deva Sadguru Om
Parthi Pureeshwara Sadguru Om
Parama Dayalo Sadguru Om
Hara Shiva Murthy Sadguru Om
Bhavani Shankara Sadguru Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant of the Universal Guru, OmkaaraChant of Shiva Sai, the universal GuruHe is the Lord of Shirdi & Parthi, the most compassionate, He is none other than the embodiment of Shiva and Parvathi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sadguru Sai Saraswathi
Brahma Deva Sati Bharati
Mangala Manjula Vaagvilasini
Veena Vadini Kalavathi
Hamsa Vahini Vidya Daayini
Veda Mata Sri Sai Bhagawathi
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the Supreme Teacher, Sai. The auspicious embodiment of all learning and wisdom (Saraswathi), consort of Lord Brahma (Creator aspect of the Trinity); The adept in the art of producing sweet melodies on the Veena (string instrument) and the bestower of all knowledge, who has the celestial swan as vehicle.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sahara Do Bhagawan
Mujhey Daya Karo Mujhey Krupa Karo
Sanmati Do Bhagawan |Sahara Do...|
Sada Saath Raho Hey Bhagawan
Sada Raksha Karo Hey Bhagawan
Shanthi Bhakthi Prem Do Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord! Be my companion in this life. Have mercy and shower Your grace on me. Bless me with wisdom. Please be with me always and always protect me. I pray to Thee to grant me peace, devotion and love.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai (Baba) Sathya Palana
Hey Shirdi Puri Vasa Sai Sarvesha
Hey Shirdi Puri Vasa Hey Parthi Puri Vasa Sarvesha Sathya Palana |Sai Sathya...|
Akhila Nivasa Jaya Hrishikesha
Mangala Kara Hey Pavana Purusha |Hey Shirdi Puri|
Hey Shirdi Puri Vasa Hey Parthi Puri Vasa Sarvesha Sathya Palana
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to You Oh Lord Sai Baba who is the Embodiment of Truth. Glory to You Oh Lord of Shirdi, Oh Lord of Parthi Who is the Embodiment and Protector of Truth Glory to You Lord who is Omnipresent and Who bestows upon all of us your Grace Glory to You Oh Lord of Shirdi, Oh Lord of Parthi Who is the Embodiment and Protector of Truth

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Aao Merey Bhagawan
Mujhey Darshan Do Bhagawan
Bhava Paar Karo Bhagawan
Merey Aawaz Suno Sai Ram |Aao Aao|
Asatoma Sadgamaya
Tamasoma Jyothirgamaya
Mruthyorma Amruthangamaya
Bhava Paar Karo Bhagawan |Merey Aawaz...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Beloved Sai Bhagawan, please come and give Your Darshan. Help me cross this ocean of life's miseries. Hear my pleas, Oh Sai Ram. Lead me from Untruth to truth, from darkness to light, from death to immortality. Help me overcome this cycle of life and death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Avatara Yuga Avatara
Deena Dayala Sankata Haara |Sai Avatara...|
Sai Brahma Sai Vishnu
Sai Maheshwara |Sai Avatara...|
Sathya Sai Prema Sai
Sab Dharmon Ke Baba Sai
Sai Parameshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Supreme Lord Sai! Oh Incarnation of this Kali Age! You are the protector of the meek, the remover of danger.You are Brahma (Creator), Vishnu (Sustainer) and Maheswara (Destroyer of evil) and the beloved Sai of devotees. Chant the name of the Lord of Lords, Lord Sathya Sai, Prema Sai, who loves all true religions.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Baba Geeta Sudha Madhuram Madhuram Anandam (3)
Shirdi (Parthi) Baba Geeta Sudha Madhuram Madhuram Anandam
Devotional Song Meaning: The nectarine words of wisdom and the melodies that flow from Lord Sai Baba confer infinite supreme bliss. Sai Baba is the song which is sweet & gives bliss. Lord of Parthi is the song which is sweet & gives bliss. Lord of Shirdi is the song which is sweet & gives bliss

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Baba Pranam
Shirdi Baba Pranam
O Merey Atma Ram
Lelo Merey Pranam
Eshwar Allah Ram
Sab Ke Ghar Sai Ram
Pooran Karo Merey Kaam
Hey Parama Shanthi Priya Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Kindly accept my offering of salutations, Oh resident of my heart, Lord Shirdi Baba, Sai Baba! Chant the name of Eshwar, Allah and Ram. Sai Belongs to all. Please bless me for successful completion of all my works. Oh Lord you love eternal peace.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Baba Sakala Bhuvana ke Daata (3)
Roopa Manohara Kamala Kantha
Yuga Avatar Sai Baba Daya Karo Parthi Baba
Shirdi Parthi Hrudaya Nivasi
Prashanthi Sundara Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Baba, who is the Protector of the universe. Glory to Lord Sai, whose Form is bewitchingly beautiful and soft like that of a Lotus. Glory to you, Avatar of this Age, shower Your Mercy, who is the Avatar of Shirdi and we pray to you to enshrine Yourself in Our Hearts, Oh Lord Prashanthi Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Baba Tera Naam Sathya Sai Baba Tera Naam
Tu Hi Brahma Tu Hi Vishnu
Tu Hi Nanak Tu Hi Yesu
Tu Hi Buddha Tu Zohrashtra
Tu Hi Allah Tu Mahaveer
Sab Hey Sai Bhagawaan (2)
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Baba Tera Naam
Allah Sai Tera Naam Maulah Sai Tera Naam
Yesu Sai Tera Naam Buddha Sai Tera Naam
Sai Baba Tera Naam Sai Rama Tera Naam
Devotional Song Meaning: You are called Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba! You are Brahma (Creator) and Vishnu (Sustainer). You are Guru Nanak, Jesus Christ, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Allah and Mahaveer. All are Sai Bhagawan Your name is Sai Baba Your Name is Allah Sai & Maulah Sai Your name is Jesus Sai & Buddha Sai Your name is Sai Baba, Sai Ram

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Bhavani Sai Bhavani Sai Bhavani Ma (2)
Shankari Abhayankari Jai Sai Bhavani Ma
Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Jai Bhavani Sai Bhavani Ma
Gayathri Shiva Gowri Maheshwari Sai Bhavani Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory and salutations to the auspiciousness Mother Sai, who is the destroyer of the bondage of life and death and the remover of fear. Victory to the Mother as Durga, Lakshmi, Saraswathi and Gayathri. Glory to Mother Sai Bhavani, who bestows goodness and who protects us. Glory to Godess Gayathri, Gowri and Maheshwari (Parvati), who is the consort of Lord Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Charan Sukha Daayi Man
Sai Bina Jeena Kya Hai (2) |Sai Charan...|
Mata Bhi Tu Pitha Bhi Tu
Aao Bhagawan Deejo Darshan
Basjao Sai Man Mandir Mey |Terey (Sai) Bina|
Devotional Song Meaning: Know Oh Mind, there is no greater peace and bliss than when you surrender at the feet of Sai. What is life without you, Oh Sai? Sai - You are our Mother and our Father! Please bestow us your Darshan and Install Yourself in our Hearts, for what is life without you?

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Darbar Mey Aao Gao
Keertana Karoon Main Sai Ke (San)
Peetambara Dhara Nayana Manohara
Sai Sab Ka Prana Sakha
Charan Kamal Mey Sharan Pado Tum |Keertana Karoon|
Devotional Song Meaning: Welcome to the assembly of devotees and sing His name, in the Divine presence of Lord Sai. The thirst of the gathered devotees is quenched by the singing of devotional songs in praise of the Lord. He is enthralling to our eyes, wearing a yellow costume. We fall at your feet and take refuge at the Lotus Feet of our Sai, who is the dearest of all friends.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Dayalu Sai Dayalu
Parthi Pureesha Sai Dayalu
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Parama Dayalu
Palita Dwarakamayi Dayalu
Murali Gaana Vilola Dayalu
Maya Manusha Vesha Dayalu
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai the compassionate one, who is the Lord of Parthi. The Protector of Devotees - the most compassionate one, who is also the Lord of Dwarakamayi (Shirdi). The Compassionate One who plays the sweet music on the flute (Murali). The Compassionate One, who has come down to earth in this deluding Human Form.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Deva Sathya Swaroopa Tum Ho Merey Baba
O Merey Sai Baba
Sab Dharmon Ke Daata
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Sharanam Sharanam Deva (Hey)
Eshwar Hi Tum Allah Ho Tum Mahaveer Nanak Tum Ho
Sab Hi Tum Ho Deva Merey Sai Baba |O Merey| |Parthi Vasa|
Devotional Song Meaning: You are my Baba, O God, the embodiment of Truth. You are the Origin of all religions. I surrender to You, Sai Deva, the Lord of Parthi. You are Eshwar, Allah, Nanak and Mahaveer. You are in all, All are in You, my dear Sai Baba.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Deva Sri Ganesha
Vande Vighna Vinasha
Parvathi Nandana Parthi Pureesha
Hey Shiva Nandana Jaya Sayeesha (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai who is verily Sri Ganesha himself. We salute you Oh Lord, who removes all obstacles from our path. We salute you Oh Lord, the beloved child of Goddess Parvathi. We salute you Oh Lord, the darling son Lord Shiva.Victory to you, Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Giridhari Gopala
Krishna Murari Gopala |Sai Giridhari...|
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Gopala
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Gopala the One who lifted the mountain to protect His devotees. He is Krishna, the slayer of demon Mura. The One who is the protector of His devotees. Our salutations, Oh Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Govinda Sai Gopala
Terey Bina Sai Sab Hai Andhera |Sai Govinda...|
Lelo Mujhey Sai Sharan Tumharey
Deejo Merey Sai Darsha Tumharey
Aao Merey Sai Man Mandir Mey (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Govinda! Oh Lord Sai Gopala! Without Thee, there is no one to lead us to the light (of wisdom) and to remove the darkness (of ignorance). Oh Lord Sai Govinda! I pray to Thee to kindly accept me at Your Lotus feet. Oh Lord Sai Gopala! Kindly install Thyself in the temple of my mind and heart.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Guna Gao Sai Naam Gao
Ananda Ananda Sai Naam Hey |Sai Guna|
Naman Japan Karoon Sai Naam Ke
Shravan Smaran Karoon Sai Naam Ke
Sai Om Sai Om Bhajo Rey Sada
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Man, Sing the Name of the Lord and His Virtues. The name of Sai confers infinite bliss. Chant and contemplate on this name. Hear and meditate on the Sai name. Sing about the name of Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Guru Deva Janardhana
Anantha Shayana Narayana
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Madhusudhana
Mangala Pavana Sai Guru Charana |Anantha Shayana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Sai, or Lord Krishna (Janardhana) is the Divine Preceptor, Who is reclining on the serpent coil as Narayana. Oh Slayer of the demon Madhu! You are the destroyer of the cycle of birth and death. Praise to the Lord Sai who is our Guru, we bow at His Feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Hai Jeevan Jeevan Sathya Sai
Sai Mera Jeevan Sahara |Sai Hai...|
Terey Bina Sai Sab Hai Andhera
Paar Karo Merey Jeevan Naiya
Sharan Lagalo Mujhey Sai Kanhaiya
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai! You are my life. Sai is the constant companion and support in my life. Without Thee there is darkness (ignorance) in my life. Kindly help me to cross the ocean of life and death. O Lord Sai Krishna! Accept me at Your Lotus Feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Hamara Hum Sai Ke Aisa Prema Hamara
Sai Ram Hamara Sai Ram Hamara
Sathya Sai Hai Naama Tumhara Shirdi Sai Avatara |Sai Ram|
Hindu Muslim Sikh Isai Sab Ka Palanhaara |Sai Ram|
Devotional Song Meaning: O Lord Sai, We belong to You and You are verily Ours; This is the loving relationship that we share; Glory to you, O Lord Sai Ram, He is ours, He is ours Praise be to Lord Sathya Sai who is the Avatar of Shirdi Sai Praise be to Lord Sathya Sai who is the nourisher and protector of Hindus, Muslims, Sikhs and Christians.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Harey Bhajo Baba Harey
Allah Yesu Sai harey |Sai Harey...|
Nanak Sai Baba Harey
Buddha Mahaveera Sai Harey
Zohrashtra Bhajo Sai Baba Harey
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Sai Baba Sing the Glory of Lord Allah, Yesu and Guru Nanak Sing the Glory of Lord Buddha, Mahaveera and Zohrashtra Praise be to Lord Sai, who is the embodiment of all religions.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Harey Sai Harey
Sai Harey Sathya Sai harey
Baba Harey Baba Harey
Baba Harey Sai Baba Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Praise be to the Lord Sai and Baba who is verily our dear Sathya Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Jaganmohini Veshadhari
Sai Jagannataka Sutradhari
Jagadodharaka Sai (Sai)
Jaya Jaya Sai Murari (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Mother Sai Jaganmohini (enchanter of the worlds), with a delusive form, the one who controls us like the puppets in her hand, the one who is the liberator of all the worlds, Victory to You Oh Sai Murari

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Kanhaiya Sai Kanhaiya
Natawara Naagara Krishna Kanhaiya |Sai Kanhaiya|
Giridhara Naagara Gopi Kanhaiya
Yuga Avatara Sai Kanhaiya
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Kanhaiya (Krishna)Glory to the merry mischief maker Lord Krishna Kanhaiya Glory to Lord Kanhaiya who lifted the mountain Govardhana to protect his Gopis and Gopikas (cowherds) Glory to Lord Sai who is the very incarnation of Lord Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Kanhaiya Sai Kanhaiya
Natawara Naagara Krishna Kanhaiya |Sai Kanhaiya|
Giridhara Naagara Gopi Kanhaiya
Yuga Avatara Sai Kanhaiya
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Kanhaiya (Krishna)Glory to the merry mischief maker Lord Krishna Kanhaiya Glory to Lord Kanhaiya who lifted the mountain Govardhana to protect his Gopis and Gopikas (cowherds) Glory to Lord Sai who is the very incarnation of Lord Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Mahadeva (Sathya)
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Sai Baba Maheshwara Hey
Nirupama Guna Sadana Sai Neeraja Dala Nayana
Vibhuti Sundara Hey Sai Baba Maheshwara Hey
Devotional Song Meaning: Praise be to our Lord Sathya Sai, who is the very embodiment of Lord Mahadeva (Shiva). Praise be to our Lord Sai Baba - the Lord of Parthi, who is the embodiment of Lord Maheshwara (Shiva). He, who is of pristine virtues, adorned with Vibhuti and whose eyes are like the tender petals of the Lotus

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Mahadeva Sathya Sai Mahadeva (2)
Alakh Niranjan Abhaya Kalambhuja Sai Mahadeva |Sai Mahadeva...|
Nitya Niranjana Vibhuti Sundara Sai Mahadeva (2)
Hara Hara Shankara Shiva Shiva Shankara (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to You, Oh Lord Sai Mahadeva To the One who is spotless in His virtues and who is the protector of all beings To the One who is beautifully adorned with the Vibhuti (Sacred Ash) We offer our prayers to you O Lord Sai Mahadeva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Mahalakshmi Narayani
Ananda Roopini Abhaya Pradayini |Sai Mahalakshmi...|
Mangala Roopini Sowbhagya Daayini
Shiva Shakthi Roopini Narayani Sai Narayani
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the auspicious Mother Sai, who is the embodiment of bliss, who dispels darkness and fear. The one who is the very embodiment of auspiciousness and Provider of prosperity. Mother Sai is verily the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Mata Pitha Deena Bandhu Sakha
Terey Charano Mey Sai Mera Koti Pranam
Sai Mata Pitha Deena Bandhu Sakha |Terey Charano...|
Mujhey Shakthi Do Merey Sai Shiva
Mujhey Bhakthi Do Merey Sai Shiva
Mujhey Mukti Do Merey Sai Shiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai! You are the mother, father, kith, kin and friend of forlorn ones. A Million prostrations at Your Lotus Feet. O Lord Sai Shiva! Grant me strength, devotion and liberation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Mera Tu Hai Sahara
Shirdi Avatara Sai Parthi Puri Bhagawan
Deenon Ke Tum Prana Sakha Prabhu
Merey Sai Ram
Merey Sai Ram Baba Parthi Puri Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: My Sai is the support and sustenance of my life; Glory to You who is the Lord of Parthi, the re-incarnation of Shirdi Sai. Glory to You Oh Sai, who is the life-mate of the poor and the downtrodden. You are our very own Oh dearest Sai, the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Mukunda Mukharavinda
Madhura Manohara Mukharavinda |Sai Mukunda...|
Taambula Ranjita Mukharavinda
Manda Smitha Haasa Mukharavinda
Nitya Manohara Mukharavinda
Paramananda Mukharavinda
Satchidananda Mukharavinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the sweet name of Sai Mukunda, whose countenance is described as soft as that of a Lotus. The One whose lips are painted bright red from chewing the betel leaves. The One with the ever smiling visage. The One whose Countenance is filled with Bliss Divine. The One whose Countenance embodies Truth, Auspiciousness and Bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Murari Ghana Shyama
Brindavan ke Bansiwala Radha Manohara Sai Shyama |Sai Murari...|
Hey Chitha Chora Nanda Kishora
Sundara Shyama Sai Gopala
Brindavan Ke Krishna (Radha)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai who is compared to Lord Krishna The one who slayed the demon Mura and the one who is bewitchingly dark as the cloud Glory to Lord Sai, who is none other than Gopala who played in Brindavan and who fills the mind of Radha Glory to Lord Sai

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Naam Bolo Govinda Naam Bolo
Mahadeva Bolo Jai Panduranga Bolo |Sai Naam...|
Rama Krishna Bolo Hey Buddha Sai Bolo
Zohrashtra Mahaveera Yesu Sai Bolo
Allah Sai Bolo Maulah Sai Bolo
Prema Sai Shanthi Daayi Sathya Sai Bolo
Govinda Bolo Gopala Bolo (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the name of our Dear Lord Sai who is also Govinda Chant the name of Mahadeva and Panduranga Chant the name of Rama Krishna Buddha, Chant the name of Zohrashtra, Mahaveera and Yesu Chant the name of Allah and Maulah Sai Chant the name of our Dear Lord Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of Love and Peace

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Naam Bolo Sathya Sai Naam Bolo
Sai Madhava Sai Keshava Sri Hari Naam Bolo |Sai Naam...|
Allah Eshwar Eesa Masiha
Buddha Mahaveera Ram |Sai Madhava|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of our dear Lord Sathya Sai Chant the name of Sai Madhava Sai Keshava and Shri Hari (names of Lord Vishnu)Chant the Name of Allah, Eshwar, Yesu, Buddha and Mahaveer.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Naam Keertana Kali Yuga Sadhana
Jagadodharana Krishna Janardhana
Sai Murari Sri Madhusudhana
Mayura Mukutadhara Madhava Mohana
Neela Varna Ghana Natajana Palana
Natawara Naagara Nanda Sunandandana
Devotional Song Meaning: Singing the glory of Lord Sai is the penance of KaliyugaHe is Lord Krishna, redeemer of the universeHe is the one who slayed Mura and Madhu, the demonsThe enchanter with the peacock crown, The dark blue-hued one who rules our heartsThe mischievous darling son of Nanda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Naamamey Brahmanandamu Sai Charanamey Divyanandamu
Sathya Sai Roopamey Nayananandamu
Leela Vinodamey Sai Sankalpamu
Premanandamey Sai Sowmya Roopamu (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai - The chanting of that name confers on all of us supreme Joy, the Lotus Feet confer divine bliss, the vision of the very form of Sri Sathya Sai is blissful to the eyes that see Him He is determined to provide us joy with his miraculous loveHis subtle and graceful form bestows on us eternal Love and Joy.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Narayana Narayana
Sathya Narayana Narayana |Sai Narayana...|
Gaana Lola Prabhu Narayana
Deena Pala Jaya Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the merciful and omniscient Lord Sai Narayana, who rejoices when the divine glory is sung. Victory to Lord Narayana who is the protector of the meek.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana
Tribhuvana Vanditha Deva
Deena Natha Harey Harey Sai Natha Harey
Deena Natha Harey Sai Natha Harey
Deena Nath Sai Nath Sai Natha Harey
Deena Nath Deena Nath
Sai Nath (O) Sai Nath
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sathya Sai Narayana! The three worlds pay obeisance to Thee. Oh Lord Sai Nath! Oh Destroyer of sins and miseries! You are the Lord and Saviour of the dejected and miserable. Chant the Name of Lord Sai Narayana, Sathya Narayana who is worshipped by all the Gods across the three Worlds. Glory to Sai Nath who is the Lord and the protector of the poor and the downtrodden.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Natha Anatha Natha
Shambho Shankara Parthi Natha |Sai Natha...|
Chandrashekara Shambho Natha
Nandi Vahana Bhola Natha
Shambho Natha (2)
Parthi Natha (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Natha who is the Lord and Protector of Orphans Glory to Lord Parthi Natha who is also worshipped as Lord Shambho and Shankara (Shiva) Glory to the Lord who is worshipped as Lord Chandrashekara - the one who has adorned the crescent Moon on his crown of hair Glory to the Lord who is worshipped as Lord Nandivahana - the one whose vehicle is the Nandi (Divine Bull) and as Lord Bhola Nath (Lord of the meek and innocent)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Natha Bhagawan Sai Natha Bhagawan
Sathyam Shivam Sundaram Sai Natha Bhagawan |Sai Natha...|
Buddham Sharanam Gachchami
Dhammam Sharanam Gachchami
Sangham Sharanam Gachchami
Sayeesha Sharanam Gachchami (Sathya)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai , You are the Truth, Auspiciousness and Beauty, Oh Lord Sai.I take refuge in Buddha (the enlightened one). I take refuge in Dhamma (the ultimate Truth) I take refuge in Sangham (the holy community). To Lord God Sai, I surrender all!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Natha Deena Natha Brahma Roopa Sadguru
Nirakara Hey Akara Sathya Sai Sadguru |Sai Natha...|
Mata Pitha Sadguru Sakala Tum Hi Sadguru
Sakala Tum Hi Sadguru Sakala Tum Hi Sadguru
Omkaara Sadguru Nirvikara Sadguru
Nirvikara Sadguru Omkaara Sadguru
Devotional Song Meaning: Pranaams to you Oh Lord Sainatha, Supreme Guru, who is the Protector of the weak and the downtrodden, the very embodiment of BrahmanThe Formless that has taken Form as Lord SaiGlory to You Oh Lord Sai Sadguru who, is our Mother Father and our everything. Glory to you Oh Lord Sai, who is everything to us. Glory to You Oh Lord who, is present in the primordial sound Omkaara. Glory to You Oh Lord who, is also blemishless.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Natha Guru Brahma Nath Guru Sathya Sai Deva
Guru Deva Guru Deva
Pankaja Charanam Sharanam Sharanam
Sathya Sai Deva (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai Natha who is the divine Preceptor. Let us all surrender at His Lotus feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Natha Guru Govinda Sathya Sai Jaya Paramananda (3)
Om Guru Natha Jaya Guru Natha Sai Guru Natha (6)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Sai Natha who is also worshipped as Guru Govinda, who gives us eternal bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Natha Sharanam (Sathya)
Shiva Sai Nath Sharanam
Sharavana Bhava Guha Shanmukha Natha
Shiva Guru Raja Prashanthi Vasa
Pranava Kaara Gnana Prakasha
Devotional Song Meaning: Surrender to Lord Sathya Sai who resides in Prashanthi, who is also the Lord Shanmukha (Son of Shiva).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Om Sai Om Sai Om
Tan Man Pran Mey Sai Om |Sai Om...|
Shayan Sapana Mey Sai Om
Gagan Pavana Mey Sai Om |Shayana|
Nayan Nayana Mey Sai Om
Janam Marana Mey Sai Om
Devotional Song Meaning: The entire Universe is permeated with the sound of 'Sai Om' the primordial sound. 'Sai Om' is everywhere, it is in the body, in the conscience, in sleep, in dream, in the sky, ether and wind. Whatever and wherever, the eyes perceive, it is nothing but 'Sai Om'. It is from emergence to dissolution.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Paada Pooja Karo Hey Manuva
Sakala Paapa Bhava Bhaya Haranam |Sai Paada...|
Nataraja Paadam Sai Paadam
Brahma Sevitha Punya Paadam
Shyamala Komala Sai Paadam
Devotional Song Meaning: O Mind - Chant the Holy Name of Sai and offer it at His Lotus Feet. By chanting thus, redeem all your sins and fears across all births. His feet are those of Nataraja (Lord Shiva), they are the holy feet which were worshipped by Lord Brahma the creator and they are the feet which are soft and delicate.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Pitha Aur Mata Sai
Deena Dayala Daata Sai |Sai Pitha...|
Sai Guru Sai Sakha Sahodara
Sai Sathya Shiva Sai Sundara
Veda Upanishad Geeta Sai |Deena|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the Holy name of Sai who is our father and mother and who is the protector of the weak and downtrodden. HE is the preceptor, friend and sibling. HE is verily the Truth, the Goodness and the Beautiful. HE is the embodiment of Vedas, the Upanishads and the Geeta.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Prem Dey Shanthi Dey Ananda Dey Sai Prem Dey
Tum Ho Baba Daya Ke Sagar
Tum Ho Guna Mandira Nata Naagar
Adi Anantha Hey Sathya Sanathana
Alakh Niranjana Sai Janardhana
Satchidananda Prabho Krupa Karo
Prem Dey Shanthi Dey Anand Dey Sai Prem Dey (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai! We pray to thee to grant us peace, happiness and love. You are an ocean of grace and mercy. One who possesses all good and pure qualities. Your form is infinite, eternal truth, with no beginning or end. You are Beyond the perception of senses, always supremely pure, Oh Sai, uplifter of humanity, You are Satchidananda - Existence, Consciousness and Divine bliss. Shower your compassion on us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Raghurama
Sai Sundara Sai Manohara Sai Komala Ram |Sai...|
Ek Tum Hi Ho Sab Ke Eshwara
Patitha Pavana Patithodharana
Jaya Shirdeesha Jaya Partheesha
Man Mandir Mey Aao Sai Ram (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty, the enchanting and delicate one. You are the Lord for one and all and the uplifter of sinners. Victory to you Oh Lord of Shirdi and Parthi, come into the temple of my heart.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Raghuvara Merey Ram Sai Giridhara Merey Shyam
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Jagadeesha Srinivasa Partheesha Hrudaya Vasa
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to you Oh Lord Sai, you are my Rama (Raghuvara) and Krishna (Giridhara), Lord Shiva, Lord Srinivasa, Lord of Parthi and in dweller of my heart.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Ram Ghana Shyam Bhagawan Tumhara Naam
Tum Bina Koi Nahin Rakhwaley
Tum Bina Koi Nahin Apad Saharey
Tum Bina Prema Koi Nahin Denewaale
Tum Ho Merey Atma Ram Baba
Bhagawan (Sai Ram) Tumhara Naam
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai you are none other than Rama and Krishna. We do not have any one other than you to save us from all adversities, to give us unconditional love, Oh Lord Sai you are our Supreme in dweller.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram Shirdi Pureeshwara Ram
Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram Parthi Pureeshwara Ram |Sai Ram|
Allah Naam Hai Tera O Sai Baba
Sab Ka Malik Tum Ho O Sai Baba
Yesu Nanak Buddha Mahaveer Sab Hai Sai Ram
Sab Hai Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to you Oh Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi. You are the Lord of the entire humanity, you are Allah, Jesus, Nanak, Buddha and Mahaveer.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Gaayen Geet Sada Subah Aur Shyam
Har Ek Pal Mey Har Ek Kshan Mey
Bhajey Hum Sada Tero Naam |Gaayen Geet|
Koi Kahey Tujhey Janaki Rama
Koi Pukarey Radhey Shyama
Hamarey Liye Tum Sai Bhagawan |Gaayen Geet|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh dear Lord Sai Ram we sing forever your glory from dawn to dusk. We sing your glory with every breath, every second and forever Oh dear Lord Sai. Some call you Janaki Ram, some others prefer to call you Radhey Shyam, but you will remain as Sai Bhagawan for us. We sing forever your glory from dawn to dusk.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Gaayen Geet Sada Subah Aur Shyam
Har Ek Pal Mey Har Ek Kshan Mey
Bhajey Hum Sada Tero Naam |Gaayen Geet|
Koi Kahey Tujhey Janaki Rama
Koi Pukarey Radhey Shyama
Hamarey Liye Tum Sai Bhagawan |Gaayen Geet|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh dear Lord Sai Ram we sing forever your glory from dawn to dusk. We sing your glory with every breath, every second and forever Oh dear Lord Sai. Some call you Janaki Ram, some others prefer to call you Radhey Shyam, but you will remain as Sai Bhagawan for us. We sing forever your glory from dawn to dusk.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Bhajo
Sadguru Sai Ram Naama Bhajo
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Bhajo |Sai Ram Sai Ram|
Allah Malik Sai Ram Bhajo
Buddha Mahaveer Sai Ram Bhajo
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Sai Ram Bhajo |Sai Ram Sai Ram|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of SaiRam, the divine preceptor. He is none other than Allah, Buddha, Mahaveer and Jesus.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Ram Sai Shyam Merey Sai Ram
Merey Sai Merey Baba Merey Prana Natha Ram |Sai Ram...|
Terey Dwar Pey Main Avoon Mujhey Shanthi Do Bhagawan
Mujhey Shanthi Do Bhagawan
Merey Jeevana Mey Saath Raho Sai Natha Hey
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Rama, Sai Shyama, my dear Baba, I am standing at your door step, bestow me with peace Oh Lord, be with me all through my life, Oh Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Rama Bolo Sai Rama Bolo
Sita Vallabha Tulasi Rama Lakshmana Sevitha Rama |Sai Rama...|
Atmabhi Rama Ananda Rama
Ahalyodharaka Karunya Rama
Maruti Sevitha Hrudayanta Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Sai Rama who is the beloved of Sita and is served by Lakshmana and Hanuman, who is the in dweller of all and the most compassionate one who liberated Ahalya from a curse.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Sai Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey (3) Raghupathi Raghava Rama Harey Rajeeva Lochana Rama Harey Sai Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Lord Sai Rama residing in Parthi, with your beautiful Lotus shaped eyes, you are the noblest of the Raghu Dynasty.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
Dasharatha Nandana Sri Raghu Rama |Sai Rama...|
Parthi Pureeshwara Pavana Naama
Pavana Naama Pavana Naama |Parthi Pureeshwara|
Sharanam Sharanam Hey Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Sai Rama the son of King Dasharatha and the scion of the Raghu dynasty. Glory to you Oh Lord of Parthi whose name is the most sacred one. We surrender ourselves to you Oh Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
Dasharatha Nandana Sri Raghu Rama |Sai Rama...|
Parthi Pureeshwara Pavana Naama
Pavana Naama Pavana Naama |Parthi Pureeshwara|
Sharanam Sharanam Hey Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Sai Rama the son of King Dasharatha and the scion of the Raghu dynasty. Glory to you Oh Lord of Parthi whose name is the most sacred one. We surrender ourselves to you Oh Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Rama Jagadeeshwara
Sarvabhowma Sarveshwara |Sai Rama...|
Aganita Guna Gana Akhileshwara
Sakala Jana Priya Sarveshwara
Shambho Mahadeva Shiva Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Rama, you are the greatest of the Emperors and Lord of the Universe, full of virtues, adored by the entire humanity, Oh Lord you are none other than the Lord Shankara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Rama Namo Namo
Sai Krishna Namo Namo
Shirdi Nivasa Namo Namo
Parthi Nivasa Namo Namo
Jagadodhara Namo Namo
Pranavakara Namo Namo
Shanthakara Namo Namo
Sakshathkara Namo Namo (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Sai Rama, Sai Krishna, the one residing in Shirdi and in Parthi, the one who is the upholder of this Universe, the one who is the personification of the Primordial sound "OM", the one who is always at Peace and who can appear before the devotee at will.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Rama Raghurama
Raja Rama Ghana Shyama |Sai Rama...|
Rama Rama Pavana Dhama
Karuna Sindhu Sathya Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty, your name is the most sacred one, you are the most compassionate one, Oh Sathya Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Rama Sai Rama Sai Rama Bhajo
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sita Rama Bhajo
Sai Ram Ram Sai Ram Ram Sai Rama Bhajo
Sai Ram Ram Ram Sai Ram Ram Ram Sai Rama Bhajo
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyama Bhajo
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Sai Rama and Sita Rama. Sing the Glory of Lord Sai Rama and Radhey Shyam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Sai Sathya Sai Humney Pukara
Tum Bina Nahin Mujhey Koi Sahara |Sai Sai...|
Dukhiyon Ke Tum Dil Ka Pyaara
Garibon Ke Tum Aankhon Ke Taara
Merey liye Tum Ek Sahara
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, I called you Sathya Sai, You are the support for the needy, downtrodden and helpless and you are my only support Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Sai Sayanarey Sarvam Brahmam Mayamanarey
Baba Baba Babanarey Bhakthito Bhajana Lo Palgonarey
Rama Rama Ramanarey Raakshasa Gunamulu Pommanarey
Krishna Krishna Krishnanarey Kashtamulanu Poguttunurey
Hari Hari Hari Hari Hari Anarey Atma Ramuni Madigonarey
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Anarey Shiva Keshavulanu Samamanarey
Devotional Song Meaning: This Bhajan describes the impact of chanting the names of Lord Sai and His other Forms. It says; Chant Sai 's name and realise that the universe is Brahman (The ultimate and unchanging reality), Chant the name of Baba and participate in Bhajans with devotion, Chant the name of Krishna and it will eliminate your troubles; Chant the name of Hari and find the in dweller in youChant the name of Shiva and realise that Shiva and Keshava (Krishna) are one and the same.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Sai Smarana Karo
Guru Charana Kamala Dhyana Karo |Sai Sai...|
Keshava Madhava Bhajana Karo
Sadguru Sai Seva Karo (Sri)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai, meditate upon His Lotus Feet, sing the glory of Keshava, Madhava (Names of Lord Krishna), serve the divine preceptor Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Saraswathi Kalavathi (Sathya)
Sakala Shastra Vikasini |Sai Saraswathi|
Bhaava Raga Laya Tala Vinodini (3)
Parthi Nivasini Bharati Brahmani
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Sai who is residing in Parthi is none other than Goddess Saraswathi, the one who is personification of all types of Arts and the one who enjoys the Art of Music.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Saraswathi Namo Namo
Devi Bhagawathi Namo Namo
Veena Vani Vishwa Kalyani
Veda Kalamayi Gnana Swaroopini |Sai Saraswathi...|
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Pradayini
Saama Gaana Priya Prashanthi Nilayey
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Sai Saraswathi (also known as Devi Bhagawathi) residing in Prashanthi Nilayam, the one who holds Veena and looks after the welfare of the Universe, who is mother of Vedas and music, the one who bestows Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love and the one who is delighted to sing Saama Vedam (One of the four Vedas).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Shankara
Narayana Bhagawan
Tum Ho Merey Pran (Baba) (2)
Deejo Merey Prabhu Shanthi Mukti
Sikhao Prabhu Mujhey Prem Aur Bhakthi
Shirdi Roopa Baba (Parthi Pureeshwara) Hey Bhagawan |Tum Ho|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai of Parthi and Shirdi, you are Lord Shankara and Lord Narayana, you are my life. Oh Lord bestow me with Peace and Liberation and teach me Love and Devotion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Shankara Bholey Shankara
Sathya Narayana Narayanam
Damaru Boley Dama Dama Dam
Dhimi Dhimi Dhimi Dhimi Boley Mrudangam
Veena Boley Narayanam |Sathya Narayana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Sai Shankara, Sathya Narayana you are none other than Lord Shiva whose Damaru (miniature hand held Drum), the Mrudangam (a Percussion instrument)and the Veena chant your name.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Shankara Parthi Pureeshwara
Ganga Jatadhara Shashidhara Phanidhara |Sai Shankara...|
Phaala Netradhara Kalakoota Hara
Bhasmodbhavakara Bhavani Shankara
Sayeeshwara Hara Parthi Maheshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Sayeeshwara of Parthi is none other than Lord Shiva whose attributes are described as, the one supporting the sacred river Ganges in His matted hair, adorning the Crescent moon on His head, adorning the serpent as a necklace, having a third eye in the forehead and smeared with ash all over the body.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Shankara Shambho Shankara
Natana Manohara Jaya Abhayankara
Chandra Kaladhara Gowri Shankara
Parama Daya Ghana Sai Shankara
Eshwaramba Nandana Parthi Shankara
Paramananda Prabhu Parameshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Lord Sai of Parthi, the Son of Eshwaramma, you are none other than Lord Shankara who is fond of dance, who bestows victory, who wears the crescent shaped moon on the head, the consort of Gowri (Parvathi), you arethe most compassionate and always in a bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Shyam Sai Shyam Sai Gopala
Jaya Madhava Jaya Keshava Jaya Murali Gaana Lola |Sai Shyam...|
Pandari Natha Panduranga
Parthi Nivasa Sai Deva |Jaya Madhava|
Devotional Song Meaning: This bhajan is in praise of Lord Sai Krishna whose abode is Parthi, who is also known as Shyam, Gopala, Madhava, Keshava and Panduranga.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Sri Sai Sath Chitha Sai
Sath Chitha Sai Bhujagendra Sai
Bhujagendra Sai Vatapathra Sai
Vatapathra Sai Sri Ranga Sai
Sri Ranga Sai Namata Namami
Devotional Song Meaning: This bhajan praises the attributes of Lord Sri Ranganatha (another Form of Lord vishnu) who is reclining on the Celestial Snake Adi Sesha, who is none other than Lord Krishna resting on Ficus Leaf. (Vatapatra Sai the child Krishna floating on ficus leaf in Hinduism is a symbolic representation of the first form of life on earth.)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Sundara Sundara
Vyagrambaradhara Harey Hari Hara |Sai Sundara...|
Anantha Guna Mandira Sundara
Natana Sundara Bhuvana Sundara
Devotional Song Meaning: This bhajan praises Lord Sai as the most beautiful in the world, who is none other than Lord Shiva adorning tiger skin, who is highest in virtues and the most charming Cosmic dancer.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Terey Charano Mey Koti Pranam
Daya Karo Merey Atma Rama
Sai Ram Hey Ghana Shyama
Jagadodhara Sri Sai Rama |Daya Karo|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, I offer million salutations at your Lotus feet. Please show mercy oh my Lord Rama, Sai Rama, Lord Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Terey Charano Mey Koti Pranam
Daya Karo Merey Atma Rama
Sai Ram Hey Ghana Shyama
Jagadodhara Sri Sai Rama |Daya Karo|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, I offer million salutations at your Lotus feet. Please show mercy oh my Lord Rama, Sai Rama, Lord Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sai Tero Naam Tero Naam
Janam Janam Mey Gaoon (2)
Charan Tumharey Sadguru Sai
Apne Hrudaya Basaoon
Shirdi Sai Parthi Sai
Prema Sai Guna Gaoon |Janam|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, I will sing your name in all my several lives, I will install your feet in my heart and continue to sing the glory of Shirdi Sai, Parthi Sai and Prema Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sakshath Parabrahma Sai Guru Vandana Sathya Sai
Guru Pada Ranjana Guru Paramesha
Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Mahesha
Sadguru Sai Parthi Pureesha
Charana Namostuthey Sai Mahesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Our salutations at your divine Lotus feet Oh Lord Sai. You are our divine preceptor, the Supreme God, , you are the unified form of the Trinity (Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Salaam Valekum Salaam Valekum Salaam Valekum Salaam
Allah Ho Allah ho Allah Ho Akbar |Salaam Valekum...|
Buddha Zohrashtra Yesu Mahaveer
Nanak Ji ki Jai Jaikar Ho
Devotional Song Meaning: God is great, peace be upon you. Victory to Buddha, Zohrashtra, Yesu, Mahaveer and Nanak.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Samba Sadashiva Sai Prabho
Shambho Mahadeva Dehi Vibho
Jaya Ganga Jatadhari Gowri Pathey
Sathya Sai Mahadeva Parthi Pathey
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sathya Sai of Parthi, you are Lord Shiva, we seek your protection, Oh Lord who supports sacred river Ganga in your matted hair.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Samba Sadashiva Samba Sadashiva
Samba Sadashiva Sai Shiva
Parthi Pureesha Hey Paramesha
Patitha Janavana Pavana Charitha
Parvathi Ramana Parama Dayala
Parvatha Raja Kumari Ramana
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Lord Samba Sadashiva, who is also the Lord of Parthi, the protector of the weak and downtrodden, the consort of Goddess Parvathi and the most merciful one.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Samba Sadashiva Sayeeshwara
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva |Samba...|
Narthana Sundara Natana Manohara
Natya Priyakara Nataneshwara (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sayeeshwara you are none other than Lord Shiva also called by other names like Gangadhara, Gowri shiva and Nataneshwara who performs the beautiful Cosmic dance.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Samba Vinodini Shiva Sai Shankari
Mangala Gowri Mata Maheshwari |Samba Vinodini|
Akhilandeshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Daya Sagari Parama Krupa Kari
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the most compassionate mother Parvathi the Consort of Lord Shiva, also known by names like Samba Vinodini, Shankari, Gowri, Maheshwari, Akhilandeswari, Raja Rajeshwari etc.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sambhava Shiva Shambho Shambho
Narthana Nataraja Nataraja |Sambhava Shiva...|
Mruthyunjaya Mahesha Mahesha
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Paramesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva who is the Cosmic dancer Nataraja, who is also known as Mruthyunjaya (Conqueror of death). He is none other than Lord Sai residing in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sambhavi Shankari Namo Namo
Shantha Swaroopini Namo Namo
Sai Maheshwari Namo Namo (Sathya)
Namo Namo Namo Namo (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Mother Sambhavi Shankari (Goddess Parvathi), who is embodiment of peace, who is none other than mother Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sanathana Sarathey Sayeesha
Sarvottama Guna Nidhey Paramesha
Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Ram
Suramuni Vanditha Sadhu Jana Poshita
Sarva Janashraya Sayeesha
Sadguru Deva Satchidananda
Sashtanga Sharanam Mama Guru Deva |Ram Sai Ram|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations at your Divine Lotus feet Oh Lord Sai, you are the upholder of the "Eternal Laws" (Sanathana Dharma), the one who is the embodiment of all virtues, the one who is worshipped by sages and noble ones and the one whom the entire humanity worships.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sangeeta Rasike Sharade (Amba)
Sadananda Roopini Saraswathi |Sangeeta Rasike...|
Bhaava Raga Laya Gaana Viloley
Bhaktha Kalpalatikey Vidya Pathey
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother Saraswathi, you are passionate about music, you are eternally in bliss, you are the indomitable support for all your devotees and you bestow knowledge to all.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sankata Harana Govinda
Pankaja Charana Govinda
Sathya Sai Deva Govinda
Saptagiri Vasa Govinda
Govinda Hari (Sai) Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to you Oh Lord Govinda who resides in the seven hills and has now incarnated as Lord Sathya Sai, who is the remover of all obstacles. We offer ourselves at your tender lotus feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sankata Harana Govinda
Pankaja Charana Govinda
Sathya Sai Deva Govinda
Saptagiri Vasa Govinda
Govinda Hari (Sai) Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to you Oh Lord Govinda who resides in the seven hills and has now incarnated as Lord Sathya Sai, who is the remover of all obstacles. We offer ourselves at your tender lotus feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sankata Harana Sri Sai Ramana
Pankaja Charana Namo Namo
Vedodharana Venkata Ramana
Lakshmi (Sai) Narayana Namo Namo
Namo Namo Namo Namo |Pankaja Charana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai (who is also the Lord Srinivasa of Tirupati), the one with feet soft like Lotus, the one who is the upholder of Vedas and who is the Consort of Lakshmi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sapney Mey Aao Shyama Murari
Savari Surat Muralidhari |Sapney Mey...|
Sab Ke Sajan Prabhu Giridhari
Sadguru Sai Parthi Vihari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh dark complexioned Lord Krishna I invite you to come in my dreams. Oh Lord Sai who strolls in Parthi, you are every one's companion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Saraswathi Devi Saraswathi
Vani Veena Saraswathi
Brahma Sanathani Brahmamayi
Veda Swaroopini Vedamayi
Vaagdevi Vageshwari
Vaagvilasini Saraswathi
Devotional Song Meaning: Our humble Salutations to mother Saraswathi who is the embodiment of Sound, Speech and Music, who is the eternal one, who is the embodiment of all Vedas.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Priya Deva
Sathya Sai Deva
Allah Yesu Buddha Aur Nanak
Zohrashtra Mahaveera Tum Ho
Rama Hi Tum Ho Krishna Hi Tum Ho
Vishwa Roopa Tum Ho (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Sathya Sai who fosters all faiths and religions. HE is verily the embodiment of Allah, Christ, Buddha, Nanak, Zohrashtra, Mahaveera, Ram and Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Deva
Sai Deva Deva Deva |Sarva Dharma...|
Allah Yesu Guru Grantha Govinda
Maulah Sai Mahaveera Madhava
Zohrashtra Buddha Sai Shankara |Sai Deva|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who is the embodiment of all religions and faiths. HE is none other than Allah, Jesus, Nanak, Mahaveer, Krishna, Buddha and Zohrashtra.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Deva
Sai Deva Deva Deva |Sarva Dharma...|
Allah Yesu Guru Grantha Govinda
Maulah Sai Mahaveera Madhava
Zohrashtra Buddha Sai Shankara |Sai Deva|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who is the embodiment of all religions and faiths. HE is none other than Allah, Jesus, Nanak, Mahaveer, Krishna, Buddha and Zohrashtra.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Shankara
Sarva Dharma Sevitha Shankara
Sarva Jana Poojita Shankara
Sarva Loka Nayaka Shankara
Sarva Paapa Kshayakara Shankara
Sadananda Dayaka Shankara
Shankara Sai Shankara (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: In this Bhajan Lord Shiva also known as Shankara (Sai Shankara) is extolled with attributes like, the one who encompasses all religions, the one who is adored by all, the one who is the Lord of the Universe, the one who destroys all sins and the one who is always in bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Roopa Parama Gatheesha
Maha Shakthi Hey Mahaan Teja
Vishwadhara Poorana Brahma Sathya Sayeesha
Prema Roopa dhara Kali Avatara Sai Mahesha
Shirdi Sai Mahesha Sathya Sai Mahesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of all religions who is extolled as the most effulgent, powerful, personification of Love and the incarnation of this Kali age

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Swaroopa Sai
Shirdi Ke (Parthi Ke) Avatara
Merey Baba Merey Sai
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Hindu Muslim Isai Aatey Hai Terey Dwarey
Milte Hai Terey Dwarey |Sai Ram Sai Ram|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Shirdi (Parthi) Sai who is the embodiment of all Religions and Faiths who draws all to HIS door step.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sarva Mangala Sai Janani
Parthi Nivasini Parama Shivani |Sarva Mangala...|
Mata Maheshwari Durga Bhavani
Adi Parashakthi Sai Narayani
Jagadodharini Bhava Bhaya Harini
Devotional Song Meaning: This Bhajan praises Mother Sai residing in Parthi, who is none other than Goddess Durga (with other names like Shivani, Maheshwari, ParaShakthi, all depicting the Consort of Shiva) as the most auspicious one and the one who destroys the fears of this materialistic world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sarva NaamaSwaroopam Sai Baba
Sarva Hrudaya Nivasam Sai Baba |SarvaNaama...|
Sarva Daivatva Swaroopam Sai Baba
Sarva Dharma Virajam Sai Baba
Om Brahma Sanathana Sai Baba
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, you are the personification of all Names (of Gods), you live in every one's hearts, you are the reflection of all pervading divinity, you are pure and Symbolise all faiths. Oh Lord Sai you are eternal supreme conscience.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sarvatra Govinda Naama Sankeertana Govinda Hari Govinda
Govinda Hari Govinda Hari Govinda Hari Govinda
Purana Purusha Govinda Hari Punya Shloka Govinda
Bhaktha Vatsala Govinda Hari Bhaagavatha Priya Govinda
Krishna Rama Govinda Hari Rama Krishna Govinda
Sai Rama Govinda Hari Sai Krishna Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: This Bhajan on Lord Srinivasa, (who is none other than Sai Rama and Sai Krishna) extols HIS virtues and attributes. He is praised as the Purana Purusha (means Krishna, the original Personality of Godhood), Bhaktha Vatsala (always affectionate to devotees), Bhagawatha Priya (dear and intimate to great devotees).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Satchidananda Paramananda
Devaki Nanda Mukunda Radhey Govinda (Vasu)
Anatha Natha Deena Natha
Prashanthi Vasa Shanthi Pradatha
Sai Ananda Mukunda Radhey Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who resides in Prashanthi Nilayam, who is none other than the son of Devaki and the beloved of Radha, the saviour of needy and downtrodden.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sath Guru Dev Raaha Dikhao Prabhu
Raaha Dikhao Sai Deva |Sath Guru...|
Tum Ho Merey Prana Daata
Tum Ho Merey Bhagya Daata
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, our divine preceptor, show us the path to liberation, you are our life giver as well as the one who bestows all prosperity.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sab Ko Deejo
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Swaroopa Aap Hai
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Jeevan Ka Marm Hai
Guru Dev Guru Dev (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, our divine preceptor, you are the personification of Truth, Peace, Love and Harmony, which are the foundations of this human life.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Swaroopa Prashanthi Nilaya Deva
Rama Ho Krishna Ho Sai Ram Deva
Shiva Shakthi Swaroopa Baba Hey Deena Palana Baba
Hey Prashanthi Nilaya Baba Hey Poornavatara Baba
Allah Ho Maulah Ho Sai Ram Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the Lord of Prashanthi who is the embodiment of Truth, Peace, Love and Harmony, Oh Lord Sai you are none other than Rama, Krishna, Shiva, Shakthi, Allah and Moula, who offers solace to the weak and the downtrodden.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sathya Manohari Sai Maheshwari
Brindavana Sanchari (Amba)
Characharamayi Sarva Shubha Kari
Yuga Yuga Avatari (Amba)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to mother Sai Maheshwari who is ever enchanting and the embodiment of Truth and Wisdom, the one who is eternal and confers HER grace and auspiciousness upon one and all and SHE is the one who is present across all times and ages..

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sathya Narayana Govinda Madhava Sai Narayana Govinda Keshava (3)
Harey Rama Harey Rama Harey Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Harey Harey
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sathya Narayana, also known as Govinda, Madhava, Narayana, Keshava, Rama and Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sathya Narayani Shantha Swaroopini
Mangala Vadani Malini
Maya Vilasini Maha Kamini
Mahishasura Mardhini Harini
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to you Oh mother Sathya Narayani who is the embodiment of eternal bliss and peace whose countenance is so enchanting and soft like a creeper and emanates radiance and auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Naamam Pavana Naamam
Munijana Sevitha Mohana Naamam |Sathya Sai|
Parama Punitham Mangala Naamam
Sundara Naamam Sumadhura Naamam
Tana Mana Ranjana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Dayaka Naamam
Devotional Song Meaning: The name of Lord Sathya Sai is Holy, the beautiful name which the sages worshipped, the most auspicious and nectarine name, the name that exhilarates the body and mind, the name which destroys the fears of the materialistic world and the one name which bestows, Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Paadambujam Bhajorey Manasa Nirantaram
Parama Pavitram Pavana Charanam
Kalimala Dahanam Sri Guru Charanam
Bhava Bhaya Nashana Duritha Nivarana
Parthi Pureeshwara Pankaja Charanam
Bhajorey Manasa Nirantaram
Bhajorey Manasa Nirantaram (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Meditate incessantly upon the most holy and auspicious Lotus Feet of Lord Sathya Sai, the feet of the divine preceptor which will eradicate the sins of this Kali age, the feet which will destroy all the fears of this materialistic world and remove the obstacles.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
Prema Sudha Baraso Shanthi Sudha Baraso |Sathya Sai...|
Kali Yuga Mey Tum Yuga Avatari
Sathya Sai Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sathya Sai the most venerable one, shower on us your immense Love and bestow Peace upon us, Oh Lord of this Kali age.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Rama Shiva Shakthi Roopa
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Poorna Teja
Eshwaramba Nandana Sathya Narayana
Yuga Avatara Devadi Deva
Jaya Paramesha Parthi Pureesha
Hrudayeshwara Sayeeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai residing in Parthi and in the hearts of devotees, you are none other than Sathya Sai Rama, Oh Lord you are the personification of Shiva and Shakthi and the son of Eshwaramba Oh Lord Sathyanarayana, you are the incarnation of the Kali Age Oh Lord of Lords, Victory to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Shiva Shambho Shankara
Neelakanta Sai Tejonmaya Roopa
Sadguru Satchidananda
Gowri Vara Hara Mruthyunjaya Shiva
Sathya Sanathana Mangala Dayaka
Sadguru Satchidananda
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sathya Sai, you are Lord Shiva (Also called, Shambho, Shankara, Neelakanta) and the personification of radiant effulgence. You bestow auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Smaranam Smaranam Parthi Sai Smaranam
Tribhuvana Palaka Sai Mahesha Sathya Sai Smaranam
Sri Guru Charanam Bhava Dukha Haranam
Sathya Sai Smaranam Smaranam
Sathya Sai Smaranam
Devotional Song Meaning: Constantly remember the name of Sathya Sai - the Lord of Parthi, the one who sustains all three worlds, chant the name of Sai Mahesha the one who removes all fears and sorrows of this materialistic world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sathya Sanathana Nitya Niranjana Bhaktha Parayana Narayana
Govinda Govinda Narayana (2)
Narayana Sai Narayana
Parthi Purandara Narayana |Govinda Govinda|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai Narayana you are the in dweller of your devotees who chant your name at all times, you are personification of Truth and Purity.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sathya Swaroopini Ma Sai Prema Swaroopini Ma
Ananda Dayini Hrudaya Viharini Parthi Nivasini Ma (Param)
Vighna Vinashini Bhava Bhaya Harini Kaali Kapalini Ma
Hey Tribhuvana Dharini Mangala Karini Moksha Pradayini Ma |Ananda|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Mother Sai - the embodiment of Truth and Bliss, the one who showers Joy, the one who is present in every one's heart, the one who removes all obstacles, fear and sorrow, the one who protects and sustains all the three worlds and is the embodiment of auspiciousness and the one who leads us to the path of Liberation.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sathyam Gnanam Anantham Brahma (3)
Sathyam Brahma
Gnanam Brahma
Anantham Brahma
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to You O Lord Sai who is the embodiment of Eternal Truth, Wisdom and Infinite.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sayeesha Sharanam Sharanam Sayeesha
Sathya Shivatmaka Sundara Esha |Sayeesha...|
Tandava Rudra Sadashiva Sai
Karuna Sagara Raghava Sai
Gaana Manohara Madhava Sai
Buddhi Pradayaka Sambhava Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai we surrender ourselves at your Lotus Feet. You are the most beautiful eternal and embodiment of all that is good and true. We surrender to you Oh Lord, you are the most enchanting Cosmic Dancer Oh Lord Sadashiva, you are the most compassionate one Oh Lord Raghava, you are the embodiment and connoisseur of all music Oh Lord Madhava, you who bestow wisdom Oh Lord Sambhava, we surrender completely to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sayeeshwara Jagadeeshwara
Parameshwara Partheeshwara |Sayeeshwara|
Karunamaya Jaganmohana
Shaileshwara Bhuvaneshwara
Kailasa Natha Maheshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: This Bhajan extols the attributes of Lord Shiva who is none other than Lord Sai residing in Parthi. The attributes are Jagdeeshwara (of the entire universe), Karunamaya (the one with kindness), Jaganmohana (the most beautiful one), Shaileshwara, Kailasa Natha (the one whose abode is the mount Kailasa).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sayeeshwari Amba Bhuvaneshwari
Partheeshwari Amba parameshwari |Sayeeshwari Amba|
Omkaara Roopini Akhileshwari
Uma Maheshwari Jagadeeshwari (Amba)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you mother Sayeeshwari residing in Parthi (called by other names such as, Bhuvaneshwari, Parameshwari, Akhileshwari, Maheshwari etc.). You are the primordial sound of "Om"personified.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sayeeshwari Amba Jagadeeshwari
Kalyani Kanchi Puri Kamakshi |Sayeeshwari Amba...|
Partheeshwari Amba Parameshwari
Matangi Madura Puri Meenakshi
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to mother Sai whose abode is Parthi, who is the mother to this entire universe. She is also the presiding deity in Kanchi (by name Kamakshi) and Madhura (by name Meenakshi).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sayeeshwari Chandramukhi
Sharanagatha Paripalini
Shashwata Ananda Dayini
Sharanam Sharanam Jaganmayi
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to you Oh Mother Sayeeshwari who is as resplendent and beautiful as the moon, to the one who showers on all of us eternal bliss and joy. We Offer our humble surrender to you Oh mother Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shaila Girishwara Uma Maheshwara Kashi Vishweshwara Sadashiva
Sadashiva Sadashiva
Sadashiva Shambho Sadashiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sadashiva who is also the Lord of Kashi (Also known as Benares) and the consort of Goddess Uma (Parvathi).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shaktheeshwari Jaya Sayeeshwari Jaya
Kadambari Jaya Kameshwari Jaya |Shaktheeshwari Jaya...|
Partheeshwari Paripalini Jaya Jaya (2)
Manava Roopini Mata Jaya Jaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Mother Sayeeshwari who is the embodiment of Shakthi, also known by other names such as Kadambari and Kameshwari, the one who is the Lord of Parthi and who protects the Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shakthi Swaroopini Sai Ma (Shiva)
Chidananda Roopini Sai Ma |Shiva Shakthi|
Bhava Bhaya Harini Sai Ma
Bhakthodharini Sai Ma
Sai Ma Sathya Sai Ma (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Mother Sai who is the embodiment of Shakthi who destroys all fears and sorrows, who protects and uplifts Her devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva (3) (Shiva)
Chandra Kaladhara Gangadhara
Gowri Vara Sundara
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shambho
Hara Hara Hara Shambho
Hara Gowri (Sathya Sai) Natha Shambho
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva - (who is also known as Mahadeva and Shambho) the one who adorns the crescent Moon on His Forehead and the sacred river Ganges in His Matted Locks, the one who is the consort of Gowri.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva Gangadhara
Hara Hara Shankara Sadashiva |Shambho Mahadeva...|
Chandrashekara Sayeeshwara
Sayeeshwara
Sayeeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara |Chandrashekara|
Sharanam Sharanam Shiva Shaktheeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names Lord Shiva (Also called Shambho, Mahadeva, Shankara and Sadashiva) - the One who adorns the crescent moon on His head and the sacred river Ganges in His Matted Locks. He is none other than the Lord Sai of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva Gangadhara
Hara Hara Shankara Sadashiva |Shambho Mahadeva...|
Chandrashekara Sayeeshwara
Sayeeshwara
Sayeeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara |Chandrashekara|
Sharanam Sharanam Shiva Shaktheeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names Lord Shiva (Also called Shambho, Mahadeva, Shankara and Sadashiva) - the One who adorns the crescent moon on His head and the sacred river Ganges in His Matted Locks. He is none other than the Lord Sai of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva Mallikarjuna
Mangala Charana Trilochana
Pinaka Paani Parvathi Ramana |Shambho Mahadeva...|
Bhava Bhaya Harana Sanathana
Parthi Pureeshwara Patitha Pavana
Devotional Song Meaning: Our salutations at the sacred feet of Lord Shiva, (also known as Shambho, Mahadeva & Mallikarjuna) who wields the Bow (Pinaka), who is the consort of Parvathi, who destroys the fear of materialistic world and who is none other than Lord Sai of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva Shiva Shambho Mahadeva
Hara Haraya Bhava Bhavaya Shiva Shivaya Namah Om
Om Namah Shivaya Om Om Namah Shivaya Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Shiva who is also called as Shambho and Mahadeva, who destroys the fear of the materialistic world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva Shiva Shambho Mahadeva
Hara Haraya Bhava Bhavaya Shiva Shivaya Namah Om
Om Namah Shivaya Om Om Namah Shivaya Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Shiva who is also called as Shambho and Mahadeva, who destroys the fear of the materialistic world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambho Murarey Shankara Murarey
Murahara Phani Dhara Shankara Murarey
Shambho Murarey Shankara Murarey |Murahara Phani|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Shambho (Shankara), who is the slayer of the demon Mura and the One who adorns the serpent around HIS neck as an ornament.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambho Nachey Maharaja
Damaru Bhajey Nachey Nataraja |Shambho Nachey...|
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om
Hari Om Hari Om Sai Om Sai Om
Hari Om Hari Om |Hari Om Hari...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Shiva (Shambho) who is worshipped in the form of the cosmic dancer Nataraja, the eternal one who dances to the beat of the Damaru (Miniature Drum held by Lord. Shiva). Chant the name of Hari Om and Sai Om.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Shambho Shankara Deva Bholey (Sai) Baba Mahadeva Paahi Prabho Sharanam Deva (2) |Bholey (Sai) Baba| Hara Hara Gangey Mahadeva (3) |Bholey (Sai) Baba| Hara Hara Gangey Mahadeva (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Shiva (Also known as Shambho Shankara and Mahadeva). Sing the Glory of Lord Sai who is the Avatar of Lord Shiva. We offer our salutations to you and surrender to you Oh Lord.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Parvathi Ramana Pashupathi Paramesha
Chandra Chuda Dhara Chandra Kaladhara
Gangadhara Shambho
Devotional Song Meaning: Obeisance to Lord Shiva who is also known as (Shambho Shankara and Paramesha)to the one who is the consort of mother Parvathi, who is as effulgent as the Moon and who holds the mighty Ganges in His matted locks.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Sadashiva
Chandra Kaladhara Hara Ganga Dhara |Shambho Shankara...|
Parvathi Ramana Parameshwara
Parameshwara Parameshwara |Parvathi Ramana|
Parthi Pureesha Prabhu Sayeesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai of Parthi who is none other than Lord Shiva (Shambho, Shankara Sadashiva), to the one who holds the crescent Moon on His head and the mighty Ganges in His matted Locks, to the one who is the consort of mother Parvathi and the Lord of the Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Sai Shiva
Samba Sadashiva Sarvesha
Ganga Jatadhara Shashidhara Shankara
Nitya Lola Kailasa Vasa
Devotional Song Meaning: We pray to Lord Shambho Shankara who is also worshipped as Samba Sadashiva. We surrender to the one who holds the mighty Ganges in His matted locks, the one who holds the crescent Moon on His head, the one whose abode is mount Kailasa.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Shiva Shambho Shankara
Shambho Shankara Samba Sadashiva Shambho Shankara
Parthi Nayaka Paramesha Paahi Maam (2) |Shambho Shankara|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai, who is none other than Shambho, Shiva, Shankara, Sadashiva and Paramesha (All names of Shiva).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambho Shiva Shankara
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva |Shambho Shiva...|
Hara Hara Mahadeva Kailasa Vasa
Partheesha Paramesha Paahi Prabho
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect us Oh Lord Partheesha (Who is none other than Lord Shiva who is also called by names such as, Shambho, Shiva, Shankara, Mahadeva and Paramesha), living on the mount Kailasa and supporting sacred river Ganga on your head.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambhu Kumara Gajanana
Shankari Tanaya Gajanana
Ambika Tanaya Gajanana
Ambuja Lochana Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Gajanana son of Lord Shiva (Shambho) and Mother Parvathi (Shankari, Ambika). His eyes are of the shape of Lotus.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambhu Kumara Gowri Tanaya
Gajanana Sadaya Jaya Jaya
Varada Ganesha Duritha Vinasha
Pranava Kaara Natha Sadaya |Gajanana Sadaya|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Ganesha the son of Lord Shiva (Shambhu) and Parvathi (Gowri), who grants boons, destroys obstacles and who is personification of the Primordial sound "Om".

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shambhu Kumara Haro Hara Shiva Shankari Bala Haro Hara
Uma Sutha Shanmukha Guha
Shiva Sharavana Bhava Haro Hara
Palani Girisha Haro Hara Puttaparthi Pureesha Haro Hara
Hara Hara Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva |Shiva Sharavana...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Kumara residing on the hills of Palani, the son of Lord Shiva and Parvathi. He is none other than Lord Sai whose abode is Puttaparthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Abhayankara
Daya Nidhey Manohara |Shankara|
Saama Gaana Priyakara
Sai Jaga Vandana
Parameshwara Maheshwara
Sabha Pathey (Krupa Nidhey) Manohara
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Shankara who dispels all fears, the one who is the Ocean of mercy, the one who is most beautiful and the one who loves music. We offer our salutations to the Lord of the Universe Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Naama Bhajo
Shankara Shankara Naama Bhajo (3) |Shankara Naama...|
Peetambara Dhara Sai Shankara
Chandra Kala Dhara Gowri Manohara
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the Name of Lord Shankara the consort of Gowri, the one who adorns the yellow dress (Peetambara) and has the crescent Moon on the head.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Roopa Sajjana Vanditha Sai Rama Namostuthey
Raghupathi Roopa Ramya Charitha Sai Rama Namostuthey
Keshava Roopa Klesha Vinashaka Sai Rama Namostuthey
Adbhuta Charitha Anjaneya Artha Rakshaka Namostuthey
Sarvaadhara Sadhu Janavana Sai Rama Namostuthey
Nirvikara Nirupama Charitha Sai Rama Namostuthey
Devotional Song Meaning: We sing in praise of Lord Sai Rama who is the embodiment of Lord Shankara and who is worshipped by all noble being. He is the embodiment of Lord Rama who has unblemished character, HE is the embodiment of Lord Keshava who destroys all obstacles and the one who is the Lord of Hanuman who is the protector of all beings. We offer our salutations to You Oh Lord Sai Rama the protector of the Universe and the one adored by the saints, the one who is worshipped as the Formless one.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Sadashiva Chandrashekara
Chandrashekara Sai Shankara |Shankara Sadashiva...|
Neelakanta Shooladhaari Sai Shankara
Phaala Netra Tripura Haari Sai Shankara
Chandrashekara Sai Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Obeisances to Lord Sai who is none other than Shankara (Sadashiva), the One who holds the crescent moon on His head. He is also known as Neelakanta, as His throat is blue in colour (due to the poison He swallowed during the conflict between Gods and demons), Salutations to the one who holds the Trident and who has the Third Eye on HIS forehead and who has slayed the demon Tripura.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Sadashiva Sabha Pathey Manohara
Chandrashekara Jatadhara Uma Maheshwara
Shankara Sadashiva Sabha Pathey Manohara
Chandrashekara Jatadhara Uma Maheshwara (2)
Shankara Sadashiva
Sabhapathey Manohara
Chandrashekara Chandrashekara
Chandrashekara Jatadhara Uma Maheshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shankara (Sadashiva) the Consort of Sabha (Daughter of King Daksha Prajapathi), to the one who holds the crescent moon in HIS matted hair. We offer our humble salutations to Uma Maheshwara (Consort of Goddess Uma). {Lord Shiva's Consort Parvathi has several other names like Uma, Bhavani, Dakshayani, Sabha, Gowri etc.,}

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Sadashiva Shiva Shiva Shambho
Chandrashekara Hara Hara Hara Shambho |Shankara Sadashiva|
Bhasma Bhooshitanga Sai Shiva Shiva Shambho
Bala Shashi Vibhushana Hara Hara Shambho
Omkaara Roopa Sai Shiva Shiva Shambho
Om Namah Shivaya Hara Hara shambho
(Om Namah Shivaya) x 4
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva, (Shambho) who is adorned with sacred ash and has crescent of moon on HIS head, who is the Primordial "Om" personified.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Samba Shiva Hara Hara
Shankara Samba Shiva |Shankara Samba...|
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Mahesha
Chandra Kaladhara Hey Paramesha
Kailasa Vasa Kashi Pathey
Karuna Sagara Parthi Pathey
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Shankara (Samba Shiva) the one who holds the mighty Ganges in His Locks, the Lord of Kashi (The City of Benaras where He is adored as Lord Viswanath), the ocean of compassion and mercy, the Lord of Parthi, we pray and offer our salutations to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara
Sai Shankara
Naada Shareera Vedodhara
Kali Yuga Avatara Sai
Hara Shiva Shankara Sai Shiva Shiva Shankara Sai
Chandrashekara Sai Parthi Shankara Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Shankara who is the embodiment of Music and the Vedas who have taken the form of Sai in this age of Kali, we hail victory to you and offer our salutations to you Oh Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara
Sai Shankara
Naada Shareera Vedodhara
Kali Yuga Avatara Sai
Hara Shiva Shankara Sai Shiva Shiva Shankara Sai
Chandrashekara Sai Parthi Shankara Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Shankara who is the embodiment of Music and the Vedas who have taken the form of Sai in this age of Kali, we hail victory to you and offer our salutations to you Oh Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara
Sai Shankara
Naada Shareera Vedodhara
Kali Yuga Avatara Sai
Hara Shiva Shankara Sai Shiva Shiva Shankara Sai
Chandrashekara Sai Parthi Shankara Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Shankara who is the embodiment of Music and the Vedas who have taken the form of Sai in this age of Kali, we hail victory to you and offer our salutations to you Oh Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara Chandrashekara
Chandramouli Shankara Shambho Shankara (2)
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Shankara
Paapa Vimochana Shashi Shekara
Lingodhbhavakara Sai Shankara
Parthi Puri Shankara Shambho Shankara (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shankara (also known as Chandramouli and Shambho) the one who holds the Ganges in His Locks, the one who is worshipped as the consort of Mother Gowri, the one who holds the crescent Moon on His head and to the Sai Shankara who creates the sacred Lingam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara Sadashiva
Sadashiva Hey Samba Shiva |Shankara...|
Amba Sahita Samba Shiva
Samba Shiva Sai Sarveshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Pray to the Universal Lord Shankara (Sadashiva) who is always with Mother Amba (Parvathi).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara Sai Shankara Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva Om
Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva (Shiva Sai) Om
Shirdi Mahesha Shiva Paramesha Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva Om
Jaya Jaya Shiva Sai Om
Parthi Mahesha Pranavakara Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva Om
Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva (Shiva Sai) Om
Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva (Sai) Om (3)
Shiva Om Sai Om (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shankara (Shiva) who is the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara Samba Shiva
Samba Sadashiva Sai Shiva |Shankara...|
Chandramouli Sadashiva
Sadguru Sathya Sai Shiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to You Oh Lord Shankara (also known as Samba Shiva) who is worshipped as Sadashiva and Chandramouli we offer our salutations to you Oh Lord and universal Preceptor Sathya Sai Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara Shankara
Shankara Abhayankara
Paahi Maam Krupakara
Paahi Maam Sayeeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: We seek your protection Oh Lord Sai who in the form of Lord Shankara gives succour to all.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara Shankara Shankara Shambho Shankara
Shiva Shambho Hara Shambho Shiva Shiva Hara Shambho
Shiva Shambho Hara Shambho
Shambho Shankara Sayeesha
Trishoola Dhari Trinetra Dhari
Shiva Shambho Hara Shambho |Shambho Shankara...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva (with other names like Shambho, Shankara), the one who is armed with the Trident and with the third eye on His forehead.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara Roopa Maheshwara Sai
Shankara Shankara Shankara Sai
Omkaara Priya Shiva Shankara Sai
Kailasa Priya Shiva Shankara Sai
Nata Jana Priya Shiva Shankara Sai |Shankara Shankara|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to You Oh Sai who is the embodiment of Lord Shiva (with other names like Shankara and Maheshwara), the one who is worshipped as the the personification of Primordial "Om", the one who is dear to the devotees and whose abode is the Holy mountains of Kailasa.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara Sai Shankar
Parthi Ke Tum Ho Nivasi
Kailas Ke Tum Ho Nivasi |Shankara Shiva|
Shankara Roop Se Tum Ne Aya Gangadhari Tum Ho Swami
Gangadhari Tum Ho Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai you have Parthi and Kailasa as your abodes, you are none other than Lord Shiva (Shankara) with the sacred Ganges on your head.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara Shambho
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shambho Mahadeva |Shankara...|
Dama Dama Damaru Bhajey Shankara Ghana Ghana Ghanta Bhajey
(Hara) Hara Bholey Natha Shambho Hara Sai Natha Shambho
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shankara, also known as Shiva and Shambho who dances to the sound of Damaru (The miniature drum in His hand) and the ringing of bells. Chant the name of Sai Natha Shambho.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankaram Bhajey Jai Jai Shankaram Bhajey
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Shankaram Bhajey
Sadgurum Bhajey Jai Sadgurum Bhajey
Satchidananda Guru Sadgurum Bhajey
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai whose abode is Parthi, who is none other than Lord Shankara. Chant the name of the Universal Preceptor who is the embodiment of bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankaram Bhajey Shankaram Bhajey
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Shankaram Bhajey
Sadgurum Bhajey Sadgurum Bhajey
Satchidananda Guru Sadguru Bhajey
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai whose abode is Parthi, who is none other than Lord Shankara, chant the name of the Universal Preceptor who is the embodiment of bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankaraya Namah Shivaya
Sadashivaya Namah Shivaya |Shankaraya...|
Uma Varaya Namah Shivaya
Omkaaraya Namah Shivaya (2)
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shankara, Sadashiva who is the consort of Mother Uma. Lord Shiva who is the embodiment of the Primordial Sound.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankari Bhaktha Vashankari Maa
Sankata Haarini Sai Maa
Pranava Swaroopini Prema Dayini
Parthi Pureeshwari Paalaya Maam
Mangala Kaarini Manjula Bhaashini
Prema Dayini Sai Maa
Sai Ma (Sathya) Sai Maa
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Mother Shankari, who is the remover of obstacles, Mother Sai who is the embodiment of Love and the Primordial Sound "OM" and the Lord of Parthi and who bestows auspiciousness and Love.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankha Chakra Dhara Sai Krishna
Shyamala Komala Murali Krishna |Shankha...|
Radha Lola Raasa Vilola
Ranga Ranga Ranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Sai Ranga Vittala (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Krishna who is the beloved of Radha. He is dark complexioned and soft natured, with a Conch and Disc in each hand. He is none other than Sai who is also Vittala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shankha Chakra Peetambhara Dhari
Karuna Sagara Rama Murari
Karuna Sagara Krishna Murari
Karuna Sagara Sai Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the Lord, who bears the Conch and Disc and who wears the peacock crown. Glory to the ever merciful Lord Rama, Krishna and Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shanmukha Shanmukha Sai Sundara
Shiva (Guru) Sharavana Bhava Om
Mangala Gowri Shankari Nandana |Shiva (Guru)|
Parthi Vihari Pranava Kaari |Shiva (Guru)|
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai who resides in Parthi and who is the personification of the primordial sound "Om", is worshipped as Lord Shanmukha and as the Guru, who is the blessed son of Mother Gowri and Lord Shankara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shantha Durge Shanthi Swaroopini
Shyamala Komala Mana Mohini |Shantha Durge...|
Adi Anadi Anantha Swaroopini
Moksha Pradayini Narayani (2)
