Devotional Song Meaning: This Bhajan extols Mother Durga whose attributes are, Peaceful appearance, attractive dark complexioned soft features, the embodiment of a form all pervading without beginning and end and the one who liberates us from the cycle of Birth and Death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sharadey Jaya Sharadey Vaagvilasini Sharadey
Sharadey Jaya Sharadey Vidya Daayini Sharadey
Sharadey Jaya Sharadey Veda Mata Sharadey
Veda Mata Sharadey
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory and Victory to Mother Sharada who resides in our speech, who is the embodiment of knowledge, who is the mother of all Vedas.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sharanam Guru Deva
Sharanam Sai deva |Sharanam...|
Mata Pitha Guru Deva
Bandhu Sakha Sai Deva
Sab Ka Malik Sai Deva
Satchidananda Guru Sai Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Surrender to Sai who is our Preceptor, Mother, Father, Friend and Relation. He is the Lord of all Faiths, He is Being (Sath), Awareness (Chith) and Bliss (Ananda).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sharanam Sharanam Paahi Gajananam
Vighna Vinashaka Gananatham
Buddhi Pradayaka Sai Gajananam
Asura Nikhandana Sai Gajananam
Paahi Gajananam Paahi Gajananam |Vighna Vinashaka|
Devotional Song Meaning: Surrender to Lord Gajanana, who removes and destroys all obstacles in our path to salvation, the one who bestows wisdom, the one who destroys all the demonic qualities within us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sharanam Sharanam Sayeesha Sharanam
Sri Guru Mama Guru Sadguru Sai Guru |Sharanam Sharanam...|
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gopalam
Shanthi Nivasam Guru Deva Sharanam (Pra)
Devotional Song Meaning: Surrender to our Lord Sai who is our Divine Preceptor, whose abode is Prashanthi Nilayam in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sharavana Bhava Guha Shiva Shakthi Bala
Shanmukha Natha Vadivela
Kanda Kumara Karthikeya
Subrahmanya Deva Sai Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: Sharavana is another name for Shiva and Parvathi's son who is also called, Shanmukha, Muruga, Kanda, Kumara, Karthikeya and Subrahmanya Deva. He is none other than Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sharavana Bhava Sri Shanmukha Natha
Hara Hara Hara Hara Harom Hara
Gowri Nandana Harom Hara
Gangadhara Sutha Harom Hara
Palani Girisha Parthi Pureesha
Sai Natha Harom Hara (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: This Bhajan is in praise of Lord Shanmukha (also called Muruga, Kumara), the son of Lord Shiva and Parvathi. His abode is on top of Palani Hills. Our obeisances to HIM.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sharavana Bhavaney Shanmukha
Velayuda Vel Muruga |Sharavana Bhavaney|
Valli Natha Karthikeya
Karuna Sagara Kumara Guruvara
Mayura Vahana Muruga Natha
Sharanam Sharanam Parthi (Sai) Natha
Sharanam Sharanam Muruga (Sai) Natha (5)
Devotional Song Meaning: This Bhajan is in praise of Lord Shanmukha (also called Muruga, Kumara), the son of Lord Shiva and Parvathi. He is extolled as the one who is armed with divine Spear and accompanied by HIS consort Valli, a compassionate Lord riding on Peacock. We seek HIS blessings. Our salutations to Lord Sai Natha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shata Baar Kaho Rey Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Hey Mangala Nayana Ram Hey Gopi Jeevana Shyam
Hey Shirdi Ke Bhagawan Hey Prashanthi Nilaya Ram
Shata Koti Namana Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Our innumerable Salutations to Sairam, to the one whose look is the most auspicious one and who is the life giver to Gopikas. Let us chant HIS name million times.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shata Koti Pranam Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Paapa Vimochana Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Hey Mangala Pavana Naam Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Man Mandir Hey Tera Dhaam Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: We offer our million salutations to you Oh Lord Sairam, to the one who destroys all our sins, whose name is the most beautiful and auspicious. Lord Sai resides in our hearts.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Sheetala Charanam Komala Charanam Manjula Charanam Mama Guru Charanam Mrudula Charanam Anugraha Charanam Sadguru Charanam Sada Smarami Prem Daata Sai Guru Natha Pavana Charanam Sada Bhajami
Devotional Song Meaning: The feet of my preceptor are cold and soft, they are tender to touch and they are full of grace. Let us all meditate and offer our prayers to these holy feet which always shower love and grace.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shesha Sai Narayana
Vasudeva Narayana
Paasha Nashana Narayana
Narayana Hari (Sathya) Narayana
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Narayana who is worshipped as Shesha Sai, Vasudeva, Hari and Lord Sathya Narayana who destroys all our sins.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shesha Shaila Vasa Narayana
Bhaktha Parijata Narayana |Shesha Shaila...|
Sarva Jeeva Vasa Narayana
Saama Gaana Lola Narayana
Sathya Sai Roopa Narayana (Hey)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Narayana who is reclining on the Celestial Serpent Adi Sesha. Oh Narayana you are the saviour of your devotees, resident in the hearts of all beings and music is your past time. Oh Lord Sathya Sai you are none other than Lord Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shirdi Ke Bhagawan Sai Ram
Parthi Mey Tum Janam Liyo Rey |Shirdi Ke...|
Mandir Mandir Ghanta Baajey
Terey Hi Naam ki Mahima Gaayen
Bhakthon Ke Rakhwaley Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord of Shirdi, you have incarnated in Parthi. Every temple and religious place is ringing the bells in praise of you and your name, Oh Lord Gopala you are the protector of the devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shirdi Ke Sai Parthi Ke Baba
Tum Ho Hamarey Pyaarey Sai Baba |Shirdi Ke...|
Premamaya Sai Prema Pradatha
Eshwaramba Nandana Jagat Paripala
Paapa Vinashaka Parama Krupala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai you are Shirdi Sai as well as Parthi Baba. You are our loving Sai Baba. You are the Lord of this Universe, personification of Love, bestower of Love, Oh compassionate Son of Mother Eshwaramba, annihilate our sins.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shirdi Mahadeva Deva Shirdi Mahadeva
Shanthi Prema Sadguru Natha
Shirdi Puri Vasa Deva
Shirdi Ke Sai Natha Sadguru Natha
Parthi Ke Sathya Sai Sadguru Deva
Guru Dev Guru Dev Guru Dev Guru Dev
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to the Lord of Shirdi who is the embodiment of Love and Peace. Glory to You Oh Guru Dev (Preceptor), you are the embodiment of Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shirdi Mahesha Shiva Shankara
Parthi Pureesha Parameshwara
Shankara Shiva Shankara Sai Shankara
Shiva (4) Shivaya Namah Om
Hara (4) Haraya Namah Om
Shivaya Namah Om Haraya Namah Om (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shankara who resided in Shirdi and Parthi. Chant the name of Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shirdi Nivasa Sai Shankara
Parthi Nivasa Sai Shankara
Bhaavatheetha Bhaava Gochara
Kaalatheetha Kaala Bhairava
Jai Jagadeeshwara Omkaareshwara (5)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Shankara who is the embodiment of Shirdi Baba and Parthi Baba who is beyond time and imagination.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Bhajana Karo
Sathya Sai Bhajana Karo (2)
Prema Sai Bhajana Karo
Narayana Bhajana Karo
Devotional Song Meaning: Come One and All and sing the Glory of Lord Shirdi Sai, Lord Prema Sai, Lord Sathya Sai and Lord Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Dwarakamayi Jai Jai Ho Sathya Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Jai Jai Ho Sathya (Parthi Pureeshwara)Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory and salutations to Lord of Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Shirdi Sai Dwarakamayi Prashanthi Vasi Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Ek Naam Sundara Naam |Shirdi Sai...| Allah Eshwara Sai Ram Parthi Puri Ke Hey Bhagawan Daya Karo Krupa Karo Raksha Karo Hey Bhagawan |Sai Ram|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shirdi Baba the Lord of Dwarakamayi and to the Lord of Prashanthi, Sai Ram, the name so enthralling. He is none other than Allah and Eshwar and the Lord of Parthi. Oh Lord show mercy and protect us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Hey Bhagawan
Uddhara Karo Bhagawan
Janam Maran Se Paar Karo Tum Sai Natha Bhagawan
Bhava Bandhan Se Door Karo Tum Deena Natha Bhagawan
Daya Karo Bhagawan (Mujhey)
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Shirdi Sai, We plead You to redeem us from this world, take us from this bondage of birth and death and from the bondage of emotion, sorrow and attachment, Oh Lord Sai Natha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Parthi Baba
Deena Janon Ke Sai Bhaktha Janon Ke Baba
Kali Yuga Avatara Merey Jeevan Aadhaara
Sri Guru Sai Ram Sadguru Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Shirdi Sai who is now in the form of Parthi Baba who is the protector of His devotees as well as the weak and the downtrodden, who has come in this age of Kali to sustain and protect all beings We offer our salutations to you Oh Sai Ram, you are our divine Preceptor.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Parthi Sai Hum Ko Deejo Premamrutha Dhara Premamrutha Dhara
Tava Seva Ke Avasar Deejo Sathya Sai Mahadev
Ganamrutha Mey Bhaav Bhi Deejo Prema Sai Bhagawan Prema Sai Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai please let the perennial stream of Love flow from you to us, Oh Lord Sathya Sai please provide us the opportunity to serve you, Oh Lord Prema Sai please instill the devotion and Love whenever we sing your Glorious Name.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Shankara Parthi Vihari Shankara
Shankara Abhayankara Bhava Bhaya Haari Shankara |Shirdi Sai...|
Paramatma Shiva Shankara Pavana Purusha Shankara
Sathya Swaroopa Shankara Sathya Sai Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Obeisances to Lord Shirdi Sai who made Parthi as HIS abode, who is the embodiment of Lord Shankara. To the one who is all pervading, the most auspicious and sacred, who removes all fear, we salute you Oh Lord Sathya Sai Shankara and offer our humble salutations.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Vittala Shesha Sai Vittala
Sri Ranga Vittala Rakumayi Vittala
Jaya Jaya Vittala Jaya Sai Vittala
Hey Ranga Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: This Bhajan extols the Glory and attributes of Lord Panduranga Vittala (Another name for Lord Krishna) of Pandharpur. He is none other than the Shirdi Sai who as Vishnu was reclining on the celestial Serpent Adi Sesha. Lord Vittala is the Consort of Rakumayi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Charana Ati Taruna Nith Nith Bhajey Hum
Nith Nith Bhajey Hum Guru Charanam Vande |Shiva Charana|
Shiva Charana Ati Taruna Guru Charana Sharanam
Sathya Charanam Sai Charanam Sathya Sai Charanam
Sathya Sai Charanam Nith Nith Bhajey hum
Devotional Song Meaning: We offer our Salutations at the divine feet of Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva. We offer our obeisances at HIS feet by singing HIS Glory incessantly.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Hara Hey Hara Shiva Hey
Samba Sadashiva Shiva Hara Hey
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Parvathi Ramana Sadashiva
Namami Shankara Tava Charanam
Bhajami Shankara Tava Charanam
Devotional Song Meaning: We offer our obeisances at the feet of Lord Shiva who is worshipped as Sadashiva, Mahadeva and as the consort of Mother Parvathi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Linga Mangalanga
Sri Ganga Gowri Linga |Shiva Linga...|
Mandara Mala Linga
Nandeeshwara Rama Linga
Sri Ganga Dhari Linga
Shivarathri Atma Linga
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations and Glory to the most auspicious form of Lord Shiva, the Shiva linga described in numerous ways depict Shiva by various adjectives.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Maheshwara Shiva Maheshwara Shiva Maheshwara Sai Ram
Shiva Maheshwara Shiva Shankara Shiva Mahadeva Sai Ram
Kailasa Vasa Mahadeva
Jagadeeshwara Hara Mahadeva
Tribhuvana Pala Baba Sai Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shiva Maheshwara, who resides in the holy mountains of Kailasa. We sing your glory Oh Sai Mahadeva who is the Lord and protector of all creatures in the three worlds. (According to Hindu mythology there are three worlds, Sky, Earth and Sub-terrain.)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Om Shiva Om Shiva Om Shiva Om
Shiva Om Shiva Om Shiva Om Sai Om
Bhaktha Jana Priya Bhakthon Ke Pran Hai Sai Natha Shiva Om
Jai Jai Jai Shiva Om
Shanthi Pradayaka Prema Pradayaka Sai Natha Shiva Om |Jai Jai|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shiva who is the embodiment of Primordial Sound, Om"and who is the protector of His Devotees, who bestows peace and love among all beings.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Priya Nandana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Gowri Priya Sutha Om Shadanana |Shiva Priya...|
Hey Mayurasana Smitha Vadana
Sindhura Vadana Shubha Charana
Shanmukha Natha Subrahmanya Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: We pray to Lord Shanmukha who is the son of Lord Shiva and the one who removes all fears of the materialistic world, the one who sits on a peacock throne and whose face is charming, the one whose face is of reddish-brown colour and whose holy feet is worshipped by all.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Sai Shankara Gangadhara (Hey)
Parthi Vihara Sayeeshwara |Shiva Sai...|
Trishoola Dhari Hey Shiva Shankara
Deena Dayala Sayeeshwara
Lingodhbhavakara Lingeshwara |Parthi Vihara|
Devotional Song Meaning: This Bhajan extols the glory of Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva with attributes like, Gangadhara (the one who holds mighty Ganges in HIS matted locks), Trishoola Dhari (Armed with Trident) Deena Dayala (Compassionate to down trodden), Lingodhbhavakara (The one who manifests the sacred Lingam).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shambho Hara Hara Shambho
Bhava Nasha Kailasa Nivasa |Shiva Shambho...|
Parvathi Pathey Harey Pashupathey
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Pathey
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Shiva Shambho you are the destroyer of all fear, the one who resides in the holy mountains of Kailasa, the consort of Mother Parvathi, the One who holds the mighty Ganges in your matted Locks, The Consort of Mother Gowri - we pray and offer our humble salutations at Your Feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shambho Narayana
Parthi Vasa Jagadeeshwara |Shiva Shambho...|
Shirdi Vasa Jagadeeshwara
Sathya Sai Shiva Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: We pray to our Lord Sai who is the embodiment of Lord Shiva and Lord Narayana who has come down to earth as the Lord of Parthi and Shirdi and the Lord of all the worlds. We surrender to you Oh Lord Sathya Sai Shiva Shankara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shambho Shambho Shiva Shambho Mahadeva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva Shiva Shambho Mahadeva
Haalaahala Dhara Shambho Anatha Natha Shambho
Hari Om (Om Om) Hari Om Hari Om Namah Shivaya
Devotional Song Meaning: We sing the glory of Lord Shiva (Shambho Mahadeva), the one who has consumed the poison to save the world and the one who is compassionate and protects the needy and downtrodden. We pray to you Oh Lord Shiva and offer our salutations.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shankara Parvathi Ramana
Gangadhara Bhuvanaabharana
Sharanagatha Vanditha Charana
Karunakara Bhava Bhaya Harana
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva Shankara who is the consort of Mother Parvathi, the one who holds the mighty Ganges in His Locks and whose radiance shines brilliantly over all worlds. We surrender and offer our prayers at Your Holy Feet Oh Lord who is most Compassionate and the one and who removes all fears.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Hara Hara
Shiva Shiva Shankara Samba Sadashiva
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Om
Hara Hara Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva who is is also known as Lord Shankara, Samba Sadashiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Bhola Maheshwara Shambho Shankara
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Manohara Shambho Shankara |Shiva Shiva...|
Vyagrambaradhara Chandrakaladhara Shambho Shankara
Haalaahala Dhara Shaila Girishwara Shambho Shankara |Ganga Jatadhara|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shiva who is also known by other names such as Hara, Bhola Maheshwara and Shambho Shankara. He supports the sacred river Ganga on His matted hair, He is the Consort of Gowri (Parvathi) and wears tiger skin, adorns the crescent shaped moon on His head and lives in mount Kailasa, the one who swallowed the poison to save Gods (during the conflict between the Gods and Demons. That is why Shiva is called Haalaahala Dhara or Neelakanta - Blue throat).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Shankara
Trishoola Dhari Trinetra Dhari |Shiva Shiva...|
Chandrakaladhara Samba Shiva
Kailasa Vasa Gangadhari
Sayeeshwara Sarveshwara Hey Jagadeeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sayeeshwara who is the embodiment of Lord Shiva, who is armed with Trident, has a third eye on His forehead, the Crescent moon on the head, who lives in Mount Kailasa, supports the sacred river Ganga on His head. He is the Lord of the Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Sai Shankara Roopa
Shiva Parameshwara Samba Shiva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Bhola Shankara
Shirdi (Parthi) Pureeshwara Sai Shiva
Samba Shiva Sai Shiva (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai Shankara who is the embodiment of Lord Shiva and worshipped by many as Lord Parameshwara, Samba Shiva, Bhola Shankara The One who took the form of the Lord of Shirdi is now with us as the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shambho Hara Hara Shambho Sai Shambho Shankara
Vyagrambaradhara Vibhuti Sundara Sai Shambho Shankara
Chandra Kaladhara Shankara Ganga Jatadhara Shankara
Tandava Priyakara Natana Manohara Haalaahala Dhara Shankara |Vyagrambaradhara|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Shiva, the one who wears the tiger skin, smeared with ashes all over His body, with the crescent moon on His head and the Ganges flowing from His matted locks, the one who loves to do the Cosmic dance, the one who swallowed the deadly poison and held it inside his throat (during the conflict between the Gods and Demons. Shiva is also called NeelaKanta - Blue coloured throat).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shambho Mahesha Girisha
Hara Hara Sai Mahadeva
Nandi Vahana Naga Bhooshana
Phaala Lochana Tripura Vihari
Parama Purusha Shiva Ganga Dhari
Chandrakaladhara Parvathi Ramana
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva the Consort of Parvathi, who resides on Mount Kailasa, who moves around on Nandi the celestial Bull, wears Serpent as an ornament around His neck, has a third eye on the forehead, holds sacred river Ganga and Crescent moon on His head and travels all three worlds (Sky, Earth and Sub-Terrain).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shambho Tandava Priyakara
Bhava Bhava Bhairava Bhavani Shankara |Shiva Shiva...|
Hara Hara Bham Bham Bhola Maheshwara
Dama Dama Damaru Natana Manohara
Sathyam Shivam Sai Sundara
Devotional Song Meaning: This Bhajan extols the attributes associated with Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva. He is described as the one who loves Cosmic dance (Tandava Priyakara), Simple in nature (Bhola) and personification of Truth (Sathyam), Giving (Shivam) and Beauty (Sundaram).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shankara Hara Parameshwara
Bala Gangadhara Sai
Shiva Shiva Shankara Parthi Pureeshwara
Nata Shiva Shankara Sai |Bala Gangadhara...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Shiva who is also known as Hara, Shankara, Gangadhara, Parameshwara and Nata Shiva Shankara (the one who performs Cosmic dance). He is also Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shankara Om Shiva Om
Hara Hara Shankara Om Shiva Om |Shiva Shiva...|
Gowri Shankara Om Shiva Om
Uma Maheshwara Om Shiva Om
Shiva (Om) Shiva Shakthi Om Shiva Om
Neelakanta Sai Om Shiva Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Shiva who is accompanied by Divine mother Gowri (Parvathi) also known as Uma and Shakthi. Chant the name of Neelakanta (another name for Shiva as his throat looks blue after swallowing poison for the sake of Gods during their fight for nectar with demons)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shankara Parthi Pureeshwara
Vyagrambaradhara Sai Maheshwara
Haalaahala Dhara Hey Gangadhara
Natana Manohara Chandra Kaladhara
Samba Sadashiva Hara Parameshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Sai the resident of Parthi is none other than Lord Shankara, who wears the tiger skin as loin cloth, who swallowed the poison for saving Gods, holding sacred river Ganges in His matted hair, who is fond of dance and wears the crescent moon on the head.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shankara Sayeeshwara
Pranamami Pranamami Partheeshwara
Omkaara Roopa Vishweshwara
Sayeeshwara Sarveshwara
Prema Swaroopa Partheeshwara |Pranamami Pranamami|
Devotional Song Meaning: Reverential salutations to Lord Sai of Parthi who is the primordial sound "OM" in human form. HE is worshipped by all in the Universe and HE is Love personified.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Om Hara Hara Hara Hara Om
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Hara Hara Sai Shankara Om
Sai Shankara Om (Sathya) (2)
Om Namah Shivaya Om Om Namah Shivaya Om
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Boley Bholey Shankara Om
Bholey Shankara Om (2) |Om Namah|
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Shiva who is a remover of all sins and cycle of birth and death, whose Damaru (The miniature drum Lord Shiva plays) chants "Om Shankara". He is today in the form of Lord Sai Shankara residing in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shambho Shiva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Sadashiva |Shiva Shiva|
Tandava Priyakara Shambho Sabesha
Parthi Mahesha Sai Shiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the holy name of Shiva, Shambho and Sadashiva, Hara who is fond of celestial dance Tandava. He is also the Lord of Parthi, Sai Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shirdi Pureeshwara Shambho Shankara Sai Shivom
Bhava Hara Purahara Puttapartheeshwara Shambho Shankara Sada Shivom
Kailasachala Bala Shiva Kaala Koota Hara Bala Shiva
Keli Lalasa Bala Shiva Leela Tandava Bala Shiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh! Lord of Shirdi, we worship you as Shiva, Parameshwara, Shambho, Shankara, Sai Shiva. You are the remover of fear and worldly misery, Your abode is Kailasa and you are a great dancer of Tandava (The celestial Dance)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shankara
Gangadhara Hara Gowreeshwara |Shiva Shiva...|
Chandrakaladhara Parameshwara
Haalaahala Dhara Hara Shankara
Yugadhara Phanidhara Shashi Shekara
Jatadhara Sai Bhaktha Shankara
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Shiva who is also called by many names such as, Shankara, Gangadhara (the one who supports the sacred river Ganga on HIS head), Hara, Gowri Shiva (Consort of Mother Gowri), Chandrakaladhara (having crescent moon on the head), Haalaahala Dhara (The one who swallowed the poison to save Gods), Yugadhara (The one who upholds all aeons), Jatadhara (The one with matted hair). Lord of Parthi is none other than the Lord Shiva who adorns the Serpent around HIS neck.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Om
Hara Hara Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om |Shiva Shiva...|
Alakh Niranjan Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Sayeeshwaraya Namah Om
Pranava Swaroopa Parameshwara
Partheeshwaraya (Sathya Sayeeshwaraya) Namah Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Shiva with mantra "Shivaya Namah Om Haraya Namah om" Pray Lord Shiva who is ever pure, who dispels the fear of this materialistic world, who is the personification of the Primordial "Om". He is none other than the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Om
Hara Hara Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om |Shiva Shiva...|
Alakh Niranjan Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Sayeeshwaraya Namah Om
Pranava Swaroopa Parameshwara
Partheeshwaraya (Sathya Sayeeshwaraya) Namah Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Shiva with mantra "Shivaya Namah Om Haraya Namah om" Pray Lord Shiva who is ever pure, who dispels the fear of this materialistic world, who is the personification of the Primordial "Om". He is none other than the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Om
Hara Hara Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om |Shiva Shiva...|
Shivaya Namah Om Haraya Namah Om
Hara Hara Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om
Shivaya Namah Om Haraya Namah Om |Hara Hara|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva, destroyer of Sins, cycle of birth and death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Om
Bhava Bhava Bhavaya Namah Om
Shirdi (Parthi) Pureeshwara Shambho Shankara
Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om
Parthi Shivaya Namah Om
Samba Shivaya Namah Om
Parthi Pureeshwara Shambho Shankara |Hara Hara|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva who dispels the fear of the materialistic world, HE is none other than Shirdi Sai and Parthi Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Shivaya Namah Om Namah Shivaya (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Shiva and chant His name

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shivaya Namah Shiva Lingaya Namah Om
Bhavaya Namah Bhava Lingaya Namah Om
Sarvaya Namah Sarva Lingaya Namah Om
Rudraya Namah Rudra Lingaya Namah Om
Atmaya Namah Atma Lingaya Namah Om
Namah Om Namah Om Namah Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Shiva who is present in the form of sacred Lingam. He manifests Himself in different forms such as, the one who dispels the fear of the materialistic world, the one who is Omnipresent, the one who is our in dweller (higher self or Conscience).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shivaya Namah Shiva Shivaya Namah Shiva Shivaya Namah Om Namah Shivaya
Shivaya Namah Shiva Shivaya Namah Shiva
Shivaya Namah Om Namah Shivaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name "Shivaya Namah Shiva" every moment of your life.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shivaya Parameshwaraya Shashi Shekaraya Namah Om
Bhavaya Guna Sambhavaya Shiva Tandavaya Namah Om
Shivaya Parameshwaraya Chandrashekaraya Namah Om |Bhavaya Guna...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chat the name of Lord Shiva, the one who dispels the fear of the materialistic world, the one who adorns the crescent shaped moon on HIS head and performs the Cosmic dance.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shivaya Shiva Sai Deva Chandrashekaraya Namah Om
Bhavaya Partheeshwaraya Devadi Devaya Namah Om
Namah Om Namah Om Namah Om
Namah Om Namah Om Namah Om Namah Om
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant name of Lord Sai, who is none other than Lord Shiva who dispels the fear of the materialistic world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shivaya Shiva Shiva Bhavaya Bhava Bhava
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Shivaya Shiva Shiva Bhavaya Bhava Bhava
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Bhavaya Bhava Bhava Haraya Hara Hara |Om Namah|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Shiva with the mantra "Om Namah Shivaya" which dispels one's worldly miseries.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shivoham Shivoham Shivoham Shiva
Satchidananda Roopam Shivoham Shiva
Shivoham Shivoham Shivoham Shiva |Satchidananda|
Devotional Song Meaning: I am Shiva (Shivoham which is a primary MANTRA of SHAIVISM which means Shiva I am {Shiva-Aham }) the embodiment of Being (Sath), Awareness (Chith) and Bliss (Ananda).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shravan Karo Manan Karo
Sai Mahima Sai Mahima
Trikhand Nachey Sai Mahima Se (2) |Shravan Karo...|
Yuga Avatari Leeladhari (2)
Parthi Pureeshwara Prabhu Giridhari
Narahari Roopa Sai Giridhari
Devotional Song Meaning: Listen and meditate on the glory of the Avatar of this Age, Lord Sai, residing in Parthi, who is none other than Lord Krishna in human form. The three worlds dance to HIS melody. (As per Indian Mythology the three worlds are Sky, Earth and the sub-terrain below the ocean).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shringara Vela Shiva Shakthi Bala
Devadi Deva Deena Dayala |Shringara Vela...|
Kanda Kumara Kadirkama Vela
Karunya Sheela Shritha Paripala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant name of Lord Subrahmanya, beautiful and compassionate son of Shiva and Shakthi, who is also called by the name Kanda and Kumara. He is none other than Lord Sathya Sayeesha who protects those who surrender to HIM.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shrivatsankitha Sri Kaustubha Dhara
Madhava Mohana Krishna (2)
Sri Tulasi Dala Vanamala Dhara |Madhava Mohana(2)|
Kali Yuga Varada Kali Avatara
Karuna Sagara Sai (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Bhagawan Sai the compassionate one is the incarnation of Lord Vishnu in Kali age, who is depicted to be bearing "Srivatsam" (The sign of Srivatsa. It is said to Symbolise Vishnus yogic powers.)and "Kaustubham" (The splendorous jewel Kaustubham represents the consciousness of all living things.). He is none other than Lord Krishna wearing the garland of Sacred Tulasi leaves (Basil Leaves).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shuklambara Dhara Ganapathi Mantram
Nityam Nityam Japo Japo
Vighna Vinashaka Vidya Dayaka
Veera Ganapathi Bhajo Bhajo
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant daily the Mantra of Ganapathi, one who wears white cloth, who is the remover of all obstacles, the bestower of knowledge and one who is very courageous.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shyama Murari Ayo Rey
Sai Murari Ayo Rey |Shyama Murari|
Gaayo Rey Gun Gaayo Rey
Payo Rey Peetambara Dhari
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing in ecstacy of the arrival of Lord Krishna who is none other than Lord Sai, also called Shyama Murari, wearing the yellow cloth characteristic of Lord Krishna's dress.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Shyama Shyama Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Shyama Shyam (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant Lord Shyam, Radhey Shyam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shyama Sundara Hari Govinda Bolo
Govinda Bolo Hari Gopala Bolo |Shyama Sundara...|
Madana Mohana Prabhu Govinda Bolo
Kamala Nayana Prabhu Gopala Bolo
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Bolo
Govinda Bolo Gopala Bolo (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the various names of Lord Krishna such as, Shyama Sundara Hari, Govinda, Madana Mohana Hari, Kamala Nayana Hari and Radha Ramana Hari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shyama Sundara Madana Mohana Radhey Gopal
Radhey Gopal Bhajo Radhey Gopal
Shankha Chakra Gadadhara Radhey Gopal
Jai Radhey Gopal |Radhey Gopal|
Murali Manohara Radhey Gopal
Jai Radhey Gopal |Radhey Gopal|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant various names of Lord Krishna such as, Shyama Sundara, Madana Mohana, Shankha Chakra Gadadhara, Radhey Gopala, Murali Manohara etc.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shyama Sundara Madana Mohana Radhey Govinda Bolo Radhey Govinda
Yadu Nandana Madhusudhana Radhey Govinda Bolo Radhey Govinda
Nalina Nayana Narayana Radhey Govinda Bolo Radhey Govinda
Deena Charana Dukha Harana Radhey Govinda Bolo Radhey Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Govinda (Krishna) the beloved of Radha, from Yadu dynasty, the one with Lotus eyes, the one who gives succour to the downtrodden.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Shyamala Komala Krishna Murari (2)
Shyamala Ghana Shyamala Megha Shyamala Komala Krishna Murari
Shyamala Komala Krishna Murari
Sridhara Yaduvara Krishna Murari (2)
Sridhara Nanda Yaduvara Bhava Bhaya Hara Giridhara Krishna Murari
Sridhara Yaduvara Krishna Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the dark complexioned and soft natured Krishna, who is also known as, Murari Ghana Shyama, Megha Shyama, Sridhara, Yaduvara, Giridhara etc.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Siddhi Ranjana Duritha Bhanjana
Sri Sathya Sai Gajanana (Bolo)
Vighna Vinashaka Ashta Vinayaka
Sri Sathya Sai Shubhanana
Vakratunda Dhara Pranava Swaroopa
Sri Sathya Sai Shubhanana (Bolo)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, you are none other than the Lord Gajanana (Ganesha), who bestows auspiciousness, removes the obstacles in life and fulfills every wish. You are the personification of the Primordial sound "Om".

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Siddhi Vinayaka Mangala Daata
Buddhi Pradayaka Gananatha |Siddhi Vinayaka...|
Vighna Harana Prabhu Vighneshwara Tum
Gowri Nandana Hey Jaga Vandana
Namostuthey Namostuthey
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Vinayaka (Lord Ganesha) you fulfill our wishes and bestow auspiciousness. You bestow knowledge to all, Oh Lord of Ganas, you destroy the obstacles in our lives Oh son of Goddess Gowri (Parvathi), you are worshipped by the entire Universe. Salutations to you Oh Lord Vighneshwara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Siddhi Vinayaka Vidya Dayaka
Sri Gowri Sutha Vighna Nashaka
Shoka Vinashaka Duritha Nivaraka
Lambodhara Gajavadana Vinayaka
Sura Nara Sevitha Buddhi Pradayaka |Sri Gowri|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Vinayaka you fulfill our wishes and you are the bestower of knowledge. Oh Son of Gowri (Parvathi) and remover of obstacles, you have mighty body worshipped by Gods and humans alike, you provide intellect to the seekers.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Simha Vahini Sai Narayani
Mata Maheshwari Durga Bhavani |Simha Vahini...|
Akhilandeshwari Jaya Jagat Janani
Abhaya Pradayini Ananda Roopini
Mangala Karini Moksha Pradayini
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Sai Narayani who rides on the Lion and who is known by many names as Mata Maheshwari, Durga Bhavani, Akhilandeshwari, Jagat Janani, Abhaya Pradayini, Ananda Roopini, Mangala Karini and Moksha Pradayini.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Simha Vahini Trishoolini
Shritha Jana Palini Shiva Shankari |Simha Vahini|
Chidanandamayi Niramayi
Sadashivamayi Sayeeshwari
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the Goddess Shiva Shankari, the one who protects all who surrender to her, the one rides on the Lion, carries the trident, one who is always full of bliss and happiness, one who is free from sorrow and fear, the consort of Sadashiva, the Goddess Sayeeshwari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sita Mohana Sundara Rama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama
Raghukula Bhooshana Sri Raghu Rama
Ratnakara Kula Sri Sai Rama
Raghava Sundara Sri Raghu Rama
Ramya Manohara Sri Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai Rama form the lineage of Ratnakara, you are Sri Rama from Raghu dynasty, consort of Mother Sita, you are the most beautiful and elegant Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sita Pathey Rama Jaya Shyamala Komala Rama
Veda Gamanutha Vimala Charitha
Vathathmaja Priya Rama
Varija Netra Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Rama, the consort of Mother Sita, with your dark complexion and soft nature you are the personification of the essence of Vedas, with your blemishless character and adored by Hanuman (Vathathmaja) you are most beautiful with Lotus shaped eyes.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sita Pathey Sri Rama
Dasharatha Rama Dayabhi Rama |Sita Pathey...|
Rama Rama Jaya Rama Rama Jaya Rama (Sai) Rama Jaya Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram Sathya Sai Ram Ram
Raghava Sundara Rajeeva Lochana Paramananda Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to you Oh Lord Sri Rama who is the consort of Mother Sita, to the One who is the son of King Dasharatha and the most merciful One, the one with Lotus shaped eyes, , the most beautiful one from Raghu Dynasty and who bestows eternal bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sita Rakshaka Rama Dootha
Lanka Dahana Ravana Mardhana
Sri Rama Dasa Daya Nidhey
Sarva Mangala Anjaneya
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to You Lord Hanuman - who protected Mother Sita and who is the messenger of Lord Rama the One who put Lanka in flames and showed the path for Rama who killed Ravana the one who confers all auspiciousness on everyone, the one who is the son of Anjana, we offer our salutations to you Oh Lord Hanuman.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sita Ram Bolo Bolo Sita Ram Radhey Shyam Bolo Bolo Radhey Shyam
Hari Naam Bolo Bolo Hari Naam
Sai Ram Bolo Bolo Sai Ram |Sita Ram Bolo...|
Hari Naam Bolo Bolo Hari Naam
Sai Ram Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Hari Naam Bolo Bolo Hari Naam
Sai Ram Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the names of Lord Sita Rama and Lord Radhey Shyama, Lord Hari and Lord Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sita Ram Naama Bhajo
Madhura Madhura Sai Naama Bhajo
Radhey Shyam Naam Bhajo |Madhura Madhura...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the Name and Glory of Sita Rama, Radhey Shyam and Lord Sai whose names are the sweetest of all.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sita Ram Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Dasharatha Nandana Janaki Jeevana
Raghukula Bhooshana Jaya Jaya Ram
Jaya Jaya Ram (Ram) Jaya Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to you Rama, who is the Consort of Sita and son of Dasharatha, the Ornament of Raghu Dynasty.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sita Rama Jaya Radhey Shyama Jaya
Mangala Charana Jaga Vandana (Shubha)
Sita Pathey Ramachandra
Raghava Raghu Nandana
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Rama from Raghu dynasty, you are the consort of Mother Sita, the whole world prostrates at your auspicious feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sita Rama Sri Raghu Rama 
Dasharathey Hey Jaya Rama
Atma Rama Aganita Guna Dhama
Pavana Naama Parandhama
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Rama from Raghu dynasty, who is the consort of Mother Sita, son of King Dasharatha, the one with blemishless character and whose name is sacred, HE is the supreme Lord.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Soham Soham Dhyan Karo
Sadguru Sai Dhyan Karo |Soham Soham...|
Soham Brahma Soham Vishnu
Soham Sai Dhyana Karo
Soham Atma Shiva Paramatma
Brahmananda Se Hrudaya Bharo
Devotional Song Meaning: Meditate on the divine word 'Soham' which means 'I am That'. Meditate on Sai who is our true and Divine Mentor. Soham is none other than Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva and the Atma (Higher self or Higher Conscience). Fill your hearts with Divine Bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Gananatha Devadi Deva
Pranava Swaroopa Prabho Paahi
Pranava Swaroopa Prabho
Hey Shiva Nandana Bala Gajanana
Parvathi Tanaya Prabho Harey
Eshwari Tanaya Prabho Sai
Eshwari Tanaya Prabho
Devotional Song Meaning: I seek your succour Oh Lord Ganesha, the supreme one among Gods, the one who is the primordial form, son of Lord Shiva and Mother Parvathi, you are none other than Sai, the son of Eshwaramba.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Gananatha Jaya Gananatha
Sharanam Sharanam Gananatha (2) |Sri Gananatha|
Parvathi Nandana Bala Gajanana
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gajanana
Pashupathey Priya Sri Ganesha |Sharanam Sharanam|
Devotional Song Meaning: I surrender to you Oh Lord Ganesha the leader of Ganas (attendants of Lord Shiva). Oh son of Parvathi and the dear son of Lord Shiva, you are none other than Sai Gajanana residing in Parthi. I surrender to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Ganapathi Hari Om
Ganapathi Hari Om Guna Nidhey Hari Om
Hari Om Hari Om
Varada Abhayakara Ananda Dayaka
Shiva Shakthi Nandana Om
Ganapathi Hari Om Guna Nidhey Hari Om |Hari Om...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Ganapathi, the virtuous one, the one who destroys fears and bestows happiness, the son of Lord Shiva and Goddess Shakthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Ganesha Jaya Ganesha
Sadguru Deva Sai Mahesha
Parvathi Shankara Hey Paramesha
Rama Krishna Hari Govinda Vittala
Subrahmanyam Subrahmanyam Shanmukha (Sai) Natha Subrahmanyam
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha son of Parvathi and Parameshwara. You are none other than the Lord Sai. Chant the names of Rama, Krishna, Hari, Govinda, Vittala, Subrahmanya and Lord Sai Natha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Ganesha Shivuni Kumara Shritha Jana Vinuta Prabho
Sri Gananatha Sevitha Paada (3)
Naagati Neevani Nammiti Sada
Nagabharana Nanu Daya Ganavaa |Sri Ganesha...|
Iddari Tallula Muddu Kumara (3)
Bhakthuda Naiti Nee Vadda Jerpara
Koddi Krupanu Naakosagi Brovara |Sri Ganesha...|
Koggugamana Naa Dikku Niveraa (3)
Makkuvuto Naa Madi Nilpitiraa
Akkara Seyaka Aadharincharaa |Sri Ganesha...|
Sajjana Sadhula Sannuta Charana (3)
Kujja Deva Gajaasura Harana
Bojja Vishala Vijaya Gajanana |Sri Ganesha...|
Sri Kailasapura Vighnesha (3)
Moravini Karunato Mammu Kaavamu Esha
Dvirada Vadana Shantha Prakasha |Sri Ganesha...|
Sri Sayeeshuni Sevaka Janulamu (3)
Sai Bhajanalu Cheyuta Manayamu
Jaya Midarava Raya Munadeva Bhakthulu Kaavaa |Sri Ganesha...|
Devotional Song Meaning: (Note-This is a very old Song /Bhajan sung in the Divine presence many years back and is in Telugu Language. Meanings are given in the best possible manner.)Oh Ganesha! Son of Shiva, please listen to our prayers. Oh Ganesha! To you, we pay our obeisance. I have always believed that You are my ultimate goal, Oh Ganesha, ornamented by a serpent. Please show your compassion on me. Oh sweet son of two mothers (Parvathi and Ganga)! We are your devotees. Take us across the shore; please shower a little grace on us. Oh Ganesha! You who walk slowly are our only recourse. We sing your name with great adoration. Do not delay our Lord, come and bless us. Oh elephant faced one! You are worshipped by the upright and the seers. Short in height, the slayer of Gaja demon, big bellied and always victorious. Oh destroyer of all obstacles! The resident of Kailasa, listen to our prayers with compassion. Come and bless us, Oh Lord you have the body of two beings and is glowing with peace. Oh Ganesha! We are the servants of Sai and we sing His Bhajans, have compassion on us and come quickly.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Ganesha Sri Ganesha Sri Ganesha Paahi Maam
Jaya Ganesha Jaya Ganesha Jaya Ganesha Raksha Maam
Sri Ganesha Paahi Maam Jaya Ganesha Raksha Maam
Jaya Ganesha Jaya Ganesha Jaya Ganesha Raksha Maam
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to thee Oh Lord Ganesha We pray to you to protect us.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Ganesha Vinayaka 
Vighna Vinashaka Vinayaka
Mangala Dayaka Vinayaka
Bhava Bhaya Nasha Vinayaka
Parthi Pureeshwara Vinayaka
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Ganesha, remover of the fear of the materialistic world, you remove obstacles and grant auspiciousness, Oh Lord Vinayaka of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Gopala Gokula Bala
Tulasi Mala Sai Gopala |Sri Gopala...|
Radha Vallabha Raasa Vilola |Tulasi Mala|
Devotional Song Meaning: Pray to Lord Sai Gopala of Gokula who is the beloved of Radha. He wears an ornament made from the beads of holy Tulasi plant.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Guru Parthi Vasa
Sai Brahma Vishnu Mahesha |Sri Guru...|
Allah Bhi Tum Ho Moulah Bhi Tum Ho
Zohrashtra Mahaveera Yesu Bhi Tum Ho
Ram Rahim Ho Krishna Karim Ho
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord of Parthi who is Guru, Brahma, Vishnu, Mahesha, Allah, Zohrashtra, Mahaveera and HE is also none other than Rama, Krishna and Karim.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Hari Bol Sri Hari Bol Mukunda Madhava Hari Hari Bol
Ek Prabhu Ke Aneka Naam Prema Se Bolo Sai Bhagawan
Sai Bhagawan Bolo Sai Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant Hari's name who is also called, Mukunda and Madhava. There is one God, but He has many names. He is also known by the name Sai Baba. Chant Lord Sai's name with love.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Hari Jaya Hari Nanda Mukunda Hari
Radha Ramana Hari Narayana
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Sri Hari who is also Lord Narayana and beloved of Radha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Hari Nanda Mukunda Harey
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Harey |Sri Hari|
Geeta Prabodhana Srivatsalanchana
Asurani Khanda Ravana Mardhana
Alakh Niranjan Rama Harey
Rama Harey Sita (Sai) Rama Harey
Raghupathi Raghava Rama Harey |Dasharatha Nandana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names Sri Hari (Krishna), Nanda's son, the name Rama, Dasharatha's son, in whose heart Sri Lakshmi resides. Oh Rama destroyer of many demons like Ravana, you are purity personified Oh Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
Narayana Veda Parayana |Sri Lakshmi|
Bhava Bhaya Harana Vanditha Charana
Alakh Niranjana Narayana
Vaidehi Mohana Narayana (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutation to Lord Narayana who is the beloved of Goddess Lakshmi, the one who has knowledge of all the Vedas, the one who removes the fear of the materialistic world and whose feet are worshipped by all, who is always pure and who has enchanted Vaidehi (Sita).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Madhusudhana Krishna Giridhara Shyama Murari
Bhaktha Vatsala Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Radha Ramana Sri Hari
Keshava Madhava Sadhu Samrakshaka
Sai Krishna Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna, you are adored by your devotees as well as your beloved Radha, you are saviour of the holy men and ascetics.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Madhusudhana Krishna Krishna
Devaki Vasudeva Krishna Krishna
Sri Jagannatha Krishna Krishna
Nanda Yashoda Krishna Krishna
Sri Sai Natha Krishna Krishna (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Madhusudhana, Krishna, son of Devaki and Vasudeva, the Lord of this Universe, you are also the charming lad of mother Yashoda and King Nanda, you are none other than Sai Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Mallikarjuna Maheshwara
Sri Sai Shambho Vishweshwara |Sri Mallikarjuna...|
Srisaila Vasa Sureshwara
Sri Bhramaramba Hrudayeshwara
Parvathi Ramana Parameshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: This Bhajan praises Lord Shiva, the presiding deity in Srisailam, in Andhra Pradesh State in India, who is the Consort of Parvathi, with various names which are HIS attributes such as, Mallikarjuna, Vishweshwara, Sri Shaila Vasa, the one who resides in the heart of Bhramaramba (Parvathi's name in Srisailam)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Mata Jaganmata
Sai Mata Shashi Gowri Mata
Dharani Mata Paripoorani Mata
Jagadharani Mata Bhava Haarini Mata
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mother Sai, the mother of universe, the mother of auspiciousness, the one who fulfills all our wishes and liberate us from this materialistic world, who is none other than the Mother Earth, our Salutations to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Raghu Nandana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Sita Pathey Ramachandra (Hey)
Parama Pavitra Varija Netra
Jagadodhara Nirakara |Sita Pathey|
Ahalyodhara Shabari Raghuraya
Raghukula Bhooshana Rajeeva Lochana |Sita Pathey...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sri Rama, you are the ornament of Raghu Dynasty, you are the destroyer of fear of this materialistic world. Oh Lord of mother Sita, your eyes are like Lotus, Oh Formless one, upholder of the universe, the one who liberated Ahalya from a curse, our Salutations to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Raghu Nandana Dasharatha Nandana
Bhadradeeshwara Rama
Vaidehi Priya Vaikunta Vasa
Sada Smarami Ramethi Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant incessantly the holy name of Rama from Raghu Dynasty. He who is the son of King Dasharatha and who is the presiding deity in Bhadrachalam (A holy place), who is the beloved of Vaidehi (another name for Sita and who resides in Vaikunta (the abode of Lord Vishnu).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Raghu Nandana Janaki Jeevana
Rama Rama Rama Sai (Ram)
Alakh Niranjana Asurani Khandana
Rajeeva Lochana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana |Rama Rama...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Rama, who is the Consort of Janaki (Sita), who is always pure, the slayer of demons, one with eyes like Lotus and who destroys the fear of the materialistic world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Raghu Nandana Sita Rama
Rajeeva Lochana Raja Rama
Raja (Sai) Rama
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Pavana Naama
Atma Rama Sai Rama
Kalimala Bhanjana Kodanda Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Rama of Raghu Dynasty, the consort of Sita, Sri Rama with Lotus eyes, the one whose sacred name destroys the fear of the materialistic world, the Sai Rama who is Atma Rama (Inner self or Higher Conscience) The Rama who wields the bow named "Kodanda" and who destroys the impurities of the age of Kali.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Jaya Ram (2)
Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Sai Ram
Sri Ram Jaya Ram Sri Ram Jaya Ram Sathya Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the glory of Lord Rama. Victory to Lord Sathya Sai Ram

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Jaya Ram Janaki Jeevana Ram
Patitha Pavana Rama Harey Jaya Raghava Sundara Ram
Deenodharana Rama Harey Jaya Maruti Sevitha Ram
Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Raghu Ram Janaki Jeevana Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the embodiment of auspiciousness, the very life of Janaki (Sita) the up lifter of downtrodden, the beautiful one from Raghava Dynasty, who sanctifies the sinners and the one who is worshipped by Maruti (Hanuman).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Rama Charanam Smaramyaham
Sthira Sukha Dayaka Sai Charanam |Sri Rama...|
Shritha Jana Palaka Shirdi Charanam
Srikara Shubha Kara Parthi Charanam
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the feet of Sri Rama which bestows eternal bliss, the feet of Shirdi Sai which bestows austerity to those who worship them and the feet of Parthi Sai which bestows wealth and prosperity.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Rama Charanam Sri Rama Charanam Sri Rama Charanam Bhajey(2)
Vaidehi Ramam Vaikunta Dhamam
Bhoopala Choodamani
Atmabhi Ramam Prabhu Sai Ramam
Sri (Sathya Sai) Rama Charanam Bhajey (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the feet of Lord Sri Rama, Lord of Vaidehi, whose abode is Vaikunta. Like the Choodamani which is the best among the jewels worn on the head, Sri Rama is the Crown Jewel among the kings who have ruled this world. He is the Atma (Higher self or Higher conscience) Rama, Sathya Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Rama Dootha Sri Rama Bhaktha Sri Rama Daasa Namo Namo
Sita Mata Shoka Vinasha
Anatha Natha Namo Namo
Maruti Raya Mahanubhava
Ati Balavanta (Anjaneya) Namo Namo
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Hanuman, the messenger and devotee of Sri Rama. He is the mighty son of Anjani and Vayu (Wind God) and the one who appeased the sorrows of Mother Sita and saviour of needy and downtrodden.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Rama Jaya Rama
Dasharathey Jaya Raghu Rama
Kalyana Rama Kodanda Rama
Sita Rama Sri Raghu Rama
Ram Jaya Ram (Sri)
Sri (Sai) Ram Ram Ram Jaya Ram Ram Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Lord Rama, son of Dasharatha, known by various names as Kalyana Rama, Kodanda Rama, Sita Rama and Raghu Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Rama Jaya Rama
Dasharathey Jaya Raghu Rama
Kalyana Rama Kodanda Rama
Sita Rama Sri Raghu Rama
Ram Jaya Ram (Sri)
Sri (Sai) Ram Ram Ram Jaya Ram Ram Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to the Lord Rama, son of Dasharatha, known by various names as Kalyana Rama, Kodanda Rama, Sita Rama and Raghu Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Jaya Jaya Rama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Sundara Rama |Sri Rama...|
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Mangala Naama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Atma Rama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Sai Rama (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the most beautiful, the one whose name is auspicious, the one who is the in dweller, Atma Rama (Higher conscience or Higher Self)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Rama Naamam Ramaneeya Naamam
Sundara Ramam Sugunabhi Ramam |Sri Rama...|
Munijana Vanditha Mohana Ramam
Janaki Ramam Jagadabhi Ramam
Taraka Naamam Sathya Sai Naamam |Sundara Rama...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Rama, your name is as enchanting as your form. You are beautiful and full of divine qualities worshipped by sages and pious people You are the Consort of Janaki and the Lord of Universe Sai Rama! Your name provides deliverance from sins. (Taraka Naamam)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Rama Namostuthey Sai Krishna Namostuthey
Shirdi Sai Namostuthey
Parthi Baba Namostuthey
Namostuthey Namostuthey
Sai Krishna Namostuthey
Devotional Song Meaning: We worship and chant Sri Rama and Sri Krishna who is also residing in Shirdi and Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Rama Raghu Nandana Ghana Shyama Yadu Nandana
Sri Ranga Nanda Nandana Sri Ranga Nanda Nandana
Ananda Nanda Gopi Ranjana Niranjana
Sri Rama Raghu Nandana
Ghana Shyama Yadu Nandana
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the holy name of Sri Rama who is of Raghu dynasty. He is none other than Ghana Shyama, Yadu Nandana, Sri Ranga (All names of Vishnu and Krishna) bestowing bliss and the one who is adored by Gopikas.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Rama Rama Ram Yadu Nandana Hey Ghana Shyam
Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Jaya Ram (3)
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram |Sri Ram Jaya(3)|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the name of Rama, who is beloved of Sita and Son of Dasharatha and star of Raghu Clan. Fill the mind with the glory of Rama, who sanctifies the sinners. Repeat the name of Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Rama Rama Rama Raghu Nandana Rama Ram
Sri Rama Rama Rama Bharatagraja Rama Ram
Sri Rama Rama Rama Ranadheera Rama Ram
Sri Rama Rama Rama Sharanam Tava Rama Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: I surrender to you Oh courageous Lord Rama of the Raghu Dynasty and the elder brother of Bharata.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Rama Rama Rama Sita Rama Raghava (2)
Narayana Hari Narayana (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the various names of Rama-- Sita Rama, Raghava, Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Rama Sri Raghu Rama
Sri Rama Sita Rama |Sri Rama...|
Sri Rama Megha Shyama
Sri Rama Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the various names of Rama---Raghu Rama, Sita Rama, Megha Shyama, Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Rama Sundara Naama
Raghu Rama Taraka Naama |Sri Rama|
Dasharatha Nandana Sri Rama
Dharma Samrakshaka Sugunabhi Rama
Kalimala Bhanjana Kodanda Rama
Karuna Sagara Kalyana Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: The name Rama is beautiful and provides deliverance from sins. Rama, the son of King Dasharatha has come to uphold righteousness, is noble. He gives succour to sins of the Kali age, is ocean of compassion and auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Ramachandra Jaya Jagannatha
Sita Pathey Jaya Raghu Natha
Patitha Pavana Deena Natha
Deena Natha Deena Natha |Patitha Pavana|
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Natha |Sita Pathey|
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Lord Rama, who is the Lord of the whole world and of the Raghu Dynasty, the consort of Sita, the one who sanctifies the sinners and who is the Lord of Parthi--Sai Natha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Ramachandra Jaya Ramachandra
Raghuveera Ranadheera Raghukula Rama |Sri Ramachandra...|
Dasharatha Nandana Dayabhi Rama
Danava Bhanjana Kodanda Rama
Kalyana Rama Kamaneeya Rama |Raghuveera|
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the valiant hero of the battlefield, the son of Dasharatha, the compassionate one, the slayer of demons, the wielder of the sacred bow Kodanda, one who does good to everyone and who is very attractive to look at.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Ranga Harey Vittala Sai Ranga Harey Vittala
Hey Daya Nidhey Vittala Hey Krupa Nidhey Vittala
Hey Sai Prabho Vittala Sathya Sai Prabho Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant Sri Ranga, Vittala who is all compassionate and merciful Oh Lord Sai Vittala, Oh Sathya Sai Vittala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Ranga Sai Shesha Sai
Sevitha Mohana Sri Sathya sai |Sri Ranga...|
Karunalaya Sri Ranga Sai
Kamaneeyanana Sri Sathya Sai |Sri Ranga...|
Jaya Jaya Govinda Govardhana Sai
Jaya Jaya Gopala Vanditha Sai
Devotional Song Meaning: Sri Ranga is all charming and Lord Sai is resting on serpent "Shesha". He is all compassionate and worshipped in different forms as Sri Ranga, Govinda, holder of Govardhana mountain, Mother Sai and Gopala. He is all attractive, charming Lord Sai

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Ranga Sri Ranga Ranga Ranga Sri Ranga (2)
Kaveri Thata Vasa Kasturi Ranga
Karunya Lavanya Karunanta Ranga
Jaya Panduranga Jaya Sai Ranga (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sriranga who resides on the banks of river Kaveri. He is compassionate and His beauty is enchanting. Victory to you Oh Lord Panduranga.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Ranga Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala (Jaya)
Sri Ranga Panduranga Sai Ranga Vittala |Sri Ranga Vittala|
Rakumayi Vittala Radhey Shyam Vittala
Dwarakamayi Vittala Purandara Vittala |Sri Ranga Panduranga|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Vittala of Pandari the consort of Rakumayi and the beloved of Radha. He is also the Dwarakamayi (Shirdi Sai).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Ranga Vittala Vittala Narayana
Panduranga Vittala Vittala Narayana
Rakumayi Vittala Vittala Narayana
Dwarakamayi Vittala Vittala Narayana
Sri Sai Vittala Vittala Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Pray to Sai Vittala who is none other than Narayana, Panduranga the beloved of Rakumayi and resident of Dwarakamayi (Shirdi Sai).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Rangana Krishnana Devaki Nandana
Kamala Nayana Shyamala Vadana Ananda Chandana |Sri Rangana...|
Venu Vilolana Gopika Ranjana Yashoda Nandana
Ananda Chandana
Yashoda Nandana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Ranganatha, Krishna, son of Devaki, with your Lotus eyes, body of dark complexion, with the flute in your hand your are happiness personified, Oh son of Yashoda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Sai Gananayakam Ganapathim
Bhaktha Jana Vanditham Pavanam |Sri Sai...|
Vidya Buddhi Pradayaka Devam
Bhava Bhaya Haranam Bhavani Tanayam
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai Ganapathi who is the Lord of Ganas (Attendants of Lord Shiva) He is worshipped by his devotees who are sanctified by His grace Oh! Son of Bhavani, you are the provider of knowledge, education and the one who dispels fear of sins and cycle of birth and death.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Sai Natha Deena Natha
Parthi Puri Bhagawan
Shantha Swaroopa Premavatara
Karuna Swaroopa Bhagawan
Rajeeva Lochana Ananda Rama
Mangala Nayanabhi Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the Lord of Parthi, the compassionate Lord of the needy and downtrodden, the personification of Peace, Mercy, the one with Lotus eyes which bestow auspiciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Sai Natha Guru Govinda
Parthi Pureeshwara Jaya Govinda
Prashanthi Nilaya Radhey Govinda
Sri Guru Jaya Guru Vittala Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the name of Lord Sai who is our Guru, the Lord Govinda who resides in Parthi/Prashanthi Nilayam, the Lord of Radha and also known by the name of Vittala.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Sai Rama Harey Sri Sai Rama Harey
Sri Rama Chandra Prabhu Rama Chandra
Sai (Sri) Rama Chandra Harey (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship Sai Rama who is also the Lord Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Sai Rama Sundara Naama
Pavana Charana Prashanthi Rama
Jagadashraya Bhava Bandha Vimochana
Ahalyodharaka Rama Harey
Rama Harey Rama Harey
Parthi Pureesha Mangala Dhama
Pavana Charana Prashanthi Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Rama of Prashanthi, from whom the entire world seeks solace and liberation, you are none other than the Lord Rama who liberated Ahalya, Oh Lord of Parthi we offer our salutations at your sacred feet.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Sai Sharanam Sharanam Deva
Sadguru Mama Guru Sharanam Deva |Sri Sai...|
Guru Sakshath Parabrahma Deva
Guru Vishnu Guru Maheshwara Deva
Sadguru Charanam Sharanam Deva (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: I surrender at the feet of my Divine preceptor, Sai, who is none other than the all pervading Parabrahma (The Supreme Cosmic Spirit). HE is Trinity (Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva) combined in one form.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Sai Shirdeeshwara Parthi Vasa Parameshwara
Patitha Pavana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Lokesha Bhaktha Palana |Sri Sai|
Jaalileda Deena Bandhava
Chaala Mela Jagat Bandhava
Bhaktha Hrudayalaya Srishti Sthithi Laya Sathya Dharma Shanthi Premalaya |Sri Sai|
Paahi Paahi Parameshwara Jata Joota Shambho Shankara
Trishoola Dhara Trinetra Dhari Girija Kantha Sadashiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai of Shirdi and Parthi, you are none other than Lord Shiva who gives succour to your devotees. Oh compassionate Lord show your mercy without delay, you are the cause for the Creation, Existence and Dissolution and the one who establishes Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love in this universe. Please come to protect us Oh compassionate Parameshwara (Lord Shiva) with your matted hair, Trident in hand having three eyes and accompanied by your Consort Girija (Parvathi).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Vasudeva Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana
Janardhana Madhusudhana
Madhusudhana Madhusudhana |Janardhana...|
Govardhanodhara Gopalana
Sri Sai Govinda Madhava Keshava
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship the Lord Hari who is known by many names as Vasudeva, Narayana, Janardhana, Madhusudhana, Govardhanodhari, Gopalana, Madhava, Keshava.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Vasudeva Narayana Sai Narayana
Janardhana Hey Madhusudhana Sai Narayana
Govardhanodhara Gopalana Sai Narayana
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Worship and chant Vasudeva, Janardhana, Madhusudhana, Narayana (All names of Krishna) who as Gopala had lifted Govardhana mountain to protect His devotees. He is the charming Hari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sri Venkatesha Sayeeshwara
Tirumalai Vasa Sayeeshwara
Sayeeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara
Balaji Govinda Sayeeshwara (2)
Akhilanda Natha Ananda Roopa
Venkatesha Sai Venkatesha (3) |Balaji Govinda(2)|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who is also the Lord Venkateshwara or Balaji who resides in Tirumala The Lord Govinda. He is the Lord of the whole Universe and the embodiment of happiness. Worship Lord Sathya Sayeeshwara!

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sridhara Sundara Radhikeshwara
Gaana Priyakara Murali Manohara |Sridhara Sundara|
Natawara Giridhara Gopikeshwara
Sayeeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: The beautiful Lord Vishnu--who is the Lord of Lakshmi and adored by Radha, the Lord who is fond of music and beautiful to look at with his flute, who is the supreme actor and dancer, the Lord of the Gopis, one who lifted the Govardhana Mountain, He is none other than our Lord Sathya Sayeeshwara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Srikari Krupakari Kshemankari Sayeeshwari
Shankari Abhayankari Shubhankari Sayeeshwari |Srikari Krupakari...|
Tandavakeli Priyakari Bhairavi Abhayankari
Sarveshwari Sundari Dayakari Maheshwari
Devotional Song Meaning: The beautiful, compassionate and all pervading goddess Parvathi, the consort of Shankara, is extolled by various names such as-- Srikari "The one who bestows Auspiciousness", Krupakari "Compassionate", Kshemankari "Looking after the welfare of devotees", Abhayankari ", who bestows fearlessness", Shubhakari "Always doing good" and TandavaKeli Priyakari "One who is fond of 'Tandava' dance".

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Srinivasa Govinda Sri Venkatesha Govinda
Purana Purusha Govinda Pundarikaaksha Govinda
Dashavidha Roopa Govinda Krishna Rama Govinda
Krishna Rama Govinda Rama Krishna Govinda
Sai Rama Govinda Sai Krishna Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Srinivasa, Govinda, Venkatesha (All names of Lord Srinivasa of Tirupati) The one who was the Lord of great Epics (Puranas) and the one who has taken ten incarnations. He is also the Lord Sai Rama and Sai Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Srinivasa Sri Venkatesha
Balaji Govinda Sayeesha |Srinivasa Sri...|
Parama Dayala Tirumalai Vasa
Padma Lakshmi Vallabha Esha
Pundarikaaksha Paapa Vinasha
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Srinivasa, Sri Venkatesha, Balaji, Govinda (All names of Lord Srinivasa of Tirupati) Oh Lord Sayeesha You are compassionate Lord residing on the hills of Tirumala accompanied by Padmavati and Lakshmi, You are Pundarikaksha (The lotus-eyed; a title of Vishnu and Krishna) the destroyer of our sins.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Srinivasa Sri Venkatesha
Balaji Govinda Sayeesha |Srinivasa Sri...|
Parama Dayala Tirumalai Vasa
Padma Lakshmi Vallabha Esha
Pundarikaaksha Paapa Vinasha
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Srinivasa, Sri Venkatesha, Balaji, Govinda (All names of Lord Srinivasa of Tirupati) Oh Lord Sayeesha You are compassionate Lord residing on the hills of Tirumala accompanied by Padmavati and Lakshmi, You are Pundarikaksha (The lotus-eyed; a title of Vishnu and Krishna) the destroyer of our sins.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Srinivasa Venkatesha
Shritha Jana Paripala Sayeesha |Srinivasa Venkatesha|
Tirupati Giri Vasa Govinda
Garuda Vahana Govinda Govinda
Govinda Govinda Srinivasa Govinda
Govinda Govinda Shirdi Vasa Govinda
Govinda Govinda Parthi Vasa Govinda
Govinda Govinda Srinivasa Govinda
Govinda Govinda Shirdi Vasa Govinda
Govinda Govinda Parthi Vasa Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the name of Srinivasa, Venkatesha The Lord Sayeesha who protects all those who have surrendered to him, Lord Govinda who resides in Tirupati, One who rides on Garuda.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Srishti Sthithi Layakara Amrutotbhavakara
Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru Devo Maheshwara |Srishti Sthithi|
Lingodhbhavakara Shiva Shiva Shiva Shankara
Shambho Mahadeva Sai Parameshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the Lord Shiva who is responsible for creation, existence and destruction. He is the creator of Amrutha-the immortal nectar. He is the preceptor in the form of Trinity (Brahma, Vishnu and Maheshwara). Lord Sai is none other than Lord Shiva who is the creator of holy Shiva Linga.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Subah Aur Shyam Bol Hari Naam
Gopi Gopala Bhajo Sai Ghana Shyam |Subah Aur...|
Chalo Man Chalo Chaley Baba Ke Dhaam
Shirdi Ke Dhaam Puttaparthi Ke Dhaam
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Hari day in day out, Chant Gopi, Gopala, Sai Ghana Shyam (All names of Krishna) Oh Mind let us proceed with our journey to the abodes of Shirdi Sai and Parthi Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Subrahmanya Maam Paahi Sai Natha Maam Paahi
Shambhu Kumara Maam Paahi Sharavana Bhava Guha Maam Paahi
Shanmukha Natha Maam Paahi Sai Natha Maam Paahi
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Subrahmanyam Hara Hara Hara Hara Subrahmanyam
Shiva Shiva Bala Subrahmanyam Hara Hara Bala Subrahmanyam
Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Subrahmanyam Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Subrahmanyam
Devotional Song Meaning: We take refuge in Lord Subrahmanya, son of Lord Shambhu (Lord Shiva) Praise Him as Sharavana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Subrahmanya Namostuthey
Sura Samhara Namostuthey
Suramuni Pala Namostuthey
Kanda Kumara Namostuthey
Shambhu Kumara Namostuthey
Shankari Bala Namostuthey
Shanmukha Natha Namostuthey
Sai Natha Namostuthey (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Pray to Lord Subrahmanya destroyer of demon Sura. He is worshipped by pious sages and noble souls. He is son of mother Shankari. Our Salutations to you Oh Sai Natha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Subrahmanyam Subrahmanyam Shanmukha Natha Subrahmanyam
Subrahmanyam Subrahmanyam Sai Natha Subrahmanyam
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Subrahmanyam Hara Hara Hara Hara Subrahmanyam
Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Subrahmanyam Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Subrahmanyam
Shiva Sharavana Bhava Subrahmanyam Guru Sharavana Bhava Subrahmanyam
Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Subrahmanyam Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Subrahmanyam
Devotional Song Meaning: We take refuge in Lord Subrahmanyam and praise Him as Sharavana. Glory to Lord Subrahmanya and Lord Sai Natha

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sumiran Kar Man Naam Prabhu Ka
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Prabhu Ka |Sumiran Kar|
Kamal Nayana Prabhu Sundara Shyama
Karley Sumiran Sai Rama
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind meditate upon the form of Lord Sai of Parthi, He is none other than the Lotus eyed Lord Krishna. Meditate upon the form of Lord Sai Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sun Ley Pukar Sai Murali (2)
Madhura Murali Mangala Murali
Mohana Murali Mukunda Murali
Sumadhura Murali Sunaada Murali
Madhava Murali Yadava Murali
Madhumathi Radha Lola Murali
Madhuvana Sanchari Shyama Murali
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna of Yadava clan, please listen to my appeal, you are the Murali krishna who raptures everyone with your sublime, sweet lilting music on your flute, going around the beautiful forest with Radha as consort.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sunaada Vinodini Sai Janani
Bhavani Jaganmohini Sai Janani |Sunaada Vinodini...|
Sambhavi Shiva Ranjani Sai Janani
Shankari Narayani Sai Janani
Bhagawathi Vara Dayini Sai Janani
Devotional Song Meaning: The mother Sai who enjoys music has several forms and names. They are, the Goddess Bhavani who has enchanted the whole world, the Goddess Sambhavi who pleases and entertains Lord Shiva, the Goddess Shankari, Narayani and the Lord Bhagawathi who bestows boons to all.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sunaada Vinodini Suhaasini
Anatha Rakshaki Sri Bhuvaneshwari
Abhaya Pradayini Ananda Roopini
Devotional Song Meaning: The Divine Mother revels in sacred music, is bliss personified, protector of helpless and needy and the one who bestows solace to all.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sundara Mukha Sri Gajanana
Eka Dantha Sri Gajanana |Sundara Mukha...|
Prathama Namami Gajanana
Rishi Muni Vanditha Gajanana
Gajanana Om Gajanana (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Ganesh the beautiful elephant faced Lord with a single tusk and is the one whom the entire universe worships first. The wise and noble sages too worship him first.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sundara Paadam Sai Paadam
Pankaja Charanam Paapa Vimochanam |Sundara Paadam...|
Nataraja Natanam Sai Paadam
Sri Krishna Narthanam Sai Paadam
Bhava Dukha Haranam Sai Paadam
Jagadodharanam Sai Paadam
Devotional Song Meaning: The feet of Sai are beautiful. The feet which are soft like Lotus petals give relief from our sins. The feet of Sai are the dancing feet of Lord Shiva and that of Lord Krishna. The feet of Sai provide solace from the trials and tribulations in our lives and they are the feet that uplift the world from miseries and calamities.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sundara Rama Sai Rama
Sugunatheetha Megha Shyama
Srishti Sthithi Laya Karana Rama
Munijana Poojita Taraka Naama
Sath Chith Ananda Swaroopa Naam (2)
Sai Ram Sai Ram (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Beautiful Rama, your virtues are of highest order, your colour is that of dark clouds, you are responsible for Creation and existence, you are adored by sages, you are the liberator from the cycle of birth and death and you are always in bliss.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sundara Shyam Nayanabhi Ram
Hey Ghana Shyam Nayanabhi Ram
Natawara Shyam Nayanabhi Ram
Radhey Shyam Nayanabhi Ram
Sai Shyam Nayanabhi Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: This Bhajan extols Lord Krishna as the blue dark complexioned Shyama, the supreme dancer and actor, the Lord of Radha who is very beautiful and enchanting for the eyes.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sundara Shyama Murari Sai
Gopala Sri Hari Sri Hari (2)
Parama Niranjana Madhava Sai
Sakala Charachara Vyapaka Sai |Gopala Sri...|
Devotional Song Meaning: The beautiful Lord Sai, also known as Shyama Murari, Gopala and Sri Hari, Lord Madhava Sai (all synonyms with Krishna) who is always pure, is spread everywhere in all the animate and inanimate things.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sundara Sugunabhi Rama Rama
Mandara Makaranda Madhurya Naama Rama |Sundara Sugunabhi|
Kodanda Mandita Ranadheera Rama Rama
Ananda Mandira Rama
Rama Jai Jai Ram Sri Rama Jai Jai Ram (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Beautiful and Virtuous Rama, your name is sweeter than honey. Oh Rama with the Kodanda (the Sacred Bow) in hand you are the personification of Valour in the battle. You are the temple of Bliss. Victory to you Oh Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sundara Sundara Nachey Sundara Sai Ghana Shyam
Nachey Rey Sai Sundara Shyam
Rhumaka Jhumaka Jhum Ghungaroo Bhajey Nachey Ghana Shyam
Nachey Natawara Sai Sundara Merey Sai Ram
Nachey Nachey Mana Mandir Mey Merey Sai Ram |Nachey Rey...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord it is a treat for the eyes and ears when the dark complexioned Shyam (Krishna) dances with the jingling anklets on His little feet, which go in rhythm to the tune. Oh Lord please dance in our hearts the same way for the song of our life.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sundara Sundara SaiSundara
Sundara Nanda Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala
Murali Madhava Mohana Roopa
Munijana Manasa Chora
Chitha Chora MaakhanChora
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the enchanting Lord Sai Gopala, the son of Nanda, the one who loves the music of the flute, the one who steals butter as well as the hearts of sages.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sundara Sundara Vinayaka
Shubha Mangala Dayaka Vinayaka
Vighna Koti Hara Vimala Gajanana
Sakala Vighna Hara Sai Gajanana
Eshwari Nandana Parthi Gajanana
Jai Jai Ganesha Jai Sri Ganesha (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Ganesha who is very beautiful, who bestows everything good and auspicious. HE is the remover of millions of obstacles that come in our way. He is Sai Gajanana (Another name for Lord Ganesha meaning Elephant faced) who resides in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sundara Vadana Gopala
Nayana Sunayana Hey Nandalala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Radha Jeevana Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Gopala, you are most enchanting, with beautiful eyes Oh son of King Nanda, Lord of Meera and the beloved of Radha, our salutations to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sundara Vadana Sarasija Nayana
Parthi Puri Bhagawan
Jagat Paripala Prashanthi Nilaya
Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan
Daya Karo Bhagawan
Krupa Karo Bhagawan
Parthi Pureesha Hey Bhuvanesha
Raksha (Sai Krupa) Karo Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord of Parthi with eyes like Lotus and who has a beautiful face who protects and sustains the world and who resides in Prashanthi Nilayam, You are my Lord. Please have compassion on me and shower your grace on me Oh Lord of Parthi and Lord of the World.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sundara Vadani Suguna Manohari
Manda Haasa Mukha Shashi Vadani
Chandana Kumkuma Alankruta Vadani
Sai Maheshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Om Shakthi Om Om Shakthi Om Om Shakthi Om Om Shakthi Om (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name 'Om Shakthi Om' repeatedly which extols Mother as Maheshwari, virtuous Goddess of Emperors, having a blissful smile with the Sandal paste and vermillion on her beautiful face.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Sundari Soundari Suguna Manohari
Shankari Sambhavi Sayeeshwari (2)
Nitya Niranjani Niramayi
Ranjani Rakshaki Sathya Sayeeshwari
Devotional Song Meaning: The Divine Mother is beauty personified, highly virtuous, consort of Shankara, ever blemishless, the one who protects Her devotees is none other than Sathya Sayeeshwari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Suramuni Vanditha Vinayaka
Ananda Dayaka Vinayaka
Hey Shiva Nandana Shubhanana
Paahi Ganesha Vinayaka
Paahi Ganesha Paahi Ganesha Paahi Ganesha Vinayaka (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Vinayaka, son of Lord Shiva. You are worshipped by all gods and sages and you bestow happiness to all.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Swagatham Swagatham Sri Sathya Paahi Suswagatham
Prashanthi Nilayam Paramatma Roopam
Parthi Pureesham Suswagatham |Swagatham Swagatham...|
Sathya Swaroopam Sadguru Natham
Dharma Swaroopam Suswagatham
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sathya Sai a very warm welcome to you, Oh Lord of Prashanthi Nilaya and personification of the Divine Atma (Higher Self or Higher Conscience), welcome to you the Lord of Parthi Oh Sadguru, the embodiment of Truth and Righteousness, a very warm welcome to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Swamiyey Sharanam Sharanam Ayyappa (2)
Sayeesha Sharanam Sharanam Sayeesha (2) |Swamiyey Sharanam...|
Shabari Giri Vasa Dharma Shastha
Parthi Puri Vasa Dharma Rakshaka
Mohini Bala Pampa Vasa
Eshwari Bala Chithravathi Vasa
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Kali Avatara (2)
Swamiyey Sharanam Sharanam Ayyappa (3)
Sharanam Sharanam Ayyappa (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: I surrender myself to thee O Lord Ayyappa, son of Mohini, who has incarnated to establish righteousness on Earth residing on the hills of Shabari near the river Pampa. I surrender myself to Lord Sayeesha son of Mother Eshwaramba residing on the banks of river Chitravathi, the incarnation of this Kali age who has taken the vow to protect His devotees.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Teertha Vittala Kshetra Vittala
Deva Vittala Pooja Vittala |Teertha Vittala...|
Sai Vittala Baba Vittala
Bandhu Vittala Guravey Vittala
Vittala Vittala Sri Hari Vittala
Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala
Vittala Vittala Sai Hari Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of the Lord Panduranga Vittala, the Lord who resides in all holy places, the God you worship, who is your preceptor, kith and kin and who is none other than Sai Hari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Terey Darshana Ko Mera Mana Tarasey
Gopala Darshana Do Nandalala
Neeraja Lochana Hey Guna Dhama
Peetambara Dhara Hey Ghana Shyama
Darshana Do Darshana Do Nandalala |Gopala Darshana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Gopala (Krishna) the virtuous one with lotus eyes, wearing the yellow clothes, please give your vision me, my heart is pining for you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Terey Siwa Prabhu Koi Nahin Hai Tuj Ko Mera Pranam
Tuj Ko Mera Pranam O Sai Baba Tuj Ko Mera Pranam
Murali Manohara Asha Na Todo
Dukh Bhanjana Mera Sath Na Chodo
Dwar Khada Hoon Main Dukhiyara
Sun Ley Meri Pukar O Sai Baba Sun Ley Meri Pukar
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord there is nobody for me except you, please accept my salutations. Oh beautiful Lord Krishna (Murali Manohara) do not disappoint me, Oh destroyer of sorrows, do not leave me. I am standing at your door with sorrowful mind. Please listen to my cries Oh Sai Baba.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tirumala Vasa Tirupati Esha
Devadi Deva Govinda
Pushkarini Thata Vasa Srinivasa
Punya Murthy Sathya Sai Govinda
Govinda Govinda Tirupati Vasa (Parthi Nivasa) Govinda
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Govinda, Lord of Virtues, who has Tirumala Hills at Tirupati as your abode on the banks of sacred Pushkarini.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tirumalesha Ramana Govinda
Parthi Puri Ramana Sayeesha |Tirumalesha Ramana...|
Gangadhara Hara Pannaga Bhooshana
Sri Nilaya Hari Kaustubha Dhari
Hari Hara Roopa Sri Venkatesha
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sayeesha the beloved Lord of Parthi, you are the Lord Govinda the beloved Lord of Tirumala and Lord Shankara holding river Ganges on the head and adorning serpent as an ornament. You are the one who wears the Kaustubha jewel and you are Lord Venkatesha who is the embodiment of Hari (Vishnu) and Hara (Shiva).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tribhuvana Pala Shirdi Pureesha
Araj Suno Merey Baba
Deena Janon Ke Tum Rakhwaley
Shyama Manohara Muraliwale
In Aankhon Ke Pyaas Bujhadey
Darshana Do Parthi Baba |Araj Suno...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord of Shirdi, who sustains of the three worlds, guardian of the helpless, who has an enchanting form with the flute, in His hand. Oh Lord, pay heed to our prayers and satiate our hunger for your vision Oh Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Trilochana Hey Tripurari
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Shankara |Trilochana...|
Paahi Murari Jaya Partheesha
Nandi Vahana Nagabharana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord of Parthi, protect us, you are none other than Lord Shankara who is the Consort of Mother Gowri and the Lord of the three worlds. You are the three eyed Lord Shankara who adorns snake as an ornament, who rides on a Bull (Nandi).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Triloka Palaka Trishoola Dharaka
Trilochana Harey Bala Shiva
Shibey Jata Joota Kantey Kalakoota
Chidambaresha Natana Shiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Shiva sustains the three worlds, three eyed and holds Trident, as the weapon, is young, having matted hair, is the presiding Lord of dance at the temple town Chidambaram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Triloka Palini Jagadeeshwari
Sadananda Roopini Sayeeshwari |Triloka Palini...|
Karunya Lavanya Kadambari
Partheeshwari Amba Shiva Shankari
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mother Sayeeshwari, the protector of the three worlds, one who is always blissful, compassionate and beautiful, the mother of Parthi, the consort of Shiva, our salutations to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tripura Sundari Ma Amba Daya Sagari Ma
Sundara Vadani Ma Amba Suguna Manohari Ma
Jaya Jagat Janani Ma Amba Jagadodharini Ma
Parthi Nivasini Ma Amba Paapa Vimochani Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh mother of Parthi you are the most beautiful in all the three worlds, you are the ocean of compassion, full of virtues you are the mother who liberates the world and frees us from our sins.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tripurari Shiva Shankara
Naga Bhooshana Naga Bharana |Tripurari Shiva...|
Omkaareshwara Namah Shivaya
Mahakaleshwara Namah Shivaya
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Shiva (also called Shankara), the slayer of Demon Tripura, the one who wears the serpent as ornament, the personification of the primordial sound "OM", the Lord Mahakala (Shiva's another name) I offer my salutation to you.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tu Hai Anatha Bandhu
Karuna Sindho Sri Sai Bhagawan |Tu Hai...|
Dukh Aur Dard Ko Door Karo
Sukh Ke Karana Dukh Ke Nivaran
Main Kya Janoon Teri Leela (Mahima)
Mamata Maya Mey Sab Hai Andhera (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Sai is the friend of the forlorn and HE is full of compassion. How can we ever know your grandeur, Oh Sai ? You are the cause of happiness and remover of sorrow when we are stooped in the darkness of ignorance ?

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tulasi Mala Dhaari Krishna
Tunga Teera Vihari Krishna |Tulasi Mala Dhaari...|
Gopi Manasa Gopala Krishna
Gopala Krishna Gopala Krishna |Gopi Manasa...|
Govinda Govinda Sai Krishna
