Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Gopala Krishna, Govinda Krishna the one who has worn the Tulasi garland and has installed Himself on the banks of River Tunga and has captured the minds of the Gopikas.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tum Bin Pran Nahin O Sai Merey
Sab Bhakthon Ka Tu Hai Sahara
Rahim Kaho Raghu Rama Kaho |Tum Bin...|
Nanak Yesu Mahaveera Shiva Shankara Premavatara Sai Ram
Tum Ho Merey Pran O Sai Merey
Tu Hai Sai Bhagawan
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh compassionate Lord Sai Ram, Lord Shankara you are also none other than Guru Nanak, Yesu and Mahaveera. Lord Sai, we adore You as personification of Love, the basis of all faiths. Chant, Ram, Rahim, Nanak, Yesu, Mahaveer. Oh Sai there would be no life without You.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tum Ho Anatha Nath Bhagawan
O Sai Merey Prana Sakha Bhagawan
Mata Pitha Guru Bandhu Tum Ho
Bhaktha (Deena) Sakha Bhagawan
Bhagawan Bhagawan (2)
Prana Sakha Bhagawan (O Sai Merey)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai Bhagawan, You are the Lord of the forlorn, closest friend for your devotees. You are everything, the Mother, Father, preceptor and even the kith and kin.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tum ho Daata Sai Shankara
Hum Ko Deejo Ananda Baba |Tum Ho Daata...|
Aao Shankara Anatha Natha
Deejo Darshana Deena Natha
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Shankara you are the one who bestows everything. We pray that you give us the eternal bliss. Please come and give vision Oh Lord Shankara, to the helpless and downtrodden.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan (Baba)
Parthi Pureesha Sri Sai Natha
Shirdi Pureesha Hey Jagannatha |Tum Ho...|
Prashanthi Vasa Sri Sai Natha
Purana Purusha Hey Jagannatha
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, who was the Lord of Shirdi and now is the Lord of Parthi and is also Lord of the world and the Lord who was mentioned in great Epics (Puranas) like Mahabharata, Ramayana etc., you are my Lord.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan O Sai
Tum Ho Merey Atma Ram |Tum Ho|
Allah Tum Ho Eshwar Tum Ho
Nanak Sai Yesu Tum Ho
Sab Dharmon Ke Sai Tum Ho
Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Sai Ram (2)
Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Sai Ram (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Sai Ram who is the Rama residing in our Atma (Higher Conscience or Higher Self). He is Allah, Eshwar, Nanak, Yesu and belongs to all faiths.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tum Ho Prabhu Ghana Shyam O Sai
Parthi Vihari Shyama Murari |Tum Ho...|
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Natawara Sundara Shyama Murari
Charana Kamala Balihaari Murari
Devotional Song Meaning: You are the Lord Krishna (Ghana Shyam) of the colour of dark thick clouds, who slayed demon Mura, the supreme actor, enchanting, extolled by devotee Meera as Giridhara Naagara (Lifted the mountain Mandara, dexterously). I offer myself at your Lotus feet Oh Lord.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tum Ho Ram Tum Ho Shyam
Bhakthon Ke Pran Bhagawan Sai Ram
Sita Ram Radhey Shyam
Eka Prabhu Sai Ram Bhagawan |Bhakthon Ke|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sai, you are the very life of your devotees, all forms blended in one, though known as Sita Ram and Radhey Shyam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tum Ho Shyam Ram Rahim (Baba)
Ram Rahim Shyama Rahim |Tum Ho...|
Allah Yesu Buddha Mahaveera
Nanak Sai Zohrashtra Bhi Ho
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Narayana (Shankara)
Tum Ho Shyam Ram Rahim
Ram Rahim Shyam Rahim (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: You are the Lord of every religion Oh Sai. Devotees adore you as Ram, Rahim, Allah, Yesu, Buddha, Mahaveera, Nanak, Zohrashtra, Narayana and Shankara.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tum Ho Vighna Vinasha Ganesha (3)
Parvathi Nandana Paahi Gajanana
Pranava Swaroopa Parthi Pureesha
Paahi Ganesha Vighna Vinasha
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect me Oh Lord Ganesha, the destroyer of all obstacles, the son of Parvathi, the embodiment of primordial sound "OM" and the Lord of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Tumhey Namaskar Sai Baba Tumhey Namaskar Sai Baba
Pranam Mera Sweekar Bhagawan Parthi Puri Sai Deva |Tumhey Namaskar|
Hey Shiva Lingadhaari Baba Hey Ananda Daayi Baba |Pranam Mera|
Hey Vibhuti Sundara Baba Tum Ati Sundara Sai Baba (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Accept our repeated obeisances Oh Bhagawan Sai Baba, the Lord of Parthi, the one who adorns the Shivalinga, giver of supreme bliss. You smear yourself with Vibhuti (Holy Ash) and you are the most beautiful Sai.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Uma Maheshwara Kumara Ganapathi
Namami Gajamukha Daya Nidhey
Bhaktha Jana Priya Sai Ganesha (2)
Bala Gajanana Krupa Nidhey (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: I bow to the elephant faced Lord Ganesha, with His entire family, parents Uma (Parvathi) and Maheshwara (Shiva) and brother Kumara (Lord Muruga). The Lord of Ganas (attendants of Lord Shiva) is dear to His devotees and is the repository of benevolence.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Bol Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Bolo |Vahey Guru| Govinda Bolo Gopala Bolo Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Bolo Shirdi (Parthi) Pureeshwara Sri Sai Bol |Sathya Naam|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Vahey Guru, Sathya Sai, Govinda, Gopala the Lord of Radha and Shirdi Sai

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Ji Bolo
Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Jai Bolo
Nitya Nitya Japiyey Terey Naam Jai Bolo |Sathya Naam|
Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Jai Bolo
Nitya Nitya Japiyey Rama Naam Jai Bolo
Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jai Bolo
Nitya Nitya Japiyey Krishna Naam Jai Bolo
Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Jai Jai
Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai (2)
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Jai Jai
Devotional Song Meaning: Always chant the names of Vahey Guru (Guru Nanak), Rama, Krishna and Govinda the beloved of Radha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vaidehi Priya Vaikunta Rama
Ahalyodharaka Rama
Raghu Vara Janani Janaki Rama
Lakshmana Sevitha Lavanya Rama
Dasharatha Nandana Rama |Raghu Vara|
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Rama of Vaikunta, beloved of Vaidehi/Janaki (Other names of mother Sita) the liberator of Ahalya, worshipped by Lakshmana, son of Dasharatha and the Lord of the Raghu dynasty.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vaikuntapathey Narayana
Varija Nayana Narayana |Vaikuntapathey Narayana|
Vakshasthala Kaustubha Mani Bhooshita
Shankha Chakra Peetambara Shobhita
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Narayana, who resides in Vaikunta, who has eyes in the shape of lotus, with the Kaustubha jewel on his chest and is adorned with Shanka (Conch) Chakra (Disc) and auspicious dress (Yellow and Orange colours.)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vaikuntapathey Sai Harey
Vyjayanthi Mala Dhari |Vaikuntapathey Sai...|
Hari Govinda Hari Gopala (3)
Vara Godavari Teera Vihari
Devotional Song Meaning: The Lord Sai of Vaikunta, who wears the Vyjayanthi garland (A necklace worn by Lord Narayana as a sign of victory), the Lord Hari and Govinda who strolls on the banks of Godavari.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vaishnavi Ma Varahi Ma
Vishweshwari Ma Vani Ma |Vaishnavi Ma...|
Shakthi Swaroopini Sai Ma
Shanthi Pradayini Santoshi Ma (Pra)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the Mother Vaishnavi also known as Santoshi, the mother of the world, the personification of Shakthi and the giver of peace.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vakratunda Mahakaya Sri Ganesha Paahi Maam
Vighna Raja Vighna Nasha Vighneshwara Paahi Maam |Vakratunda Mahakaya...|
Paahi Maam Karunakara Paahi Maam Jagadeeshwara |Vighna Raja|
Devotional Song Meaning: Protect us Oh compassionate Lord Ganesha, Lord of the world, with your contorted body you destroy the obstacles in life.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vanamala Shritha Jana Pala
Darshanam Ivvayya Gopala (Sai)
Goparipala Gopi Lola
Radha Manasa Giridhara Bala
Giridhara Bala Raasa Vilola (Radha Lola) (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Gopala, the protector of good and the pious, who adorns the garland of forest flowers, grant us Your vision. You are the protector of the cows. You occupy the thoughts of Radha, you are the one who protected the devotees by lifting the Mandara Mountain and the one who performed the celestial dance.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vanamali Brinda Vanamali Krishna (2)
Vanamali Brinda Vanamali
Kalinga Narthana Kamsadi Mardhana
Radha Hrudaya Nivasa Harey Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Krishna, the one who adorns the garland of forest flowers grown in Brindavan. You are the one who put an end to the poisonous snake Kalinga, annihilated wicked Kamsa and you dwell in the heart of Radha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vanamali Radha Ramana Giridhari Govinda
Neela Megha Sundara Narayana Govinda |Vanamali Radha...|
Bhaktha Hrudaya Mandara Bhanu Koti Sundara
Nanda Nanda Gopa Vrinda Narayana Govinda
Narayana Govinda (9)
Narayana Narayana Narayana Govinda (2)
Narayana Govinda (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the names of Govinda, also called the Giridhari, beloved of Radha, the wearer of garland of forest flowers, the beautiful and dark blue Narayana, who is like the Mandara flower in the hearts of his devotees, who is beautiful and effulgent like a million Suns, the son of Nanda and one among the cowherds.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vanamali Vasudeva Jaganmohana Radha Ramana
Jaganmohana Radha Ramana (2)
Shashi Vadana Sarasija Nayana Jaganmohana Radha Ramana (3)
Radha Ramana Radha Ramana (4)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna, adorning the garland made of forest flowers you attract all minds and the whole world. Your charming bright face like a shining moon and eyes like lotus are admired by Radha.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vanamali Vedodhara
Vaikuntapathey Narayana
Giridhari Gaana Manohara
Garuda Vahana Narayana (4) |Vaikuntapathey Narayana|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord the one who adorns the garland made of forest flowers, the one who protects and nourishes the Vedas, you are Narayana the Lord of Vaikunta, the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain to protect your devotees and the one who relishes the sweetness of divine music.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vande Sai Sadguru Charanam
Pavana Charanam Pankaja Charanam |Vande Sai...|
Brahmananda Swaroopa Manoharam
Paramananda Swaroopa Smaranam
Jagadodharana Shanthi Sadanam
Sai Charanam Paapa Haranam |Pavana Charanam...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Let us offer our obeisance at the sacred lotus feet of the benevolent Guru, Sai, the very embodiment of supreme and highest bliss and up-lifter of the down trodden.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vande Uma Nandanam Gajananam
Suramuni Sevitha Sumukha Gajananam |Vande Uma...|
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Siddhi Vinayaka Paahi Gajananam
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Gajanana, the son of Uma and the one who is worshipped by sages, who is the giver of knowledge, intellect and boons.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vayu Kumara Vanara Veera
Ati Balavanta Hanumantha
Kesari Nandana Anjani Putra
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Pavana Kumara (2)
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Pavana Kumara (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Hanuman, the son of Kesari and Anjana, you are the most powerful, victory to you Oh blessed son of Wind God (born to Kesari and Anjana out of boon from the Lord of Wind)

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Veda Kalamayi Naada Swaroopini
Kadamba Priyey Karuna Sagari
Veena Venu Mrudanga Vinodini
Gnana Bharana Bhooshani Ranjani
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the repository of Vedas (Goddess Saraswathi), who is personification of melody, the one who has decorated herself with various jewels, loves music, plays Veena, Flute and Mrudangam (Indian percussion instrument used mostly in South India).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Veena Gaana Priyey Sharadey
Vedakala Nilayey Saraswathi |Veena Gaana Priyey...|
Vidya Sahitey Vimaley Kamaley
Bhavalankruta Gaana Viloley
Mukti Pradayini Hey Jagat Janani
Parthi Pureeshwari Hey Bhavani
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Goddess Sharada (Saraswathi) who is fond of the music of Veena, in whom all the knowledge and arts of the Vedas are enshrined, the mother of the world who gives liberation, the Mother Bhavani of Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Veena Vadini Saraswathi Ma
Jaya Jagadambey Janani Ma |Veena Vadini...|
Ambey Bhavani Sai Ma
Jaya Jagadeeshwari Rakshaya Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Please protect me Oh Universal Mother Sai, you are none other than Goddess Saraswathi playing celestial music with her Veena.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Veera Dheera Shoora Hanuman Ki Jai
Pavana Putra Anjaneya Hanuman Ki Jai |Veera Dheera...|
Sada Rama Naama Japata Hanuman Ki Jai
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram |Sada Rama...|
Sita Shoka Nasha Kaarana Hanuman Ki Jai
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Hanuman the one of valour, courage, strength, son of Pavana (the wind god) and Anjana Devi, who chants Lord Rama's name incessantly and who is responsible for the removal of Mother Sita's sorrow.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Veera Hanumathey Namo Namo
Vayu Kumara Namo Namo |Veera Hanumathey...|
Raghava Priyakara Namo Namo
Sri Rama Dootha Namo Namo
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Hanuman the personification of courage, who is son of wind god, messenger and dearest to Lord Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Veera Maruti Gambhira Maruti
Dheera Maruti Ati Dheera Maruti
Geeta Maruti Sangeeta Maruti
Dootha Maruti Rama Dootha Maruti
Bhaktha Maruti Parama Bhaktha Maruti
Devotional Song Meaning: Maruti the son of Wind God, is one of supreme valour, courage and was highly talented in Music. He is the messenger and devotee of the highest order of Lord Rama.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vibhuti Sundara Sai Nath
Sai Nath Sai Nath Sathya Sai Nath
Gangadhara Hara Samba Sadashiva |Sai Nath|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Sathya Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva who is covered with sacred ash and on whose head He adorns the pious river Ganga.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vibhuti Sundara Sai Nath Hara Hara Mahadeva
Bilva Dala Priya Chandrakaladhara
Hara Hara Mahadeva
Vyagrambaradhara Sai Sundara
Hara Hara Mahadeva
Shiva Shiva Sadashiva
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Shiva also known as Hara and Sadashiva, the Lord of Lords, has the sacred ash smeared all over His body, loves the Bilva leaf (Leaf of wood apple tree or Bel tree) used in HIS worship, bears the Crescent moon on His head and wears the Tiger skin.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Vidya Dayini Bhagavati Namo Namo Namo Sai Narayani |Vidya Dayini...| Chinmaya Roopini Naada Swaroopini |Namo Namo...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Obeisance to the Goddess who bestows Knowledge and who plays musical instruments (Goddess Saraswathi), the embodiment of sound, energy and Cosmic consciousness.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vighna Vinashaka Deva
Suramuni Vanditha Deva
Tribhuvana Palaka Deva Deva |Vighna Vinashaka|
Triloka Vanditha Jaya Gana Deva
Pranava Swaroopa Deva Deva
Pranava Swaroopa Deva
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to the Lord Ganesha who destroys the obstacles in life and is worshipped by sages and pious. He rules all the three worlds and is worshipped in the three worlds. He is the personification of the primordial sound "OM".

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vighna Vinashaka Devadi Deva
Adi Sanathana Deva
Prathama Poojya Gananatha
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Nitya Niranjana
Siddhi Vinayaka Deva
Mangala Dayaka Shambho Manohara |Prathama Poojya|
Devotional Song Meaning: You are always offered the first prayers in any worship Oh Lord of Ganas (the attendants of Lord Shiva), Oh Lord of Lords, eternal, ancient and destroyer of obstacles. You annihilate the fear of birth and death, Lord of powers acquired through austerities, blemishless, who bestows auspiciousness and dear son of Lord Shiva. .

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vighna Vinashaka Gananatha
Gajanana Hey Gajavadana
Gananatha Gananatha
Pranava Swaroopa Gananatha
Parthi Pureeshwara Gananatha |Gajanana Hey|
Devotional Song Meaning: The elephant faced Lord Ganesha is the leader of Ganas (the attendants of Lord Shiva), destroyer of all obstacles. He is the embodiment of primordial sound "Om" and resides in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vighna Vinashaka Vinayaka (3)
Amba Bhavani Shiva Shambhu Kumara
Karunya Lavanya Akhilandeshwara
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Vinayaka (Lord Ganesha), the destroyer of obstacles in life, who is the son of Lord Shiva and Parvathi (Amba Bhavani), who is compassionate and beautiful and who is the Lord of the Universe.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vighneshwara Gananatha Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Shubhanana
Mangala Murthy Sri Ganaraya
Jaya Ganaraya Sri Ganaraya (2)
Ashta (Siddhi) Vinayaka Shubhanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Vighneshwara (Lord Ganesha) the son of Parvathi, , having a pleasant and auspicious face, who bestows eight types of blessings. He is also known as Siddhi Vinayaka. (Fulfills your prayers).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vighneshwara Maha Devadi Deva
Vighna Vinashaka Deva
Pranavakara Jyothi Swaroopa
Jaya Mangala Kara Deva
Jaya Mangala Kara Deva (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Victory to Lord Vighneshwara (Lord Ganesha), Lord of Lords, destroyer of obstacles in life, personification of the primordial sound OM and and also the embodiment of divine light.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vighneshwara Vinayaka
Vishwa Dhara Namostuthey
Namostuthey Namostuthey |Vishwa Dhara|
Suramuni Vanditha Vinayaka
Bhava Bhaya Nasha Vinayaka
Sharanam Sharanam Vinayaka (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations and surrender to Lord Vighneshwara (Lord Ganesha) who sustains the Universe, who is worshipped by Holy and Pious sages and who destroys the fear of this world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vighneshwaram Bhaja Vighneshwaram Sadguru Natham Gowri Sutham
Jaya Shiva Nandana Vighneshwaram Pranavanandam Devi Sutham
Siddhi Vinayaka Vighneshwaram Vidya Dayaka Gowri Sutham
Vighneshwaram Bhaja Vighneshwaram Sharanam Sharanam Devi Sutham
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the praises of the master of obstacles, Lord Vighneshwara (Lord Ganesha), son of Shiva and Gowri, the embodiment of "Om" (the primordial sound), one who bestows knowledge and spiritual boons. Let us surrender to the son of Devi.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Vighneshwaram Bhajorey Manasa Vighna Haram Bhajorey (2) Vighneshwaram Bhajorey Manasa Vighna Haram Bhajorey (Bhajorey)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Mind! Sing the praises of Lord Vighneshwara (Lord Ganesha) who removes all obstacles and destroys them.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vinati Karoon Main Baar Baar Sai
Darshana Do Mujhey Ek Baar Sai |Vinati Karoon...|
Hrudaya Mandir Mey Aao Sai
Lelo Hum Ko Charano Mey Sai
Deejo Hum Ko Charan Tumharey
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai I plead with you time and again, to give me Darshan at least once and enshrine yourself in my heart. I prostrate at your feet. Please accept me to your fold.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vinati Suno Merey Sai Bhagawan
Daya Karo Merey Sai Bhagawan
Bhaktha Janon ke Tum Ho Pran
Deena Dayala Karuna Nidhan
Tribhuvana Pala Sadhu Paritra
Devotional Song Meaning: Please listen to my pleadings Oh my Lord Sai, have compassion on me, you are the very life of your devotees, you are the treasure house of compassion showing mercy on the downtrodden, you are the one who sustains the three worlds and the protector of Saints.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vinati Suno Vinati Suno
Vinati Suno Ma Vinati Suno
Ma Vinati Suno
Sankata Harini Santoshi Ma
Sadhu Jana Priya Sai Ma
Sada Ananda Dayini Ma
Sadashiva Priya Sai Ma
Sathya Sai Ma
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Sathya Sai Ma, (Represents Goddess Parvathi here) you are very dear to Lord Shiva, you bestow happiness to all, you are very dear to all the Saints, Oh Santoshi Ma you are the annihilator of all sufferings, please listen to my pleadings.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vinayaka Vighna Nashaka
Anatha Rakshaka Ananda Dayaka
Uma Maheshwara Hey Shiva Nandana
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Oh Lord Vinayaka, the destroyer of obstacles, protector of the downtrodden, who bestows happiness and who is son of Goddess Uma (Parvathi's another name) and Lord Shiva.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vinayaka Vinayaka
Vighna Vinashaka Vinayaka
Gowri Nandana Hey Shiva Nandana
Parvathi Nandana Gajanana
Mooshika Vahana Gajanana
Modaka Hasta Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Vinayaka (Lord Ganesha), the destroyer of obstacles, the elephant faced son of Parvathi and Shiva, the one who rides on the Mouse and who has Modaka (a type of sweet) in his hand.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vinayaka Vinayaka
Vighna Vinashaka Vinayaka
Gowri Nandana Hey Shiva Nandana
Parvathi Nandana Gajanana
Mooshika Vahana Gajanana
Modaka Hasta Gajanana
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Vinayaka (Lord Ganesha), the destroyer of obstacles, the elephant faced son of Parvathi and Shiva, the one who rides on the Mouse and who has Modaka (a type of sweet) in his hand.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vishnu Mohini Sai Narayani
Ksheerabdhi Tanayey Sai Narayani |Vishnu Mohini...|
Lakshmi Manorama Kanchanabharini
Kamala Kaamini Sai Narayani
Sukha Sampada Sowbhagya Pradayini
Devotional Song Meaning: Mother Narayani (Goddess Lakshmi) is the enchanter of Lord Vishnu, born out of the ocean of milk, having a splendorous face, one who loves the Lotus flower, who bestows comfort and prosperity for everyone.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vishnu Satchidananda Venu Gopala Bala
Krishna Rama Govinda Hari Hari (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the various names of the Lord Vishnu, namely Rama, Govinda, Hari and the Child Krishna holding the flute in His hand, who are all the embodiments of Being (Sath), Awareness (Chith) and Bliss (Ananda).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vishwadhari Shiva Avatari
Sai Shankara Namo Namo |Vishwadhari Shiva...|
Mathura Natha Narayana Hari
Sai Shankara Namo Namo (Sathya) (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Sai, you are the very incarnation of Shiva and Lord Narayana of Mathura (Krishna).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vishwamayi Shiva Shakthimayi
Parama Dayamayi Premamayi |Vishwamayi Shiva|
Vedamayi Hey Brahmamayi
Premamayi Hey Gnanamayi
Jyothi Swaroopini Jaganmayi
Devotional Song Meaning: In this Bhajan the Mother Sai is extolled as one who is full of compassion, love and goodness and the embodiment of Veda, Speech and Sound (Brahma) and effulgence pervading the whole world.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vittala Bhajo Sai Vittala Bhajo (2)
Pandari Natha Panduranga Vittala Bhajo
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Vittala Bhajo
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of the Lord Vittala, also known as Panduranga the Lord of Pandharpur and the Lord Sai residing in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vittala Hari Vittala (3)
Panduranga (Purandara) Vittaley Hari Narayana
Hari Narayana Bhajo Narayana
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of of Hari Vittala, also known as Panduranga Vittala, Purandara Vittala, Sai Narayana and Sathya Narayana.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vittala Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana |Vittala|
Madhusudhana Narayana
Hey Shesha Shayana Narayana
Narayana (Hari) Sai Narayana (2)
Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala (2)
Vittala Vittala Parthi Ranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Narayana reclining on Adishesha (the celestial Snake). He is none other than Madhusudhana (Krishna),

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vittala Rakumayi Vittobha Rakumayi
Shirdi Maajhey Pandarpura Sai Maajhey Rakumayi
Pundalika Varada Panduranga Hari Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing praises of Mother Rakumayi and Her consort Vittala, of Shirdi and Pandharpur, the one who conferred boons on His devotee Pundalika.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vittala Vittala Hari Vittala
Vittala Vittala Naama Bhajo Hari Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Vittala Vittala Naam
Vittala Vittala Naama Bhajo Hari Vittala
Vittala Vittala Hari (Sai) Vittala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Vittala, Panduranga Vittala, Sai Vittala. Sing the glories of Lord Vittala at all times..

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vittala Vittala Narayana
Panduranga Vittala Narayana
Sri Ranganatha Narayana |Vittala Vittala...|
Paramesha Narayana
Paramatma Narayana
Jaya Parthi Vasa Narayana
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Narayana of Parthi you are verily Panduranga Vittala, Ranganatha, Paramesha and Paramatma, the supreme Lord (Synonyms of Lord Narayana).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Govinda Gopala Hari Narayana (Sai)
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana |Govinda Gopala...|
Parthi Pureesha Prashanthi Vasa Panduranga Vittala (2) |Govinda Gopala...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the different names of the Lord Panduranga Vittala, Govinda, Gopala, Narayana who has His abode at Prashanthi Nilayam in Parthi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vittala Vittala Vittala Jai Vittala Vittala Vittala Jai
Deena Bandhu Vittala Jai Karuna Sindho Vittala Jai
Apad Bandhava Vittala Jai Anatha Rakshaka Vittala Jai
Pandari Natha Vittala Jai Panduranga Vittala Jai
Parthi Pureesha Vittala Jai Prashanthi Nilaya Vittala Jai
Devotional Song Meaning: Glory to Lord Vittala, refuge of the downtrodden, reservoir of compassion.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Vittobha Vittala Panduranga
Panduranga Hari Panduranga |Vittobha Vittala...|
Narahari Ranga Ranga Panduranga
Purandara Ranga Panduranga |Panduranga Hari|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Panduranga, also known as Vittobha and Vittala, Narahari Ranga, Purandara Ranga and several other names.

Devotional Song Lyrics: Vyjayanthidhara Vanamala Dhara  Shankha Chakra Dhara Peetambara Dhara |Vyjayanthidhara Vanamala Dhara|  Srikara Purandara Giridhara Naagara  Muralidhara Ghana Shyama Manohara
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna, with the garland of flowers around your neck and wearing the Yellow coloured dress, adorning the Conch and the spinning Disc in each arm, you are the most beautiful sight for all.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yadava Kula Deepa Hey Nandalala
Hey Nandalala Sai Gopala |Yadava Kula|
Trayee Brindavana Shyama Gopala (Sai Gopala)
Sri Madhusudhana Sai Gopala
Jaya Muralidhara Hey Vraja Bala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Gopala you are the light of Yadu Dynasty, the Shyama Gopala of Trayee Brindavan. You are the Sai Gopala who annihilated demon Madhu in Dwapara age. Victory to You.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yadu Kula Nandana Sri Hari Madhava
Govinda Gopala Krishna Krishna
Madhava Murali Sri Madhusudhana
Mohana Radhey Krishna Krishna
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna of the Yadava clan, you are also known by different names as Madhava, Govinda, Gopala, Madhusudhana, Mohana and Radhey Krishna.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yadu Nandana Gopala
Jaya Brindavana Lola
Jaya Murali Gaana Vilola
Gopala Gopala Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: Chant the name of Sai Gopala, the son of Yadu dynasty, who moved around in Brindavan and who is enchanted by the sound of Flute He plays.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yadu Nandana Hey Ghana Shyam
Brindavana Sanchari Shyam |Yadu Nandana...|
Mora Mukuta Peetambara Dhari
Bansi Mohana Shyam
Maakhan Chora Yashoda Ke Natkat
Devaki Nandana Shyam (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Salutations to Lord Krishna also known as Shyam, son of Yadu dynasty, who strolls in Brindavan, wearing peacock feathers in His crown, dressed in yellow coloured clothes, who is fond of playing Flute, who steals butter from the house of Gopikas and the darling son of mother Yashoda and Devaki.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yadu Nandana Yashoda Bala
Madhava Keshava |Yadu Nandana...|
Mathura Natha Mama Sai Natha
Mandara Giridhara Madhusudhana Hey
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Son of Yadu dynasty, the son of Yashoda, you are the Lord Madhava and Keshava, the one who held aloft the hillock Mandara, Oh Lord Madhusudhana (Krishna).

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yamuna Teera Vihari Brindavana Sanchari
Govardhana Giridhari Gopala Krishna Murari
Chithravathi Teera Vihari Chinni Krishna Murari |Govardhana Giridhari...|
Prema Hrudaya Sanchari Parthi Puri Sri Sai |Govardhana Giridhari...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Krishna moves about in Brindavan and in the hearts of devotees filled with divine love and also on the banks of river Yamuna. The cute little Krishna who lifted the hillock Govardhana with his little finger, is the Sai of Parthi on the banks of the river Chitravathi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yashoda Bala Nanda Gopala
Gokula Bala Gopala Bala |Yashoda Bala...|
Yaduvara Giridhara Krishna Gopala
Jaya Jaya Meera Prabhu Nandalala
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh son of Nanda born of Yadu clan who held aloft the hillock Govardhana, who moves about in Gokula, Victory to you Oh Lord of devotee Meera.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yesu Masiha Sarva Loka Nayaka
Allah Ho Akbar Ilahi Sathya Sai Mahadeva
Sai Shirdi Sai Sathya Sai Jagannatha
Zohrashtra Buddha Mahaveer Sathya Sai Mahadeva
Devotional Song Meaning: Lord Sathya Sai, the master of the entire world and of all faiths, responds to all names such as Yesu Masiha, Allah, Zohrashtra, Buddha and Mahaveer.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yug Avatar Radhey Shyam
Radhey Shyam Bolo Radhey Shyam
Parama Niranjana Radhey Shyam
Paapa Vimochana Radhey Shyam
Parthi Pureeshwara Radhey Shyam |Radhey Shyam|
Devotional Song Meaning: Sing the name of Radhey Shyam of Parthi, the incarnation of this KALI age, who is always pure and who liberates us from all our sins.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yug Yug Ke Avatar Tum Hi Ho
Merey Ram Merey Shyam Shirdi Sai Parthi Ram
Jag Ke Palanhaar Tum Hi Ho
Allah Eshwara Terey Naam
Sab Ko Sanmati Do Bhagawan
Allah Eshwar Terey Naam Shirdi Sai Parthi Ram |Jag ke...|
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord of Shirdi and Parthi, you have incarnated from age to age, you are my Lord Rama and my Lord Krishna. you are the ruler of this Universe. You are Allah, Eshwar, bless us with wisdom Oh Lord.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yuga Avatara Palanhaara
Kaivalya Dayaka Ram O Sai |Yuga Avatara...|
Karuna Sagara Prem Ke Sindhu
Deena Bandhu Deena Nath Bhagawan
Alakh Niranjana Prashanthi Vasa Hrudayeshwara Sai Ram
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Baba! You have incarnated in this age, you are the one who grants liberation, you are the ocean of love and compassion, friend and Lord of the oppressed, ever pure and resident of Prashanthi Nilayam.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yuga Avatara Sai Rama
Rama Rama Ram (Sai)
Rama Rama Ram Sita Pathey Sri Ram (2) |Yuga Avatara...|
Parama Niranjana Prashanthi Rama
Sri Raghu Rama Sai Rama
Rama Rama Ram (Sai)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Rama you are the incarnation of this KALI age, the consort of Sita, Oh Lord Rama of Prashanthi, you are eternally pure, you are the Lord Rama of the Raghu dynasty.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yuga Avatara Sayeeshwara
Yadava Yadu Kula Nandana
Sundara Shubha Kara Sridhara
Madhava Keshava
Mangala Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: You are the incarnation of this KALI age Oh Sayeeshwara, you bestow auspiciousness, you are of Madhu lineage, of Yadu clan and the Consort of Goddess Lakshmi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yuga Avatara Sayeeshwara
Yadava Yadu Kula Nandana
Sundara Shubha Kara Sridhara
Madhava Keshava
Mangala Sai Gopala
Devotional Song Meaning: You are the incarnation of this KALI age Oh Sayeeshwara, you bestow auspiciousness, you are of Madhu lineage, of Yadu clan and the Consort of Goddess Lakshmi.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yuga Yuga Ke Avatara Sai Rama Sai Krishna Sai Baba
Baba Sai Baba Baba Sai Baba |Yuga Yuga...|
Allah Yesu Nanak Sai
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahaveera Sai
Ram Rahim Jai Ram Rahim Jai Ram Rahim Jai Ram (2)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Lord Sai You incarnate through different ages as Rama, Krishna and as Sai Baba. The devotees worship you by different names as Allah, Eshwara, Nanak, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahaveera, Ram and Rahim.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Yuga Yuga Vanditha Sai Baba
Sharanam Sharanam Shata Koti Sharanam
Treta Yuga Mey Tum Ho Ram Baba
Dwapara Yug Mey Tum Ho Krishna Baba
Kali Yug Mey Tum Ho Sathya Sai Baba |Sharanam Sharanam|
Sai Ram Sai Ram (3)
Devotional Song Meaning: Oh Baba, Millions surrendered at your feet during the past several eons. In the age of TRETA you were Rama, In the age of DWAPARA you were Krishna and in this age of KALI you are Sathya Sai Baba Oh my Sai Ram.

Devotional Song Lyrics:
Ganesha Sharanam, Ganesha Sharanam You are always protecting me, You are always
guiding me
Om Om Om Om
Saisha Sharanam, Saisha Sharanam
You are always protecting me, You are always
guiding me
Om Om Om Om

You are my safest place,
I’m always in Your sacred hands, You protect me Lord,
Whenever fear comes near, I believe in You,
Yes, I believe in You,
And I know that I ... am strong, In the love of my Lord.

We sing in the name of the One Eternal Infinite Being Who has many names
And is beyond all names and forms
We come together for healing, revealing who we are

Well I looked over Jordan and what did I see Comin’ for to carry me home

Tell all my friends I’m comin’ after you Comin’ for to carry me home.
Swing low, sweet chariot Comin’ for to carry me home Swing low, sweet chariot Comin’ for to carry me home.

Sathya Sai we join your chorus
We praise the love You place before us
Om Om
Sathya Sai, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Om Sathya Sai, Sai Ram, Om
Om Om
Oh, Lord Hear My Prayer, Oh, Lord Hear My Prayer, When I Call, Answer Me, Oh, Lord Hear My Prayer Oh, Lord Hear My Prayer Come And Listen To Me.

O God beautiful, O God beautiful At Thy feet, O I do bow
O God beautiful, O God beautiful

In the forest Thou art green In the mountain Thou art high In the river Thou art restless
In the ocean Thou art grave

(O God Beautiful)

To the serviceful, Thou art service To the bhakta, Thou art love
To the sorrowful, Thou art sympathy To the yogi, Thou art bliss
(O God beautiful)
To the Hindu, Thou art Krishna To the Buddhist, Thou art Buddha To the Christian Thou art Jesus Now on the Earth You’re Sai Baba
(O God beautiful) Om, Om

Into Your Hands I Lay My Spirit Into Your Hands I Lay My Life
Into Your Hands I, Into Your Hands I Into Your Hands I Lay

The wonder of God in you

We need Him in the morning We need Him in the night We need Him in the noonday

We need Him when we’re happy We need Him when we’re sad
We need Him when we’re burdoned And when our hearts are glad

If	we ever need the Lord before, We sure do need him now
Oh, we sure do need Him now Oh, we sure do need Him now
If	we ever needed the Lord before We sure do need Him now

Deep in my heart is a song of prayer O Great Spirit you are always there Deep in my heart is a song of prayer O Great Spirit you are always there
Deep in my heart…( Oh Great Spirit) . . . Deep in my heart …( Oh Great Spirit) . . .

I woke up this morning with my mind My mind it was stayed on Baba (x3)
Allelu (Allelu!) Allelu (Allelu!) Allelujah

Allelu (Allelu!) Allelu (Allelu!) Allelujah

Allelu (Allelu!) Allelu (Allelu!) Allelujah

Deep peace of the running wave to you Deep peace of the silent stars
Deep peace of the flowing air to you Deep peace of the quiet earth
May peace May peace May peace fill your soul May peace May peace
May peace make you whole.

We are standing on Holy Ground
And I know that there are angels all around Let us praise Swami now
We are standing in His presence on Holy Ground

Know that the Lord is sweetness itself Everything is a sign of His grace He is the nearest, He is the dearest Born in the world of Sri Sathya Sai
Hold on to Him as close as you can Knowing Him as an intimate friend

Prema Swaroopa Prema Anand Prema Swaroopa Prema BhagawaanYour will is my will, Your will is mine Your will is my will, Your will's divine My will is Your will, my will is Yours My will is Your will, our wills entwined Prema Swaroopa Prema Anand Prema
Swaroopa Prema Bhagawaan

There’s no place to go, there’s nothing left to do, There’s nothing left to see, there’s no one left to be For Your will is my will, Your will is mine

Bhagawaan

I keep feeling Your Love in me over and over again

Baba my lord

my lord

Friend
You are my Wisdom, You are my Treasure You are my Everything, You are my Lord, my
loving Lord

I am God, I am God, I am no different from God, I am the Infinite Supreme, the One Reality
I am Satchidananda Swaroopa I am Om Tat Sat Om

I am Love. I am Truth. I am Peace eternally.
I am ever pure Delight. I am always full and free.
Fear or grief can never touch me.
I Am Om Tat Sat Om

Never away from the avatar eyes, avatar eyes,
Sai Avatar eyes.
He's only as far as the space from hearts, he lives in our hearts, he lives in our hearts
Never away from the avatar eyes, avatar eyes,
Sai Avatar eyes.

avatar eyes, Sai Avatar eyes

Mother Oh Mother Sai Maa, You mean the whole world to me Sai Maa
Mother Oh Mother Sai Maa, You are the light of
my life Sai Maa

Maa Sai Maa Maa Sai Maa

(VAMP)

Amazing Grace, how sweet the sound That saved a soul like meI once was lost, but now I am found Was blind, but now I see
'Twas Grace that taught my heart to fear And Grace my fears relieved
How precious did that Grace appear The hour I first believed

(Amazing Grace)
